sentences.en: I want to buy a new bag.
sentences.cn: 我想買個新包包。

sentences.en: Jack hasn't been able to revise the article yet.
sentences.cn: 傑克還沒能修改文章。

cn: 關於，在⋯的附近 ad在四周

sentences.en: I know nothing about him.
sentences.cn: 我對他一無所知。

sentences.en: The book costs above $90.
sentences.cn: 這本書價格超過九十美元。

sentences.en: According to Lisa, Lucy has to leave this city.
sentences.cn: 據麗莎說，露西不得不離開這個城市。

sentences.en: Can you walk across the road quickly?
sentences.cn: 你能快速地穿過馬路嗎？

cn: v: 行動，扮演，做事，舉止

sentences.en: We must think carefully before we act.
sentences.cn: 行動之前，我們必須認真考慮。

sentences.en: You should put your ideas into action.
sentences.cn: 你應該把想法變成行動。

sentences.en: She dreamed of being an actress.
sentences.cn: 她夢想成為一名演員。

sentences.en: She was reluctant to add my name to the list.
sentences.cn: 她不願意在名單上加上我的名字。

sentences.en: My friend is going to address the meeting tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我朋友明天將在會議上致詞。

sentences.en: Her behavior looks like very adult.
sentences.cn: 她的行為看起來很成熟。

sentences.en: I'm afraid that I can’t lend money to you.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我不能借錢給你。

sentences.en: He planned to do housework after school.
sentences.cn: 放學後他打算做家事。

sentences.en: Shall we go to swim this afternoon?
sentences.cn: 我們今天下午去游泳怎麼樣？

sentences.en: I need to wash the plate again.
sentences.cn: 我需要再洗一次這個盤子。

sentences.en: There is no good for us to go against his decision.
sentences.cn: 反對他的決定對我們沒好處。

sentences.en: It's ages since we’ve danced together.
sentences.cn: 我們好久沒在一起跳舞了。

sentences.en: Two years ago, we had finished the task.
sentences.cn: 兩年前，我們就已經完成了這項任務。

sentences.en: My father will not agree on my opinion.
sentences.cn: 父親將不會同意我的觀點。

sentences.en: We should make contact with him ahead of time.
sentences.cn: 我們應該提前和他聯繫。

sentences.en: There is a scent in the air.
sentences.cn: 空氣中有一種香味。

sentences.en: I would like to send a letter by airmail.
sentences.cn: 我想寄封航空郵件。

sentences.en: He did not leave the airport until the airplane took off.
sentences.cn: 直到飛機起飛，他才離開機場。

sentences.en: Tomorrow I will pick Lily up at the airport.
sentences.cn: 明天我將去機場接莉莉。

sentences.en: All of us hang on her sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我們都很依賴她。

sentences.en: We are not allowed to sneak about there.
sentences.cn: 我們不能在那裡偷偷摸摸行動。

sentences.en: I almost never play football.
sentences.cn: 我幾乎從沒踢過足球。

sentences.en: We can't leave him alone in the kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 我們不能把他獨自留在幼稚園。

sentences.en: She saw me running along the road yesterday.
sentences.cn: 她昨天看到我沿著馬路跑。

sentences.en: We have already lived here for two years.
sentences.cn: 我們已經在這裡住兩年了。

sentences.en: They also should pay attention to the air pollution.
sentences.cn: 他們也應該關注空氣污染。

sentences.en: I always try to help other people.
sentences.cn: 我總是盡力幫助別人。

sentences.en: I must admit that I am a lazy man.
sentences.cn: 我不得不承認我是個懶惰的人。

sentences.en: She is the only girl among us.
sentences.cn: 她是我們當中唯一的女孩。

sentences.en: My brother and my friend are both reading a book now.
sentences.cn: 我的哥哥和我的朋友現在都在看書。

sentences.en: Her anger is out of control.
sentences.cn: 她無法控制自己的憤怒。

sentences.en: She was very angry because I did not wait for her.
sentences.cn: 她很生氣，因為我沒等她。

sentences.en: Animals can be divided into many species.
sentences.cn: 動物可分為很多種類。

sentences.en: Let's find another seat.
sentences.cn: 我們再找個座位。

sentences.en: It is easy for me to answer the question.
sentences.cn: 我可以輕易回答這個問題。

sentences.en: I'm afraid of ants.
sentences.cn: 我害怕螞蟻。

sentences.en: Any one of us is a good dancer.
sentences.cn: 我們之中的任何一個人舞都跳得很好。

sentences.en: I can do anything for you if you like.
sentences.cn: 如果你願意，我可以為你做任何事。

sentences.en: They say humans evolved from apes.
sentences.cn: 據說，人類是由猿猴演變而來的。

sentences.en: I hope he can appear on time tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我希望他明天能準時出現。

sentences.en: This is an apple on his table.
sentences.cn: 在他桌上的是顆蘋果。

sentences.en: In April, I will return to my native town.
sentences.cn: 四月份，我將回故鄉。

sentences.en: We are looking forward to buying a new car.
sentences.cn: 我們期待買一輛新車。

sentences.en: It has a population of one million in this area.
sentences.cn: 這個地區有一百萬人口。

sentences.en: His arm is longer than mine.
sentences.cn: 他的手臂比我的長。

sentences.en: Without the army, people will have no sense of security.
sentences.cn: 沒有軍隊，人民會沒有安全感。

sentences.en: My grandmother always says the moon revolves around the earth.
sentences.cn: 我奶奶總是說月球圍繞地球運轉。

sentences.en: My sister is good at art.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹擅長藝術。

sentences.en: As expected, she came here on time.
sentences.cn: 不出所料，她準時來到了這裡。

sentences.en: I will ask Jim to clean the room.
sentences.cn: 我將要求吉姆打掃房間。

sentences.en: Just at that moment, the boy burst into tears.
sentences.cn: 就在那時，這個男孩突然哭了起來。

sentences.en: Last August, I moved to this city from New York.
sentences.cn: 去年八月，我從紐約搬到了這個城市。

cn: 姑姑，阿姨，伯母，嬸嬸，舅母

sentences.en: I have to take care of my aunt tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天得照顧阿姨。

sentences.en: Autumn is my favorite season.
sentences.cn: 秋季是我最喜愛的季節。

sentences.en: I live twenty miles away from the company.
sentences.cn: 我住在離公司二十英里遠的地方。

sentences.en: She just gave birth to a baby.
sentences.cn: 她剛生完小孩。

sentences.en: Please remember to give back the book to me.
sentences.cn: 請記得把書還給我。

sentences.en: I am bad at singing songs.
sentences.cn: 我不擅長唱歌。

sentences.en: What has he got in the green bag?
sentences.cn: 他那個綠色的袋子裡裝的是什麼？

sentences.en: She threw away that ball.
sentences.cn: 她把那個球扔了。

sentences.en: I have a colorful balloon.
sentences.cn: 我有一顆彩色氣球。

sentences.en: Eating bananas is good for the eyes.
sentences.cn: 吃香蕉對眼睛有好處。

sentences.en: The band is very popular with people.
sentences.cn: 這個樂隊很受人們的歡迎。

sentences.en: My mother withdrew some money from the bank.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽從銀行領了一些錢。

sentences.en: I have never been to a bar.
sentences.cn: 我從來沒去過酒吧。

sentences.en: The barber is very kind to the customers.
sentences.cn: 這個理髮師對客人很和善。

sentences.en: Most of the poor people are based at the house.
sentences.cn: 大部分窮人都被安置在這個房子裡。

sentences.en: As is well known, she likes the baseball champion.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，她喜歡那個棒球冠軍。

sentences.en: Citizens enjoy basic human rights.
sentences.cn: 公民享有基本的人身權利。

sentences.en: Please give me the basket.
sentences.cn: 請把這個籃子給我。

sentences.en: I would rather play basketball than stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我寧願打籃球而不願待在家裡。

sentences.en: People rarely see bats.
sentences.cn: 人們很少見到蝙蝠。

sentences.en: I want to have a shower instead of a bath.
sentences.cn: 我不想泡澡，想要淋浴。

sentences.en: Do you like bathing in the river?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡在河裡洗澡嗎？

sentences.en: Could you tell me where the bathroom is?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我洗手間在哪嗎？

sentences.en: If he doesn't want to join us, then so be it.
sentences.cn: 如果他不願意加入我們，那就隨他便吧。

sentences.en: Mr. Brown is walking on the beach.

sentences.en: She thinks that bears look very ugly.
sentences.cn: 她認為熊看起來很醜。

sentences.en: The rain is beating against the window, and I am sitting beside it.
sentences.cn: 雨敲打著窗戶，我坐在窗戶邊。

sentences.en: Lucy is the most beautiful girl I have ever seen.
sentences.cn: 露西是我見過最漂亮的女孩。

sentences.en: A lot of people praise highly natural beauty.
sentences.cn: 很多人推崇自然美。

sentences.en: I went to sleep because it was too late to do anything.
sentences.cn: 我去睡覺了，因為太晚了什麼也做不成。

sentences.en: As he thought, James becomes a successful man.
sentences.cn: 正如他所想，詹姆斯成了一名成功人士。

sentences.en: Do you want to have a rest in bed?
sentences.cn: 你想在床上休息一會兒嗎？

sentences.en: I have found that my mother is as busy as a bee every day.
sentences.cn: 我發現母親每天忙得像蜜蜂似的。

sentences.en: I haven't listened to the song before.
sentences.cn: 我從來沒聽過這個歌。

sentences.cn: 你什麼時候開始學俄語的？

sentences.en: There is a tree behind my house.
sentences.cn: 我家的後面有一棵樹。

sentences.en: I don't believe she is our teacher’s daughter.
sentences.cn: 我不相信她是我們老師的女兒。

sentences.en: Can you hear the bell is ringing?
sentences.cn: 你能聽到門鈴在響嗎？

sentences.en: Does the book belong to him?
sentences.cn: 這本書是屬於他的嗎？

sentences.en: The temperature is below 20 degrees now.
sentences.cn: 現在溫度在二十度以下。

sentences.en: Do you like to sit beside me?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡坐在我旁邊嗎？

sentences.en: Who is your best friend?
sentences.cn: 誰是你最好的朋友？

sentences.en: You'd better tell him the truth.
sentences.cn: 你最好告訴他實話。

sentences.en: You have to choose one between the two colors.
sentences.cn: 你必須在兩種顏色中挑選一種。

sentences.en: The bicycle is a little cheaper than that one.
sentences.cn: 這輛腳踏車比那輛便宜一點。

sentences.en: Which is the biggest room?
sentences.cn: 哪個是最大的房間？

sentences.en: The bird flew from the south.
sentences.cn: 這隻鳥從南方飛來。

sentences.en: Although she was of rich birth, she led a simple life.
sentences.cn: 儘管出身富貴，她卻過著簡樸的生活。

sentences.en: I want to get rid of bad habits bit by bit.
sentences.cn: 我要一點一點地改掉壞習慣。

sentences.en: That dog often bites people.
sentences.cn: 那隻狗經常咬人。

sentences.en: The black cat ran away from my home.
sentences.cn: 那隻黑貓從我家逃跑了。

sentences.en: Lily's home is nearby; it is only three blocks away.
sentences.cn: 莉莉的家就在附近，距此只有三條街。

sentences.cn: 我一看到血，就要暈過去。

sentences.en: I really enjoy the feeling of the wind blowing my hair.
sentences.cn: 我很享受風吹著頭髮的感覺。

sentences.en: The blue skirt is different from the red one.
sentences.cn: 這件藍色的裙子和那件紅色的不同。

sentences.en: Who told you there is a boat?
sentences.cn: 誰告訴你這裡有船？

sentences.en: Smoking is harmful to your body.
sentences.cn: 吸菸對你的身體有害。

sentences.en: These two dogs are fighting for a bone.
sentences.cn: 這兩隻狗正為一根骨頭而打架。

sentences.en: Can I borrow your book?
sentences.cn: 我能借你的書嗎？

sentences.en: He was born with a speech talent.
sentences.cn: 他生來就有演講天賦。

sentences.en: Both of you must go to the dinner party.
sentences.cn: 你們兩個都必須去參加晚宴。

sentences.en: We should stick to our own bottom line.
sentences.cn: 我們應該堅守自己的底線。

sentences.en: I'd like a bowl of porridge.
sentences.cn: 我要一碗粥。

sentences.en: I sent a box of oranges to her.
sentences.cn: 我寄了一箱柳丁給她。

sentences.en: The boy is cleverer than his elder brother.
sentences.cn: 這個男孩比他哥哥聰明。

sentences.en: If you were a brave man, you would be fearless in your daily life.
sentences.cn: 如果你是個勇敢的人，日常生活中你將無所畏懼。

sentences.en: I almost eat bread every morning.
sentences.cn: 我幾乎每天早上都吃麵包。

sentences.en: The window glass was broken by the boy.
sentences.cn: 窗戶玻璃被那個男孩打破了。

sentences.en: I don't understand why you don’t have breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你為什麼不吃早餐。

sentences.en: There is not much clearance for us to pass under the small bridge.
sentences.cn: 這座小橋下沒有多餘的空隙能讓我們通過。

sentences.en: We all believe that Tom will have a bright future.
sentences.cn: 我們都認為湯姆會有一個光明的未來。

sentences.en: Can you bring me something to eat?
sentences.cn: 你能帶些吃的東西給我嗎？

sentences.en: My brother is a good boy.
sentences.cn: 我的弟弟是個好男孩。

sentences.en: I want to see the brown sweater.
sentences.cn: 我想看那件棕色的毛衣。

sentences.en: Aren't you afraid of bugs?
sentences.cn: 你不害怕臭蟲嗎？

sentences.en: They decide to build a new school.
sentences.cn: 他們決定建一所新學校。

sentences.en: The man who is in front of the building comes of a good stock.
sentences.cn: 大樓前面那個人出身世家。

sentences.en: Do you like to take a bus or be on foot?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡搭公車還是步行？

sentences.en: She is busy cooking supper.
sentences.cn: 她正忙著做晚餐。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, but I can’t help you.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我不能幫你。

sentences.en: You should blend the butter and sugar together.
sentences.cn: 你應該把奶油和糖混合在一起。

sentences.en: Can you tell the difference between a butterfly and a moth?
sentences.cn: 你能說出蝴蝶和蛾的區別嗎？

sentences.en: My friend bought a hairpin for me.
sentences.cn: 我朋友買了一個髮夾給我。

sentences.en: I was tripped by a stone.
sentences.cn: 我被一塊石頭絆倒了。

sentences.en: The bird was confined in the cage.
sentences.cn: 這隻鳥被關在籠中。

sentences.en: This cake tastes good.
sentences.cn: 這塊蛋糕嚐起來不錯。

sentences.en: People always call her Snow White for some reason.
sentences.cn: 出於某種原因，人們總是叫她白雪公主。

sentences.en: We should let the camels drink some water.
sentences.cn: 我們應該讓駱駝喝點水。

sentences.en: My camera was imported from Germany.
sentences.cn: 我的相機是從德國進口的。

sentences.en: Now, many parents would like to attend the summer camp with their children.
sentences.cn: 現在，很多家長願意和他們的孩子一起參加夏令營。

sentences.en: Can you do me a favor?
sentences.cn: 你能幫我一個忙嗎？

sentences.en: The little girl threw the candy to me.
sentences.cn: 那個小女孩把糖果丟給我。

sentences.en: Who is the man in the duckbill cap?
sentences.cn: 戴鴨舌帽的那個男人是誰？

sentences.en: The structure of my car is very simple.
sentences.cn: 我的汽車結構很簡單。

sentences.en: I intend to send my father a handmade card on Father's Day.
sentences.cn: 我打算在父親節送給父親一張親手做的卡片。

sentences.en: We should take good care of ourselves when we leave our parents.
sentences.cn: 離開父母時，我們要照顧好自己。

sentences.en: You must be careful when you open the bottle.
sentences.cn: 你打開這個瓶子時，一定要小心。

sentences.en: The weather forecast says it will rain today, so don't forget to carry your umbrella.
sentences.cn: 天氣預報說今天有雨，因此你不要忘了帶傘。

sentences.en: In most cases, the parents love their children with all their heart.
sentences.cn: 大部分情況下，父母都是全心全意愛他們的孩子。

sentences.en: Leopards and cats look alike.
sentences.cn: 豹和貓長得很像。

sentences.en: Upon seeing me, she excitedly caught my arm.
sentences.cn: 一見到我，她就激動地抓住我的胳膊。

sentences.en: What is the cause of the fire?
sentences.cn: 引起這起火災的原因是什麼？

sentences.en: Can you guess how many cents there are in my hand?
sentences.cn: 你能猜出我手裡有多少一分的硬幣嗎？

sentences.en: The pillar is the center of my house.
sentences.cn: 這根柱子是我房子的中心。

sentences.en: It is certain that he likes high-tech products.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定的是，他喜歡高科技產品。

sentences.en: Did you see my chair?
sentences.cn: 你看到我的椅子了嗎？

sentences.en: Please give me a chance, let me show my talent.
sentences.cn: 請給我一個機會，讓我展示我的才能。

sentences.en: Please draw the chart out immediately.
sentences.cn: 請馬上把這張圖表繪製出來。

sentences.en: The timid boy doesn't have the courage to chase the dog.
sentences.cn: 這個膽小的孩子沒有勇氣去追趕那隻狗。

sentences.en: I go to the hospital for a check-up every year.
sentences.cn: 我每年都去醫院進行體檢。

sentences.en: A group of chicks are looking for worms to eat in my yard.
sentences.cn: 在我的院子裡，一群小雞正在找蟲子吃。

sentences.en: She makes her living by selling chicken.
sentences.cn: 她靠賣雞肉為生。

sentences.en: Our chief purpose is to improve the life quality.
sentences.cn: 我們的主要目的是提高生活品質。

sentences.en: Don't be too hard on the child.
sentences.cn: 別對孩子太苛刻了。

sentences.en: Many people think that Christmas is a festival to celebrate.
sentences.cn: 很多人認為耶誕節是一個值得慶祝的節日。

sentences.en: There is a church near my home.
sentences.cn: 我家附近有一個教堂。

sentences.en: I aspire to live in a small city.
sentences.cn: 我渴望去小城市生活。

sentences.en: We are from different classes.
sentences.cn: 我們來自不同的班級。

sentences.en: You must keep the room clean and tidy.
sentences.cn: 你們一定要保持房間乾淨、整潔。

sentences.en: You should make it clear to her that you don't agree with her plan.
sentences.cn: 你應該清楚地告訴她，你不同意她的計畫。

sentences.en: I think mountain climbing is also a form of exercise.
sentences.cn: 我覺得爬山也是一種運動形式。

sentences.en: This clock in my house has a long history.
sentences.cn: 我屋子裡的這座鐘有著悠久的歷史。

sentences.en: Please don't forget to close the window after work.
sentences.cn: 下班後不要忘記關窗。

sentences.en: Dark clouds are a sign of rain, let's go home quickly.
sentences.cn: 烏雲是要下雨的預兆，我們快點回家吧。

sentences.en: We set up a tent on the coast.
sentences.cn: 我們在海岸邊搭帳篷。

sentences.en: Whose coat is this?
sentences.cn: 這是誰的外套？

sentences.en: Mother says chocolate is made from cocoa powder.
sentences.cn: 媽媽說巧克力是由可可粉製作成的。

sentences.en: The woman is very dependent on coffee.
sentences.cn: 這個女人很依賴咖啡。

sentences.en: Research shows that drinking Coca-Cola is bad for your teeth.
sentences.cn: 研究表明，喝可樂對牙齒不好。

sentences.en: My cold has continued for a week.
sentences.cn: 我的感冒已經持續一周了。

sentences.en: I have a variety of colors in my wardrobe.
sentences.cn: 我的衣櫃裡有各種顏色的衣服。

sentences.en: The train is coming.
sentences.cn: 火車來了。

sentences.en: The two of us don't have much in common.
sentences.cn: 我們兩個沒有太多共同點。

sentences.en: Let's continue the class.
sentences.cn: 我們繼續上課。

sentences.en: He is very interested in cooking.
sentences.cn: 他對烹飪很感興趣。

sentences.en: I hate eating cookies.
sentences.cn: 我討厭吃餅乾。

sentences.en: Today the weather is getting cool.
sentences.cn: 今天天氣變涼爽了。

sentences.en: Do you believe that cats like to eat boiled corn?
sentences.cn: 你相信貓咪喜歡吃煮熟的玉米嗎？

sentences.en: He insisted that his decision was correct.
sentences.cn: 他堅持認為自己的決定是正確的。

sentences.en: I get from my mother that the chair cost $15.
sentences.cn: 我從媽媽那裡知道這張椅子花了十五美元。

sentences.en: Please count how many dogs there are in the yard.
sentences.cn: 請數一下院子裡有多少隻狗。

sentences.en: I think different countries have different cultures, so we should respect the foreign guests.
sentences.cn: 我覺得不同的國家有不同的文化，所以我們應該尊重外國客人。

sentences.en: The course these adults take is an absolute doddle.
sentences.cn: 這些成年人學的課程簡直太容易了。

sentences.en: Mother covers the quilt for me every night.
sentences.cn: 媽媽每天晚上都為我蓋被子。

sentences.en: Who knows how many cows there are on the farm?
sentences.cn: 有誰知道這個農場有多少頭牛？

sentences.en: She is fascinated with the cowboy.
sentences.cn: 她對那個牛仔很著迷。

sentences.en: Long time ago, a crow was the symbol of auspiciousness.
sentences.cn: 很久以前，烏鴉曾是吉祥的象徵。

sentences.en: Suddenly a loud cry broke the quiet night.
sentences.cn: 突然一聲叫喊打破了平靜的夜晚。

cn: 幼童軍，（獅、虎、熊、狐）幼獸，年輕人

sentences.en: The cub returned to his mother's arms.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕人回到了媽媽的懷抱。

sentences.en: Please wash the cups.
sentences.cn: 請把這些杯子洗一下。

sentences.en: She used scissors to cut cloth.
sentences.cn: 她用剪刀把布剪破了。

sentences.en: It is such a cute dog that everyone wants to touch it.
sentences.cn: 牠是如此可愛的一隻狗，每個人都想撫摸牠。

sentences.en: The little girl likes to play with her daddy.
sentences.cn: 這個小女孩喜歡和爸爸一起玩。

sentences.en: I don't mind dancing with him.
sentences.cn: 我不介意和他跳舞。

sentences.en: My mother said that I have the gift of a dancer.
sentences.cn: 媽媽說我有成為舞蹈家的天賦。

sentences.en: The real danger is that people don't realize the danger.
sentences.cn: 真正的危險是人們意識不到危險。

sentences.en: We should not be affected by the dark side of society.
sentences.cn: 我們不應該受社會陰暗面的影響。

sentences.en: Up to date, I haven't been to his house.
sentences.cn: 到目前為止，我還沒去過他家。

sentences.en: The couple has no daughter.
sentences.cn: 這對夫婦沒有女兒。

sentences.en: He works day and night for his son.
sentences.cn: 他為了兒子不分白天黑夜地工作。

sentences.en: His father has been dead for five years.
sentences.cn: 他的父親已經去世五年了。

sentences.en: We should actively deal with the problems.
sentences.cn: 我們應該積極地處理問題。

cn: n: 可愛的人，親愛的人

sentences.en: You will always be my dearest friend.
sentences.cn: 你永遠是我最親愛的朋友。

sentences.en: Don't be sad, for birth and death is the law of nature.
sentences.cn: 別傷心了，因為生死是大自然的規律。

sentences.en: In December, I will attend a big wedding ceremony.
sentences.cn: 十二月份，我要參加一個盛大的結婚典禮。

sentences.en: Have you decided to give up the competition?
sentences.cn: 你已經決定要放棄比賽了嗎？

sentences.en: His smile left a deep impression on me.
sentences.cn: 他的笑容給我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.en: The deer ran away at the sight of the lion.
sentences.cn: 這群鹿一看到獅子就逃跑了。

sentences.en: Where is Jack's desk?
sentences.cn: 傑克的桌子在哪裡？

sentences.en: This old lady's only son died last week. It was a big blow for her.
sentences.cn: 這位老太太唯一的兒子上周死了，這對她來說是一個很大的打擊。

sentences.en: The twins have different characters.
sentences.cn: 這對雙胞胎有著不同的性格。

sentences.en: We must bravely face all kinds of difficult problems, and then find ways to overcome them.
sentences.cn: 我們要勇敢地面對各種難題，然後想辦法克服它們。

sentences.en: Grandpa is digging holes to plant trees in the yard.
sentences.cn: 爺爺正在院子裡挖洞種樹。

sentences.en: We are preparing a hearty dinner.
sentences.cn: 我們正在準備一頓豐盛的晚餐。

sentences.en: His direct expression made me at a loss.
sentences.cn: 他直接的表白令我不知所措。

sentences.en: His room is so dirty that nobody wants to enter it.
sentences.cn: 他房間裡太髒以至於沒人願意進去。

sentences.en: He is the person who first discovered the small lake.
sentences.cn: 他是第一個發現那個小湖的人。

sentences.en: He can make very exquisite dishes.
sentences.cn: 他能製作很精美的盤子。

sentences.en: I have formed the habit of doing exercise every day.
sentences.cn: 我已經養成了每天都做運動的習慣。

sentences.en: It is reported that the doctor has a superb skill and noble medical ethics.
sentences.cn: 據報導，這名醫生有著高超的醫術和高尚的醫德。

sentences.en: In a sense, dogs and people are equal.
sentences.cn: 從某種意義上來說，狗和人是平等的。

sentences.en: Barbie is the best-selling doll in the 20th century.
sentences.cn: 芭比娃娃是二十世紀最暢銷的玩偶。

sentences.en: To tell you the truth, this gift cost me 100 dollars.
sentences.cn: 老實跟你說，這個禮物花了我一百美元。

sentences.en: My mother tells me the door to success opens only for the prepared people.
sentences.cn: 媽媽告訴我，成功之門只為有準備的人打開。

sentences.en: Dove is one of the most common birds.
sentences.cn: 鴿子是最常見的鳥之一。

sentences.en: I want to note down what he says.
sentences.cn: 我想把他說的話記下來。

sentences.en: Lily said that she would wait for me downstairs after school.
sentences.cn: 莉莉說放學後她會在樓下等我。

sentences.en: How much are a dozen socks?
sentences.cn: 一打襪子多少錢？

sentences.en: I drew a conclusion that he dislikes women.
sentences.cn: 我得出結論，他不喜歡女人。

sentences.en: I will do my best to realize my dream.
sentences.cn: 我要盡自己最大的努力去實現我的夢想。

sentences.en: He often goes to the pub for a drink.
sentences.cn: 他經常去那家酒館喝酒。

sentences.en: It's hard to drive a car in the water.
sentences.cn: 在水裡開車很困難。

sentences.en: A drunken driver is a danger to the public.
sentences.cn: 喝醉的駕駛對公眾是一個威脅。

sentences.en: Some people can't adapt themselves to the dry climate in the desert regions.
sentences.cn: 有些人無法適應沙漠地區的乾燥氣候。

sentences.en: Have you tried Peking duck?
sentences.cn: 你吃過北京烤鴨嗎？

sentences.en: Can you see a group of ducklings swimming in the pond?
sentences.cn: 你能看見一群小鴨子正在池塘裡游泳嗎？

sentences.en: During my illness, my mother had been taking care of me.
sentences.cn: 在生病期間，母親一直在照顧我。

sentences.en: We need to be patient to each person here.
sentences.cn: 我們對這裡的每一個人都要有耐心。

sentences.en: I have been dreaming of flying freely in the sky like the eagle.
sentences.cn: 我一直夢想著像鷹一樣在空中自由飛翔。

sentences.en: His biggest characteristic is that he has a pair of big ears.
sentences.cn: 他最大的特徵是有一雙大耳朵。

sentences.en: Early to bed and early to rise is beneficial to the health of our body.
sentences.cn: 早睡早起有利於身體的健康。

sentences.en: Who on earth should take the responsibility?
sentences.cn: 究竟誰該承擔責任呢？

sentences.en: I was struck with ease after finishing the task.
sentences.cn: 完成任務後，我突然感到一陣輕鬆。

sentences.en: The train he takes is moving toward east.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐的火車向東方行駛。

sentences.en: It is not easy to struggle alone in the city.
sentences.cn: 獨自一個在城市奮鬥很不容易。

sentences.en: After eating, I have to do the dishes.
sentences.cn: 飯後，我得洗餐具。

sentences.en: We live on the edge of the city.
sentences.cn: 我們住在城市的邊緣。

sentences.en: Let's count the eggs.
sentences.cn: 我們數一數雞蛋。

sentences.en: To our surprise, she gave birth to eight children.
sentences.cn: 令我們吃驚的是，她竟然生了八個孩子。

sentences.en: The man is eighteen years older than his wife.
sentences.cn: 這個男人比妻子大十八歲。

sentences.en: In my family, the proportion of females is eighty percent.
sentences.cn: 在我家，女性的比例是百分之八十。

sentences.en: It turns out that they don't select either of us.
sentences.cn: 結果證明，他們不選我們當中的任何一個。

sentences.en: It's a pity that we did not see the elephant in the zoo.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，我們在動物園裡沒看到大象。

sentences.en: Eleven plus five is sixteen.
sentences.cn: 十一加五等於十六。

sentences.en: There's nothing else but some old chairs in the room.
sentences.cn: 除了幾把舊椅子，房間沒有別的。

sentences.en: Let's put an end to this debate.
sentences.cn: 我們結束這場辯論吧。

sentences.en: Most people agree that English is the most common language in the world.
sentences.cn: 大部分人認為，英語是世界上最通用的語言。

sentences.en: I don't have enough money.
sentences.cn: 我沒有足夠的錢。

sentences.en: We are not allowed to enter the room.
sentences.cn: 我們不能進入房間。

sentences.en: He always says that everybody is equal before the law.
sentences.cn: 他總說法律面前人人平等。

sentences.en: They brushed straight by without even looking at the poor boy.
sentences.cn: 他們直接走過，甚至不看那個可憐的男孩一眼。

sentences.en: If the cat doesn't eat anything tomorrow evening, take it to the vet.
sentences.cn: 如果小貓明天晚上不吃東西，就帶牠去醫院吧。

sentences.en: Miss Liu is the kindest woman that she has ever seen.
sentences.cn: 劉女士是她曾經遇到最仁慈的女士。

sentences.en: I will vacuum the interior every time I wash my car.
sentences.cn: 我每次洗車的時候用吸塵器清理內部。

sentences.en: I will finish this examination paper in ninety minutes.
sentences.cn: 我將在九十分鐘內完成這份試卷。

sentences.en: It is he that is sent to examine into the matter.
sentences.cn: 奉派去調查那件事情的是他。

sentences.en: Door-to-door delivery is right an example of our good services.
sentences.cn: 送貨上門更是我們服務的表現。

sentences.en: I think LINE is the best way for communication except mobile telephone.
sentences.cn: 我認為 LINE是手機之外最好的聯繫方式。

sentences.en: The couple don't usually see eye to eye on many matters.
sentences.cn: 這對夫婦經常在許多事情上意見不和。

sentences.en: The doctor says there is no way to hide the freckles in his face.
sentences.cn: 醫生說他臉上的雀斑沒辦法掩蓋。

sentences.en: She seemed by implication to acknowledge that fact last night.
sentences.cn: 她昨晚似乎含蓄地承認了那事實。

sentences.en: They say the trouble is that our factory is running at full capacity.
sentences.cn: 他們說，問題是我們公司的訂單已經滿了。

sentences.en: They know that the temperature has fallen to zero from the thermometer.
sentences.cn: 看溫度計他們得知氣溫已經降到零度。

sentences.en: I believe an open enemy is better than a false friend.
sentences.cn: 我相信虛偽的朋友比公開的敵人更壞。

sentences.en: My best friend stopped smoking with the help of his family.
sentences.cn: 我最好的朋友在家人的幫助下戒了菸。

cn: 扇子，（運動等）狂熱愛好者，風扇

sentences.en: I don't know this fan is broken.
sentences.cn: 我不知道這電扇壞了。

sentences.en: As far as I know, his car crashed into a big tree.
sentences.cn: 據我所知，他的車撞到一棵大樹。

sentences.en: I heard a small percentage of the farm produce was ruined.
sentences.cn: 我聽說農產品中的一小部分壞掉了。

sentences.en: The farmer called his wife out of bed early at six.
sentences.cn: 這位農夫六點鐘把妻子從床上叫起來。

sentences.en: I used to have a liking for fast cars.
sentences.cn: 我曾經很喜歡快車。

sentences.en: You'll get fat if you continue to eat so many sweets.
sentences.cn: 如果你繼續吃這麼多的糖果，你會發胖的。

sentences.en: His father has the habit of smoking during meals.
sentences.cn: 他父親有邊吃飯邊抽菸的習慣。

sentences.en: I fear he is coming back soon.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他很快就要回來了。

sentences.en: I got to know him in February.
sentences.cn: 我二月份認識了他。

sentences.en: I think it doesn't pay to feed animals.
sentences.cn: 我認為飼養牲口划不來。

sentences.en: He still felt sad after getting better.
sentences.cn: 康復後，他仍然覺得很傷心。

sentences.en: I had a feeling of deep sorrow as I heard the news.
sentences.cn: 得知那個消息我深感遺憾。

sentences.en: After a long flight they suffered from jet lag for a few days.
sentences.cn: 他們在長途飛行後，有幾天時差不適。

sentences.en: It cost him fifteen dollars to repair the clock.
sentences.cn: 修這個鐘花了他十五美元。

sentences.en: The young man was given an advance of fifty dollars on his salary.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕人預支了五十美元薪水。

sentences.en: I am always fighting with my sisters about the noise.
sentences.cn: 我常常為了噪音和妹妹們爭吵。

sentences.en: I was filled with joy when I saw you again.
sentences.cn: 再次看到你，我無比高興。

cn: 最後的，最終的，決定性的

sentences.en: It's indeed fortunate that his final attempt to fix it is successful.
sentences.cn: 幸運的是他最後這次把它修好了。

sentences.en: She found somewhere to park the car at last.
sentences.cn: 最後她找到了地方停車。

sentences.en: The fine weather tempted them to go out for a walk.
sentences.cn: 好天氣誘使他們出去散步。

sentences.en: My son had two fingers cut off by a knife while playing.
sentences.cn: 我兒子玩耍時被刀子切掉了兩根手指。

sentences.en: Since we've finished our housework, let’s play computer games and kill some time!
sentences.cn: 既然我們做完家事了，讓我們打電腦遊戲消磨時光吧！

sentences.en: Keep a fire extinguisher available at all times.
sentences.cn: 任何時候都要放置即時可用的滅火器。

sentences.en: The first thing he does after getting up is to make the bed.
sentences.cn: 他起床後的第一件事就是整理床鋪。

sentences.en: The idea of eating raw fish nauseates him.
sentences.cn: 他一想到吃生魚就噁心。

sentences.en: It has been five months since she left her hometown.
sentences.cn: 自從她離開家鄉已經五個月了。

sentences.en: House prices have gone through the floor these days.
sentences.cn: 近來房價已經降得很低了。

sentences.en: These roses have been in flower for three weeks.
sentences.cn: 這些玫瑰花已經開了三個星期。

sentences.en: If my son cleans his room, the pigs might fly.
sentences.cn: 如果我兒子整理自己的房間，豬都可以飛啦。

sentences.en: Let's get off after the dense fog melts away.
sentences.cn: 等濃霧消失後我們就出發。

sentences.en: What she said didn't make any sense. Don’t follow it.
sentences.cn: 她說的話根本沒有道理，不必照作。

sentences.en: The famous singer contributed food and clothing for us.
sentences.cn: 那個知名的歌星捐助食物和衣服給我們。

sentences.en: They are playing at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 他們在山腳下玩耍。

sentences.en: The girl gave up buying the skirt for the high price.
sentences.cn: 因為價格高，女孩沒有買那條裙子。

sentences.en: You'd better make friends with those who will force you to lever yourself up.
sentences.cn: 你最好交那些讓你不得不提升自己的朋友。

sentences.en: You should contact the foreign guests right away.
sentences.cn: 你應該立刻與外國客人取得聯繫。

sentences.en: The villagers put out the big forest fire at last.
sentences.cn: 村民們終於撲滅了那場森林大火。

sentences.en: Don't forget to lock the door before going out.
sentences.cn: 出門前，別忘了鎖門。

sentences.en: Do you use a knife and fork or would you rather use chopsticks?
sentences.cn: 你是使用刀叉呢，還是寧願用筷子？

sentences.en: You must reduce speed to forty kilometres an hour.
sentences.cn: 你必須把速度減到每小時四十公里。

sentences.en: We have the option of a two door or a four door model.
sentences.cn: 我們可選擇二門或四門的車型。

sentences.en: I started earning a living for myself at fourteen.
sentences.cn: 我十四歲開始自己謀生。

sentences.en: Are you free for having a dinner with me tomorrow?
sentences.cn: 你明天有空和我一起吃飯嗎？

sentences.en: The teacher asked him to open the window to let in some fresh air.
sentences.cn: 老師請他打開窗戶讓一些清新的空氣透進來。

sentences.en: He knows he is going to leave here on Friday.
sentences.cn: 他知道他這周五要離開這裡了。

sentences.en: I'd like you to meet my friend Kate.
sentences.cn: 我要給你介紹我的朋友凱特。

sentences.en: I saw the naughty child poke the frog with a stick.
sentences.cn: 我看見那個調皮的孩子用棍子撥動青蛙。

sentences.en: Before you repair the switch, heater must be disconnected from power supply.
sentences.cn: 你在修理開關前，務必切斷暖氣機的電源。

sentences.en: There is a lawn in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子前有一片草坪。

sentences.en: My hometown abounds with fruits, especially apples.
sentences.cn: 我的家鄉盛產水果，尤以蘋果著稱。

sentences.en: He'll be full of energy in several months.
sentences.cn: 幾個月後他就會感到精力充沛。

sentences.en: I have made up my mind to get as much fun as possible in the future.
sentences.cn: 我已經下了決心以後要及時行樂。

sentences.en: What a funny coat he is wearing!
sentences.cn: 他穿的外套多麼滑稽可笑啊！

sentences.en: Why don't you go to a football game?
sentences.cn: 你們為什麼不去看足球比賽呢？

sentences.en: I intend to plant some flowers in my new garden.
sentences.cn: 我計畫在新花園裡種一些花。

sentences.en: He wanted to get some gasoline at the gas station nearby.
sentences.cn: 他要在附近的加油站加些油。

cn: 全體的，普遍的，全面的，一般的

sentences.en: In general, those who drink and drive will cause traffic accidents.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，酒後開車的都易出車禍。

sentences.en: Will you tell me how to get to the nearest post office?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我最近的郵局在哪裡嗎？

sentences.en: The girl looked as if she had seen a ghost.
sentences.cn: 那女孩看起來就像見到鬼似的。

sentences.en: This one is a gift and the other one is for his own use.
sentences.cn: 這個是送人的禮物，另一個是他自己用的。

sentences.en: I got off with a pretty girl in the park.
sentences.cn: 我在公園裡結識一位美麗的女孩。

sentences.en: She gave him her picture as a memento before going away.
sentences.cn: 她在離別前給他一張照片留作紀念品。

sentences.en: She is glad she could be of some help to him.
sentences.cn: 她很高興能幫上他的忙。

sentences.en: He is thirsty, so please get him a glass of water.
sentences.cn: 他渴了，請給他一杯水解解渴。

sentences.en: The office gave her a present when she got married.

sentences.en: He was considered a master of witty banter in the office.
sentences.cn: 他被認為是辦公室裡逗樂子的好手。

sentences.en: Why did you get out of the football match this afternoon?
sentences.cn: 你為什麼要逃避今天下午的足球比賽？

sentences.en: I will discuss this matter with her tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天要和她討論這件事。

sentences.en: The meeting is to be held on May 5th.
sentences.cn: 會議定於五月五日舉行。

sentences.en: Buying household appliances may prove too costly.
sentences.cn: 購買家電可能會花太多錢。

sentences.en: Maybe he has changed his mind.
sentences.cn: 或許他已經改變了主意。

sentences.en: When do you think is convenient for me to visit you?
sentences.cn: 你認為我什麼時候拜訪你比較方便？

sentences.en: In my opinion, passing the entrance exam means being admitted into college.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，通過入學考試意味著被大學錄取。

sentences.en: He smelt at the meat and told me it had gone bad.
sentences.cn: 他聞了聞這塊肉，然後告訴我它已經壞了。

sentences.en: I rarely meet the guests face to face.
sentences.cn: 我很少和客戶們見面。

sentences.en: Please step to the middle, or you will block the door.
sentences.cn: 請往中間走，不然你就堵住門了。

sentences.en: It's about two miles over that way.
sentences.cn: 順著那條路，大約有兩英里。

sentences.en: Mix these fruits with the milk to make fruit salad.
sentences.cn: 把這些水果和牛奶調成水果沙拉。

sentences.en: Your words cut no ice with me—my mind was made up.
sentences.cn: 你說的話不起作用，我已下定決心了。

sentences.en: Please wait a minute; I am engaged at the moment.
sentences.cn: 請稍等一會兒，我現在正在忙。

sentences.en: Evidently, the man fell in love with Miss Black.
sentences.cn: 顯然，那個人愛上了布萊克小姐。

sentences.en: I have to go now; otherwise I'll miss the last bus.
sentences.cn: 我必須現在就走，要不然就趕不上末班車了。

sentences.en: She acknowledged publicly that she had made a mistake.
sentences.cn: 她當眾承認，自己犯了個錯誤。

sentences.en: Sorry, he just went out a moment ago.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，他剛才出去了。

sentences.en: I didn't comply with my mamma’s words when I was a little child.
sentences.cn: 我小的時候總是不聽媽媽的話。

sentences.en: Try your best, and mommy is always beside you.
sentences.cn: 盡力去做，媽媽永遠在你身邊。

sentences.en: She's covering for me on Monday.
sentences.cn: 她星期一會幫我代班。

sentences.en: I am dreading borrowing money from him.
sentences.cn: 我正在為向他借錢的事發愁。

sentences.en: How many golden monkeys did you see?
sentences.cn: 你看到了多少隻金絲猴？

sentences.en: We often go shopping at the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 月底，我們經常去購物。

sentences.en: It is said that the moon today is at its brightest and fullest.
sentences.cn: 據說，今天的月亮是最亮最圓的。

sentences.en: More and more people choose to take a bus when they go out.
sentences.cn: 愈來愈多的人出門選擇搭公車。

sentences.en: We all went to see them off on the morning of their departure.
sentences.cn: 他們離開的那個早上，我們都去送行。

sentences.en: Her eyes are her most striking feature.
sentences.cn: 她最引人注目的是那雙眼睛。

sentences.en: Mother says to keep a pet is a waste of time.
sentences.cn: 媽媽說，養寵物浪費時間。

sentences.en: After bidding them farewell, he left for the mountain to pray.
sentences.cn: 辭別了他們之後，他動身去山上禱告。

sentences.en: She is as quiet as a mouse.
sentences.cn: 她很文靜。

sentences.en: I can't stand it when people talk with their mouths full.
sentences.cn: 我無法忍受別人說話的時候滿嘴食物。

sentences.en: Let's move on to the prickly subject of where to set up the new factory.
sentences.cn: 我們繼續討論在哪裡建新廠這個棘手問題吧。

sentences.en: It is said that the movie is based on a real-life incident.
sentences.cn: 據說，這部電影是根據真實事件拍攝。

sentences.en: We have adopted Mr. Green as our manager.
sentences.cn: 我們接受格林先生作我們的經理。

sentences.en: Mrs. Li remarked that she seemed a quiet girl.
sentences.cn: 李太太評論說，她看起來是個文靜的女孩。

sentences.en: Would Ms. Wang please come forward?
sentences.cn: 請王小姐到前面來好嗎？

sentences.en: I'm afraid I’ve taken up too much of your time.
sentences.cn: 恐怕，我已經打擾您太久了。

sentences.en: He dirtied his trousers when he stepped on the mud.
sentences.cn: 他踩在爛泥裡，把褲子弄髒了。

sentences.en: I had a mug of cocoa before going to bed.
sentences.cn: 臨睡前，我喝了一杯可可。

sentences.en: I like pop music a lot.
sentences.cn: 我很喜歡流行音樂。

sentences.en: No matter who he is, he must obey the rules.
sentences.cn: 不論他是什麼人，都必須遵守規則。

sentences.en: I lost my balance and fell down.
sentences.cn: 我沒有站穩，就摔倒了。

sentences.en: I'm sorry. There is no one here by that name.
sentences.cn: 對不起，這裡沒有您說的這個人。

sentences.en: The two nations warred upon each other for over a decade.
sentences.cn: 這兩個國家互相打了十多年的仗。

sentences.en: I have a forbearing nature and I accept troubles with a smile.
sentences.cn: 我較為寬容，遇到麻煩也能一笑了事。

sentences.en: Are there any parks near the theatre?
sentences.cn: 劇院附近有停車場嗎？

sentences.en: The players are running neck and neck.
sentences.cn: 選手們跑得並駕齊驅。

sentences.en: I need someone to help me with the luggage.
sentences.cn: 我需要有人幫我搬行李。

sentences.en: He is never concerned about being born a bastard.
sentences.cn: 他從不介意自己是私生子。

sentences.en: It seems that you feel ambivalent about your new job.
sentences.cn: 你似乎對新工作喜憂參半。

sentences.en: The news of her marrying a foreigner came as a bombshell.
sentences.cn: 她要嫁給一個外國人，這個消息令人震驚。

sentences.en: He felt dismal after reading a piece of bad news in the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 在報上讀了一條不好的消息後，他心情憂鬱。

sentences.en: We have decided to go camping next week.
sentences.cn: 我們已決定下個星期去露營。

cn: 好的，可愛的，友好的，令人愉快的

sentences.en: It's been nice talking to you.
sentences.cn: 和你談話很愉快。

sentences.en: It must have rained last night for the road is wet.
sentences.cn: 路面是濕的，昨晚肯定下過雨。

sentences.en: That train gets there at nine o'clock on the button.
sentences.cn: 那班火車九點整到那裡。

sentences.en: They have nineteen days to stay here.
sentences.cn: 他們有十九天時間可以在這裡。

sentences.en: It is decided that we have to stay another ninety days.
sentences.cn: 已經決定了，我們不得不再停留九十天。

sentences.en: There is no need to worry about it.
sentences.cn: 不必為那件事煩惱。

sentences.en: My mother always fires up at the noise.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽總是一聽到噪音就生氣。

sentences.en: It is so noisy here that I can't do my homework.
sentences.cn: 這裡太吵，我沒法寫作業。

sentences.en: We had a very tolerable lunch this noon.
sentences.cn: 今天中午，我們吃了還算可以的午餐。

sentences.en: It neither increased nor decreased my income.
sentences.cn: 我既不會因此多賺些錢，也不會因此少賺些。

sentences.en: It's very cold in the north in winter.
sentences.cn: 北方的冬天特別冷。

sentences.en: When I gave her the present, she turned up her nose at it.
sentences.cn: 我送禮給她時，她對我的禮物不屑一顧。

sentences.en: Please don't drive too fast. I’m not in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 請不要開太快，我不趕時間。

sentences.en: You should make a brief note on the telephone pad.
sentences.cn: 你需要在電話通訊錄上記下簡短的話。

sentences.en: I have nothing to do with this matter.
sentences.cn: 我與這件事無關。

sentences.en: She is too proud to take notice of him.
sentences.cn: 她很驕傲，不理睬他。

sentences.en: They are expected to arrive there on November 5th.
sentences.cn: 他們有望在十一月五日抵達那裡。

sentences.en: I never dreamed of being your wife, but the fact is that I am your wife now.
sentences.cn: 我從未想過要當你的妻子，但是，現在我卻成為了你的妻子。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I have the wrong number.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我打錯電話了。

sentences.en: As a nurse, I am always full of thought for my patients.
sentences.cn: 作為護士，我對病人總是關心備至。

sentences.en: I'll pick you up tonight, OK?
sentences.cn: 今晚我去接你，好嗎？

sentences.en: Looking for the key there is like fishing for a needle in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 在那裡找鑰匙，就像是大海撈針。

sentences.en: I set the alarm clock for 7 o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我把鬧鐘定在七點鐘。

sentences.en: The number of travelers begins to tail off in October.
sentences.cn: 十月份遊客開始減少。

sentences.en: She often speaks ill of Jim behind his back.
sentences.cn: 她常在背後說吉姆的壞話。

sentences.en: What time do you think is better for us to set off?
sentences.cn: 你認為，我們什麼時候出發比較好？

sentences.en: I'm sure flowers will add beauty to your office.
sentences.cn: 我確信，花卉能美化您的辦公室。

sentences.en: You mean the crime was committed with the connivance of a military officer?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是說，這項罪行是在一名軍官的縱容下發生的？

sentences.en: Do you often contact your parents?
sentences.cn: 你經常和父母聯絡嗎？

sentences.en: An expert says the oil spill will cause incalculable damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 一位專家說，這次石油洩漏將對環境造成難以估計的損害。

sentences.en: The old lady engaged herself in looking after her grandson.
sentences.cn: 這位老太太忙著照顧孫子。

sentences.en: A young lady with graces appeared on the stage.
sentences.cn: 舞臺上出現了一位優雅的年輕女士。

sentences.en: I had a date with the girl once before.
sentences.cn: 我以前和那個女孩約會過。

sentences.en: All of us have to work together with one heart.
sentences.cn: 我們大家要齊心協力。

sentences.en: We're going to have only one child.
sentences.cn: 我們只打算要一個孩子。

sentences.en: Suddenly, a butterfly flew in from the open window.
sentences.cn: 突然，一隻蝴蝶從開著的窗戶飛了進來。

sentences.en: He spent days agonizing over whether to quit the job or not.
sentences.cn: 他用了幾天時間苦苦思考，是否要辭掉這個工作。

sentences.en: You can squeeze the juice from an orange.
sentences.cn: 你可以榨柳丁汁。

sentences.en: In order to accomplish your target, you should work hard to improve yourself.
sentences.cn: 為了達到你的目標，你應該努力精進自己。

sentences.en: My father and mother are always bickering about something or other.
sentences.cn: 我父母總是在為這樣那樣的事情爭吵。

sentences.en: It's a pity our trip to Japan is cancelled.
sentences.cn: 真遺憾，我們去日本的旅行取消了。

sentences.en: Sorry, my parents won't allow me to stay out late.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我父母不會允許我在外待得很晚。

sentences.en: Look, a compact sitting-room of the same genre is outside.
sentences.cn: 看，外面是間具有同樣格調的小小起居室。

sentences.en: A hawk is hovering over the hill.
sentences.cn: 一隻鷹在小山丘上空翱翔。

sentences.en: I advise you not to go out on your own at night.
sentences.cn: 我奉勸你，晚上別單獨外出。

sentences.en: His job is laying out the graphics on the page.
sentences.cn: 他的工作是設計頁面上的圖表。

sentences.en: I am engrossed in painting.
sentences.cn: 我全神貫注於繪畫。

sentences.en: I have two pairs of trousers to be washed and pressed.
sentences.cn: 我有兩條褲子要洗熨。

sentences.en: Do you have pants to go with the jacket?
sentences.cn: 你們有和這件夾克搭配的褲子嗎？

sentences.en: Ask your papa to help you ease off your belt a bit.
sentences.cn: 讓你爸爸幫你把腰帶鬆開些。

sentences.en: I think Spring Festival couplets are written on red paper.
sentences.cn: 我覺得春聯是寫在紅紙上。

sentences.en: The judge said no parent can duck out of his / her duty to his / her children.
sentences.cn: 法官說，沒有一個父母可以逃避自己對孩子應盡的責任。

sentences.en: We'll get to the amusement park soon.
sentences.cn: 我們很快會到遊樂園。

sentences.en: I want to invite all of you to a party.
sentences.cn: 我想請你們所有人參加一個派對。

sentences.en: It's impossible for you to pass the exam if you don’t work hard to improve yourself.
sentences.cn: 如果你不好好精進自己，就不可能通過考試。

sentences.en: I have built a solid friendship with my classmates in the past three years.
sentences.cn: 在過去三年裡，我與同學們建立深厚的友誼。

sentences.en: You must pay a deposit for the library card.
sentences.cn: 你得為圖書卡繳押金。

sentences.en: We are required to write our exercises in pen.
sentences.cn: 我們被要求用鋼筆做練習。

sentences.en: He bore hard upon the pencil and it broke.
sentences.cn: 他使勁壓鉛筆，然後鉛筆就斷了。

sentences.en: You know people have the right to wear what they like.
sentences.cn: 要知道，人們有權力穿自己喜歡的衣服。

sentences.en: Perhaps he could assist in some way.
sentences.cn: 也許，他能幫上什麼忙。

sentences.en: We can't find a suitable person to do that thing.
sentences.cn: 我們找不到一個合適的人選去做那件事。

sentences.en: My son keeps a dog as a pet.
sentences.cn: 我兒子養了一條狗作寵物。

sentences.en: Lily is playing the piano in her room.
sentences.cn: 莉莉正在她的房間裡彈鋼琴。

sentences.en: It is a picture of me in my school days.
sentences.cn: 那是我學生時代的照片。

sentences.en: What he said was only pie in the sky.
sentences.cn: 他所說的實在是渺茫得很。

sentences.en: I can do it. It's a piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 我能辦得到的，這不費吹灰之力。

sentences.en: Look, a dead pig is lying on the ground.
sentences.cn: 看，地上躺著頭死豬。

sentences.en: It took us ages to find a place to park last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我們找了好半天，才找到停車的地方。

sentences.en: Our plan had some difficulties in being in operation.
sentences.cn: 我們在執行計畫時遇到一些困難。

sentences.en: I am going to buy some potted plants.
sentences.cn: 我要去買些盆栽。

sentences.en: I often go to play football out of hours.
sentences.cn: 我在工作時間之外常常踢足球。

sentences.en: He is second to none as a basketball player.
sentences.cn: 作為一名籃球隊員，誰都贏不了他。

sentences.en: There used to be a playground in the region.
sentences.cn: 這個地區曾經有個遊樂場。

sentences.en: Wash your hands before you come in, please.
sentences.cn: 請先洗洗手再進來。

sentences.en: The key will be muddled up with something else in your pocket.
sentences.cn: 你口袋裡的鑰匙會和其他東西混在一起。

sentences.en: His son has a gift for poetry.
sentences.cn: 他兒子有作詩的天賦。

sentences.en: My point is that we should go back now.
sentences.cn: 我的觀點是，我們現在應該立刻回去。

sentences.en: At that time, I sensed something was amiss and called the police.
sentences.cn: 那時候，我覺得有點不對勁，就叫了警察。

sentences.en: I saw the policeman discharge his gun at the fleeing thief.
sentences.cn: 我看見警察向那個逃跑的小偷開了槍。

sentences.en: The little child dropped into the pond.
sentences.cn: 那個小孩子掉進池裡去了。

sentences.en: The pool was fenced off because it was dangerous.
sentences.cn: 這個水池很危險，所以用柵欄圍起來。

sentences.en: A poor boy called John was killed in the accident, too.
sentences.cn: 一個名叫約翰的可憐男孩也在這次意外中喪生。

sentences.en: He wants a pile of popcorn of the butyric flavor.
sentences.cn: 他想要一堆奶油味的爆米花。

sentences.en: You'd better shift your position from the horizontal.
sentences.cn: 你最好從水平姿勢變換成其他姿勢。

sentences.en: Do you think it is possible to arrive there on time?
sentences.cn: 你認為有沒有可能準時到那裡？

sentences.en: We've just had a power failure.
sentences.cn: 我們這裡剛停了電。

sentences.en: I plan to join a language club to practice English speaking.
sentences.cn: 我打算參加語言俱樂部練習說英語。

sentences.en: If I had not prepared for my English exam, I would have attended your party.
sentences.cn: 如果我不用準備英語考試，我就會去參加你的派對了。

sentences.en: My new car is pretty good and it stops on a dime.
sentences.cn: 我的新車很不錯，剎車很靈。

sentences.en: What's the price of the blue coat?
sentences.cn: 那件藍色外套多少錢？

sentences.en: They asked him to print the word in Italics.
sentences.cn: 他們要求他用斜體印出這個詞。

sentences.en: With my help, she ought to have no problem.
sentences.cn: 有了我的幫助，她應該不會有什麼問題。

sentences.en: I will prove to the world that I am the best.
sentences.cn: 我要向全世界證明，我是最棒的。

sentences.en: He will be ashamed to show his face in public.
sentences.cn: 他不好意思拋頭露面。

sentences.en: Let's go over and help him pull the big box.
sentences.cn: 我們過去幫他拉那個大箱子。

sentences.en: People decorate baskets with purple ribbons on that day.
sentences.cn: 在那一天，人們用紫色的絲帶來裝飾籃子。

sentences.en: Their main purpose is to raise money.
sentences.cn: 他們的主要目的就是募款。

sentences.en: If you always push him too hard, he will go mad.
sentences.cn: 如果你總是逼他太緊，他會發瘋的。

sentences.en: It's time to put an end to their little caper.
sentences.cn: 是時候制止他們的胡鬧了。

sentences.en: To our surprise, the queen had a plain face.
sentences.cn: 讓我們吃驚的是，那位女王相貌平平。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I won’t be able to answer your question now.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我現在不能回答你的問題。

sentences.en: I know he is quick on the uptake.
sentences.cn: 我知道他的理解力很強。

sentences.en: Keep quiet, your little sister is sleeping.
sentences.cn: 安靜些，你的小妹妹在睡覺。

sentences.en: It's quite straightforward to find my house.
sentences.cn: 找到我家相當容易。

sentences.en: I am against race prejudice.
sentences.cn: 我反對種族歧視。

sentences.en: The astonishing news was given out over the radio.
sentences.cn: 這個令人震驚的消息是通過無線電發出的。

sentences.en: To build a new railroad there will be a mammoth job.
sentences.cn: 在那裡修建一條新鐵路將會是一項巨大的工程。

sentences.en: If it doesn't rain this weekend, will you go camping with us?
sentences.cn: 如果這個周末不下雨，你會和我們一起去露營嗎？

sentences.en: There is a beautiful rainbow hanging in the sky.
sentences.cn: 一條美麗的彩虹懸掛在天上。

sentences.en: I hope to raise my daughter to be a decent person.
sentences.cn: 我希望把女兒培養成優秀人才。

sentences.en: I occasionally see the rats in this house.
sentences.cn: 我有時會在這個房子裡發現老鼠。

sentences.en: We didn't reach the village until it got dark.
sentences.cn: 我們直到天黑才到達那個村莊。

sentences.en: A man read the gas meter just now.
sentences.cn: 一名男子剛才來查看了瓦斯表。

sentences.en: Run along and get ready for bed.
sentences.cn: 走，準備去睡覺。

cn: 真實的，正宗的，名副其實的

sentences.en: We'll never get to know the real England there.
sentences.cn: 我們在那裡根本不會瞭解真正的英國。

sentences.en: What is the reason for the picture's appeal?
sentences.cn: 這幅畫為什麼具有吸引力？

sentences.en: Nothing is more important than to receive education for the girl.
sentences.cn: 對於這個女孩來說，沒有比接受教育更重要的事情了。

sentences.en: I have red eyes due to lack of sleep.
sentences.cn: 由於缺乏睡眠，我的雙眼佈滿血絲。

sentences.en: I remembered that he was the drunken man.
sentences.cn: 我記得他就是那個喝醉酒的人。

sentences.en: Can you tell me how to write this report?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我如何寫這份報告嗎？

sentences.en: You deserve a rest after cleaning the house.
sentences.cn: 打掃完房子後，你應該休息一下。

sentences.en: I'll certainly pass your message on to him as soon as he returns.
sentences.cn: 他一回來，我就把你的口信傳給他。

sentences.en: We mustn't waste a grain of rice.
sentences.cn: 我們不能浪費一粒米。

sentences.en: I often dream about being a rich man.
sentences.cn: 我常常夢想成為一個富人。

sentences.en: The girl got on her bicycle and rode off.
sentences.cn: 女孩騎上腳踏車走了。

sentences.en: You'd better put the dressing table on the right.
sentences.cn: 你最好把梳粧檯放在右邊。

sentences.en: He borrowed the wedding ring from his best friend.
sentences.cn: 結婚戒指是從他最好的朋友那裡借來的。

sentences.en: They all rose cheering to their feet.
sentences.cn: 他們都起立歡呼。

sentences.en: The children dived into the river to cool off.
sentences.cn: 孩子們跳進河裡涼快一下。

sentences.en: Unluckily, the only road to the village was blocked by a fallen tree.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，通往那個村莊的唯一道路被一棵倒下的樹擋住了。

sentences.en: I don't think a robot can think for itself.
sentences.cn: 我認為機器人不能獨立思考。

sentences.en: Try to push the rock with all your might.
sentences.cn: 試著全力推那塊石頭。

sentences.en: Two months rolled by, and the school finished at last.
sentences.cn: 兩個月過去了，學校終於放假了。

sentences.en: The roof collapsed under the weight of the snow last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚屋頂被雪壓坍了。

sentences.en: I'd like to book a single room with a bath.
sentences.cn: 我想預訂一間附衛浴的單人套房。

sentences.en: If you can pass the exam, the rooster will lay eggs.
sentences.cn: 如果你能通過考試，公雞就會下蛋了。

sentences.en: Her stinginess is the root of trouble.
sentences.cn: 她的吝嗇是苦惱的根源。

sentences.en: The thief let himself down by means of a rope.
sentences.cn: 那個小偷用一條繩子滑了下來。

sentences.en: On Valentine's Day, she held a bouquet of roses.
sentences.cn: 情人節那天，她捧著一束玫瑰花。

sentences.en: The girl came round soon.
sentences.cn: 女孩很快就醒了過來。

sentences.en: A row of boys are standing in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 一排男孩正站在房子前面。

sentences.en: The girl rubbed her face with the back of her hand.
sentences.cn: 女孩用手背擦了擦臉。

sentences.en: The floor of the hall is covered with rubber to prevent slipping.
sentences.cn: 大廳的地板上覆蓋著橡膠以防滑。

sentences.en: I make it a rule to take a short walk after dinner.
sentences.cn: 我習慣在晚餐後散步。

sentences.en: He ran 100 meters in a surprising 12-second time.
sentences.cn: 他以驚人的十二秒時間跑完了一百公尺。

sentences.en: I am so sad to hear that your grandmother has passed away.
sentences.cn: 聽說你奶奶去世了，我十分難過。

sentences.en: It is safe to cross the road with the help of the policeman.
sentences.cn: 在這位警察的幫助下過馬路很安全。

sentences.en: Look, the boats are sailing on the water.
sentences.cn: 看，船正在水面上航行。

sentences.en: The mobile phone will be on sale next week.
sentences.cn: 這款手機將於下周上市。

sentences.en: I taste the soup to see if he has put enough salt in it.
sentences.cn: 我嚐了嚐湯，看他是否放了足夠的鹽。

sentences.en: Though we are the same age, you look younger than me.
sentences.cn: 雖然我們同歲，可是你看起來比我年輕。

sentences.en: They were walking about on the sands with bare feet.
sentences.cn: 他們正赤腳在沙灘上四處漫步。

sentences.en: He enjoyed a round of golf on Saturday mornings.
sentences.cn: 他喜歡在周六上午打一場高爾夫球。

sentences.en: It will help you save much money if you travel by public transportation.
sentences.cn: 搭乘公共交通工具可以幫你省下很多錢。

sentences.en: The man went away with a saw in hand.
sentences.cn: 那個人拿著鋸子離開了。

sentences.en: There's a lot to be said for eating reasonably.
sentences.cn: 合理飲食的好處不勝枚舉。

sentences.en: If we make a noise, we'll scare off the thief.
sentences.cn: 如果我們發出聲響，會把小偷嚇跑。

sentences.en: The workshop was a scene of feverish activity when the boss came in.
sentences.cn: 老闆進來時，車廠裡是一片緊張匆忙的景象。

sentences.en: Let me explain why I was late for school this morning.
sentences.cn: 讓我解釋一下今天早上上學遲到的原因。

sentences.en: The doctor recommends sea baths for the benefit of my health.
sentences.cn: 醫生勸我做海水浴以養生。

sentences.en: How long does the rainy season last?
sentences.cn: 雨季會持續多久？

sentences.en: Take a seat as soon as possible after you enter the hall.
sentences.cn: 進入大廳後，儘快找個座位坐下來。

sentences.en: I flunked Chinese in second grade.
sentences.cn: 我二年級時國文不及格。

sentences.en: I saw two men fighting beside your door this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早上我看到有兩個人在你家門前打架。

sentences.en: Look, the farmers are scattering seed.
sentences.cn: 看，農民們在播種。

sentences.en: Their children are always going to parties and seem to sleep out nearly every night.
sentences.cn: 他們的孩子總是去參加派對，好像幾乎每晚都在外過夜。

sentences.en: Price of the rice has gone up and down like a seesaw.
sentences.cn: 米的價格像蹺蹺板一樣時漲時跌。

sentences.en: It is easy for him to lose his self esteem.
sentences.cn: 他很容易失去自尊。

sentences.en: I am disgusted with the behavior of the selfish woman.
sentences.cn: 我很討厭那個自私女人的行為。

sentences.en: These kinds of pens are all sold out.
sentences.cn: 這些類型的鋼筆全部賣完了。

sentences.en: We are obliged to send our children to school.
sentences.cn: 我們有義務送子女去上學。

sentences.en: We can't deny that he has strong sense of time.
sentences.cn: 我們不能否認，他有很強的時間觀念。

sentences.en: I heard the judge handed down a very heavy sentence on her.
sentences.cn: 我聽說法官給她判了很重的刑。

sentences.en: It is September and time to pick the cotton; am I right?
sentences.cn: 九月了，摘棉花的時候到了，我說的對嗎？

sentences.en: I asked the waiter to come over to serve me.
sentences.cn: 我讓服務生過來接待我。

sentences.en: What do you think of this restaurant's service?
sentences.cn: 你認為這間餐廳的服務如何？

sentences.en: I must set a limit to the expense of the trip.
sentences.cn: 我必須給這次的旅遊定下預算。

sentences.en: It is required that they leave before seven o'clock.
sentences.cn: 他們得在七點之前離開。

sentences.en: My sister was only seventeen when she joined the army.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹加入國軍時才十七歲。

sentences.en: My grandmother died at the age of seventy.
sentences.cn: 我奶奶享年七十歲。

sentences.en: Mary has lost her voice for several days.
sentences.cn: 瑪麗嗓子啞了好幾天了。

sentences.en: Shake the tablecloth before putting it away.
sentences.cn: 桌布收起來之前要抖一下。

sentences.en: My idea is that we shall eat more fruits.
sentences.cn: 我的意見是，我們要多吃水果。

sentences.en: The cake is in the shape of a heart.
sentences.cn: 蛋糕呈心形。

sentences.en: The man was killed by a man-eating shark.
sentences.cn: 那個人被一條食人鯊殺死了。

sentences.en: She has a sharp tongue, and no one likes her.
sentences.cn: 她言語刻薄，沒有人喜歡她。

sentences.en: She won't feel secure when she is alone in the house.
sentences.cn: 她一個人在家時感覺不安全。

sentences.en: Let's drive the sheep down the hill.
sentences.cn: 我們把羊趕下山吧。

sentences.en: The servant tore the sheet in half.
sentences.cn: 僕人把床單撕成兩半。

sentences.en: We began to go home when the setting sun shone in.
sentences.cn: 夕陽西下時，我們開始回家。

sentences.en: Where is this ship bound for?
sentences.cn: 這船開往哪裡？

sentences.en: Will you iron the shirt for me?
sentences.cn: 你能為我熨一下這件襯衫嗎？

sentences.en: The famous singer is as common as an old shoe.
sentences.cn: 那個著名的歌星很平易近人。

sentences.en: A new kind of chair is on display in the shop.
sentences.cn: 商店裡展出了一種新椅子。

sentences.en: I think it is a good idea to go shopping tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我認為明天去逛街是個好主意。

sentences.en: The ship is anchored off the shore.
sentences.cn: 船在海岸處拋了錨。

sentences.en: Whenever you are short of money, just come to me.
sentences.cn: 你什麼時候缺錢，都可以來找我。

sentences.en: You should have asked the doctor for a shot of penicillin.
sentences.cn: 你本應該讓醫生給你打一針青黴素。

sentences.en: Would you show me the place where I should put my shoulder bag?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我應該把這個背包放在哪裡嗎？

sentences.en: He always shouts at people when he gets angry.
sentences.cn: 他一生氣就對人大喊大叫。

sentences.en: Would you like to show me the bus stop for the National Palace Museum?
sentences.cn: 去故宮博物院的公車站在哪裡？

sentences.en: She shut the door after she came into the room.
sentences.cn: 走進房間後她就把門關上了。

sentences.en: The child isn't shy at all with us.
sentences.cn: 這個小孩在我們面前一點也不害羞。

sentences.en: I'm getting sick of hearing that.
sentences.cn: 我聽夠了。

sentences.en: Well, you can park your car on either side of the street.
sentences.cn: 嗯，你可以把車停在街道的任何一邊。

sentences.en: All children are equal in the sight of the parents.
sentences.cn: 父母對所有孩子都一視同仁。

sentences.en: Isn't it silly to see a movie that you know nothing about?
sentences.cn: 你不覺得看一部你一點都不瞭解的電影有點荒唐嗎？

sentences.en: I plunked down $ 350 for a silver necklace.
sentences.cn: 我花了三百五十美元買一條銀項鍊。

sentences.en: He led a thrifty and simple life although he was an official.
sentences.cn: 他雖然當官，但生活儉樸。

sentences.en: Since we have a baby, we need a two-bedroom apartment.
sentences.cn: 我們有個小孩，所以要一個有兩間臥室的公寓。

sentences.en: It's not easy to sing a song in front of people.
sentences.cn: 在眾人面前唱歌不是件容易的事。

sentences.en: Rumor has it that the famous singer lost her job and went on the line.
sentences.cn: 傳言說那位知名的歌手失業了，淪為娼妓。

sentences.en: Your flight will be delayed for another two hours, sir.
sentences.cn: 先生，您的班機將再延遲兩個小時起飛。

sentences.en: You must tell me why you don't like my sister.
sentences.cn: 你必須告訴我你不喜歡我妹妹的原因。

sentences.en: The girl sat at her desk reading a novel.
sentences.cn: 女孩坐在桌邊看一本小說。

sentences.en: The news that she has been pregnant for six months came through private channels.
sentences.cn: 她已懷孕六個月這個消息來源於小道消息。

sentences.en: In total, sixteen people were injured in a traffic accident last night.
sentences.cn: 共有十六個人在昨晚的交通事故中受傷。

sentences.en: I will cease to write at the age of sixty.
sentences.cn: 我六十歲將停止寫作。

sentences.en: What's the size of your normal group to Hong Kong?
sentences.cn: 你們去香港的旅遊團一般有多大？

sentences.en: Do you have the skill to ride a bike on a rope?
sentences.cn: 你有在繩子上騎腳踏車的本事嗎？

sentences.en: Roughness of the skin can be caused by bad diet.
sentences.cn: 飲食不好可能引起皮膚粗糙。

sentences.en: It's pie in the sky. You’ll never get the money.
sentences.cn: 那根本不可能，你永遠也拿不到錢。

sentences.en: I slept like the dead last night and did not hear anything.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我睡得像死人，什麼也沒有聽到。

sentences.en: The new employees are slow to adapt to the rules.
sentences.cn: 新雇員對於那些規定適應得很慢。

sentences.en: Americans play small tricks on friends and strangers on April Fool's Day.
sentences.cn: 不論是對朋友還是對陌生人，美國人都喜歡在愚人節時搞些惡作劇。

cn: 伶俐的，聰明的，漂亮的，整齊的

sentences.en: I can see that you are a smart buyer.
sentences.cn: 我看得出你買東西很精明。

sentences.en: You must have smelt the smell of dinner.
sentences.cn: 你一定聞到晚餐的味道了。

sentences.en: A smile of craftiness passed across her face.
sentences.cn: 她臉上掠過一絲狡黠的微笑。

sentences.en: Do they allow smoking in the cinemas?
sentences.cn: 他們允許在電影院裡抽菸嗎？

sentences.en: I can't overcome my repugnance to eating snakes.
sentences.cn: 吃蛇真噁心，我可受不了。

sentences.en: My car is stuck in deep snow.
sentences.cn: 我的車陷進深雪中。

cn: 所以，因此 ad那麼，這樣，如此

sentences.en: Mom told me that it's not good for our teeth to eat so many sweet foods.
sentences.cn: 媽媽告訴我吃太多甜食對我們的牙齒不好。

sentences.en: I bought two cakes of soap last week.
sentences.cn: 我上周買了兩塊肥皂。

sentences.en: I would like a cup of tea and a bottle of soda as well.
sentences.cn: 我想要一杯茶，也要一瓶蘇打水。

sentences.en: My son was asleep on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 我兒子在沙發上睡著了。

sentences.en: I've got to buy two soft berth tickets to Bei-jing for tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我想買兩張明天到北京的軟臥票。

sentences.en: The soil is adaptable to the growth of flowers.
sentences.cn: 土壤適宜於花的生長。

sentences.en: I feel like having some dumplings.
sentences.cn: 我想吃一些水餃。

sentences.en: It is my pleasure to know someone like you.
sentences.cn: 可以認識到你這樣的人是我的榮幸。

sentences.en: The letter has something to do with her husband.
sentences.cn: 這封信與她丈夫有關。

sentences.en: My mother often swore at me, sometimes for no reason at all.
sentences.cn: 媽媽經常罵我，有時毫無理由。

sentences.en: She is badly cut up by the death of her son.
sentences.cn: 她因兒子的死極為悲傷。

sentences.en: The song has a good beat that we can dance to.
sentences.cn: 這首歌的節奏很強，我們可以跟著跳舞。

sentences.en: But for your help, I couldn't have found my lost father so soon.
sentences.cn: 如果沒有你的幫助，我不可能這麼快找到我失蹤的父親。

cn: a: 感到難過的，對不起的

sentences.en: I'm sorry, but I didn’t notice you.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我沒注意到你。

sentences.en: I'm not going to sell my soul just to make money.
sentences.cn: 我不會為了賺錢而出賣自己的靈魂。

sentences.en: It sounds like a reasonable solution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 這個解決問題的辦法似乎比較合理。

sentences.en: Eggs and tomatoes go well together in the soup.
sentences.cn: 湯中放入雞蛋和番茄嚐起來很對味。

sentences.en: If we keep milk for a long time it will turn sour.
sentences.cn: 如果牛奶放的時間長了，它就會變酸。

sentences.en: The harbor lies to the south of our city.
sentences.cn: 港口位於我們這個城市的南邊。

sentences.en: I know she took my parking space just to spite me.
sentences.cn: 我知道她為了使我惱怒而搶我的停車位。

sentences.en: The moment he spoke he regretted his words.
sentences.cn: 話一說出，他就後悔了。

sentences.en: Is there something special in your painting?
sentences.cn: 你的畫有什麼特殊的地方嗎？

sentences.en: It is important that we do not interrupt the speech of others.
sentences.cn: 不打斷別人說話是很重要的。

sentences.en: How do you spell your name?
sentences.cn: 您的名字怎麼拼寫？

sentences.en: He had to spend some money again to have his watch repaired.
sentences.cn: 他又要花些錢去修錶了。

sentences.en: My boyfriend was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 我男朋友生於富貴之家。

sentences.en: What sport do you like among basketball, football or ping-pong?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡哪種球類：籃球、足球還是乒乓球？

sentences.en: Spring is just around the corner.
sentences.cn: 眼看春天就要到了。

sentences.en: I slipped and tumbled down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我腳一滑滾下了樓梯。

sentences.en: He stood in various poses while he was photographed.
sentences.cn: 他照相時擺出了各種姿勢。

sentences.en: A little bird told me that new movie star would come to visit our city.
sentences.cn: 有人告訴我那個新電影明星要來我們城市。

sentences.en: I have to start packing and get ready for move next week.
sentences.cn: 我下周得開始打包行李準備搬家了。

sentences.en: Be sure to get in touch with him when you visit the States.
sentences.cn: 到美國去的時候，一定要跟他聯絡。

sentences.en: I think there's not a vestige of truth in the witness’s statement.
sentences.cn: 我認為這個證人的證詞沒有絲毫的真實性。

sentences.en: I suggest that we leave early for the train station.
sentences.cn: 我建議我們早一點去火車站。

sentences.en: I must accustom myself to staying up late.
sentences.cn: 我得使自己習慣晚睡覺。

sentences.en: He's the first man to step out of the bus.
sentences.cn: 他是第一個下公車的人。

sentences.en: I think she still has chance to get into the university.
sentences.cn: 我認為她還有上大學的機會。

sentences.en: You are bound to move the big stone.
sentences.cn: 你肯定能搬動那塊大石頭。

sentences.en: Do you mean you won't stop your bad eating habits?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是說你不會停止不良的飲食習慣？

sentences.en: As far as I can remember, the store was closed down four years ago.
sentences.cn: 我記得那家商店四年前倒閉了。

sentences.en: You should bring home to him the real meaning of the story.
sentences.cn: 你應該讓他知道這個故事的真正含義。

sentences.en: Every time I hear the strange sound, I feel frightened.
sentences.cn: 每次我聽到那個奇怪的聲音，都會覺得害怕。

sentences.en: Do you mind if I sit on the street to have a rest?
sentences.cn: 你介意我坐在馬路上休息一會嗎？

sentences.en: Do you realize that the girl is fond of strong men?
sentences.cn: 你知道這女孩喜歡強壯的男士嗎？

sentences.en: I didn't mean to offend the foreign student.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要冒犯那個留學生的。

sentences.en: I am calling to ask something about studying.
sentences.cn: 我打電話來是想諮詢一些有關學習的問題。

sentences.en: I have never seen such a stupid person.
sentences.cn: 我從沒見過這麼蠢的人。

sentences.en: You are blessed in having such a good wife.
sentences.cn: 你娶到如此一位賢妻真是三生有幸啊。

sentences.en: I can't understand why you like eating sugar.
sentences.cn: 我搞不懂你怎麼會喜歡吃糖。

sentences.en: It is expected that this summer will be extremely hot.
sentences.cn: 預計今年夏天會非常地熱。

sentences.en: The truth is that the Earth goes around the sun.
sentences.cn: 事實是，地球繞著太陽轉。

sentences.en: Make sure all mobile phones are turned off.
