sentences.cn: 我絕不允許自己陷入那麼多的風流韻事。

sentences.en: If you had not aided me, I should have been scolded by the teacher.
sentences.cn: 要不是你幫我，我今天就要被老師責備了。

sentences.en: The aim of the campaign is to remind people of the damage of wine.
sentences.cn: 這項活動的目的在於提醒人們注意飲酒的危害。

sentences.en: If the fog disappeared, the aircraft the travelers take would arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 如果霧散了，遊客們乘坐的飛機就能準時到達。

sentences.en: To save time, the visitors could transfer to an airplane with another airline.
sentences.cn: 為了節省時間，遊客們可以換乘另一條航線的飛機。

sentences.en: If the guard had noticed the fire alarm at that time, the visitors would not be in hospital now.
sentences.cn: 如果當時警衛注意到火災警報，遊客們現在就不會躺在醫院裡了。

sentences.en: Please put the photo taken on the scenic spot in the album and take good care of it.
sentences.cn: 把這張在景點照的照片放入相冊中並好好保管。

sentences.en: This picture you drew is alike to that one.
sentences.cn: 你畫的這張畫跟那張很像。

sentences.en: People said several visitors were alive in the air crash.
sentences.cn: 據說有幾個遊客在這次空難中生還。

cn: 杏仁，杏樹，杏仁狀的東西

sentences.en: The doctor says it is bad to eat bitter almonds.
sentences.cn: 那名醫生說吃苦杏仁不好。

sentences.en: It's impolite to talk aloud in public when you travel abroad.
sentences.cn: 你在國外旅遊時，在公共場合大聲交談很不禮貌。

sentences.en: What's the meaning of the alphabet on the wall of the theatre?
sentences.cn: 劇院牆上的字母是什麼意思？

sentences.en: Although the woman is fat, she walks fast.
sentences.cn: 儘管那個女人很胖，但是她走得很快。

sentences.en: There are about 2,000 visitors, as far as I know, in the scenic spot altogether.
sentences.cn: 據我所知，景點約有兩千名遊客。

sentences.en: I earned a large amount of money by selling goods in the park.
sentences.cn: 我在公園賣東西賺了一大筆錢。

sentences.en: In ancient Greece, many visitors swarm into the famous scenic spot every day.
sentences.cn: 在古希臘，每天都有很多的遊客湧入這個著名的景點。

sentences.en: His ankle got hurt when he took a walk outside.
sentences.cn: 他外出散步時扭傷了腳踝。

sentences.en: Anyone of you could climb to the top of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 你們中的任何一個人都可以爬到山頂。

sentences.en: Anyhow, they can only trust the guide to find their way home.
sentences.cn: 不管怎樣，他們唯有相信導遊才能找到回家的路。

sentences.en: If you want to go traveling, you can call me anytime.
sentences.cn: 如果你想去旅遊，隨時打電話給我。

cn: 無論如何，不管怎樣，總之

sentences.en: Anyway, she will be your loyal fan forever.
sentences.cn: 不管怎樣，她永遠都是你忠實的粉絲。

sentences.en: I would like to go anywhere of the world if I have enough time.
sentences.cn: 如果有充足的時間，我要走遍世界。

sentences.en: They are going to rent an apartment near the resort.
sentences.cn: 他們打算在那個度假勝地附近租一套公寓。

sentences.en: The actor is to have a plastic surgery for a good appearance.
sentences.cn: 為了擁有漂亮的外表，那個演員要去做整型手術。

sentences.en: I went to a doctor for my bad appetite during my trip.
sentences.cn: 旅行中我胃口不好，去看了醫生。

sentences.en: How can he apply for a place for traveling abroad?
sentences.cn: 他如何才能申請去國外旅遊的名額？

sentences.en: The girl is playing with her friends wearing her mother's apron now.
sentences.cn: 女孩現在正穿著媽媽的圍裙和朋友玩。

sentences.en: They are arguing violently about where to spend their holiday.
sentences.cn: 他們正在就去哪裡度假展開激烈的討論。

sentences.en: The two singers were not having an argument when the man came in.
sentences.cn: 那人進來時，那兩個歌手沒有在吵架。

cn: 扶手椅，單人沙發，安樂椅

sentences.en: Is the traveler looking for an armchair?
sentences.cn: 那個遊客是在找一把扶手椅嗎？

sentences.en: We should listen to the arrangement of the director carefully.
sentences.cn: 我們要仔細聽取導演的安排。

sentences.en: The policemen finally arrested the thief who always stole in the Palace Museum.
sentences.cn: 員警最終逮捕了那個總在故宮裡行竊的小偷。

sentences.en: It was very late when the visitors arrived at the hotel.
sentences.cn: 當遊客們抵達旅館時已經非常晚了。

sentences.en: Look, the athlete is discharging an arrow from a bow.
sentences.cn: 看，運動員正在射箭。

sentences.en: You will be able to understand the article if you know the experiences of the author.
sentences.cn: 如果你知道作者的經歷，就能讀懂這篇文章。

sentences.en: As an artist, his father has an updated thought and travels abroad every year.
sentences.cn: 作為一名藝術家，他父親的思想很前衛，每年都出國旅遊。

sentences.en: I couldn't be asleep for I had a cup of coffee before going to bed.
sentences.cn: 我上床前喝了杯咖啡，因此睡不著。

sentences.en: My assistant always goes to the gym at weekend.
sentences.cn: 我的助理周末經常去健身房。

sentences.en: What surprised me was that he attacked the army in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 讓我吃驚的是他在下午向軍隊發動攻擊。

sentences.en: He attended the feast on his wife's behalf.
sentences.cn: 他代表妻子參加宴席。

sentences.en: We should focus all our attention on climbing the hill.
sentences.cn: 我們應該把所有的注意力都放在爬山上。

sentences.en: The travelers walked the path in order to avoid the heavy traffic.
sentences.cn: 遊客們走小道以避開擁擠的交通。

sentences.en: These nuns baby-sit the abandoned baby in turn.
sentences.cn: 這些修女們輪流照看這個棄嬰。

sentences.en: What you have to do is to find a scrupulous baby-sitter when you go travelling.
sentences.cn: 出去旅遊時，你必須做的就是找個細心的保姆。

sentences.en: I look backward from time to time when I am taking a walk.
sentences.cn: 我散步時不時地向後看。

sentences.en: The water from the fountain kept the visitors moving backwards.
sentences.cn: 噴泉的水迫使遊客們向後退。

sentences.en: He suggests baking more bread for the guests.
sentences.cn: 他建議為客人們多烤點麵包。

sentences.en: It is suggested that we go to the bakery to buy some bread for the guests.
sentences.cn: 有人提議我們去麵包店裡為客人們買點麵包。

sentences.en: We are playing cards in the balcony of my new house.
sentences.cn: 我們在我家新房子的陽臺上玩撲克牌。

sentences.en: The reason why the pandas in the zoo died is that there was no bamboo.
sentences.cn: 動物園裡熊貓的死因是沒有竹子可以吃。

sentences.en: The world-famous banker had a crush on Jane and invited her to watch a film.
sentences.cn: 那位享譽世界的銀行家暗戀珍，並請她看電影。

sentences.en: They have a barbecue once a week.
sentences.cn: 他們一周吃一次燒烤。

sentences.en: Suddenly, they heard a fierce burst of dog bark from the amusement park.
sentences.cn: 突然，他們聽見遊樂園裡傳來一陣兇猛的狗叫聲。

sentences.en: I made it clear that you can't hide in the basement.
sentences.cn: 我已經明確說過，你們不能在躲在地下室。

sentences.en: You should get down to the basics of dance.
sentences.cn: 你應該從舞蹈的基礎知識開始學起。

sentences.en: We should lay a solid basis for our performance.
sentences.cn: 我們應該要為演出打下堅實的基礎。

sentences.en: Both of his sons have sacrificed in the battle and he has no mood to travel.
sentences.cn: 他的兩個兒子都在戰爭中犧牲了，他沒心情去旅遊。

sentences.en: It makes no sense to play with the crystal bead.
sentences.cn: 玩那個水晶珠根本毫無意義。

sentences.en: My hometown is famous for coffee beans and the waterfall.
sentences.cn: 我的家鄉以咖啡豆和那個瀑布而出名。

sentences.en: She doesn't like her husband’s littery beard and refuses to go out for a walk with him.
sentences.cn: 她不喜歡丈夫那雜亂的鬍鬚，拒絕跟他外出散步。

sentences.en: Her bedroom is situated on the second floor of the house and she is listening to music there.
sentences.cn: 她的臥室在房子的二樓，她正在裡面聽音樂。

sentences.en: My husband wanted to eat beef for dinner.
sentences.cn: 我的丈夫晚餐想吃牛肉。

sentences.en: The young traveler's phone continued beeping all the time.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕遊客的手機一直發出嗶嗶聲。

sentences.en: The visitor is allergic to dark beer.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客對黑啤酒過敏。

sentences.en: How could the boy trample the beetle to death?
sentences.cn: 那個男孩怎麼能把甲蟲踩死呢？

sentences.en: These men near the zoo live by begging.
sentences.cn: 動物園附近的這些人以乞討為生。

sentences.en: The young actor was still a beginner at this time last year.
sentences.cn: 去年的這個時候，那個年輕的演員還只是個新手。

sentences.en: You should keep your belief and never give up performing.
sentences.cn: 你要堅定信念，永不放棄表演。

sentences.en: The waitress in red seems believable.
sentences.cn: 那個穿紅衣服的女服務生看起來可以相信。

sentences.en: Every visitor fastened the seat belt, how come you didn't?
sentences.cn: 每個遊客都繫好安全帶，為什麼你沒有呢？

sentences.en: If you ask me, I think the man on the bench is a basketball enthusiast.
sentences.cn: 如果你問我，我認為坐凳子上那個人是籃球愛好者。

sentences.en: If it is possible, bend over little by little to watch the goldfish.
sentences.cn: 如果可能的話，慢慢地彎下腰去觀賞金魚。

sentences.en: Besides working, regular traveling is also important.
sentences.cn: 除了工作之外，定期旅遊也很重要。

sentences.en: You have to be over 18 to bet in this area.
sentences.cn: 在這個地方賭博者年齡不得低於十八歲。

sentences.en: The amusement park has changed beyond recognition.
sentences.cn: 遊樂園已經變得煥然一新。

sentences.en: I failed to pay my bill, so the network company cut off my Internet connection.
sentences.cn: 我沒有支付帳單，於是網路公司切斷了我的網路連接。

sentences.en: The goat in the zoo was bound to a tree.
sentences.cn: 動物園裡的那隻山羊被綁在一棵樹上。

sentences.en: That bitter medicine is good for your health is believable. If you get better, I will take you to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 良藥苦口利於病還是可信的。等你好了，我帶你去動物園。

sentences.en: My opinion is that the information about when we go traveling on the blackboard is wrong.
sentences.cn: 我的意見是黑板上關於我們何時去旅遊的資訊是錯誤的。

sentences.en: I gave the applicant the suggestion that he filled in all the blank forms.
sentences.cn: 我建議那個申請者把所有的空白表格都填寫完整。

cn: 眼盲的，盲目的，未察覺的

sentences.en: Since the actress was blind, she has been accustomed to the dark life.
sentences.cn: 自從眼睛瞎了後，那個女演員已經適應了黑暗的生活。

sentences.en: She hates to watch the bloody war films.
sentences.cn: 她討厭看血腥的戰爭片。

sentences.en: We had better ask the board for advice about where to spend the holiday.
sentences.cn: 關於去哪裡度假，我們最好向董事會徵求一下意見。

sentences.en: Look, the children are boiling some kind of liquid in the lab.
sentences.cn: 看，孩子們正在實驗室裡煮沸某種液體。

sentences.en: The music fountain on the square is just like a time bomb.
sentences.cn: 廣場上的音樂噴泉就像一顆定時炸彈。

sentences.en: My uncle has turned from a strong man into a bony one after these years' riotous life.
sentences.cn: 經過多年的放蕩生活，我叔叔從一個強壯的人變得瘦骨嶙峋了。

sentences.en: Tom put those magazines into the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 湯姆把那些雜誌放進書櫃。

sentences.en: Is it okay to borrow a camera from him?
sentences.cn: 可以向他借一台相機嗎？

sentences.en: Let's invite the boss to that new disco.
sentences.cn: 我們邀請老闆去那個新開的舞廳吧。

sentences.en: He won't bother the beautiful conductor anymore.
sentences.cn: 他不會再打擾那個美麗的售票員了。

sentences.en: The traveler gave the bottle a couple of shakes before drinking the juice.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客喝果汁前先把瓶子搖動幾下。

sentences.en: My father made a bow with the branch and rope to hunt for the bird.
sentences.cn: 為了獵取那隻鳥，我父親用樹枝和繩子做了一張弓。

sentences.en: The waiter in the bar refused to bow and scrape to every customer.
sentences.cn: 酒吧裡那個服務生不願奉承每個顧客。

sentences.en: He was invited by Lily to join her bowling club.
sentences.cn: 莉莉邀他加入她的保齡球俱樂部。

sentences.en: Being in love with the girl addled the actor's brain.
sentences.cn: 和那個女孩墜入愛河已使那個演員神魂顛倒。

sentences.en: My mother made a slingshot from the branch of the tree and I liked to play with it.
sentences.cn: 媽媽用樹枝做了一個彈弓，我很喜歡玩。

sentences.en: What is your favorite brand of wines?
sentences.cn: 你最喜歡哪種牌子的酒？

sentences.en: The ballroom was built by those brick layers.
sentences.cn: 這個舞廳是由那些砌磚匠建造的。

sentences.en: It's my honor to make a brief introduction of the arrangement of the journey.
sentences.cn: 我很榮幸向你們簡單介紹一下這次旅行的安排。

sentences.en: She won others' respect by her broad knowledge in music.
sentences.cn: 她因在音樂方面的淵博知識而贏得了他人的尊重。

sentences.en: It's no use listening to the English broadcast every morning.
sentences.cn: 每天早上都聽英文廣播沒什麼用。

sentences.en: What do the visitors have for their brunch?
sentences.cn: 那些遊客早午餐吃什麼？

sentences.en: No matter what you eat, brushing your teeth is the best way to fight cavities.
sentences.cn: 不管你吃什麼，吃飯後刷牙都是抵抗蛀牙的最佳方式。

sentences.en: The buns would have been cooked well if I didn't go shopping.
sentences.cn: 如果我沒有去逛街的話，小圓麵包都已經做好了。

sentences.en: I took a bundle of snacks to the park.
sentences.cn: 我帶了一包零食去公園。

sentences.en: The trees were being burnt when they rushed out of the forest.
sentences.cn: 當他們從森林跑出時，那些樹已經燒著了。

sentences.en: We all burst out laughing after hearing her joke.
sentences.cn: 聽了她的笑話之後，我們都大笑起來。

sentences.en: He declined her invitation to the party because it conflicted with his business.
sentences.cn: 他謝絕她的邀請，因為派對與他的生意衝突了。

sentences.en: No one is allowed to press that red button except the photographer.
sentences.cn: 除了攝影師以外，任何人都不能碰那個紅色按鈕。

sentences.en: The cabbage soup the woman made was tasty.
sentences.cn: 這個女人煮的白菜湯味道很好。

sentences.en: The guide said the cable tunnel was destroyed by the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 導遊說電纜隧道被這次地震破壞了。

sentences.en: Is that why the party was held in the café?
sentences.cn: 那就是派對在這家咖啡館舉行的原因嗎？

sentences.en: He is a frequent visitor to this cafeteria.
sentences.cn: 他是這家自助餐廳的熟客。

sentences.en: I take it for granted the calendar on the wall of the park was taken down by my son.
sentences.cn: 我還以為公園牆上的日曆是被我兒子取下來的。

sentences.en: Will you please calm down and have a cup of coffee?
sentences.cn: 請你冷靜下來喝杯咖啡，好嗎？

sentences.en: Your decision to cancel the concert will disappoint your fans.
sentences.cn: 你取消這場音樂會的決定，會使你的歌迷失望。

sentences.en: It is odd that the visitor died of cancer.
sentences.cn: 很奇怪，那個遊客死於癌症。

sentences.en: It's clear that the candle on the stage will soon burn out.
sentences.cn: 很明顯，舞臺上那根蠟燭很快就會燒完。

sentences.en: Visitors may not be allowed to go backstage without the captain's permission.
sentences.cn: 沒有船長的允許，遊客們不許擅自進入後臺。

sentences.en: It looks that the floor of the auditorium was covered with carpet.
sentences.cn: 禮堂的地板上好像鋪著地毯。

sentences.en: There are enough carrots for the guests.
sentences.cn: 這有足夠的紅蘿蔔給客人們吃。

sentences.en: I made myself up as a cart driver.
sentences.cn: 我把自己化妝成一個馬車夫。

sentences.en: The girl is like a cartoon character after getting dressed.
sentences.cn: 換上衣服後，那個女孩就像是一個卡通人物。

sentences.en: I was robbed of cash when I was walking along the river bank.
sentences.cn: 我在河邊散步時現金被搶走了。

sentences.en: Before dancing, he inserted a cassette into the machine.
sentences.cn: 跳舞前，他把一盒錄影帶放入機器。

sentences.en: The wall of the castle in the park requires repairing.
sentences.cn: 公園裡那個城堡的牆需要修理。

sentences.en: The cave was surrounded by visitors all over the world.
sentences.cn: 山洞被來自全世界各地的遊客包圍了。

sentences.en: It's nothing to drink with boys, but her father hit the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 與男孩們喝酒沒什麼大不了，但她父親勃然大怒。

sentences.en: Actually, reasonable potation won't hurt nerve cell.
sentences.cn: 其實，適量飲酒不會對神經細胞造成傷害。

sentences.en: Let me tell you why the visitor was led into the central control room.
sentences.cn: 我來告訴你為什麼那個遊客會被帶到中央控制室。

sentences.en: Can you not understand, the game was invented in last century?
sentences.cn: 難道你不明白嗎，這個遊戲上個世紀就發明出來了？

sentences.en: What about having a cup of cereal during the break?
sentences.cn: 休息的時候喝點麥片粥怎麼樣？

sentences.en: The twins in the film are chalk and cheese.
sentences.cn: 電影中的這對雙胞胎截然不同。

sentences.en: Every traveler has to change the flight, including you and me.
sentences.cn: 每個遊客都得改航班，包括你和我。

sentences.en: The actress is not strong enough in character and often depends on her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員在個性方面還不夠堅強，總是依賴自己的男朋友。

sentences.en: We will be charged if we keep our car parking outside the cinema when we watch the film.
sentences.cn: 如果我們去看電影，並把車停到電影院外面的話，是要被收費的。

sentences.en: If you play golf, no wearing the cheap clothes.
sentences.cn: 去打高爾夫球時，別穿便宜的衣服。

sentences.en: The travelers were cheated out of one hundred dollars by that cheater.
sentences.cn: 遊客們被那個騙子騙了一百美元。

sentences.en: Not only the actress but also the actor knows what a chemical change is.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員和那個男演員都知道化學變化。

sentences.en: There is little chance of my winning the chess game.
sentences.cn: 我贏棋的希望極小。

sentences.en: These adults danced around with childish delight.
sentences.cn: 這些大人像孩子一樣歡樂地圍在一起跳舞。

sentences.en: Although she is childlike, she is in charge of the whole ping pong team.
sentences.cn: 雖然她很單純，但她現在已經負責管理整個乒乓球隊了。

sentences.en: She had her chin hurt in the PE class.
sentences.cn: 她在上體育課時，把下巴弄傷了。

sentences.en: The little child began to cry when she took the chocolate and the toy away.
sentences.cn: 當她把巧克力和玩具拿走時，小孩子大哭起來。

sentences.en: I will take this song for choice.
sentences.cn: 我要選這首歌。

sentences.en: He was really stoked that they chose him for the team.
sentences.cn: 他們選他加入這個隊伍，他興奮極了。

sentences.en: Their children are playing with the chopsticks which are a token of their love.
sentences.cn: 他們的孩子正在玩那些代表著他們愛情的筷子。

sentences.en: The foreign visitor admitted drawing a circle on the statue.
sentences.cn: 外國遊客承認了自己在雕像上畫了一個圓圈。

sentences.en: It is the duty of each and every citizen to protect the facilities of the park.
sentences.cn: 每個公民都有責任保護公園裡的設施。

sentences.en: I could claim to be an expert after coming back from the traveling.
sentences.cn: 旅遊回來後，我可以說是專家了。

sentences.en: The audience clapped hands to welcome him coming back.
sentences.cn: 觀眾們鼓掌歡迎他回來。

cn: 古典的，傳統的，最優秀的

sentences.en: She likes music, except the classic one.
sentences.cn: 她喜歡音樂，但古典音樂除外。

sentences.en: I am listening to music and wondering if the eagle caught the rabbit with its claws.
sentences.cn: 我邊聽音樂邊想著老鷹是否用爪子抓住了兔子。

sentences.en: My son and daughter like making houses of sticks and clay.
sentences.cn: 我兒子和女兒喜歡用樹枝和黏土蓋房子玩。

sentences.en: The path to the garden has been cleaned by the cleaner.
sentences.cn: 通往花園的小路已經被清潔工人打掃乾淨了。

sentences.en: I could not hide my amusement at the way the clerk was dancing.
sentences.cn: 看見那個職員跳舞的姿勢，我忍不住笑出來。

sentences.en: The compere always boasts about how clever her son is.
sentences.cn: 那個主持人總是吹噓她的兒子是多麼聰明。

sentences.en: He had deliberately picked a city with a tropical climate to travel to.
sentences.cn: 他特意選了一個熱帶氣候的城市去旅遊。

sentences.en: The accordion is stored in the hall closet.
sentences.cn: 手風琴一直擱在門廳的壁櫥裡。

sentences.en: I am tied up with the work to make cloth when I am free.
sentences.cn: 空閒的時候我總是忙於織布。

sentences.en: All of the actors are always well clothed.
sentences.cn: 所有的演員都穿著考究。

sentences.en: I heard the clothes store was relocated to the center of the city.
sentences.cn: 我聽說那家服裝店搬遷到那個城市的中心。

sentences.en: They took enough food and clothing for the traveling.
sentences.cn: 他們為這次旅遊帶了充足的食物和衣服。

sentences.en: The forecast says it will be cloudy next week, so we can travel as planned.
sentences.cn: 天氣預報說下周是多雲的天氣，所以我們可以按計劃旅遊了。

sentences.en: The star clown on the stage was considered as a master of witty banter.
sentences.cn: 舞臺上那個小丑被認為是個逗樂子的專家。

sentences.en: Stop going to the new club in the town anymore.
sentences.cn: 不要再去鎮上那家新開的俱樂部了。

sentences.en: He has made great progress under the guidance of his coach.
sentences.cn: 在教練的指導下，他得到很大的進步。

sentences.en: Do add some coal into the boiler.
sentences.cn: 一定要往鍋爐裡加一些煤。

sentences.en: Let us listen to her cock-and-bull story.
sentences.cn: 我們來聽聽她那荒誕的故事。

sentences.en: There's a big cockroach crawling on the floor of the museum!
sentences.cn: 有一隻大蟑螂在博物館的地板上爬！

sentences.en: We flipped a coin to decide who would drink the wine.
sentences.cn: 我們用擲硬幣的方法決定誰喝酒。

sentences.en: The magnificent sights collect a large crowd of people.
sentences.cn: 壯麗的景色引來了一大群人。

sentences.en: I am engaged in collecting colorful candy papers.
sentences.cn: 我正在忙著收集五顏六色的糖果紙。

sentences.en: Be still when I comb your hair before performance.
sentences.cn: 演出前我幫你梳頭時，請不要動。

sentences.en: Collect yourself, since it's comfortable to sit on the grass.
sentences.cn: 放鬆一下，因為坐在草地上很舒服。

sentences.en: Why in God's name, the employees are dancing in the company.
sentences.cn: 天啊，員工們都在公司裡跳舞。

sentences.en: The young guide compares himself to Shakespeare, which annoys us.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕的導遊把自己比作莎士比亞，這讓我們感到很厭煩。

sentences.en: He is complaining about the latest movie.
sentences.cn: 他在抱怨最新的電影。

sentences.en: Given that he goes traveling, we won't require him to complete the task today.
sentences.cn: 考慮到他去旅遊了，我們不要求他今天完成工作了。

sentences.en: I bought a portable computer so that I can carry it during traveling.
sentences.cn: 我買了一台可攜式電腦，以便在旅遊時攜帶。

sentences.en: What should I do if he calls to confirm the appointment?
sentences.cn: 如果他打電話來確認約會時間怎麼辦？

sentences.en: Never try to end the conflict between you and the athletes by fighting.
sentences.cn: 絕對不要試圖靠打架來解決你和運動員們之間的衝突。

sentences.en: I arranged for them to visit the Confucius Temple tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我已安排他們明天遊孔廟。

sentences.en: The boy accepted his teammates' congratulations happily.
sentences.cn: 那個男孩高興地接受了隊友們的祝賀。

sentences.en: She is very happy when being told that she was considered the most successful actress.
sentences.cn: 聽說自己被評為最成功的女演員，她非常高興。

sentences.en: Wish you have a good journey and keep in contact with me.
sentences.cn: 希望你旅途愉快，與我保持聯繫。

sentences.en: Hearing that news that they can go traveling, she couldn't contain herself for joy.
sentences.cn: 聽到他們可以去旅遊的消息，她高興得不能自己。

sentences.en: The man shows great self-control when others are teasing him.
sentences.cn: 那個人在別人開他玩笑時表現出極大的自制。

sentences.en: For my part, the controller needs to have a travel.
sentences.cn: 依我看來，總監需要去旅遊。

sentences.en: I want to know when it is convenient for us to have a date.
sentences.cn: 我想知道什麼時候我們方便約會。

sentences.en: For your information, I had a successful conversation with the visitor.
sentences.cn: 你要知道，我和那個訪客成功交談了一次。

sentences.en: The cooker I bought yesterday doesn't work, so let’s go out for a picnic.
sentences.cn: 我昨天買的那個爐具不能用了，所以我們去野餐吧。

sentences.en: The painting she copied can pass for an authentic one.
sentences.cn: 她臨摹的畫足以亂真。

sentences.en: It's high time that they fetch the ball in the corner.
sentences.cn: 是時候他們去撿回角落裡的那個球了。

sentences.en: I'm sick and tired of the singer’s buying costly handbags.
sentences.cn: 我受不了那個歌手，她總是買價格昂貴的包包。

sentences.en: It's your turn to put wads of cotton in your ears.
sentences.cn: 該你把小塊棉花塞在耳朵裡了。

sentences.en: The director gave a little cough to announce her presence.
sentences.cn: 導演輕輕咳了一下，示意她已到場。

sentences.en: Accompany your grandpa in the countryside when you are free lest he should feel lonely.
sentences.cn: 你有空時去鄉下陪你爺爺吧，以免他覺得孤獨。

sentences.en: Are you sure the super star's hometown is in a county?
sentences.cn: 你確定那位巨星的家鄉在一個小縣城裡嗎？

sentences.en: The couple at a neighboring table spoke in undertones.
sentences.cn: 鄰桌的夫婦在低聲交談。

sentences.en: I don't have the courage to talk about traveling with them.
sentences.cn: 我沒有勇氣和他們談論一起旅遊的事。

sentences.en: As I see it, the best way to solve the dispute between you and the company is to take into court.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，解決你和那間公司之間問題的最好辦法就是訴諸法律。

sentences.en: Would you mind if I introduce my cousin to you and invite you to my house tonight?
sentences.cn: 我把堂兄介紹給你，並邀請你今晚來我家，你介意嗎？

sentences.en: The little boy takes the solider crab as his pet.
sentences.cn: 小男孩把這隻寄居蟹當成是他的寵物。

sentences.en: The boy is climbing up the crane while other children are running after him.
sentences.cn: 其他孩子追那個小男孩的時候，他正在爬起重機。

sentences.en: The beautiful picture was drawn by my nephew with crayon.
sentences.cn: 這張美麗的畫是我侄子用蠟筆畫的。

sentences.en: It is crazy of him to go skating on the thin ice.
sentences.cn: 到這麼薄的冰上溜冰，他真是瘋了。

sentences.en: The dresser spread some cold cream on the actor's face.
sentences.cn: 化妝師在那個演員的臉上塗了一些乳霜。

sentences.en: The actress's getting married again will create a scandal.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員再婚這件事情將引發醜聞。

sentences.en: Could you please explain why the visitor committed a crime?
sentences.cn: 你能解釋一下那個遊客犯罪的原因嗎？

sentences.en: Do you know if the man is having a mid-life crisis?
sentences.cn: 你知道那個男人是否正在經歷中年危機嗎？

sentences.en: It's no good trying to harvest the crops, since they were trampled to death by the visitors.
sentences.cn: 沒辦法收成穀物了，因為遊客把它們都踩死了。

sentences.en: When she appeared on the stage she was nervous by crossing her legs.
sentences.cn: 登臺表演時，她雙腿交叉，心情很緊張。

sentences.en: The jewelry and ornaments the visitors want to buy are white crows.
sentences.cn: 遊客們想買的珠寶飾品都是珍品。

sentences.en: The famous singer was engulfed by the waiting crowd.
sentences.cn: 那個著名的歌星被守候著的人群團團圍住。

sentences.en: I think it is cruel to confine the bird in a cage.
sentences.cn: 我認為把鳥關在籠子裡太殘忍了。

sentences.en: The belief to respect the old is ingrained in our culture.
sentences.cn: 尊重老人這個理念在我們的文化中根深蒂固。

sentences.en: All of the experts in the hospital had no idea on how to cure the senator's disease.
sentences.cn: 醫院裡所有的專家對那個參議員的病都毫無辦法。

sentences.en: The children are taking a curious glance at my new computer.
sentences.cn: 孩子們用好奇的眼光打量著我新買的電腦。

sentences.en: He traveled to America behind the curtain.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷地去美國旅遊了。

sentences.en: I think it would be better if you understand the custom there.
sentences.cn: 我認為如果你瞭解那裡的風俗會更好。

sentences.en: They say the new law is enacted on behalf of the customers and visitors.
sentences.cn: 他們說這項新法律的制定代表了顧客們和遊客們的利益。

sentences.en: She has been much healthier since she began to do daily dozen.
sentences.cn: 自從開始每天做早操以來，她感覺身體好多了。

sentences.en: I am sure drinking has damaged your health.
sentences.cn: 我確定飲酒已經損害了你的健康。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, my brother is fond of some dangerous sports.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，我哥哥喜歡一些危險的運動。

sentences.en: Now the deleted data about the travelers is being recovered by the technicians.
sentences.cn: 現在那些被刪除的遊客資料正在由技術人員進行還原。

sentences.en: The delegation would take the flight which takes off at dawn of tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 代表團會搭乘明天黎明起飛的航班。

sentences.en: He likes the musician who is totally deaf.
sentences.cn: 他喜歡那個完全耳聾的音樂家。

sentences.en: No one expected that the public debate developed into a fistfight.
sentences.cn: 誰也沒有料到公開辯論演變成了一場鬥毆。

sentences.en: I could pay off my debt if I win a prize in the lottery.
sentences.cn: 如果我樂透中獎的話，我就能還清債務了。

sentences.en: It's definite that her decision will upset a lot of fans.
sentences.cn: 她的決定肯定會使許多粉絲不開心。

sentences.en: Did you make any decision on how to decorate the room and where to spend the holiday?
sentences.cn: 你決定如何裝修你的房間和去哪裡度假了嗎？

sentences.en: I will award her a trip to America if she gets the master's degree.
sentences.cn: 如果她取得碩士學位，我將會獎勵她去美國旅遊一次。

sentences.en: The traveler wouldn't have to delay his plan if he had followed your instructions.
sentences.cn: 如果那個遊客聽你指示的話，就不必延遲他的計畫了。

sentences.en: He hasn't eaten such delicious food since he began to travel around the world.
sentences.cn: 自從開始環球旅行，他好久沒吃過如此美味的食物了。

sentences.en: If I had delivered the gift there on time!
sentences.cn: 如果我能準時把禮物送到那裡就好了！

sentences.en: I can't agree with the dentist more and I would give up drinking at night.
sentences.cn: 我完全同意牙醫的意見，將會戒掉晚上喝酒的習慣。

sentences.en: The young father denies his daughter nothing and always plays with her.
sentences.cn: 年輕的父親對女兒百依百順，總是和她一起玩。

sentences.en: It isn't my department to play the guitar.
sentences.cn: 彈吉他不是我的專長。

sentences.en: The girls can depend on Tom since he is always ready to help others.
sentences.cn: 女孩們可以依靠湯姆，他總是很樂於助人。

sentences.en: We lost our way in the depth of the forest yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我們在森林深處迷路。

sentences.en: He is often described as the most handsome actor.
sentences.cn: 他經常被稱為是最英俊的演員。

sentences.en: I've no idea if I can get some water in the hot and dry desert.
sentences.cn: 我不知道我能否在這又熱又乾的沙漠中得到一些水。

sentences.en: When we took photos in the park, the complicated design of the camera was beyond my depth.
sentences.cn: 我們在公園照相時，相機複雜的結構令我難以理解。

sentences.en: There is no reason for you to desire for traveling to the country.
sentences.cn: 你沒有理由渴望去鄉下旅遊。

sentences.en: Before the waiter moves on dessert we can play cards.
sentences.cn: 服務員上甜點前，我們可以玩撲克牌。

sentences.en: The man was detected in the act of scrawling all over the antique wall.
sentences.cn: 那人在古牆上亂塗亂畫被發現了。

sentences.en: Any idea what develops healthy bodies? Does it include traveling often?
sentences.cn: 你知道什麼對健康有益嗎？包括經常旅遊嗎？

sentences.en: There are some inharmonious phenomena in the development of the tourism industry.
sentences.cn: 旅遊業的發展中存在著一些不和諧現象。

sentences.en: We can enjoy the morning dews here for the whole holiday.
sentences.cn: 整個假期我們都可以在這裡欣賞晨露。

sentences.en: The traveler dialed the wrong number, but he threw it in the shopkeeper's dish.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客撥錯號碼了，但他把這件事歸咎於店鋪老闆。

sentences.en: He didn't celebrate his parents’ diamond wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 他沒有慶祝父母六十周年鑽石婚姻。

sentences.en: The diary in the actress's schooldays is worthy of being kept.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員求學時記下的日記值得保存。

sentences.en: All the students are allowed to take part in the exam, on the condition that they can't use a dictionary.
sentences.cn: 所有學生都可以參加考試，條件是不能用字典。

sentences.en: Should there be another chance, try to eliminate the difference between you and your mother.
sentences.cn: 如果再有一次機會的話，努力消除你和媽媽之間的分歧。

sentences.en: Had it not been that difficulty, we would have arrived at the scenic spot in advance.
sentences.cn: 如果不是因為那個困難，我們已經提前到達景點了。

sentences.en: They all say that dinosaur museum is worth visiting.
sentences.cn: 他們都說那個恐龍博物館值得參觀。

sentences.en: She doesn't know the exact direction, so point out the way as she goes along.
sentences.cn: 她不太知道具體的方位，所以在沿途告訴她怎麼走。

sentences.en: I don't have a chance to travel with the director.
sentences.cn: 我沒有機會和主管一起旅遊。

sentences.en: Don't tell me you disagree with the guide’s words.
sentences.cn: 你不會是不同意導遊的話吧。

sentences.en: His playing guitar loudly is a source of disagreement among the neighbours and him.
sentences.cn: 他大聲彈吉他是他和鄰居之間紛爭的一個原因。

sentences.en: To my delight, the taboo which forbids women to travel there is disappearing slowly.
sentences.cn: 讓我高興的是，禁止女人去那裡旅遊的禁忌正在逐漸消失。

sentences.en: Let's fix a time for discussing where to spend the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我們約個時間來討論去哪裡度周末。

sentences.en: Don't waste time having a discussion on that boring topic.
sentences.cn: 不要浪費時間談論那個無聊的話題了。

sentences.en: Don't you think that we should not make friends with dishonest people?
sentences.cn: 你不認為我們不該和不誠實的人交朋友嗎？

sentences.en: Those precious items which were displayed yesterday were stolen.
sentences.cn: 昨天展出的那些珍貴展物被偷了。

sentences.en: Keep your distance from the flowers in the garden!
sentences.cn: 和花園裡的那些花保持距離！

sentences.en: He will marry the girl from a distant place next month.
sentences.cn: 他下個月就要和這位來自遠方的女孩結婚。

sentences.en: As a time-saving man, he always divides his weekend into several cuts.
sentences.cn: 作為一個節約時間的人，他總是將周末的時間分成幾部分。

sentences.en: There is a clear division between his zone and mine, so be careful when you play basketball.
sentences.cn: 他的地盤和我的之間有明確的劃分線，所以你打籃球時要注意一下。

sentences.en: He felt dizzy and almost couldn' t concentrate on TV.
sentences.cn: 他感到頭暈目眩，幾乎不能集中精力看電視。

sentences.en: We were totally attracted by the dolphins just now.
sentences.cn: 剛才我們完全被海豚的表演吸引住了。

sentences.en: It's donkey’s years since he learned to play the guitar.
sentences.cn: 他學彈吉他已經好多年了。

sentences.en: There were some black dots on my face after I came back from the seaside.
sentences.cn: 我從海邊回來後臉上有一些小黑點。

sentences.en: He hopes that they would become a double income after marriage.
sentences.cn: 他希望結婚後能成為雙薪家庭。

sentences.en: There's no doubt that the performance will make some difference to them.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，這次演出會對他們造成一定的影響。

sentences.en: I have been thinking about why the doughnut is so delicious and the music is so melodious here.
sentences.cn: 我一直在想為什麼這裡的甜甜圈這麼好吃，音樂這麼好聽。

sentences.en: The singers arrived at the hotel in the downtown on the dot of 9 o'clock.
sentences.cn: 歌手們九點鐘準時到達了位於市中心的旅館。

sentences.en: Health is not something that you can get back after visiting a doctor; you should exercise more.
sentences.cn: 健康並不是你在看過醫生之後就可以重新得到的，你應該多運動。

sentences.en: I don't think it’s necessary to drag politics into our conversation.
sentences.cn: 我覺得沒必要把政治牽扯到我們的談話中來。

sentences.en: I don't see that they will win the first prize in the dragon boat competition.
sentences.cn: 我認為他們不能在龍舟比賽中贏得第一名。

sentences.en: I don't think it’s right to catch so many beautiful dragonflies in the park.
sentences.cn: 我覺得在公園裡捉這麼多美麗的蜻蜓是不對的。

sentences.en: They are anxiously awaiting the appearance of the famous drama actor from England.
sentences.cn: 他們在焦急地等待那個來自英國的著名戲劇演員。

sentences.en: All you have to do is to take pens out of the drawer.
sentences.cn: 你只要把筆從抽屜裡拿出來就行。

sentences.en: The only motivation of my life is the desire for drawing art.
sentences.cn: 對繪畫藝術的渴望是我生活的唯一動力。

sentences.en: The actress insists that the dress for performance should be shorter.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員要求表演用的衣服要更短一些。

sentences.en: I dropped the ball into the water the minute I caught it.
sentences.cn: 我一抓到球就把它扔到了水裡。

sentences.en: It's nothing to be surprised about; the actor just bought some drug before acting.
sentences.cn: 沒什麼大驚小怪的，那個演員只是在表演前買了一些毒品。

sentences.en: As a rule, visitors can buy the pills in the small drugstore at the entrance of the scenic spot.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，遊客可以在景點入口處的小藥房買到這些藥丸。

sentences.en: These children ran towards the man after hearing the beat of the drum.
sentences.cn: 這些孩子們聽到鼓聲就朝那個人跑去。

sentences.en: Oh my god, I forgot to pull out the plug of the dryer before I went out for a walk.
sentences.cn: 喔，天哪，我出門散步前忘記把吹風機的插頭拔掉了。

sentences.en: It is very dull to spend the weekend at home.
sentences.cn: 在家裡度過周末很沉悶。

sentences.en: Haven't you heard of the dumb boy who is a famous writer?
sentences.cn: 你沒聽說過那個啞巴男孩是一個著名的作家嗎？

sentences.en: Have you ever eaten dumplings?
sentences.cn: 你吃過餃子嗎？

sentences.en: We should send our duty to gardeners and not destroy the plants when we are in the park.
sentences.cn: 我們在公園時應該尊敬園丁，不要破壞植物。

sentences.en: In brief, we should distribute the money earned last year and go to travel.
sentences.cn: 簡而言之，我們應該分配去年賺的錢並去旅遊。

sentences.en: We desire that our hometown would be rebuilt after the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 地震過後，我們希望能夠重建家園。

sentences.en: The director said that the theme of the movie is about Eastern culture.
sentences.cn: 導演稱這部電影的主題是關於東方文化。

sentences.en: My parents sacrificed many things to pay for my education and took me abroad to travel.
sentences.cn: 我父母犧牲很多來支付我的學費，並帶我去國外旅遊。

sentences.en: It seems that the film has little effect on these naughty children.
sentences.cn: 看電影對這些調皮的孩子沒有用。

sentences.en: Television advertising should be the most effective way to popularize the toys.
sentences.cn: 電視廣告是推廣玩具最有效的方法。

sentences.en: They climbed to the top of the mountain without effort.
sentences.cn: 他們不費力就登上了山頂。

sentences.en: The elder people have the priority to visit the museum.
sentences.cn: 老年人參觀博物館有優先權。

sentences.en: He was elected as the headman of their group without doubt.
sentences.cn: 他毫無疑問地被推選為他們的組長。

sentences.en: All of the students should get familiar with the chemical elements.
sentences.cn: 所有學生都應該熟悉這些化學元素。

sentences.en: We can take an elevator to the top of tour tower.
sentences.cn: 我們可以搭電梯到觀光塔頂。

sentences.en: Whatever you do, you should take the boy's emotions into consideration.
sentences.cn: 不管你做什麼，都應該考慮到男孩的情緒。

sentences.en: It is his desire that all the students should encourage each other.
sentences.cn: 他的願望是所有學生都能夠相互鼓勵。

sentences.en: His encouragement meant a great deal to the guests in the bar.
sentences.cn: 他的鼓勵對酒吧裡的客人來說意義重大。

sentences.en: To sum up, the ending of the movie made us disappointed.
sentences.cn: 總之，這部電影的結尾讓我們很失望。

sentences.en: I heard the boy's selfishness made many people his enemies.
sentences.cn: 我聽說那個男孩因為自私樹敵很多。

sentences.en: I was worn out and had little energy left after running.
sentences.cn: 我跑步後完全筋疲力盡，幾乎沒有什麼剩餘的精力了。

sentences.en: It is hoped that I can sit beside the window to enjoy the pretty sights during the journey.
sentences.cn: 希望我能坐個靠窗的座位，以便好好欣賞沿途的美景。

sentences.en: Music is my major source of enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 音樂是我快樂的主要泉源。

sentences.en: Ask him if we can book the entire restaurant for the party?
sentences.cn: 問他我們能不能包下整家餐廳來開派對？

sentences.en: I appointed to meet her at the entrance of the cinema.
sentences.cn: 我約定在電影院門口和她碰面。

sentences.en: The man doesn't know why the flap doesn’t stick to the envelope.
sentences.cn: 那個男人不知道為什麼信封口黏不起來。

sentences.en: Maybe the visitors are unable to relate to the bad environment there.
sentences.cn: 或許遊客們不能適應那裡的惡劣環境。

sentences.en: Now open your eyes and guess where the eraser is.
sentences.cn: 現在睜開眼，猜猜橡皮擦在哪裡。

sentences.en: The TV presenter checked it again to make sure there is no error.
sentences.cn: 節目主持人又核對了一遍，以便確保沒有錯誤。

sentences.en: I've got to be especially careful when I cycle on ice.
sentences.cn: 我在冰面上騎車得格外小心。

sentences.en: I think the event is unavoidable to the actor.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這種事件對那個演員來說是不可避免的。

sentences.en: He told me the exact date of departure.
sentences.cn: 他跟我說出發的確切日期。

sentences.en: He can do nothing but create excellent movies.
sentences.cn: 除了創作精彩絕倫的電影之外，他什麼也不會。

sentences.en: She was happy that her performance aroused the excitement of the audience.
sentences.cn: 她很高興自己的表演激起了觀眾們興奮的情緒。

sentences.en: The girl cannot come to the party, so she asks him to excuse her.
sentences.cn: 女孩不能來參加派對了，所以她請他原諒。

sentences.en: Do exercise in your free time and your health will be improved.
sentences.cn: 有空運動一下，你的健康狀況會得到改善。

sentences.en: The boys can't exist without bread and water.
sentences.cn: 沒有麵包和水，這些男孩不能生存。

sentences.en: The fans expected her to be the winner of the game.
sentences.cn: 粉絲們都期待她能成為比賽的贏家。

sentences.en: I can't believe he bought the expensive car with all his savings and took his wife to Hualien for a visit.
sentences.cn: 我真不敢相信他用所有的積蓄買了那輛昂貴的車，並帶妻子去花蓮旅遊。

sentences.en: Riding a rollercoaster was a terrible experience for me.
sentences.cn: 坐雲霄飛車對我來說是一次可怕的經歷。

sentences.en: The actress is also an expert in writing.
sentences.cn: 那個女演員也是寫作的專家。

sentences.en: The girl asked the teacher to give her a chance to explain.
sentences.cn: 那女孩請求老師給她一個解釋的機會。

sentences.en: I can't express how excited I was after watching the film.
sentences.cn: 我無法表達看完電影後我是多麼地激動。

sentences.en: Do you have extra time to visit the old man?
sentences.cn: 你有時間去拜訪那個老人嗎？

sentences.en: It is a trend for men to trim eyebrows this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，男士修眉是一種趨勢。

sentences.en: You mean he failed at the pre-qualifying stage?
sentences.cn: 你意思是說他在預賽中被淘汰了？

sentences.en: We can't ascribe our failure to other teammates.
sentences.cn: 我們不能把失敗歸因於其他的隊友。

sentences.en: In this competition Tom was renowned as a fair judge.
sentences.cn: 在這次比賽中，湯姆贏得了公平裁判的榮譽。

sentences.en: Have you ever been to that famous scenic spot?
sentences.cn: 你去過那個著名的旅遊勝地嗎？

sentences.en: Don't blame the stunt man; it’s not his fault.
sentences.cn: 別責備那個替身演員了，那不是他的錯。

sentences.en: Could you do me a favor to take a photo of me?
sentences.cn: 請你幫我拍張照好嗎？

sentences.en: Can you tell me what your favorite movie is?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我你最喜歡哪部電影嗎？

sentences.en: The teacher is always fearful for the students.
sentences.cn: 老師總是為學生們擔憂。

sentences.en: They will obtain an entrance fee after the entertainment.
sentences.cn: 娛樂表演之後，他們將獲得一筆入場費。

sentences.en: We are liable for protecting the only female in our group.
sentences.cn: 我們有責任保護組裡面這唯一的女性。

sentences.en: It is regrettable that the horse unseated him at the first fence.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，馬在過第一道籬笆時把他甩了下來。

sentences.en: As you know, the festival atmosphere didn't bring much happiness to them.
sentences.cn: 如你所知，節日的氣氛並沒有給他們帶來多少歡樂。

sentences.en: She was pulled down by a sudden fever last night.
sentences.cn: 她昨晚突然發燒病倒了。

sentences.en: Stop frolicking in the field as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 快點停止在田地裡玩耍。

sentences.en: It is stated that the strong fighter has never been knocked down by an opponent.
sentences.cn: 據說這位強壯的戰士從未被對手打倒過。

sentences.en: Go and ask the accountant whether he got the total figure.
sentences.cn: 去問問會計他是否知道總額。

sentences.en: The majority of my friends have seen this film.
sentences.cn: 我的大多數朋友都已經看過這部電影了。

sentences.en: A fireman found her pet cat and gave it back to her.
sentences.cn: 一個消防隊員發現了她的寵物貓，並還給了她。

sentences.en: She told me the producer is very firm to her.
sentences.cn: 她告訴我，製片人對她要求非常嚴格。

sentences.en: The guide said that being a fisherman isn't easy.
sentences.cn: 導遊說做一個漁夫不容易。

sentences.en: They all think this song fits you.
sentences.cn: 他們都認為這首歌適合你。

sentences.en: Her radio was broken, who can fix it up?
sentences.cn: 她的收音機壞了，誰能把它修理好呢？

sentences.en: We reach the shore; have you seen the yellow flag over there?
sentences.cn: 我們到岸了，你看到那邊的黃旗了嗎？

sentences.en: This visitor is the only person who witnessed the sudden flash.
sentences.cn: 這名遊客是唯一一個親眼目睹那突然閃光的人。

sentences.en: By using the little flashlight, he can finish reading the novel.
sentences.cn: 靠這支小手電筒，他可以讀完這本小說。

sentences.en: She walks into the flat with one of her fans.
sentences.cn: 她和其中一名粉絲一同走進公寓。

sentences.en: Nothing can stop the flight of time, so go traveling when you are young.
sentences.cn: 時間的飛逝是無法阻擋的，所以趁著年輕去旅遊吧。

sentences.en: Tens of thousands of visitors flood into the city in May every year.
sentences.cn: 每年五月，數以萬計的遊客湧入這座城市。

sentences.en: I spread the flour on my face to amuse my daughter.
sentences.cn: 為了逗女兒笑，我把麵粉塗到了臉上。

sentences.en: The cyclists were nearly driven crazy by the flow of traffic.
sentences.cn: 腳踏車騎士們快被車流搞瘋了。

sentences.en: How to avoid getting the flu when we are on holiday?
sentences.cn: 我們度假時，如何避免得流感呢？

sentences.en: My sister always amuses herself by playing the flute.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹總是吹笛自娛。

sentences.en: These reporters focus their attention on that movie star's private life.
sentences.cn: 這些記者關注的是那個電影明星的私生活。

sentences.en: Don't you deem that foggy mountains are attractive?
sentences.cn: 你不覺得煙霧茫茫的群山很有魅力嗎？

sentences.en: They held a big party the following evening.
sentences.cn: 他們第二天晚上舉辦了一個大派對。

sentences.en: Don't be a fool to think that he will take you to shoot arrows.
sentences.cn: 不要像傻瓜一樣以為他會帶你去射箭。

sentences.en: It surprises me that the tourist could be so foolish.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客這麼蠢，真是讓我吃驚。

sentences.en: After the game, he turned into a football fan.
sentences.cn: 那次比賽後，他成了一個足球迷。

sentences.en: These foreigners were requested to follow the customs of the city.
sentences.cn: 這些外國人被要求遵守這座城市的風俗。

sentences.en: She will never forgive him for not accompanying her to travel.
sentences.cn: 她永遠不會原諒他沒有陪她去旅遊。

sentences.en: The only way to satisfy the boy is to find a form of entertainment which is fit for him.
sentences.cn: 唯一能讓男孩滿意的方法就是找到適合他的娛樂方式。

sentences.en: All of us have to wear formal dress for the party this evening.
sentences.cn: 今天晚上我們所有人應該盛裝赴宴。

sentences.en: It is unimaginable that he is the former member of the club.
sentences.cn: 他是俱樂部的前任成員，真是不可思議。

sentences.en: Just keep moving forward and you will get to the foot of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 只要一直往前走，你就能走到山腳下。

sentences.en: As an actor, he is as crafty as a fox.
sentences.cn: 作為一名演員，他像狐狸一樣狡猾。

sentences.en: They are frank and always friendly to the people who come here to spend holidays.
sentences.cn: 他們很直率，對來這裡度假的人也很友善。

sentences.en: Frankly speaking, he will lose his freedom if he becomes an actor.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，如果他成為演員就會失去自由。

sentences.en: But for that pie in the freezer, we will suffer from hungry.
sentences.cn: 要不是冰箱裡那塊派，我們會挨餓的。

sentences.en: There would be a friendly match between his school and mine tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他的學校和我的學校明天有一場友誼賽。

sentences.en: When the earthquake took place, the visitors came out of the cave in a fright.
sentences.cn: 地震發生時，遊客們都驚恐地從山洞裡跑出來。

sentences.en: Can you believe they can use crackers to frighten away wild animals?
sentences.cn: 你相信他們能以鞭炮嚇走野獸嗎？

sentences.en: The main function of the machine is to amuse the people who are bored.
sentences.cn: 這款機器的主要功能就是娛樂無聊的人們。

sentences.en: Encouraged by the last victory, the player felt confident of further success.
sentences.cn: 在上次勝利的鼓舞下，該隊員有信心再次獲勝。

sentences.en: I look forward to hearing from the man who is traveling in America in the near future.
sentences.cn: 我盼望著不久後收到那個在美國旅遊的人的消息。

sentences.en: Some television stars would get into gossip to gain more publicity.
sentences.cn: 一些明星為了吸引更多公眾的注意，不惜陷進八卦中。

sentences.en: I found some children playing games there after I got into my garage.
sentences.cn: 進入車庫後，我發現那裡有幾個孩子在遊戲。

sentences.en: The smell of the garbage in the small park overpowered him.
sentences.cn: 那個小公園裡的垃圾臭味使他無法忍受。

sentences.en: I spent the entire morning in helping the gardener trim these shrubs.
sentences.cn: 我花了整個上午的時間幫助園丁修剪這些灌木。

sentences.en: I'm afraid the gate isn’t wide enough to let the bus the travelers take in.
sentences.cn: 恐怕這大門不夠寬，遊客們乘坐的大巴士進不去。

sentences.en: The notice says you should gather at the gate of the park.
sentences.cn: 通知說你們應該在公園門口集合。

sentences.en: It was generous of the boss to drive us to the airport.
sentences.cn: 老闆開車送我們去機場，真是太慷慨了。

sentences.en: Instead, the unexpected guest at the party was very gentle.
sentences.cn: 相反，派對上的這個不速之客很彬彬有禮。

sentences.en: I think the man will be more attractive if he behaves like a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 我覺得如果那個男人的言行像紳士一樣，會更有魅力。

sentences.en: We are having our geography class at the moment, but they are watching a film.
sentences.cn: 我們現在正在上地理課，但是他們在看電影。

sentences.en: The workers in the zoo can't make the giant panda as a present to the visitor.
sentences.cn: 動物園裡的工作人員不能把大熊貓作為禮物送給遊客。

sentences.en: Ask the children to get an eyeful of these giraffes.
sentences.cn: 讓孩子們來看看這些長頸鹿。

sentences.en: The mate to this glove was left in the cinema just now.
sentences.cn: 這副手套的另一隻剛才忘在電影院了。

sentences.en: The child sticks to his mother like glue.
sentences.cn: 那個小孩寸步不離開母親。

sentences.en: The goal the director set is impossible to achieve.
sentences.cn: 導演定下的目標是不可能完成的。

sentences.en: His refusal to my invitation really got my goat.
sentences.cn: 他拒絕了我的邀請，真是讓我生氣。

sentences.en: They were planning to celebrate their golden wedding.
sentences.cn: 他們正在計畫如何慶祝金婚。

sentences.en: I used to enjoy a round of golf on Saturday afternoons.
sentences.cn: 過去我喜歡在周六下午打一場高爾夫球。

sentences.en: You must govern your temper when you see the super star.
sentences.cn: 看到那位超級巨星時，你必須控制住情緒。

sentences.en: The solider was accused of being disloyal to the government last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，那名軍人被指控對政府不忠。

sentences.en: You, she and I are in the same grade.
sentences.cn: 你、她和我在同一年級。

sentences.en: We, you and they like grapes and watching films very much.
sentences.cn: 我們，你們還有他們都非常喜歡葡萄和看電影。

sentences.en: Look, they are lying on the grassy hillside and playing cards.
sentences.cn: 看，他們正躺在長滿草的山坡上玩牌。

sentences.en: To our shock, the greedy singer is traveling in our city now.
sentences.cn: 讓我們震驚的是，這個貪婪的歌手現在就在我們的城市旅遊。

sentences.en: He will greet you in the name of the host.
sentences.cn: 他將代表主人前來迎接你。

sentences.en: He doesn't want to be an actor with the growth of age.
sentences.cn: 隨著年齡的增長，他不再想當演員了。

sentences.en: The stings of this flower are used to guard against the visitors who want to pick them up.
sentences.cn: 這種花的刺可以用來阻止那些想摘花的遊客。

sentences.en: Welcome to have a taste of the guava juice.
sentences.cn: 歡迎來喝芭樂汁。

sentences.en: Indeed the guitar he plays does sound like a baby' s cry.
sentences.cn: 事實上，他彈的吉他聽起來的確像孩子的哭聲。

sentences.en: A guy with long hair lost his heart to the traveler from Taiwan.
sentences.cn: 那個長頭髮的傢伙愛上了這個來自台灣的遊客。

sentences.en: I am not in the habit of watching TV.
sentences.cn: 我沒有看電視的習慣。

sentences.en: How long was it from your house to the hall? I am afraid we will miss the play if we walk there.
sentences.cn: 從你家到禮堂有多遠？我擔心我們步行到那裡會錯過演出。

sentences.en: He wanted to run onto the bus and made hamburger out of the disgusting driver.
sentences.cn: 他想衝上車把那個可惡的司機打一頓。

sentences.en: It is regrettable that there's no hammer at hand for the passengers to smash the window.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是手邊沒有鎚子可以讓乘客們用來砸爛窗戶。

sentences.en: I saw the actress wave her handkerchief and throw the actor a kiss.
sentences.cn: 我看見女演員揮動手帕，給男演員一個飛吻。

sentences.en: The guide is the only person who knows how to handle the problem.
sentences.cn: 只有導遊知道如何處理這個問題。

sentences.en: The assistant isn't handsome, but it doesn’t matter.
sentences.cn: 助理並不英俊，但這沒有關係。

sentences.en: The lanterns are hung at the gate of the park to illuminate the passers-by.
sentences.cn: 公園大門口掛著燈籠來為路人照明。

sentences.en: I could hardly believe that I was paid to watch a film.
sentences.cn: 我不敢相信，看場電影還能得到報酬。

sentences.en: The old man used to be a hateful man, but now he is well bred.
sentences.cn: 那個老先生曾經是一個可憎的男人，但現在他非常有禮貌。

sentences.en: What on earth should these women do to keep healthy?
sentences.cn: 這些女人到底該怎麼做才能保持健康？

sentences.en: It's kind of you to help me move all these gas heaters in such a hot day.
sentences.cn: 在這麼熱的天幫我搬完所有的熱水器，你真是太好了。

sentences.en: It is snowy all the year round in this height of the mountain and many visitors come here in summer.
sentences.cn: 這山在這個海拔高度是終年都有積雪，很多遊客都是在夏天來這裡。

sentences.en: It is my honor to get her helpful advice and I plan to travel next week.
sentences.cn: 得到她有用的建議實在是我的榮幸，我決定下周就去旅遊。

sentences.en: The hen my mother keeps brought off a brood of young last week, and the children are playing with them.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽養的那隻母雞上周孵出了一窩小雞，孩子們正在和牠們玩。

sentences.en: The guide over there is the hero you are looking for.
sentences.cn: 那個導遊就是你們要找的英雄。

sentences.en: The dancer on the stage doesn't need to hide his light under a bushel.
sentences.cn: 舞臺上那個舞者沒必要隱藏他的才華。

sentences.en: I'm thinking of crossing the highway and playing by the river.
sentences.cn: 我打算穿過公路去河邊玩耍。

sentences.en: I found a scar on his hip by accident and he told me he was hurt when he was playing basketball.
sentences.cn: 我偶然發現他的臀部有一個傷疤，他告訴我他打籃球時受傷的。

sentences.en: The hippopotamus plays with a red and yellow ball during the daytime.
sentences.cn: 河馬在白天的時候玩一個紅黃相間的球。

sentences.en: The explorers hired a local villager to go across the river.
sentences.cn: 為了過河，探險家們雇了一個當地的村民。

sentences.en: His hobby is just the same as mine.
sentences.cn: 他的愛好和我的相同。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, he is the biggest holder of this project.
sentences.cn: 說實話，他是這個計畫的最大持股人。

sentences.en: When their conversation turned to Chinese food, he became homesick.
sentences.cn: 當他們的談話轉向中國菜時，他有些想家了。

sentences.en: As an honest person, you should be faithful to your audience.
sentences.cn: 作為一個誠實的人，你該忠於自己的觀眾。

sentences.en: Don't bother them since they are on their honey moon.
sentences.cn: 別打擾他們，因為他們在度蜜月。

sentences.en: The young dancer can hop and spin on his head.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕的舞者能單腳跳，並且以頭支地旋轉。

sentences.en: The lonely visitor went to the hospital himself.
sentences.cn: 那個孤單的遊客自己去醫院了。

sentences.en: The host frequently raised his glass during the feast last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚的宴會上，主人頻頻舉杯。

sentences.en: The hotel is perched on a steep hillside.
sentences.cn: 旅館座落在陡峭的山坡上。

sentences.en: However, he made up his mind to travel by himself.
sentences.cn: 然而，他下定決心獨自旅行。

sentences.en: Everybody hums and haws when I refer to traveling.
sentences.cn: 我談到旅遊時，每個人都吞吞吐吐的。

sentences.en: Everybody says the famous actress is a humble woman indeed.
sentences.cn: 大家都說那個著名的女演員真的是個很謙遜的人。

sentences.en: It is very humid in the world-famous scenic spot.
sentences.cn: 這個世界聞名的景點非常潮濕。

sentences.en: You would know that the guide has a sense of humor.
sentences.cn: 你會發現那個導遊很有幽默感。

sentences.en: He has the hunger for traveling but I also need that chance.
sentences.cn: 他渴望去旅遊，但是我也需要那次機會。

sentences.en: I'd like to know whether you can hunt for a fox in the forest.
sentences.cn: 我想知道你能否在森林裡獵取到一隻狐狸。

sentences.en: They saw the hunter creep up to the deer.
sentences.cn: 他們看到獵人躡手躡腳地走近那頭鹿。

sentences.en: You should hurry up to arrive at the park on time.
sentences.cn: 你們得快點，以便準時趕到公園。

sentences.en: The patient father ignores none of his daughter's requests even if she asks him to take her to the park at night.
sentences.cn: 那位耐心的父親從不忽略女兒的任何要求，即使她要求他晚上帶她去公園玩也一樣。

sentences.en: I didn't play Mahjong because my son was seriously ill.
sentences.cn: 我兒子病得很嚴重，所以我沒有打麻將。

sentences.en: I can't imagine what the lake in the park looks like.
sentences.cn: 我不能想像公園裡那個湖長什麼樣子。

sentences.en: I know my performance is of no importance.
sentences.cn: 我知道我的表演無關輕重。

sentences.en: My father sent him a treadmill to help him improve his health.
sentences.cn: 我父親送給他一台跑步機來幫助他改善健康狀況。

sentences.en: She has got many hobbies including listening to music.
sentences.cn: 她有很多愛好，包括聽音樂。

sentences.en: I spend in excess of my income every month, so I don't have money to travel.
sentences.cn: 我每月都入不敷出，所以我沒有錢去旅遊。

sentences.en: Hang on; the number of the visitors is still increasing.
sentences.cn: 等一下，遊客們的數量還在增加中。

sentences.en: I think the independence of judgment is the symbol of an adult, so your son can't travel alone.
sentences.cn: 我認為獨立判斷是一個成年人的標誌，所以你兒子還不能獨自去旅遊。

sentences.en: I prefer independent travel to conducted tours.
sentences.cn: 比起觀光團我還是喜歡獨自旅行。

sentences.en: The alert indicates that there is no water left on the drinking fountain.
sentences.cn: 警報顯示飲水機裡沒有水了。

sentences.en: The industry here is less developed than that of the district, so the investors are disappointed.
sentences.cn: 這裡的產業沒有那個地區的發達，所以投資者們都很失望。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the media has a powerful influence on these famous singers.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，媒體對於這些著名的歌星有很大的影響。

sentences.en: There's no ink in the pen for the visitor to go on his writing.
sentences.cn: 鋼筆裡沒有墨水讓那個遊客繼續寫信了。

sentences.en: I was bitten by an insect in the garden just now.
sentences.cn: 剛才我在花園裡被蟲子咬了一口。

sentences.en: The guide insisted setting off right away.
sentences.cn: 導遊堅持要立刻出發。

sentences.en: I should apply to the manager in the first instance if I want to join the club.
sentences.cn: 如果我想加入俱樂部，首先應向經理提出申請。

sentences.en: I think it is not enough having a cup of instant coffee before acting.
sentences.cn: 表演前只喝一杯即溶咖啡是不夠的。

sentences.en: He says the violin is one of the oldest instruments known to man.
sentences.cn: 他說小提琴是人們所知最古老的樂器之一。

sentences.en: The guide in red is of international repute.
sentences.cn: 穿紅色衣服那個導遊享有國際聲譽。

sentences.en: The famous dancer insisted on having the interview in public.
sentences.cn: 這位著名的舞蹈家堅持要當眾接受採訪。

sentences.en: I went over to introduce myself to the foreign visitor emboldened by the wine.
sentences.cn: 我借酒壯膽，走上前去向那個外國遊客做自我介紹。

sentences.en: The strangest thing is that the toy plane was invented by the boy.
sentences.cn: 誰也想不到，這個玩具飛機是這個小男孩發明的。

sentences.en: What in the world was the reason that made you refuse our invitation?
sentences.cn: 究竟是什麼原因讓你拒絕了我們的邀請？

sentences.en: Can you invite her to take part in the game?
sentences.cn: 你可以邀請她參加遊戲嗎？

sentences.en: The small island is referred to as a fairyland on earth by the visitors.
sentences.cn: 這個小島被遊客們稱為人間仙境。

sentences.en: He himself doesn't know which new item is his favorite, so he buys nothing at the shop.
sentences.cn: 他自己也不知道哪件商品是他最喜歡的，所以在商店裡他什麼也沒有買。

sentences.en: The actor took off his down jacket before appearing on the stage.
sentences.cn: 登上舞臺前，演員脫下了羽絨服。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the policeman's gun jammed in the critical moment and the man was killed.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，在那個千鈞一髮的時刻，員警的槍卡彈了，那個男人被殺了。

sentences.en: The young man couldn't tell the difference between jazz music and pop music.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕人分辨不出爵士樂和流行音樂。

sentences.en: The jeans are not the traveler's, that’s because his are dark grey ones.
sentences.cn: 這條牛仔褲不是那個遊客的，那是因為他的那條是深灰色。

sentences.en: I feel quite at ease when I sit in my new jeep and drive it to visit my friends.
sentences.cn: 坐在我新買的吉普車裡去拜訪朋友時，我感覺十分愜意自在。

sentences.en: It is my habit to take exercise by jogging every day.
sentences.cn: 我有每天慢跑運動的習慣。

sentences.en: Amazingly, that picture is their joint work.
sentences.cn: 讓人吃驚的是，那幅畫是他們合作的作品。

sentences.en: I am shocked to hear that the judge likes playing cards.
sentences.cn: 聽說這個法官喜歡玩撲克牌，我很震驚。

sentences.en: Of course we can have some juicy fruits to quench our thirst.
sentences.cn: 我們當然可以吃一些多汁的水果來解渴。

sentences.en: Come on, help yourself to the ketchup he made.
sentences.cn: 來，吃些他做的番茄醬。

sentences.en: The singer was abducted at the gate of the kindergarten yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天那個歌手在幼稚園大門口被綁架走了。

sentences.en: They lost themselves in the kingdom of Fairy Tales in the park.
sentences.cn: 在公園裡，他們完全沉浸在童話王國裡。

sentences.en: It was my fault to knock that vase in the museum.
sentences.cn: 把博物館裡的花瓶撞倒是我的錯。

sentences.en: The boy is rich in knowledge although he has no money.
sentences.cn: 這男孩學識淵博，儘管他很窮。

sentences.en: He had never seen a koala until he traveled to Australia last year.
sentences.cn: 去年去澳大利亞旅遊之前他從來沒有見過無尾熊。

sentences.en: I was fearful of the ladybug in the park.
sentences.cn: 我非常害怕公園裡的瓢蟲。

sentences.en: It is general knowledge that this lane in the city is very narrow.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道，這座城市的這條小巷特別窄。

sentences.en: The girl is just ten years old, but she can speak three languages.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩只有十歲，但她可以說三種語言。

sentences.en: Be careful, it is stated that a burning lantern in the park caused a fire yesterday.
sentences.cn: 小心，據說昨天公園裡的一只燃燒的燈籠引起了一場火災。

sentences.en: I feel ashamed to sit on your lap to play games.
sentences.cn: 我不好意思坐在你腿上玩遊戲。

sentences.en: He invited her to his house in their latest conversation.
sentences.cn: 在最近一次的談話中，他親自邀請她去他家。

sentences.en: I am becoming disenchanted with my job as a lawyer and plan to travel to Korea.
sentences.cn: 我對自己的律師工作漸漸地不抱幻想了，並打算去韓國旅遊。

sentences.en: Owing to his excellent leadership, the team won at last.
sentences.cn: 多虧他出色的領導才能，這一隊最終贏了。

sentences.en: According to the legal process, the model will be released tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 根據法律流程，那個模特兒明天就會被釋放。

sentences.en: The guest in the bar likes to put a squeeze of lemon in his drink.
sentences.cn: 酒吧裡那個客人喜歡在飲料中放一點檸檬汁。

sentences.en: Lemonade is the main contributor to the overweight of the traveler.
sentences.cn: 檸檬汽水是導致這個遊客超重的罪魁禍首。

sentences.en: I criticized him for lending the camera to a stranger in the park.
sentences.cn: 我因為他把照相機借給公園裡的一個陌生人而責怪他。

sentences.en: My teacher says it is a good practice to write to a certain length.
sentences.cn: 我的老師說，按照一定的長度進行寫作是一種好的練習。

sentences.en: Suppose he completed the painting of the snow leopard, what would he get?
sentences.cn: 假如他完成了那幅雪豹的畫作，他能得到什麼？

sentences.en: Tell the maid to take some more lettuce.
sentences.cn: 讓女僕再拿一些生菜來。

sentences.en: She ran across him in the public library.
sentences.cn: 她在公共圖書館碰巧遇見他。

sentences.en: I licked my upper lip and told the teacher I was not myself today.
sentences.cn: 我舔了舔上嘴唇，告訴老師我今天感到不舒服。

sentences.en: I can cover the big pot with the lid and make soup for the guests.
sentences.cn: 我可以把那個大鍋蓋上鍋蓋，為客人們煮湯。

sentences.en: Sadly, the singer was struck by lightning and died instantly.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，那個歌星被雷擊了，很快就死了。

sentences.en: We limit our activities to running on the playground.
sentences.cn: 我們的活動範圍僅限於在操場上跑步。

sentences.en: I can't link these art works with the young man.
sentences.cn: 我不能把這些藝術作品和那個年輕人聯想在一起。

sentences.en: The nurse advised him to eat some liquid food.
sentences.cn: 護士建議他吃些流質食物。

sentences.en: There's no way I become the listener of that presenter.
sentences.cn: 我不可能成為那個主持人的聽眾。

sentences.en: It's hunger that goads the poor beggar to steal a piece of loaf.
sentences.cn: 饑餓驅迫那個可憐的乞丐偷一塊麵包。

sentences.en: Don't be afraid of entertaining the boring local bigwigs.
sentences.cn: 不要害怕去招待當地那些無聊的大人物。

sentences.en: You know the Great Pyramid is located in the middle of the desert.
sentences.cn: 你知道的，大金字塔位於沙漠中。

sentences.en: The visitor locked the door and stayed in the hotel room alone.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客鎖上門，獨自待在旅館房間裡。

sentences.en: There are two log cabins, one is for women visitors and the other is for men visitors.
sentences.cn: 有兩間小木屋，一間給女遊客，另一間給男遊客。

sentences.en: The little girl was alarmed at being lone.
sentences.cn: 那個小女孩害怕孤獨。

sentences.en: The singer feels very lonely after his wife's death, so he always invites friends to his house.
sentences.cn: 那個歌星在妻子去世後感到很孤獨，所以他總是邀請朋友到家裡來。

sentences.en: The actor is, as it were, a man who is easy to lose his senses.
sentences.cn: 那個演員好像是一個很容易失去理智的人。

sentences.en: No one is a born loser; just be tough if you lose the game.
sentences.cn: 沒有人生來就是失敗者，如果你比賽失敗了，要堅強些。

sentences.en: The old actor's death is a great loss to the entertainment business.
sentences.cn: 那位老演員的逝世是娛樂圈的重大損失。

cn: 可愛的，令人愉快的，好看的

sentences.en: He found a lovely girl playing computer games there when he came into the hall.
sentences.cn: 他進入大廳時，發現一個可愛的女孩在裡面玩電腦遊戲。

sentences.en: I enjoyed myself without the company of my lover.
sentences.cn: 沒有愛人的陪伴，我仍然玩得很開心。

sentences.en: I hope you wouldn't lower yourself to play games with your fan.
sentences.cn: 希望你不要降低身份，跟自己的粉絲玩遊戲。

sentences.en: The winner attributes his victory to luck.
sentences.cn: 那個贏家認為他的勝利是靠運氣。

sentences.en: My favorite magazine is put out once a week.
sentences.cn: 我最喜歡的雜誌一周出一期。

sentences.en: How did people feel about magic before 1,800 A.D.?
sentences.cn: 西元一千八百年前，人們怎麼看待魔術？

sentences.en: Think about everything carefully before you choose to be a magician.
sentences.cn: 在決定成為一名魔術師之前，你要把所有事情都考慮清楚。

sentences.en: At that time, people always danced in front of the factory which was the main supplier of beer.
sentences.cn: 那時，人們總在這間工廠前跳舞，這間工廠是主要的啤酒供應商。

sentences.en: The bar will take measures to maintain order.
sentences.cn: 酒吧將會採取措施來維持秩序。

sentences.en: The singer got mad at her husband's male chauvinism after marriage .
sentences.cn: 婚後，那歌星對丈夫的大男人主義很生氣。

sentences.en: It was not long before the foreign visitor learned to speak Mandarin.
sentences.cn: 沒有多久，那個外國遊客就學會講中國話了。

sentences.en: Sorry for my eating your mango.
sentences.cn: 原諒我吃了你的芒果。

sentences.en: It is not a good manner to talk at table, because the host will be angry.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時說話很不禮貌，因為主人會生氣。

sentences.en: I was marked out for singing in chorus.
sentences.cn: 我被指定參加合唱團。

sentences.en: They are trying to prepare for their marriage themselves and have a big party.
sentences.cn: 他們打算自己籌備婚禮並辦一次盛大的派對。

sentences.en: I admit that the man wearing the mask in the ball was a friend of mine.
sentences.cn: 我承認舞廳裡那個戴面罩的人是我的一個朋友。

sentences.en: Have you heard that there was mass hysteria when the band came on stage?
sentences.cn: 你聽說了嗎？樂團登臺時觀眾一片瘋狂。

sentences.en: Wipe your shoes on the mat before you enter the bar.
sentences.cn: 你進酒吧前在墊子上擦一下鞋。

sentences.en: No kidding, the tie doesn't match your shirt and I advise you to change for another one if you want to take part in the party.
sentences.cn: 說真的，這條領帶跟你的襯衫很不配，如果你打算參加派對的話我建議你換一條。

sentences.en: The chief mate's wife was brought to bed, but he still went abroad to travel.
sentences.cn: 那位主任的老婆要生產了，但他還是去國外旅遊。

sentences.en: Recent studies show that these materials can be used to make footballs for people to play with.
sentences.cn: 最新研究表明這種材料可以用來生產足球，以供人們玩耍。

sentences.en: I prepared a very elaborate meal for my guests.
sentences.cn: 我為客人們做了一頓精美的飯菜。

sentences.en: Speak point by point to get your meaning across, or the students will be at a loss.
sentences.cn: 一點一點地說，這樣你的意思才能被人理解，不然學生們會不知所措。

sentences.en: I will try every means to get a ticket of the concert.
sentences.cn: 我將會採用一切手段來得到演唱會門票。

cn: 可測量的，可預見的，重要的

sentences.en: My guess is that the girl surrounded by several bodyguards is a measureable singer.
sentences.cn: 我猜被幾名保鏢包圍著的那個女孩是一位重要的歌星。

sentences.en: It is objected that the new measure may hurt the fans' feelings.
sentences.cn: 有人提出反對，這個新的措施可能會傷害粉絲們的感情。

sentences.en: The medicine is believed to date from the year of 1,700 A.D.
sentences.cn: 這種醫學被認為是起源於一千七百年。

sentences.en: I am delighted to see that the meeting hall was full of fans.
sentences.cn: 我很高興看到會議廳坐滿了粉絲。

sentences.en: My sixth sense tells me she is playing this beautiful melody.
sentences.cn: 第六感告訴我，她在彈奏這首優美的曲子。

sentences.en: Let's share the melons equally before acting.
sentences.cn: 表演前讓我們平分這些甜瓜吧。

sentences.en: They plan to enroll her as a member of the club next month.
sentences.cn: 他們打算下個月吸收她成為俱樂部會員。

sentences.en: The singer advised us to observe a minute's silence in memory of the people who died in the accident.
sentences.cn: 那個歌手建議我們為事故中的死者默哀一分鐘。

sentences.en: The actor was in a hurry, so he told the waiter to bring the menu quickly.
sentences.cn: 那個演員很匆忙，所以他叫服務生快點拿菜單來。

sentences.en: Leave him a message to go fishing this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 給他留個口信，讓他下午去釣魚。

sentences.en: He took out a metal flask from his bag at the party.
sentences.cn: 在派對上，他從包包裡掏出一個金屬瓶子。

sentences.en: The basketball star is about 2 meters tall.
sentences.cn: 那個籃球明星大約兩公尺高。

sentences.en: It's easy to persuade the director if we get the right method.
sentences.cn: 只要我們的方法得宜，說服導演並不難。

sentences.en: The posters of the concert are all over the metro carriage.
sentences.cn: 地鐵的車廂裡滿滿都是演唱會的海報。

sentences.en: None of the visitors understands these military terms.
sentences.cn: 沒有一個遊客懂這些軍事用語。

sentences.en: They consider the young actor as a man in a million.
sentences.cn: 他們認為這個年輕的演員是萬中選一的人。

sentences.en: I danced with his partner, and he danced with mine.
sentences.cn: 我和他的舞伴跳，他和我的舞伴跳。

sentences.en: Every normal person would know that 8 minus 3 equals 5.
sentences.cn: 每一個正常人都應該知道八減三等於五。

sentences.en: Whatever the kind woman says, she can't make the broken mirror whole again.
sentences.cn: 不管那個熱心的女子說什麼，都不能使破鏡重圓。

sentences.en: I advise him to get out and mix more with people.
sentences.cn: 我建議他出去多跟人們往來。

sentences.en: Your hobbies in your free time speak well for your model of life.
sentences.cn: 你空閒時的愛好說明你的生活方式很好。

sentences.en: The modern amusement park is much better than it used to be.
sentences.cn: 這個現代化的遊樂園比過去好得多。

sentences.en: Somebody told me the monster in the movie is very frightening.
sentences.cn: 有人告訴我，電影裡那個怪獸特別可怕。

sentences.en: The racers can ride a motorcycle well, let alone a bicycle.

sentences.en: What you should do is to cut your nails.

sentences.en: It's funny that they use a broken fish net to catch fish.

sentences.en: There's nobody on the square but these dancing women.

sentences.en: I nodded my head to agree with the plan that we go for a picnic on Sunday.

sentences.en: I like to taste all kinds of noodles in my free time.

sentences.en: I always keep a notebook at the elbow when I go traveling.
sentences.cn: 我旅遊時，總是在手邊放一本筆記。

sentences.en: I spent a peaceful morning on the grassland, reading a novel.
sentences.cn: 我在草地上看小說，度過了一個寧靜的上午。

sentences.en: You will be off your nut if you consider the movie is good.

sentences.en: You can't imagine my grandfather is learning to operate a computer recently.

sentences.en: We don't arrive at an opinion on where to spend the holiday.

cn: 愉快的，討人歡喜的，舒適的

sentences.en: After passing through the training, we can enjoy a pleasant time.
