sentences.cn: 小偷在警察的眼前偷走了外國遊客的錢。

sentences.en: The visitor let off steam by yelling at the guide.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客對導遊大喊大叫，藉以發洩怒氣。

sentences.en: As a big shot in steel industry, he likes playing golf in his free time.
sentences.cn: 作為鋼鐵大王，他喜歡空閒時打高爾夫。

sentences.en: He stuck to the promise that he would give her a big party.
sentences.cn: 他遵守了為她辦一場盛大派對的諾言。

sentences.en: I have suffered from the pain in the stomach after mealed in the scenic spot.
sentences.cn: 在景點吃完飯後，我一直胃痛。

sentences.en: All of the tourists began to run toward the bus when the storm was coming.
sentences.cn: 暴風雨即將來臨時，所有的遊客都開始向巴士跑去。

sentences.en: They are playing cards to kill the time near the stove.
sentences.cn: 他們在火爐旁邊玩牌以消磨時間。

sentences.en: Hold your back straight, or you will lose the game.
sentences.cn: 把背挺得筆直，不然你會輸了比賽。

sentences.en: He is a stranger here and he knows nothing about where to play billiards.
sentences.cn: 他是一個外地人，對該去哪裡打撞球一無所知。

sentences.en: I don't care a straw for your opinion on where to spend the weekends.
sentences.cn: 關於去哪裡度周末，我一點都不在乎你有什麼看法。

sentences.en: Keep away from the strawberry and come to play with your ball.
sentences.cn: 遠離那些草莓，過來玩你的皮球吧。

sentences.en: The visitors stepped across the stream and kept their feet dry.
sentences.cn: 遊客們跨過了小溪，沒有把腳沾濕。

sentences.en: I should stress that you'd better enjoy your weekends as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 我要強調一下，你最好盡可能享受周末時光。

sentences.en: I saw he stretch his leg and trip up the thief on TV.
sentences.cn: 我在電視上看到他伸出腿絆倒了小偷。

sentences.en: The leader was strict with them for fear that they should have an accident.
sentences.cn: 領隊對他們很嚴格，唯恐他們出意外。

sentences.en: The strike hung up our traveling abroad.
sentences.cn: 這次罷工嚴重地延誤了我們出國旅遊。

sentences.en: The string broke with a snap when he was playing the guitar.
sentences.cn: 他彈吉他時，啪的一聲，弦斷了。

sentences.en: In order to win the upcoming match fair and square, you'd better struggle hard.
sentences.cn: 為了光明正大地贏得這場比賽，你最好努力奮鬥。

sentences.en: I suddenly changed the subject, which left him floundering helplessly.
sentences.cn: 我突然改變話題，使他茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: Subtract ten from twenty you have ten.
sentences.cn: 二十減十得十。

sentences.en: If you want to succeed, stop gambling as soon as you can.
sentences.cn: 如果你想成功，就儘快戒賭。

sentences.en: The actor showed off around after having gained the success.
sentences.cn: 獲得成功後，那個演員到處炫耀。

sentences.en: The journey was successful and couldn't have been better.
sentences.cn: 這次旅行玩得真過癮。

sentences.en: The director's sudden death came as a bombshell.
sentences.cn: 那個導演突然死亡的消息讓每個人都很震驚。

sentences.en: The super star wore a white suit to disguise herself for fear of being recognized.
sentences.cn: 那個巨星穿了一套白西裝來掩飾自己，以免被別人認出來。

cn: 充滿陽光的，晴朗的，明媚的

sentences.en: Let's bask ourselves on the sunny beach, okay?
sentences.cn: 我們在陽光燦爛的海灘上曬太陽，好嗎？

sentences.en: In front of the supermarket, all the dancers throw themselves heart and soul into the performance.
sentences.cn: 超市前，所有舞者都盡心盡力地演出。

sentences.en: The explorer's water supply slowly diminished as the days wore on.
sentences.cn: 時間一天天過去，探險者的水在慢慢減少。

sentences.en: Her excellent performance made her win the audience's supports.
sentences.cn: 她那精彩的演出使她贏得很多觀眾的支持。

sentences.en: It's your turn to dive below the surface of the water.
sentences.cn: 該你潛水了。

sentences.en: If you continue playing with the fish, it won't survive.
sentences.cn: 如果你一直玩那條魚的話，它會死的。

sentences.en: We said with one mouth that the answer to the riddle should be “swallow”.
sentences.cn: 我們異口同聲地說這個謎語的謎底應該是「燕子」。

sentences.en: I was amazed to see a beautiful swan swimming gracefully in the pond of the park.
sentences.cn: 我吃驚地看到一隻漂亮的天鵝正在公園池塘中優雅地游水。

sentences.en: My greatest passion is knitting sweaters.
sentences.cn: 我最大的嗜好是織毛衣。

sentences.en: Jane was left to sweep up after the party.
sentences.cn: 派對結束後珍被留下來打掃。

sentences.en: I have been on the swing for about half an hour, now it's your go.
sentences.cn: 我盪鞦韆有半個小時了，現在該輪到你了。

sentences.en: The statue at the entrance of the scenic spot is the symbol of the leader.
sentences.cn: 景點入口處的那座雕塑是這個領導人的象徵。

sentences.en: The young girl showed great talent for folk dance.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕的女孩在民族舞方面顯示出很大的天賦。

sentences.en: He was annoyed by those talkative women.
sentences.cn: 他很討厭那群嘰嘰喳喳的女人。

sentences.en: I saw the farmers picking tangerines and collecting them in heaps.
sentences.cn: 我看到農夫們正在摘橘子並把它們擺放成堆。

sentences.en: I am longing for buying a fish tank to keep the goldfish.
sentences.cn: 我非常渴望買個魚缸來養金魚。

sentences.en: Judging from the tape, the singer's voice is very magnetic
sentences.cn: 從磁帶來判斷，那個歌手的聲音很有磁性。

sentences.en: What's the target audience of the performance?
sentences.cn: 這次表演以哪些人為對象？

sentences.en: Hiking in such a hot day is no easy task.
sentences.cn: 在這樣熱的天徒步旅行真不是件容易的事。

sentences.en: All of the guests can't hold back their appetite when facing the tasty food.
sentences.cn: 面對這麼好吃的東西，所有的客人都控制不住自己的食慾了。

sentences.en: I think the success of the football team was largely due to his efforts.
sentences.cn: 這個足球隊的成功在很大程度上是他努力的結果。

sentences.en: In his fury the tourist tore the ticket to pieces.
sentences.cn: 盛怒之下，遊客把門票撕得粉碎。

sentences.en: It was clear that she was too old now for teenage parties.
sentences.cn: 很顯然，她年齡太大了，不適於參加少年聚會。

sentences.en: These teenagers are expert in hip-hop.
sentences.cn: 這些青少年擅長跳街舞。

sentences.en: The tourist telephoned the guide several times, but failed to get her in the end.
sentences.cn: 遊客打了好幾次電話給導遊，但最終都無法聯繫上她。

sentences.en: There's live broadcast on the television about the football game tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天電視上有關於這次足球比賽的實況轉播。

sentences.en: The age of the temple is four times as long as the monk's.
sentences.cn: 寺院的年齡是那位僧人的四倍。

sentences.en: The golden rule in tennis is to focus your attention on the ball.
sentences.cn: 打好網球的重要原則是眼要緊盯著球。

sentences.en: The guide said the wind would blow the tent away.
sentences.cn: 導遊說風會把帳篷吹走。

sentences.en: I entered a swimming class before the term.
sentences.cn: 開學前我報了一個游泳班。

sentences.en: Her terrible joke frightened off all the foreign visitors.
sentences.cn: 她那個可怕的玩笑把所有外國遊客都嚇跑了。

sentences.en: All the people at the party were having a terrific time.
sentences.cn: 參加派對的每個人都玩得開心極了。

sentences.en: I walked through the test, then went out to play basketball on the playground.
sentences.cn: 我草草地做完測驗題，然後就去操場上打籃球了。

sentences.en: He left his textbook in the cinema.
sentences.cn: 他把課本忘在電影院了。

sentences.en: Last night, his performance won the praise of the audience in the theater.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，他的表演贏得了劇院裡觀眾的讚美。

sentences.en: It was too hot; therefore the concert was put back from Monday to Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 天氣太熱了，因此音樂會從星期一延後到星期三。

cn: 厚的，濃密的，粗的，（俚）太過分的

sentences.en: It is a bit thick to have a picnic on a rainy day.
sentences.cn: 雨天去野餐真讓人受不了。

sentences.en: My mother was set on by a thief in the park yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，我媽媽在公園裡遭到一個竊賊的襲擊。

sentences.en: Tell the boys it is dangerous to walk on the thin ice.
sentences.cn: 告訴那些男孩們，在薄冰上行走是危險的。

sentences.en: Both of the children listened to the story with thirsty ears.
sentences.cn: 兩個孩子都津津有味地聽故事。

sentences.en: The singer cleared his throat and began to sing.
sentences.cn: 那個歌手清了清嗓子，唱了起來。

sentences.en: Contrary to our expectations, she slept through the party.
sentences.cn: 我們沒想到她竟然從派對開始一直睡到結束。

sentences.en: The poor singer was booed and heckled throughout his singing.
sentences.cn: 那個可憐歌手的演唱自始至終都遭到喝倒彩。

sentences.en: The slippers he wore made him stick out like a sore thumb at the party.
sentences.cn: 派對上，他穿拖鞋顯得很尷尬。

sentences.en: When we got to the top of the mountain, a sudden thunder made our hair curl.
sentences.cn: 當我們爬到山頂時，一陣響雷讓我們感到毛骨悚然。

sentences.en: It is customary to give the guide a tip here.
sentences.cn: 這個地方給導遊小費是一種風俗。

sentences.en: He wanted to recall his words about the comments on the title of entertainment news.
sentences.cn: 他想收回他對這條娛樂新聞標題的評論。

sentences.en: There will be a great deal of toast at the party.
sentences.cn: 派對上會有大量的吐司麵包。

sentences.en: The shoe is pressing on the boy's toes and he couldn’t walk anymore.
sentences.cn: 那個男孩的鞋子磨腳，他不能再走路了。

sentences.en: My mother is adept at cooking dishes with tofu.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽最善於用豆腐煮菜了。

sentences.en: No wonder the tourist went to the toilet so frequently.
sentences.cn: 怪不得那個遊客如此頻繁地去洗手間。

sentences.en: Is it OK that the guests eat the tomatoes?
sentences.cn: 客人們可以吃番茄了嗎？

sentences.en: The singer was frightened on the stage and held his tongue.
sentences.cn: 那個歌手在臺上很害怕，說不出話。

sentences.en: His teeth are sensitive to cold food.
sentences.cn: 他的牙齒對冰冷食物過敏。

sentences.en: It's quite beyond him to speak on a topic on entertainment.
sentences.cn: 他實在講不了關於娛樂的話題。

sentences.en: I map out a tour around the world after graduating from the university.
sentences.cn: 我計畫大學畢業後進行一次環球旅行。

sentences.en: Do remember to bring your towel when go swimming.
sentences.cn: 去游泳時千萬要記得帶你的毛巾。

sentences.en: Fancy her having been to the Eiffel Tower.
sentences.cn: 想不到她竟然參觀過艾菲爾鐵塔。

sentences.en: She has a deep love for track and field event.
sentences.cn: 她熱愛田徑運動。

sentences.en: They are travelling in Hong Kong which is said to be the biggest trade centre in Asia.
sentences.cn: 他們正在被認為是亞洲最大的貿易中心的香港旅遊。

sentences.en: It is a tradition to play majong here.
sentences.cn: 打麻將在這裡是傳統習慣。

sentences.en: It is traditional to sing and dance on New Year's Day in the country.
sentences.cn: 在這個國家，新年這天唱歌跳舞是一種習俗。

sentences.en: The traffic in the city is very dangerous for the foreign visitors.
sentences.cn: 這個城市的交通對外國遊客來說很危險。

sentences.en: The boy put some cheese to lure the cat into his trap.
sentences.cn: 男孩放了一些乳酪來讓小貓上鉤。

sentences.en: As you wish, your wife will get a free travel to Tokyo as the reward.
sentences.cn: 如你所願，你妻子將得到赴東京免費旅行的獎賞。

sentences.en: I hardly dreamt of finding a treasure map in the cave.
sentences.cn: 我沒想到竟然在這個洞裡發現一張藏寶圖。

sentences.en: It is a fairly shoddy way to treat an old tourist like this.
sentences.cn: 這樣對待一位老年遊客真是十分可鄙。

sentences.en: It appears that he will stop his traveling and go to hospital for treatment.
sentences.cn: 他好像要停止旅遊，去醫院接受治療了。

sentences.en: I won admiration for my comportment during the singing trial last year.
sentences.cn: 我去年在唱歌選拔賽中的表現得到了讚賞。

sentences.en: It happened that they are playing games on a triangle of grass beside the path.
sentences.cn: 碰巧，他們在路邊的一塊三角形草坪上玩遊戲。

sentences.en: The tourist was on his toes, so he wasn't cheated by the old man’s trick.
sentences.cn: 這個遊客很機靈，所以沒被那個老人的詭計騙到。

sentences.en: At last, they drove a truck to drag the tour bus out of the river.
sentences.cn: 最終，他們開著一輛卡車將觀光巴士從河中拖了出來。

sentences.en: Contrary to his brother, he likes blowing a trumpet.
sentences.cn: 和他的哥哥相反，他很喜歡吹喇叭。

sentences.en: We should trust the guide, for this is the only way that we can escape from the cave.
sentences.cn: 我們必須相信導遊，因為這是我們從洞穴裡逃出去的唯一辦法。

sentences.en: The plain truth is that he has never played golf.
sentences.cn: 說白了，他從來沒有打過高爾夫球。

sentences.en: It is no use bringing a tube of toothpaste, for the hotel on the scenic spot provides every guest with a toothpaste and brush.
sentences.cn: 帶牙膏沒什麼用，因為觀光景點的旅館為每一位顧客提供牙膏和牙刷。

sentences.en: He saw some naughty boys crawling into the tunnel when he was walking.
sentences.cn: 他散步的時候看到一些淘氣的男孩爬進了隧道裡。

sentences.en: It is said that the latest movie is a real turkey.
sentences.cn: 據說最近的那部電影是一大敗筆。

sentences.en: I saw a turtle crawling along the coastline.
sentences.cn: 我看到一隻烏龜正在沿著海岸線爬行。

sentences.en: The bar offers a lot of diversions for every type of person.
sentences.cn: 這個酒吧為各種人提供許多消遣。

sentences.en: Now the typhoon is deviating from the expected course; so tell the guests to stay at a safe place.
sentences.cn: 現在颱風正在偏離預想的路線，所以通知遊客待在安全的地方。

sentences.en: It is evident that the visitors don't like this ugly picture.
sentences.cn: 很顯然，遊客們不喜歡這幅醜陋的畫。

sentences.en: To cut the chase, the umbrella in the bar was stolen by a man who drank there.
sentences.cn: 我就直說吧，酒吧裡的那把傘是被一個喝酒的客人偷走的。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me for a moment that he came to the cocktail party with his underwear hanging out.
sentences.cn: 我一點也沒想到他竟然衣冠不整來參加雞尾酒會。

sentences.en: The boxer gave the man in uniform a good beat.
sentences.cn: 拳擊手把穿制服的人痛打了一頓。

sentences.en: The director depended upon me to play this role in place of Jim.
sentences.cn: 導演讓我代替吉姆扮演這個角色。

sentences.en: It's a wonder that he invited many poor men instead of the upper class for the party.
sentences.cn: 他邀請了一些窮人而不是上流人士來參加這次派對，真是難得。

sentences.en: It's laughable that he is used to playing ping-pong before going to bed.
sentences.cn: 讓人啼笑皆非的是，他已經習慣了睡前打乒乓球。

sentences.en: It's hard to imagine there used to be a lot of sparrows in the park.
sentences.cn: 很難想像公園裡以前有很多麻雀。

sentences.en: The new game is sure to be popular among the young users.
sentences.cn: 這個新的遊戲肯定會很受年輕用戶的喜歡。

sentences.en: She dived into the game as usual without thinking.
sentences.cn: 她和往常一樣不加思考便加入了這場遊戲。

sentences.en: Why not swap houses with strangers in your vacation?
sentences.cn: 假期裡為什麼不與陌生人交換房屋呢？

sentences.en: The valley the explorers are going to lies behind the small hill.
sentences.cn: 探險者們要去的山谷就在這座小山的背面。

sentences.en: There's a lot to be said for the value of walking after dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐後散步的好處不勝枚舉。

sentences.en: The victory of the football game was at the cost of his injury.
sentences.cn: 這次足球比賽的勝利是他受傷換來的。

sentences.en: The problem with the video is that it is highly addictive.
sentences.cn: 錄影帶的問題在於它很容易讓人上癮。

sentences.en: Is there anywhere that the mountaineer can have a rest in the village?
sentences.cn: 村裡有供登山者休息的地方嗎？

sentences.en: She was almost driven crazy each time I played the violin.
sentences.cn: 每次我拉小提琴，她就幾乎要發瘋。

sentences.en: The visitor is eager to get a good view of the famous waterfall.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客急切地想更清楚地看看這條著名的瀑布。

sentences.en: He read the vocabulary again and again and forgot to play basketball.
sentences.cn: 他一遍又一遍地朗讀詞彙表，都忘了打籃球。

sentences.en: She said she likes volleyball least of all.
sentences.cn: 她說她最不喜歡打排球了。

sentences.en: I vote for having a picnic on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我建議周日去野餐。

sentences.en: The man said he was not qualified to be a voter.
sentences.cn: 那個男人說他沒有資格作選舉人。

sentences.en: Her waist is small and she is very suitable for dancing.
sentences.cn: 她的腰很細，很適合跳舞。

sentences.en: They had an argument with the waiter about the price of the wine in the bar.
sentences.cn: 在酒吧裡，他們和服務生因為酒的價格發生爭吵。

sentences.en: It's odd that the visitor woke up to find herself alone in the mountain.
sentences.cn: 很奇怪，那個遊客醒來時發現只有她自己在山裡。

sentences.en: That souvenir he bought from the scenic spot fell from his wallet and broke into pieces.
sentences.cn: 他從景點買的紀念品從皮夾裡掉出來，摔成了碎片。

sentences.en: The villager told the explorers that the waterfall never dries up all the year around.
sentences.cn: 村民告訴探險家，這條瀑布全年都不枯竭。

sentences.en: Mother cut the watermelon into several slices for the guests to eat.
sentences.cn: 媽媽把西瓜切成幾塊讓客人們吃。

sentences.en: The flower vanished from sight with a wave of the magician.
sentences.cn: 魔術師手一揮花朵就不見了。

sentences.en: I prize my guitar as a soldier prizes his weapon.
sentences.cn: 我珍愛我的吉他，猶如一個士兵珍愛他的武器。

sentences.en: They are opposed to wed after coming back from a tour of America.
sentences.cn: 他們反對從美國旅遊回來後再結婚。

sentences.en: I am willing to overwork on weekdays if I can get the rewards.
sentences.cn: 如果有獎勵的話，我願意在工作日加班。

sentences.en: It'd be foolish to watch the sun set beyond the western hills on such a cold day.
sentences.cn: 這麼冷的天看西方山上的夕陽真是夠蠢的。

sentences.en: When they dropped in on me, they were all wet through by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他們來拜訪我時，全身都被雨淋透了。

sentences.en: It was the first time for me to see a whale during the scuba diving this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 在今天下午的潛水活動中，我第一次看到鯨魚。

sentences.en: Whatever happens, the football game will be held on schedule.
sentences.cn: 不管發生什麼事，足球比賽都會如期進行。

sentences.en: To prepare so much food for the picnic would be to break a butterfly on the wheel.
sentences.cn: 野餐準備這麼多食物有點小題大作了。

sentences.en: Whenever you set out for the journey, I'll keep your company.
sentences.cn: 不管你什麼時候出發去旅行，我都會陪著你。

sentences.en: Wherever he travels, she will be by his side all the while.
sentences.cn: 無論他去哪裡旅遊，她都會在他身旁。

sentences.en: Don't you know it’s impolite to whisper in front of so many guests?
sentences.cn: 你難道不知道當著這麼多客人的面竊竊私語很不禮貌嗎？

sentences.en: Whoever can find the lost girl will get the reward of 1,000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 誰能找到那個失蹤的女孩，就能得到一千美元的獎金。

sentences.en: They will take steps to widen the garden in the park.
sentences.cn: 他們將會採取措施加寬公園裡的那個花園。

sentences.en: The young man paced out the length and width of the football ground.
sentences.cn: 年輕人用步伐量出足球場的長度和寬度。

cn: a: 野生的，荒涼的，狂熱的

sentences.en: After coming back from the long journey, he got down to his work about wild animals.
sentences.cn: 長途旅行回來之後，他開始研究野生動物的工作。

sentences.en: Are you willing that he should join us in the game?
sentences.cn: 你願意讓他加入我們的遊戲嗎？

sentences.en: He will be in company with her to go to that windy mountain region for relaxation.
sentences.cn: 他會陪她去那個風大的山區散心。

sentences.en: The right wing of the bird was hit by a piece of stone.
sentences.cn: 鳥的右翅膀被一塊石塊打中了。

sentences.en: The winner sang songs to amuse himself after the game.
sentences.cn: 比賽過後，獲勝者唱歌自娛。

sentences.en: The boy tied up the bird with the wire.
sentences.cn: 小男孩用電線將小鳥捆綁起來。

sentences.en: It's wise to leave the park before the storm.
sentences.cn: 在暴風雨來臨之前離開公園是明智的。

sentences.en: It is fortunate that they succeeded in playing out the comedy within one hour.
sentences.cn: 幸運的是，他們成功地在一小時之內演完那齣喜劇。

sentences.en: She is without question the best of all the players.
sentences.cn: 她無疑是所有選手中最好的。

sentences.en: The old man is a lone wolf and always walks on his own.
sentences.cn: 那個老先生是一個喜歡獨處的人，經常自己一個人獨行。

sentences.en: All of the tourists wonder that how they created such marvelous feats of engineering as the Great Wall.
sentences.cn: 所有遊客都好奇，他們是如何創造了像長城這樣偉大的工程奇觀。

sentences.en: They went into the country yesterday and had a wonderful time.
sentences.cn: 他們昨天到鄉下玩得很愉快。

sentences.en: The wooden bridge over the stream was made by the workers.
sentences.cn: 小溪上面的木橋是工人製造的。

sentences.en: I've decided to knit a sweater of wool for my husband in the free time.
sentences.cn: 我打算在空閒時間為丈夫織一件羊毛衫。

cn: a: 有多少的價值，值錢的

sentences.en: It is worth while to discuss where to go for a picnic.
sentences.cn: 該去哪裡野餐，值得討論一下。

sentences.en: The visitor was wounded and his blood poured out of the wound.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客受傷了，傷口血流如注。

sentences.en: They were playing games in the yard at the front of the house.
sentences.cn: 他們在房前的院子裡遊戲。

sentences.en: I heard the man was a talented musician in his youth.
sentences.cn: 我聽說那個男人年輕時很有音樂天份。

sentences.en: You are likely to see many wild animals on the grasslands, such as zebras and sheep.
sentences.cn: 你可能會在草原上看到很多野生動物，例如斑馬和羊。

cn: 搭乘交通工具，在船（火車、飛機）上

sentences.en: Well, all the passengers who came aboard the ship could have a free meal.
sentences.cn: 嗯，船上的所有乘客都可以免費享用一餐。

sentences.en: It is acceptable to have bacon and eggs today.
sentences.cn: 今天吃培根和蛋是可以接受的。

sentences.en: A traffic accident happened on the corner when we drank coffee.
sentences.cn: 我們喝咖啡的時候，那個轉角發生了一起交通事故。

sentences.en: The man withdrew twenty thousand dollars from his bank account to invite his friends to dinner.
sentences.cn: 那個人從銀行帳戶裡領了兩萬美元請朋友吃飯。

sentences.en: The spelling must be accurate, or else, you are not allowed to have dinner.
sentences.cn: 拼字必須正確無誤，否則，你不准吃晚餐。

sentences.en: After having a big dinner, she had an ache in the stomach.
sentences.cn: 飽餐一頓後，她感到胃痛。

sentences.en: He could enjoy all kinds of delicacies if he achieved his goals.
sentences.cn: 如果目標實現的話，他就能享受各種美食。

sentences.en: The cook is widely known for his achievement in dessert.
sentences.cn: 這位廚師因其在甜食上的成就而出名。

sentences.en: As a foodie, she is an active participant in the activity.
sentences.cn: 作為一名美食家，她積極參與這項活動。

sentences.en: We need to take actual action immediately after making a decision to have hot pot.
sentences.cn: 決定去吃火鍋後，我們要立刻採取實際行動。

sentences.en: You need to pay additional expense if you order other dishes.
sentences.cn: 你如果點其他的菜，需要另外付費。

sentences.en: Ever since, thousands of guests have come to taste the delicious food and the cook has also been admired for it.
sentences.cn: 從那之後，成千上萬的客人前來品嚐美食，廚師也為此受到了讚美。

sentences.en: We celebrated in the big restaurant after I was admitted to Yale University.
sentences.cn: 我被耶魯大學錄取後，我們去那家大飯店慶祝。

sentences.en: The couple adopted an orphan who was picky about food.
sentences.cn: 這對夫婦收養了一個對食物很挑剔的孤兒。

sentences.en: The dishes taste better in the restaurant after introducing advanced technology.
sentences.cn: 引入先進技術後，這家餐廳的飯菜好吃多了。

sentences.en: The cook takes advantage of his position to steal food.
sentences.cn: 這個廚師利用職務之便偷拿食物。

sentences.en: I was none the worse for my adventure, but was nearly starved to death.
sentences.cn: 這次冒險沒有使我受到傷害，只是差點餓死。

sentences.en: This kind of biscuit is delicious and it pays to advertise at the golden time.
sentences.cn: 這種餅乾很好吃，在黃金時間段做廣告很值得。

sentences.en: I glanced at the food and beverage advertisement on the newspaper and then set it aside.
sentences.cn: 我看了一眼報紙上的餐飲廣告，然後把它放在一邊。

sentences.en: I took my friend's advice and didn’t have the fish.
sentences.cn: 我聽從朋友的建議，沒有吃那條魚。

sentences.en: Her parents advised her not to travel with the gang of scoundrels again.
sentences.cn: 父母勸她不要再和那群無賴一起旅行。

sentences.en: The adviser has a good appetite no matter what happens.
sentences.cn: 不管發生什麼事，這個顧問都有好胃口。

sentences.en: The truth was that the rubbish near the table affected our appetite.
sentences.cn: 事實是，桌子旁邊的垃圾影響了我們的食慾。

cn: 承擔得起，花費得起，提供，給予

sentences.en: We can't afford the bill and were kicked out of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我們付不起帳單，被趕出了旅館。

sentences.en: I tried my best to learn cooking, and soon afterwards I cooked well.
sentences.cn: 我盡全力學習煮飯，很快就有了一手好廚藝。

sentences.en: Planting vegetables in vinyl house is very popular in modern agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在現代農業中，在溫室裡種植蔬菜十分普遍。

sentences.en: We are having hot pot, so please turn on the air-conditioner.
sentences.cn: 我們在吃火鍋，所以請把空調打開。

sentences.en: I have a cup of tea in the teahouse in this alley every afternoon.
sentences.cn: 每天下午我都在這條巷子裡的那家茶館喝杯茶。

sentences.en: I was so amazed at the news that he was sent to hospital because he had eaten a roast frog.
sentences.cn: 聽說他因為吃了一隻烤青蛙而被送到醫院，我十分吃驚。

sentences.en: She was filled with amazement when I took her to a cafe.
sentences.cn: 我帶她上咖啡館時，她十分驚訝。

sentences.en: Newspapers are of vital importance to the ambassador from America.
sentences.cn: 對於這個從美國來的大使來說，報紙特別重要。

sentences.en: He has been filled with ambition to eat all kinds of snacks all around the world.
sentences.cn: 他立志要吃遍全世界的小吃。

sentences.en: I caught a glimpse of the girl in a restaurant; her way of eating is like an angel.
sentences.cn: 我在餐館裡瞥見過那個女孩，她吃飯的樣子就像一個天使。

sentences.en: The statue looks very ugly from this angle.
sentences.cn: 從這個角度來看，那個雕像很難看。

sentences.en: It was announced that we would have a big dinner tonight.
sentences.cn: 我們收到通知，今晚將會有一頓豐盛的晚餐。

sentences.en: His sudden announcement of treating all the colleagues to dinner took us by great surprise.
sentences.cn: 他突然請所有同事吃飯，這讓我們都很吃驚。

sentences.en: Her outstanding ability for tasting red wine set her apart from other girls.
sentences.cn: 她獨特的品酒能力使她在女孩中獨具一格。

sentences.en: It is apparent that he had no intention of having a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 很明顯，他不想喝咖啡。

sentences.en: They appealed to the manager for a dinner party on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 他們向經理申請周日聚餐。

sentences.en: We all appreciate your treating us to dinner.
sentences.cn: 謝謝你請我們吃飯。

sentences.en: I decided not to approach her in fear of rejection.
sentences.cn: 我因怕她拒絕而決定不去找她。

sentences.en: I will never approve of your eating such dirty food.
sentences.cn: 我永遠不會贊成你吃這麼髒的食物。

sentences.en: We were all in high spirits when eating snacks stealthily in the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 在水族館裡偷偷吃零食時，我們都很興奮。

sentences.en: I was surprised to find the little boy was good at arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 我驚訝地發現，那個小男孩的計算能力特別好。

sentences.en: With the arrival of Jim, we began to sing.
sentences.cn: 隨著吉姆的到來，我們開始唱歌了。

sentences.en: All of the books were burnt to ashes in the fire just now.
sentences.cn: 剛才，所有的書都在大火中化成了灰燼。

sentences.en: I put the bread aside and began to drink milk.
sentences.cn: 我把麵包放在一邊，開始喝牛奶。

sentences.en: I asked my friends to assist in eating up the cake.
sentences.cn: 我請朋友們幫忙吃完這個蛋糕。

sentences.en: After the failure, the athlete began to eat too much out of sheer boredom.
sentences.cn: 那次失敗後，因為感到無聊，這個運動員開始無節制地大吃起來。

sentences.en: I attempted to eat the nasty dish, but failed.
sentences.cn: 我試圖吃那道難吃的菜，但沒有成功。

sentences.en: He has a passive attitude towards the song.
sentences.cn: 他對這首歌採取負面態度。

sentences.en: The snack bar attracts guests from all parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 這家小吃店吸引了全國各地的客人。

sentences.en: Fine food is attractive to her.
sentences.cn: 美食對她很有吸引力。

sentences.en: The audiences are forbidden to eat snacks in the cinema.
sentences.cn: 觀眾禁止在電影院裡吃零食。

sentences.en: The famous author has a bad habit.
sentences.cn: 那個著名作家有個壞習慣。

sentences.en: Ben stood up in an automatic movement after he finished dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐後，班不假思索地站了起來。

sentences.en: She ceased to eat for fear of staining the automobile.
sentences.cn: 擔心把車弄髒，她停止吃東西。

cn: 可用的，可得到的，有效的

sentences.en: He isn't available for living in China because he dislikes Chinese food.
sentences.cn: 他不適合住在中國，因為他不喜歡吃中國菜。

sentences.en: As we all know, he likes to have coffee in the café at the avenue.
sentences.cn: 我們都知道，他喜歡在林蔭大道上那家咖啡館喝咖啡。

sentences.en: I think there is nothing special about the dinner, and it is average.
sentences.cn: 我覺得晚餐的飯菜沒什麼特別，挺平常的。

sentences.en: Please awake him at 6 o'clock, or he will have no time to eat breakfast.
sentences.cn: 請在六點鐘叫醒他，不然他就沒時間吃早餐了。

sentences.en: He was awakened by his girlfriend and then went to have a cup of tea with her.
sentences.cn: 他被女朋友叫醒，然後跟她一起去喝茶。

sentences.en: He was awarded a gold medal in the competition, so he bought us a drink.
sentences.cn: 他在比賽中贏得金牌，於是請我們喝酒。

sentences.en: She wasn't aware of the problem that she had nothing to eat.
sentences.cn: 她還沒有意識到她已經沒有東西吃了。

sentences.en: There, I cannot have a buffet because of the awful weather.
sentences.cn: 算了吧，天氣很糟糕，我不能去吃自助餐了。

sentences.en: If you can cleave a block of wood with the axe, I will give you some chocolates.
sentences.cn: 如果你能用這把斧頭劈開一塊木頭，我就給你一些巧克力。

sentences.en: He has a background in cooking and all of his friends like the dishes he cooks.
sentences.cn: 他學過烹飪，所有朋友都喜歡吃他做的菜。

sentences.en: Let me know if the bacon is cooked in a frying pan, because it tastes a little salty.
sentences.cn: 請告訴我培根是不是在平底鍋裡做的，因為它吃起來有點鹹。

sentences.en: He was suffering from a stomachache, it's because there were bacterium in the food he has just eaten.
sentences.cn: 他肚子疼，是因為他剛才吃的食物裡有細菌。

sentences.en: I think the man is badly in need of water.
sentences.cn: 我認為這個人急需喝水。

sentences.en: He is fond of playing badminton and being out drinking on Sundays.
sentences.cn: 他喜歡在周日打羽毛球和出去喝酒。

sentences.en: Put your baggage on the rack and have a drink together with us.
sentences.cn: 把行李放在行李架上，來和我們一起喝酒。

sentences.en: He hoped that the fish would nibble at the bait, if so, his children could have fish tonight.
sentences.cn: 他希望魚來咬鉤，這樣的話，他的孩子今晚就有魚吃了。

sentences.en: Can you keep balance between meals and snacks?
sentences.cn: 你能在主食和零食之間保持平衡嗎？

sentences.en: He was wounded when having hot pot, and now the nurse was twisting the bandage around his arm.
sentences.cn: 他在吃火鍋時受傷了，現在護士正用繃帶纏住他的手臂。

sentences.en: I went bang into a telephone pole and my milk spilt out.
sentences.cn: 我砰地撞到電線杆，我的牛奶灑了出來。

sentences.en: There is nothing to eat and they are on the margin of bare subsistence.
sentences.cn: 沒有東西吃了，他們處在挨餓的邊緣。

sentences.en: His income is barely enough to keep the wolf from the door.
sentences.cn: 他的收入只能勉強度日。

sentences.en: I converted the barn into a garden, and always had coffee there.
sentences.cn: 我把那個穀倉改成了花園，時常在那裡喝咖啡。

sentences.en: His beer flowed out from the broken barrel, so he had to buy some from the shop.
sentences.cn: 啤酒從那個漏桶中流出來了，所以他還得去商店裡買一些。

sentences.en: Let me fill you in on why we have lunch near the bay.
sentences.cn: 讓我來告訴你為什麼我們要在海灣附近吃午餐。

sentences.en: The man drinking tea in the black was caught in the full beam of a searchlight.
sentences.cn: 那個在黑暗中喝茶的人被探照燈照中而暴露無遺。

sentences.en: It used to be said that when a man is drunk, he's a beast.
sentences.cn: 過去人們常說，一個人喝醉時很野蠻。

sentences.en: I opened my heart to the beggar and gave him something to eat.
sentences.cn: 我非常同情那個乞丐，給了他一點吃的。

sentences.en: It is very impolite to behave so rudely at dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時如此粗魯真是沒禮貌。

sentences.en: An advantage of her being is that she can cook anything you want to eat.
sentences.cn: 她存在的好處之一就是她能做出你想吃的任何東西。

sentences.en: It seems that he has a wolf in his belly.
sentences.cn: 他吃起飯來像餓狼。

cn: 在⋯之下，低於⋯ ad在下方，在底下

sentences.en: Let me see if there is some bread beneath a pile of dead leaves.
sentences.cn: 讓我看看那堆枯樹葉下面是否有麵包。

sentences.en: We benefit a lot from having a glass of water after getting up in the morning.
sentences.cn: 早起後喝一杯水讓我們受益頗多。

sentences.en: I couldn't help eating the berry.
sentences.cn: 我忍不住吃莓果。

sentences.en: He is reading the bible.
sentences.cn: 他在讀聖經。

sentences.en: He has assets of billion dollars, but he always works with an empty belly.
sentences.cn: 他有十億美元的資產，但總是餓著肚子工作。

sentences.en: Bingo! I have finished eating the big cake!
sentences.cn: 瞧，我把這個大蛋糕吃完了！

sentences.en: The biscuits I ate last time left a deep impression on me.
sentences.cn: 上次吃的餅乾給我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.en: My mother blamed me for my throwing the leftovers away.
sentences.cn: 我把剩飯倒掉，所以媽媽責備了我。

sentences.en: She wrapped herself in a blanket and shoveled the food into her mouth.
sentences.cn: 她身上裹著毯子，大口吃著東西。

sentences.en: A fish bone sticks in my throat and it bleeds.
sentences.cn: 一根魚刺卡在我的喉嚨裡，喉嚨流血了。

sentences.en: He is blessed with bread and water.
sentences.cn: 他很幸運，麵包和水都有了。

sentences.en: The woman in a yellow blouse told us they had a special on suitcase today.
sentences.cn: 那個穿黃襯衫的女人告訴我們，他們的行李箱今天特價。

sentences.en: He should make so bold as to eat a puffer fish.
sentences.cn: 他竟然敢吃河豚。

sentences.en: The boss gave him the boot because he stole stationery in the company.
sentences.cn: 他因為偷公司的文具而被老闆開除。

sentences.en: Some foreigners crossed the border just to enjoy a quick snack.
sentences.cn: 有些外國人越過邊境只是為了吃點小吃。

sentences.en: Her everlasting eating candies bores her husband to death.
sentences.cn: 她不停地吃糖果，這讓她的丈夫極度厭煩。

sentences.en: She braked hard in order not to hit the man who was standing in the middle of the road.
sentences.cn: 她急忙踩剎車，為的是不撞到那個站在馬路中間的人。

sentences.en: He is as bold as brass to ask me for a piece of bread.
sentences.cn: 他厚顏無恥地向我要一塊麵包。

sentences.en: They spoke highly of the bravery of the young man.
sentences.cn: 他們高度稱讚那個年輕人的勇敢行為。

sentences.en: He beat his breast at the news that his chocolates were eaten up by his sister.
sentences.cn: 得知妹妹吃完了他的巧克力，他捶胸頓足。

sentences.en: She has eaten for half an hour, barely pausing to draw breath.
sentences.cn: 她足足吃了半小時，幾乎沒有停下來喘一口氣。

sentences.en: She was able to breathe easily again after disposing of the rubbish.
sentences.cn: 處理掉所有的垃圾後，她又可以鬆口氣了。

sentences.en: It is pleasant to enjoy the cool sea breeze and have a cup of coffee here.
sentences.cn: 在這裡享受涼爽的海風，喝著咖啡很愜意。

sentences.en: The bride has never been a great one for rice.
sentences.cn: 新娘向來不喜歡吃米飯。

cn: 明亮的，傑出的，才華洋溢的

sentences.en: He had the good fortune to drink with some brilliant directors.
sentences.cn: 他有幸與幾位傑出的主管人員一同喝酒。

sentences.en: A brook flows through the small village.
sentences.cn: 一條小河流經這個小村莊。

sentences.en: The cook picked up a broom to drive off the flies around the dish.
sentences.cn: 廚師拿起一把掃帚驅趕盤子周圍的蒼蠅。

sentences.en: He knitted his brow when he tasted the soup.
sentences.cn: 他品嚐湯的時候皺起眉頭。

sentences.en: Oh my god, the soup in the pot is at the bubble.
sentences.cn: 喔，天啊，鍋裡的湯在沸騰。

sentences.en: As for the current situation, the food she offered was just a drop in the bucket.
sentences.cn: 從目前的形勢來看，她提供的食物不過是滄海一粟。

sentences.en: His bad habit of eating before going to bed should be nipped in the bud.

sentences.cn: 他們不計後果，為了吃肉而殺掉所有的野牛。

sentences.cn: 你們這周日來吃自助餐可能會更好一些。

sentences.cn: 他告訴我今晚要和她一起吃飯。

sentences.en: He will talk about the food safety with me after he dips into this report.
sentences.cn: 瀏覽完這份報告後，他會和我談談食品安全的問題。

sentences.en: Dirt and junk food are adverse to the growth of your son.
sentences.cn: 骯髒與垃圾食品對你兒子的成長很不利。

sentences.en: Don't disappoint your mother by going to school without breakfast.
sentences.cn: 不要不吃早餐就去上學，那會讓你媽媽失望的。

cn: 失望，令人失望的人或事

sentences.en: To our disappointment, there is nothing to eat in the fridge.
sentences.cn: 令我們失望的是，冰箱裡沒有吃的。

cn: 迪斯可舞廳，迪斯可舞曲

sentences.en: You should dedicate yourself to singing instead of going to the disco.
sentences.cn: 你應該好好研究如何唱歌，而不是去舞廳跳舞。

sentences.en: I will be only too glad to dine in your restaurant if you can offer a discount of twenty percents.
sentences.cn: 如果你打八折，我會非常樂意在你的餐廳裡用餐。

sentences.en: His discovery is bound to be useful for making mooncakes.
sentences.cn: 他的新發現對於製作月餅肯定有幫助。

sentences.en: You will run the risk of disease if you eat the dirty food.
sentences.cn: 如果你吃了不乾淨的食物，就可能會患病。

sentences.en: Hand the disk to me and I will make you some tea.
sentences.cn: 把磁片遞給我，我泡點茶給你喝。

sentences.en: I dislike to dine with him.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡跟他一起吃飯。

sentences.en: He calls on the soldiers to have dinner in the ditch in case of the enemy's attack.
sentences.cn: 他號召戰士們在戰壕裡吃飯，以防敵人進攻。

sentences.en: Dive into the water to catch fishes, if so, he wouldn't suffer from hunger.
sentences.cn: 跳入河中捕一些魚，這樣的話他就不用挨餓了。

sentences.en: The foods on the dock are in accordance with the ones that he demands.
sentences.cn: 碼頭上的那些食物和他想要的一致。

sentences.en: He made a sudden dodge aside before the waiter splashed the soup over him.
sentences.cn: 在服務生把湯灑在他身上之前，他迅速閃避到一旁。

sentences.en: The statics show that the demand for this drink in domestic supermarkets is as great as that of the overseas.
sentences.cn: 資料顯示，國內的超市對這種飲料的需求和海外的需求同樣旺盛。

sentences.en: It is rumored that only one dose of this drink can alleviate your thirst.
sentences.cn: 傳言說，服用小劑量的這種飲料就能緩解你的口渴。

sentences.en: It is doubtful that whether he can drink the wine off at a time.
sentences.cn: 他能否一次就喝完酒還值得懷疑。

sentences.en: Please stand by until we drain the glass dry.
sentences.cn: 站在一邊等我們把這杯喝完。

sentences.en: She drank the milk in a dramatic gesture.
sentences.cn: 她動作誇張地喝著牛奶。

sentences.en: The rain dripped into the bowl, but he didn't care about it at all.
sentences.cn: 雨水滴到了碗裡，但他一點也不在意。

sentences.en: He put down the wine glass and drowned himself in the past.
sentences.cn: 他放下酒杯，沉浸於回憶中。

cn: 昏昏欲睡的，使人發困的

sentences.en: It's queer that he feels drowsy after lunch every day.
sentences.cn: 很奇怪，他每天午餐後都想睡覺。

sentences.en: Evidently she got drunk and walked much slower than usual.
sentences.cn: 很顯然她喝醉了，走路比平時要慢得多。

cn: 由於，應有的，應付的，預定的

sentences.en: At the banquet the guests took their seats in due order.
sentences.cn: 在宴會上，客人們依次就座。

sentences.en: They throw the leftovers to the dump and it sends out an offensive odor.
sentences.cn: 他們把剩飯倒在垃圾場裡，那裡散發出難聞的氣味。

sentences.en: It will be better if you can dust this bag of ham for me.
sentences.cn: 如果你能幫我撣去這包火腿上的灰塵就更好了。

sentences.en: I'm eager to know whether you have been there.
sentences.cn: 我很想知道你是否去過那裡。

sentences.en: I hear wine gobbles up half of his earnings.
sentences.cn: 我聽說他的一半收入都用在喝酒上。

sentences.en: I drank a bottle of milk, shouted and listened for the echo.
sentences.cn: 我喝杯牛奶，大聲喊著，然後聆聽著回聲。

sentences.en: He keeps editing a book of his own poetry while drinking tea in his spare time.
sentences.cn: 閒餘時間，他一直在喝茶、編詩集。

sentences.en: The edition of the cookery book is confined to 4,000 copies.
sentences.cn: 這一版烹飪書限量出售四千冊。

sentences.en: The chief editor was unwilling to eat the steak.
sentences.cn: 主編不願意吃牛排。

sentences.en: It takes patience to educate a child in using fork and knife.
sentences.cn: 教孩子使用刀叉需要耐心。

sentences.en: Starvation and thirst may both be barriers to educational progress.
sentences.cn: 饑餓和口渴都會妨礙學業的進展。

sentences.en: He may as well give more food and water to those efficient workers.
sentences.cn: 他最好多發點食物和水給那些能幹的工人。

sentences.en: I will eat more food if you are at my elbow.
sentences.cn: 如果你在我身邊，我會吃得更多。

sentences.en: It is curious that her food is even simpler than that of the elderly woman living next to her.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她的食物甚至比隔壁老年婦女的食物還要簡單。

sentences.en: He was too nervous to eat before the election.
sentences.cn: 選舉前，他緊張地吃不下飯。

sentences.en: The electric shortage had a great effect on our diet.
sentences.cn: 電力短缺對我們的飲食有很大的影響。

sentences.en: The electricity supply in the dining room was cut off and we had dinner in the dark.
sentences.cn: 餐廳停電了，我們摸黑吃飯。

sentences.en: The new kind of machine is operated by an electronic pulse.
sentences.cn: 這款新型的機器是靠電子脈衝來操作。

sentences.en: Emergency food supplies were brought in case of the storm.
sentences.cn: 為了預防暴雨，運來了應急食物。

sentences.en: The emperor attempted to eat noodles with a fork, but failed.
sentences.cn: 那個皇帝試圖用叉子吃麵條，結果失敗了。

sentences.en: The governor emphasized that starving people were even more than before.
sentences.cn: 州長強調，挨餓的人甚至比以前還多。

sentences.en: After being employed as an editor, he is determined to commit himself to cooking.
sentences.cn: 被聘為編輯之後，他決心投身於烹飪這一行。

sentences.en: Neither of us is currently in paid employment, so we have no money to get married.
sentences.cn: 我們倆目前都沒有工作賺錢，所以沒有錢結婚。

sentences.en: The employee gestured to the waiter to bring some more coffee.
sentences.cn: 那個員工打手勢示意服務生再拿些咖啡。

sentences.en: The man cherished a deep resentment towards his employer because of starvation.
sentences.cn: 那個人因為挨餓，而對他的雇主懷恨在心。

sentences.en: At first sight the fridge appeared to be empty, but there were many foods in fact.
sentences.cn: 乍看之下，冰箱是空的，其實裡面有很多吃的。

sentences.en: Clearly, his sharp teeth enabled him to eat meat.
sentences.cn: 很明顯，他那鋒利的牙齒確保他能夠吃肉。

cn: 精力旺盛的，充滿活力的

sentences.en: It's possible that she doesn’t feel energetic enough to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 很可能她覺得沒有足夠的力氣逛街。

sentences.en: It is not unusual for the fat woman to engage herself in eating all day.
sentences.cn: 那個胖女人天天忙著吃東西不足為奇。

sentences.en: She can't have dinner with him because she has a previous engagement.
sentences.cn: 她不能和他一起吃飯，因為她有約在先。

sentences.en: It might be a good idea to sit on the engine and have lunch.
sentences.cn: 坐在機車上吃午餐是個好主意。

sentences.en: The engineer was arrested for being drunk and disorderly last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，那個工程師因酗酒滋事而被捕。

sentences.en: I feel very happy to have an enjoyable supper with my friends.
sentences.cn: 我很高興和朋友們吃一頓愉快的晚餐。

sentences.en: The entry of the fat man boosts our confidence to finish the big lunch.
sentences.cn: 那個胖子的加入增強了我們吃完這頓豐盛的午餐的信心。

sentences.en: All the students should be conscious of the importance of the environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 所有學生都應該認識到環保的重要性。

sentences.en: All of his friends envied him for having a good appetite.
sentences.cn: 他所有的朋友都羡慕他有個好胃口。

sentences.en: How can I erase the tomato juice from my coat?
sentences.cn: 我怎麼才能把外套上的番茄汁擦掉呢？

sentences.en: My brother always sought escape in the bottle from hard realities last year.
sentences.cn: 去年我哥哥常常借酒消愁來逃避殘酷的現實。

sentences.en: It goes evil with her and she can't eat anything.
sentences.cn: 她的情況不妙，不能進食。

sentences.en: Her ability of tasting red wine has reached a high degree of excellence.
sentences.cn: 她品嚐紅酒的能力已經達到爐火純青的地步。

sentences.en: I should like to exchange my coffee with yours.
sentences.cn: 我想跟你交換咖啡。

sentences.en: After breakfast, he suddenly showed keen interest in exhibition.
sentences.cn: 早餐後，他突然對展覽會表現出濃厚的興趣。

sentences.en: He was unaware of the existence of the milk in the kitchen until today.
sentences.cn: 直到今天，他才知道冰箱裡有牛奶。

sentences.en: All of the guests in the hotel made a rush for the exit when the fire happened.
sentences.cn: 火災發生時，旅館裡的所有人都慌忙衝向出口。

sentences.en: It is beyond our expectation that the cake is salty.
sentences.cn: 真沒想到，那個蛋糕竟然是鹹的。

sentences.en: The expense of the food has gone beyond their budget.
sentences.cn: 這些食物的花費已經超出了他們的預算。

sentences.en: He handed the breakfast to his assistants before the experiment.
sentences.cn: 實驗前，他把早餐遞給助理。

sentences.en: Given that the boiler might explode, we didn't cook dinner.
sentences.cn: 考慮到鍋爐也許會爆炸，我們沒有煮飯。

sentences.en: The export of this kind of milk powder has tripled over the past four years.
sentences.cn: 在過去四年裡，這種奶粉的出口量增加三倍。

sentences.en: She had an anxious expression on her face when seeing the report.
sentences.cn: 她看到報告就愁容滿面。

sentences.en: The boy was encouraged by his mother's expressive nod.
sentences.cn: 媽媽意味深長的點頭鼓勵了男孩。

sentences.en: Her points are always vey extreme and she always disputes with others during dinner.
sentences.cn: 她的觀點總是很極端，而且她經常在吃飯時和別人吵架。

sentences.en: I could not decide whether the story he told during the dinner was fact or fable.
sentences.cn: 我無法確定他晚餐時講的故事究竟是事實還是無稽之談。

sentences.en: The factor of water and food is out of their expectation.
sentences.cn: 食物和水的因素超出了他們的預料。

sentences.en: When their singing faded away in the distance, we began to drink coffee.
sentences.cn: 當他們的歌聲逐漸消失在遠方時，我們開始喝咖啡。

sentences.en: He went off in a faint after eating the bread.
sentences.cn: 吃過麵包後，他就昏過去了。

sentences.en: She has got a fairly good idea of what to eat this evening.
sentences.cn: 她已經完全知道今天晚上要吃什麼。

sentences.en: Before sleep, some imaginative children made up fairy stories.
sentences.cn: 睡覺前，一些想像力豐富的孩子自己編造童話故事。

sentences.en: We should never lose faith, even if we are suffering from starvation.
sentences.cn: 即使挨餓，我們也絕不能喪失信念。

sentences.en: She is a real fake, and you can't count on her on buying car.
sentences.cn: 她是個真正的騙子，買車這件事你不能指望她。

sentences.en: Are you familiar with the well-dressed woman?
sentences.cn: 你熟悉那個衣著考究的女人嗎？

sentences.en: The singer's eating habit gave rise to wild rumor among her fans.
sentences.cn: 這位歌手的飲食習慣引起歌迷們的各種流言蜚語。

cn: 狂熱者，極端分子，盲信者

sentences.en: He is a puffer fanatic, but all of his friends tell him to get away from it.
sentences.cn: 他酷愛吃河豚，但他的朋友們都讓他遠離它。

sentences.en: He fancied that girl and made an appointment with her yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他很喜歡那個女孩，昨天跟她約會了。

sentences.en: The taxi fare rose on grounds of the petrol shortage, so we walked to the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 由於汽油短缺，計程車的費用上漲了，所以我們步行去書店。

sentences.en: He beguiled the child to go farther with chocolates.
sentences.cn: 他用巧克力哄著孩子走遠一些。

sentences.en: This kind of dress goes in and out of fashion quickly.
sentences.cn: 這種洋裝很快流行起來，又很快不流行了。

sentences.en: He confirmed that they ate at a fashionable new restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他證實他們在一家新開張的時尚餐廳吃飯。

sentences.en: Fasten the horse to the tree, and then come to have a cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 把馬拴在樹上，然後過來喝杯茶。

sentences.en: By a strange quirk of fate we had lunch in the same restaurant.
sentences.cn: 真巧，我們居然在同一家餐廳吃午餐。

sentences.en: Don't forget to switch off the faucet after you use it.
sentences.cn: 用完後別忘了關水龍頭。

sentences.en: There is great merit in fixing up the fax, for the boss will treat you to dinner and give you some money.
sentences.cn: 修好這台傳真機大有好處，因為老闆會請你吃飯，還會給你一筆錢。

sentences.en: He ruffled my feathers when we drank together in the bar, and my boyfriend gave him a lesson.
sentences.cn: 在酒吧喝酒時他惹怒我，我男朋友給了他一個教訓。

sentences.en: He said that feature film has no charm for him, and then left the cinema.
sentences.cn: 他說對劇情片不感興趣，就離開電影院了。

sentences.en: The principal keeps the announcement that he skips classes to drink on file.
sentences.cn: 校長把他蹺課去喝酒的公告都存檔了。

sentences.en: The feast ended up with a wonderful firework.
sentences.cn: 宴席以一場精彩的煙火表演而結束。

sentences.en: I noticed that he stopped talking and clenched his fist.
sentences.cn: 我看到他停止說話並握緊了拳頭。

sentences.en: It's impossible for them to broil turkey over a charcoal flame.
sentences.cn: 他們不可能在木炭上烤火雞。

sentences.en: He said the kind of snack smelled stink, but in fact had delicious flavor.
sentences.cn: 他說這種小吃雖然很難聞，但是吃起來很有風味。

sentences.en: I'll put a flea in her ear if she still refuses to have breakfast.
sentences.cn: 如果她再不吃早餐的話，我就要對她不客氣了。

sentences.en: Just thinking about eating snakes makes his flesh creep.
sentences.cn: 一想起吃蛇，他渾身都起雞皮疙瘩。

sentences.en: Strange thoughts floated through his mind when he ate the roast chicken.
sentences.cn: 他吃烤雞時腦海裡浮現了一些奇怪的念頭。

sentences.en: A flock of guests in the hotel were scared off by the fire.
sentences.cn: 飯店裡的一群客人被火災嚇跑了。

sentences.en: He folded his arms when he felt uncomfortable after eating.
sentences.cn: 飯後感覺不舒服時，他抱緊了雙臂。

sentences.en: Don't grumble at the unsavory dishes of your school; difficulties help to forge you into an able folk.
sentences.cn: 別再抱怨學校的飯菜難吃了，困難有助於使你成才。

sentences.en: He made an attempt to throw the follower off, so he went to a bar and had a drink.
sentences.cn: 他試圖甩掉跟蹤他的人，於是進了一間酒吧喝酒。

sentences.en: My mother is fond of having a hand in everything, even what I eat and drink.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽喜歡什麼事都插手，甚至連我的吃喝都要管。

sentences.en: My mother gave me a kiss on the forehead and asked me to have breakfast.
sentences.cn: 媽媽吻了我的前額，並要我去吃早餐。

sentences.en: I'll bear the delicious food in mind forever.
sentences.cn: 我將永遠記住那些好吃的食物。

sentences.en: They set forth immediately after breakfast yesterday morning.
sentences.cn: 昨天早上吃過早餐後，他們就立即出發了。

sentences.en: I have had the good fortune to have dinner with him.
sentences.cn: 我有幸與他一起吃飯。

sentences.en: A bar was founded by the people here to memorize the old man.
sentences.cn: 人們在這裡建了一間酒吧來紀念那位老人。

sentences.en: The villagers there live on the fountain from the mountain.
sentences.cn: 那裡的村民都以山上的泉水為生。

sentences.en: Big hotels always want to freeze out the smaller ones in this city.
sentences.cn: 在這個城市裡，大飯店總是想排擠小飯店。

sentences.en: The man is a frequent guest to the bar.
sentences.cn: 那個人是這間酒吧的常客。

sentences.en: We held out the hand of friendship to him when he had nothing to eat.
sentences.cn: 當他沒有東西吃時，我們向他伸出了友誼之手。

sentences.en: Doesn't it frustrate you that none of the guests likes the dishes you cook?
sentences.cn: 沒有一個客人喜歡你做的菜，你不覺得沮喪嗎？

sentences.en: I'm considering some more pepper when frying the chicken.
sentences.cn: 我正考慮在炸雞時多放一些胡椒粉。

sentences.en: The store is in want of more liquid fund to attract guests.
sentences.cn: 這間店需要更多的流動資金來吸引顧客。

sentences.en: She was rushed into going home, so she forgot her fur coat in the bar.
sentences.cn: 她被催著趕快回家，所以把皮大衣忘在酒吧裡。

sentences.en: It took a lot of energy to move the furniture, so I had a big dinner after that.
sentences.cn: 搬傢俱費了我很大勁，所以搬完之後我大吃了一頓。

sentences.en: Two gallon of water is far from enough for these thirsty villagers.
sentences.cn: 對於這些口渴的村民來說，兩加侖水遠遠不夠。

sentences.en: Don't gamble with your life.
sentences.cn: 別拿你的生命冒險。

sentences.en: It is unthinkable that a gang of criminals are drinking coffee in the café.
sentences.cn: 難以置信，一群罪犯正在這間咖啡館裡喝咖啡。

sentences.en: I think the most critical issue is to narrow the gap between the two dishes.
sentences.cn: 我認為最關鍵的問題是縮小這兩道菜之間的差距。

sentences.en: My husband liked to eat pork which was seasoned with garlic.
sentences.cn: 我丈夫喜歡吃用大蒜調味的豬肉。

sentences.en: The bandits set fire to the bar with gas and most of the guests were wounded.
sentences.cn: 歹徒們用汽油焚燒這間酒吧，大多數客人都受傷了。

sentences.en: She thrust the book away from her with an angry gesture.
sentences.cn: 她生氣地把書猛地推開。

sentences.en: My brother cast a sneering glance at the card I made.
sentences.cn: 我弟弟輕蔑地瞥了一眼我做的卡片。

sentences.en: I am a skeptic about the global water shortage.
sentences.cn: 我是全球水資源短缺的懷疑論者。

sentences.en: To a baker, the glory lies not in money but in the customers' compliment.
sentences.cn: 對於一個糕點師來說，榮耀不在於金錢，而在於顧客們的讚美。

sentences.en: I lingered on the hill, drank a bottle of milk and enjoyed the beautiful glow of sunset.
sentences.cn: 我流連於山上，喝著牛奶並欣賞著美麗的落日餘暉。

sentences.en: I looked down on those people who always talked about gossip at table.
sentences.cn: 我看不起那些喜歡在餐桌上傳播流言蜚語的人。

sentences.en: The governor always yearns for the snacks in his hometown.
sentences.cn: 那個州長總是懷念家鄉的小吃。

sentences.en: I had no way to know the girl who was wearing a black gown.
sentences.cn: 我無法認識那個穿著黑色禮服的女孩。

sentences.en: He wanted to grab at her bread, but she pushed him away.
sentences.cn: 他想搶她的麵包，但卻被她推開了。

sentences.en: I have taken notice of the gradual change of the color of the meat.
sentences.cn: 我注意到了肉的顏色在逐漸變化。

sentences.en: The graduate is ruining his life by drinking every day.
sentences.cn: 那個畢業生每天都喝酒，這是在毀掉他自己的生活。

sentences.en: Our family is almost self-sufficient in grain crops.
sentences.cn: 我們家的糧食現在已經差不多能自給了。

sentences.en: I hear this kind of snacks is sold by gram.
sentences.cn: 我聽說這種零食是以克為單位出售的。

sentences.en: He grasped the painting and kept staring at it.
sentences.cn: 他抓起圖畫，一直盯著它看。

sentences.en: The little grasshopper on the corn gave me quite a scare.
sentences.cn: 玉米上的小蝗蟲真的讓我嚇一跳。

sentences.en: All of these vegetables are said to be bred in a greenhouse.
sentences.cn: 據說，這些蔬菜都是在溫室裡培育出來的。

sentences.en: Seeing that the boy could have dinner himself, the young mother grinned with pleasure.
sentences.cn: 看到小男孩會自己吃飯，年輕的媽媽滿意地笑了。

sentences.en: It is just a short walk to the grocery.
sentences.cn: 到雜貨店的路並不遠。

sentences.en: I think the legal guardian has the duty to ensure the kids won't starve.
sentences.cn: 我認為法定監護人有責任保證孩子不挨餓。

sentences.en: Under the guidance of the boss, all the poisonous milk powder has been taken back.
sentences.cn: 在老闆的指導下，所有的毒奶粉都回收了。

sentences.en: I was pissed off by him and spitted the gum on his face.
sentences.cn: 我被他惹煩了，就把口香糖吐在他的臉上。

sentences.en: The little boy gazed at those athletes who were drinking beers in the gym.
sentences.cn: 小男孩盯著那些正在體育館裡喝啤酒的運動員們看。

sentences.en: He used to be a hairdresser, but he is very great at baking now.
sentences.cn: 他曾是一名理髮師，但他現在對烘焙很精通。

sentences.en: The young man walked through the hallway to and fro in order to send lunch to those people in the house.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕人來來回回從走廊經過，是為了給屋子裡的那些人送午餐。

sentences.en: He had good reasons to throw a handful of rice to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他有很好的理由扔一把米在地上。

sentences.en: The girl is handy with sewing.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩是縫紉的高手。

sentences.en: A worker in the harbor who ate a poisonous fish was in danger now.
sentences.cn: 港灣裡的一個工人吃了有毒的魚，現在很危險。

sentences.en: This kind of food does more harm than good to our health.
sentences.cn: 這種食物對於我們的健康來說，弊大於利。

sentences.en: Nobody knows whether this kind of drink is harmful to our health.
sentences.cn: 沒有人知道這種飲料是否對我們的健康有害。

sentences.en: The harvest of apples last year was nothing less than that of the year before last year.
sentences.cn: 去年的蘋果收成和前年的一樣。

sentences.en: You should have thought twice before making your hasty decision to wear the dress.
sentences.cn: 匆忙決定要穿這件洋裝之前，你本應該三思的。

sentences.en: The eggs can't be eaten if the chicks hatch out.
sentences.cn: 小雞孵出來之後，雞蛋就不能吃了。

cn: 老鷹，好戰分子，貪婪的人

sentences.en: I don't know whether eating a hawk does harm to our health.
sentences.cn: 我不知道吃鷹肉是否會對我們的健康有害。

sentences.en: He stored some hay in case there would be snow.
sentences.cn: 他儲存一些乾草，以防下雪。

cn: 標題，新聞提要，頭條新聞

sentences.en: It was not until he saw the headline of the newspaper that he got to know what he had eaten.
sentences.cn: 直到他看到報紙的頭條新聞，他才知道自己吃了什麼。

sentences.en: The headquarters made airdrops of food to refugees.
sentences.cn: 指揮部向難民們空投食物。

sentences.en: He fell into a drunken stupor and got hurt, but now the wound healed.
sentences.cn: 他喝得不省人事受傷了，但是傷口現在已經好了。

sentences.en: Put these apples in a heap now.
sentences.cn: 現在把這些蘋果放成一堆。

sentences.en: I feel like more in heaven than just being happy when I drink the red wine.
sentences.cn: 喝紅酒時，與其說我感覺很快樂，倒不如說我如同身在天堂。

sentences.en: Cool your heels and the coffee is nearly ready.
sentences.cn: 等一下咖啡就好了。

sentences.en: Although dwelling in a shabby place which was just like the hell, I was sure of bread and water tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 雖然生活在一個破舊如地獄的地方，我依然堅信明天會有麵包和水。

sentences.en: The helmet protected him from being hurt in the accident happening.
sentences.cn: 在意外發生時，他的頭盔保護他免受傷害。

sentences.en: He never hesitates to eat pears whenever he sees them.
sentences.cn: 他一看見梨子，就毫不猶豫地吃掉。

sentences.en: Nobody will accompany me to have a cup of coffee and hike other than him.
sentences.cn: 除了他之外，沒有人會陪我喝咖啡和徒步旅行。

sentences.en: She dropped a hint to him by reaching out her fingers when she was having breakfast.
sentences.cn: 吃早餐時，她伸出手指來給他暗示。

sentences.en: The historian who committed himself to the study of history liked china best.
sentences.cn: 那位把全部精力都奉獻給歷史研究的歷史學家最喜歡瓷器。

sentences.en: The beginning of his eating fruits has historic meaning to his health.
sentences.cn: 他開始吃水果對於他的健康具有歷史意義。

sentences.en: The shape of the vase is quite distinct from the historical records.
sentences.cn: 這種花瓶的外形和歷史記載的不相符。

sentences.en: The dinning room was a hive of activity, and many guests were walking back and forth.
sentences.cn: 餐廳裡一片繁忙的景象，許多客人們來來回回地走著。

sentences.en: She seriously stared at the form in front of her with her hollow eyes.
sentences.cn: 她用那雙凹陷的眼睛嚴肅地盯著面前的表格。

cn: 神聖的，聖潔的，令人景仰的

sentences.en: She lives a holy life and never eats meat.
sentences.cn: 她過著聖潔的生活，從不吃肉。

sentences.en: I have been away from my hometown for about 20 years, but I can still clearly visualize the taste of the food.
sentences.cn: 我離開家鄉已經將近二十年，但我還能清晰地想像出那種食物的味道。

sentences.en: His teacher spoke in praise of him for his honesty.
sentences.cn: 他的老師表揚了他的誠實。

sentences.en: Undoubtedly, if he graduated with honors, his parents would take him to a big restaurant to celebrate it.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，如果他以優異的成績畢業，他父母肯定會帶他去大餐廳慶祝。

sentences.en: The children rushed toward the dinning room eagerly after hearing the sound of horn.
sentences.cn: 聽到喇叭聲後，孩子們急切地衝向餐廳。

cn: 恐怖的，可怕的，令人恐懼的

sentences.en: To say truly, the food you cooked yesterday tasted really horrible.
sentences.cn: 說實話，你昨天煮的飯真難吃。

sentences.en: To his horror, they asked him to eat mice.
sentences.cn: 令他驚恐的是，他們竟然讓他吃老鼠。

cn: 每小時的，以小時計算的，隨時的

sentences.en: The man who delivers mails comes here at hourly intervals, so you needn't worry.
sentences.cn: 那個送郵件的人每個小時來一次，所以你不用擔心。

sentences.en: The story goes that the housekeeper vowed not to cook anymore after that.
sentences.cn: 據說，從那之後那個主婦發誓再也不煮飯了。

sentences.en: He hugged his daughter tightly before he leaved.
sentences.cn: 離開前，他緊緊地擁抱了女兒。

sentences.en: She gave a humorous account of the snacks she had in America.
sentences.cn: 她風趣地講述了她在美國吃到的小吃。

sentences.en: After supper, she hushed her baby to sleep.
sentences.cn: 晚餐後，她哄寶寶睡覺。

sentences.en: I ate up the food in the hut.
sentences.cn: 我把小棚子裡的食物吃個精光。

sentences.en: I will not chance eating icy food in such a cold day.
sentences.cn: 我不願意在這樣冷的天冒險吃冰凍的食物。

sentences.en: It is totally useless to talk about ideal food with the poor man who often starves.
sentences.cn: 和經常挨餓的那人談論理想的食物是完全沒有用的。

sentences.en: The guard in the building quickly made certain of the guest's identity.
sentences.cn: 大樓裡的警衛很快就確定了那名客人的身份。

sentences.en: It is not surprised that the little boy is in sheer ignorance of this kind of drink.
sentences.cn: 那個小男孩完全不知道這種飲料，這不足為奇。

sentences.en: She has the image of the tomatoes as being sweet and sour.
sentences.cn: 番茄給她的印象是甜甜的、酸酸的。

sentences.en: It is beyond imagination that she finished her supper in such a quick way.
sentences.cn: 她很快就吃完晚餐，這真難以想像。

sentences.en: The immediate sequel to his eating sashimi was the pain in his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他吃生魚片的立即後果是肚子疼。

sentences.en: You should take it moderately on importing this kind of milk powder.
sentences.cn: 在進口這種奶粉時你們應該適可而止。

cn: v: 給⋯極深的印象，影響

sentences.en: Surprisingly, such delicious foods didn't impress him at all.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，這麼好吃的食物竟然沒有給他留下任何印象。

cn: 令人印象深刻的，感人的

sentences.en: The taste of the drink cut an impressive figure.
sentences.cn: 這種飲料的味道給人深刻的印象。

sentences.en: It is indeed unfortunate that he ate poisonous mushrooms and died.
sentences.cn: 他吃到毒蘑菇然後死了，這真是不幸。

sentences.en: It's up to us to distribute food and water to each individual.
sentences.cn: 分發食物和水給每一個人是由我們自己決定的。

sentences.en: As is known to us all, he likes to go indoor climbing.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，他喜歡室內攀岩。

sentences.en: It's best for you to stay indoors and do not go anywhere.
sentences.cn: 你最好待在屋裡，哪裡都不要去。

sentences.en: Compared with the industrial area, there are many restaurants and bars here.
sentences.cn: 與工業區相比，這裡有很多餐廳和酒吧。

sentences.en: I admitted that the dish I cooked was inferior to his in taste.
sentences.cn: 我承認我煮的飯菜沒有他煮的好吃。

sentences.en: They were informed to finish their work promptly.
sentences.cn: 他們都被通知趕快完成工作。

sentences.en: Tell the waiter to be careful when he serves the dishes lest the boy should be injured.
sentences.cn: 告訴服務生端菜時要小心，以免小男孩受傷。

sentences.en: It's no joke eating such spicy food when he is recovering from an injury.
sentences.cn: 他正在養傷，吃這麼辛辣的食物可不是鬧著玩的。

sentences.en: I have never realized that the price of the breakfast offered in the inn is so high.
sentences.cn: 我從未想到這家小旅館的早餐價格竟如此之高。

sentences.en: I ate up the cake in response to an inner calling.
sentences.cn: 我受內心慾望的驅使吃完那個蛋糕。

sentences.en: To prove that you were innocent and didn't eat the strawberries, you must show me your tongue.
sentences.cn: 如果你想證明自己是清白的，沒有吃草莓，就伸出舌頭讓我看看。

sentences.en: The traffic policeman held up a car so as to inspect if the driver has drunk.
sentences.cn: 交通警察攔住一輛轎車，以便檢查司機是否喝過酒。

sentences.en: The inspector had no qualms about eating without paying the bill.
sentences.cn: 對於吃霸王餐這件事，那個檢查員並不覺得有什麼不安。

sentences.en: First, they just had soup instead of a full meal at the dinner party.
sentences.cn: 首先，聚餐時他們沒有吃全餐，只喝了湯。

sentences.en: You must strictly follow the expert's instructions and drink less, or you’ll be in danger.
sentences.cn: 你必須嚴格按照專家的話去做，少喝酒，否則你會有危險。

sentences.en: Nonetheless, he is only interested in internal food.
sentences.cn: 然而，他只對國內的食物感興趣。

sentences.en: I beg your pardon, but I don't mean to interrupt your lunch.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我不是故意要打擾你吃午餐。

sentences.en: May I make an introduction of the dish to you now?
sentences.cn: 我現在可以向你介紹這道菜了嗎？

sentences.en: This dish is named after the inventor.
sentences.cn: 這道菜是以那個發明者命名的。

sentences.en: I felt obliged to deeply investigate the cause of the food poisoning.
sentences.cn: 我感覺有必要深入調查這次食物中毒的原因。

cn: a: 象牙製的，乳白色的

sentences.en: The chopsticks he is using are carved from ivory.
sentences.cn: 他正在用的筷子是用象牙雕成的。

sentences.en: If you continue to steal food in the restaurant, you'll end up in jail.
sentences.cn: 你如果繼續在餐廳裡偷東西吃，最終會被抓進監獄的。

sentences.en: However, she can see nothing special on the dish except it is contained in a jar.
sentences.cn: 可是，除了裝在一個廣口瓶裡外，她看不出這道菜有什麼特別之處。

sentences.en: He saw his chance and threw his milk onto the girl's jaw powerfully.
sentences.cn: 他看準機會，將牛奶朝女孩的下巴狠狠地扔了過去。

sentences.en: I am quite jealous of her because she can cook such delicious dishes.
sentences.cn: 我很嫉妒她，因為她能做出如此美味的菜。

sentences.en: When he sees the lion, his legs feel like jelly.
sentences.cn: 他一看到那隻獅子就兩腿發軟。

sentences.en: A jet plane is circling round and round clockwise above to airdrop food and water.
sentences.cn: 一架噴射機在上空順時針盤旋著，空投食物和水。

sentences.en: Orange juice is the jewel of all the drinks for me.
sentences.cn: 所有飲料當中，我最喜歡喝柳橙汁。

sentences.en: Under the escort of the safeguards, they conveyed the jewelry boxes without eating anything.
sentences.cn: 在保鏢的護送下，他們沒有吃任何東西就去運送珠寶了。

sentences.en: I kept a journal about what I have eaten and drunk every day.
sentences.cn: 我每天吃了什麼、喝了什麼都記在日記了。

sentences.en: They didn't prepare enough foods; consequently, they decided to cancel their plan for the journey.
sentences.cn: 因為沒有準備足夠的食物，因此他們決定取消旅行計畫。

sentences.en: Did you have any recall of the joyful day when we had dinner together?
sentences.cn: 你還記得我們一起愉快吃飯的那天嗎？

sentences.en: God forbid that you should find anything to eat in the jungle.
sentences.cn: 你絕不會在叢林裡找到任何吃的。

sentences.en: The cause why we never eat junk foods is that they are harmful to our health.
sentences.cn: 我們從來不吃垃圾食品的原因是它們對我們的健康有害。

sentences.en: The man who has a sense of justice is drinking milk now.
sentences.cn: 那個很有正義感的人現在正在喝牛奶。

sentences.en: Stop feeding food to the kangaroo, for it will be too full.
sentences.cn: 別餵袋鼠東西吃了，牠會吃太飽的。

sentences.en: Two hours have passed; however, the water in the kettle still doesn't boil up.
sentences.cn: 已經過去兩個小時了，可是水壺裡的水還沒有燒開。

sentences.en: A story is going about that he spilt his water on the keyboard accidently.
sentences.cn: 據說，是他不小心把水灑在鍵盤上。

sentences.en: I am inept at making steak and kidney pie.
sentences.cn: 我並不擅長做牛肉腰子餡餅。

sentences.en: He set his goal to eat a kilogram of mooncakes.
sentences.cn: 他定下目標要吃掉一公斤的月餅。

sentences.en: They stopped to drink water per kilometer.
sentences.cn: 他們每走一公里就要停下來喝水。

sentences.en: I seized on my kit bag and ran out to have lunch.
sentences.cn: 我抓起工具袋就跑出去吃午餐。

sentences.en: The beggar knelt down in front of the rich man to ask for food.
sentences.cn: 那個乞丐跪在那個富人的面前乞討食物。

sentences.en: I am furious that these knights get aggressive when they are drunk.
sentences.cn: 我很氣憤，這些騎士一喝酒就尋釁滋事。

sentences.en: My sister knits up sweaters faster than me.
sentences.cn: 我姊姊織毛衣比我快。

sentences.en: He gave a wrench at the knob to open the fridge and look for food.
sentences.cn: 他猛地轉了一下冰箱的把手，以打開冰箱找吃的。

sentences.en: You should cut the knot by eating up all the food.
sentences.cn: 你應該快刀斬亂麻，把這些食物統統吃掉。

sentences.en: I think the label should be firmly affixed to the package of the food.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這張標籤應該牢牢地貼在食物的包裝盒上。

sentences.en: Didn't you like the dress with the lace collar?
sentences.cn: 你難道不喜歡那件有蕾絲衣領的洋裝嗎？

sentences.en: I need another ladder which is longer than this one to pick off the apples.
sentences.cn: 我需要另外一架比這個長的梯子才能摘下那些蘋果。

sentences.en: I will give up drinking in the latter part of the year.
sentences.cn: 後半年我將戒酒。

sentences.en: She tasted the bread I made and roared with laughter.
sentences.cn: 她吃了我做的麵包，放聲大笑。

sentences.en: I am tired with washing clothes; let's send them to the laundry and have a cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 我洗衣服太累了，把它們送到洗衣房，然後喝杯茶。

sentences.en: Keep off the lawn.
sentences.cn: 不要踐踏草皮。

sentences.en: The bottle of milk is apt to leak if there is a hole.
sentences.cn: 如果有洞的話，那瓶牛奶會很容易漏。

sentences.en: His giving up eating meat was a leap in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他不吃肉是貿然的行動。

sentences.en: The bag he used to hold the food is made of leather.
sentences.cn: 他用來裝食物的袋子是用皮革做的。

sentences.en: I am seldom at leisure to have a cup of coffee in the cafe.
sentences.cn: 我很少有空去咖啡館喝杯咖啡。

sentences.en: Will you care to lengthen the dinner hour?
sentences.cn: 你介意延長晚餐的時間嗎？

sentences.en: We should first keep the camera lens clean.
sentences.cn: 我們應該先保持照相機鏡頭的清潔。

sentences.en: He had the temerity to drink my milk and called me a liar.
sentences.cn: 他竟敢喝我的牛奶，還說我撒謊。

cn: 自由主義的，慷慨的，開明的

sentences.en: I have a liberal attitude to eating snakes and mice.
sentences.cn: 我對吃蛇肉和老鼠肉看得很開。

sentences.en: He took the liberty of eating my food when I was away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的時候，他擅自吃我的食物。

sentences.en: The librarian was in his cups and couldn't stand up.
sentences.cn: 那個圖書管理員喝醉酒，站不起來了。

sentences.en: The secret of their survival is that there is some food in the lifeboat.
sentences.cn: 他們能夠活下來的祕密就是救生船上有食物。

sentences.en: The lifeguard was reluctant to hobnob with me.
sentences.cn: 那個救生員不願意和我一起喝兩杯。

sentences.en: He has never eaten a hamburger in his lifetime.
sentences.cn: 他一生從未吃過漢堡。

sentences.en: You don't have to eat the ice-cream which looks like a lighthouse.
sentences.cn: 你不需要吃那個看起來像燈塔的冰淇淋。

sentences.en: If he drank up the water, all of us will be out on a limb.
sentences.cn: 如果他把水喝光了，我們都會有危險。

cn: 亞麻布，日用織品，亞麻織品

sentences.en: Before going out for a picnic, I sent my linen handkerchief to him as a souvenir.
sentences.cn: 去野餐之前，我把亞麻布手帕送給他留作紀念。

sentences.en: She put thick lipstick on her lips and it came off on the wine glass.
sentences.cn: 她嘴上塗了厚厚的口紅，而口紅印在酒杯上。

sentences.en: It is antisocial to throw away litter in public places.
sentences.cn: 在公共場所丟垃圾是沒公德心的。

cn: 精力充沛的，活潑的，栩栩如生的

sentences.en: Based on her lively description, we can get a general image of the beautiful city.
sentences.cn: 透過她那生動的描述，我們對美麗的城市有了大概的印象。

sentences.en: You know excessive wine can result in injury to the liver.
sentences.cn: 你知道的，飲酒過量會損害肝臟。

sentences.en: The good news that he began to take food has taken a load off her mind.
sentences.cn: 聽到他開始進食的好消息，她放心了。

sentences.en: The lobby was crowded with people who were having lunch.
