sentences.cn: 飛行員詢問了天氣情況，然後讓服務生給他一杯咖啡。

sentences.en: We have planted up to fifty pine trees; now we need to drink some water.
sentences.cn: 我們已經種了五十棵松樹，現在需要喝點水。

sentences.en: Let's go out for a pint tonight, shall we?
sentences.cn: 我們今晚出去喝啤酒，好嗎？

sentences.en: He worked all his life down the pit.
sentences.cn: 他一輩子在礦井下工作。

sentences.en: I pity you if you ate their food without permission.
sentences.cn: 如果你未經允許就吃他們的食物，我就鄙視你。

sentences.en: I peel away the plastic wrapping of the food and begin to eat.
sentences.cn: 我撕掉食品的塑膠包裝，開始吃起來。

sentences.en: Well, I have apples in plenty to eat.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我有大量的蘋果可以吃。

sentences.en: The statue seems like a plug and I don't want to buy it.
sentences.cn: 那個雕像看起來像插頭，我不想買它。

sentences.en: He took away the biggest apple and he always took all the plums.
sentences.cn: 他把最好的東西拿走了，他總是挑出最好的東西占為己有。

sentences.en: I was sympathetic with this plumber and invited him to have dinner with me.
sentences.cn: 我很同情那個水管工人，請他和我一起吃飯。

sentences.en: You must have been up the pole to eat so many candies at a time.
sentences.cn: 你一次吃這麼多糖果，一定是發瘋了。

sentences.en: The political leader will be memorized for his charity for good.
sentences.cn: 這個政治領袖的仁慈將會被永遠銘記。

sentences.en: These politicians are hostile to the idea of having western food.
sentences.cn: 這些政治家們反對吃西餐。

sentences.en: He talked about the politics in excitement over dinner.
sentences.cn: 飯間，他興奮地談起政治。

sentences.en: I took a straw poll among these people to find out how many people like to eat a durian.
sentences.cn: 我在這些人之間做一個調查，看看有多少人喜歡吃榴槤。

sentences.en: You are past hope to have a picnic near the polluted lake.
sentences.cn: 你們不可以在這被污染的湖泊附近野餐。

sentences.en: I have a pity on the pony and feed it with my water.
sentences.cn: 我很同情那匹小馬，並拿我的水餵牠。

sentences.en: That musician who is having dinner specializes in pop music.
sentences.cn: 那個正在吃飯的音樂家專攻流行音樂。

sentences.en: If this kind of food is not popular in the market, you'll have to start over again.
sentences.cn: 如果這種食品在市場上不受歡迎，你們就必須重頭再來。

sentences.en: I had never eaten an orange and gave it a whirl sitting beside the porcelain.
sentences.cn: 我從沒吃過橘子，就坐在瓷器旁試著吃了一個。

sentences.en: Give a portion of each day to read books.
sentences.cn: 每天抽一部分的時間來看書。

sentences.en: His portrait is painted on the other side of the food's packing bag.
sentences.cn: 食品包裝袋的另一面印著他的肖像。

sentences.en: What's the postage for sending the book to Taipei?
sentences.cn: 把這本書寄到台北需要多少錢？

sentences.en: The poster was nipped to pieces by the boys.
sentences.cn: 海報被男孩們撕成碎片。

sentences.en: The news that the banquet was postponed made us in a bad mood.
sentences.cn: 宴會延期的消息讓我們感到心情低落。

sentences.en: There were various indications that the weather led to the postponement of ceremony.
sentences.cn: 種種跡象表明，是天氣原因導致了典禮的延遲。

sentences.en: They were thrilled to find that the pottery could be used for cooking.
sentences.cn: 他們因發現這個陶器可以用來煮飯而欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: We have to pour a great amount of milk into the sink.
sentences.cn: 我們不得不把大量的牛奶倒進水槽裡。

sentences.en: She poured out the series of misfortunes that led her to poverty when we had dinner together.
sentences.cn: 我們一起吃飯時，她傾訴導致她貧困的一連串不幸。

sentences.en: She indulges herself in powdering her face during dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐期間，她沉溺於往臉上撲粉。

sentences.en: The scheme to have a picnic in the park seems on the surface to be quite practical.
sentences.cn: 去公園野餐的方案表面上看起來似乎很實際。

sentences.en: If you want to drink water, kneel in prayer now.
sentences.cn: 如果你想喝水，跪下祈禱吧。

sentences.en: Don't waste your precious time in drinking and you should persist in your dream.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的寶貴時間浪費在喝酒上，你應該堅持你的夢想。

sentences.en: They are working around the clock in preparation for the celebration.
sentences.cn: 他們正在為慶典的準備工作而晝夜不停地忙碌著。

sentences.en: It took great strength to resist the pressure of the authorities and get more food.
sentences.cn: 頂住當局的壓力以得到更多的食物費了很多力氣。

sentences.en: It is all the better if you just pretend not to have had breakfast.
sentences.cn: 如果你假裝沒有吃早餐會更好。

sentences.en: Be careful when you eat a fish to prevent injuries to your throat.
sentences.cn: 吃魚時要小心，以避免對你的喉嚨造成傷害。

sentences.en: Previous to that, I have already had a lot of food.
sentences.cn: 在那之前，我已經吃了很多食物。

sentences.en: The priest began to pursue his art world since his childhood.
sentences.cn: 那個牧師從兒時起就開始追求他的藝術世界。

sentences.en: What do you find the hardest thing in a primary school?
sentences.cn: 你覺得在小學裡最困難的事是什麼？

sentences.en: It is hardly probable that he has already met her.
sentences.cn: 他不可能已經見過她了。

sentences.en: Your coffee is in the process of being boiled.
sentences.cn: 你的咖啡還在煮。

sentences.en: Our new product stands out in the market, so I want to treat you to dinner tonight.
sentences.cn: 我們的新產品從市場中脫穎而出，所以今晚我想請你們吃飯。

sentences.en: Many customers profit from the food festival.
sentences.cn: 很多顧客都從這次的美食節中得益。

sentences.en: This dish lends itself to the cater program very well.
sentences.cn: 這道菜非常適合那個美食節目。

sentences.en: I was promoted to manager, so I wanted to invite you to dinner for celebration.
sentences.cn: 我被提拔為經理，想邀請你們一起吃飯慶祝。

sentences.en: He was busy talking with her and didn't take notice of the proof.
sentences.cn: 他正忙著和她說話，沒有注意到證物。

sentences.en: It is proper that you should ask your mother if she has had supper.
sentences.cn: 你當然應該問問你的母親，她是否已經吃晚餐了。

sentences.en: My prime concern is to protect my property.
sentences.cn: 我最關心的是保護自己的財產。

sentences.en: We are in two minds whether to accept his proposal to have a cup of coffee now.
sentences.cn: 他提議現在去喝一杯咖啡，我們對此猶豫不決。

sentences.en: You can pick these persimmons and eat them under the protection of me.
sentences.cn: 你可以在我的保護下摘這些柿子吃。

sentences.en: It is obligatory for you to wear protective clothing when you work there.
sentences.cn: 你們在那裡工作時，必須穿防護服裝。

sentences.en: Some people set on him when he drank in a pub.
sentences.cn: 他在一家小酒館喝酒時，一些人把他揍了一頓。

sentences.en: If you can fix the punch up, I will treat you a cup of coffee.
sentences.cn: 如果你能修理好那個打孔器，我會請你喝一杯咖啡。

sentences.en: He has never eaten western food, but it was pure guesswork on our part.
sentences.cn: 他從沒吃過西餐，不過這純屬我們的猜測。

sentences.en: We should stand off those people who just drink to pursue pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我們要遠離那些只會喝酒取樂的人。

sentences.en: I know your quarrel comes down to your eating habits.
sentences.cn: 我知道歸根究底你們是為了不同的飲食習慣而吵架。

sentences.en: I am queer for hamburgers these days.
sentences.cn: 我這幾天迷上吃漢堡。

sentences.en: I was impressed by the example he quoted at table.
sentences.cn: 我對他吃飯時舉的那個例子印象深刻。

sentences.en: Let me fill you in on what a victim of racial prejudice eats and drinks now.
sentences.cn: 讓我來告訴你，種族偏見的受害者現在吃什麼以及喝什麼。

sentences.en: Can I remind you to be careful with the radar when you go out?
sentences.cn: 我能提醒你，出去時要小心雷達嗎？

sentences.en: Don't lose your rag if he refuses to eat the buns you make.
sentences.cn: 如果他不吃你做的饅頭，你不要發脾氣。

sentences.en: There is no doubt about his eating up the raisins.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，是他吃完了葡萄乾。

sentences.en: He was demoted to the rank of ordinary soldier because of drinking.
sentences.cn: 因為喝酒，他被降為普通士兵。

sentences.en: The apple price is going down at the rate of one dollar per kilogram.
sentences.cn: 蘋果價格以每公斤一美元的速度往下降。

cn: 生的，未加工的，不熟練的

sentences.en: I have told you that raw meat must be kept separate from cooked one.
sentences.cn: 我告訴過你生肉和熟肉必須分開存放。

sentences.en: By this time, there's still a ray of hope for them to eat the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 到這時，他們仍有一線希望吃到烤肉。

sentences.en: Don't fool with that razor when you have dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時別玩弄那把剃刀。

sentences.en: What will the boy react to your suggestion that we travel together?
sentences.cn: 那個男孩對你提出的我們一起旅行的建議有什麼反應？

sentences.en: My first reaction is to have a mouthful of water right away.
sentences.cn: 我的第一反應就是趕緊喝一口水。

sentences.en: She is reasonable in her demands to eat in a famous restaurant.
sentences.cn: 她提出去有名餐廳用餐的要求是合情合理的。

sentences.en: I am in receipt of your parcel which is full of nuts.
sentences.cn: 我收到你那個裝滿堅果的包裹。

sentences.en: He put down the bread and took up the receiver.
sentences.cn: 他放下麵包，拿起電話聽筒。

sentences.en: There's no point in recognizing the stolen apple among these fruits.
sentences.cn: 從這堆水果中認出那顆被偷的蘋果毫無意義。

sentences.en: Would it be correct to use the recorder?
sentences.cn: 我們用這個記錄儀是正確的嗎？

sentences.en: The patient has an intense will to recover, if so he can drink with his friends.
sentences.cn: 那個病人熱切地希望恢復健康，這樣他就能和朋友一起喝酒了。

sentences.en: You should reduce your intake of salt bit by bit.
sentences.cn: 你應該逐漸減少攝取食鹽的量。

sentences.en: He was implicated in the regional conflict.
sentences.cn: 他捲入地區衝突中。

sentences.en: I came to regret not having breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我開始後悔沒有吃早餐。

sentences.en: I find it hard to relate this little animal with a delicious dish.
sentences.cn: 我很難把這種小動物與美味的菜餚聯繫起來。

sentences.en: Have a cup of coffee to relax yourself in due time.
sentences.cn: 在恰當的時機，喝杯咖啡來放鬆自己。

sentences.en: I will release you from these unsavory foods.
sentences.cn: 我不會讓你再吃這些難吃的食物了。

sentences.en: I heard from a reliable source that you had nothing to eat.
sentences.cn: 我從一位可靠人士那兒獲悉，你沒有東西可以吃。

sentences.en: It is a great relief to have something to eat after the famine.
sentences.cn: 饑荒後能有東西吃真是讓人鬆一口氣。

sentences.en: My religion was a crutch to me when I suffered from hunger.
sentences.cn: 挨餓的時候，宗教信仰可以在精神上支撐我。

sentences.en: He is in a trancelike state of religious ecstasy.
sentences.cn: 他的宗教狂熱已使他處於恍惚之中。

sentences.en: He can cook and doesn't rely upon others.
sentences.cn: 他自己會煮飯，不依賴他人。

sentences.en: You should eat less to cut back on expenditure and remain solvent.
sentences.cn: 你們應該少吃點以減少開支，以備急用。

sentences.en: I always remind myself that I should eat less.
sentences.cn: 我總是提醒自己要少吃。

sentences.en: The people who abide in the remote village still eat raw meat.
sentences.cn: 住在偏遠村子的那些人仍然吃生肉。

sentences.en: After lunch you can remove the cloth from the table.
sentences.cn: 午餐後，你可以把布從桌子上拿走。

sentences.en: The most important thing is to renew your health and stop drinking in future.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是要恢復健康，並且以後要戒酒。

sentences.en: The first thing to do is to rent an apartment.
sentences.cn: 要做的第一件事就是租一套公寓。

sentences.en: We can have a cup of tea when your bike is under repair.
sentences.cn: 你的腳踏車還在修理中，我們可以喝杯茶。

sentences.en: We undertake to replace the ring if she don't like it.
sentences.cn: 如果她不喜歡這個戒指，我們保證退換。

sentences.en: It's hard to find a replacement for this assistant.
sentences.cn: 很難找到另一個人來代替這名助理。

sentences.en: She was picked out from the staff to represent them to go to the banquet.
sentences.cn: 從全體員工中選出她來作為代表去參加宴會。

sentences.en: We need no more representatives other than you to go out for a picnic.
sentences.cn: 除了你之外，我們不需要別的代表外出野餐。

sentences.en: We offer foods and water to the poor foreigners on behalf of the republic.
sentences.cn: 我們代表共和國，給這些可憐的外國人提供食物和水。

sentences.en: It is absurd that they should deny my request to offer them food.
sentences.cn: 他們拒絕我向他們提供食物的要求，真是荒唐。

sentences.en: The boy who is standing there has a reserve of talent.
sentences.cn: 站在那裡的那個男孩有著極大的天賦。

sentences.en: He resisted eating bananas on that day.
sentences.cn: 那天他非常抗拒吃香蕉。

sentences.en: If you don't save money, you will be lost without resource.
sentences.cn: 如果你不節省，你就會徹底完蛋。

sentences.en: When I asked whether he had had breakfast, he was noticeably slow to respond.
sentences.cn: 當我問他是否已經吃過早餐時，他明顯反應遲緩。

sentences.en: Her silence was a response to your invitation for dinner.
sentences.cn: 她的沉默就是對你邀請她吃飯的答覆。

sentences.en: I have no responsibility to fulfill your needs of buying expensive clothing.
sentences.cn: 我沒有責任來滿足你買昂貴衣服的需要。

sentences.en: I was restricted to drink one bottle of soda drinks every day in case of gaining weight last month.
sentences.cn: 為了防止增胖，我上個月被限制每天只能喝一瓶蘇打飲料。

sentences.en: For pity's sake, don’t reveal your identity before he has finished his lunch.
sentences.cn: 求求你，在他吃完午餐前，不要透露你的身份。

sentences.en: The ribbon beside his bag is in similarity with mine.
sentences.cn: 他的袋子旁的那條絲帶跟我的相似。

sentences.en: He drank some water to rid himself of thirst.
sentences.cn: 他喝了點水來解渴。

sentences.en: Where he lived during those days was a complete riddle.
sentences.cn: 他那幾天住哪裡完全是一個謎。

sentences.en: The apples are ripe for eating.
sentences.cn: 這些蘋果成熟可以吃了。

sentences.en: He finished these tasks at the risk of his life.
sentences.cn: 他冒著生命危險完成這些任務。

sentences.en: He is roaring at his daughter because she refuses to drink milk.
sentences.cn: 女兒不喝牛奶，所以他正在對她咆哮。

sentences.en: Well, I think the roast hen is done to a turn.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我認為這雞烤得正到火候。

sentences.en: They formed a plot to rob the bakery.
sentences.cn: 他們制定搶劫那家麵包店的計畫。

sentences.en: The robber was captured alive when I was having breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我在吃早餐時，強盜被活捉了。

sentences.en: Doesn't the man who is drinking look like that robber who’s wanted for the jewel robbery?
sentences.cn: 那個喝酒的人像不像那個因搶劫珠寶而受到通緝的罪犯？

sentences.en: He was clad in a rich robe encrusted with jewels when we had dinner together.
sentences.cn: 我們一起吃飯時，他身穿一件鑲滿寶石的華貴禮袍。

sentences.en: The rocket will be lifted off after they come back.
sentences.cn: 他們回來後，火箭就會發射。

cn: 浪漫的，傳奇性的，不切實際的

sentences.en: The girl has a romantic nature.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩天生多情。

sentences.en: It is perfect rot to believe him.
sentences.cn: 簡直是荒唐才相信他。

sentences.en: The morals of the man are rotten to the core.
sentences.cn: 那個男人道德敗壞至極。

sentences.en: According to the rough estimate, he has eaten about one hundred grapes.
sentences.cn: 根據粗略的估計，他已經吃了近一百顆葡萄。

sentences.en: I got myself bogged down in routine work and even had no time to have dinner.
sentences.cn: 日常事務把我絆住了，我甚至沒有時間吃飯。

sentences.en: He reclined on a rug eating some potato chips.
sentences.cn: 他躺在地毯上吃薯片。

sentences.en: Rumor has it that he doesn't eat meat.
sentences.cn: 有謠言說他不吃肉。

sentences.en: These spoons will corrode with rust if you never use them to have soup.
sentences.cn: 如果你不用這些湯匙喝湯的話，它們就會生銹而損壞。

sentences.en: The girl in blue skirt is rusty in chess.
sentences.cn: 那個穿藍色裙子的女孩棋藝生疏。

sentences.en: Have your supper and hit the sack as early as possible.
sentences.cn: 吃完晚餐，早點上床睡覺。

sentences.en: For God's sake, he didn’t eat anything all day.
sentences.cn: 天啊，他一整天都沒吃東西。

sentences.en: All in all, the dish you have cooked is very satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 整體來說，你煮的這道菜非常令人滿意。

sentences.en: She put the saucer of milk on the table by the fire.
sentences.cn: 她把那碟牛奶放在爐邊的桌子上。

sentences.en: Considering that he has a big stomach, the sausage is for him.
sentences.cn: 考慮到他的胃口比較大，那根香腸歸他了。

sentences.en: It will be a saving to take a bus.
sentences.cn: 搭公車能省錢。

sentences.en: I think the value of the card my son made cannot be weighed in the scale of dollars and cents.
sentences.cn: 我兒子做的卡片的價值無法用金錢來衡量。

sentences.en: Food and water are scarce with us.
sentences.cn: 我們缺乏食物和水。

cn: 稻草人，可怕但無害的人

sentences.en: The little boys are frightened of the scarecrow.
sentences.cn: 那些小男孩很怕這個稻草人。

sentences.en: The red scarf of the girl who is sitting there made her stick out.
sentences.cn: 那個坐在那裡的女孩戴的那條紅圍巾使她顯得很突出。

sentences.en: How did she watch the scary movie and drink a cup of coffee calmly?
sentences.cn: 她是如何做到邊看恐怖電影邊鎮定地喝咖啡的？

sentences.en: Tell the children not to scatter about the banana peels.
sentences.cn: 告訴孩子們不要隨地亂丟香蕉皮。

sentences.en: If you hurry up, you will keep up with the new time schedule.
sentences.cn: 如果你快一點，就能趕上新的時間表。

sentences.en: Some scholars turned against his opinion that people should eat less salt.
sentences.cn: 一些學者轉而反對他提出的那個觀點，即人們應該少吃鹽。

sentences.en: I set the goal to win the first scholarship and treat my parents a big dinner.
sentences.cn: 我設定目標，要贏得一等獎學金並請父母大吃一頓。

sentences.en: She aspires to a scientific research.
sentences.cn: 她有志於一項科學研究。

sentences.en: Don't take using a scoop to have soup for granted.
sentences.cn: 不要認為喝湯用勺子是理所當然的。

sentences.en: He was mistaken for an enemy scout and nobody gave him foods to eat.
sentences.cn: 他被誤認為是敵人的偵察兵，沒有人給他食物吃。

sentences.en: I roared out her name to make her stop screaming and have something to eat.
sentences.cn: 我大吼她的名字，以讓她停止尖叫並吃點東西。

sentences.en: You should screw up your courage and finish the project.
sentences.cn: 你們應該打起精神完成這項企劃。

sentences.en: I got cream on my dress when I ate the cake and it wouldn't scrub off.
sentences.cn: 我吃蛋糕時洋裝沾上奶油，擦不掉了。

sentences.en: No one can tear off the seal and eat in the restaurant without permission.
sentences.cn: 未經允許，沒有人可以撕掉封條，並且在那家餐廳裡吃飯。

sentences.en: Whether he has had his breakfast is a question of secondary importance.
sentences.cn: 他是否吃早餐是個次要的問題。

sentences.en: He quickly ate up those snacks at the time when the security men entered.
sentences.cn: 保安人員進來的那一刻，他迅速吃掉那些點心。

sentences.en: I have never sought to hide my idea when I want to eat something.
sentences.cn: 想吃東西時，我從不企圖隱瞞自已的想法。

sentences.en: Seize this opportunity to do whatever you like and I will be on your side.
sentences.cn: 抓住這個機會盡情做你喜歡的任何事情吧，我會支持你的。

sentences.en: It is seldom that he eats so many candies.
sentences.cn: 他很少吃這麼多糖果。

cn: 可感覺的，明智的，合情理的

sentences.en: No one was sensible of his suffering from hunger.
sentences.cn: 沒人察覺到他正在挨餓。

sentences.en: If you don't eat the bread she bakes, it’s difficult to avoid stepping on her sensitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 如果你不吃她烤的麵包，就難免會傷害她脆弱的情感。

sentences.en: After a long separation, they had a dinner happily together.
sentences.cn: 闊別多年後，他們一起愉快地吃頓飯。

sentences.en: When he ate the boiled egg, his mother sewed some money into his coat.
sentences.cn: 他吃水煮雞蛋時，媽媽把一些錢縫進他的大衣裡。

sentences.en: I take it he likes to talk about sex during meeting.
sentences.cn: 我認為他喜歡在開會時談論性。

sentences.en: I heard that the man is a person of gross sexual appetites.
sentences.cn: 我聽說那個男人是個性慾旺盛的人。

sentences.en: He ended up having supper with a sexy girl.
sentences.cn: 他最後和一個性感的女孩共進晚餐。

sentences.en: They are having their lunch under the shade of the tree.
sentences.cn: 他們正在樹蔭下吃午餐。

sentences.en: You are casting your shadow over my dinner table and I can't see the dishes clearly.
sentences.cn: 你擋著我的餐桌了，我看不清楚。

sentences.en: He was strolling along the shady path and singing a love song.
sentences.cn: 他一邊在林蔭道上漫步，一邊唱著情歌。

sentences.en: We came to the shallow river to have a picnic ahead of schedule.
sentences.cn: 我們都提前來到了這條淺河邊野餐。

sentences.en: The dish you made put me to shame.
sentences.cn: 你做的菜使我感到羞愧。

sentences.en: It involves a lot of shampoo to wash your hair if they put the cream of the cake on it.
sentences.cn: 如果他們把蛋糕的奶油抹到你的頭髮上，你需要很多洗髮精來洗頭髮。

sentences.en: I have to shave tonight.
sentences.cn: 我今天晚上要刮鬍子。

sentences.en: The man who is eating a hamburger was born into a shepherd family.
sentences.cn: 那個正在吃漢堡的男人出生在一個牧師家庭。

sentences.en: My son's drinking milk dates back to a shiny day in 2012.
sentences.cn: 我兒子喝奶這件事要追溯到二○一二年一個晴朗的日子。

sentences.en: They are discussing how to shorten the arm of the manager.
sentences.cn: 他們討論怎麼限制經理的力量。

sentences.en: Please wait a minute, and I will finish my supper shortly.
sentences.cn: 請稍等，我很快就吃完晚餐了。

sentences.en: Look out for the shovel when you walk there.
sentences.cn: 在那裡走路時要當心鏟子。

sentences.en: Instead of shrinking back from the meat, the vegetarian ate a piece of beef.
sentences.cn: 那個素食者吃了一塊牛肉，而不是在肉食面前退縮。

sentences.en: By contrast, some people only sigh when they have nothing to eat.
sentences.cn: 相比之下，一些人沒有食物吃時就會唉聲歎氣。

sentences.en: There must be something wrong with the traffic signal.
sentences.cn: 交通號誌燈一定是出問題了。

sentences.en: A cake is significant for him on his 20th birthday.
sentences.cn: 二十歲生日這天，蛋糕對他來說很重要。

sentences.en: In my eyes, there's no similarity between this ring and that one.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，這個戒指和那個戒指沒有什麼相似之處。

sentences.en: He thinks it's a sin to eat meat.
sentences.cn: 他覺得吃肉是一種罪過。

sentences.en: The man who is drinking is sincere and easy to get along with.
sentences.cn: 那個正在喝酒的男人很誠懇，很好相處。

sentences.en: He took a sip of the tea and stood up.
sentences.cn: 他喝了一小口茶，站了起來。

sentences.en: They have nothing to eat in the present situation.
sentences.cn: 在當前形勢下，他們沒有東西吃。

sentences.en: I was in despair when I can't find my ice skates anywhere.
sentences.cn: 我到處都找不到溜冰鞋，真鬱悶。

sentences.en: It's rotten not to be able to ski and have a picnic today.
sentences.cn: 今天不能去滑雪，也不能去野餐，真是太糟了。

sentences.en: He deserves to be punished for skipping school to drink.
sentences.cn: 由於翹課去喝酒，他應該受到懲罰。

sentences.en: Currently, there are about one hundred people taking photos in front of the skyscraper.
sentences.cn: 目前，大約有一百人在摩天大樓前面照相。

sentences.en: Finally, the slaves who always starved rose against the slaveholders.
sentences.cn: 最終，饑餓的奴隸們起來反抗奴隸主。

sentences.en: I got the attention of the girl who was eating bread by plucking at my sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我拉袖子引起了那個正在吃麵包的女孩的注意。

sentences.en: I think it's best to slice into the cake from the middle.
sentences.cn: 我認為最好從中間把蛋糕切開。

cn: 容易滑的，油滑的，不可靠的

sentences.en: She is as slippery as an eel and leaves the unsavory biscuits to others.
sentences.cn: 她很滑頭，把難吃的餅乾留給其他人吃。

sentences.en: He slid down the slope and had lunch at the foot of the hill.
sentences.cn: 他滑下山坡，在山腳下吃午餐。

sentences.en: Now you can blend the flour with the water to make a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 現在你可以把麵粉和水調成均勻的麵糊。

sentences.en: Put down your bread and take a deep breath before snapping.
sentences.cn: 吃東西前，放下你的麵包，再深吸一口氣。

sentences.en: The solid ice-cream will melt into water if it is being heated.
sentences.cn: 如果加熱的話，固體的冰淇淋能夠融化成水。

sentences.en: He will hit a streak of good luck someday and have enough money to buy whatever he wants to eat.
sentences.cn: 有一天他會走好運，有足夠的錢買他想吃的一切東西。

sentences.en: I must plough on somehow even if I have no water to drink.
sentences.cn: 儘管沒有水喝，我仍然要堅持下去。

sentences.en: Just be on alert, for he will get you drunk sometime.
sentences.cn: 一定要注意，因為他改天會把你灌醉。

cn: 多少，稍微，有點 pron某物，一些

sentences.en: He seemed somewhat to be confused about what to eat tonight.
sentences.cn: 他似乎有點不明白今天晚上要吃什麼。

cn: a: 疼痛發炎的，痛心的

sentences.en: He is in sore grief now, so don't bother him by these apples.
sentences.cn: 他現在正在極度悲痛之中，所以不要去叫他吃蘋果了。

sentences.en: I'm in great sorrow now and I don’t want to have dinner.
sentences.cn: 我現在感到很傷心，不想吃飯。

sentences.en: Let's call a spade a spade.
sentences.cn: 我們還是有話直說吧。

sentences.en: I hear she is a dab hand at cooking spaghetti.
sentences.cn: 我聽說她是煮義大利麵條的高手。

sentences.en: What's the specific time of our meeting?
sentences.cn: 我們確切的開會時間是幾點鐘？

sentences.en: By putting some spice into the soup, you can make it delicious.
sentences.cn: 在湯裡放些香料，湯會很美味。

sentences.en: The milk spilled when I bent over to tie my shoes.
sentences.cn: 當我俯身綁鞋帶時，牛奶灑了。

sentences.en: They took a spin around the town in order to drink.
sentences.cn: 為了喝酒，他們坐車出去繞城轉一圈。

sentences.en: He spit out the milk.
sentences.cn: 他把牛奶吐了出來。

sentences.en: They cut off the power out of spite.
sentences.cn: 他們為了洩憤，將電源切斷。

sentences.en: Try not to let the soup splash on your hand.
sentences.cn: 小心別讓湯濺到手上。

sentences.en: Can't we give up eating sweets before dinner because it will spoil our appetite?
sentences.cn: 我們不能在飯前不吃糖嗎？因為會損害胃口。

sentences.en: Do you by any chance know he got a foot sprain in his ankle when he went to have a drink in the bar?
sentences.cn: 你知道他在去酒吧喝酒時，腳踝嚴重扭傷嗎？

sentences.en: He trimmed off the sideburns and then sprayed.
sentences.cn: 他把鬢角修完然並往頭髮上噴髮膠。

sentences.en: I saw he was sprinkling the flowers while eating when I came by his house.
sentences.cn: 當我從他家經過時，看到他正在邊吃東西邊澆花。

sentences.en: These agents are chasing after the spy in the airport.
sentences.cn: 這些探員正在機場裡追趕那名間諜。

sentences.en: Do you have any good ways to squeeze out more juice to drink?
sentences.cn: 你有什麼好辦法擠出更多的果汁來喝嗎？

sentences.en: The boy stabbed the other with a knife, then got away.
sentences.cn: 男孩用刀刺傷另一個，然後就逃跑了。

sentences.en: Finally the price of the oranges was stable.
sentences.cn: 最終橘子的價格穩定了。

sentences.en: It's sure that he will come over to the stadium.
sentences.cn: 他一定會來體育館。

sentences.en: Be sure that all the staff have enough water to drink.
sentences.cn: 一定要確保所有的員工都有足夠的水喝。

cn: 不新鮮的，陳腐的，過時的

sentences.en: Do you think it is necessary to throw the stale bread away?
sentences.cn: 你認為有必要把變質的麵包給扔掉嗎？

sentences.en: He just stared at me in astonishment when hearing that there wasn't food left for him.
sentences.cn: 得知沒有為他留食物後，他一直就那樣吃驚地盯著我。

sentences.en: People who starve to death these days are beyond number.
sentences.cn: 這些天因饑荒而死的人數不清。

sentences.en: As long as they are still sitting beside the statue, we can find them.
sentences.cn: 只要他們還坐在雕像旁，我們就能找到他們。

sentences.en: He gets a steady job to raise his family, that's to say, he can buy food and water for them.
sentences.cn: 他得到一份穩定的工作來養活家人，也就是說，可以為他們買食物和水。

sentences.en: The mountain is too steep, and the traveler who has no equipment is at stake now.
sentences.cn: 那座山太陡了，那個沒有帶裝備的遊客現在很危險。

sentences.en: His stepchild grew tired of the sameness of the dishes.
sentences.cn: 飯菜單調，他的繼子都吃膩了。

sentences.en: His stepfather caught a cold and didn't have supper tonight.
sentences.cn: 他的繼父感冒了，晚上沒有吃飯。

sentences.en: My stepmother hasn't come to herself after eating the poisonous bread.
sentences.cn: 吃了有毒的麵包後，我繼母一直沒從昏迷中清醒。

sentences.en: Wouldn't it be nice to play the stereo when we have supper?
sentences.cn: 我們吃飯的時候放音響不是更好嗎？

sentences.en: He doesn't like this sticky food. Take it away.
sentences.cn: 他不喜歡這種黏黏的食物，把它拿開。

sentences.en: He was bored stiff after having noodles for three days.
sentences.cn: 連續吃三天的麵條，他厭煩透了。

sentences.en: I'm sorry that my words stung you; I offer you a drink tonight.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉，我的話傷害到你，我晚上請你喝酒。

sentences.en: It doesn't take much to stir milk into a cake mixture.
sentences.cn: 不用費力就能把牛奶攪和到做蛋糕的混合料中。

sentences.en: There's no need to stitch a button on my jacket.
sentences.cn: 沒有必要在我的夾克上釘一顆扣子。

sentences.en: My stockings are crammed with chocolates now.
sentences.cn: 我的長襪裡面塞滿了巧克力。

sentences.en: He perches on a stool at the bar and has drunk four bottles of wine by far.
sentences.cn: 他坐在酒吧裡的一張椅子上，到現在已經喝了四瓶酒。

cn: 暴風雨的，激烈的，粗暴的

sentences.en: We have reason to believe that she feels frightened sleeping alone at home in the stormy night.
sentences.cn: 我們有理由相信她對一個人在暴風雨之夜在家睡覺感到很害怕。

sentences.en: The new strategy about driving will take into effect soon.
sentences.cn: 關於駕駛的新策略很快就要生效了。

sentences.en: The little girl doesn't have enough strength to life up the big box.
sentences.cn: 小女孩沒有足夠的力氣將大箱子搬起。

sentences.en: He tore the bread in strips to eat.
sentences.cn: 他把麵包撕成條來吃。

sentences.en: Am I allowed to have dinner in the restaurant the structure of which has changed?
sentences.cn: 我能不能在那家已改建的餐廳裡吃飯？

cn: 頑固的，倔強的，難對付的

sentences.en: She is as stubborn as a mule, and your trying her to write a book is in vain.
sentences.cn: 她是一個非常頑固的人，你勸說她寫書是沒有用的。

sentences.en: The studio executive gave way to the staff.
sentences.cn: 電影公司經理對員工作出讓步。

sentences.en: He found some green stuff on his way to the office.
sentences.cn: 在去辦公室的路上，他發現了一些蔬菜。

sentences.en: It took me a while to latch onto his style of eating steak.
sentences.cn: 我過了一會兒才明白他吃牛排的方式。

sentences.en: I personally think the reason why this mooncake is valuable is that it has rare substance in it.
sentences.cn: 我個人認為，這種月餅之所以貴是因為裡面有稀有材料。

sentences.en: I don't figure on so many people at the picnic in the suburb.
sentences.cn: 我們沒有料到會有這麼多人參加這次郊區的野餐。

sentences.en: Being thirsty, I had a suck of orange juice.
sentences.cn: 我口渴了，喝了一口柳橙汁。

sentences.en: I couldn't bear to see others suffer from hunger.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看見別人挨餓。

sentences.en: It is sufficient to show that he has eaten up the chocolates.
sentences.cn: 這足以證明他吃光了所有的巧克力。

sentences.en: I presume to suggest that you should take more fruits.
sentences.cn: 我冒昧地建議你多吃些水果。

sentences.en: She committed suicide because she got fired.
sentences.cn: 她因為被解雇而自殺。

sentences.en: I hope it is a suitable location for having a cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 我希望那是一個適合喝茶的地方。

sentences.en: Do your utmost to count the sum of the apples.
sentences.cn: 盡你全力去計算蘋果的顆數。

sentences.en: In summary, he doesn't like sweet food.
sentences.cn: 簡言之，他不喜歡吃甜食。

sentences.en: You will never make the summit if you don't have climbing ropes.
sentences.cn: 如果你沒有登山繩，你永遠到不了山頂。

sentences.en: The taste of this grapefruit is superior to that of the one on the table.
sentences.cn: 這個柚子的味道比桌子上那個好。

sentences.en: I suppose they would like to come with us.
sentences.cn: 我猜他們會想要和我們一起去。

sentences.en: Do you enjoy being surrounded by all kinds of clothing?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡被各種衣服包圍嗎？

sentences.en: According to the survey, only half of them have breakfast every day.
sentences.cn: 根據調查，他們中只有一半的人每天都吃早餐。

sentences.en: The man owed his survival to the bottle of water he brought.
sentences.cn: 他是因為帶了一瓶水才倖免於難的。

sentences.en: It is just conceivable that the survivor lived on the watermelon these days.
sentences.cn: 那個倖存者這幾天就靠這顆西瓜生活，這不是不可能。

sentences.en: I don't know why you suspect him of stealing the camera.
sentences.cn: 我不知道你為什麼懷疑是他偷了相機。

sentences.en: I have a suspicion that he is allergic to seafood.
sentences.cn: 我懷疑他對海鮮過敏。

sentences.en: I sweared by Almighty God that I didn't steal her money.
sentences.cn: 我對萬能的上帝發誓，我沒有偷她的錢。

sentences.en: Eating hot pot in such a hot day is a real sweat.
sentences.cn: 在這麼熱的天吃火鍋是一件艱難的事情。

sentences.en: Their discontent about the dormitory gradually swelled into dispute.
sentences.cn: 他們對宿舍的不滿漸漸演變成了爭端。

sentences.en: The man is swift to have his lunch.
sentences.cn: 那男人迅速地吃了午餐。

sentences.en: He suggested we switch the conversation to music.
sentences.cn: 他建議我們改為討論音樂這個話題。

sentences.en: With a sweep of my sword I cut through the rope tied on the bag.
sentences.cn: 我揮劍把袋子上的繩子砍斷。

sentences.en: We made an objection to the system that all the students should wear uniform.
sentences.cn: 我們反對讓所有學生都穿制服的制度。

sentences.en: To take two tablets of the medicine after dinner does good to your recovery.
sentences.cn: 飯後吃兩片藥有利於你的康復。

cn: v: 用大頭針釘住，附加

sentences.en: We can hammer a tack into the wall.
sentences.cn: 我們可以在牆上釘一根釘子。

sentences.en: We can find the price tag attached to the packing bag of the chocolates.
sentences.cn: 我們能在巧克力的包裝袋上找到價格標籤。

sentences.en: The tailor who is well-known for making good suits is having a cup of tea now.
sentences.cn: 那個以製作精美西服而聞名的裁縫現在正在喝一杯茶。

sentences.en: It is hardly conceivable that the tame girl made loud noise when she had soup.
sentences.cn: 簡直難以想像，那個溫順的女孩喝湯時會發出很大的聲音。

sentences.en: I didn't realize that a little tap would scare you so much.
sentences.cn: 我並沒有意識到，輕拍你一下會使你如此受驚。

sentences.en: The sales tax has always been a heavy burden on the boss of the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 對於這個書店的老闆來說，營業稅一直是個沉重的負擔。

sentences.en: It was mean of them to tease the little boy about his lunch.
sentences.cn: 他們嘲笑那個男孩吃的午餐，真是太壞了。

sentences.en: I entered a technical school to learn to design just two months ago.
sentences.cn: 就在兩個月前，我進入一所技術學校學習設計。

sentences.en: I think it's a good idea to apply modern techniques to make bread.
sentences.cn: 我認為將現代技術應用於做麵包，是個好主意。

sentences.en: Do you happen to know there is still much resistance to new technology on making ice-cream?
sentences.cn: 你知道嗎，關於製作冰淇淋的新技術仍然有很多的阻力？

sentences.en: You should find a proper way to control your temper when you see your son eating junk food.
sentences.cn: 當你看到兒子吃垃圾食品時，你應該找個合適的方法控制自己的脾氣。

sentences.en: He whispered to me that his temperature was up again after swimming.
sentences.cn: 他低聲對我說他游泳後，體溫又上升了。

sentences.en: Your temporary obesity was closely related to your eating habit.
sentences.cn: 你暫時的肥胖與飲食習慣有密切關係。

sentences.en: I tend to have bread and milk in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我習慣早上吃麵包喝牛奶。

sentences.en: At the tender age of four, I began to like playing the guitar.
sentences.cn: 早在四歲時，我就開始喜歡彈吉他。

sentences.en: Most animals will defend their territory against others to make sure they have enough to eat.
sentences.cn: 為了確保有足夠的食物吃，大多數動物會抵制其他動物進入自己的領域。

sentences.en: The story he told was edited from the original text.
sentences.cn: 他講的故事是根據原文改編的。

sentences.en: He is thankful to know that they have offered many foods to him.
sentences.cn: 得知他們給他很多食物，他十分感激。

sentences.en: His plan for a picnic seems fine in theory, but I don't know whether it will work out.
sentences.cn: 他打算去野餐的計畫從理論上來說是很好的，但我不知道能否實施。

sentences.en: I have a thirst for a hamburger now.
sentences.cn: 我現在渴望吃漢堡。

sentences.en: He lost the thread of what he ate this morning.
sentences.cn: 他記不清自己早上吃什麼了。

sentences.en: These people are under the threat of having nothing to wear.
sentences.cn: 這些人面臨著沒有衣服穿的威脅。

sentences.en: Mother always threatens them with not letting them have supper.
sentences.cn: 媽媽總是用不准吃晚餐來威脅他們。

sentences.en: I am tickled pink that my son has eaten up the bread I made.
sentences.cn: 兒子吃完我做的麵包，我很高興。

sentences.en: I wonder when the tide can turn in our favor.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，形勢什麼時候會對我們有利。

sentences.en: I have a good habit to keep my room tidy.
sentences.cn: 我有保持房間整齊的好習慣。

sentences.en: I do my best to open the bottle of drink, but the cork is too tight.
sentences.cn: 我盡全力去打開這瓶飲料，但是蓋子太緊。

sentences.en: I hear a new rule will come into effect to tighten the control on sales of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 我聽說一項新的規定即將實施，以便加強對酒的銷售控制。

sentences.en: Did you know that your father sold the timber to buy you a car?
sentences.cn: 你知道嗎，你父親為了買車子給你，把木材賣了？

sentences.en: What he said about his work was a tissue of lies.
sentences.cn: 他所說的關於他工作的那些話是一派胡言。

sentences.en: He is enslaved to wine and tobacco, but she loves him all the same.
sentences.cn: 儘管他又酗酒又抽菸，她還是一樣愛他。

sentences.en: Even though he has tons of money, he doesn't often buy new clothing.
sentences.cn: 儘管他有很多錢，但是他也不常買新衣服。

sentences.en: Have you considered cooking the tortoise he brought back from the beach?
sentences.cn: 你有沒有考慮過用他從沙灘撿回來的烏龜做菜？

sentences.en: He angrily tossed a piece of bread to his sister while eating.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時，他生氣地將一塊麵包扔向妹妹。

sentences.en: I can almost say snacks and tourism are the lifeblood of our city.
sentences.cn: 我幾乎可以說小吃和旅遊業是我們這個城市的命脈。

sentences.en: Please put him through to the tourist agency.
sentences.cn: 請幫他接旅行社。

sentences.en: He helped me to tow the box full of books to my house.
sentences.cn: 他幫我把裝滿書的箱子拖到我家。

sentences.en: His hunger should be traced back to his not having breakfast this morning.
sentences.cn: 他之所以餓是因為早上沒吃早餐。

sentences.en: The trader took a mouthful of the cake and then spat it out.
sentences.cn: 那個商人吃了一口蛋糕，又吐了出來。

sentences.en: The boy left a trail of slime along the floor after eating the honey.
sentences.cn: 小男孩吃完蜂蜜，在地板上留下一道黏液。

sentences.en: He has a deep fascination with all forms of transport.
sentences.cn: 他對所有的運輸工具都很著迷。

sentences.en: She thinks this kind of food is trash.
sentences.cn: 她覺得這種是垃圾食品。

sentences.en: The traveler complained to us at the dishes in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 那個遊客向我們抱怨餐廳的菜不好吃。

sentences.en: How does his advice that we eat a tray of cake sound?
sentences.cn: 他建議我們吃一盤蛋糕，你覺得怎麼樣？

sentences.en: I was trembling with excitement at the good news that I can have supper in that restaurant.
sentences.cn: 聽到我可以去那間餐廳吃飯的好消息，我興奮地顫抖起來。

sentences.en: How long will it take you to make clear of the trend of gas prices?
sentences.cn: 你搞清楚瓦斯價格的趨勢需要多久？

sentences.en: It is supposed that the tribe still eats raw meat now.
sentences.cn: 據推測，這個部落現在還吃生肉。

sentences.en: I have no idea what could be done when facing with the tricky situation that my son doesn't sleep.
sentences.cn: 我兒子不睡覺，面臨著這樣棘手的形勢，我不知道該做些什麼。

sentences.en: There are a troop of people who are not great meat eaters in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 餐廳裡有一群肉吃得不多的人。

sentences.en: In the tropical forest, they drink coconut milk after they cut down the trees.
sentences.cn: 在熱帶雨林裡，他們砍倒樹後，就喝椰子汁。

sentences.en: Be careful of my trunk; it's full of painting.
sentences.cn: 小心我的行李箱，裡面全是畫。

sentences.en: To be quite truthful with you, she is not interested in fiction movie at all.
sentences.cn: 跟你說實話，她對科幻片一點都不感興趣。

sentences.en: I was forced to buy a tub of ice cream for her.
sentences.cn: 我不得不買一盒冰淇淋給她。

sentences.en: He gave a tug at my hair when I was playing ball.
sentences.cn: 我玩球時他拉了一下我的頭髮。

sentences.en: I'm determined to plant a tulip bulb in the garden.
sentences.cn: 我決定在花園裡種一株鬱金香球根。

sentences.en: He took a tumble down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他摔下樓梯。

sentences.en: My mother always calls the tune about what to eat.
sentences.cn: 關於吃什麼，總是我媽媽說了算。

sentences.en: He was taken in the charge of his tutor, even his meals were made by the tutor.
sentences.cn: 這男孩受他的家庭教師管理，甚至他的飯都是家庭教師煮的。

sentences.en: She still didn't twig why they ate up her apples.
sentences.cn: 她仍然不明白，為什麼他們吃光了她的蘋果。

sentences.en: I took Lily for her twin sister when we had dinner together.
sentences.cn: 一起吃飯時，我把莉莉當成了她的孿生妹妹。

sentences.en: The plastic box which contains chocolates tends to twist under pressure.
sentences.cn: 那個裝巧克力的塑膠盒受到壓力容易變形。

sentences.en: The typewriter is always at your service after you have lunch.
sentences.cn: 你吃完午餐後，打字機隨時都為你所用。

sentences.en: I hear this snack is typical of the region.
sentences.cn: 我聽說這種小吃是本地區的特產。

sentences.en: The trade union is concerned with what the workers eat and drink.
sentences.cn: 工會關注工人們每天吃什麼，喝什麼。

sentences.en: We must unite the students in asking the principal to improve the quality of the class.
sentences.cn: 我們必須使學生們團結，要求校長改善課堂品質。

sentences.en: You must strengthen your unity facing with the problem when you have nothing to eat.
sentences.cn: 在面對沒有東西可以吃的問題時，你們必須加強團結。

sentences.en: Once upon a time, people knew nothing about the universe.
sentences.cn: 很久以前，人們對宇宙一無所知。

sentences.en: I won't speak to her unless she says sorry to me.
sentences.cn: 她不向我道歉，我才不會跟她說話呢。

sentences.en: It was apparent that he was upset.
sentences.cn: 很明顯他心緒煩亂。

sentences.en: She stared at her lunch with a vacant expression.
sentences.cn: 她茫然地凝視著自己的午餐。

sentences.en: I have to tell you that this necklace is more valuable than that one.
sentences.cn: 我不得不告訴你，這條項鍊比那條還貴。

cn: 有蓋小貨車，麵包車，前驅

sentences.en: The foodie is in the van of catering.
sentences.cn: 美食家站在餐飲業的前列。

sentences.en: All my troubles will vanish away if my mother buys me many computer games.
sentences.cn: 如果媽媽買很多電腦遊戲給我，我就無憂無慮了。

sentences.en: I'm certain there are a variety of dishes on the table.
sentences.cn: 我確定桌子上有很多種菜。

sentences.en: The small town is noted for its various snacks.
sentences.cn: 這個小鎮因為各式各樣的小吃而出名。

sentences.en: Don't vary from the law of nature and eat seasonal fruits.
sentences.cn: 不要違反自然規律，要吃時令水果。

sentences.en: Dear! You broke my favorite vase.
sentences.cn: 天啊，你竟然打破我最喜愛的花瓶。

sentences.en: There—the two vehicles collided with each other because both of the drivers were eating while driving.
sentences.cn: 瞧，兩輛車相撞了，因為兩個司機都是邊吃東西邊開車。

sentences.en: I will give a lecture on American verse tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天要做一個關於美國詩歌的講座。

sentences.en: Oh, no! I forgot my vest in the café where we just had coffee.
sentences.cn: 喔，不會吧！我把背心忘在剛才我們喝咖啡的那個咖啡廳了。

sentences.en: The vice-president had a quick swig of water before speaking.
sentences.cn: 講話前，副總統匆忙喝了一大口水。

sentences.en: I soon fell victim to hamburgers.
sentences.cn: 我很快就被漢堡迷住了。

sentences.en: He finished his supper and slammed the door with violence.
sentences.cn: 他吃完晚餐，砰地一聲猛地把門關上了。

sentences.en: With a violent movement, she shook the bread off her hand.
sentences.cn: 她一用力，甩掉了手上的麵包。

sentences.en: Good heavens! My boyfriend sent me a bunch of violet!
sentences.cn: 天啊！男朋友竟然送給我一束紫羅蘭！

sentences.en: With the aid of the microscope, all viruses on the food are clearly visible.
sentences.cn: 在顯微鏡的幫助下，食物上的所有細菌都清晰可見。

sentences.en: The beautiful waterfall came within our range of vision when we were eating and walking.
sentences.cn: 我們邊走邊吃時，美麗的瀑布進入我們的視野之中。

sentences.en: Wow! Apples are rich in vitamin E.
sentences.cn: 哇！蘋果富含維生素 E。

sentences.en: I have a vivid recollection of the shape of the statue.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地記得那雕像的形狀。

sentences.en: What's the volume of the fridge which is full of food?
sentences.cn: 這個裝滿食物的冰箱體積有多少？

sentences.en: It should be noted that he wagged his head when he saw the super star.
sentences.cn: 要注意，他看到這名超級巨星時搖了搖頭。

sentences.en: I was discontented with my wages because I can't buy enough food with it.
sentences.cn: 我對自己的薪資很不滿意，因為它還不夠我吃飯呢。

sentences.en: How are you going to have your lunch in the small wagon?
sentences.cn: 你打算如何在這麼小的馬車裡吃午餐呢？

sentences.en: It looked as if he was wakened up, but he didn't sleep at all.
sentences.cn: 好像他是被叫醒似的，但是他根本就沒睡。

sentences.en: Do constrain your mind not to wander from the dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時克制著不讓自己分心。

sentences.en: Of one accord, they came out to enjoy the warmth of the sun after lunch.
sentences.cn: 午餐後，他們不約而同去外面曬太陽。

sentences.en: My sister warned me against the hot soup.
sentences.cn: 姊姊告誡我要小心熱湯。

sentences.en: How about lighting up a wax candle when we have supper?
sentences.cn: 吃晚餐時點支蠟燭怎麼樣？

sentences.en: What would you say of weakening the tea by adding water?
sentences.cn: 加水把茶弄得淡一些，你覺得怎麼樣？

sentences.en: There is an old saying goes well “health is better than wealth,” so don't hesitate to spend your money on eating something good.
sentences.cn: 有句諺語說得好，「健康勝於財富」所以別猶豫了，花錢吃點好吃的吧。

sentences.en: The wealthy man cheated her into eating the steak.
sentences.cn: 那個富人騙她吃牛排。

sentences.en: Would you be so kind as to weave a garland of flowers?
sentences.cn: 能請你編一個花環嗎？

sentences.en: I was enmeshed in the web of the debt because of drinking and gambling.
sentences.cn: 因為喝酒和賭博，我負債累累。

sentences.en: You'll never guess the café we used to go to is choked with weeds now.
sentences.cn: 你永遠想不到，我們以前經常去的咖啡廳現在雜草叢生。

sentences.en: All the children are weeping for starvation.
sentences.cn: 因為肚子餓，所有的孩子都在哭。

sentences.en: You will be able to know what the wheat is if you have had cereal.
sentences.cn: 如果你喝過麥片粥，就會知道什麼是小麥了。

sentences.en: It's cruel to whip the child just because he was unwilling to wash his hands.
sentences.cn: 僅僅因為孩子不願洗手就鞭打他，這太殘忍了。

sentences.en: Some people didn't hear the whistle for lunch, so some of them missed it.
sentences.cn: 有些人沒聽到午餐的哨聲，所以他們之中的一些人沒吃到飯。

sentences.en: They supposed that the man was wicked, so they refused to have dinner with him.
sentences.cn: 他們認為那個人很壞，所以拒絕和他一起吃飯。

sentences.en: What seems to be the trouble is the table beside which they are having dinner is made of willow.
sentences.cn: 問題好像在於，他們吃飯用的桌子是用柳木做的。

sentences.en: The girl showed much interest on the doll and winked at his mother to buy it.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩對洋娃娃表現出強烈的興趣，向媽媽使眼色要買。

sentences.en: Wipe out the bowl before you put soup into it.
sentences.cn: 盛湯前先把碗擦洗乾淨。

sentences.en: The received wisdom is that he doesn't like playing cards.
sentences.cn: 大家一致認為他不喜歡玩牌。

sentences.en: He wrapped himself up in a coat when he went out for shopping.
sentences.cn: 他外出購物時穿了一件外套。

sentences.en: He took me by my left wrist when we had coffee together.
sentences.cn: 我們一起喝咖啡時，他抓住我的左手腕。

sentences.en: What's the point of examining his stomach with the x-ray?
sentences.cn: 給他的胃照 X光有什麼意義？

sentences.en: He gave a yawn after lunch.
sentences.cn: 午餐後他打了個哈欠。

sentences.en: He yelled at his mother because she didn't buy the shoes he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他因為媽媽沒買他要的鞋子而對她大吼大叫。

sentences.en: Come on! He doesn't like the yolks.
sentences.cn: 拜託，他不喜歡吃蛋黃的。

sentences.en: The banquet starts, but I couldn't find the proper way to sew in the zipper.
sentences.cn: 宴會已經開始了，可我沒辦法正確地縫上拉鍊。

sentences.en: They were required to meet the boss in the economic development zone.
sentences.cn: 他們被要求去經濟開發區和老闆見面。

sentences.en: It's not good for him to abandon himself to the virtual reality of the network.
sentences.cn: 他沉溺於網路的虛擬實境而不能自拔，真不好。

sentences.en: What I'm getting at is you’ll suffer from pain in your abdomen again if you eat ice-cream.
sentences.cn: 我的意思是，你吃了冰淇淋，等下又會肚子痛了。

sentences.en: I mean what he said is absolute libel.
sentences.cn: 我意思是，他所說的完全是誹謗。

sentences.en: I have been tired of wearing silk socks, because they don't absorb sweat.
sentences.cn: 我厭倦穿絲襪，因為它們不吸汗。

sentences.en: My point of view is that his abstract theories are useless.
sentences.cn: 我的觀點是，他的抽象理論沒有什麼用。

sentences.en: I thought academic success was not always an open sesame to a good job.
sentences.cn: 我認為，在校成績好並非總是獲得好工作的敲門磚。

sentences.en: I don't like the boy because he speaks in his broad accent.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡那個男孩，是因為他說話口音很重。

sentences.en: Your words and opinion will receive wide acceptance.
sentences.cn: 你的話和觀點將會得到廣泛的認可。

sentences.en: Don't worry; I have access to people who can help me.
sentences.cn: 別擔心，我有辦法接近能幫助我的人。

sentences.en: No matter how suspicious you are, my breaking your cup was really accidental.
sentences.cn: 不管你怎麼懷疑，我打破你的杯子真的是意外。

sentences.en: I believe he can conquer anything if she accompanies him.
sentences.cn: 我相信，有她的陪伴，他可以征服一切。

sentences.en: He is afraid that he can't accomplish his ideal in his life.
sentences.cn: 他怕他這一生都無法實現他的夢想了。

sentences.en: His laziness stands in the way of accomplishment of his plan.
sentences.cn: 懶惰是他實現自己計畫的障礙。

sentences.en: She must have been defrauded of her money by the dishonest accountant.
sentences.cn: 她的錢肯定是被那個奸詐的會計騙走了。

sentences.en: No one can deny that it's hard to state the number of casualties with accuracy.
sentences.cn: 沒人能夠否認，準確地說出傷亡人數是困難的。

sentences.en: He was accused of stealing; it was really astonishing.
sentences.cn: 他被指控犯有盜竊罪，真讓人驚訝。

sentences.en: Learning from the last failure, I will be careful with acid this time.
sentences.cn: 從上次的失敗中吸取教訓，我這次要小心酸。

sentences.en: I am acquainted with the Chinese Literature.
sentences.cn: 我對中國文學很瞭解。

sentences.en: I'm not good at French, just having some acquaintance with it.
sentences.cn: 我不擅長法語，只是懂一點罷了。

sentences.en: I'm very lucky, for I acquired the famous singer’s autography just now.
sentences.cn: 我剛得到那個知名歌手的親筆簽名，真是太幸運了。

sentences.en: Nothing is more important than to have several acres of farmland for me.
sentences.cn: 對於我來說，沒有什麼比擁有幾畝田更重要的事了。

sentences.en: I will try my best to adapt myself to the new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 我要盡力使自己適應新環境。

cn: 適當的，能勝任的，足夠的

sentences.en: I wonder if she is adequate to the job.
sentences.cn: 我不知道她是否能勝任這項工作。

sentences.en: I hate you for applying that adjective to me.
sentences.cn: 我討厭你用那個字眼來形容我。

sentences.en: Now that you ask for my opinion, I tell you that you should adjust the focus of your camera.
sentences.cn: 既然你徵求我的意見，那我就告訴你，你應該調節照相機的焦距。

sentences.en: I have to make adjustments to my thinking in order that I can survive in office.
sentences.cn: 為了保住這份工作，我必須轉變觀念。

sentences.en: An admirable performance means a great deal to me.
sentences.cn: 一場優美的表演對於我來說意義重大。

sentences.en: I was struck with admiration when I saw his works.
sentences.cn: 看到他的作品，我驚歎不已。

sentences.en: I think there is an increase in school admission of children.
sentences.cn: 我認為，入學兒童的數量有所增加。

cn: 代理商，代理處，政府機構

sentences.en: Considering that the service of this travel agency is good, we choose it.
sentences.cn: 考慮到這家旅行社的服務較好，我們就選擇它。

sentences.en: You can ask an agent to keep the local people under control.
sentences.cn: 你可以讓一個探員去控制當地的民眾。

cn: 侵略的，好鬥的，有進取心的

sentences.en: I am angry that he puts forward some aggressive policies.
sentences.cn: 我對他提出一些侵略性的政策感到很生氣。

sentences.en: I am agreeable to watch a film with him tonight.
sentences.cn: 我欣然同意和他今晚一起去看電影。

sentences.en: No matter what you say, I still think AIDS isn't a serious infectious disease.
sentences.cn: 不管你們說什麼，我都認為愛滋病不是一種嚴重的傳染病。

sentences.en: On no account can we drink too much alcohol.
sentences.cn: 我們絕對不能飲酒過量。

sentences.en: We should be on the alert for the cunning colleagues.
sentences.cn: 我們應該提防著狡猾的同事們。

sentences.en: I am in favor of giving the allowance to the old couple.
sentences.cn: 我贊成把津貼給這對老夫婦。

sentences.en: I think he will acknowledge that he stole the aluminum can on the table.
sentences.cn: 我想，他會公開承認他偷了桌上的那個鋁罐。

sentences.en: He talks as if he doesn't plan to come back before 11 o’clock a.m.
sentences.cn: 他說話的口氣好像是不打算在上午十一點之前回來。

sentences.en: You have no choice but to let an amateur actor play the role.
sentences.cn: 你沒有別的選擇，只能讓一個業餘演員來扮演這個角色。

sentences.en: I tell you I am ambitious to win the first place.
sentences.cn: 告訴你，我下決心要贏得第一名。

sentences.en: Sorry to bother you, but I hope you can find him amid these people.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，打擾你了，但我希望你能在這些人中找到他。

sentences.en: Tell me more about the girl; she always amuses me.
sentences.cn: 再談談那個女孩吧，她總是逗我開心。

sentences.en: He will take me to the amusement park and that's what I mean to do.
sentences.cn: 他要帶我去遊樂園玩，那正是我想要做的。

sentences.en: Surfing the internet is the best way to get the analysis of the novel.
sentences.cn: 想要得到這本小說的分析，最好的辦法是上網。

sentences.en: We should analyze the situation and find the way to solve the problem now.
sentences.cn: 現在我們應該分析形勢，找出解決這個問題的方法。

sentences.en: I learned that my ancestors came from Sichuan.
sentences.cn: 我得知自己的祖先是來自四川。

sentences.en: That reminds me, I want to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary in London.
sentences.cn: 那提醒我，我想去倫敦慶祝結婚二十周年。

sentences.en: It annoyed me that he didn't come to my house yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上他沒有來我家，這讓我很氣惱。

sentences.en: The problem is the annual governmental conference won't be held in the city hall.
sentences.cn: 問題是一年一度的政府會議，不在市政大廳舉行。

sentences.en: Her standing John up caused me great anxiety.
sentences.cn: 她讓約翰空等一場，我感到很焦慮。

sentences.en: I always feel anxious when I give a speech in public.
sentences.cn: 公開演講時，我總是很焦慮。

sentences.en: I hope he will apologize to me on receiving my letter of complaint.
sentences.cn: 我希望，一收到我的投訴信，他就來向我道歉。

sentences.en: You should make an apology to all the guests now.
sentences.cn: 你現在應該向所有的客人道歉。

sentences.en: I plan to sell a variety of drugs as well as medicine appliances.
sentences.cn: 我打算銷售各種各樣的藥品和醫療器械。

sentences.en: There's no way John was the eighth applicant for the job.
sentences.cn: 約翰絕對不可能是第八個申請這項工作的人。

sentences.en: I consider that they are writing an application for admission.
sentences.cn: 我認為他們正在寫入學申請。

sentences.en: The question is that they may be reluctant to appoint a teacher to the vacant post.
sentences.cn: 問題是，他們可能不願委派一名老師來填補那個空缺。

sentences.en: I am glad to hear that he got a good appointment yesterday.
sentences.cn: 聽說他昨天找到了一個好工作，我為他高興。

sentences.en: I think he shows no appreciation of classic music.
sentences.cn: 我認為，他不會欣賞古典音樂。

sentences.en: The example you cited wasn't appropriate for him.
sentences.cn: 你舉的例子不適合他。

sentences.en: The news that he gave his approval to that project excited me.
sentences.cn: 他批准那項工程，這消息讓我很興奮。

sentences.en: The way I see it, she gave us an arch smile in order to relax us.
sentences.cn: 我的看法是，她朝我們淘氣地微笑是為了讓我們放鬆。

sentences.en: I believe the quarrel arose from a book.
sentences.cn: 我相信，這場爭吵是由一本書引起的。

sentences.en: It's his holding me by the arm that irritated me.
sentences.cn: 他抓住我的手臂激怒了我。

sentences.en: Computer is the only thing that can arouse my interest.
sentences.cn: 只有電腦能引起我的興趣。

sentences.en: I don't want to make an outline of the article at night.
sentences.cn: 我不想在晚上寫文章的大綱。

sentences.en: I find his eyebrows are artificial in a glance.
sentences.cn: 我一眼就看出，他的眉毛是假的。

sentences.en: We hold the opinion that the Louvre is one of the world's famous artistic centers.
sentences.cn: 我們認為，羅浮宮是世界有名的藝術中心之一。

sentences.en: I was ashamed to say I didn't go to his party.
sentences.cn: 我不好意思說我沒有參加他的派對。

sentences.en: He loves me; that is because my aspect is fair and arresting.
sentences.cn: 他愛我，那是因為我的漂亮，惹人注目。

sentences.en: Supposing she has a headache, give her two aspirins.
sentences.cn: 如果她頭疼的話，就讓她吃兩片阿斯匹靈。

sentences.en: I think you don't need to assemble on the playground in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我認為，你們早上不需要在操場上集合。

sentences.en: I believe the assembly will come to a close this Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我相信，大會將於本周六閉幕。

sentences.en: Provided the teacher doesn't assign homework for us, I will watch TV.
sentences.cn: 如果老師不指派作業給我們，我就看電視。

sentences.en: We can't emphasize the importance of the new assignment too much.
sentences.cn: 我們再強調新任務的重要性也不為過。

sentences.en: The reason why I hate her is that she refused to give me assistance.
sentences.cn: 我討厭她的原因是她拒絕幫助我。

sentences.en: Sorry, I always associate a highway with an accident.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我總是把高速公路和車禍聯想在一起。

sentences.en: We must do something to join the association.
sentences.cn: 我們必須採取行動以加入這個社團。

sentences.en: I assume he has arrived in London.
sentences.cn: 我想他已經到倫敦了。

sentences.en: I give you an assurance that I will buy you a present when I come back.
sentences.cn: 我向你保證，回來時一定買禮物給你。

sentences.en: I assure you that I would never betray you.
sentences.cn: 我向你保證，永遠不背叛你。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I dislike the athletic star.
sentences.cn: 說實話，我不喜歡那個運動明星。

cn: 自動存提款機（= automatic teller machine）

sentences.en: To put it bluntly, I will never use an ATM.
sentences.cn: 直截了當地說，我永遠都不會去用自動取款機。

sentences.en: I think the small town is still bathed in a festive atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這個小鎮還沉浸在節日的氣氛中。

sentences.en: I don't think a molecule is made up of atoms.
sentences.cn: 我認為，分子不是由原子組成的。

sentences.en: It is for the same reason that I don't understand the meaning of the word atomic.
sentences.cn: 我不明白單字 atomic的意思，也是出自同樣的原因。

sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned you needn’t attach the label to the book.
sentences.cn: 就我看來，你不需要把標籤貼到書上。

sentences.en: I think the little girl has a great attachment to her mother.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，那個小女孩十分依戀媽媽。

sentences.en: I felt an immediate attraction for him at that moment.
sentences.cn: 在那一刻，我對他頓生愛慕。

sentences.en: Be careful not to step on my audio components.
sentences.cn: 小心，別踩到我的音響設備。

sentences.en: I think we have no authority for the act.
sentences.cn: 我覺得我們無權這樣做。

sentences.en: I will spare no effort to write my autobiography.
sentences.cn: 我將不遺餘力地寫自傳。

sentences.en: There's no point in awaiting his letter for me.
sentences.cn: 對於我來說，等他的來信毫無意義。

sentences.en: I was awkward for I forgot about his birthday.
sentences.cn: 我忘記他的生日，真是尷尬。

sentences.en: Both the box and the backpack are what I want.
sentences.cn: 箱子和背包都是我想要的。

sentences.en: I won't buy him a comb because he is as bald as a coot.
sentences.cn: 我不會買梳子給他，因為他頭上一根頭髮也沒有。

sentences.en: Not only he but also I want to enjoy the ballet.
sentences.cn: 他和我都想看芭蕾舞劇。

sentences.en: We must take action lest our company should go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 為了不使公司破產，我們必須採取措施。

sentences.en: I scorn to bargain with the shopkeeper.
sentences.cn: 我不屑於與店主討價還價。

sentences.en: I think the chicken will not run away once I set a barrier.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，把柵欄建好之後，小雞就不會亂跑了。

sentences.en: To be frank, I don't like the color of the basin.
sentences.cn: 老實說，我不喜歡那個盆子的顏色。

sentences.en: I was bored to death because a battery of questions troubled me.
sentences.cn: 一連串的問題困擾著我，我被煩死了。

sentences.en: In my view, both those legs and the beak are made of paper.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，那些腳和雞喙都是用紙做出來的。

sentences.en: I think he is handsome when he beams at us with satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，他滿意地對著我們微笑時很帥了。

sentences.en: As far as I could see, her behavior was unjustifiable yesterday.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，她昨天的行為是不合情理的。

sentences.en: For my part, the biography isn't interesting at all.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，那本傳記一點也不有趣。

sentences.en: I will choose either biology or physics as my major.
sentences.cn: 我將選擇主修生物學或物理。

sentences.en: In my heart, she is a good blade.
sentences.cn: 在我心中，她劍術高明。

sentences.en: For your information, your coat doesn't blend with your skin color.
sentences.cn: 告訴你，你的外套和膚色很不搭。

sentences.en: What a blessing I caught the last bus!
sentences.cn: 我趕上了末班車，真是幸運！

sentences.en: I hope you can finish it in a blink of an eye.
sentences.cn: 我希望，你能在一眨眼的工夫完成它。

sentences.en: I absolutely agree with his words that the flowers are in full bloom in June.
sentences.cn: 他說這花在六月最盛開，我完全同意。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I won’t be able to wait till the trees are in blossom.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕不能夠等到這些樹開花。

sentences.en: I'm not certain whether I will blush if I am scolded.
sentences.cn: 我不確定受到責備時會不會臉紅。

sentences.en: I don't like boasting about my son’s success at school.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡誇耀兒子在學校學習成績良好。

sentences.en: I think about one third of us share a bond with animals every day.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，我們之中三分之一的人每天都與動物有關聯。

sentences.en: From where I stand, I hope this cheque doesn't bounce.
sentences.cn: 從我的立場來說，我希望這張支票不要遭到退票。

sentences.en: I am angry that I have been under a cloud since her bracelet was lost.
sentences.cn: 自從她的手鐲不見以後，我一直受到懷疑，這讓我很生氣。

sentences.en: The color of my brassiere leaves much to be desired.
sentences.cn: 胸罩的顏色讓我不滿意。

sentences.en: My goal is to breed many rabbits.
sentences.cn: 我的目標是養很多兔子。

sentences.en: I can go on condition that the bridegroom is drunk.
sentences.cn: 我可以走，條件是新郎必須喝醉。

sentences.en: To be frank, his words made me broil with envy.
sentences.cn: 坦率地說，他的話讓我妒火中燒。

sentences.en: To be honest, I think the man is as broke as you are.
sentences.cn: 說實話，我覺得那個人和你一樣分文不剩。

cn: 野蠻的，殘忍的，冷酷無情的

sentences.en: I think you should make an effort to protect your family in front of the brutal facts.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，在嚴峻的現實面前，你應該努力保護你的家人。

sentences.en: I hope he will put up a notice on a bulletin board tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我希望，他明天在佈告板上張貼通知。

sentences.en: I think you should never keep these things in the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 我認為，你絕不該把這些東西放在櫥櫃內。

sentences.en: What I should do now is to calculate the cost of the travel.
sentences.cn: 我現在要做的是計算旅行的費用。

sentences.en: After much calculation, I decide to give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 經過慎重考慮後，我決定戒菸。

cn: 計算機，計算者，計算圖表

sentences.en: I should make good use of my money, so I plan to buy a pocket calculator.
sentences.cn: 我應該好好利用我的錢，所以我計畫買一台攜帶型計算器。

sentences.en: I was not supposed to eat lower calorie vegetables.
sentences.cn: 我本不該吃低卡路里的蔬菜。

sentences.en: You should avoid taking part in such a big campaign.
sentences.cn: 你應該避免參加這麼大的活動。

sentences.en: You are not permitted to meet the candidate in private.
sentences.cn: 你不得私下與那個候選人見面。

sentences.en: I think the book is within the capacity of children.
sentences.cn: 我認為，孩子們能看懂這本書。

sentences.en: I believe the freighter will go through the Cape of Good Hope.
sentences.cn: 我相信，那艘貨輪會經過好望角。

sentences.en: Why in God's name? It’s ignorant of you to use the phrase monopolistic capitalism here.
sentences.cn: 天啊？你在這個地方用壟斷資本主義這個片語，真是無知。

cn: n: 資本家，資本主義者

sentences.en: I guess quite a lot of people are out of job in capitalist countries.
sentences.cn: 我猜，在資本主義國家裡有許多人失業。

sentences.en: I don't think she began her career as a zoologist at the age of 20.
sentences.cn: 我認為，她不是在二十歲時開始動物學家職業生涯的。

sentences.en: We should make every effort to salvage the cargo ship.
sentences.cn: 我們應該竭盡全力去打撈那艘貨船。

sentences.en: To my joy, the medicine has killed the carriers of disease such as mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 讓我高興的是，那種藥殺死了蚊子之類攜帶病毒的昆蟲。

sentences.en: To some extent, I dislike the statue carved last year.
sentences.cn: 在某種程度上，我不喜歡去年雕刻的那個雕像。

sentences.en: I lose my hope for life now after a catalogue of disasters.
sentences.cn: 一連串的災難後，我現在對生活失去了希望。

sentences.en: I don't believe that he ceased breathing.
sentences.cn: 我不相信他停止了呼吸。

sentences.en: Personally, I feel he will take part in her eightieth birthday celebrations.
sentences.cn: 我個人認為，他會來參加她的八十大壽的慶祝活動。

sentences.en: I think cement is widely used in building work.
sentences.cn: 我認為水泥在建築工程中應用很廣。

sentences.en: I hope you can forgive me for breaking your CD.

sentences.cn: 一方面我想睡覺，另一方面我又想聽室內音樂會。

sentences.en: My dream is that I can take part in the 20th world championship.
sentences.cn: 我的夢想是，能參加第二十屆世界錦標賽。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, I think this kind of tea has distinct characteristics.
sentences.cn: 整體而言，我認為，這種茶葉有明顯的特徵。

sentences.en: I strongly believe that both the charities he and his wife worked in are non-profit organizations.
sentences.cn: 我堅信，他和妻子工作的兩個慈善團體都是非盈利組織。

sentences.en: I don't want to inform them to go to the chemistry lab.
sentences.cn: 我不想通知他們去化學實驗室。

cn: 珍惜，愛護，懷有（希望、感情等）

sentences.en: Further, it's wrong for him to cherish possessions more than his wife.
sentences.cn: 另外，他重視財富勝過妻子是不對的。

sentences.en: I stopped up my ears so that I can keep the chirp of sparrows out.
sentences.cn: 我堵住耳朵，以便隔絕麻雀的嘰喳聲。

sentences.en: I am prepared to accept some remunerative chore.
sentences.cn: 我打算接受一些有報酬的雜務。

sentences.en: I think your speech will be welcomed with a chorus of praise.
sentences.cn: 我認為，你的演講會受到一片稱讚。

sentences.en: I can't stand the smell of cigar smoke, but I’m not averse to the occasional cigar.
sentences.cn: 我不能忍受雪茄菸的氣味，但我不反對偶爾抽一支。

sentences.en: I hope we can have a circular tour around the world before we get married.
sentences.cn: 我希望，在結婚之前我們可以環球旅行。

sentences.en: I'm a firm believer in punishing the people who circulate false news.
sentences.cn: 我堅信散佈流言者該受懲罰。

sentences.en: I always thought his books had a circulation of one hundred thousand last year.
sentences.cn: 我一直以為，去年他的書銷量是十萬冊。

sentences.en: Under the circumstance, all of us should keep calm.
sentences.cn: 在這種情況下，我們都要保持冷靜。

sentences.en: It grieves me to see the civilian casualties there.
sentences.cn: 看到那裡的平民傷亡，我感到很悲痛。

sentences.en: In my opinion, human civilization is always on the move.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，人類文明一直都在進步。

sentences.en: I'm curious to know what you have to clarify.
sentences.cn: 我很想知道，你必須澄清什麼。

sentences.en: I think there will be a clash between you and him.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，你和他之間將要起衝突。

sentences.en: I am dying to know the system of classification used in Chemistry.
sentences.cn: 我很想知道化學裡的分類系統。

sentences.en: At first, I should classify these clothes according to quality.
sentences.cn: 首先，我應該把這些衣服根據其品質分類。

sentences.en: Don't bother me. I am busy with preparing for scrambling up the cliff.
sentences.cn: 別打擾我，我正忙著為攀爬峭壁做準備。

sentences.en: Your quarrel with the teacher will bring matters to a climax.
sentences.cn: 你和老師的爭吵會使得事態發展到頂點。

sentences.en: I'm sick and tired of the clumsy boy.
sentences.cn: 我對那個笨拙的男孩感到厭煩。

cn: 粗糙的，粗俗的，不精緻的

sentences.en: I'm getting a little concerned about sleeping on the coarse blankets.
sentences.cn: 我對睡在粗硬的毯子上面有點擔心。

sentences.en: I am happy to tell you the postal code.
sentences.cn: 我很高興告訴你郵遞區號。

sentences.en: It's lucky that you didn’t get hurt because of the collapse of the building.
sentences.cn: 你沒有因為建築物的倒塌而受傷，真是太幸運了。

sentences.en: I think he will carry on the business in combination with his brother.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，他會與哥哥合夥做生意。

sentences.en: I am not sure whether I will go to watch the comedy which the actor plays in.
sentences.cn: 我不確定是否要去看那個演員演的喜劇。

sentences.en: I'm grateful for your lending the two comics to me.
sentences.cn: 我很感激你能把那兩本連環畫借給我。

sentences.en: I regretted not listening to the commander's order.
sentences.cn: 我後悔沒有聽指揮官的命令。

sentences.en: I feel unqualified to comment on her new hairstyle.
sentences.cn: 我覺得沒有資格對她的新髮型發表意見。

sentences.en: I remembered that you majored in international commerce last year.
sentences.cn: 我記得，去年你的主修是國際商務。

sentences.en: For one reason or another, I want to commit suicide these days.
sentences.cn: 不知什麼原因，我這些天想自殺。

sentences.en: I don't want to commit myself on the reason of the communication disruption.
sentences.cn: 我不想對這次通訊中斷的原因表態。

sentences.en: I think the young man will be integrated into the local community soon.
sentences.cn: 我想，那個年輕人很快就會融入當地人的圈子。

sentences.en: I offer no comment on your companion on the train.
sentences.cn: 我沒有對火車上你的那個同伴作評論。

sentences.en: I don't know whether I will qualify for the second round of the competition.
sentences.cn: 我不知道我是否有資格進入第二輪比賽。

sentences.en: Apart from this factor, French language teaching is a very competitive market in Taiwan.
sentences.cn: 除去這個因素，法語教學在台灣是個充滿競爭的市場。

sentences.en: You should commit yourself to beating your competitor at that time.
sentences.cn: 那時候你應該專心致志於打敗對手。

sentences.en: I didn't feel that I have complicated the problem.
sentences.cn: 我認為我沒有把問題複雜化。

sentences.en: I want to express my gratitude to you for helping me compose the song.
sentences.cn: 我要謝謝你幫我創作了這首歌。

sentences.en: I think it is impossible for him to surpass the famous composer.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，他很難超越那個知名的作曲家。

sentences.en: He should apologize for not finishing the composition.
sentences.cn: 他應該為沒完成作文道歉。

sentences.en: I demanded that you concentrate your whole attention on the book.
sentences.cn: 我要求你把全部注意力都集中在書上。

sentences.en: I think you should read the book with great concentration.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，你應該聚精會神地看這本書。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the girl has no concept of right and wrong.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，那個女孩沒有是非概念。

sentences.en: I am completely in the dark concerning how to get to the hotel.
sentences.cn: 我完全不知道如何去那家旅館。

sentences.en: I will give you a concrete case to explain the theory later.
sentences.cn: 等等我會為你們舉個具體事例，來解釋這個理論。

sentences.en: I am concerning myself over the young conductor now.
sentences.cn: 我現在很關心那個年輕的售票員。

sentences.en: I am very pleased to have this opportunity to attend the press conference.
sentences.cn: 我很高興能有機會參加這次記者會。

sentences.en: I can hardly believe that he confessed the crime.
sentences.cn: 我幾乎不敢相信他承認自己犯罪。 I can hardly（我幾乎不能）後面接動詞原形。

sentences.en: I have every confidence that he will succeed.
sentences.cn: 我充分相信，他會成功。

sentences.en: I confine to bed because of poor health.
sentences.cn: 因為身體不好，我得臥床休息。

sentences.en: I think I should summon up all my courage to go to work after one day's confusion.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，經過一天的迷茫後，我應該鼓足勇氣去上班。

sentences.en: I am reluctant to congratulate her on having passed the examination.
sentences.cn: 我不願意祝賀她通過考試。

sentences.en: On this occasion, I don't want to talk about the congress.
sentences.cn: 在這樣的場合，我不想討論國會。

sentences.en: My purpose is to conquer my disinclination to meet people.
sentences.cn: 我的目的是克服不願與人交往的習慣。

sentences.en: I had a guilty conscience about not attending her wedding.
sentences.cn: 我因為沒參加她的婚禮而感到內疚。

sentences.en: Don't worry; I think it’s of no consequence.
sentences.cn: 別擔心，我覺得這不礙事。

sentences.en: I think my failure in the exam was consequent on my illness.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，考試失敗是由生病引起的。

sentences.en: It seems to me that the young are less conservative than the old.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，年輕人比老年人較不保守。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to tell you that I will fire you because your actions do not consist with your words.
sentences.cn: 我很遺憾地告訴你，我要解雇你，因為你總是言行不一。

sentences.en: I have a disinclination for him because he isn't consistent with others in actions.
sentences.cn: 我討厭他，是因為他的行動與別人不一致。

sentences.en: I think the quality of the coat isn't quite consonant with its price.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這件外套的品質和價錢不相稱。

sentences.en: I'll fight you on constituting a committee.
sentences.cn: 我不同意你組建委員會。

sentences.en: I can't imagine he doesn’t even know what the constitution is.
sentences.cn: 我無法想像，他竟然不知道什麼是憲法。

sentences.en: I think the rich man has the right to construct a factory here.
sentences.cn: 我認為，那個富人有權利在這裡建廠。

sentences.en: I believe that the man had put a false construction on your words.
sentences.cn: 我相信，那個人是故意曲解你的話。

sentences.en: I meant it as a bit of constructive advice; I hope you won't take it as a personal insult.

sentences.en: We have to find a travel agent to consult about the travel things.
sentences.cn: 我們得找一個旅遊仲介諮詢出遊事宜。

sentences.en: I'm up for being a consultant anytime.
sentences.cn: 不管什麼時候，我都喜歡作一名顧問。

sentences.cn: 我覺得，他把大部分時間都花在打電腦遊戲上了。

sentences.en: I was relieved after packing the goods into the container.

sentences.en: I don't get very excited about the content of the will.

sentences.cn: 與城市相比，我發現農村的空氣較新鮮。

sentences.cn: 我覺得年輕人總是輕視所有的社會習俗。

sentences.cn: 我保證，這個論點反過來也依然成立。

sentences.cn: 她居然自己去做那件事，真是勇敢。

sentences.cn: 我覺得，無論在哪裡，我們都要對老人有禮貌。

sentences.en: I lean to buying this kind of durable materials.
sentences.cn: 我傾向於買這種耐用的材料。

sentences.en: It delights me to know that it's not dusty in your city.
sentences.cn: 得知你所在的城市不是灰濛濛的，我很高興。

sentences.en: I am sold on buying lots of DVD of cartons for him.
sentences.cn: 我贊成多買一些動畫片的光碟給他。

sentences.en: This dye doesn't take in cold water.
sentences.cn: 那種染料在冷水中不起作用。

sentences.en: I rejoice that my dynamic son attracts a lot of girls.
sentences.cn: 我那有活力的兒子吸引了很多女孩子，我很高興。

sentences.en: I cannot say yes to his view that the poet lived in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 他說那個詩人是明朝人，我不同意。

sentences.en: Sorry, I am deaf to your earnest words.
sentences.cn: 對不起，我聽不進你的忠言。

sentences.en: I don't hold with her views on producing the new kind of earphones.
sentences.cn: 我不同意她關於生產這種新款耳機的觀點。

sentences.en: The unemployment will shoot up because of the deepening of the economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 失業人數會因為經濟危機加劇而激增。

sentences.en: I suggest you be economical with cooking oil when cooking.
sentences.cn: 我建議你烹飪時少用點油。

sentences.en: I vote that she studies economics in Tsinghua University.
sentences.cn: 我建議她去清華大學讀經濟學。

sentences.en: He considers the economist a great man. I'd like to take exception to that.
sentences.cn: 他認為那位經濟學家是個偉大的人，我不同意他的看法。

sentences.en: I think Mr. Lin is an important contributor to the economy of Taiwan.
sentences.cn: 我認為，林先生為台灣經濟做出重要貢獻。

sentences.en: I was most impressed with his work efficiency.
sentences.cn: 他的工作效率讓我留下了很深刻的印象。

sentences.en: I don't see it good to buy some new elastic.
sentences.cn: 我認為，再買一些鬆緊帶是不對的。

sentences.en: We had better send for an electrician now.
sentences.cn: 我們現在最好派人去請個電工來。

sentences.en: You should brush up your knowledge of electronics this week.
sentences.cn: 這周，你應該溫習電子學知識。

sentences.en: It was distressing to see he broke the elegant vase.
sentences.cn: 看到他打碎了那個別緻的花瓶，真是痛心。

sentences.en: I nearly lose my interest in the elementary mathematics.
sentences.cn: 我幾乎對基礎數學失去了興趣。

sentences.en: I am obliged to eliminate all the possibility.
sentences.cn: 我不得不排除所有的可能性。

sentences.en: I think about twenty percent of the city's residents are born elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這個城市的居民幾乎有百分之二十是出生在異地。

sentences.en: To me, there are many communication tools, for instance, phone, e-mail and so on.
sentences.cn: 對於我來說，溝通工具很多，比如電話、電子郵件等。

sentences.en: To be frank, I am embarrassed by these questions.
sentences.cn: 說實話，這些問題讓我很窘迫。

sentences.en: I hope I can ease his embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 我希望能緩解他的困窘。

cn: 大使館，大使館全體成員

sentences.en: I am sure they will be familiar with the Japan Embassy before long.
sentences.cn: 我確定不久之後，他們將是日本大使館的常客。

sentences.en: I hope she can emerge from the accident unharmed.
sentences.cn: 我希望，她能在這次事故中脫險，毫無損傷。

sentences.en: By my reckoning, the teacher's emotional pep talk will stir up the students.
sentences.cn: 據我估計，老師的熱情鼓勵會讓同學們倍感振奮。

sentences.en: We had better put emphasis on all details that she told us.
sentences.cn: 我們最好重視她說的所有細節。

sentences.en: Speaking my conscience, the collapse of the Empire can't be prevented.
sentences.cn: 說心裡話，這個帝國的崩潰是不可避免的。

sentences.en: The two bowls enclose a vacuum, so I am afraid I can't pull them apart.
sentences.cn: 兩個碗之間是真空的，所以我擔心沒辦法將它們分開。

sentences.en: I didn't think to encounter you here.
sentences.cn: 我沒想到，會在這裡遇到你。

sentences.en: Your action would endanger your health; worse still, it may endanger your life.
sentences.cn: 你的行為會危及你的健康，更糟糕的是，它可能危及你的生命。

sentences.en: I can't endure to see he is so painful.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看到他如此痛苦。

sentences.en: He has no right to enforce his own views on her.
sentences.cn: 他無權把自己的觀點強加給她。

sentences.en: I think we lack the necessary enforcement machinery, but I am bashful in expressing my view.
sentences.cn: 我認為我們缺乏必要的執行機制，但我羞於表達自己的觀點。

sentences.en: I was proud that my son got A's in many engineering exams.
sentences.cn: 我很驕傲，我兒子在很多次工程學考試中都得了 A。

sentences.en: I would like you to enlarge upon your suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我希望，你能詳細談談你的建議。

sentences.en: I don't regard the enlargement of the company’s overseas business activities favourably.
sentences.cn: 我不看好公司海外業務的擴展。

sentences.en: I think this kind of food has enormous sales potential.
sentences.cn: 我認為這種食品有很大的銷售潛力。

sentences.en: I think it is my time to entertain you at dinner.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，該由我來招待你們吃飯了。

sentences.en: Of course the guest will nag at your entertainment.
sentences.cn: 當然，那個客人會挑剔你們的款待。

sentences.en: I think he will show enthusiasm for traveling.
sentences.cn: 我想，他會熱衷於旅遊。

sentences.en: I am envious of her new necklace.
sentences.cn: 我很嫉妒她的新項鍊。

sentences.en: I think that women should be on an equality with men.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，女人應該與男人平等。

sentences.en: I will try my best to equip my daughter with a good education.
sentences.cn: 我要盡最大的努力，讓女兒受到優質教育。

sentences.en: I am sure the new system can be compatible with existing equipment.
sentences.cn: 我確定，新的系統會與現有的設備相容。

sentences.en: I deem the fall of the Berlin Wall marked the end of an era.
sentences.cn: 我認為柏林牆的倒塌標誌著一個時代的結束。

sentences.en: It was an errand of mercy to me.
sentences.cn: 對於我來說，這是雪中送炭。

sentences.en: The new store has escalators to carry customers from one floor to another.
sentences.cn: 新的店家有手扶梯載顧客從一層樓到另一層樓。

sentences.en: I think the essay constitutes a direct threat to me.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這篇論文對我形成直接威脅。

sentences.en: Moreover, the new rule has been established and none of us can modify it at random.
sentences.cn: 而且，新規則已經制定，我們任何人都不得任意修改。

sentences.en: I could deduce that they're celebrating the establishment of the new college.
sentences.cn: 我推斷，他們在慶祝新學院的成立。

sentences.en: Vitamin and mineral requirements are essential for you.
sentences.cn: 對於你來說，維生素和礦物質是必須的。

sentences.en: I estimate that she is the apple of her parents' eyes.
sentences.cn: 我估計，她是父母的掌上明珠。

sentences.en: I tell you not to evaluate a person on the basis of appearance.
sentences.cn: 我告訴你，不要以貌取人。

sentences.en: Their opinions and evaluations are out of my expectation.
sentences.cn: 他們的意見和評價出乎我的意料。

sentences.en: I am afraid he will fall ill on the eve of the race.
sentences.cn: 我擔心他會在比賽前夕病倒。

sentences.en: I will never regret for what I said no matter what the eventual outcome is.
sentences.cn: 不管最後的結果是什麼，我永遠不會為自己說過的話後悔。

sentences.en: On the basis of the evidence, I think he is innocent.
sentences.cn: 基於這些證據，我認為他是無罪的。

sentences.en: It has become evident to me who betrayed me.
sentences.cn: 我已經清楚是誰出賣我。

sentences.en: I think he has a tendency to exaggerate things.
sentences.cn: 我覺得他傾向於誇大事實。

sentences.en: I feel honored to be an examinee of the big company.
sentences.cn: 作為這家大公司的一名應試者，我覺得很榮幸。

sentences.en: The examiner won't let me through because my oral English is poor.
sentences.cn: 我的英語口說很差，考官不會讓我及格的。

sentences.en: All of the dishes are good with the exception of this one.
sentences.cn: 所有菜都好吃，除了這一道。

sentences.en: As far as I am concerned, too much exercise will exhaust him.
sentences.cn: 依我看，過多的運動會讓他精疲力竭。

sentences.en: I would appreciate it if you take me to the exhibit.
sentences.cn: 如果你帶我去看展覽，我會非常感激。

sentences.en: In my opinion, this substance has no tendency to expand.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，這種物質沒有膨脹的傾向。

sentences.en: I plan to give an impulse to industrial expansion next year.
sentences.cn: 我打算在明年促進工業的擴展。

sentences.en: If my memory serves me right, near the experimental farm exists a waterpower station.
sentences.cn: 如果我沒記錯的話，實驗農場附近有一座水力發電站。

sentences.en: Well, you should say a few words by way of explanation.
sentences.cn: 嗯，你得說幾句話作為說明。

sentences.en: If I were you, I would explore the Arctic regions.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你，我會探測北極地帶。

sentences.en: The explosion just now gave me quite a scare.
sentences.cn: 剛才的爆炸聲把我嚇了一跳。

cn: a: 爆炸性的，引發爭論的

sentences.en: It's a problem, and above all, it is an explosive problem.
sentences.cn: 這是個問題，尤其是這個問題還容易引起爭論。

sentences.en: I am sure I will expose the shameful activity to the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我確定要向報社揭露這無恥行徑。

sentences.en: I have a yearning for having a room with a southern exposure.
sentences.cn: 我渴望有一間向南的房間。

sentences.en: I am occupied with extending my garden, so I don't want to go to the party.
sentences.cn: 我正忙於擴建花園，所以我不想去參加派對。

sentences.en: I think it can hold back market competition to a great extent.
sentences.cn: 我認為，這在很大程度上阻止了市場競爭的發展。

sentences.en: I think the girl bears a strong facial resemblance to you.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，那個女孩的容貌和你十分相像。

sentences.en: I wouldn't feel happy if they sent my daughter to the kindergarten with poor facilities.
sentences.cn: 如果他們把我女兒送到設備很差的幼稚園，我會不高興。

sentences.en: If you want to get promoted, you will have to be faithful to your boss.
sentences.cn: 如果你想得到提拔，就得對老闆忠誠。

sentences.en: I think the woman has hankered after fame all her life.
sentences.cn: 我認為這個女人一生都在追求名聲。

cn: 想像中的，奇異的，幻想的

sentences.en: I promise I won't give up the fantastic job.
sentences.cn: 我保證，我不會放棄這份好工作。

sentences.en: To me, the movie was more of a horror story than an ironic fantasy.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，這部影片與其說是帶有諷刺意味的奇幻片，不如說是恐怖片。

sentences.en: I am afraid I have to make my farewell to you.
sentences.cn: 恐怕，我要與你們說再見了。

cn: 致命的，毀滅性的，決定性的

sentences.en: It would be fatal to bring the bag home.
sentences.cn: 把這個袋子帶回家，可能招致災難。

sentences.en: I am favorable to going out for a walk.
sentences.cn: 我贊成出去散步。

sentences.en: You shouldn't have troubled yourself to feast us with so many dishes.
sentences.cn: 你本不該用這麼多菜宴請我們，太麻煩了。

sentences.en: I think the boat is used to ferry the villagers to the bank.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這小船是用來擺渡村民到河岸的。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me that your hometown is fertile of oranges.
sentences.cn: 我從沒想到，你們家鄉盛產橘子。

sentences.en: Her bag is the exact fetch of the one I lost and I suspect she stole mine.
sentences.cn: 她的包包和我不見的那個一模一樣，我懷疑是她偷了我的包包。

sentences.en: To finish reading the fiction in two days is no easy work.
sentences.cn: 兩天之內讀完這本小說，不是件容易的事。

sentences.en: I am sure I will get a beat on him after a fierce struggle.
sentences.cn: 我確定經過殊死的較量，我會比他占上風。

sentences.en: Of course I can get the position of director on the strength of my skill in finance.
sentences.cn: 我當然相信，憑著自己的理財本領，我可以得到主管這個職位。

sentences.en: I am afraid the report is inconsistent with the financial affairs.
sentences.cn: 恐怕這報告和那些金融事務不一致。

sentences.en: I think he was quite reckless of his own safety when he set off those firecrackers.
sentences.cn: 我想他點燃那些鞭炮的時候，完全都不顧及自己的安危。

sentences.en: I find it hard for me to wall up the fireplace at night.
sentences.cn: 我發現晚上把那個壁爐封住，對於我來說是困難的事情。

sentences.en: I think she always flatters herself.
sentences.cn: 我覺得她總是自以為是。

sentences.en: I wouldn't stand that you fled from your duty.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍你逃避責任。

cn: 有彈性的，靈活的，可變通的

sentences.en: I think that the girl has a flexible mind.
sentences.cn: 我認為，那個女孩思維靈活。

sentences.en: She is fluent in a few languages, so I'm sure she can do this job.
sentences.cn: 她能流利地說好幾種語言，我相信，她一定能勝任這項工作。

sentences.en: I don't want to flunk in the exam as you.
sentences.cn: 我不想和你一樣考試不及格。

sentences.en: I think he was in the full flush of success last year.
sentences.cn: 我認為，去年他的成就如日中天。

cn: 泡沫 v 起泡沫，吐白沫

sentences.en: In my view, where there is water, there is foam.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，有水的地方就有泡沫。

sentences.en: I will forbid her going out at nights.
sentences.cn: 我要阻止她晚上外出。

sentences.en: In my opinion, it would be premature to forecast the result.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，預言結果還為時過早。

sentences.en: I hate to disagree with you, but the formation of a new government is not as easy as you might think.
sentences.cn: 我不想和你有不同意見，但新政府的組建可能沒有你想像的那麼容易。

sentences.en: I think that formula is very difficult to remember.
sentences.cn: 我覺得那個公式很難記。

sentences.en: I've always wanted to visit the old fort.
sentences.cn: 我一直想參觀那個古堡。

sentences.en: I am the fortunate possessor of a bright future.
sentences.cn: 我很幸運，我有個光明的前途。

sentences.en: At this distance of time, I consider it hard to date the fossil.
sentences.cn: 時隔這麼久，我覺得很難確定這化石的年代。

sentences.en: It's her excellent performance that laid a foundation for her career.
sentences.cn: 是她出色的表現為她的事業打下了基礎。

sentences.en: In my mind, they three are the founders of the university.
sentences.cn: 在我心中，他們三個是這所大學的創建人。

sentences.en: I hope the fragrance the flowers give out can relax you.
sentences.cn: 我希望花朵散發出來的香味能讓你放鬆。

sentences.en: How fragrant the girl just passing by is!
sentences.cn: 剛走過去的女孩身上真香！

sentences.en: I will talk to him when he is in a better frame of mind.
sentences.cn: 他心情好些時，我會和他談話。

sentences.en: I am afraid the tire will blow out on the freeway.
sentences.cn: 我擔心會在高速公路上爆胎。

sentences.en: I have confidence in the frequency converter.
sentences.cn: 我對這個變頻器有信心。

sentences.en: I've had it up to here with the freshman.
sentences.cn: 我真受不了那個大一新生。

sentences.en: These farmers should be cautioned to protect the vegetables from frost.
sentences.cn: 這些農民應該收到警告，保護蔬菜避免結霜。

sentences.en: I frowned on her being late for school.
sentences.cn: 我因為她上學遲到而不高興。

sentences.en: I think it's wrong to drink in frustration.
sentences.cn: 心情不好就喝酒，我覺得是不對的。

sentences.en: I think this kind of fuel has the advantage of burning easily.
sentences.cn: 我認為，這種燃料有易燃的優點。
