sentences.en: I have no experience in the work, so I am afraid I can't fulfill the task on time.
sentences.cn: 我對這個工作沒有經驗，所以我擔心不能準時完成任務。

sentences.en: I am sure he will try his best in fulfillment of his duty.
sentences.cn: 我確定，他會盡最大的努力來履行自己的職責。

sentences.en: I think this telephone is out of order, but that one is functional.
sentences.cn: 我認為這支電話是壞的，不過那支可以用。

sentences.en: This book is fundamental to your study.
sentences.cn: 這本書對於你的學習來說是必不可少的。

sentences.en: I shouldn't have scolded her since that’s not her funeral.
sentences.cn: 這不關她的事，我本不該責怪她。

sentences.en: My beloved trousers were flamed a hole by him, so I was furious with him.
sentences.cn: 我心愛的褲子被他燒了個洞，所以我對他很生氣。

sentences.en: Shall we furnish the poor people with some supplies?
sentences.cn: 我們給這些窮人供應一些生活用品，好嗎？

sentences.en: Furthermore, I will leave for a date tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 而且，我明天便要離開去赴約。

sentences.en: I don't like these paintings that are on show in the art gallery.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡藝術館展出的這些畫。

sentences.en: I think you are on the track of the gangster.
sentences.cn: 我想你們正在追蹤那名匪徒。

sentences.en: I am unhappy when my husband turned his gaze to the beautiful girl.
sentences.cn: 我丈夫把目光移到那個漂亮的女孩身上時，我很不高興。

sentences.en: You should change into first gear when you go down the hill.
sentences.cn: 下山時你應該換一檔。

sentences.en: Evidence is accumulating that the expert knows nothing about the structure of gene in fact.
sentences.cn: 愈來愈多的證據表明，其實那個專家對基因的結構一無所知。

sentences.en: The man was one of the best singers of his generation.
sentences.cn: 那人是他那一代中最優秀的歌星之一。

sentences.en: I am sure he will be knocked out by my generosity.
sentences.cn: 我確定，我的寬宏大量會讓他感到吃驚。

sentences.en: I think of myself as a genius in math.
sentences.cn: 我自以為是個數學天才。

sentences.en: As time goes on, a genuine friendship will grow between them.
sentences.cn: 隨著時間的推移，他們之間會產生真摯的友情。

sentences.en: I will tell you if I have the germ of an idea.
sentences.cn: 如果我有初步的想法，就會告訴你。

sentences.en: I think the boy is gifted with rare eloquence.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，那個男孩天生具有罕見的口才。

sentences.en: I was daunted by the gigantic word in this letter.
sentences.cn: 這封信裡的這個長單字難倒我了。

sentences.en: Wouldn't it be a giggle to put his glasses away?
sentences.cn: 把他的眼鏡藏起來，豈不有趣？

sentences.en: I think there is no ginger in the man over there.
sentences.cn: 我覺得那邊那個人毫無生氣。

sentences.en: You should glide out of the room when he is sleeping.
sentences.cn: 你應該在他睡著時溜出房間。

sentences.en: I felt sad when I caught a glimpse of that paper.
sentences.cn: 瞥見那份試卷時，我很難過。

sentences.en: I plan to travel around the globe next year.
sentences.cn: 我打算在明年進行環球旅行。

sentences.en: It is a glorious thing to open the door for you.
sentences.cn: 為你開門是件光榮的事。

sentences.en: I was afraid that I would be alleged to have brought goods into the country illegally.
sentences.cn: 我怕我會被指控非法攜帶貨物入境。

sentences.en: I will accept the gift sent by my friend with good grace.
sentences.cn: 我會欣然接受朋友送的禮物。

sentences.en: I think her success is closely linked to her graceful manner.
sentences.cn: 我覺得她的成功和優雅的舉止息息相關。

sentences.en: I assure you that she is a lovely and gracious woman.
sentences.cn: 我向你擔保，她是個可愛又親切的女子。

sentences.en: To be specific, your graduation thesis doesn't satisfy me.
sentences.cn: 具體地說，你的畢業論文讓我不滿意。

sentences.en: I'll answer for it that the grammar book will be finished next week.
sentences.cn: 我保證下星期完成那本文法書。

sentences.en: Except for some grammatical mistakes, your composition is well written.
sentences.cn: 除了幾處文法錯誤之外，你這篇作文寫得不錯。

sentences.en: Eating grapefruit doesn't make sense for these people.
sentences.cn: 對於這些人來說，吃葡萄柚沒有什麼意義。

sentences.en: I was very grateful to you for your company.
sentences.cn: 我特別感謝你的陪伴。

sentences.en: I promise you that I will not devoid of all gratitude if I succeed.
sentences.cn: 我保證，如果我成功了，絕不會忘恩負義。

sentences.en: I feel impelled to express grave doubts about the plan they proposed.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，不得不對他們提出的計畫深表懷疑。

sentences.en: For one thing I hate eating greasy food, for another it isn't good for my health.
sentences.cn: 一方面我不喜歡吃油膩的食物，另一方面，它也不利於身體健康。

sentences.en: You should give her a warm greeting when she approaches.
sentences.cn: 當她走近時，你應該熱情問候她。

sentences.en: I swear grief and disappointment hastened the old man's death.
sentences.cn: 我肯定，悲哀和失望加速了那位老人的死亡。

sentences.en: I shall not grieve for not passing the exam.
sentences.cn: 對於沒通過考試，我一點也不難過。

sentences.en: I ground my teeth when I saw they were having dinner together.
sentences.cn: 我看見他們在一起吃飯，氣得咬牙切齒。

sentences.en: You must give a guarantee of good behavior.
sentences.cn: 你要保證行為端正。

sentences.en: No matter where I went, the guilt will be eating into my conscience.
sentences.cn: 不管我走到哪裡，內疚始終一直折磨著我的心。

sentences.en: I felt guilty by breaking her favorite vase.
sentences.cn: 打破了她最心愛的花瓶，我感到非常內疚。

sentences.en: I've been thinking about in which year the Gulf War happened.
sentences.cn: 我一直在想，波灣戰爭是發生在哪一年。

sentences.en: You must be a habitual visitor to his house.
sentences.cn: 你一定是他家的常客。

sentences.en: I call for a halt to the attack towards the foreign people.
sentences.cn: 我呼籲停止對外國人的攻擊。

sentences.en: I have a desire to see his current handwriting.
sentences.cn: 我非常渴望看到他現在的筆跡。

sentences.en: Don't you allow the clay to harden.
sentences.cn: 你不要讓那些黏土變硬。

sentences.en: I think I can go through one hardship after another.
sentences.cn: 我相信，我可以經歷一個又一個的困難。

sentences.en: I don't want to go to the hardware store in consequence of his words.
sentences.cn: 因為他說的話，讓我不想去那家五金行。

sentences.en: I will steal a red and a black harmonica without reflecting on the consequences.
sentences.cn: 我將會不計後果地偷一支紅色的和一支黑色的口琴。

sentences.en: You should be in harmony with your colleagues.
sentences.cn: 你該與同事協調一致。

sentences.en: Don't be so harsh to the students who are naughty!
sentences.cn: 不要對調皮的學生太嚴厲！

sentences.en: He went to school in haste just now.
sentences.cn: 他剛才急急忙忙去學校了。

sentences.en: I should have hastened him to go to the Finance Ministry.
sentences.cn: 我本應該催他趕往財政部的。

sentences.en: In my opinion, race hatred is common in the time of war.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，戰爭年代的種族仇恨很普遍。

sentences.en: You should wear the same headphone as your brother's.
sentences.cn: 你應該和弟弟戴一樣的耳機。

sentences.en: I felt incapable of eating these healthful foods.
sentences.cn: 我感覺無法吃這些有益健康的食物。

sentences.en: I haven't seen a helicopter for a long time.
sentences.cn: 我很久沒有看到直升機了。

sentences.en: I don't think there will be a herd of sheep on the hill from a long distance.
sentences.cn: 我想，遠處的山上不會有一群羊。

sentences.en: I will eat up the bread without hesitation.
sentences.cn: 我會毫不猶豫地把麵包吃完。

sentences.en: It is highly debatable whether she should accept his proposal.
sentences.cn: 她是否該接受他的求婚，還有待討論。

sentences.en: I would adore to settle back in the homeland and eat the delicious snacks.
sentences.cn: 我非常樂意回家鄉定居，吃美味的小吃。

sentences.en: Do not bother her when she is on her honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 她度蜜月的時候不要打擾她。

sentences.en: You should be jealous of the honorable title.
sentences.cn: 你該忌妒這個光榮稱號。

sentences.en: I can never be off the hook no matter what I do.
sentences.cn: 不管我做什麼，都無法脫身。

sentences.en: I feel hopeful that we can find her even though the city is big.
sentences.cn: 儘管這個城市很大，我對找到她很樂觀。

sentences.en: You should try to prevent the dispute on the horizon from happening.
sentences.cn: 你們應該試圖避免這場即將發生的爭端。

sentences.en: Funny a book as it is, I was still horrified by some plots of it.
sentences.cn: 儘管這是一本很搞笑的書，我還是被一些情節嚇到了。

sentences.en: I want to hose down a whole garden in one day.
sentences.cn: 我想在一天時間內來澆灌整個花園。

sentences.en: No one felt happy to have dinner with such a mean host.
sentences.cn: 沒人樂意和這樣吝嗇的主人一起吃飯。

sentences.en: Why didn't you live in the hostel near my house as I told you to?
sentences.cn: 你為什麼不住我跟你說的我家附近的青年旅館呢？

cn: a: 家庭的，家喻戶曉的

sentences.en: It looks as though he was born in a respectable household.
sentences.cn: 他看起來好像是出生在一戶有名望的人家。

sentences.en: I look down upon the housewife who is busy at housework all day.
sentences.cn: 我瞧不起那個整天忙家務的家庭主婦。

sentences.en: I think he is expert at getting out of housework.
sentences.cn: 我覺得他很會逃避家務。

sentences.en: The great chairman spent her lifetime in the service of humanity.
sentences.cn: 那位偉大的主席耗盡畢生的精力為人類服務。

sentences.en: I am sure many buildings will be demolished by the hurricane.
sentences.cn: 我確定，許多建築物會被颶風摧毀。

sentences.en: Well, I believe water can be reduced to oxygen and hydrogen by electrolysis.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我相信用電解法可以把水分解為氧和氫。

sentences.en: Something must be done to prevent the ship from crashing into the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 必須採取措施，避免輪船撞上冰山。

sentences.en: I think he is identical in character with his sister.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，他的品性和他妹妹相同。

sentences.en: You should take your identification card with you when you are in a strange place.
sentences.cn: 當你在一個陌生的地方時，要隨身帶著你的身份證。

sentences.en: He always identifies himself with us, thus we like him very much.
sentences.cn: 他經常和我們打成一片，因此很受我們喜歡。

sentences.en: You really have to do something about your study since both dialects and idioms are difficult to learn.
sentences.cn: 你真該為你的學業做點什麼了，方言和慣用語都很難學。

sentences.en: It's wrong of you to drink in your idle time.
sentences.cn: 在空閒時間喝酒是不對的。

sentences.en: Let's bow down to the idol.
sentences.cn: 我們向神像行禮吧。

cn: 無知的，愚昧的，不知道的

sentences.en: I think he is ignorant of literature.
sentences.cn: 我覺得他不瞭解文學。

sentences.en: My hope is to draw a chart to illustrate my points.
sentences.cn: 我希望畫個圖表來說明我的觀點。

sentences.en: By way of illustration, I'll refer to how a pig lives in the forest.
sentences.cn: 我將舉例說明，一頭豬是如何在森林中生活的。

sentences.en: It is imaginable that he will be angry if he gets the bad news.
sentences.cn: 可以想像，他得知那個壞消息會生氣。

sentences.en: It won't do any harm to draw an imaginary beast.
sentences.cn: 畫一隻虛構的怪獸，也沒有什麼壞處。

sentences.en: It would be wonderful if all of you are imaginative.
sentences.cn: 如果你們都很有想像力，那就太好了。

sentences.en: It makes a difference to me who you are imitating.
sentences.cn: 你在模仿誰，對我來說很重要。

sentences.en: It is a wonder that all of your merchandise is imitation jewelry.
sentences.cn: 真不敢相信，你所有的商品都是偽造的珠寶。

sentences.en: I think the machinery is tenanted by an immigrant from Korea.
sentences.cn: 我認為，這些機械是歸一個韓國僑包所有。

sentences.en: My plan is to immigrate to the United States.
sentences.cn: 我的計畫是移民到美國。

sentences.en: I think it is not in conflict with the laws the immigration authority makes.
sentences.cn: 我想，這與移民局制定的法律沒有衝突。

sentences.en: The news on the newspaper will have an impact on these people.
sentences.cn: 報紙上的新聞對這些人產生影響。

sentences.en: He implies that we can have dinner together. Don't you understand?
sentences.cn: 他在暗示我們可以一起吃飯，你不明白嗎？

sentences.en: I got the impression that he didn't forget the accident.
sentences.cn: 我感覺，他沒有忘記那次意外。

sentences.en: The film which is based on a real-life incident makes an indelible impression on me.
sentences.cn: 以現實生活中的事件為基礎的那部電影，讓我難以忘懷。

sentences.en: I set my mind to read books at night, including vacations.
sentences.cn: 我下定決心在晚上看書，包括假日。

sentences.en: I don't want to give any indication of my feelings to you.
sentences.cn: 我不想向你展示自己的感情。

sentences.en: I'd like to know more about industrializing.
sentences.cn: 我想多瞭解一些關於工業化的東西。

sentences.en: I think this is a good chance for you to look after the infant.
sentences.cn: 我認為，照顧那個嬰兒對你來說是個很好的機會。

sentences.en: Keep away from me because I don't want to infect you with my cold.
sentences.cn: 離我遠點，我不想把感冒傳染給你。

sentences.en: His disease may be referable to virus infection.
sentences.cn: 他的病也許是由病毒感染引起的。

sentences.en: I think the government should bring up a hedge against inflation.
sentences.cn: 我認為，政府應該提出一項政策來預防通貨膨脹。

sentences.en: I don't like him because he always tries to get in with the influential men.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡他，是因為他總是試圖巴結那些有影響力的人。

sentences.en: I would like to recommend the information to you.
sentences.cn: 我想推薦這個資料給你。

sentences.en: In that case, I will buy an informative book.
sentences.cn: 既然那樣，我要買一本資料豐富的書。

sentences.en: I think these kinds of ingredients are of great importance to cook the dish.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，做這道菜時，這幾樣原料很重要。

sentences.en: I think recouping our initial investment is just around the corner.
sentences.cn: 我覺得我們馬上就可以收回成本了。

sentences.en: I am convinced of his innocence.
sentences.cn: 我確信他是無辜的。

sentences.en: To me, our output should be proportional to the input.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，我們的輸出應當與輸入成比例。

sentences.en: I'll surely insert a picture into the fifth page of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 我一定會在這本字典的第五頁插入一張圖片。

sentences.en: I think we should make an inspection of the school.
sentences.cn: 我認為我們該去視察學校了。

cn: 靈感，鼓舞人心的人或事物

sentences.en: Maybe I can draw my inspiration from sleepwalking.
sentences.cn: 或許，我可以從夢遊中獲取靈感。

sentences.en: Well, you should inspire your students to think in the study.
sentences.cn: 嗯，你要鼓勵學生在學習中多思考。

sentences.en: It is essential that we install an air-conditioner in our house.
sentences.cn: 我們有必要在家裡裝一台空調。

sentences.en: I think my son has an instinct for playing guitar.
sentences.cn: 我認為，我的兒子對彈吉他很有天分。

sentences.en: It's amazing that he instructs his sister in English.
sentences.cn: 他教妹妹英語，真讓人驚訝。

sentences.en: Let's visit our history instructor at the weekend, OK?
sentences.cn: 周末我們去拜訪歷史老師，好嗎？

sentences.en: My son got 0's in the final exam, which is taken as an insult by me.
sentences.cn: 我兒子在期末考試中得了很多零分，我認為這是對我的侮辱。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the insurance is grounded on trust.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，保險業立足於信用。

sentences.en: It is high time that you invited the young intellectual to give a speech.
sentences.cn: 你早就該邀請那個年輕的知識份子來做演講。

sentences.en: It is important that she enter the intelligence services.
sentences.cn: 她進入情報部門很重要。

sentences.en: I have arrived at the conclusion that your boyfriend is intelligent.
sentences.cn: 我已得出結論，你男朋友很聰明。

sentences.en: For the future, I intend to look after my baby with my sister.
sentences.cn: 今後，我打算和姊姊一起照顧我的孩子。

sentences.en: It's long been my dream to watch the intense match.
sentences.cn: 觀看這場激烈的比賽一直是我的夢想。

sentences.en: It is likely that the government will intensify structural adjustment in this item.
sentences.cn: 政府有可能會在這個項目中增強結構調整力度。

sentences.en: It's really a challenge for me to read with the poor intensity of light.
sentences.cn: 在光的強度不足時看書，對我來說真是個挑戰。

sentences.en: It makes no difference to me whether you have received intensive training.
sentences.cn: 你是否受過密集訓練，對我來說無所謂。

sentences.en: I have no intention of going shopping today.
sentences.cn: 我今天無意去逛街。

sentences.en: I think these elements will interact with each other in this experiment.
sentences.cn: 我認為在這個實驗中，這些元素會相互作用。

sentences.en: It helps if his paper can express the concept of interaction design.
sentences.cn: 如果他的論文能體現交互設計的理念，那會有所幫助。

sentences.en: Don't interfere with his work.
sentences.cn: 別妨礙他工作。

sentences.en: It goes without saying that the factory is till at an intermediate stage of development.
sentences.cn: 不用說，這間工廠還處在發展的中間階段。

sentences.en: It's a bad habit to surf the Internet all night.
sentences.cn: 徹夜上網是個壞習慣。

sentences.en: It's a pleasure to interpret the chairman’s speech.
sentences.cn: 很高興來翻譯主席的演講。

sentences.en: It's not like him to keep up physical training without interruption.
sentences.cn: 堅持鍛煉不間斷，不像是他的作風。

sentences.en: It's my first time of having an intimate candlelit dinner for two persons and I like it very much.
sentences.cn: 這是我的第一次溫馨的二人燭光晚餐，我很喜歡。

sentences.en: It's been so long since I heard of his funny intonation; I want to laugh.
sentences.cn: 很久沒聽到他滑稽的語調了，我很想大笑。

sentences.en: It won't take long before the cancer cells invade other parts of your body.
sentences.cn: 用不了多久，癌細胞就會侵襲身體的其他部分。

sentences.en: I think the invasion of tourists can bring life to the summer resort.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，大批遊客的湧入會使這個避暑勝地熱鬧起來。

sentences.en: I don't know how he lit upon the idea for the invention.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他是如何想到那個發明的。

sentences.en: It would be imprudent to invest all his money in the real estate.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的錢都投資在房地產，是不明智的。

sentences.en: I think it is sensible in terms of an investment.
sentences.cn: 我認為，從投資的角度來考慮是合理的。

sentences.en: The police must have arrived at a solution via scientific investigation yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，警察肯定是透過科學的調查研究得出解決問題的辦法。

sentences.en: I think the project must be involved with state secrets.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這項計畫肯定涉及到國家機密。

sentences.en: I don't know why he has always felt a deep involvement with dogs.
sentences.cn: 我不知道，他為什麼對狗總是有著深厚的感情。

sentences.en: I wonder why these thirteen hundred patients are isolated from other people.
sentences.cn: 我想知道為什麼這一千三百個病人要與其他人隔離。

sentences.en: The indication is that he wants to be in complete isolation from the outside world and I long for the life, too.
sentences.cn: 有跡象表明，他想過與世隔絕的生活，我也嚮往那種生活。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I have an itch to play chess now.
sentences.cn: 說實話，我現在很想下棋。

sentences.en: I am burning with jealousy at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我現在妒火中燒。

cn: a: 年輕的，資歷較淺的

sentences.en: He is junior to me in the company.
sentences.cn: 在公司裡，他的職位比我低。

sentences.en: I am keen to help these poor people.
sentences.cn: 我很願意幫助這些窮人。

cn: v: 開始努力工作，屈從

sentences.en: The general opinion is that you have to knuckle down, but I don't think so.
sentences.cn: 大家普遍認為你應該專心練習，但是我不這麼想。

sentences.en: I think a thousand one hundred and forty-nine labors will lose their jobs.
sentences.cn: 我認為，將會有一千一百四十九個工人失去工作。

sentences.en: I hope that our laboratory can be kept in good order.
sentences.cn: 我希望，我們的實驗室裡能夠保持井然有序。

sentences.en: I am afraid that I will lag behind him.
sentences.cn: 我害怕會落後於他。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the year 1949 is a landmark for the Chinese nation.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，一九四九年是中華民族具有劃時代意義的一年。

sentences.en: It is universally acknowledged that Guilin's landscape is number one in the world, but I don’t like it.
sentences.cn: 全世界都知道桂林山水甲天下，但是，我不喜歡那裡。

sentences.en: There seems to be some houses destroyed by a landslide; it was a pity.
sentences.cn: 看起來好像是一些房子被山崩毀壞了，真是遺憾。

sentences.en: I think her conclusions were largely founded on guesswork.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，她的結論大部分都是基於猜測。

sentences.en: I am angry that I have not seen anything of her lately.
sentences.cn: 近來我連她的影子也沒有見到過，我很生氣。

sentences.en: I estimate that thousands upon thousands people keep a watchful eye on the launch of the satellite.
sentences.cn: 我估計，成千上萬的人在關注著這顆衛星的發射。

sentences.en: It is not lawful to accept these thousands of dollars.
sentences.cn: 接受這上萬美元是不合法的。

sentences.en: I think it was my teacher that led me into the world of music.
sentences.cn: 我認為是我的老師帶我進入了音樂的殿堂。

sentences.en: I want to lean against the tree to have a rest.
sentences.cn: 我想靠著樹休息一下。

sentences.en: Those who are learned are not necessarily wise.
sentences.cn: 博學者未必都是聰明的。

sentences.en: I will never boast of my learning.
sentences.cn: 我永遠都不會誇耀自己的學識。

sentences.en: I take it as a pleasure to attend the famous scientist's lecture tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天我願意去聽那個知名科學家的演講。

sentences.en: The lecturer should try to settle these people down.
sentences.cn: 那個講師應該設法讓這些人安靜下來。

sentences.en: I like nothing better than the legend about Robin Hood.
sentences.cn: 我最喜歡關於羅賓漢的傳說。

sentences.en: I like taking a leisurely walk and appreciating the things in the historical museum.
sentences.cn: 我喜歡慢慢地走著，欣賞歷史博物館的東西。

sentences.en: We are thinking of taking out a marriage license.
sentences.cn: 我們正打算領結婚證書。

sentences.en: If you don't lighten the lantern, you must be ready to take the consequences.
sentences.cn: 如果你不點燈籠，就必須自食其果。

sentences.en: It is a truth that I can't transcend the limitations of the ego.
sentences.cn: 我無法超越自身的侷限性，這是事實。

sentences.en: His wife will divorce him if he keeps being in liquor.
sentences.cn: 如果他總是喝得醉醺醺的，他妻子會和他離婚。

cn: 文學的，文人的，書卷氣的

sentences.en: She is considered to be one of the 17th century's literary giants, but I don’t like her.
sentences.cn: 她被視為十七世紀的文學巨匠之一，但是我不喜歡她。

sentences.en: I think he has very eclectic tastes in literature.
sentences.cn: 我認為，在文學方面，他的興趣非常廣泛。

sentences.en: It's so great that the bank makes a loan of five hundred thousand to us.
sentences.cn: 太棒了，那間銀行貸給我們五十萬元。

sentences.en: I think we should buy the house which is in a convenient location.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，我們應該買那間位置很方便的房子。

sentences.en: You can hide in the locker room.
sentences.cn: 你可以躲在衣帽間裡。

sentences.en: I think her words are against all logic.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，她的話完全不符合邏輯。

sentences.en: It is logical that he borrows money from you.
sentences.cn: 他向你借錢是很自然的事。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the lotion has no use on her skin anyway.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，這乳液對她的皮膚一點效果都沒有。

sentences.en: You are dismissed for you are a lousy accountant.
sentences.cn: 你被辭退，是因為你是個不稱職的會計。

sentences.en: He will be loyal to his country forever.
sentences.cn: 他會永遠忠誠於祖國。

sentences.en: I want you to swear your loyalty to the Party.
sentences.cn: 我要你們宣誓效忠於黨。

sentences.en: There is a better way to celebrate the lunar New Year.
sentences.cn: 還有個更好的辦法來慶祝農曆新年。

sentences.en: It's true that leading a luxurious life is always vacuous.
sentences.cn: 奢侈的生活總是很空虛，這是真的。

sentences.en: I think the luxury villa is worth at least seventy million dollars.
sentences.cn: 我認為這幢豪華別墅至少價值七千萬美元。

sentences.en: You should phase in new machinery for increased automation next year.
sentences.cn: 明年，你們應該開始逐步採用新機器，以提高自動化程度。

sentences.en: She is a little madam and we all dislike playing with her.
sentences.cn: 她有公主病，我們都不喜歡和她一起玩。

sentences.en: I want all the men to be ravished with my magnetic personality.
sentences.cn: 我要讓所有的男人為我迷人的風度所傾倒。

sentences.en: It is indeed the most magnificent building I have seen.
sentences.cn: 這確實是我見到過最宏偉的建築。

sentences.en: I hope those who failed the exam can take a makeup exam next week.
sentences.cn: 我希望考試不及格的人下周參加補考。

sentences.en: I think he is your inferior in manual dexterity.
sentences.cn: 我覺得論手巧，他不如你。

sentences.en: I want to use the equipment of our own manufacture.
sentences.cn: 我想用我們自己製造的設備。

sentences.en: It is good manners to visit the manufacturer first.
sentences.cn: 先拜訪製造商是有禮貌的表現。

sentences.en: It takes a lot of stamina to run in the marathon.
sentences.cn: 跑馬拉松很耗費體力。

sentences.en: I hope there is no margin of error in your plan.
sentences.cn: 我希望，你的計畫中不會有誤差幅度。

sentences.en: I think the girl has maturity beyond her years.
sentences.cn: 我覺得那個女孩過於老成。

sentences.en: It's impossible that the car exceed the maximum speed.
sentences.cn: 那輛車不可能超越極限速度。

sentences.en: I'm hoping to measure the cliff before climbing it.
sentences.cn: 我希望攀爬懸崖前能先丈量一下。

sentences.en: I hope I am paid by the month as a mechanic.
sentences.cn: 作為一名技工，我希望能按月領取工資。

sentences.en: Her smile is mechanical; she must be involved in the affair.
sentences.cn: 她笑得很勉強，一定是捲入了這件事中。

sentences.en: Feb. 13th was for me a memorable day because the lecture I attended that day had great influence on me.
sentences.cn: 對我來說，二月十三日是個值得紀念的日子，因為我那天聽的演講對我影響很大。

sentences.en: I hope the memorial meeting can be held in the open air.
sentences.cn: 我希望，那個追悼會能在戶外舉行。

sentences.en: You shouldn't show mercy to the beggar.
sentences.cn: 你不該憐憫那個乞丐。

sentences.en: It's a mere waste of time talking to him.
sentences.cn: 和他談話純粹是浪費時間。

sentences.en: I hope the boy who has merits in many aspects can become my boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 我希望，那個有很多優點的男孩能成為我的男朋友。

sentences.en: My letter was lost and the messenger should answer for the consequences.
sentences.cn: 我的信遺失了，那個送信人要對後果負責。

sentences.en: He must be in a messy spot now.
sentences.cn: 現在他一定是陷入了窘境。

sentences.en: It's inconceivable that the microscope was found under her bed.
sentences.cn: 這個顯微鏡最後在她床下找到了，太不可思議了。

sentences.en: I will give her a mild hint, hoping she will get it.
sentences.cn: 我會給她委婉的暗示，希望她能領會。

sentences.en: I couldn't hide my disappointment when I knew there was no mineral.
sentences.cn: 當我知道那裡沒有礦物時，我掩飾不住自己的失望。

cn: a: 最低的，最低限度的

sentences.en: The weather forecast says that the minimum temperature today is 2°C, so put on your down jacket when you go out.
sentences.cn: 天氣預報說，今天的最低氣溫是攝氏兩度，所以你外出時要穿上羽絨服。

sentences.en: I would contend that the minister is lying.
sentences.cn: 我倒是認為部長在撒謊。

sentences.en: I hope she can be on attachment to the Ministry of Defense from June 10th.
sentences.cn: 我希望從六月十日那天起，她能隸屬國防部。

sentences.en: Someone must have set the child on to do this piece of mischief.
sentences.cn: 一定是有人唆使那個孩子做這種胡鬧的事。

sentences.en: Talking of the past, I will feel miserable.
sentences.cn: 提起過去，我就覺得痛苦。

sentences.en: He may be the one hundred and eleventh person who is dogged by his misfortune.
sentences.cn: 他應該是第一百一十一個被不幸糾纏的人。

sentences.en: I don't want to see you are being misled by the man’s wiles.
sentences.cn: 我不希望你被那個男人的花言巧語蒙混。

sentences.en: I no longer fear that he would misunderstand me.
sentences.cn: 我不再害怕他會誤解我。

sentences.en: It's bad to drink, so remember to be more moderate in your drinking from now on.
sentences.cn: 喝酒不好，今後要記著適度飲酒。

sentences.en: I will remain modest even if I make a name for myself.
sentences.cn: 即使我出了名，也仍然會謙虛。

sentences.en: It is thought that modesty is a kind of virtue, but I don't think so.
sentences.cn: 人們認為謙虛是種美德，但是我不這麼認為。

sentences.en: It was miserable of you to steal the monitor.
sentences.cn: 你偷了螢幕器，真是可恥。

sentences.en: Is it convenient for you to come here monthly? I need your help.
sentences.cn: 你能每月來一次這裡嗎？我需要你的幫忙。

sentences.en: We should set up a monument in remembrance of the heroes.
sentences.cn: 我們應該建一座紀念碑來紀念那些英雄。

sentences.en: Moreover, to go beyond the shibboleth is good for yourself.
sentences.cn: 另外，擺脫那些陳規陋習，對你自己有好處。

sentences.en: It was mostly in this respect that I found she wasn't as perfect as I thought.
sentences.cn: 主要是在這個方面，我發現她不像我想的那麼完美。

sentences.en: You should motivate your students to study hard.
sentences.cn: 你應該激勵你的學生努力學習。

sentences.en: Is there any chance you could possibly tell me your motivation? I want to know it very much.
sentences.cn: 你有沒有可能告訴我，你的動機是什麼？我很想知道。

sentences.en: I am unwilling to tell others I lived in the backward mountainous areas in my early ages.
sentences.cn: 我不願告訴別人，我小時候生活在落後的山區。

sentences.en: I think that as you sow you shall mow.
sentences.cn: 我認為，付出就會有收穫。

sentences.en: Is there anything else that you want to know about MTV?
sentences.cn: 關於音樂電視，你還有別的想知道嗎？

sentences.en: This was the moment when I made up my mind to avoid the muddy road.
sentences.cn: 就是在這個時候，我決心要避開那條泥濘的道路。

sentences.en: I don't think she excels in multiple-choice questions.
sentences.cn: 我認為，她不擅長做複選題。

sentences.en: I hope the murderer will be put to death as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 我希望那個兇手儘快被處死。

sentences.en: I believe he will pay the extra taxes without a murmur.
sentences.cn: 我相信，他會毫無怨言地交附加稅。

sentences.en: I think there is no one but likes his mustache.
sentences.cn: 我想，沒有人會不喜歡他的小鬍子。

sentences.en: The little kingdom should confederate with other countries for mutual safety next year.
sentences.cn: 明年，這個小國應該與其他國家建立聯盟，以求共同的安全。

sentences.en: They describe the woman to be a mysterious person, so I want to see what she looks like very much.
sentences.cn: 他們把那個女人描繪得很神祕，所以我很想知道她長什麼樣。

sentences.en: I have no intention to give up climbing the Himalaya, namely the highest mountain in this area.
sentences.cn: 我不打算放棄爬喜馬拉雅山，也就是這個地區最高的山。

sentences.en: I hope these people of no nationality can live happily.
sentences.cn: 我希望，這些沒有國籍的人能快樂地生活。

sentences.en: No doubt the nearsighted man won't satisfy my boss.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，那個近視的人不會讓我的老闆滿意。

sentences.en: I deem that it is my duty to help the needy.
sentences.cn: 我認為，幫助窮人是我的責任。

sentences.en: I advise you not to neglect to visit your grandmother.
sentences.cn: 我建議你，別忘了去探望你的祖母。

sentences.en: You should negotiate with them and ask if they can lend us four hundred million dollars.
sentences.cn: 你該和他們協商一下，問問他們能否貸給我們四億美元。

sentences.en: I have an eye for music; nevertheless, I know nothing about this song.
sentences.cn: 我對音樂很有鑒賞力，但是對這首歌卻是一無所知。

sentences.en: Staying in the Cayman Islands was a total nightmare to me.
sentences.cn: 在開曼群島待的日子，對我來說，完全是一場噩夢。

sentences.en: What he said was all nonsense.
sentences.cn: 他全是在胡說。

sentences.en: It is indisputable that it's not right to use this noun here.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，在這裡用這個名詞是不對的。

sentences.en: Nowadays I am unwilling to wear my heart on my sleeves.
sentences.cn: 如今我不願意輕易流露自己的感情。

cn: 核心的，原子核的，原子能的

sentences.en: I won't tell others I am a strident advocate of applications of nuclear power.
sentences.cn: 我不會告訴別人，我是核能應用的堅定擁護者。

sentences.en: It's my duty to send numerous necessities to the disaster area.
sentences.cn: 把難以計數的生活用品送往災區，是我的責任。

sentences.en: I plan to start up a nursery near my house.
sentences.cn: 我打算在家附近開辦托兒所。

sentences.en: It's beyond doubt that nylon doesn’t knit up as well as pure wool.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，尼龍不像純羊毛那樣好織。

sentences.en: I can't make such a mob of blackguards act in obedience to my orders.
sentences.cn: 我無法讓這群惡棍遵照我的命令行動。

sentences.en: You should be absolutely obedient to your teachers.
sentences.cn: 你要絕對服從老師們。

sentences.en: How can you wave aside all our objections? You disappoint us.
sentences.cn: 你怎麼能全然不顧我們的反對？你讓我們感到失望。

sentences.en: I will give an objective evaluation towards his performance.
sentences.cn: 我會對他的表演給出客觀評價。

sentences.en: Please rest assured that I have good powers of observation.
sentences.cn: 請放心，我有很好的觀察力。

sentences.en: I feel pretty confident that all those obstacles are superable.
sentences.cn: 我很有信心，那些障礙都可以超越。

sentences.en: It is strictly forbidden to obtain information from the opponent in my company, but I don't care.
sentences.cn: 我們公司嚴禁從對手那裡獲取資訊，但是我並不在意。

sentences.en: I think it's the occasional accident that brought them together.
sentences.cn: 我認為，那次偶然的事故讓他們團結起來了。

sentences.en: People who have no fixed occupation are not allowed to enter my office.
sentences.cn: 沒有固定職業的人不許進我的辦公室。

sentences.en: You shouldn't have called upon workers to occupy the factory.
sentences.cn: 你不該號召工人佔領工廠。

sentences.en: To a great extent, your words offend him.
sentences.cn: 在很大程度上，你的話冒犯了他。

sentences.en: It was silly of you to take offense at him.
sentences.cn: 你為他發怒，真是愚蠢。

sentences.en: What he did last night was offensive to me.
sentences.cn: 他昨晚的所做作為讓我很不高興。

sentences.en: I don't want to be trained to be an expert in Taiwanese opera.
sentences.cn: 我不想被培養成歌仔戲的專家。

sentences.en: I hope the new law will come into operation in 2104.
sentences.cn: 我希望，新法律能在二一○四年生效。

sentences.en: Their parents oppose their marriage, which will make a strong impact on them, in my opinion.
sentences.cn: 在我的觀點來看，他們的父母反對他們的婚姻，會對他們有很大的影響。

sentences.en: It is a chance to practice your oral English.
sentences.cn: 這是你練習英語口說的機會。

sentences.en: I am afraid he will go into orbit if he knows the news.
sentences.cn: 我怕，如果他得知那個消息，會暴跳如雷。

sentences.en: I was tempted to conduct the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 我很想來指揮這個管弦樂隊。

sentences.en: I should like to know how bacteria decompose organic matter.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，細菌是如何使有機物腐爛的。

sentences.en: Take care a bit; otherwise I will smack you.
sentences.cn: 小心一點，否則我會揍你。

sentences.en: I was sitting on the thorns when I waited for the outcome yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天等待結果時，我如坐針氈。

sentences.en: Given the opportunity, I will become an outstanding singer.
sentences.cn: 如果給我機會，我會成為一位傑出的歌手。

sentences.en: It is well known to every one that the earth is oval, but I don't think so.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，地球是橢圓的，但是我不這麼想。

sentences.en: I was overcome with emotion when I saw him.
sentences.cn: 看到他，我很激動。

sentences.en: I don't know why he is incident to overlook her fault.
sentences.cn: 我不知道，他為什麼這麼輕易地寬容她的過錯。

sentences.en: I'm worried that he will come back suddenly, so I will stay awake overnight.
sentences.cn: 我擔心他會突然回來，所以我打算晚上不睡。

sentences.en: I was terrified out of my mind when he overtook me.
sentences.cn: 當他趕上我時，我嚇呆了。

sentences.en: They plot to overthrow the government and I want to report them to the police.
sentences.cn: 他們蓄謀推翻政府，我想向警察舉報他們。

sentences.en: We should load ourselves with water, food and oxygen equipment when we go into the cave.
sentences.cn: 我們進入那個洞穴時，要攜帶水、食物和氧氣設備。

sentences.en: Let's be fast to keep pace with him.
sentences.cn: 我們走快點，跟上他的速度。

sentences.en: I am disappointed by the news that the panel discussion is postponed to next week.
sentences.cn: 專題討論會延期至下周舉行，我很失望。

sentences.en: I would never dare to jump with a parachute without you accompanying.
sentences.cn: 沒有你的陪伴，我永遠也不敢跳傘。

sentences.en: I hope the substance of our talk can be condensed into a paragraph.
sentences.cn: 我希望，我們談話的要旨可以被壓縮成一段話。

sentences.en: I think the manager is always partial to his employees.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，那位經理總是偏袒自己的員工。

sentences.en: I can't believe there is widespread disillusionment with his participation in politics.
sentences.cn: 我不相信人們對他參政普遍感到失望。

sentences.en: I think it is wrong to choose the past participle for that question.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，那道題目選擇過去分詞是錯誤的。

sentences.en: You had better go into partnership with him.
sentences.cn: 你最好和他建立合作關係。

sentences.en: I hope I can take a passive role in the film.
sentences.cn: 我希望，我能在這部電影中扮演反派角色。

sentences.en: Have you thought of eating pasta for supper? I'd love to have it very much.
sentences.cn: 你有沒有想過晚餐吃義大利麵？我非常想吃。

sentences.en: He must have mistaken the egg for pebble.
sentences.cn: 他肯定是把那個雞蛋當作鵝卵石了。

sentences.en: I think this kind of dialect is peculiar to the area.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這種方言是這個地方特有的。

sentences.en: If you dare throw away the pedal, you must face the consequences of your action.
sentences.cn: 如果你敢扔掉那個踏板，就必須自食其果。

sentences.en: In my opinion, he gets on well with his peers.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，他與同輩相處得很好。

sentences.en: To add insult to injury, I suffered a penalty.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是，我受到了懲罰。

sentences.en: I estimate that the fire will reduced 10 percent of the houses to ashes.
sentences.cn: 我估計，大火會使百分之十的房屋化為灰燼。

sentences.en: I don't care about whether there are a small percentage of goods in the storage now.
sentences.cn: 無論現在倉庫裡是否有一小部分貨物，我並不感興趣。

sentences.en: I think the dress can show off your figure to perfection.
sentences.cn: 我認為，這件洋裝能恰到好處地顯示出你的身材。

sentences.en: I have no relish for buying perfume.
sentences.cn: 我對買香水不感興趣。

sentences.en: I suspect that the boss allows her to become the permanent employee of our company.
sentences.cn: 我懷疑，老闆會允許她成為我們公司的固定職員。

sentences.en: I think it won't take much persuasion to let the sales go away.
sentences.cn: 我認為，不用費什麼口舌就可以讓那業務員走開。

cn: 有說服力的，令人信服的

sentences.en: You shouldn't be sceptical about these persuasive reasons.
sentences.cn: 你不該懷疑這些有說服力的理由。

cn: 悲觀的，厭世的，悲觀主義的

sentences.en: I won't hear of his pessimistic views of work.
sentences.cn: 我不同意他對工作所持的悲觀看法。

sentences.en: I advise you to mark every petal with different colors.
sentences.cn: 我建議你為每一片花瓣都標記不同的顏色。

sentences.en: I have doubts about the unnormal phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 我對這種不正常的現象表示懷疑。

sentences.en: I take a pessimistic view of the philosopher's words.
sentences.cn: 我對那個哲學家的話持悲觀見解。

sentences.en: I think those philosophical views could serve as the guide of our behavior.
sentences.cn: 我認為，這些哲學思想可以作為我們行為的指導。

sentences.en: I believe you will find philosophy hard to learn at last.
sentences.cn: 到最後，我相信你會發現哲學很難學。

sentences.en: I can't wait to share with him my photography experience.
sentences.cn: 我迫不及待地想和他分享我的攝影經歷。

sentences.en: Most important of all, you should keep in good physical condition.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是，你得保持身體健康。

sentences.en: You had better seek help from the physician right away.
sentences.cn: 你應該立即向內科醫生尋求幫助。

cn: 物理學家，物理學研究者

sentences.en: I am doubtful the physicist isn't able to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 我懷疑，那個物理學家無法解決這個難題。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I'm not turned on by physics.
sentences.cn: 說實話，我對物理一點也不感興趣。

sentences.en: I wish to become a pianist when I grow up.
sentences.cn: 我希望長大後成為一名鋼琴家。

sentences.en: I foresee that the pickpocket will run away if we go near him.
sentences.cn: 我有預感，如果我們靠近那個小偷，他會逃跑。

sentences.en: I am proud of becoming the pioneer in the activity.
sentences.cn: 成為這次活動的先鋒，我感到很自豪。

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to be a pirate this time.
sentences.cn: 這次，作個海盜還是值得的。

sentences.en: The plentiful oil in this area was not my scene.
sentences.cn: 我對這個地區豐富的石油不感興趣。

sentences.en: I smell out a plot to assassinate the President and I want to call the police.
sentences.cn: 我發現了一個刺殺總統的陰謀，我想報警。

sentences.en: I'm uninterested in the article which contains a lot of plural nouns.
sentences.cn: 我對那篇包含有許多複數名詞的文章不感興趣。

sentences.en: When they assign you more projects, you don't have a chance to go home at 6 p.m.
sentences.cn: 當他們指派更多計畫給你的時候，你就沒有機會在下午六點回家了。

sentences.en: I felt angry after he gave me a poisonous look.
sentences.cn: 他惡意地看了我一眼後，我覺得很生氣。

sentences.en: You must polish up your English if you want to stay in the company.
sentences.cn: 如果你想留在公司，就得精進英語。

sentences.en: We're just talking about the environmental pollution of this city, and we don’t want to quarrel with you.
sentences.cn: 我們只是在討論這個城市的環境污染問題，不想和你吵架。

sentences.en: There are indications that my popularity is ebbing and I feel anxious.
sentences.cn: 有跡象表明，我的聲望正在下降，我感到很焦慮。

sentences.en: I need your help. When will it be convenient for you to repair my portable computer?
sentences.cn: 我需要你的幫忙。你什麼時候方便修理我的可攜式電腦？

sentences.en: I feel ashamed to tell others I worked as a porter before.
sentences.cn: 我羞於告訴他人，我以前作過搬運工。

sentences.en: I am angry that the film portrays him as a bad man.
sentences.cn: 電影把他描述成一個壞人，我很生氣。

sentences.en: I am possessed with the idea that he looks down upon me.
sentences.cn: 我總是有種感覺，他瞧不起我。

sentences.en: I think his factory is in possession of advanced manufacturing technology.
sentences.cn: 我覺得他的工廠擁有先進的製造技術。

sentences.en: To be precise, I don't like his way of speaking.
sentences.cn: 確切地說，我不喜歡他說話的方式。

sentences.en: It is hard to predict whether he will win the game.
sentences.cn: 很難預測出他是否會贏得比賽。

sentences.en: I think his suggestion is preferable to yours.
sentences.cn: 我認為他的建議比你的更好。

sentences.en: I am lukewarm about the news of her pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 我對她懷孕的消息不感興趣。

cn: 懷孕的，充滿的，意味深長的

sentences.en: I think her words are pregnant with meaning.
sentences.cn: 我認為她的言辭富有意義。

sentences.en: You'd better look up the preposition in the dictionary before you use it.
sentences.cn: 你用這個介系詞之前，最好先在字典裡查閱一下。

sentences.en: You should make sufficient preparation for the product presentation tonight.
sentences.cn: 你今晚應該為產品介紹做好充分的準備。

sentences.en: I think that picture is in good preservation in the museum.
sentences.cn: 我覺得那幅畫在博物館裡保存得很好。

sentences.en: In my opinion, you should preserve the animals from harm.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，你們應該保護這些動物免受傷害。

sentences.en: I think this kind of medicine played a role in the prevention of the illness.
sentences.cn: 我認為這種藥起了預防疾病的作用。

sentences.en: Out of question, this is the prime work we should do at present.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，這是我們當前要做的首要工作。

sentences.en: I think the stone implement can date from primitive society.
sentences.cn: 我認為這件石器可以追溯到原始社會。

sentences.en: He should be accused of infringing on their privacy.
sentences.cn: 他侵犯了他們的隱私，應該受到指責。

sentences.en: It is a great privilege to be allowed into the hall.
sentences.cn: 被允許進入這個大廳，真是難得的事。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the results show clearly that the procedure is wrong.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，結果充分說明這種程序是錯誤的。

sentences.en: I hope you can proceed with the introduction in a minute.
sentences.cn: 我希望等一下你繼續介紹。

sentences.en: I aim to increase the production levels next year.
sentences.cn: 明年，我的目標是提高生產水準。

cn: 生產的，富饒的，富有成效的

sentences.en: In my opinion, economic growth should be combined with productive forces.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，經濟發展應該與生產力相結合。

sentences.en: I hope you can treat teaching as your lifelong profession.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能把教學當做終身職業。

sentences.en: I don't plan to visit the professional athlete; please give my best wishes to him.
sentences.cn: 我不打算去拜訪那個職業運動員，請代我問候他。

sentences.en: I want to say that your behavior is unbefitting of a university professor.
sentences.cn: 我想說，你的行為與大學教授的身份不相符。

sentences.en: I make a decision to read some profitable books from now on.
sentences.cn: 我下定決心，從現在起要讀一些有益的書籍。

sentences.en: I think his suggestion can play a prominent role in our work.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，他的建議在我們的工作中能發揮顯著的作用。

sentences.en: Please don't hesitate to ask me about the physical condition of the promising young man.
sentences.cn: 隨時都不吝詢問我關於那個有為青年的健康狀況。

sentences.en: The news of her promotion came as a shock to me this morning.
sentences.cn: 今早，她升職的消息讓我吃驚。

sentences.en: I hope you are prompt to do your work.
sentences.cn: 我希望你立即開始做你的工作。

sentences.en: I want you to make a sentence with the pronoun.
sentences.cn: 我要你用這個代名詞造個句子。

sentences.en: I have to say that the pronunciation of the girl on the stage is terrible.
sentences.cn: 我不得不說，舞臺上那個女孩的發音很糟糕。

sentences.en: All of us should be thankful for her to make the company prosper again.
sentences.cn: 我們所有人都該感激她，使公司重新繁榮起來。

sentences.en: I think people's buying luxury goods is an index for the area’s prosperity.
sentences.cn: 我認為，人們購買奢侈商品是一個地區繁榮的標誌。

sentences.en: There are signs that the economy here is prosperous at present, but I think it won't last long.
sentences.cn: 有跡象表明，目前這個地區經濟繁榮，但是我認為這持續不了多久。

sentences.en: I ask her to eat less protein from now on.
sentences.cn: 我要求她從現在開始少吃些蛋白質。

sentences.en: I think your protest against him makes no sense.
sentences.cn: 我覺得你對他的反抗沒有任何意義。

sentences.en: She is a proverb for carelessness and I don't want to work with her.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道她的粗心，我不想和她一起工作。

sentences.en: I am disdainful of his psychological research.
sentences.cn: 我瞧不起他的心理學研究。

sentences.en: I think he is more a psychologist than a pathologist.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，與其說他是病理學家，不如說他是心理學家。

sentences.en: She must have had a background in social psychology.
sentences.cn: 她肯定受過社會心理學教育。

sentences.en: We should try our best to make a good job of publication.
sentences.cn: 我們應該盡最大的努力，做好出版工作。

sentences.en: I have no objection to publicity of the right kind.
sentences.cn: 我不反對正當的宣傳。

sentences.en: He threatened to publish a weighty refutation and I don't know what to do.
sentences.cn: 他威脅說要發表文章進行有分量的反駁，我不知道該怎麼辦。

sentences.en: It would be churlish to refuse the publisher's invitation.
sentences.cn: 拒絕那個出版社的邀請，未免失禮。

sentences.en: I don't like him because he is in pursuit of money and fame all the time.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡他，是因為他一直在追求金錢和名譽。

sentences.en: I don't want to comment on the news that a building collapsed in the quake yesterday.
sentences.cn: 那則新聞說有棟建築物在地震中倒塌，對此我不想評論。

sentences.en: I think being wrapped in a quilt will be better.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，裹在被子裡會好點。

sentences.en: With regard to the quotation, I will talk with you face to face.
sentences.cn: 關於報價，我會和你面談。

sentences.en: I think he will flow into a rage if you slap him.
sentences.cn: 如果你甩他巴掌，我想他會勃然大怒。

sentences.en: I hope I can live in an area which is abundant in rainfall.
sentences.cn: 我希望住在降雨量非常充足的地方。

sentences.en: We must be realistic about the problem.
sentences.cn: 我們必須實事求是地看待這個問題。

sentences.en: I think it's money that leads to his becoming a rebel.
sentences.cn: 我認為，是金錢導致他成了叛徒。

sentences.en: It is enough for me to recall these students' names.
sentences.cn: 回憶這些學生的名字，就夠我受了。

sentences.en: You'd better give a reception to the guests yourself.
sentences.cn: 你最好親自招待客人。

sentences.en: I agree in cooking dishes according to that recipe.
sentences.cn: 我同意按照那個食譜來做菜。

sentences.en: I do not doubt but that you can recite the article in two minutes.
sentences.cn: 我相信你能在兩分鐘內把文章背下來。

sentences.en: I think you will change beyond recognition after putting on make-up.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，你化妝後肯定會大變，讓人難以認出。

sentences.en: I am confident in your early recovery.
sentences.cn: 我相信你會早日康復。

sentences.en: I think where there is recreation, there is happiness.
sentences.cn: 我認為，哪裡有消遣，哪裡就有快樂。

sentences.en: I plan to recycle those beer cans in future.
sentences.cn: 我打算以後回收那些啤酒罐。

sentences.en: You can't expect me to approve of the reduction during the Spring Festival.
sentences.cn: 你別指望我贊成春節時降價。

sentences.en: I hope you won't refer yourself to others.
sentences.cn: 我希望你不要求助於他人。

sentences.en: Well, my words are only for your reference.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我的話僅供你參考。

sentences.en: I hope you can reflect on my suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能仔細考慮一下我的建議。

sentences.en: I hope you made your decision on reflection.
sentences.cn: 我希望你是經過了再三考慮才做出決定。

sentences.en: I believe we will succeed in our reform.
sentences.cn: 我相信我們的改革會成功。

sentences.en: I want to have a cup of coffee to refresh myself.
sentences.cn: 我想喝杯咖啡提神。

sentences.en: We should offer help to these poor refugees.
sentences.cn: 我們應該向這些可憐的難民提供幫助。

sentences.en: I bet he cares nothing for my refusal.
sentences.cn: 我打賭，他不在意我的拒絕。

sentences.en: I think he can provide better resolution for us regarding this problem.
sentences.cn: 我想，關於這個問題，他能為我們提供更好的解決辦法。

sentences.en: I hope you can queue up to register.
sentences.cn: 我希望你們能排隊登記。

sentences.en: I think your marriage without registration won't be recognized by them.
sentences.cn: 我覺得他們不會承認你們未登記的婚姻。

sentences.en: I favour the idea that they should regulate the traffic.
sentences.cn: 他們應該管制交通，我贊成這個觀點。

sentences.en: I require that the regulation allow of no variation.
sentences.cn: 我要求這個規則不得改變。

sentences.en: I am afraid of her rejection to my proposal all the time.
sentences.cn: 一直以來，我都害怕她拒絕我的求婚。

sentences.en: I think the knife is relative to the murder.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這把刀和這件謀殺案有關。

sentences.en: I advise you to keep a balance between relaxation and work.
sentences.cn: 我建議你在消遣和工作之間要保持平衡。

sentences.en: I don't know how to relieve him from his pain.
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎樣才能讓他擺脫痛苦。

sentences.en: I am reluctant to give suck to the baby.
sentences.cn: 我不願意為那個嬰兒餵奶。

sentences.en: I would certainly disdain to remark on his picture.
sentences.cn: 我當然不願意評論他的畫。

cn: 值得注意的，卓越的，顯著的

sentences.en: It's remarkable that his tongue can touch his nose.
sentences.cn: 他的舌頭能觸碰到鼻子，真是不尋常。

sentences.en: Your only remedy is to go and ask him for help.
sentences.cn: 你唯一的補救辦法是去向他求助。

sentences.en: Let there be no repetition of such foolish questions.
sentences.cn: 別再問這種愚蠢的問題了。

sentences.en: You should make a representation to your boss why you are late.
sentences.cn: 你得向老闆說明為什麼遲到。

sentences.en: I don't want to have a reputation for eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 我不想以行為古怪而出名。

sentences.en: I will brave death to rescue these people.
sentences.cn: 我會冒著生命危險去這些人。

sentences.en: I hope to research into the problem with you.
sentences.cn: 我希望和你一起研究這個問題。

sentences.en: I think it is an unexpected turn for the researcher.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這對那個研究者來說，是個出乎意料的轉捩點。

sentences.en: I hope my baby will resemble his father in look.
sentences.cn: 我希望我的孩子長得像他父親。

sentences.en: I want her to make a reservation in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我想要她在那家餐廳訂位。

sentences.en: She shouldn't resign to her fate.
sentences.cn: 她不該聽天由命。

sentences.en: I will hand in my resignation letter to the boss tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天，我會將辭職信交給老闆。

sentences.en: I perceive that you are not very satisfied with the resistance of the crowd.
sentences.cn: 我明白你對群眾的抵抗不甚滿意。

sentences.en: I make a resolution not to get in touch with her in future.
sentences.cn: 我決心以後再也不和她聯繫。

sentences.en: I think it's up to me to resolve this problem.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這個問題應由我來解決。

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, I think she is a respectable artist.
sentences.cn: 事實上，我認為她是一位值得尊敬的藝術家。

sentences.en: You shouldn't look at the hypocrite with respectful eyes.
sentences.cn: 你們不該用恭敬的眼光看那個偽君子。

sentences.en: I think this medicine will restore you to health soon.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這種藥能讓你儘快恢復健康。

sentences.en: You will find out some disadvantage about trade restriction in the future.
sentences.cn: 以後，你們會發現貿易限制的一些弊端。

sentences.en: I will do my utmost to retain the active and optimistic mentality.
sentences.cn: 我將會盡力保持積極樂觀的心態。

sentences.en: I have quite a disinclination to retire from the factory.
sentences.cn: 我很不情願從工廠退休。

sentences.en: I hope she will be elected as the responsible person of the retirement community next year.
sentences.cn: 我希望明年她會當選為退休社區的負責人。

sentences.en: I am afraid we will be forced to retreat.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我們不得不撤退。

sentences.en: I am sure you will be welcomed back to the reunion by them.
sentences.cn: 我確信他們會歡迎你回來團聚。

sentences.en: I am afraid the criminal will take revenge on the police.
sentences.cn: 我擔心罪犯會對警察實施報復。

sentences.en: In light of these factors, we have to revise the plan.
sentences.cn: 鑒於這些因素，我們不得不修改這項計畫。

sentences.en: At any rate, the plan you made last night needs revision.
sentences.cn: 不管怎樣，昨晚你制定的那個計畫需要加以修訂。

sentences.en: I believe the revolution will be quickly snuffed out.
sentences.cn: 我相信那場革命會被迅速鎮壓。

sentences.en: I want to cry at the mention of the revolutionary struggle.
sentences.cn: 一提到革命鬥爭，我就想哭。

sentences.en: I think it is within my power to reward her for that.
sentences.cn: 我想我有權為那件事獎勵她。

sentences.en: In my opinion, meter and rhyme are assistants to your memory.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，押韻和格律有助於你記憶。

sentences.en: I'm concerned that the boy has no sense of rhythm.
sentences.cn: 我擔心那個男孩沒有任何節奏感。

sentences.en: I hear about the romance between them and want to do something for them.
sentences.cn: 我聽說過他們之間的浪漫史，很想為他們做點什麼。

sentences.en: He shoved aside the pregnant woman roughly.
sentences.cn: 他把那個孕婦粗暴地推到了一邊。

sentences.en: I want to take an indirect route in an attempt to kill the time.
sentences.cn: 我想繞路走，以消磨時間。

sentences.en: I think it's playing computer games that results in his ruin.
sentences.cn: 我認為玩電腦遊戲導致了他的毀滅。

sentences.en: I like his book which has a strong flavour of rural life.
sentences.cn: 他那本書有濃郁的農村生活氣息，我很喜歡。

sentences.en: You shouldn't get a promotion at the sacrifice of your health.
sentences.cn: 你不該以犧牲健康為代價來獲得升職。

sentences.en: I hope the manager can make an adjustment in my salary.
sentences.cn: 我希望經理能對我的薪水作出調整。

sentences.en: It's contemptible of the saleswoman to inveigle the girl into buying four coats.
sentences.cn: 女店員誘騙那個女孩買了四件外套，真卑鄙。

sentences.en: I don't believe that the salesperson used to make a living by begging.
sentences.cn: 我不相信這個售貨員曾經以乞討為生。

sentences.en: I hope you can give attention to the information of the satellite.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能關注關於衛星的資訊。

sentences.en: I want all of you to leave with satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 我要你們每個人都滿意地離開。

sentences.en: I scarcely knew how to deal with the problem at that time.
sentences.cn: 那時我幾乎不知道要如何處理那個問題。

sentences.en: They must be fascinated by the beautiful rural scenery.
sentences.cn: 美麗的農村風光肯定會讓他們著迷。

sentences.en: I am very angry with him and want to scold him.
sentences.cn: 我很生他的氣，想責罵他。

sentences.en: I hope you can scratch your head for a solution to the question.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能好好思索，找出問題的答案。

sentences.en: I don't want to get hold of the screwdriver because it’s too cold.
sentences.cn: 我不想抓住這把螺絲起子了，太過冰冷。

sentences.en: I bet they will marvel at the sculpture of Venus.
sentences.cn: 我打賭，他們會對這座維納斯雕像驚嘆。

sentences.en: I hope the dog to stop barking at the seagull.
sentences.cn: 我希望那隻狗不要再對著海鷗叫。

sentences.en: In respect of the age, I think I am senior to him.
sentences.cn: 論年齡，我覺得我比他年長。

sentences.en: I think these settlers' families can be traced back to 1805.
sentences.cn: 我認為這些定居者的家族可以追溯到一八○五年。

sentences.en: I am afflicted with a severe headache and want to go to hospital.
sentences.cn: 我正承受著嚴重的頭疼，想去醫院。

sentences.en: I think it is shameful to sponge on my girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 我覺得依靠女朋友接濟很可恥。

sentences.en: I am eager to chatter up with the handsome shaver.
sentences.cn: 我急於和那個帥氣的理髮師搭訕。

sentences.en: I am unwilling to give shelter to them.
sentences.cn: 我不願意給他們提供住宿。

sentences.en: I am pleased to lend you a hand to shift the stone.
sentences.cn: 我很高興幫你搬石頭。

sentences.en: It's very shortsighted of you to give up this opportunity.
sentences.cn: 你放棄這個機會，真是目光短淺。

sentences.en: I believe she can shrug off the unfair criticism.
sentences.cn: 我相信她不會理睬這不公平的批評。

cn: n: 短程接駁車，太空梭，梭子

sentences.en: I say ditto to his idea about the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 我贊成他關於太空梭的觀點。

sentences.en: I feel it very shameful to have no money to do any sightseeing.
sentences.cn: 沒錢去旅遊，我覺得很丟臉。

sentences.en: I think the signature isn't contemporaneous with the document.
sentences.cn: 我覺得簽名和文件不是同時完成的。

sentences.en: The speech has little significance for me.
sentences.cn: 這個演講對我沒什麼意義。

sentences.en: To tell you the truth, I was deeply touched by her sincerity.
sentences.cn: 和你說實話，我被她的真誠深深感動。

sentences.en: He must have impressed the girl with his singular appearance.
sentences.cn: 他那奇特的外貌一定給女孩留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.en: I believe the man will give you the chance to find the site.
sentences.cn: 我相信那個人會給你們機會找到那個位置。

sentences.en: I want to take that sketch map as an example to show you how to do the work.
sentences.cn: 我想以那張概略圖為例，來向你們展示怎麼工作。

sentences.en: I have had enough of the old sledge and I want a new one.
sentences.cn: 我受夠了那個舊雪橇，想買個新的。

sentences.en: I think the sleigh brims over with their hope.
sentences.cn: 我想那個雪橇載滿了她們的希望。

sentences.en: Maybe he has slight knowledge on the new subject.
sentences.cn: 或許，他對這門新學科略通一二。

sentences.en: I believe the tutor will think highly of the slogan.
sentences.cn: 我相信教練會高度評價這個口號。

sentences.en: Under the cover of the smog, you can approach the enemy secretly.
sentences.cn: 在煙霧的掩護下，你可以悄悄地接近敵人。

sentences.en: I was shy of making a sneeze suddenly at dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃飯時我突然打了個噴嚏，我覺得很難為情。

sentences.en: I am fed up with the woman who is sobbing out the whole event.
sentences.cn: 我受夠那個正在哭訴整個事件的女人。

sentences.en: I think this kind of battery charger can plug into any socket.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這種電池充電器可以插入任何類型的電源插座。

sentences.en: I hope you can take charge of the software engineering of our company.
sentences.cn: 我希望你可以負責我們公司的軟體工程。

cn: 太陽的，日光的，太陽能的

sentences.en: It's good that we can make use of solar energy to generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 我們能利用太陽能來發電，真是太好了。

sentences.en: Maybe the girl who is good at painting is in her sophomore year.
sentences.cn: 或許那個擅長畫畫的女孩在讀大二。

sentences.en: It was a sorrowful day for all of us.
sentences.cn: 對於我們所有人來說，這都是個悲傷的日子。

sentences.en: I think the souvenir can go back to my grandmother's childhood.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這個紀念品可以追溯到我奶奶的童年。

sentences.en: I will mend the door in my spare time.
sentences.cn: 我會在閒暇時間修理那扇門。

sentences.en: I think the spark is symbolic of hope.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這火花象徵著希望。

sentences.en: If you tell him the good news, I believe his eyes will sparkle with excitement.
sentences.cn: 如果你告訴他那個好消息，我相信他的眼睛會閃耀著激動的光芒。

sentences.en: I am worried about the injured sparrow.
sentences.cn: 我擔心這隻受傷的麻雀。

sentences.en: I was unwilling to catch fish with my spear.
sentences.cn: 我不願意用長矛來捕魚。

sentences.en: I think this species is almost indistinguishable from that one.
sentences.cn: 我覺得，這個物種和那個物種幾乎無法區分。

sentences.en: I am indisposed to have spicy food.
sentences.cn: 我不願意吃辛辣食物。

sentences.en: I fancy that she regards her father as her spiritual pillar.
sentences.cn: 我猜她把父親當作自己的精神支柱。

sentences.en: You should keep on working and get splendid achievement.
sentences.cn: 你應該堅持工作，取得輝煌的成就。

sentences.en: I plan to split up with my wife next month.
sentences.cn: 我打算下個月與妻子離婚。

sentences.en: I wonder why he lays no claim to being a sportsman.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，他為什麼不以運動員自居。

sentences.en: All of the athletes should carry forward the sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 所有運動員都要發揚體育精神。

sentences.en: I think women in your country have very little status.
sentences.cn: 我覺得你們國家的女人沒有什麼地位。

sentences.en: I wonder if I can chop off these branches from the stem.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，我是否可以把這些樹枝從枝幹上砍掉。

sentences.en: Don't be so stingy with the money when your mother is ill.
sentences.cn: 當你媽媽病了，用錢不要那樣吝嗇。

sentences.en: I intend to strengthen the reserve force in the face of the powerful enemy.
sentences.cn: 大敵當前，我打算加強後備力量。

sentences.en: In any case, you must strive for your future.
sentences.cn: 無論如何，你都必須為你的未來而奮鬥。

sentences.en: I hope you can give the little dog a gentle stroke.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能輕輕撫摸那隻小狗。

sentences.en: I am afraid I can't fix the position on the submarine which submerges in the water.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕無法為那艘潛入水中的潛水艇定位。

sentences.en: I bridled at the suggestion that he made.
sentences.cn: 我瞧不起他提出的建議。

sentences.en: It will be useful to summarize the main idea of this text for us.
sentences.cn: 總結這篇課文的中心思想，對我們會有用。

sentences.en: Believe it or not, I don't want to go surfing with him.
sentences.cn: 信不信由你，我不想和他一起去衝浪。

sentences.en: I have no doubt that the surgeon is expert in treating leg disease.
sentences.cn: 我毫不懷疑這位軍醫擅長治療腿部疾病。

sentences.en: I require that the doctor give a surgery to my son right away.
sentences.cn: 我要求醫生立即為我兒子做手術。

sentences.en: To tell you the truth, I will never surrender to her.
sentences.cn: 和你說實話吧，我永遠不會屈服於她。

sentences.en: You should acclimatize yourself to the new surroundings as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 你應該儘快適應新環境。

sentences.en: I am suspicious about the motive of the man over there.
sentences.cn: 我懷疑那邊那個人的動機。

sentences.en: I fear that he is under the sway of bad men.
sentences.cn: 我擔心他受到壞人的支配。

sentences.en: You should give stress to the third syllable.
sentences.cn: 你應該重讀第三個音節。

sentences.en: I am very sympathetic to the poor orphan.
sentences.cn: 我很同情這個可憐的孤兒。

sentences.en: I have no sympathy for you.
sentences.cn: 我不同情你。

sentences.en: I can't work up much enthusiasm for the symphony.
sentences.cn: 我對這首交響樂不感興趣。

sentences.en: I want him to pass me the cough syrup.
sentences.cn: 我想讓他把止咳糖漿遞給我。

sentences.en: I think she should add some systematic knowledge to her thesis.
sentences.cn: 我認為她應該在她的論文中加入一些系統知識。

sentences.en: You can borrow money from him; he has money on tap.
sentences.cn: 你可以向他借錢，他手頭有錢。

sentences.en: I was greatly astonished that technician can't solve this problem.
sentences.cn: 技術員不能解決這個難題，我覺得很吃驚。

sentences.en: I am firmly persuaded that technological progress will accelerate the pace of the life.
sentences.cn: 我堅信科技進步將會加快生活節奏。

sentences.en: He could not make sense of the telegram.
sentences.cn: 他無法理解這封電報的意思。

sentences.en: I guess she heard on the bush telegraph that he will resign.
sentences.cn: 我猜她得到了他要辭職的小道消息。

sentences.en: I put no trust in his theory about the telescope.
sentences.cn: 我不相信他那關於望遠鏡的理論。

sentences.en: I have a suspicion that he has a tendency to autosadism.
sentences.cn: 我懷疑他有自虐傾向。

sentences.en: I think she is tense with expectancy.
sentences.cn: 我想她是因期待而神經緊張。

sentences.en: I am not clear about how to dispel my tension mood.
sentences.cn: 我不知道該怎樣消除自己的緊張情緒。

sentences.en: I think the little girl will be terrified to burst into tears.
sentences.cn: 我覺得小女孩會被嚇得大哭起來。

sentences.en: A snake is a terror to me.
sentences.cn: 蛇對我來說很可怕。

sentences.en: I plan to give a talk on the theme of teenage crime.
sentences.cn: 我打算就青少年犯罪這個主題做一次報告。

sentences.en: I think she has made a very thorough analysis on the situation.
sentences.cn: 我覺得她對形勢的分析很透徹。

sentences.en: I want to make friends with the girl who is thoughtful for others.
sentences.cn: 我想和那個對人很體貼的女孩做朋友。

sentences.en: Your girlfriend comes across as a timid girl.
sentences.cn: 你女朋友看上去像是個膽小的女孩。

sentences.en: It would be too tiresome to eat in a restaurant without a waiter.
sentences.cn: 在沒有服務生的餐廳裡吃飯真是討厭。

sentences.en: Her mother shows that her behavior is tolerable, but I am fed up with her.
sentences.cn: 她母親表示她的行為是可以容忍的，但是我受夠她了。

sentences.en: I have no tolerance for his bad temper.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍他的壞脾氣。

sentences.en: You should be tolerant of youngsters.
sentences.cn: 你該對年輕人寬容一些。

sentences.en: I could not tolerate eating in my class.
sentences.cn: 我無法容忍有人在我的課堂上吃東西。

sentences.en: I shiver at the idea that I have to sleep in front of the tomb.
sentences.cn: 一想到要在墳前睡覺，我就害怕。

sentences.en: Under the circumstances, I have to make a tough decision.
sentences.cn: 在這種情況下，我不得不做出一個艱難的決定。

sentences.en: Maybe the tragedy will leave a scar on my mind forever.
sentences.cn: 或許，這場災難會給我留下永遠的精神創傷。

sentences.en: I think it's tragic that he died at the age of eighteen.
sentences.cn: 他十八歲時去世，我覺得十分可悲。

sentences.en: I won't agree that you transfer your property to your lover.
sentences.cn: 我不會同意你將財產轉讓給情人。

sentences.en: I bet that he will transform into a poor wretch overnight.
sentences.cn: 我打賭，他會在一夜之間變成窮光蛋。

sentences.en: You must make efforts to translate the article into English.
sentences.cn: 你必須努力把這篇文章譯為英語。

sentences.en: I advise you to be deep in translation during these two hours.
sentences.cn: 我建議你在這兩個小時期間專心於翻譯。

sentences.en: I hate translating since I get a handle on the beautiful translator.
sentences.cn: 自從對那個漂亮的翻譯者有所瞭解後，我就很討厭翻譯。

sentences.en: I am afraid the transportation will be at a standstill soon.
sentences.cn: 我擔心交通很快會癱瘓。

sentences.en: I think this will relieve him of a tremendous burden.
sentences.cn: 我想這將為他解決一個巨大的負擔。

sentences.en: He must be proficient in several tribal lingoes.
sentences.cn: 他肯定精通幾種部族語言。

sentences.en: I believe you will triumph at length.
sentences.cn: 我相信你們最終會勝利。

sentences.en: I'm not really into accepting the troublesome job.
sentences.cn: 我真不想接受那個討厭的工作。

sentences.en: I volunteer to take part in the tug-of-war.
sentences.cn: 我自願參加拔河比賽。

sentences.en: I feel disappointed that the meteor disappeared in a twinkle of an eye.
sentences.cn: 眨眼間那顆流星就不見了，我很失望。

sentences.en: I want to recommend Jim as a typist.
sentences.cn: 我想推薦吉姆作打字員。

sentences.en: Please tell me where the exit of this underpass is and I will be grateful to you.
sentences.cn: 請告訴我，這個地下通道的出口在哪裡，我會很感激你的。

sentences.en: I think his style of painting is unique to mine.
sentences.cn: 我認為他的繪畫風格和我的不同。

sentences.en: I think she is quite at home with English, which is called the universal language.
sentences.cn: 我認為她對被稱為世界語言的英語很熟悉。

sentences.en: I want to know why this hospital is affiliated with the local university.
sentences.cn: 我想知道這家醫院為什麼附屬於當地大學。

sentences.en: I have no heart for uploading the photos.
sentences.cn: 我沒有心思上傳照片。

sentences.en: I think the big supermarkets are concentrated in the urban centers.
sentences.cn: 我認為大超市集中在市中心。

sentences.en: I have an urge to go on board as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 我希望儘快登機。

sentences.en: I'm not in the right frame of mind to play because he is in urgent need of help.
sentences.cn: 他急需幫助，我沒心思玩耍。

sentences.en: I think the word has come into usage.
sentences.cn: 我認為這個單字已為大家所慣用。

sentences.en: It is vain to try to persuade him.
sentences.cn: 試圖說服他是沒有用的。

sentences.en: I believe he will make vast improvement in English.
sentences.cn: 我相信他的英語會有很大進步。

sentences.en: It sounds funny to me that he is a vegetarian.
sentences.cn: 他是個素食者，這讓我覺得很可笑。

sentences.en: In my opinion, the verb should be followed by a noun.
sentences.cn: 我認為這個動詞後面要接名詞。

sentences.en: I am very annoyed with him about his carelessness.
sentences.cn: 我對他的粗心大意非常惱火。

sentences.en: I want you to pour some liquid into the vessel.
sentences.cn: 我想讓你倒一些液體到容器裡。

sentences.en: You have to mix vinegar with other condiments together.
sentences.cn: 你得將醋與其他佐料混合在一起。

sentences.en: You can't violate the company’s rules at will, or you will get punishment.
sentences.cn: 你不能任意地違反公司規定，不然你會受到懲罰。

sentences.en: I think his behavior has been in violation of the law.
sentences.cn: 我認為他的行為已經違反了法律的規定。

sentences.en: I will keep an eye on the virgin voyage of that ship.
sentences.cn: 我會關注那艘輪船的處女航。

sentences.en: This pair of trousers has the virtue of durability.
sentences.cn: 這條褲子有耐穿的優點。

sentences.en: I want to keep my computer from being attacked by new viruses.
sentences.cn: 我想讓我的電腦不受新型病毒的攻擊。

cn: 視覺的，視力的，看得見的

sentences.en: I am overwhelmed with delight when I see the film has excellent visual effects.
sentences.cn: 看到這部影片有著極好的視覺效果時，我高興極了。

sentences.en: It is vital that you sign your name on the document.
sentences.cn: 你在文件上簽字是至關重要的。

sentences.en: I think it is most risky to approach an active volcano.
sentences.cn: 我認為靠近一座活火山是非常危險的。

sentences.en: I feel so good to do voluntary work in the orphanage.
sentences.cn: 在孤兒院做義工，我覺得很好。

sentences.en: I hope he volunteers for the military service.
sentences.cn: 我希望他自願去當兵。

sentences.en: It burns me up when he pronounces the vowel wrongly.
sentences.cn: 他讀錯那個母音時，我很生氣。

sentences.en: You had better make your will preparatory to your voyage.
sentences.cn: 你最好在出航前立下遺囑。

sentences.en: I think walnuts are a local specialty in his hometown.
sentences.cn: 我覺得核桃是他家鄉的特產。

sentences.en: It really made me angry when I found the information on the website.
sentences.cn: 在網上發現這個消息的時候，我真的很生氣。

cn: a: 每周的，一周一次的

sentences.en: I hope you can write to your parents weekly.
sentences.cn: 我希望你每周給父母寫一封信。

sentences.en: I think the welfare of the workers is bound up with the benefits of the factory.
sentences.cn: 我認為工人們的福利與工廠的效益密切相關。

sentences.en: I don't think he is a man of little wit.
sentences.cn: 我認為他不是個頭腦簡單的人。

sentences.en: I was curious how the witch cast a spell on the girl.
sentences.cn: 我很好奇，女巫是怎樣對小女孩施妖術的。

sentences.en: They will withdraw if they run out of ammunition.
sentences.cn: 他們用完彈藥就會撤退。

sentences.en: I think there is not a vestige of truth in that witness's statement.
sentences.cn: 我認為那個證人的證詞沒有絲毫真實性。

sentences.en: I was devastated by the news of his death in the wreck.
sentences.cn: 獲悉他在此次失事中去世的消息，我十分震驚。

sentences.en: I hate to see that you wrinkle your forehead.
sentences.cn: 我討厭看你皺眉。

sentences.en: I think your yearly payroll goes hand in hand with your capacity for work.
sentences.cn: 我認為你的年薪與你的工作能力密切相關。

sentences.en: In my opinion, yogurt is a perfectly acceptable substitute for cream in cooking.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，優酪乳是烹飪時特別受歡迎的奶油替代品。

cn: 年輕的，青年的，有青春活力的

sentences.en: No matter what happens, I will try my best to keep youthful.
sentences.cn: 無論如何，我都要盡最大努力保持年輕。

sentences.en: The salesgirl should abide such terrible conditions; it is really beyond me.
sentences.cn: 那個女售貨員竟然能夠忍受這樣糟糕的環境，我真的想不通。

sentences.en: It's supposed that the tax on the products should be abolished.
sentences.cn: 據推測，這種產品的稅收應當廢除。

sentences.en: It's said that she had an abortion last week.
sentences.cn: 據說，她上周做了流產手術。

sentences.en: The customer took an abrupt departure just now.
sentences.cn: 剛才，那個顧客突然走掉了。

cn: 不合理的，荒唐的，可笑的

sentences.en: It's indeed absurd of you to buy such an expensive pen.
sentences.cn: 你買這麼貴的鋼筆，真是荒唐。

sentences.en: There is an abundant supply of fruit in the new supermarket.
sentences.cn: 新開那家超市供應大量的水果。

cn: 高等教育，學院，專科學校

sentences.en: The writer was said to be a graduate of an art academy.
sentences.cn: 據說，那位作家畢業於一所藝術學院。

sentences.en: It takes a while for the old man to accustom himself to the new living conditions.
sentences.cn: 那名老先生用了一段時間來適應新的居住環境。

sentences.en: The man in trouble must have an ace up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 那個處於困境中的男子必定有什麼祕密王牌。

sentences.en: She alone refuses to acknowledge the need for sales promotion.
sentences.cn: 只有她拒絕承認促銷活動的必要性。

sentences.en: The product contains the effective anti-acne essence of tea trees.
sentences.cn: 這種產品含有高效抗痘茶樹精華。

sentences.en: Just imagine her surprise on seeing the vice-admiral in the mall.
sentences.cn: 想想看，在購物中心看到那位海軍中將，她是多麼驚訝。

sentences.en: Boys during adolescence seldom like going shopping with their mother.
sentences.cn: 很少有青春期的男生喜歡和媽媽一起去買東西。

cn: a: 青春期的，青少年的

sentences.en: The adolescent girl feels like buying that simple dress without adornment.
sentences.cn: 那個少女想要買那件樸素毫無裝飾的洋裝。

sentences.en: The little girl simply adores buying toys.
sentences.cn: 那個小女孩十分喜歡買玩具。

sentences.en: Regretfully, the millionaire became addicted to tobaccos in adulthood.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，那位百萬富翁在成年時期染上了菸癮。

cn: 廣告客戶，刊登廣告的人

sentences.en: If you'd like to, you can refer to the telephone directory to find the advertiser’s number.
sentences.cn: 如果你想，可以從電話簿上找到那個廣告客戶的號碼。

sentences.en: The teacher was held in great affection by those children.
sentences.cn: 那個老師很受那些孩子們喜歡。

sentences.en: As a reputed company, quality should be put always at the top of the agenda.
sentences.cn: 作為一家信譽良好的公司，品質始終都應當是最重要的議題。

sentences.en: Whether to buy the dress or not, the woman was in an agony of indecision.
sentences.cn: 是否要買那件洋裝，那位女士陷入了猶豫不決的痛苦中。

sentences.en: The little town's economy mainly depends on agricultural products.
sentences.cn: 這個小鎮的經濟主要是依靠農產品銷售。

sentences.en: It is generally acknowledged that artificial intelligence has been commonly used in the intelligent robots research.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，人工智慧被廣泛應用於智慧型機器人研究。

cn: 密閉的，密封的，無懈可擊的

sentences.en: The salesman wanted the cake to keep crisp, so he put it in an airtight container.
sentences.cn: 售貨員想讓餅乾保持脆度，所以把它放在密封的容器中。

sentences.en: The sales manager suffered from an inflammation of the airways.
sentences.cn: 那位銷售經理氣管發炎了。

sentences.en: The salesman made the customers rolling in the aisles.
sentences.cn: 售貨員逗得顧客們捧腹大笑。

sentences.en: As for a salesman, it's not necessary to be good at algebra.
sentences.cn: 對於一名推銷員而言，精通代數並不是必要條件。

sentences.en: These unspoken rules in the marketing are alien to her nature.
sentences.cn: 行銷業的潛規則與她的本性不符。

sentences.en: She wants to buy a pet cat, but her mother is allergic to cats.
sentences.cn: 她想買一隻寵物貓，但是，她媽媽對貓過敏。

sentences.en: The three-month-old baby has an allergy to some milk products.
sentences.cn: 那個三個月大的嬰兒對某些乳製品過敏。

sentences.en: Her sister wants an alligator handbag, but her family couldn't afford it.
sentences.cn: 她妹妹想要個鱷魚皮手提包，可是，她家裡卻負擔不起費用。

sentences.en: The salesgirl found an ally against the inhumane shopkeeper.
sentences.cn: 那位女店員找到了對抗不近人情的店主的盟友。

sentences.en: Property prices have slightly altered in these two months.
sentences.cn: 這兩個月的房地產價格有些輕微的變化。

sentences.en: There is a pattern of alternate circles and squares on the wrapping paper.
sentences.cn: 包裝紙上有一種圓形和方形相間的圖案。

sentences.en: The boy is crying for the tree growing at an altitude of one thousand meters.
sentences.cn: 那男孩哭喊著想要的是生長在海拔一千公尺處的那種樹木。

sentences.en: Well, these biscuits should be ample for you two.
sentences.cn: 好吧，這些餅乾應該夠你們兩個吃了。

sentences.en: It's believed that the exchange rate can serve as an anchor in inflation control.
sentences.cn: 人們相信，在通貨膨脹管控中，匯率可以發揮作用。

sentences.en: It's suggested that the anthem should be played to mark the open of the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 有人提議，奏聖歌來慶祝超市開業。

sentences.en: The old couple hesitated over whether to buy the antique mahogany table or not.
sentences.cn: 那對老夫婦猶豫是否要買那張紅木古桌。

sentences.en: They all applaud her decision to launch promotion activities.
sentences.cn: 他們都贊同她開展促銷活動的決定。

sentences.en: The customers broke into thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 顧客們爆發出雷鳴般的掌聲。

cn: 貼切的，有⋯傾向的，靈敏的

sentences.en: The salesman seems to be apt at communicating with customers.
sentences.cn: 這個推銷員似乎很善於和顧客打交道。

sentences.en: I wonder whether you have any objection to the architect's plan for the new shopping center.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，對於這位設計師的新建購物中心設計圖，你們是否有反對意見。

sentences.en: I'm deeply impressed by the classical architecture of the commercial street.
sentences.cn: 商業街的古典建築風格令我印象深刻。

sentences.en: This is the largest indoor sports arena in the town.
sentences.cn: 這是這個城鎮上最大的室內體育場。

sentences.en: It's said that a suit of armor of the general will be sold by auction.
sentences.cn: 據說，那位將軍的一套盔甲將被拍賣。

sentences.en: There is a long flight of stairs ascending to the entrance of the mall.
sentences.cn: 要走過長長的臺階，才能到達這個購物中心的入口處。

sentences.en: She made an ass of herself—realizing that she left her purse at home at the checkout.
sentences.cn: 她做了件傻事，在結帳處才意識到自己把錢包忘在家裡了。

sentences.en: The roar of the traffic outside the mall was an assault on her nerves.
sentences.cn: 購物中心外的車輛喧囂聲刺激了她的神經。

sentences.en: Good communication skills are undoubtedly an enormous asset to salesmen.
sentences.cn: 對於推銷員來說，良好的溝通技巧無疑是極大的有利條件。

sentences.en: It astonished me that he should spend one thousand dollars on the counterfeit painting.
sentences.cn: 他竟然為那幅假畫花了一千美元，令我感到驚訝。

cn: a: 迷路的，離開正道的

sentences.en: The misleading sign in the shopping center led him astray.
sentences.cn: 這家購物中心裡的誤導性標誌使得他迷路。

sentences.en: I am astonished to hear that the salesman dreamed of becoming an astronaut.
sentences.cn: 聽說那位推銷員夢想著成為一名太空人，我十分驚訝。

sentences.en: The telescope to astronomers is what the goods to salesman.
sentences.cn: 望遠鏡之於天文學家就如同商品之於售貨員。

sentences.en: It is indeed a silly thing to talk about astronomy in the crowded supermarket.
sentences.cn: 在擁擠的超市裡談論天文學，真是蠢事。

sentences.en: In the trade fair, the dowager always had a bodyguard in close attendance.
sentences.cn: 在交易會上，那位貴婦總有一名保鏢隨身護衛。

sentences.en: There was rapturous applause from every corner of the auditorium when the salesman appeared.
sentences.cn: 那位售貨員出現的時候，禮堂裡四處爆發出熱烈的掌聲。

cn: n: 輔助物，助動詞，附屬機構

sentences.en: You had better buy some medical auxiliaries in case of an emergency.
sentences.cn: 你最好買一些醫療輔助設備，以防緊急事件發生。

sentences.en: The crowd were awed into silence by the sternness of guide's voice.
sentences.cn: 導遊嚴厲的聲音嚇得人群鴉雀無聲。

sentences.en: Take it easy; we will not be going shopping yet awhile.
sentences.cn: 別著急，我們暫時還不會去購物。

sentences.en: No one knows why the man remains a bachelor throughout his life.
sentences.cn: 沒有人知道，那個男人為什麼終生未娶。

sentences.en: In my mind, the experienced salesmen should be the backbone of the industry.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，經驗豐富的推銷員應當是這個行業的主要力量。

sentences.en: The red hat is the badge of the clerks in the mall.
sentences.cn: 這家購物中心的店員都戴一頂紅帽子。

sentences.en: The customers held a ballot of members on the proposal.
sentences.cn: 顧客舉行無記名投票，對這項提議進行表決。

sentences.en: The company has been banned from the sale of milk products.
sentences.cn: 這家公司已被禁止從事乳製品銷售。

sentences.en: The supermarket was robbed by a band of bandits last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，那家超市被一群強盜搶劫。

sentences.en: This year may be a banner year for sales, I think.
sentences.cn: 我想，今年也許是銷售狀況最好的一年。

sentences.en: Her friends held a banquet for her after she bought a house in the city.
sentences.cn: 她在那座城市買棟房子後，朋友們為她舉行了宴會。

sentences.en: When it comes to the end-of-season sales, most housewives may behave like those barbarians.
sentences.cn: 季末清倉的時候，大多數的家庭主婦也許會表現得像那些野蠻人一樣。

sentences.en: He had an unexpected encounter with his ex-girlfriend in the barbershop.
sentences.cn: 他在理髮店巧遇前女友。

sentences.en: When they entered the clothing shop, a barefoot girl suddenly ran out.
sentences.cn: 他們走進服裝店的時候，一個赤腳的女孩突然跑出來。

sentences.en: They had a barren discussion about the patterns on the wrapping paper.
sentences.cn: 他們對包裝紙上的圖案進行毫無意義的討論。

sentences.en: Shoals of people always come to buy basses at this time of the year.
sentences.cn: 每年的這個時候，都會有很多人來買鱸魚。

sentences.en: These biscuits in the store are baked in batches of thirty.
sentences.cn: 這家店裡的餅乾是以三十個為一爐進行烘烤。

sentences.en: The shopkeeper's face was battered to a pulp by those bandits.
sentences.cn: 那個店主的臉被那些搶匪打得血肉模糊。

sentences.en: She came home with a box full of odds and ends bought from the bazaar.
sentences.cn: 她抱著滿滿一盒從市集上買來的零碎東西回家。

sentences.en: As Christmas is drawing near, the shopkeeper wants to buy some colorful lights to beautify the store.
sentences.cn: 隨著耶誕節臨近，那位店主想買些彩燈裝飾店鋪。

sentences.en: Her mother bought enough rice two weeks beforehand.
sentences.cn: 兩周之前，她媽媽就買了足夠的米。

sentences.en: They collected money and bought daily necessities on behalf of the homeless.
sentences.cn: 他們為無家可歸的人籌款、購置生活必需品。

sentences.en: You can't be too careful about your belongings while in the crowded shopping center.
sentences.cn: 在擁擠的購物中心，再怎麼小心自己的財物都不為過。

sentences.en: The salesgirl seems to be beloved of all children who have seen her.
sentences.cn: 似乎所有見過那個女店員的孩子們都會喜歡她。

sentences.en: It's universally acknowledged that vitamins are beneficial to our health.
sentences.cn: 世人皆知，維他命於健康有益。

sentences.en: The old man bid five thousand dollars for the painting.
sentences.cn: 那位老人為這幅畫出價五千美元。

sentences.en: He is the only blacksmith to sell kettles for miles around.
sentences.cn: 他是方圓幾英里內唯一賣水壺的鐵匠。

sentences.en: When they went out of the mall, they encountered a blast of hot air.
sentences.cn: 他們走出購物中心時，一股熱浪撲面而來。

sentences.en: No one knows why the professor blazed up without warning.
sentences.cn: 沒有人知道，那名教授為什麼突然大怒。

sentences.en: You had better soak the new shirt you bought yesterday in bleach to remove the stains.
sentences.cn: 你最好把昨天新買的襯衫泡在漂白劑中，以清除污垢。

sentences.en: A blizzard of e-mails came from the customers to enquire about the new product.
sentences.cn: 顧客發來大量的郵件，詢問這種新產品。

sentences.en: She observed that the blond at the checkout was a foreigner.
sentences.cn: 她注意到，在結帳處的那個金髮女子是外國人。

cn: v: 吸墨水，弄上墨漬或污漬

sentences.en: His being caught stealing in the supermarket will be a blot on the escutcheon forever.
sentences.cn: 他在超市中偷竊被抓，將成為永遠的污點。

sentences.en: The shopkeeper was in the blues because of those unsalable goods.
sentences.cn: 那位店主因為那些滯銷貨物而悶悶不樂。

sentences.en: The early morning mist blurred the outline of the shopping center.
sentences.cn: 清晨的薄霧模糊了那個購物中心的輪廓。

sentences.en: The clothing store will be moved bodily to a new site next month.
sentences.cn: 下個月，那家服裝店將整體遷往新地址。

sentences.en: For lack of industry standards, the quality of bodyguards service greatly varied.
sentences.cn: 由於缺乏行業規範，保鏢服務的品質參差不齊。

sentences.en: The discussion finally got bogged down in irrelevant details of the shopping list.
sentences.cn: 最終，這項討論因為購物清單上的一些無關細節而終止。

sentences.en: She has been dealing with the nuts and bolts of the marketing plan these days.
sentences.cn: 這些天，她都在思量行銷方案的基本要點。

cn: 分紅，獎金，意外所得之物

sentences.en: Whoever buys a pound of chocolate from this store will get a box of biscuits as a bonus.
sentences.cn: 凡是從這家商店購買一磅巧克力的人都將得到一盒贈送的餅乾。

sentences.en: It's supposed that this year should be a boom year for exports.
sentences.cn: 據推測，今年將是出口貿易繁榮發展的一年。

sentences.en: There stands a telephone booth in front of the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 超市前面有個公用電話亭。

sentences.en: The little girl bought much ice-cream out of sheer boredom.
sentences.cn: 出於無聊，那個小女孩買了很多冰淇淋。

sentences.en: She held the doll tightly to her bosom and asked her mother to buy it for her.
sentences.cn: 她把那個玩偶緊緊地抱在懷裡，要媽媽買下它。

sentences.en: You should know something about botany if you want to buy these flowers.
sentences.cn: 如果你想買這些花，就應該知道些植物學的知識。

sentences.en: There happens to be a shopping center on Sunset Boulevard.
sentences.cn: 日落大道上恰好有一處購物中心。

sentences.en: I'm bound to say I don’t like your new dress very much.
sentences.cn: 我必須要說，我不太喜歡你新買的洋裝。

sentences.en: As a driver, you had better keep in mind the boundary between acceptable and unacceptable behaviors.
sentences.cn: 作為一名司機，你最好牢記什麼是該做的，什麼是不該做的。

sentences.en: She will not go shopping with us because she suffers from a bowel complaint.
sentences.cn: 她腹瀉，所以不會和我們一起去購物。

sentences.en: I feel bound to tell you that you had better stop talking about that heavyweight boxer in the crowded mall.
sentences.cn: 我覺得有必要告訴你，在這擁擠的購物中心裡，你最好停止談論那個重量級拳擊手。

sentences.en: You will be fired if you simply think about boxing while working as a policeman, I'll be bound.
sentences.cn: 我確信作為一名警察，如果你只是想著拳擊，你一定會被解雇的。

sentences.en: He has been salesman going from door to door to sell products since boyhood.
sentences.cn: 從少年時代起，他就是個挨家挨戶推銷產品的推銷員。

sentences.en: All the salesmen have braced themselves for a supreme effort.
sentences.cn: 所有推銷員都準備好全力以赴。

sentences.en: She feels like buying the dress which is trimmed with silk braid.
sentences.cn: 她想買那件有絲帶裝飾的洋裝。

sentences.en: There are many pieces of material of different breadths for you to choose from.
sentences.cn: 這裡有很多寬度不一的布料供您選擇。

sentences.en: The young man bribed his way into the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕人靠賄賂進入這家超市工作。

sentences.en: After being given a bribe of five hundred dollars, the manager agreed to sell the briefcases at the trade price.
sentences.cn: 收了五百美元的賄賂後，那位經理同意以批發價出售這些公事包。

sentences.en: Two years' work in the mall has broadened the salesgirl’s horizons.
sentences.cn: 在這個購物中心的兩年工作經歷，使得這個女店員拓寬了視野。

sentences.en: Those goods are all cast out of bronze.
sentences.cn: 那些商品都是用青銅鑄成的。

sentences.en: It's impossible for there to be any brooch at that price in the store.
sentences.cn: 這家商店裡不可能有那個價位的胸針。

sentences.en: Actually, it's useless to brood over your fault.
sentences.cn: 事實上，對你所犯下的過錯耿耿於懷也是沒有什麼用的。

sentences.en: “It doesn't help to cry over the split broth anyway,” said the shopkeeper.
sentences.cn: 那位店主說，「無論如何，為打翻的肉湯哭泣也是無濟於事的」。

cn: 兄弟關係，兄弟會，（總稱）同行

sentences.en: We have dinner and go shopping together in complete brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 我們像兄弟一樣一起吃飯一起逛街。

sentences.en: They spent the whole afternoon browsing over books in the bookshop.
sentences.cn: 他們用整個下午的時間在書店裡瀏覽書籍。

sentences.en: The little boy was covered in bruises after falling off from the stairs in the mall.
sentences.cn: 那個小男孩從購物中心的樓梯上摔下來，身上有瘀青。

cn: n: 腫漲，凸出部分，膨脹

sentences.en: There is usually a bulge in the sales of fruits in June.
sentences.cn: 水果的銷售量通常在六月會有所增長。

sentences.en: These goods are cheaper if you buy them in bulk.
