sentences.cn: 籌錢為那些無家可歸的人建庇護所，他們有很多的困難要考慮。

sentences.en: His marketing theory was refuted down to the last point.
sentences.cn: 他的行銷理論被駁斥得體無完膚。

sentences.en: There was an overall improvement in expenditure styles during the reign of the king.
sentences.cn: 在那位國王統治期間，消費方式有所改進。

sentences.en: She rejoiced to hear that her boyfriend bought a purse.
sentences.cn: 聽說男朋友買了一個皮夾，她十分高興。

sentences.en: We rejoiced that they gave up changing the last remaining relic of ancient civilization into a commercial district.
sentences.cn: 我們十分高興，他們放棄把最後一處古文明遺址改造為商業區的想法。

sentences.en: The incident served as a constant reminder how dangerous substandard medicine was.
sentences.cn: 這次事件時時提醒著我們，假藥有多危險。

sentences.en: If I lend one hundred dollars to you to buy a bike, you should repay it to me by next week.
sentences.cn: 如果我借你一百美元買腳踏車，你要在下周之前還我。

sentences.en: She is reckoning on buying a copier that can reproduce colorful photographs.
sentences.cn: 她在考慮買一台可以複製彩色照片的影印機。

sentences.en: You had better not buy such a reptile like a lizard as a pet.
sentences.cn: 你最好不要買類似蜥蜴之類的爬行動物作為寵物。

cn: a: 共和政體的，共和黨的

sentences.en: The Republican reckoned to limit the expenditure of money on weapons.
sentences.cn: 共和黨考慮限制購買武器的開支。

sentences.en: His wife resented his spending much money on alcohol.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子討厭他花很多錢買酒。

sentences.en: The businessman who resides at 158 Fifth Avenue is reckoned to be the most extravagant man here.
sentences.cn: 那個住在第五大道一五八號的商人被認為是這裡最奢侈的人。

sentences.en: The price of the residence on that street was reckoned a little too high.
sentences.cn: 那條街上的住房價格有點過高了。

sentences.en: The local resident was fined fifty dollars for buying smuggling articles.
sentences.cn: 那位當地居民因為買走私品被罰款五十美元。

sentences.en: When it comes to the crunch, you can resort to selling the house.
sentences.cn: 危急時，你可以賣掉這房子。

sentences.en: It's hard to restrain her anger when she learnt that her husband spent all his money on gambling.
sentences.cn: 聽聞丈夫把所有的錢都拿去賭博，她難以控制自己的怒氣。

sentences.en: She said she bought a novel last week and gave a resume of the plot.
sentences.cn: 她說她上周買了一本小說並闡述了情節概要。

sentences.en: His wife retorted that it's quite necessary to buy that necklace.
sentences.cn: 他妻子反駁說，買那條項鍊是十分必要的。

sentences.en: Sales of fruits this month show a reverse trend to that recorded last month.
sentences.cn: 這個月的水果銷售額與上月的情況相反。

sentences.en: The sales figures revived fear of a small salary scale.
sentences.cn: 銷售額喚起了對低薪的擔憂。

sentences.en: The capitalist asked the police to put down the revolt with two thousand pounds.
sentences.cn: 那個資本家出兩千英鎊請警察來鎮壓叛亂。

sentences.en: The discussion revolved around the issue of purchasing office appliances.
sentences.cn: 這次討論是以購買辦公設施為中心。

sentences.en: The rhino horn should be the most extravagant purchase the miser had ever made.
sentences.cn: 那犀牛角應當是那個吝嗇鬼所買過的最奢侈的東西。

sentences.en: He was constantly ribbed about his preference for buying barbecued spare-ribs.
sentences.cn: 他常常因為偏愛買烤豬排而被取笑。

sentences.en: The student bought the boots with ridges on the soles after revolving the amount of spending money in his mind.
sentences.cn: 仔細考慮過零用錢金額之後，那個學生買下那雙鞋底有條紋的靴子。

sentences.en: Don't be ridiculous; you cannot buy that pearl necklace with your limited salary.
sentences.cn: 別傻了，就憑你那點有限的薪水，買不起那條珍珠項鍊的。

sentences.en: It's ridiculous that the teenager should want to buy a rifle.
sentences.cn: 那個少年竟然想買一支步槍，真是荒謬。

sentences.en: Seeing the astronomical figures on the bill, the man was rigid with terror.
sentences.cn: 看到帳單上的天文數字，那人嚇得全身僵硬。

sentences.en: We were revolted by his endless talking about the spectacles with gold rims he bought recently.
sentences.cn: 我們討厭聽他喋喋不休地談論新買的那副金框眼鏡。

sentences.en: The little boy ripped the cover off the book, so his mother had to buy it.
sentences.cn: 那個小男孩把那本書的封面撕掉了，因此他媽媽只得買下它。

sentences.en: A ripple of incredulity passed through her when she received the electrical bill.
sentences.cn: 收到電費帳單時，她覺得不可置信。

sentences.en: The chain of supermarkets had no rival in the field of the retail of daily necessities.
sentences.cn: 在日用品零售方面，這家連鎖超市無人能及。

sentences.en: His wife roamed freely over the expenditures last month.
sentences.cn: 他妻子漫談上個月的開支。

sentences.en: His daughter wanted to buy a robin.
sentences.cn: 他的女兒想買隻知更鳥。

sentences.en: The ridiculousness of the scene made them laugh when the robust man in a gaudy shirt appeared in the store.
sentences.cn: 那個健壯的人穿著花俏的襯衫出現在店裡，這滑稽的一幕逗得他們大笑。

sentences.en: You are making a rod for your own back if you lend money to him to buy a car.
sentences.cn: 如果你借錢給他買車，那是自找麻煩。

cn: v: 把⋯說得一錢不值，輕視

sentences.en: You had better not buy that novel which is actually a load of rubbish.
sentences.cn: 那本書其實就是廢話連篇，你最好不要買。

sentences.en: Other cupboards will be dwarfed by the one which is famous for its rugged qualities.
sentences.cn: 這款以堅固耐用聞名的碗櫃使其他同類產品相形見絀。

sentences.en: My stomach is rumbling; let's buy something to eat.
sentences.cn: 我的肚子餓得咕咕叫，我們去買些東西吃吧。

sentences.en: When the waiter came to take his order, he made an insolent retort, rustling the menu.
sentences.cn: 服務生過來為他點餐的時候，他把菜單翻得沙沙響，侮慢地回絕。

sentences.en: Don't talk rubbish; what he bought were sacred writings.
sentences.cn: 別胡說八道，他所買的是宗教經典著作。

sentences.en: His brother did not buy a saddle.
sentences.cn: 他哥哥並沒有買過馬鞍。

sentences.en: You must be a saint to be able to stand his extravagant tastes and habits.
sentences.cn: 你竟然能忍受他那奢侈的嗜好和習慣，真是個聖人。

sentences.en: The salmon salad in the restaurant was rubbished by my mother.
sentences.cn: 這家餐館的鮭肉沙拉被我媽媽批評得一無是處。

sentences.en: The soldier reported to the officer about the expenditure of money on weapons after giving a salute.
sentences.cn: 敬禮之後，那位士兵向軍官彙報用於購置武器的開支。

sentences.en: It's ridiculous for you to buy a pair of sandals like that.
sentences.cn: 你竟然買那麼一雙涼鞋，真是荒謬。

sentences.en: The lady's remark was a savage attack on the quality of the laptop.
sentences.cn: 那位女士的評價是對這台筆記型電腦的品質的惡意攻擊。

sentences.en: She bought a novel which was savaged by readers and scanned it at bedtime.
sentences.cn: 她買了一本被讀者們猛烈抨擊的小說，在睡前瀏覽一遍。

sentences.en: His pilferage from the jewelry store caused a scandal in his family.
sentences.cn: 他在珠寶店行竊讓家人很氣憤。

sentences.en: The man with a scar on his face was caught pinching money from the cashbox in the store.
sentences.cn: 那個臉上有傷疤的人在這家店的錢箱中偷錢，當場被抓。

sentences.en: The lady with scents of lavender pecked at her food in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 那位有薰衣草香味的女士在餐廳裡無精打采地吃著食物。

sentences.en: The scheme that we go shopping in Hong Kong seems to be practical on the surface.
sentences.cn: 我們去香港購物的計畫表面看起來似乎很實際。

sentences.en: We all heap scorn on him for he can't afford to buy new uniform and schoolbag.
sentences.cn: 我們都嘲笑他買不起新制服和書包。

sentences.en: The customers scrambled these goods up.
sentences.cn: 顧客們把這些商品弄亂了。

sentences.en: I had a bit of a scrap with the salesman over there.
sentences.cn: 我跟那邊的那個售貨員有過爭執。

sentences.en: We want to scrape together some money to buy a gift for the poor girl.
sentences.cn: 我們想湊錢為那個可憐的女孩買一份禮物。

sentences.en: The man who is buying a picture always wants to be on the scroll of fame.
sentences.cn: 那個正在買畫的人老想名垂青史。

sentences.en: The sculptor tried hard to bargain with the man.
sentences.cn: 雕刻家盡力與那個人討價還價。

sentences.en: What he hopes for is buying a can of secure milk powder.
sentences.cn: 他希望買到一罐安全的奶粉。

sentences.en: Give me a segment of a tangerine to taste; if it is sweet, I will buy some.
sentences.cn: 給我一瓣柑橘嚐嚐，如果甜的話，我就買一些。

sentences.en: He lost all sensation in his legs when he was at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他在超市購物時，腿部失去知覺。

sentences.en: All of us should keep the sensitivity to the market.
sentences.cn: 我們都應該保持對市場的敏感性。

sentences.en: There is no time for sentiment for we have to go shopping now.
sentences.cn: 沒有時間多愁善感，因為我們得去購物了。

cn: 陸軍或海軍陸戰隊中士

sentences.en: Sergeant Black wanted to go to the supermarket which is in the shadow of the hospital.
sentences.cn: 布萊克中士想去醫院附近的超市。

sentences.en: I heard that she gave forth a series of works in succession.
sentences.cn: 我聽說她連續發表了一系列的作品。

sentences.en: Don't preach me a sermon, I just want to buy a computer.
sentences.cn: 請不要對我講大道理，我只是想買一台電腦而已。

sentences.en: Which kind of server do you want to buy?
sentences.cn: 你想要買哪一種托盤？

sentences.en: The gruesome setting for the murder is the supermarket you always go to.
sentences.cn: 那起謀殺案令人毛骨悚然的背景就是你經常去的那家超市。

sentences.en: The salesman even played a shabby trick on the customers.
sentences.cn: 那個售貨員甚至對顧客們玩弄卑鄙的手段。

sentences.en: The salesman says this knife is designed to sharpen the pencils.
sentences.cn: 售貨員說，這把刀就是為削鉛筆而設計的。

sentences.en: When I bought some pears, my glasses broke into shatters suddenly.
sentences.cn: 我買梨子的時候，眼鏡突然碎了。

sentences.en: The sheriff whose name is Tom Black is under no obligation to buy anything.
sentences.cn: 那個叫湯姆．布萊克的郡長不必非買什麼東西不可。

sentences.en: To shield your eyes from the sun, you need to buy a pair of sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 想保護眼睛不受太陽光照射，你有必要買一副太陽眼鏡。

sentences.en: At the thought of buying a snake home gave me the shivers.
sentences.cn: 一想起買一條蛇回家，我就嚇得直哆嗦。

sentences.en: We have to buy some materials to make up for shortage.
sentences.cn: 我們需要買一些材料以彌補空缺。

sentences.en: “Going shopping too often is her greatest shortcoming.” her mother says.
sentences.cn: 她媽媽說：「太頻繁購物是她的最大缺點。」

sentences.en: Please shove up; I want to buy some grapes.
sentences.cn: 請借過，我想買點葡萄。

sentences.en: I think there was not a shred of falsehood in what the salesman said.
sentences.cn: 我覺得那個售貨員沒說一句假話。

sentences.en: The customer let out a piercing shriek after he saw the moldy bread.
sentences.cn: 那個顧客看到發黴的麵包後，發出一聲尖叫。

sentences.en: The shrine is an object of pilgrimage, not a shopping center.
sentences.cn: 這處聖地是人們朝聖的目的地，不是購物中心。

sentences.en: The visitors were shattered by the evergreen shrub in front of the museum.
sentences.cn: 觀光客們都被博物館前面那常綠灌木叢給震撼了。

sentences.en: The news that we don't have to go shopping on such a cold day sent a shudder through me.
sentences.cn: 得知我們不用在這麼冷的天去購物的消息，我激動得渾身發抖。

sentences.en: Many a shop has put up the shutters owing to the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 許多商店都因為惡劣的天氣停止營業了。

sentences.en: It was only two minutes before he bought some silkworms.
sentences.cn: 他只用兩分鐘的時間就買到一些蠶。

sentences.en: Let's go to the supermarket to buy some foods after you simmer down.
sentences.cn: 等你平靜下來後，我們一起去超市買點食品。

sentences.en: The salesman gave us just the skeleton of her theory about how to buy a genuine antique.
sentences.cn: 那個售貨員給我們提供關於如何買到古玩真品的理論大概。

sentences.en: I have saved up enough money to buy the sweater with a design of a skull.
sentences.cn: 我已經存夠錢來買那件帶有骷髏頭圖案的毛衣。

sentences.en: His answer to my request that we go shopping together was to slam the door.
sentences.cn: 我要求跟他一起去購物，他只是猛地關上門作為回答。

sentences.en: The customer gave the salesman a slap on the cheek.
sentences.cn: 顧客一巴掌打在售貨員的臉上。

sentences.en: He slammed the door in my face and bought the slaughtered pig at last.
sentences.cn: 他拒絕聽取我的意見，最終買下那頭被屠宰的豬。

sentences.en: He was slain when he was buying a car.
sentences.cn: 他正在買汽車時被殺死。

cn: 不整潔的，草率的，稀薄的

sentences.en: I like going shopping in my sloppy clothes.
sentences.cn: 我喜歡穿著寬鬆隨意的衣服去逛街。

sentences.en: She is in a slump in her career and can't afford to buy a fridge.
sentences.cn: 她處在事業的低谷，沒錢買冰箱。

sentences.en: The customer picked up a watch on the sly.
sentences.cn: 那個顧客偷偷地把那塊手錶給扒走了。

sentences.en: When you buy a bottle of drink, you have to give a smash on the vending machine.
sentences.cn: 你想買一瓶飲料的話，需要猛擊那台自動販賣機。

sentences.en: Snarling at the salesman is useless.
sentences.cn: 對售貨員咆哮是沒有用的。

sentences.en: Did you snatch the mobile phone from him when you go shopping together?
sentences.cn: 你們一起逛街的時候，你有沒有把手機從他那裡搶過來？

cn: n: 偷偷摸摸的人或事

sentences.en: It's dishonourable of us to have a sneak attack on him when he buys his breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我們在他買早餐的時候偷襲不光彩。

cn: 鬼鬼祟祟做事的人，運動鞋

sentences.en: The man who is reduced to a skeleton likes to buy buns wearing sneakers.
sentences.cn: 那個瘦得皮包骨頭的人喜歡穿著運動鞋買饅頭。

sentences.en: I want to take a sniff at the roses before I buy them.
sentences.cn: 我想在買這些玫瑰花之前先聞一聞花香。

sentences.en: His loud snore kept me awake, so I got up to go to the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 他的鼾聲大得使我睡不著，所以我起床去超市。

sentences.en: He gave a snort of derision when I told him I bought a cheap cup.
sentences.cn: 當我告訴他我買了一個便宜的水杯時，他哼一下鼻子表示嘲笑。

sentences.en: He was soaked in the music and didn't want to buy anything.
sentences.cn: 他沉浸在音樂中，不想買任何東西。

sentences.en: When he sobers down, you can accompany him to buy some clothes.
sentences.cn: 等他安靜下來，你可以陪他去買一些衣服。

sentences.en: She was softened up with the free gifts the salesmen gave to her.
sentences.cn: 推銷員送的贈品打動了她的心。

sentences.en: To buy a cell-phone, the salesman is my sole trust.
sentences.cn: 如果要買手機的話，那個售貨員是我唯一信賴的人。

sentences.en: She wore an extraordinarily solemn expression because her mother didn't buy the coat for her.
sentences.cn: 她臉上帶著異常嚴肅的表情，因為她媽媽沒有買那件外套給她。

sentences.en: She had been held in solitary confinement for half a month because she stole things in the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 因為在超市裡偷東西，她被單獨關押了半個月。

sentences.en: It was subsequently emerged that his solo attracted many customers in the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 隨後的情況顯示，他的獨奏吸引了超市裡很多的顧客。

cn: a: 具有主權的，至高無上的

sentences.en: I think as a salesman, your character is of sovereign importance.
sentences.cn: 我認為作為一個推銷員，你的人品最為重要。

sentences.en: It is too soon to sow yet and we haven't buy seeds.
sentences.cn: 現在還不到播種的時候，而且我們還沒有買種子。

sentences.en: His dream is to buy a spacecraft, but it's just a flight of fancy.
sentences.cn: 他的夢想是買一艘太空船，但這只是異想天開。

sentences.en: My cousin is a specialist in literature and he loves buying jade.
sentences.cn: 我堂兄是文學方面的專家，而且他喜歡買玉石。

cn: 樣本，範例，某種類型的人

sentences.en: It was a specimen of her generosity to buy things.
sentences.cn: 這是她慷慨大方購物的一個實例。

sentences.en: The drunken man made a spectacle of himself in the store.
sentences.cn: 那個酒醉的人在商店裡大出洋相。

sentences.en: He was content to stand by as an spectator when his wife was buying all kinds of clothes.
sentences.cn: 當妻子在買各種的衣服時，他滿足於站在旁邊做一個旁觀者。

sentences.en: Hearing that his girlfriend has spent all his savings buying a car, a cold shiver ran down his spine.
sentences.cn: 得知女朋友用他所有的積蓄買車，他打了一個寒顫。

sentences.en: St. John has never gazed on such splendor in a supermarket.
sentences.cn: 聖約翰從沒有在一個超市裡見過如此輝煌壯麗的場面。

sentences.en: Don't sponge on your parents if you always want to buy luxuries.
sentences.cn: 如果你總是想要買奢侈品的話，就不要依賴你父母。

cn: v: 聚光照明，使公眾注意

sentences.en: Since she likes to be in the spotlight, let her buy these things on behalf of us.
sentences.cn: 既然她喜歡出風頭，就讓她代表我們買這些東西吧。

sentences.en: We need to buy all these things on the list with a sprint of very hard work.
sentences.cn: 我們需要努力一陣子才能買到清單上所有的東西。

sentences.en: I always go shopping on the spur of the moment.
sentences.cn: 我總是一時興起就去購物了。

cn: n: 濃縮果汁，擁擠嘈雜的人群

sentences.en: After the salesman squashed the grapes into a pulp, we bought some.
sentences.cn: 等那個推銷員把葡萄壓榨成醬後，我們買了一些。

cn: n: 蹲，擅自佔用的土地

sentences.en: We need to get into a squat to pick out some good potatoes.
sentences.cn: 我們需要蹲下來才能挑到一些好的馬鈴薯。

sentences.en: I have a stack of emails in my inbox to deal with, so I have no time to buy vegetables.
sentences.cn: 我的收件夾裡有很多電子郵件要處理，所以我沒有時間買菜了。

sentences.en: I want to stagger work shifts to buy some daily necessities.
sentences.cn: 我得錯開工作去買點日用品。

sentences.en: This ink stain won't rub out and I need to buy some detergent.
sentences.cn: 這墨水漬擦不掉，我需要買一些清潔劑。

sentences.en: I will stake you to a big house.
sentences.cn: 我會資助你買一間大房子。

sentences.en: The sucker you want to buy is no better than a hollow stalk.
sentences.cn: 你想買的這個吸管比空麥稈子好不了多少。

sentences.en: He sneaked out to buy some fruits at a market stall.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷溜出去在市場的貨攤上買水果。

sentences.en: I've read the third stanza before we made our way through the crowds of shoppers.
sentences.cn: 我們從購物的人潮中擠過去之前，第三節詩我已經讀過了。

sentences.en: His buying the expensive ring gave me a startle.
sentences.cn: 他買下那個昂貴的戒指，嚇了我一跳。

sentences.en: The man who is anything of a statesman is buying a cake.
sentences.cn: 那個像政治家的男人在買蛋糕。

sentences.en: We have statistics for the last year about which kind of drink the customers like to buy.
sentences.cn: 我們有去年關於顧客最喜歡買哪種飲料的統計資料。

sentences.en: The salesman showed the price fluctuations in a statistical table to the customers.
sentences.cn: 售貨員用統計表向顧客們展示價格的波動。

sentences.en: He put her aboard a steamer bearing in with London and went shopping alone.
sentences.cn: 他把她送上一艘駛向倫敦的汽船，然後獨自去購物。

sentences.en: We must steer by these pits to buy fruits there.
sentences.cn: 要去那邊買水果，我們必須繞過這些漥坑。

sentences.en: The old woman always holds a stereotype to look upon buying luxuries.
sentences.cn: 那個老婦人總是用自己固有的觀念看待購買奢侈品這件事。

sentences.en: The chef is very stern in buying rice.
sentences.cn: 這名主廚購買稻米時極為嚴格。

sentences.en: There's no need to get in a stew and I believe you can buy a satisfying handbag.
sentences.cn: 沒有必要煩惱，我相信你能買到一個滿意的手提包。

cn: v: 發出惡臭，招人厭惡

sentences.en: Let me stink out the mosquitoes before we go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我們去購物前，讓我把蚊子熏出去。

sentences.en: Is this kind of cloth in stock now?
sentences.cn: 這種布料現在有庫存嗎？

sentences.en: All of the customers have to stoop their head to enter the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 所有顧客必須彎腰才能進入超市。

sentences.en: The storage of food is not enough for the whole family in winter and we have to buy some.
sentences.cn: 糧食的儲存量不夠一家人過冬，我們還要買一些。

sentences.en: This is the time for stout people to buy some diet pills.
sentences.cn: 是胖子們買減肥藥的時候了。

sentences.en: She said she would straighten up her room after buying the eye-cream.
sentences.cn: 她說買過眼霜後她就整理房間。

sentences.en: They took a straightforward route to the beach after buying enough foods and water.
sentences.cn: 他們買了足夠的食物和水後取直道去海灘。

sentences.en: Their relationship is under great strain when they go shopping together.
sentences.cn: 他們一起購物時關係非常緊張。

cn: a: 困難的，狹窄的，嚴格的

sentences.en: She took strait vows that she won't buy anything this month.
sentences.cn: 她立下嚴格的誓願，這個月不買任何東西了。

cn: n: 縷，不同的一個部分

sentences.en: She was stranded in the storm when you took a shower, wasn't she?
sentences.cn: 你淋浴時她被暴風雨困住了，是嗎？

sentences.en: The trousers of the child who is buying a lollipop are held on by an elastic strap.
sentences.cn: 那個正在買棒棒糖的小孩的褲子是用一根鬆緊帶繫著的。

sentences.en: Don't stray from the right subject when we talk about what to buy.
sentences.cn: 當我們在討論買什麼時請不要偏離正題。

sentences.en: A streak of lightning flashed through the sky when we bought a fish in the market.
sentences.cn: 我們在市場買魚時，一道光閃過天空。

sentences.en: In a big stride the customer came out of the store when the earthquake took place.
sentences.cn: 地震發生時，這個顧客一個箭步走出商店。

sentences.en: He sniffed at the red striped T shirt I bought.
sentences.cn: 他對我買的那件紅色條紋的 T恤嗤之以鼻。

sentences.en: I am going to take a stroll in the village after buying some tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 我準備買些番茄後到村裡散步。

sentences.en: The storm caused no structural damage to the supermarket that we were at.
sentences.cn: 風暴沒有破壞我們所在的超市的建築結構。

sentences.en: He stumbled on his childhood friend when he was shopping.
sentences.cn: 他逛街時偶然遇到兒時的夥伴。

sentences.en: We all went shopping and left him sitting on the stump.
sentences.cn: 我們都去逛街了，留下他一個坐在樹樁上。

cn: v: 使吃驚，使目瞪口呆

sentences.en: I was stunned by his idea that he wanted to buy a villa.
sentences.cn: 我對他想要買一棟別墅的想法感到震驚。

sentences.en: You must sniff a sturdy man out to accompany you to buy the famous painting.
sentences.cn: 你必須找一個健壯的人來陪你買那件名畫。

sentences.en: The customers in the supermarket are all stylish dressers.
sentences.cn: 這個超市裡的顧客穿著都很時髦。

sentences.en: I submit that we can buy a big box.
sentences.cn: 我想我們可以買一個大箱子。

sentences.en: We made substantial changes to shopping.
sentences.cn: 我們在購物上作了重大變動。

sentences.en: I had to find another one to substitute for her to go shopping with me.
sentences.cn: 我得找另一個人來代替她陪我去購物。

sentences.en: You can pack all the things you have just bought into the suitcase.
sentences.cn: 你可以把你剛買的所有東西都放進這個手提箱裡。

sentences.en: I sneaked up on the man who was buying some sulfur.
sentences.cn: 我偷偷地接近那個買硫磺的男人。

sentences.en: I could not summon up the courage to ask him to buy the beautiful watch.
sentences.cn: 我鼓不起勇氣要他買那漂亮的手錶給我。

cn: 表面的，膚淺的，一知半解的

sentences.en: The customer has a superficial knowledge of this kind of jewel.
sentences.cn: 那個顧客對這種珠寶略知皮毛。

sentences.en: You must break down superstitions if you want to buy the new kind of wedding dress.
sentences.cn: 你想買這款新式婚紗，必須破除迷信。

sentences.en: I have to submit to his arrangement that I supervise the children when he goes shopping.
sentences.cn: 我不得不服從他的安排：他去逛街，我照顧孩子。

sentences.en: Between you and me, I think that our supervisor is a shopaholic.
sentences.cn: 我們私下說，我認為主管是一個購物狂。

sentences.en: I could not suppress a smile when I saw him buy the funny statue.
sentences.cn: 看到他買那個有趣的雕像，我禁不住笑了。

sentences.en: It was the supreme moment in his life when he bought the wedding ring.
sentences.cn: 買結婚戒指是他一生中最重要的時刻。

sentences.en: The customers surge out of the supermarket before 10 p.m.
sentences.cn: 晚上十點前，顧客們從超市裡湧出。

sentences.en: I have no alternative but suspend my experiment to buy books.
sentences.cn: 除了中止實驗去買書，我別無選擇。

sentences.en: I do not have enough money to sustain your buying that expensive coat.
sentences.cn: 我沒有足夠的財力讓你買下那個昂貴的外套。

sentences.en: He became bogged in the swamp on the way to hike.
sentences.cn: 他在健行的路上陷在沼澤中。

sentences.en: When I went shopping, I found the waters in front of the supermarket swarm with life.
sentences.cn: 我去購物的時候發現超市前面的水裡充滿著生物。

sentences.en: I can't afford to buy the computer; he laughs in his sleeve instead of sympathizing.
sentences.cn: 我買不起那台電腦，他不同情，反倒暗笑。

sentences.en: I'll tackle him about buying which kind of book.
sentences.cn: 我得和他談談買哪一種書。

sentences.en: The girl with tan skin sneaked into the supermarket to buy candies.
sentences.cn: 那個棕褐色皮膚的女孩偷偷溜進超市買糖果吃。

sentences.en: He doesn't know which bunch of flowers to buy because his mind is in a tangle.
sentences.cn: 他不知道要買哪一束花，因為他的思想還處於困惑之中。

sentences.en: Don't buy the pipe for it is caked with tar.
sentences.cn: 別買那個菸斗，它裡面漬了很多油。

sentences.en: I put little stock in the salesman because he sold tart apples to me last time.
sentences.cn: 我不太信任那個售貨員，因為他上次賣給我的蘋果很酸。

sentences.en: I became a taunt to my friends because I didn't buy a car.
sentences.cn: 沒有買車，我成了朋友們嘲諷的對象。

sentences.en: He sneaked out of the tavern and went shopping.
sentences.cn: 他偷偷溜出小旅館，去購物了。

cn: 敘述者，出納員，泰勒（姓氏）

sentences.en: The teller bought all the fruits the man sold; it really takes the biscuit.
sentences.cn: 這位出納員買下那人賣的所有水果，實在是太離譜了。

sentences.en: I can't adapt to the exhausting tempo of city life and even have no time to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我不能適應這令人精疲力竭的城市生活節奏，我甚至都沒有時間購物了。

cn: 誘惑，冒⋯的風險，使感興趣

sentences.en: Just be careful not to be tempted off the straight path when you go shopping in the foreign countries.
sentences.cn: 你去國外購物時要小心，不要誤入歧途。

sentences.en: The toy I can't afford to buy was a strong temptation to my son.
sentences.cn: 我買不起的那個玩具對兒子來說是一個強烈的誘惑。

sentences.en: The tenant sneaked a look at his book when he bought vegetables with his wife.
sentences.cn: 那個房客跟妻子一起買菜時偷偷地看書。

cn: 暫時的，不確定的，猶豫不決的

sentences.en: They made a tentative arrangement to buy a pair of shoes this weekend.
sentences.cn: 他們暫定這個周末去買一雙鞋。

sentences.en: The man who is buying a pen is in the terminal stage of cancer.
sentences.cn: 那個正在買鋼筆的人處於癌症晚期。

sentences.en: I saw the man sneak a book into his bag in the terrace after I came back from the market.
sentences.cn: 我從市場回來看見那個男人在陽臺上把一本書偷偷放在包裡。

sentences.en: I will accompany you to buy a pair of thigh boots tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天能陪你去買一雙長靴。

sentences.en: I am swamped with researching the thorns and have no time to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我正忙於研究荊棘，沒空去購物。

sentences.en: It gave me a big thrill to know that he will buy me a car.
sentences.cn: 聽說他要買輛車給我，我感到興奮不已。

sentences.en: If I don' buy the new thriller I will be on thorns.
sentences.cn: 如果不買那本新的驚險小說，我會如坐針氈。

sentences.en: The young man who is buying a pair of ice skates is the heir to the throne.
sentences.cn: 那個正在買溜冰鞋的年輕人是王位繼承人。

sentences.en: We pushed our way through a throng of customers.
sentences.cn: 我們從一大群顧客中擠過去。

sentences.en: He thrust back the little stabs of homesickness by buying a lot of foods to eat.
sentences.cn: 他藉由買很多食物吃來努力排遣湧上心頭的思鄉之情。

sentences.en: She put a tick by the names of things she wanted to buy.
sentences.cn: 她在自己想買的東西名稱前畫上記號。

sentences.en: Many houses in the countryside are roofed in blue tiles.
sentences.cn: 農村很多房子都是用藍瓦蓋的。

sentences.en: It has been predicted that the Earth will tilt on its axis, so let's buy some foods and water to store in case of famine and disease.
sentences.cn: 有人曾預言地球會傾斜，所以我們買些食物和水儲存起來以防饑荒和疾病。

sentences.en: Send round to the grocer's for a tin of beer.
sentences.cn: 叫人到食品店去買一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: There are too many people there, so I need to stand on tiptoe to see what the peddler is selling.
sentences.cn: 那裡人太多了，我需要踮著腳才能看到小販在賣什麼。

sentences.en: I submitted myself to him and bought a lot of toads home.
sentences.cn: 我聽從他，買了許多蟾蜍回家。

cn: v: 長時間或辛苦地工作，跋涉

sentences.en: He wanted to buy the book which was a toil to read.
sentences.cn: 他想買那本讀起來很費勁的書。

cn: a: 象徵性的，裝樣子的

sentences.en: I want to buy him a present in token of my gratitude.
sentences.cn: 我想買一件禮物給他，以表示對他的感謝之情。

sentences.en: He told her he has been carrying a torch for her about one year when they went shopping together.
sentences.cn: 他們一起逛街時，他告訴她他已經暗戀她近一年了。

sentences.en: The man who is buying bread is tormented by toothache.
sentences.cn: 那個正在買麵包的人因牙痛而受折磨。

sentences.en: Could you not bother me by a torrent of questions when I am doing shopping?
sentences.cn: 我買東西的時候你能不要用滔滔不絕的問題來煩我嗎？

sentences.en: He was tortured with anxiety and didn't want to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 他正為焦慮所苦，不想去購物。

cn: 比賽，錦標賽，中世紀的騎士比武

sentences.en: I am aching to buy a new handbag after the tournament.
sentences.cn: 我渴望在聯賽後買一個新的手提包。

sentences.en: Don't buy a house in this city, because the atmosphere is seriously polluted by the toxic gases here.
sentences.cn: 別在這個城市買房了，因為有毒氣體嚴重地污染了這裡的空氣。

sentences.en: Through a careful inspect, I think the trademark of these goods was changed.
sentences.cn: 經檢查，我覺得這些商品的商標都改了。

cn: 叛徒，背叛者，背信棄義的人

sentences.en: The man who is buying flowers is denounced as a traitor by his friends.
sentences.cn: 那個買花的人被朋友們譴責為叛徒。

cn: n: 重腳步聲徒步，流浪漢

sentences.en: The tramp frightened the shop assistant by talking to him.
sentences.cn: 那個流浪漢跟店員講話，嚇了他一跳。

sentences.en: Be careful not to trample on grass when you and your friends go to the park.
sentences.cn: 你和你的朋友去公園時不要踐踏草坪。

sentences.en: Her lie was transparent when she checks out.
sentences.cn: 付帳時，她的謊言被識破了。

sentences.en: It's said the treasury secretary combats extravagance and waste.
sentences.cn: 據說財政部長反對鋪張浪費。

sentences.en: The trade treaty will stimulate the market here.
sentences.cn: 這個貿易條約將會刺激這裡的消費。

sentences.en: The reporter who is buying a mask likes to be in the trenches.
sentences.cn: 那個在買口罩的記者喜歡去第一線。

sentences.en: She began by paying tribute to the people who bought her products.
sentences.cn: 她首先向買她產品的人表示敬意。

sentences.en: Don't trouble yourself with such a trifle before you buy a car.
sentences.cn: 買車前，不要因為這樣的小事而煩惱了。

sentences.en: I trimmed off the trousers after I bought them home.
sentences.cn: 那條褲子買回家後我修剪了一下。

sentences.en: The number of customers in this supermarket triples today.
sentences.cn: 這個超市的顧客人數今天翻了三倍。

cn: n: 疾走，現成譯本，腹瀉

sentences.en: I often go for a trot before buying foods in the morning.
sentences.cn: 早上我經常在買食物前小跑一會兒。

sentences.en: There is no trout left today; please come tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 今天沒有鱒魚了，明天再來吧。

sentences.en: It was nip and tuck as to which one to buy.
sentences.cn: 到底買哪一個，很難說。

sentences.en: The salesman received tuition in marketing last year.
sentences.cn: 那個售貨員去年學了行銷學。

sentences.en: They took a long tramp to the city to buy tunas.
sentences.cn: 他們長途跋涉來到這個城市買鮪魚。

sentences.en: The tyrant paid no attention to the salesman's cry and left without paying.
sentences.cn: 那個專橫的人不理會售貨員的叫喊，沒付帳就離開了。

sentences.en: The guest at the café has an undergraduate degree in psychology.
sentences.cn: 咖啡館那個客人有心理學的學士學位。

sentences.en: She showed partiality for the second-hand book with some sentences underlined.
sentences.cn: 她傾向於買那本句子帶有底線的二手書。

sentences.en: The customer found there was a crack underneath the floor of the shop.
sentences.cn: 顧客發現，商店的地板下面有一條裂痕。

sentences.en: It's quite understandable that she always buys cheap clothes.
sentences.cn: 她總是買便宜衣服，這很能讓人理解。

sentences.en: It was undoubtedly he who bought a fake.
sentences.cn: 買到膺品的肯定是他。

sentences.en: I update my best friend on what I have just bought.
sentences.cn: 我告訴最好的朋友我剛買了什麼東西。

sentences.en: He jerked upright in surprise when he saw the new cell phone I bought.
sentences.cn: 他看到我買的新手機後驚訝得跳了起來。

sentences.en: There is an upward tendency in fruit prices.
sentences.cn: 水果價格有上漲的趨勢。

sentences.en: Come this way, and these steps lead upwards to the front door of the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 走這邊，這些臺階往上通向超市的正門。

sentences.en: I am at an utter loss which skirt to buy.
sentences.cn: 我完全不知道該買哪條裙子。

sentences.en: The vacancy of his expression made me doubt if he heard the salesman.
sentences.cn: 他茫然的神情讓我懷疑他是否聽到了售貨員的講話。

sentences.en: He bought two vacuums in his innocence.
sentences.cn: 他傻傻地買了兩台吸塵器。

sentences.en: I have a vague idea of buying a present for her.
sentences.cn: 我隱約覺得要買一個禮物給她。

cn: 自負，空虛，無價值的東西

sentences.en: His buying the car is just a boast out of vanity.
sentences.cn: 他買那輛車只是出於虛榮心。

sentences.en: The salesman says, “Water in the pot will change to vapor after heated.”
sentences.cn: 推銷員說：「鍋裡的水經過加熱就會變成蒸氣。」

sentences.en: The air is perfumed with the scent of vegetation in the flower market.
sentences.cn: 花卉市場的空氣中充滿了植物的香味。

sentences.en: My father draws a veil over the promise that he will buy me a bike.
sentences.cn: 父親對要買一輛腳踏車給我的事情避而不談。

sentences.en: I am not in the vein for shopping at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我現在沒有心情購物。

sentences.en: I am arrayed in a red velvet to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我穿著一件紅色天鵝絨衣服去購物。

sentences.en: I won't venture buying the washing machine.
sentences.cn: 我不敢買那台洗衣機。

cn: 言詞上的，用文字的，逐字的

sentences.en: The salesman at the door has a good command of verbal English.
sentences.cn: 門口那個推銷員具有良好的英語口語表達能力。

sentences.en: Let's buy some popcorn before watching the match which is Chelsea versus Manchester United.
sentences.cn: 看切爾西隊對曼徹斯特聯隊的比賽前，我們去買點爆米花。

sentences.en: He deceived her into the belief that he will buy her a ring if she can climb the vertical cliff.
sentences.cn: 他騙她相信，如果她登上那個陡峭的懸崖，他就買戒指給她。

sentences.en: He puts a veto upon my buying the high heels.
sentences.cn: 他不許我買那些高跟鞋。

sentences.en: He bought the latest MP3 via a friend.
sentences.cn: 他透過一個朋友買到了最新款的 MP3。

sentences.en: My heart vibrated with excitement when he bought me a bunch of roses.
sentences.cn: 當他買玫瑰給我時，我的心因興奮而悸動。

cn: v: 把⋯錄在錄影磁帶上

sentences.en: There is nothing to stop him from buying videotapes.
sentences.cn: 沒有什麼辦法可以阻止他買錄影帶。

sentences.en: The anchorman's words evoke a strong response in the viewers.
sentences.cn: 主持人的話在觀眾中產生強烈反響。

cn: 精力，(語言等的)氣勢，(動、植物的)強健

sentences.en: The salesman recommended the pen to me with great vigor.
sentences.cn: 售貨員很熱情地向我推銷那枝鋼筆。

sentences.en: The man who is buying a car is yet in green vigorous senility.
sentences.cn: 那個買汽車的人老當益壯。

sentences.en: The man was wakened from sleep by the villain.
sentences.cn: 男人被壞人驚醒。

sentences.en: My plan of going shopping died on the vine.
sentences.cn: 我去購物的計畫夭折了。

sentences.en: The woman who is playing a violin is a great violinist by any standard.
sentences.cn: 不論以什麼標準看，那個在演奏小提琴的女人都是偉大的小提琴家。

sentences.en: The customer in the shop doesn't obtain a visa for England.
sentences.cn: 商店裡那個顧客沒有獲得英國的簽證。

sentences.en: I take a vow never to buy a book again.
sentences.cn: 我發誓再也不買書了。

sentences.en: The woman waded into the products we sold.
sentences.cn: 那個女人猛烈地抨擊我們賣的產品。

sentences.en: When he stepped out of the supermarket, he heard the girl wailing.
sentences.cn: 當他走出超市時聽到女孩的哭叫聲。

sentences.en: The children who enter the supermarket should be in ward to adults.
sentences.cn: 孩子進入超市須由成人監護。

sentences.en: I think most of these wares are of poor quality.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這些商品大部分品質都不好。

sentences.en: The salesman thinks it's hard to clear off the old stocks in the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 售貨員認為倉庫裡的存貨很難處理掉。

sentences.en: The warrior cajoled his girlfriend into buying him a new armor.
sentences.cn: 那個戰士哄女朋友買新盔甲給他。

cn: 注意的，小心翼翼的，警戒的

sentences.en: I need to keep a wary eye on the customer over there.
sentences.cn: 我要密切注意那邊那個顧客的舉動。

sentences.en: I am weary of doing shopping alone.
sentences.cn: 我厭倦獨自購物。

sentences.en: The weird chothes he bought really gas me.
sentences.cn: 他買的奇裝異服真是笑死我了。

sentences.en: We have to fetch up at the wharf before they auction the boat.
sentences.cn: 我們得在他們拍賣那艘船之前趕到碼頭。

cn: ad: 在哪裡，靠近什麼地方

sentences.en: The courier couldn't bring to mind the customer’s whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 那個送貨員記不得顧客的住址。

sentences.en: I fix my attention on the foods whereas my husband does on the cigarettes in the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 逛超市時，我關注食品而我丈夫只看香菸。

sentences.en: “The vegetable price is rising.” She spoke with a whine.
sentences.cn: 她抱怨著說，「蔬菜的價格又在漲」。

sentences.en: My thoughts are in a whirl, so I don't want to go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我的思想很亂，所以不想去購物。

sentences.en: The salesman whisked away the dust on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 售貨員拂去那個架子上的灰塵。

sentences.en: The young man sought solace in the whisky bottle at the bar.
sentences.cn: 那個年輕人在酒吧裡借酒澆愁。

sentences.en: The wholesale price of the hat is 10 dollars.
sentences.cn: 這頂帽子的批發價是十美金。

cn: 有益健康的，合乎衛生的

sentences.en: It wouldn't be wholesome for her to do shopping there.
sentences.cn: 她去那裡購物恐怕不安全。

sentences.en: There is widespread condemnation of the cashier's rude attitude.
sentences.cn: 收銀員粗暴的態度遭到人們普遍的譴責。

sentences.en: The widow's heart is surcharged with grief and she doesn’t want to eat anything now.
sentences.cn: 那寡婦特別憂傷，她現在什麼都不想吃。

sentences.en: He always goes shopping since he is in the wilderness.
sentences.cn: 自從風光不再，他經常去購物。

sentences.en: Buying and selling animals is barred from wildlife sanctuaries.
sentences.cn: 野生動物保護區內禁止買賣動物。

cn: 枯萎，以鄙視等態度懾服某人

sentences.en: gardener's dish.
sentences.cn: 這些花都枯死了，公主把這歸咎於園丁。

cn: int: 用來表達悲傷或驚慌

sentences.en: Woe betide you if you stole the book I just bought.
sentences.cn: 如果你偷了我剛買的那本書，你會得到報應。

sentences.en: What do you want to do by buying a woodpecker?
sentences.cn: 你買一隻啄木鳥幹什麼？

sentences.en: Roll up your sleeves in the workshop and go shopping freely in your free time.
sentences.cn: 在工作坊時好好工作，空閒了可以自由地購物。

sentences.en: He led his daughter to the church to worship God before going shopping.
sentences.cn: 去購物前，他帶她女兒來教堂敬拜上帝。

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to take a risk to buy the house.
sentences.cn: 冒險買那個房子是值得的。

sentences.en: She doesn't esteem the salesman to be worthy of trust.
sentences.cn: 她認為那個售貨員不值得信賴。

sentences.en: I am rather dubious about his idea to buy a wreath.
sentences.cn: 我對他想買花環的想法持懷疑態度。

sentences.en: Wring out your wet clothes before entering the room.
sentences.cn: 進房間前把你的濕衣服擰乾。

sentences.en: The poor man isn't worthy to buy a yacht.
sentences.cn: 那個窮人不配買遊艇。

sentences.en: I have a yarn with my mother while shopping.
sentences.cn: 我跟媽媽一邊聊天一邊購物。

sentences.en: I know which store keeps a large stock of yeast cake.
sentences.cn: 我知道哪家商店有大量的酵母餅存貨供應。

sentences.en: I will never yield to any mean seller.
sentences.cn: 我絕不會向任何卑鄙的商家屈服。

sentences.en: Let's take up yoga to aid relaxation after shopping.
sentences.cn: 買完東西，我們練一下瑜伽來幫助放鬆。

sentences.en: The man wants to buy some brass which is an alloy of copper and zinc.
sentences.cn: 那個人想買銅鋅合金─黃銅。

sentences.en: Zip your lips when you buy foods.
sentences.cn: 買食物的時候閉上你的嘴。

sentences.en: This new kind of camera can zoom out on people.
sentences.cn: 這款新相機可以使人像縮小。

cn: n: 使用縮寫詞的人，縮短

sentences.en: Mister can be abbreviated to Mr. in commercial correspondence.
sentences.cn: 在商務信函中，Mister可以縮寫為 Mr.。

sentences.en: The buyer said that kg was the abbreviation of kilogram.
sentences.cn: 那個採購員說，kg是 kilogram的縮寫。

sentences.en: It's abnormal for you to missend the email.
sentences.cn: 你發錯郵件，這很不正常。

cn: n: 土著居民，土生生物

sentences.en: The manager had no idea of this aboriginal story.
sentences.cn: 那個經理不知道這個土著居民的故事。

sentences.en: At that instant, a negotiator suddenly spoke aborigine language.
sentences.cn: 在那一刻，一名談判員突然說了原住民語。

sentences.en: The warehouse abounded with computer equipments.
sentences.cn: 倉庫裡有很多電腦設備。

sentences.en: The supervisor was absentminded about everything at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 在會議上，主管對任何事都心不在焉。

sentences.en: The secretary looked at the memo with an air of abstraction.
sentences.cn: 祕書茫然地看著備忘錄。

sentences.en: It is said that the financier had an abundance of wealth.
sentences.cn: 據說，那位金融家非常富有。

sentences.en: He advised the superior not to abuse his privilege.
sentences.cn: 他建議上司不要濫用特權。

sentences.en: The trade regulations will be carried out to accelerate the development of economy.
sentences.cn: 貿易法規的實施是為了加快經濟的發展。

sentences.en: The factory needed a truck with a good acceleration.
sentences.cn: 工廠需要一輛加速性能很好的貨車。

sentences.en: Business information was accessible to the leader.
sentences.cn: 領導者很容易得到商業資訊。

sentences.en: The operator was charged with being the accessory to this commercial espionage.
sentences.cn: 那個接線生被指控為這個商業間諜的共犯。

sentences.en: This conference room can accommodate five hundred persons at most.
sentences.cn: 這個會議室最多可容納五百人。

sentences.en: Food and accommodation have become a great problem to the staff.
sentences.cn: 對於員工們來說，食宿已經變成一個大問題。

sentences.en: Don't buy the salesman’s story because his conduct always doesn’t accord with his words.
sentences.cn: 不要相信那個銷售員的話，他總是言行不一。

sentences.en: In accordance to your request, we will deliver goods as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 根據你方的要求，我方會儘快發貨。

sentences.en: Please inform them of our order for goods and they would inform act accordingly.
sentences.cn: 請通知他們我們的訂貨單，他們會照做的。

sentences.en: The shipping company should be accountable for the accident.
sentences.cn: 船運公司應該對事故負責。

sentences.en: It is said that there is no love left between the accounting and the production departments.
sentences.cn: 據說，會計部門和生產部門之間關係很不好。

sentences.en: The rainwater in the freight car had accumulated to a depth of half a meter.
sentences.cn: 貨車裡面的雨水已經有半公尺深了。

sentences.en: You must clean away all the accumulations of dirt in the meeting room in one hour.
sentences.cn: 你們必須在一個小時內清理掉會議室裡的所有積塵。

sentences.en: There is a hint of accusation in this letter of complaint.
sentences.cn: 這封投訴信裡暗含著指責。

sentences.en: All the employees must spend much time on the acquisition of English.
sentences.cn: 所有職員都必須花大量時間來學習英語。

cn: n: 行動主義者，積極分子

sentences.en: He has been an activist investor for so long time.
sentences.cn: 他成為一名激進投資者很長時間了。

sentences.en: The assistant said that there was an acute shortage of folders.
sentences.cn: 助理說資料夾嚴重短缺。

sentences.en: It is not in conformity with good social adaptation.
sentences.cn: 這不符合良好的社會適應能力。

sentences.en: The girl was not much of a secretary addict.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩並不是很喜歡祕書工作。

sentences.en: The boss came here to help his assistant overcome addiction to drugs.
sentences.cn: 老闆來這裡是為了幫助他的助理克服毒癮。

sentences.en: Internal affairs of the company are administered by professionals.
sentences.cn: 公司內部事務由專業人員進行管理。

sentences.en: Many new employees are ingratiating themselves with the administration department.
sentences.cn: 很多新員工都在討行政部門的歡心。

sentences.en: The administrative burden will be lifted from the company next year.
sentences.cn: 公司的行政負擔將於明年解除。

sentences.en: The company was starved for a network administrator.
sentences.cn: 公司急需一位網路系統管理員。

sentences.en: The corporate leaders didn't advocate reforming the management system.
sentences.cn: 公司領導人並不主張進行管理體制改革。

sentences.en: This superior was so affectionate towards his subordinates.
sentences.cn: 這位主管非常疼愛他的下屬。

sentences.en: I dare affirm that this is a junk mail.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定這是一封垃圾郵件。

sentences.en: Their termination of contract was condemned as aggression.
sentences.cn: 他們解除合約被譴責為一種挑釁行為。

sentences.en: It's a pity that the excellent leader had degenerated into an alcoholic.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，那位優秀的領導者已經墮落成為一名酗酒者。

sentences.en: You can't alienate from your colleagues or superiors.
sentences.cn: 你不能疏遠你的同事或上司。

sentences.en: This private enterprise has decided to be in alliance with the labor union.
sentences.cn: 這家私營企業決定與工會聯盟。

sentences.en: Key cards should be allocated to every employee.
sentences.cn: 出入證應該分配給每一名員工。

cn: 在旁邊，並排地 prep在旁邊

sentences.en: The secretary stood alongside of the president in the press conference.
sentences.cn: 在記者招待會上，祕書站在總裁的身邊。

cn: a: 二選一的，供選擇的

sentences.en: There was no alternative for the manager to agree with this plan.
sentences.cn: 經理別無選擇，只好同意這個方案。

sentences.en: The argument between them resulted from the ambiguities in the contract.
sentences.cn: 他們的爭論是由合約中的歧義引起的。

sentences.en: The manager was given an ambiguous reply when he asked about the minutes of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 經理詢問會議記錄時，得到了一個含糊不清的答覆。

sentences.en: Two firemen helped this injured worker into the ambulance.
sentences.cn: 兩名消防員扶這個受傷的工人上救護車。

sentences.en: The opponent would lay an ambush for the delegation.
sentences.cn: 對手將設下埋伏等待代表團的到來。

sentences.en: Could you tell me whether he was an amiable cooperator or not?
sentences.cn: 你能告訴我他是否是一個友善的合作者嗎？

sentences.en: It's the assistant who told me how to amplify the sound of the microphone.
sentences.cn: 是助理告訴我如何擴大麥克風的聲音。

sentences.en: As the editor-in-chief, have you read the newly-published the Analects of Confucius?
sentences.cn: 作為主編，你讀過那本新出版的《論語》嗎？

sentences.en: There was analogy between this contract and that one.
sentences.cn: 這兩份合約有相似之處。

sentences.en: I do believe he is a market analyst.
sentences.cn: 我確信他是一名市場分析員。

sentences.en: Please improve your analytical skills as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 請儘快提高你的分析能力。

sentences.en: It had never been more than an anecdote about the company development.
sentences.cn: 那只不過是一個有關公司發展的趣聞軼事罷了。

sentences.en: These scientists still made no clear distinction between animate and inanimate organisms.
sentences.cn: 這些科學家還無法清楚地辨別有生命和無生命的生物體。

sentences.en: The leaders always took their annoyance out on the new employees.
sentences.cn: 領導者們總是對新員工出氣。

sentences.en: If you agree to have anonymous vote at the meeting, just let you be.
sentences.cn: 如果你同意在會議上進行不記名投票，就隨你便吧。

cn: a: 南極的，南極地區的

sentences.en: It's your duty to reconsider the Antarctic Treaty.
sentences.cn: 你們有責任重新考慮南極條約。

sentences.en: The workers were permitted to erect antenna on the roof of the company.
sentences.cn: 允許工人在公司的屋頂安裝天線。

sentences.en: I grant you liberty to sell these antibiotic ointments on the market.
sentences.cn: 我允許你們在市場上銷售這種抗菌素軟膏。

sentences.en: Until recently, this antibody drug began to sell well.
sentences.cn: 直到最近，這種抗體藥物的銷量才有所提升。

sentences.en: The manager anticipated making a clean sweep in the product launch.
sentences.cn: 經理預期在產品發佈會上大獲全勝。

sentences.en: The president was in anticipation of more people attending this business party.
sentences.cn: 總裁期待有更多的人來參加這次的商業派對。

sentences.en: As a lawyer, he knew that defendant was the antonym of plaintiff.
sentences.cn: 作為一名律師，他知道被告是原告的反義詞。

sentences.en: This program is applicable to all office softwares.
sentences.cn: 這種程式適用於所有的辦公軟體。

sentences.en: I am an apprentice to the worker there.
sentences.cn: 我是那邊那個工人的徒弟。

sentences.en: This product questionnaire is approximate to perfect.
sentences.cn: 這份產品調查問卷近乎完美。

sentences.en: This entrepreneur has a strong aptitude for management.
sentences.cn: 這位企業家有很強的管理才能。

sentences.en: This instrument was designed for arctic exploration.
sentences.cn: 這個儀器是為北極探險而設計的。

sentences.en: The manager was waking up that this salesman was extremely arrogant.
sentences.cn: 經理開始認識到，這名業務員極其傲慢。

sentences.en: That a main artery would be built in this city is true.
sentences.cn: 這座城市真的要修建一條主幹道。

sentences.en: The agent struggled to articulate his view on retail.
sentences.cn: 那個代理商竭力表明自己對於零售的看法。

sentences.en: Could you help me check whether the stone was an artifact?
sentences.cn: 能否請你幫我一個忙，查看一下這個石頭是不是人造的？

sentences.en: Their plan to assassinate the business magnate was uncovered by the secretary.
sentences.cn: 他們刺殺那個商業巨頭的計畫被祕書發現了。

sentences.en: You must seek opportunities to assert yourself at the stockholders' meeting.
sentences.cn: 在股東大會上，你一定要尋找機會維護自己的權利。

sentences.en: It's too early to assess his capacity now.
sentences.cn: 現在對他的能力進行評估還為時過早。

sentences.en: Send a telegram on the assumption that the fax machine is broken.
sentences.cn: 假設傳真機壞了，就發電報。

sentences.en: This medical corporation is selling drugs which were contraindicated in patients with asthma.
sentences.cn: 這家醫藥公司正在銷售對哮喘病人禁用的藥物。

sentences.en: That is why most of the financiers seek for political asylum.
sentences.cn: 這就是大多數金融家尋求政治庇護的原因。

sentences.en: For us, it's of great importance to attain the sales target.
sentences.cn: 對我們來說，完成銷售目標非常重要。

sentences.en: Those attendants set about arranging the exhibition hall.
sentences.cn: 那些服務人員開始佈置展覽廳。

sentences.en: You could not take down the attic which was used to store goods.
sentences.cn: 你們不能拆除那個用於存放貨物的閣樓。

sentences.en: Due to economic crisis, they had to put these facilities up for auction.
sentences.cn: 由於經濟危機，他們不得不把這些設備拿去拍賣。

sentences.en: Do you know whether this trade secret is authentic?
sentences.cn: 你知不知道這個商業機密是否可信？

sentences.en: Under no circumstances will the bank authorize this loan.
sentences.cn: 在任何情況下，銀行都不會批准這項貸款。

sentences.en: What made the editor-in-chief happy was that he got the famous writer's autograph.
sentences.cn: 主編很開心，是因為他得到那位名作家的手稿。

sentences.en: The principals of the branch offices had full autonomy in their own markets.
sentences.cn: 分公司負責人對其管轄的市場享有充分的自主權。

sentences.en: These researchers are masters of aviation industry.
sentences.cn: 這些研究人員是航空業方面的專家。

sentences.en: We should do our utmost to live through this awesome economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 我們應該盡全力來度過這場可怕的經濟危機。

sentences.en: Stock index is a barometer of the market economy.
sentences.cn: 股票指數是市場經濟的晴雨錶。

sentences.en: The administrative director beckoned to the waiter when the banquet began.
sentences.cn: 宴會開始時，行政主管朝服務生招了招手。

sentences.en: The principal was constantly besieged by the reporters in the press conference.
sentences.cn: 在記者會上，負責人不斷受到記者的打擾。

sentences.en: It's out of character to betray your colleagues at work.
sentences.cn: 在工作中背叛你的同事很不像你。

sentences.en: I really want to know why you drank so much alcoholic beverage in the party.
sentences.cn: 我真的很想知道你為什麼在派對上喝那麼多酒精飲料。

sentences.en: The customers had a bias against import commodity.
sentences.cn: 顧客對進口商品心存偏見。

sentences.en: You are expected to put this binoculars on sale.
sentences.cn: 你應該廉價出售這個雙筒望遠鏡。

sentences.en: The scientists made a plan about researching the plant biochemistry.
sentences.cn: 科學家們制定計畫來研究植物生物化學。

cn: 生物學的，與生物學相關的

sentences.en: What do you mean by specializing in biological engineering?
sentences.cn: 你專修生物工程是什麼意思？

sentences.en: What made you think that the new colleague had a bizarre behavior?
sentences.cn: 你為什麼認為那個新同事行為怪異？

sentences.en: It's a surprise that the project leader looked bleak.
sentences.cn: 令人驚奇的是，那位專案負責人看起來很沮喪。

cn: v: 跌跌撞撞地走，犯錯誤

sentences.en: It's a blunder to let him know about our investment plan.
sentences.cn: 讓他瞭解我們的投資計畫是一個錯誤。

sentences.en: The house agent is blunt about his career life.
sentences.cn: 那位房產經紀人對自己的職場生活直言不諱。

sentences.en: The manager bombarded the secretary with the sales report.
sentences.cn: 經理不停地向祕書追問有關銷售報表的事情。

sentences.en: This professor is always in bondage to his self-conceit and arrogancy.
sentences.cn: 這名教授總是被自負和自大所束縛。

sentences.en: Merger of company gave the enterprise revenue a big revenue (P. 776) boost.
sentences.cn: 公司合併使企業效益大大提高。

sentences.en: What will you do if you fail your interview this bout?
sentences.cn: 如果這次你面試失敗了，你會做什麼？

sentences.en: Most of the customers have decided to put this fake commodity under a boycott.
sentences.cn: 大多數消費者決定聯合抵制這項偽劣商品。

sentences.en: Why on earth did the excellent student suffer from mental breakdown?
sentences.cn: 那個優秀的學生究竟為什麼精神崩潰？

sentences.en: This sales team made a breakthrough in dominating the Asia market.
sentences.cn: 這個銷售團隊在佔據亞洲市場方面有所突破。

sentences.en: Breakup of marriage didn't have an influence on his work.
sentences.cn: 婚姻破裂並未對他的工作造成影響。

cn: v: 釀製，沖泡，即將發生

sentences.en: The assistant brewed up a cup of tea for the visitor.
sentences.cn: 助理為訪客倒一杯茶。

sentences.en: It is said that the transnational corporation is on the brink of bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 據說，那家跨國公司就要倒閉了。

sentences.en: It's great to work with a brisk colleague.
sentences.cn: 與一個做事乾脆俐落的同事共事是很愉快的。

sentences.en: He can vouch for the authenticity of these recruitment brochures.
sentences.cn: 他能夠保證這些招聘簡章的真實性。

sentences.en: Actually, the headman of this factory was usually a brute to the workers.
sentences.cn: 事實上，這家工廠的負責人經常虐待工人。

sentences.en: You can benefit a lot if you buckle down to this new job.
sentences.cn: 如果你認真做這份新工作，你會受益頗多。

cn: 龐大的，笨重的，體積大的

sentences.en: The worker was incapable of moving this bulky cargo.
sentences.cn: 那名工人搬不動這件超大貨物。

sentences.en: Bureaucracy did grave damage to the interest of corporation.
sentences.cn: 官僚作風嚴重損害了公司利益。

sentences.en: Won't you attend the chairman’s burial?
sentences.cn: 你不想參加董事長的葬禮嗎？

sentences.en: Double byte is a computer terminology, is that right?
sentences.cn: 雙位元組是電腦用語，對嗎？

sentences.en: What would you think of that I buy a bottle of drink without caffeine for the manager?
sentences.cn: 你認為買一瓶不含咖啡因的飲料給經理怎麼樣？

sentences.en: Calcium is found abundantly in the dairy products produced by this company.
sentences.cn: 這家公司生產的乳製品中含有很多鈣。

sentences.en: The maintainer took out a plier from a canvas bag.
sentences.cn: 那名維修工從一個帆布包裡拿出一把鉗子。

sentences.en: This leader had the capability to deal with budgetary deficit.
sentences.cn: 這位領導人有能力應付預算赤字。

sentences.en: The following is the production process of this capsule.
sentences.cn: 下面是這種膠囊的生產流程。

sentences.en: Could you think up a caption which summarizes the conference?
sentences.cn: 你能想出概括會議內容的標題嗎？

sentences.en: The principal said that the truck was taken captive by the gangsters.
sentences.cn: 負責人說，那輛貨車被歹徒劫持了。

sentences.en: The great majority of the corrupt officials were kept captivity for two years.
sentences.cn: 大多數的受賄官員都被監禁了兩年。

sentences.en: The reason for her getting fat is that she usually has too many carbohydrates in the office.
sentences.cn: 她發胖是因為經常在辦公室裡吃過多的碳水化合物食品。

sentences.en: The female colleague gave my hand a caress.
sentences.cn: 那位女同事撫摸了一下我的手。

sentences.en: Maybe it's better for all the staff to go caroling together.
sentences.cn: 全體員工一起唱聖誕頌歌，可能會更好一些。

sentences.en: This senior accountant ever worked as a cashier in a district bank.
sentences.cn: 這名資深會計曾經在一家地方銀行當出納員。

sentences.en: This laid-off worker was a casualty of the company's layoff.
sentences.cn: 這名被解雇的工人是公司裁員的受害者。

sentences.en: No one knows that this catastrophe insurance has been abolished.
sentences.cn: 沒有人知道這項重大事故保險已經取消了。

sentences.en: As a service industry, we must cater to all the clients.
sentences.cn: 作為服務業，我們必須要滿足所有顧客的需求。

cn: 騎兵，騎兵部隊，裝甲部隊

sentences.en: All the people saw the cavalry charge down on a little girl via video.
sentences.cn: 透過影片，所有人都看到騎兵向一個小女孩衝去。

sentences.en: It is absurd that there is a big cavity in the boss's tooth.
sentences.cn: 老闆的牙上有個大洞，真是荒唐。

sentences.en: The chairman was buried in a private cemetery after he passed away.
sentences.cn: 董事長去世後，被埋在私人墓地裡。

sentences.en: I know with certainty that where the book of tender is.
sentences.cn: 我確切知道投標書放在哪裡。

cn: 證明，擔保，發證書（或執照）給

sentences.en: The applicant has been certified as a senior accountant.
sentences.cn: 那位應聘者已經拿到高級會計師證書。

sentences.en: The waiters served up champagne after the business dinner began.
sentences.cn: 商務宴會開始後，服務生端上香檳酒。

sentences.en: The president's disappearance threw the whole company into chaos.
sentences.cn: 總裁的失蹤使整個公司陷入一片混亂。

sentences.en: The administrative assistant's work is characterized by patience and carefulness.
sentences.cn: 那位行政助理的工作特點是耐心和細心。

sentences.en: One third of the clients thought this activated charcoal was easy to use.
sentences.cn: 有三分之一的顧客認為這種活性炭使用起來很方便。

sentences.en: I will never allow you to watch chariot race during work-time.
sentences.cn: 我絕不允許你在工作時間看戰車比賽。

sentences.en: Embarking in charitable causes could earn the company a good reputation.
sentences.cn: 從事慈善事業可以為公司贏得好名聲。

sentences.en: Many employees got fat, which was not a predictor of high cholesterol level.
sentences.cn: 很多員工發胖，並不表示他們的膽固醇很高。

cn: 慢性的，長久的，習慣性的

sentences.en: Chronic gastritis always coexists with work stress.
sentences.cn: 慢性胃炎總是與工作壓力同時存在。

sentences.en: After giving a little chuckle, the assistant leveled with the manager.
sentences.cn: 輕聲一笑之後，助手對經理說了實話。

sentences.en: The student sought his bed after completing a fair chunk of her article.
sentences.cn: 學生寫完大部分的文章後，就睡覺了。

sentences.en: Pre-job training was intended to civilize those inexperienced new employees.
sentences.cn: 職前培訓的目的在於教育那些毫無經驗的新員工。

sentences.en: The secretary clamped the folder to the pen container.
sentences.cn: 祕書把資料夾夾在筆筒上。

sentences.en: With this knowledge, the stenographer could classify with clarity.
sentences.cn: 瞭解這些，速記員就可以清楚地進行分類。

sentences.en: After work, her business is to cleanse the office.
sentences.cn: 下班後，她的任務是清理辦公室。

sentences.en: There is not enough clearance for the locker being put in the office.
sentences.cn: 辦公室裡沒有足夠的空間來放置儲物櫃。

sentences.en: This new employee felt a clench in his head when seeing the superior.
sentences.cn: 看到上司時，這位新員工感到頭部一陣揪緊。

sentences.en: The institute of medicine was doing clinical trial on the drugs of your company.
sentences.cn: 醫學研究院正在對你們公司的藥物進行臨床試驗。

sentences.en: Many employees said that the manager was a younger clone of the chairman.
sentences.cn: 很多員工說，經理是董事長年輕時的翻版。

cn: v: 使結束，使停止辯論

sentences.en: The principal was meant to declare the closure of the factory.
sentences.cn: 負責人打算宣告工廠關閉。

sentences.en: It's strange that there was a coffin at the gate of the company.

cn: n: 強光，最重要的事情

sentences.en: The manager invited me to her suite for business.
sentences.cn: 經理邀請我去她的套房談生意。

sentences.en: The sound in the concert hall was in superb condition.
sentences.cn: 音樂廳裡的音響狀況極好。

sentences.en: Most of the employees believed in the superiority of this measure.
sentences.cn: 大多數員工都相信這項措施的優越性。

sentences.en: The engineers decided to improve on this supersonic plane.
sentences.cn: 工程師們決定改良這架超音速飛機。

sentences.en: The old man was quite superstitious, so you weren't satisfied of him.
sentences.cn: 那名老男人很迷信，你別相信他。

sentences.en: I mean there to be close supervision to the staff.
sentences.cn: 我的意思是，要好好監督員工們。

sentences.en: What the supervisor likes best is Sunday supplement.
sentences.cn: 周日增刊是主管的最愛。

sentences.en: The newcome employee will soon surpass us in technology.
sentences.cn: 這個新來的員工很快會在技術上超過我們。

sentences.en: The manager said the surplus equipment should be handed in to the factory.
sentences.cn: 經理說多餘器材應該交回工廠。

sentences.en: I waited in great suspense for the boss's decision.
sentences.cn: 我焦急萬分地等待老闆的決定。

sentences.en: The mistake led to his suspension from office.
sentences.cn: 他因為這個錯誤暫時停職。

sentences.en: My colleague wants to swap her working scheme for mine.
sentences.cn: 我的同事想跟我換一下工作方案。

sentences.en: It's symbolic of his formal retirement.
sentences.cn: 這意味著他正式退休了。

sentences.en: The document symbolizes the manager's failure, so he is in utter despair.
sentences.cn: 這份文件說明經理失敗，所以他徹底絕望了。

sentences.en: I will seek my boss's advice about the symmetry of the house I designed.
sentences.cn: 關於我設計的這個房子的對稱性問題，我將徵求老闆的意見。

sentences.en: The manager told us to keep a tab on the newcome colleague's symptoms.
sentences.cn: 經理讓我們注意那個新同事的病症。

sentences.en: My boss is a synonym for wisdom in the company.
sentences.cn: 在我們公司，老闆就是智慧的代名詞。

sentences.en: Making synthetic leather is an ordeal for these workers.
sentences.cn: 製作人造皮革對於這些工人來說是件痛苦的事情。

sentences.en: I have no tact in dealing with my classmates.
sentences.cn: 我太傻了，不會和同學們相處。

sentences.en: The little boy must use surprising tactics to win the competition.
sentences.cn: 為了贏得比賽，那個小男孩必須採用出人意料的手段。

sentences.en: There is a very high tariff on the product, so the manager gave up buying.
sentences.cn: 這種產品的關稅很高，所以經理放棄採購。

sentences.en: He said the tedious job simply ate him up.
sentences.cn: 他說單調乏味的工作簡直把他煩死了。

sentences.en: Our landlord is a young man with an artistic temperament.
sentences.cn: 我們的房東是一個很有藝術家氣質的年輕人。

cn: 大風暴，騷動 v使遭受暴風雨（或雪），使騷動

sentences.en: No tempest is capable of shattering my decision to resign.
sentences.cn: 任何驚濤駭浪都不能動搖我辭職的決心。

sentences.en: I heard your contract will terminate next week.
sentences.cn: 我聽說你的合約下周就到期了。

sentences.en: The manager told us textile prices had been marked down.
sentences.cn: 經理告訴我們紡織品降價了。

sentences.en: Cotton fabric the workers produce has a pleasant texture.
sentences.cn: 工人們生產的棉布手感很好。

cn: n: 戲劇表演，戲劇演員

sentences.en: I have no time to have dinner because of working overtime, to say nothing of the theatrical district.
sentences.cn: 因為加班，我連吃飯的時間都沒有，更談不上去劇院了。

sentences.en: My colleague was prosecuted for theft yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我同事因偷竊被告發了。

cn: 理論上的，假設的，空論的

sentences.en: His resigning tomorrow is only a theoretical possibility.
sentences.cn: 他明天就辭職只是一種假設。

cn: 治療學家，特定療法技師

sentences.en: I just want to be a family therapist after resigning.
sentences.cn: 我只想在辭職後做一個家庭治療師。

sentences.en: My brother underwent aversion therapy for his addiction to drinking last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，我哥哥因為酗酒成癮而接受厭惡療法的治療。

sentences.en: I was sold out by one of my friends, thereafter we didn't speak to each other.
sentences.cn: 我被一個朋友出賣，此後我們互相不理睬。

sentences.en: The manager has this matter up his / her sleeve, thereby you needn't worry.
sentences.cn: 經理對這件事有應急計畫，所以你不用擔心。

sentences.en: Watch out for thermometer in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 密切注意實驗室裡的那個溫度計。

sentences.en: I can't use a computer on the threshold of my job.
sentences.cn: 剛開始工作時，我不會用電腦。

sentences.en: Our boss said that to practice thrift is a virtue.
sentences.cn: 我們老闆說，節儉是美德。

sentences.en: The thrifty housewife said she got something on our manager.
sentences.cn: 這個勤儉持家的主婦說，她抓住我們經理的把柄。

sentences.en: The company thrives on our boss's good management.
sentences.cn: 我們公司的興旺發展得益於老闆的良好管理。

sentences.en: My heart was throbbing with excitement when he interviewed me.
sentences.cn: 當他面試我的時候，我興奮得心直跳。

cn: 通行費，損失，長途電話費

sentences.en: Hard working takes a heavy toll of her body.
sentences.cn: 辛苦工作使她的身體受到了傷害。

cn: 使倒塌，搖搖欲墜，將⋯推翻

sentences.en: The assistant toppled over onto the floor when the super star came in.
sentences.cn: 這名超級巨星進來時，助理摔倒在地板上。

sentences.en: A tornado whirled into the city when we were having a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我們在開會時，一場龍捲風襲擊了這座城市。

sentences.en: One of the manager's less attractive traits is criticizing us in public.
sentences.cn: 經理有個不大討人喜歡的特點，就是喜歡當眾責備我們。

sentences.en: There is a tranquil expression on my boss's face at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 開會時，老闆的臉上有種安祥自若的表情。

sentences.en: The tranquilizer can be up your sleeve during work.
sentences.cn: 工作時，你可以私下準備一些鎮靜劑。

sentences.en: The manager left the transaction of the matter to me.
sentences.cn: 經理把這個業務交給我辦理。

sentences.en: The secretary sneaked a peek at the transcript of the interview.
sentences.cn: 祕書偷偷看了一眼採訪內容的文字稿。

sentences.en: I want to make the transformation from an ordinary employee to a manager.
sentences.cn: 我想由一個普通的員工變身成為一名經理。

cn: 電晶體，晶體管收音機，半導體收音機

sentences.en: Grandfather takes a transistor everywhere.
sentences.cn: 爺爺去哪裡都帶著一個晶體管收音機。

sentences.en: You should make an effort to protect the products in transit.
sentences.cn: 在運送過程中，你應該努力保護好這些產品。

sentences.en: His transition from an employee to a boss is hard.
sentences.cn: 他從一個員工變為老闆，過程非常艱辛。

sentences.en: I think the document will be delayed in transmission.
sentences.cn: 我覺得這份文件會在傳遞中被耽誤。

sentences.en: Please transmit the document to the manager right away.
sentences.cn: 請立即把這份文件傳給經理。

sentences.en: I hated being transplanted from this office to that one.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡從這個辦公室移到那個辦公室。

sentences.en: The girl's fear at the elevator may have its root in a childhood trauma.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩對電梯的恐懼可能源於童年時期的創傷。

sentences.en: She didn't really mean to tread on the manager’s toes.
sentences.cn: 她不是真的有意要冒犯經理。

sentences.en: One of my friends was suspected of treason.
sentences.cn: 我的一個朋友被懷疑犯有叛國罪。

cn: n: 牛車旅行，艱苦的跋涉

sentences.en: It's a long trek from my house to the night market.
sentences.cn: 從我家到夜市很遠。

sentences.en: There was a slight tremor in the manager's voice when he told us the good news.
sentences.cn: 經理通知我們這個好消息時，他的聲音略微有點顫抖。

sentences.en: Don't trespass upon the staff during working hours.
sentences.cn: 工作時間不要打擾員工。

sentences.en: I heard the boss is quick on the trigger.
sentences.cn: 我聽說老闆很機靈。

sentences.en: All of my colleagues made a triumphant return.
sentences.cn: 我們的同事全部凱旋而歸。

sentences.en: The girl works herself up about the most trivial things during working hours.
sentences.cn: 工作時間內，最瑣碎的事情也能讓那女孩變得很激動。

cn: a: 顯示身份或地位的，有威望的

sentences.en: The image of the girl holding up the trophy is still etched on my memories now.
sentences.cn: 我現在還記著女孩舉著獎杯的樣子。

sentences.en: We sit in the classroom and imagine the tropic sun glared down on us.
sentences.cn: 我們坐在教室，想像著熱帶的太陽整日灼曬著我們。

cn: n: 逃學者，逃避責任者

sentences.en: The secretary wasn't reprimanded for playing truant before.
sentences.cn: 祕書以前沒有因翹班而受到過斥責。

sentences.en: Let's call a truce to avoid the boss’s suspicion.
sentences.cn: 我們休戰吧，以免引起老闆的懷疑。

sentences.en: She was infected with tuberculosis last year.
sentences.cn: 她去年被傳染肺結核。

sentences.en: What's the relation between malignant tumor and cancer?
sentences.cn: 惡性腫瘤和癌症有什麼關係？

sentences.en: The critic's criticism put him in turmoil.
sentences.cn: 評論家的批評讓他很焦慮。

sentences.en: Don't leave me in the twilight of my career, please.
sentences.cn: 請不要在我事業的衰退時期離開我。

sentences.en: I resign in an effort to counter the boss's tyranny.
sentences.cn: 我辭職是為了對老闆的專橫表示抗議。

sentences.en: My mother was stricken by stomach ulcer last year.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽去年罹患胃潰瘍。

sentences.en: The ultimate responsibility for the labor trouble undoubtedly lies in the management.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，資方應當為此次勞資糾紛負完全責任。

sentences.en: The employees were unanimous in their oppositions to the salary reduction.
sentences.cn: 雇員們都一致反對削減薪水。

sentences.en: It was she who uncovered a plot against the sales manager.
sentences.cn: 是她揭露針對那位銷售經理的陰謀。

sentences.en: The director appeared to have underestimated the cost of the business trip.
sentences.cn: 那位主管似乎低估了這次出差的費用。

sentences.en: They underwent great hardship at the beginning of the program.
sentences.cn: 這個計畫開始時，他們遭遇極大的困難。

sentences.en: His confidence was seriously undermined by repeated failures of his efforts to get a promotion.
sentences.cn: 努力謀求晉升，卻屢次失敗，他的信心受到嚴重的打擊。

sentences.en: I cannot undertake that she will undertake the task.
sentences.cn: 我不能保證她會接手這項任務。

sentences.en: Always remember that even a small mistake might undo all our efforts.
sentences.cn: 要時刻記得，即便是一個小小的失誤，也可能使我們前功盡棄。

cn: 失業，失業狀況，失業人數

sentences.en: Due to the economic crisis, more and more workers faced unemployment.
sentences.cn: 由於經濟危機，愈來愈多的工人面臨失業。

sentences.en: It's a scandal that the director unfolded the business secret to their opponent.
sentences.cn: 那位主管把商業機密告訴對手，真是可恥。

sentences.en: Never should you underestimate the difficulty of unifying each department.
sentences.cn: 你永遠都不要輕視統一各個部門的困難。

sentences.en: The manager was in a savage mood and left before the assistant unlocked the door.
sentences.cn: 那位經理非常生氣，等不及助理開門就走了。

sentences.en: She saw the sales manager unpack the contract from the drawer.
sentences.cn: 她看到那位銷售經理從那個抽屜裡取出合約。

sentences.en: His son who had a strict upbringing became a director in the multinational company.
sentences.cn: 他那個受到嚴格教育的兒子成為那家跨國公司的一名主管。

sentences.en: He was upgraded to the director of the sales department last week.
sentences.cn: 上周，他晉升為銷售部主管。

sentences.en: The manager who had a savage temper found it hard to get employees to uphold his verdict.
sentences.cn: 那位性情粗暴的經理發現，難以讓雇員們支持他的裁決。

sentences.en: It was decided by a unanimous vote that he should undertake the task to research into enriched uranium.
sentences.cn: 一致決定，由他來接手研究濃縮鈾的任務。

sentences.en: It's a matter of urgency that the marketing plan be prepared by next week.
sentences.cn: 行銷計畫須於下周之前準備妥當，這是當務之急。

sentences.en: The assistant always passes his urine before he punches out.
sentences.cn: 那位助理總是在下班打卡之前去小便。

sentences.en: You can ask the secretary to usher you into the manager's office.
sentences.cn: 你可以讓那位祕書引領你去經理辦公室。

sentences.en: The clerk underestimated the cost of the writing utensils by twenty percent.
sentences.cn: 那位職員對書寫用具的花費低估了百分之二十。

sentences.en: It's a problem of great urgency that we should design the utility furniture.
sentences.cn: 當務之急是設計多功能傢俱。

sentences.en: The research group tried to utilize solar power as a source of energy.
sentences.cn: 那個研究組試圖將太陽能作為能源。

sentences.en: We have done our utmost to help you with that task.
sentences.cn: 我們已經盡最大的努力來幫助你做那項工作。

sentences.en: We should have a contract with them for the supply of vaccine.
sentences.cn: 就疫苗供應一事，我們應當與他們簽訂合約。

sentences.en: It was a valiant attempt to apply for a job in the well-known company.
sentences.cn: 向那家知名的公司裡申請職位，是很勇敢的嘗試。

sentences.en: They insisted that the contract was held to be valid.
sentences.cn: 他們堅持認為，這份合約是有效的。

sentences.en: I'm afraid the period of validity of the sales contract has expired.
sentences.cn: 恐怕，這份銷售合約的有效期已滿。

sentences.en: We had a contract with their company to supply concentrated vanilla.
sentences.cn: 我們和他們公司有供應香草香精的合約。

sentences.en: I wonder why the quality of your work is distinctively variable.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，為什麼你的工作品質時好時差。

sentences.en: The currency exchange rate does not seem to show much variation this season.
sentences.cn: 這一季的貨幣兌換率似乎並沒有太大的變動。

sentences.en: The manager questioned the validity of the assumption that someone vended customers' personal information.
sentences.cn: 那位經理對某人出售顧客個人資訊的推測感到有些懷疑。

cn: 攤販，自動售貨機，供應商

sentences.en: You said she once worked as a street vendor.
sentences.cn: 你說，她曾經是個街頭小販。

sentences.en: The news that she was fired brought her to the verge of tears.
sentences.cn: 聽到自己被解雇的消息，她都快哭了。

sentences.en: The company whose main products were versatile tools was said to be on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 據說那家主要生產萬用工具的公司瀕臨破產。

sentences.en: There seems to be different versions of the manager's resignation.
sentences.cn: 對於經理辭職一事，似乎有不同的說法。

sentences.en: The veteran was elected as the chairman of the chamber of commerce by a unanimous vote.
sentences.cn: 那位老兵以全數通過當選為商會主席。

sentences.en: The vet's complaints appeared to be all variations on a theme.
sentences.cn: 那位獸醫的抱怨不滿，說來說去似乎也都是那麼回事。

sentences.en: The interviewer got good vibrations from the interviewee.
sentences.cn: 那位面試者給面試官留下好印象。

sentences.en: Carelessness should be one of the assistant's little vices.
sentences.cn: 粗心大意是那位助理的缺點之一。

sentences.en: The manager's vicious look gave her bad vibrations.
sentences.cn: 那位經理惡狠狠的樣子給她留下不好的印象。

sentences.en: The accountant was victimized for discovering undisposed deficit.
sentences.cn: 那位會計因為發現未處理的帳目虧空而遭懲處。

sentences.en: With so many variations, it's hard to estimate who will be the victor in the competition for the contract.
sentences.cn: 有那麼多變數存在，難以判斷誰會獲勝，爭取到這份合約。

sentences.en: Our company was victorious over theirs in the competition for the contract.
sentences.cn: 我們公司勝過他們公司，爭取到這份合約。

sentences.en: The manager raised valid objections to the plan for building a villa there.
sentences.cn: 對於在那裡修建別墅的計畫，那位經理提出了有力的反對。

sentences.en: The workers needed in the vineyard were always subject to variation.
sentences.cn: 這個葡萄園裡所需要的工人是經常變動的。

sentences.en: It's said that a virtual state of competition existed between the two companies.
sentences.cn: 據說，這兩家公司實際上是處於競爭狀態。

sentences.en: She cannot visualize what her life would be like if she lost the job.
sentences.cn: 她無法想像，如果失去這份工作，她的生活將會是什麼樣子。

sentences.en: The new editor appeared to be bursting with vitality and imagination.
sentences.cn: 那位新編輯似乎充滿活力和想像力。

cn: a: 聲音的，直言不諱的

sentences.en: Most interviewees were vocal about their expectation of the salary.
sentences.cn: 大多數面試者都對薪資期望值直言不諱。

sentences.en: I'm afraid you have missed your vocation; you should have been a good teacher.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你是入錯行了，你本該是一位好老師。

sentences.en: She was the virtual head of the vocational training.
sentences.cn: 她是這次職業培訓的實際負責人。

sentences.en: Electronic products of the company had a great vogue three years ago.
sentences.cn: 三年前，這家公司的電子產品風靡一時。

sentences.en: The young man vomited up all he had eaten after coming home from the banquet.
sentences.cn: 從宴會上回到家之後，那名年輕男子把所吃的東西都吐了出來。

sentences.en: The man dressed in cheap and vulgar clothes had little vocation for interpretation.
sentences.cn: 那個穿著廉價而低俗衣服的人不適合作口譯。

sentences.en: Her unemployment left her feeling vulnerable and helpless.
sentences.cn: 失業使得她六神無主，十分無助。

sentences.en: It's a matter of the utmost importance to provide wardrobes with different sizes for consumers.
sentences.cn: 為顧客提供不同尺寸的衣櫃是極為重要的。

sentences.en: In those countries engaged in warfare, it's hard to visualize supporting your family with the poor salary from work.
sentences.cn: 在那些交戰國中，難以想像要用微薄的工資來養家。

sentences.en: You had better make sure that your laptop is still under warranty.
sentences.cn: 你最好確保你的筆記型電腦還在保固期內。

sentences.en: They made a valiant attempt to design the waterproof clothing.
sentences.cn: 他們做了大膽的嘗試，來設計防水衣服。

sentences.en: There is no evidence whatsoever to show that the scientist wants to resign.
sentences.cn: 並沒有什麼證據表明，那位科學家想要辭職。

sentences.en: He saw through the windshield that the guard held the worker's arm in a vice-like grip.
sentences.cn: 透過擋風玻璃，他看到，那名警衛緊緊地抓住工人的手臂。

sentences.en: The assistant's ability to withstand pressure had been tested to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 那位助理對壓力的承受已經達到極限。

cn: 反應靈敏的，詼諧的，機智的

sentences.en: But for the witty remarks, the question of the reporter will put the senator in a vulnerable position.
sentences.cn: 要不是有幽默的妙語，那個記者的問題將會使參議員處於危險的境地。

sentences.en: We have been pushed to the utmost limits of endurance by the manager who woos success.
sentences.cn: 我們已經被那位想要獲得成功的經理逼得忍無可忍了。

sentences.en: He angrily wrenched his arm away when she tried to explain the matter to him.
sentences.cn: 她想對他解釋這件事的時候，他生氣地把手臂掙脫開了。

sentences.en: They wrestled with great difficulty in the competition for the contract.
sentences.cn: 為了爭取到這份合約，他們在競爭中努力克服極大的困難。

sentences.en: The assistant yearned to get a promotion.
sentences.cn: 那位助理渴望獲得晉升。

sentences.en: The new manager always works with great zeal.
sentences.cn: 那位新來的經理總是熱情洋溢地工作。

sentences.en: The new President addressed the entire nation and made a considerable promise.
sentences.cn: 這位新上任的總統向全體國民致詞，並做出了一個重要的承諾。

sentences.en: We'll have a new addition to the family next week.
sentences.cn: 下個月我們家會新添一個成員。

sentences.en: I never thought that you could adapt yourself to a new environment so quickly.
sentences.cn: 我從沒想到你能這麼快適應新環境。

sentences.en: The novel has been adapted into a movie.
sentences.cn: 這本小說已被改編為電影。

sentences.en: Suddenly, I felt an acute pain in my back.
sentences.cn: 突然間，我感到背上一陣劇痛。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the blind have an acute sense of hearing.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，盲人的聽覺比較敏銳。

sentences.en: The actual price was much higher than I had thought.
sentences.cn: 實際價格比我以為的要高得多。

sentences.en: My father acquired an antique painting during his trip to China last month.
sentences.cn: 我父親上個月去中國旅行的時候得到一幅古畫。

sentences.en: The young man refused to acknowledge his defeat until the award ceremony was over.
sentences.cn: 年輕人拒絕承認他的失敗，直到頒獎典禮結束。

sentences.en: The whole team acknowledged heartily the financial assistance offered by the local government.
sentences.cn: 整個團隊衷心地感謝市政當局提供的財政援助。

sentences.en: Work hard and you'll achieve success someday.
sentences.cn: 努力工作，總有一天你會獲得成功。

sentences.en: I need an accurate scale for I'm on a diet.
sentences.cn: 為了減肥，我需要一個精確的體重計。

sentences.en: The company is advertising for an accountant.
sentences.cn: 公司正在招聘一名會計師。

sentences.en: According to our records, Nicholas has been late for work three times this month.
sentences.cn: 根據記錄，這個月尼可拉斯已經有三次上班遲到了。

sentences.en: Thinking he would never accomplish anything, the man was very angry.
sentences.cn: 想到他會永遠一事無成，讓那人非常生氣。

sentences.en: She asked me to accompany her to the concert, but I refused.
sentences.cn: 她請我陪她去音樂會，但是我拒絕了。

sentences.en: She accompanied wonderfully during the concert and caused bursts of applause.
sentences.cn: 她在這場音樂會上伴奏地非常好，贏得了陣陣掌聲。

sentences.en: Only hardcore fans have access to the superstar.
sentences.cn: 只有資深粉絲才能接近這位巨星。

sentences.en: The only access to the island is by ship.
sentences.cn: 要去這座小島只能坐船。

sentences.en: The girl speaks English with a strong Canadian accent.
sentences.cn: 那個女孩說英語有很重的加拿大口音。

sentences.en: If one wants to correctly pronunce this word, one should accent the second syllable.
sentences.cn: 如果想正確地發這個單字的讀音，你應該重讀這個單字的第二個音節。

sentences.en: The police have collected abundant proof of the young man's guilt.
sentences.cn: 員警已經搜集了大量的證據證明這個年輕人有罪。

sentences.en: On his bookshelf are literary masterpieces in abundance.
sentences.cn: 他的書櫃上有大量文學名著。

sentences.en: It was absurd of you to give such a suggestion!
sentences.cn: 你竟然給出這樣的建議，真是荒唐！

sentences.en: Where did you come up with such an abstract painting? I really can't understand it.
sentences.cn: 你從哪裡弄來這幅抽象畫？我真的一點都看不懂。

sentences.en: Open your book, and turn to page 3. We will start with the abstract.
sentences.cn: 打開書，翻到第三頁。我們先從摘要開始。

sentences.en: Plants absorb carbon dioxide and release oxygen.
sentences.cn: 植物能吸收二氧化碳，釋放氧氣。

sentences.en: This interesting book absorbs even the naughtiest boy's total attention.
sentences.cn: 即使是最淘氣的男孩子也被這本有趣的書吸引了全部注意力。

sentences.en: Timmy has absolute trust in his older brother who is regarded as a genius.
sentences.cn: 提米對他那被譽為天才的哥哥有著絕對的信任。

sentences.en: Tell me the reason for your absence yesterday.
sentences.cn: 告訴我你昨天缺席的原因。

sentences.en: The carriage came to an abrupt stop.
sentences.cn: 馬車突然停止了。

sentences.en: John dares not drive on roads with many abrupt turns.
sentences.cn: 我不敢在有很多急轉彎的路上開車。

sentences.en: I have never been abroad before on account of not having the money to.
sentences.cn: 因為沒有錢，我之前從來沒有出過國。

sentences.en: This book I bought is abridged from the original work.
sentences.cn: 我買的這本書是原版的縮減版。

sentences.en: To keep abreast of current affairs, we can watch the news on TV or surf the internet.
sentences.cn: 為了隨時了解時事，我們可以看電視新聞或者上網。

sentences.en: The officials are talking about abolishing the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 官員們在討論廢除死刑。

sentences.en: They didn't go to the park yesterday because of the abnormal weather.
sentences.cn: 因為異常的天氣，昨天他們沒有去公園。

sentences.en: The researcher became more irritable after conducting a study on abnormal psychology.
sentences.cn: 這個研究人員自從研究了變態心理學之後，變得更加易怒了。

sentences.en: I want you to know that my son has the ability to present complex matters lucidly.
sentences.cn: 我想讓你們明白，我兒子有深入淺出地表述複雜事物的能力。

sentences.en: I bet no one can abide these conditions.
sentences.cn: 我打賭沒人能忍受這種條件。

sentences.en: The young man said he would abide by his promise.
sentences.cn: 那位年輕人說他會遵守諾言。

sentences.en: At last, the manager decided to abandon the scheme.
sentences.cn: 最終，經理決定放棄這個方案。

sentences.en: She was asked to arrange all of the books on the shelves before leaving the bookstore.
sentences.cn: 她被要求在離開書店之前把書架上書全部整理好。

sentences.en: He promised that he would arrive before noon, but he didn't appear until two o’clock.
sentences.cn: 他承諾說中午前會到，可是直到兩點鐘才出現。

sentences.en: She appears to have lost interest in her job.
sentences.cn: 看來她對自己的工作已經失去興趣了。

sentences.en: It's very apparent that he has fallen in love with her.
sentences.cn: 很顯然，他已經愛上她了。

sentences.en: Did she accept his apology for breaking her vase?
sentences.cn: 他打碎了她的花瓶，她接受他的道歉嗎？

sentences.en: She is anxious about her son who left home more than five years ago.
sentences.cn: 她的兒子已經離家五年多了，她很擔心他。

sentences.en: I was anxious to know the result of the competition as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 我很想儘快知道比賽的結果。

sentences.en: Please fill in this blank with your annual salary.
sentences.cn: 請在這個空格裡填寫你的年薪。

sentences.en: His parents were incredibly excited when he announced his engagement.
sentences.cn: 當他宣佈他已經訂婚時，他的父母激動不已。

sentences.en: The angle of that line needs to be corrected.
sentences.cn: 這條線的角度需要重新校正。

sentences.en: The ancient history of Roman civilization interests me greatly.
sentences.cn: 古羅馬文明史對我很有吸引力。

sentences.en: His funny expression amused the children.
sentences.cn: 他滑稽的表情把孩子們給逗樂了

sentences.en: Can you please amplify your viewpoint further?
sentences.cn: 你們能進一步詳述你們的觀點嗎？

sentences.en: Amplify your voice so that everyone can hear you.
sentences.cn: 把聲音放大一些，讓每個人都能聽到。

sentences.en: There's ample room for the children on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 沙發很寬敞，容得下孩子們。

sentences.en: Ten dollars will be ample for my needs.
sentences.cn: 十美元就夠我用了。

sentences.en: He has no idea who the owner of the land alongside the river is.
sentences.cn: 他不知道河邊的那塊地歸誰所有。

sentences.en: The teacher raised the alarm when the girl had not gotten to school at 9 a.m.
sentences.cn: 當女孩早上九點還沒有到學校時，她的老師報了警。

sentences.en: The dog was alarmed by the noise and ran away.
sentences.cn: 小狗被那噪音嚇跑了。

sentences.en: Look, that's the newest combat aircraft.
sentences.cn: 看，這是最新式的戰鬥機。

sentences.en: The aim of this new government policy is to reduce unemployment.
sentences.cn: 政府的這項新政策目的在於降低失業率。

sentences.en: Aim the gun carefully at the target, and then pull the trigger.
sentences.cn: 小心瞄準目標，然後扣動扳機。

sentences.en: The effect of AIDS should never be discounted.
sentences.cn: 決不能低估愛滋病的影響。

sentences.en: You have given enough aid to us in our work.
sentences.cn: 你已經在工作上給我們足夠的幫助了。

sentences.en: We aided him in applying for a visa.
sentences.cn: 我們幫助他申請簽證。

sentences.en: How to promote the development of agriculture is still a big problem that is waiting for a solution.
sentences.cn: 如何快速發展農業仍然是個亟待解決的問題。

cn: 令人愉快的；欣然同意的

sentences.en: With such agreeable weather, they plan to go hiking.
sentences.cn: 天氣如此好，他們打算去健行。

sentences.en: Do you think he will be agreeable to your plan?
sentences.cn: 你認為他會欣然同意你的計畫嗎？

sentences.en: Can you afford a ten-day trip to Europe?
sentences.cn: 你能負擔得起歐洲十日遊嗎？

sentences.en: I know smoking affects one's health, but it’s really hard to quit.
sentences.cn: 我知道吸菸會影響健康，但是戒菸真的很難。

sentences.en: I am afraid the cancer has affected your lungs.
sentences.cn: 我擔心癌症已經侵入你的肺臟。

sentences.en: The wife advised her husband not to drive too fast because safety comes first.
sentences.cn: 妻子建議丈夫不要開得太快，因為安全才是第一。

sentences.en: I'm here asking you for some advice. Can you help me?
sentences.cn: 我希望你能給我些建議，你能幫我嗎？

sentences.en: The company advertised their new product on the sides of city buses.
sentences.cn: 公司將新產品的廣告刊登在市區公車車身上。

sentences.en: His height advantage helped a lot in the competition.
sentences.cn: 他的身高優勢在比賽中幫了大忙。

sentences.en: She advanced a suggestion to postpone the meeting.
sentences.cn: 她提議推遲會議。

sentences.en: Science and technology have made great advances in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近些年來，科學和技術取得了重大發展。

sentences.en: You have to admit that Lily is more qualified for this job than you.
sentences.cn: 你必須承認莉莉比你更能勝任這份工作。

sentences.en: I really admire her for her bravery.
sentences.cn: 我真的欽佩她的勇氣。

sentences.en: As a romantic poet, he often admires the beauty and amazingness of nature.
sentences.cn: 作為一個浪漫主義詩人，他經常讚美大自然的偉大與美麗。

sentences.en: The only thing you need to do is to adjust yourself to this new situation as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 你現在唯一要做的是儘快適應新情況。

sentences.en: Has your preparation for the exam been adequate?
sentences.cn: 對這次考試，你有充足的準備嗎？

sentences.en: The task of top priority is to find an adequate solution to the current problem.
sentences.cn: 當務之急是針對目前出現的問題找到一個合適的解決辦法。

sentences.en: They hardly have an interest in ancient Egyptian civilization, right?
sentences.cn: 他們對古埃及文化並不感興趣，不是嗎？

sentences.en: That chemist will help you make up the prescription.
sentences.cn: 那位藥劑師會幫你按處方配藥。

sentences.en: That chemist works for a pharmaceutical company researching new drugs.
sentences.cn: 那位化學家在一間製藥公司研發新藥物。

sentences.en: The charter specifies the rights of people with disabilities.
sentences.cn: 這個法令明確規定了殘障人士所享有的權利。
