sentences.en: You had better charter a flight three days earlier.
sentences.cn: 你最好提早三天包租飛機。

sentences.en: The newspaper characterized the entrepreneur as ambitious.
sentences.cn: 報紙把那位企業家描述得很有雄心壯志。

sentences.en: It might take you some time to adapt to the changeable weather here.
sentences.cn: 你可能需要一些時間來適應這裡的多變天氣。

sentences.en: Such enthusiasm is his characteristic.
sentences.cn: 他總是這麼熱情。

sentences.en: Jack and his father share some of similar characteristics.
sentences.cn: 傑克和他爸爸有相似的特色。

sentences.en: They are busy in decorating the bridal chamber.
sentences.cn: 他們忙著布置新房。

sentences.en: The employees like that their boss has a casual attitude about most things.
sentences.cn: 員工們喜歡凡事不斤斤計較的老闆。

sentences.en: The soldier captured a deserter in the forest.
sentences.cn: 這個士兵在樹林裡捉到了一個逃兵。

sentences.en: Alice arranged her agenda in a very businesslike way.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲很有條理地安排好了日程。

sentences.en: The first person who blows up a balloon till it bursts will be the first person to set off.
sentences.cn: 第一個吹破氣球的人可以首先出發。

sentences.en: The sudden burst of the balloon scared me.
sentences.cn: 氣球的突然破裂嚇了我一跳。

sentences.en: The mother's obtaining of employment eased the father’s burden.
sentences.cn: 母親也開始工作了，減輕了父親的負擔。

sentences.en: That boy in the bulky red sweater is our vice monitor, a very outgoing person.
sentences.cn: 那個穿一件紅色寬大毛衣的男孩是我們的副班長，他是個很開朗外向的人。

sentences.en: The bulk of the carton makes it hard to carry.
sentences.cn: 箱子的體積太大，很難搬運。

sentences.en: I have finished the bulk of my homework.
sentences.cn: 我已經完成了一大半作業。

sentences.en: This picture shows a bud on an apple tree in the spring.
sentences.cn: 這張照片展示的是，春天蘋果樹的一朵花蕾。

cn: adj: 青銅色的，青銅制的

sentences.en: This statue is made of bronze.
sentences.cn: 這個雕像是青銅製成的。

sentences.en: The third-place winner in a contest usually is awarded a bronze medal.
sentences.cn: 季軍通常被授予銅牌。

sentences.en: Many people are enjoying the cool sea breeze on the beach.
sentences.cn: 許多人在沙灘上享受清涼的海風。

sentences.en: Are you aware of how dangerous this is?
sentences.cn: 你知道這樣有多危險嗎？

sentences.en: The physicist was awarded for his new theory.
sentences.cn: 這位物理學家因為他的新理論而獲得獎章。

sentences.en: The physicist showed us the award he won.
sentences.cn: 這位物理學家給我們看了他得的獎品。

sentences.en: This study surveyed 200 adult men with an average age of 30.
sentences.cn: 這項研究調查了兩百名平均年齡是三十歲的成年男性。

sentences.en: Vegetable prices are below the average of the previous year.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜的價格低於去年的平均價格。

sentences.en: A serious automobile accident happened yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天發生了一起嚴重的車禍。

sentences.en: She attributes her success to her own hard work and her husband's support.
sentences.cn: 她把自己的成功歸因於自己的努力和丈夫的支持。

sentences.en: The new movie has attracted large audience.
sentences.cn: 這部新電影吸引了大批觀眾。

sentences.en: What's your attitude to his dropping out?
sentences.cn: 你對他輟學有什麼看法？

sentences.en: The woman gives all of her attention to her baby, which makes her husband a little jealous.
sentences.cn: 女士把所有的注意力都給了她的孩子，讓她的丈夫都有點吃醋了。

sentences.en: The average height of athletes has increased about 1 inch in the past few years.
sentences.cn: 過去幾年中，運動員的平均身高增加了大約一英寸。

sentences.en: Do you need two aspirins for your headache?
sentences.cn: 你要兩片阿斯匹靈緩解一下頭疼嗎？

sentences.en: We should look at every aspect of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我們應該看看這問題的各個方面。

sentences.en: This house has a northern aspect.
sentences.cn: 這座房子面朝北。

sentences.en: He always advertises himself as an artist, but he never produces any excellent works.
sentences.cn: 他總是標榜自己是個藝術家，卻從沒有拿出什麼優秀作品。

sentences.en: The editor asked Mary to write an article on educational reform.
sentences.cn: 編輯要求瑪麗寫一篇關於教育改革的文章。

sentences.en: The articles found in the car prove that the car belongs to Marry.
sentences.cn: 在車裡找到的物品證明，這輛車是瑪麗的。

sentences.en: Follow the arrows on the floor and you will find thewashroom.
sentences.cn: 跟著地板上的箭頭走，就能找到洗手間。

sentences.en: Can you please deliver a message to my parents for me?
sentences.cn: 你能幫我向我的父母送個信嗎？

sentences.en: A dictionary editor must be skilled at giving the definition of words.
sentences.cn: 詞典編纂者必須精於給單字下定義。

sentences.en: The police deduced from the clues in the room who had stolen the secret documents.
sentences.cn: 員警從房間裡的線索推斷出了是誰偷走了那些機密文件。

sentences.en: The boy was asked to declaim the poem he wrote in front the class.
sentences.cn: 男孩被要求在班上朗誦他寫的詩歌。

sentences.en: I have a date with my friends to watch the sunrise on the deck tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 我和朋友們約好，明天早上在甲板上看日出。

sentences.en: A decided change has already taken place.
sentences.cn: 情況已經發生了明顯的變化。

sentences.en: It's common sense that sugar decays teeth.
sentences.cn: 糖能腐蝕牙齒，這是常識。

sentences.en: This country cottage has gradually fallen into decay.
sentences.cn: 這棟鄉間別墅漸漸開始衰敗。

sentences.en: The old man bought this ancient painting from an antiques dealer at a high price.
sentences.cn: 這位老人以高價從一個古董商那裡買來了這幅古畫。

sentences.en: He was dazzled by the flashlights.
sentences.cn: 閃光燈照得他目眩。

sentences.en: His words dazed me. I have no idea what he was trying to express.
sentences.cn: 他的話讓我迷惑不解，我不知道他想要表達什麼。

sentences.en: In recent days, I have taken my examinations in a daze.
sentences.cn: 最近幾天，我考試時都是一種茫然的狀態。

sentences.en: He threw a dart at his enemy.
sentences.cn: 他向敵人投擲了一枚飛鏢。

sentences.en: We bought several bottles of milk at the dairy on the way back home.
sentences.cn: 我們在回來的路上買了幾瓶牛奶。

sentences.en: Treat the crops with fertilizer to increase their yields.
sentences.cn: 給莊稼施肥來增加產量。

sentences.en: It is said that a cricket in your house brings luck.
sentences.cn: 據說房間裡有蟋蟀能帶來好運。

sentences.en: The boy finally made up his mind to save some pocket money and buy a cricket bat.
sentences.cn: 男孩終於下定決心要存零用錢去買一個板球拍。

sentences.en: The class consists of 56 students.
sentences.cn: 這個班級有五十六個學生。

sentences.en: It's considerate of you to warn me of the possible delays.
sentences.cn: 你提醒我可能的延誤，真是太體貼了。

sentences.en: Conserve some strength for we have 10 more miles to walk.
sentences.cn: 保存些體力吧，我們還有十英里要走。

sentences.en: The professor is always very interested in wildlife conservation.
sentences.cn: 教授一直對野生動物保護十分關心。

sentences.en: A week after the operation, he became fully conscious.
sentences.cn: 手術一週後，他完全恢復清醒了。

cn: 認真的，盡責的，有良心的

sentences.en: He is very conscientious and businesslike, which pleases his boss very much.
sentences.cn: 他工作認真負責又有效率，讓老闆非常高興。

sentences.en: I must admit my fault, for it's a matter of conscience.
sentences.cn: 我必須去認錯，這是有關良心的事。

sentences.en: The little girl made a conquest of every audience through her perfect dancing skills.
sentences.cn: 小女孩用她完美的舞蹈技巧征服了每一位觀眾。

sentences.en: His team conquered the other teams in the contest.
sentences.cn: 他的隊伍在比賽中戰勝了其他隊伍。

sentences.en: Your opinion is in conflict with his.
sentences.cn: 你的觀點和他相衝突。

sentences.en: These two theories conflict completely in their essences.
sentences.cn: 這兩種理論在本質上是完全分歧的。

sentences.en: The king conferred knighthoods on several of his brave soldiers.
sentences.cn: 國王授予幾位勇猛的士兵騎士頭銜。

sentences.en: She is too young to handle such a complex situation; we must give her a hand.
sentences.cn: 她太年輕了，處理不來這個複雜的情況，我們要幫她一下。

sentences.en: These two football players complement each other.
sentences.cn: 這兩個足球運動員彼此互補。

sentences.en: Red wine makes an excellent complement to this meal.
sentences.cn: 有紅酒配這一餐真是棒極了。

sentences.en: On the southern side of the campus stands a colonial building.
sentences.cn: 校園南邊，有一座殖民時期風格的建築。

sentences.en: Antelope can tolerate a wide range of climatic differences.
sentences.cn: 羚羊能夠忍受差異很大的氣候條件。

sentences.en: I want to oppose to this classification of customers.
sentences.cn: 我想反對以這種方式來對顧客進行分類。

sentences.en: You could demand further clarification from them on the whole matter.
sentences.cn: 你可以要求他們進一步澄清整件事情。

sentences.en: He was discouraged by such a high price.
sentences.cn: 這樣高的價格使他很氣餒。

sentences.en: She waited for news from her mom, with great discomfort.
sentences.cn: 她忐忑不安地等待著母親的消息。

sentences.en: It is the lack of discipline in this school that results in its high rate of fighting.
sentences.cn: 正是這所學校的紀律散漫，導致打架事故頻出。

sentences.en: The doctor discharged the patient after a week.
sentences.cn: 一週後，醫生准許病人出院了。

sentences.en: Two boxes of goods were discharged for free.
sentences.cn: 兩箱貨物已經免費卸好了。

sentences.en: She was invited to direct the party.
sentences.cn: 她被邀請指導這場晚會。

sentences.en: The traffic accident last night has a direct relationship with Mike.
sentences.cn: 昨晚的車禍與麥克有著直接的關係。

sentences.en: The interviewer told the boy that they will not hire anyone lacking a high school diploma.
sentences.cn: 面試官告訴男孩，他們不會聘請一個沒有高中文憑的人。

sentences.en: Countess Olenska keeps her dignity in any situation.
sentences.cn: 在任何場合下，奧蘭斯卡伯爵夫人都保持著她的尊貴。

sentences.en: They purchased a set of new furniture for their marriage, including a new digital television.
sentences.cn: 他們為結婚購入了一套新的傢俱，包括一台新型數位電視。

sentences.en: The diameter of this tree trunk is 50.35 cm.
sentences.cn: 這棵樹的樹幹直徑是五十點三五公分。

sentences.en: I have a precise diagnosis right now.
sentences.cn: 我現在有一份精確的診斷書。

sentences.en: His shoes are totally wet with dew.
sentences.cn: 他的鞋子被露水完全浸濕了。

sentences.en: This old professor has devoted his whole life to the development of new energy sources.
sentences.cn: 這位老教授把他的一生都奉獻給了開發新能源。

sentences.en: She has determined to switch to archaeology for the next four years.
sentences.cn: 她已經決定未來四年轉修考古學。

sentences.en: Sherlock Holmes is an excellent private detective created by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
sentences.cn: 夏洛克．福爾摩斯是亞瑟．柯南．道爾筆下一位非常優秀的私家偵探。

sentences.en: I detected a decided change in his attitude towards this matter, but I didn't know why.
sentences.cn: 我發現他對於這件事的態度有明顯的變化，但是我不知道是因為什麼。

sentences.en: He has little money and is desperate for some food.
sentences.cn: 他沒有錢了，而且極度需要些食物。

sentences.en: The poor girl was overwhelmed by the despair of never seeing her brother again.
sentences.cn: 再也見不到她的弟弟的絕望心情籠罩了這個可憐的女孩。

sentences.en: As parents, we should not despair of our children, no matter how clumsy they are.
sentences.cn: 作為父母，不管孩子有多笨，我們也不應該對他們失去信心。

sentences.en: It is most desirable that both of you come to my graduation ceremony.
sentences.cn: 你們兩人都來參加我的畢業典禮，這真是最好不過了。

sentences.en: The designer of this house is a student from Italy who is studying architecture at Yale University.
sentences.cn: 這所房子的設計者是一個來自義大利的學生，他目前正在耶魯大學主修建築學。

sentences.en: This house has been deserted for over ten years since its owner passed away.
sentences.cn: 自從房子的主人去世後，這所房子已經荒廢了十多年了。

sentences.en: The poppy was deserted for it kept biting the furniture.
sentences.cn: 那隻小狗因為一直咬傢俱而被遺棄。

sentences.en: Your description of the situation conflicted with the fact.
sentences.cn: 你對情況的描述與事實相衝突。

sentences.en: Three hours is enough time for the descent from the mountain.
sentences.cn: 下山三個小時就足夠了。

sentences.en: This wealth descended directly to me from my grandfather.
sentences.cn: 這份財產是由我祖父直接傳給我的。

sentences.en: Many words, “cafe” for example, derive from French.
sentences.cn: 有許多單字來源於法語，比如「cafe」。

sentences.en: The headmaster, as well as his deputy, has gone downtown for a meeting by bus.
sentences.cn: 校長和他的副手已經坐公車去市中心開會去了。

sentences.en: That boring party depressed me so much that I left before it ended.
sentences.cn: 這個沉悶的晚會讓我感覺如此壓抑，所以我在結束之前就離開了。

sentences.en: Her sudden departure upset him very much.
sentences.cn: 她的突然離開讓他很心煩意亂。

sentences.en: The boss assigned us a new glass cabinet for department files.
sentences.cn: 老闆分配給我們一個新的玻璃櫃來放置部門資料。

sentences.en: The population density in this state is the highest in this country.
sentences.cn: 這個州的人口密度是這個國家裡最高的。

sentences.en: The researcher demonstrated his theory with a large number of experiments.
sentences.cn: 研究員用大量的實驗來論證他的理論。

sentences.en: The school has the right to give a demerit to those students who break school rules.
sentences.cn: 學校有權對那些違反校規的學生給予記過處分。

sentences.en: Compared with last year, the total export earnings this year have increased by 0.5%.
sentences.cn: 與去年相比，今年出口總收益增長零點五個百分點。

sentences.en: My only suggestion to you is to work in earnest. Only then will you get promoted.
sentences.cn: 我對你唯一的建議就是認真工作，只有這樣你才能得到晉升。

sentences.en: I put red dye in my mother's hair.
sentences.cn: 我把母親的頭髮染紅了。

sentences.en: The boy dyed his hair green to make himself look different.
sentences.cn: 那個男孩為了讓看起來與眾不同，把頭髮染成了綠色。

sentences.en: She changed her dwelling secretly so as to avoid her ex-husband.
sentences.cn: 為了躲避前夫，她偷偷搬了家。

sentences.en: Should city dwellers pay more tax than rural ones?
sentences.cn: 城市居民要比鄉村居民多繳稅嗎？

sentences.en: These residents have taught their kids to put their trash into dustbins since childhood.
sentences.cn: 這些居民從小就教育孩子要把垃圾丟入垃圾箱裡。

sentences.en: I assure you that this pair of trousers is made of durable material.
sentences.cn: 我向你保證，這條褲子是用耐穿的料子製成的。

sentences.en: My rent is due next week.
sentences.cn: 我的租金下個月到期。

sentences.en: Their window was broken by a drunkard last night.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上，他們家的窗戶被一個醉鬼打破了。

sentences.en: The students have a month of physical drills at the beginning of each school year.
sentences.cn: 這些學生每學年開學都有一個月的體能訓練。

sentences.en: It is necessary to drill every morning.
sentences.cn: 每天早上鍛煉身體很有必要。

sentences.en: I have a class in figure drawing this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我今天下午有一節人物素描課。

sentences.en: I finally found my manuscript in the drawer.
sentences.cn: 我最後在抽屜裡找到了書稿。

sentences.en: The drawer must bear legal liability in this affair.
sentences.cn: 開票人必須對這一件事承擔法律責任。

sentences.en: Benjamin Franklin drafted the United States' Declaration of Independence with other Founding Founders.
sentences.cn: 班傑明 ·富蘭克林和其他幾位開國元勳共同起草了《美國獨立宣言》。

sentences.en: The policeman requested that he drew a draft of the suspect.
sentences.cn: 員警要求他畫出嫌疑犯的大致模樣。

sentences.en: The teacher doesn't like Edward because he often dozes off in class.
sentences.cn: 這位老師不喜歡愛德華，因為他經常在課堂上打瞌睡。

sentences.en: His father refused to sublease the downtown store to them.
sentences.cn: 他的父親拒絕將商業區的店面轉租給他們。

sentences.en: They could not stand the hustle and bustle when they lived downtown.
sentences.cn: 住在商業區的時候，他們無法忍受那裡的喧囂。

sentences.en: If necessary, take another dose after 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 有必要的話，二十四小時後再服一劑。

sentences.en: The president who was impeached finally met his doom.
sentences.cn: 這位遭到彈劾的總統終於下臺了。

sentences.en: Am I doomed to be a loser?
sentences.cn: 難道我註定是個失敗者嗎？

sentences.en: This wealthy businessman made a generous donation of 10 thousand dollars to a charity.
sentences.cn: 這位富有的商人慷慨地捐給慈善機構一萬美元。

sentences.en: Students dominated the audience that attended the concert.
sentences.cn: 來看音樂會的觀眾大都是學生。

sentences.en: This fish is the dominant course in this meal.
sentences.cn: 這道魚是這一餐的主菜。

sentences.en: There will be diverse companies taking part in on-campus recruiting in April.
sentences.cn: 四月時會有許多公司參加校園徵才。

sentences.en: This road has fallen into disuse.
sentences.cn: 這條路已經廢棄不用了。

sentences.en: These donations will be distributed to the earthquake victims.
sentences.cn: 這些善款會分發給地震災民。

sentences.en: This judge is an up-right man and treats every one without distinction.
sentences.cn: 這位法官是個很正直的人，對所有人都一視同仁。

sentences.en: Suddenly, there came a distant cry, which scared the teenagers on such a silent night.
sentences.cn: 突然傳來一聲遙遠的哭聲，在寂靜的深夜裡嚇壞了這些少年。

sentences.en: Sugar dissolves in hot water much faster than in cool water.
sentences.cn: 糖在熱水中比在冷水中融化地要快得多。

sentences.en: Those big boys completely disregarded the warning sign and jumped into the river one by one.
sentences.cn: 那些大男孩完全無視於警示牌，一個接一個地跳進了河裡。

sentences.en: The indifferent boss showed disregard to his staff.
sentences.cn: 這個冷漠的老闆對他的員工十分漠然。

sentences.en: A series of stamps is on display today.
sentences.cn: 今天有一系列郵票正在展出。

sentences.en: There is no need to display signs of emotion all the time.
sentences.cn: 沒有必要任何時候都把喜怒哀樂掛在臉上。

sentences.en: The man got dismissed from the army due to stealing.
sentences.cn: 這個人因為偷盜被部隊開除了。

sentences.en: The young movie star always disguises himself as a middle-aged man when he goes out.
sentences.cn: 這位年輕的電影明星每次出門的時候都把自己偽裝成一位中年大叔。

sentences.en: Those people in the street dressed in casual clothes are actually police officers in disguise.
sentences.cn: 街上穿便衣的那幾個人實際上是偽裝的員警。

sentences.en: Can you discriminate fake coins from real ones?
sentences.cn: 你能辨別假的硬幣和真的硬幣嗎？

sentences.en: They believed that his actions discriminate against women.
sentences.cn: 他們認為他的行為歧視女性。

sentences.en: Can the eruption of a volcano be predicted?
sentences.cn: 火山噴發能提前預測到嗎？

sentences.en: The enthusiastic villagers helped those young students erect their tent.
sentences.cn: 熱心的村民們幫助年輕學生們搭建帳篷。

sentences.en: He stands erect there, thinking about something.
sentences.cn: 他直直的站在那裡，想著些什麼。

sentences.en: I'm so envious that you received an opportunity to go on a junket.
sentences.cn: 真羡慕你得到了公費旅遊的機會。

sentences.en: The peaceful village is enveloped by mountains.
sentences.cn: 這個寧靜的小村莊周圍群山環繞。

cn: 取名；賦予權利，使有資格

sentences.en: He wrote an article entitled Love.
sentences.cn: 他寫了一篇名為《愛》的文章。

sentences.en: Every female employee is entitled by the boss to a day off on March 8th every year.
sentences.cn: 每年三月八日婦女節，老闆都會讓每個女員工放一天假。

sentences.en: Every good company has its own enterprise culture and implements it out in its daily work.
sentences.cn: 每一個優秀的企業都有自己的企業文化，並將之貫徹於日常工作中。

sentences.en: My elder brother enrolled in the army when he was 18.
sentences.cn: 我哥哥十八歲的時候入伍了。

sentences.en: I have to reply to applicants' every enquiry.
sentences.cn: 我需要回覆申請人的所有問題。

sentences.en: Driven by enormous profits, many farmers have gone into business.
sentences.cn: 被巨大的利益驅使，許多農民轉而經商。

sentences.en: All of the students were deeply attracted by an old engraving of London Bridge in this exhibition.
sentences.cn: 所有的學生都被展會上的一幅古老的倫敦橋版畫深深吸引住了。

sentences.en: He had his initials engraved on this ring.
sentences.cn: 他將自己名字的起首字母刻在這個戒指上。

sentences.en: They announced their engagement in the local newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他們在當地報紙上刊登了訂婚消息。

sentences.en: I can't endure staying up late.
sentences.cn: 我忍受不了熬夜。

sentences.en: Your praise of my work is a great encouragement to me.
sentences.cn: 您對我工作的讚賞是對我莫大的鼓勵。

sentences.en: This orchard has been enclosed by high walls by its owner in order to discourage thieves.
sentences.cn: 果園的主人在周圍築起了高牆來防賊。

sentences.en: The emptiness of the class reminded him that today is Sunday.
sentences.cn: 教室裡空蕩蕩的，提醒他今天是禮拜日。

sentences.en: His employer increased his salary because of his excellent performance at work.
sentences.cn: 他的雇主因為他在工作上的優秀表現幫他加薪。

sentences.en: This company has 15,000 employees and 450 branches across the country.
sentences.cn: 這家公司有一萬五千名員工，並在全國有四百五十家分公司。

sentences.en: He is quite radical on matters of emigration.
sentences.cn: 他對於移民的問題態度相當激進。

sentences.en: The old couple are planning to emigrate from Taiwan to Canada next year—their son has already settled there.
sentences.cn: 這對老夫妻計畫明年從臺灣移民到加拿大—他們的兒子已經在那裡定居了。

sentences.en: The conductor has the right to stop the train in the event of an emergency.
sentences.cn: 緊急情況下，列車長有權停止火車。

sentences.en: We made an appointment to meet at 2 o'clock, but he did not emerge until 4. He was two hours late!
sentences.cn: 我們約好下午兩點見面，但是他到四點才出現，遲到了整整兩個小時！

sentences.en: You can eliminate your writing mistakes conveniently on a computer.
sentences.cn: 在電腦上你可以很方便地消除書寫的錯誤。

sentences.en: The mother sent her child to an elementary dancing class.
sentences.cn: 媽媽把孩子送去一個初級舞蹈班。

sentences.en: That elegant woman is the duke's fiancée.
sentences.cn: 那位優雅的女士是公爵的未婚妻。

sentences.en: Who do you think will win the election?
sentences.cn: 在你看來，誰會贏得選舉？

sentences.en: He prodded me with his elbow and winked at me. Do you know what did he mean?
sentences.cn: 他用手肘輕輕地推了我一下，又對我眨眼，你知道他這是什麼意思嗎？

sentences.en: The boy made a great effort to improve his grades.
sentences.cn: 男孩很努力地去提升成績。

sentences.en: That efficient teacher is quite popular in this school.
sentences.cn: 那位能幹的老師在學校相當受歡迎。

sentences.en: The director recommended Jimmy to edit the new magazine. What's your opinion?
sentences.cn: 主管推薦吉米來主編這本新雜誌。你怎麼看？

sentences.en: What's your opinion on the government’s new economic policy?
sentences.cn: 請問你對政府新的經濟政策有什麼看法？

sentences.en: The fearless knight went into the forest, defeated the evil dragon and saved the princess.
sentences.cn: 勇敢的騎士進入了森林，打敗了惡龍，拯救了公主。

sentences.en: The bullet wound in his left breast was the fatal injury.
sentences.cn: 他左胸上的槍傷是致命傷。

sentences.en: Fasten your coat when you're out. It’s cold.
sentences.cn: 出門的時候把大衣繫好，外面很冷。

sentences.en: The farmhand said that he saw a weird man slip into the kitchen after breakfast.
sentences.cn: 那個農工說，早飯後他看見一個很奇怪的男人偷溜進了廚房。

sentences.en: I had a fantastic dream last night, but I can recall little of it.
sentences.cn: 我昨晚做了個很奇異的夢，但是想不起來了。

sentences.en: My eyelids keep twitching.
sentences.cn: 我的眼皮一直在跳。

sentences.en: People in this village live in extreme poverty.
sentences.cn: 這個村莊的人們生活極其貧困。

sentences.en: Fortunately, all his injuries from the accident are external.
sentences.cn: 很幸運地，他在那場意外中只有受到外傷。

cn: 有表現力的，富有表情的

sentences.en: Mike has a very expressive face.
sentences.cn: 麥克的臉表情很豐富。

sentences.en: He exposed himself on the beach to the sun every day for a few months, trying to get bronze skin.
sentences.cn: 他在海灘上曬了幾個月的太陽，想要曬出古銅色的皮膚。

sentences.en: The exporter's main product is agricultural equipment, such as harvesters and sowers.
sentences.cn: 這家出口公司主營農業設備，比如說收割機和播種機。

sentences.en: This boy has an explosive temper that he inherited from his father.
sentences.cn: 這個男孩遺傳了他父親的火暴脾氣。

sentences.en: The explosive has already been prepared by the enemy.
sentences.cn: 敵人早就準備好了炸藥。

sentences.en: In one year, that spaceship will be used in the exploration of space.
sentences.cn: 這艘太空船將在一年後投入太空勘探。

sentences.en: Exploiting wind and solar energy is regarded as one of the efficient ways to lower the use of non-renewable resources.
sentences.cn: 開發風能和太陽能被視為降低不可再生資源消耗量的有效方式之一。

sentences.en: When the boiler exploded, many a student was eating lunch in the dining hall.
sentences.cn: 鍋爐爆炸的時候，許多學生正在餐廳吃午飯。

sentences.en: The experienced engineer detected the reason for the failure quickly and offered several pieces of advice.
sentences.cn: 經驗豐富的工程師很快檢測出了故障原因，並給出了幾則建議。

sentences.en: Both the girls have applied to join the expedition to the North Pole.
sentences.cn: 兩個女孩都申請了參加北極探險。

sentences.en: There is little expectation of rain tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天預計沒雨。

sentences.en: Please stay out of it. Your interference is likely to make the existing situation worse.
sentences.cn: 請不要插手這件事。你的干涉很可能會使當前形勢變得更糟。

sentences.en: The museum is exhibiting its latest collection of stamps.
sentences.cn: 博物館展示了最新收藏的郵票。

sentences.en: There are a lot of ancient sculptures on exhibit.
sentences.cn: 展會上有很多古老的雕塑。

sentences.en: The little girl exchanged an apple with the boy for his flower.
sentences.cn: 小女孩用一個蘋果跟男孩換了一朵花。

sentences.en: He gave me an album in exchange for that superstar's autograph.
sentences.cn: 他用一張唱片給我交換了那個巨星的親筆簽名。

sentences.en: The residents complained about the excessive noise outside.
sentences.cn: 居民們投訴外面的噪音。

sentences.en: Everyone needs to hand in their homework before noon, and you are no exception.
sentences.cn: 所有人都要在中午之前交作業，你也不例外。

sentences.en: The girl excels more at dancing than her younger sister (does).
sentences.cn: 這個女孩比她妹妹更擅長跳舞。

sentences.en: The theory of evolution was met with strong opposition when it was first published.
sentences.cn: 進化論剛發表的時候，遭到了強烈的反對。

sentences.en: It's evident that you’re responsible for this mistake.
sentences.cn: 顯然，你要為這次失誤負責。

sentences.en: After such an eventful day, I'm exhausted and longing for my comfortable bed.
sentences.cn: 經過這樣多事的一天，我現在累極了，非常渴望我舒適的床。

sentences.en: A comfortable bed must be located on perfectly even ground.
sentences.cn: 一張舒適的床必須放置在平坦的地方。

sentences.en: She went out without even taking a glance at me.
sentences.cn: 她甚至看都沒有看我一眼就出去了。

sentences.en: Are there common criteria to evaluate success?
sentences.cn: 是否存在一個評估成功的通用標準呢？

sentences.en: The couple estimates that their total savings are barely enough to pay the down payment of a house.
sentences.cn: 這對夫妻估計，他們的所有存款也僅僅付得起房子的頭期款。

sentences.en: It's essential that you earn a college diploma.
sentences.cn: 你務必要拿到大學文憑。

sentences.en: His acts of generosity won him the villagers' endearments.
sentences.cn: 他的慷慨大方贏得了村民們的喜愛。

sentences.en: It appears that we've blown a fuse.
sentences.cn: 看起來我們好像把保險絲燒斷了。

sentences.en: Aluminum will fuse at high temperatures.
sentences.cn: 鋁在高溫下會熔化。

sentences.en: The father was absolutely furious at being cheated by his son.
sentences.cn: 爸爸對於被兒子欺騙大發雷霆。

sentences.en: His funeral is on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 他的葬禮在週六舉行。

sentences.en: Whether or not he will be able to arrive on time is the fundamental problem.
sentences.cn: 他能否準時到達才是根本問題。

sentences.en: The committee's function is not to mediate neighbors’ disputes.
sentences.cn: 委員會的職責並不是調解鄰里糾紛。

sentences.en: Even though this machine has been in use for a long time, it still functions well.
sentences.cn: 這台機器即使放了很長一段時間，仍然能夠運轉正常。

sentences.en: Traffic accidents on this expressway have decreased in frequency by 35% over the past several years.
sentences.cn: 過去幾年裡，這條高速公路上交通事故發生的頻率已經下降了百分之三十五。

sentences.en: All of the goods were sent by air freight in order that they would arrive before the trade show next week.
sentences.cn: 為了趕上一週後的展銷會，所有的貨物都是空運寄送。

sentences.en: I cut my forefinger on a fragment of a mirror.
sentences.cn: 我的食指被鏡子的碎片割傷了。

sentences.en: The designer of this fountain was awarded a prize for creativity.
sentences.cn: 這座噴泉的設計者被授予最佳創意獎。

sentences.en: Jenny is the only teacher who knows the founder of the school.
sentences.cn: 珍妮是老師中是唯一知道學校創辦人是誰的人。

sentences.en: As a child, an interest in music was fostered in him.
sentences.cn: 他從小就在音樂方面培養興趣。

sentences.en: Lucy is one of the children that the couple fosters.
sentences.cn: 露茜是這對夫婦領養的孩子之一。

sentences.en: This fossil dates back to 2 million years ago.
sentences.cn: 這塊化石可以追溯至兩百萬年前。

sentences.en: The walls of the fort are there to protect those inside from an attacking force.
sentences.cn: 堡壘的外牆功用是為內部抵擋外來的攻擊。

sentences.en: The story happened on a dreary and forsaken beach in winter.
sentences.cn: 這個故事發生在冬季，一個人跡罕至的海灘上。

sentences.en: His forefinger is as long as his middle finger.
sentences.cn: 他的食指和中指一樣長。

sentences.en: One of his forefathers came to this country from China.
sentences.cn: 他祖先中有一位是從中國來到這個國家的。

sentences.en: His foe swore to destroy his kingdom.
sentences.cn: 他的敵人發誓要摧毀他的王國。

sentences.en: The bath is full of foam.
sentences.cn: 浴缸裡蓋滿了泡沫。

sentences.en: What's the red fluid in this cup?
sentences.cn: 杯子裡的紅色液體是什麼？

sentences.en: Her feeling to the matter are fluid and not set in stone.
sentences.cn: 她對於這件事的看法還未確定。

sentences.en: The advantage of this plan is its flexibility.
sentences.cn: 這個計畫的優點就在於靈活性。

sentences.en: The company has set up a new fleet of cars for their expanding business.
sentences.cn: 為了滿足不斷增加的業務量，公司又組了新的車隊。

sentences.en: The only flaw in her personality is her arrogance.
sentences.cn: 她唯一的性格缺陷就是傲慢。

sentences.en: His uncle got him a fitting position at his company.
sentences.cn: 他叔叔在自己的公司裡為他找了份合適的工作。

sentences.en: These fittings have a very good decorative effect.
sentences.cn: 這些配件達到很好的裝飾作用。

sentences.en: A fir is an evergreen tree that grows in frigid areas.
sentences.cn: 冷杉是一種常綠樹，生長在寒帶。

sentences.en: The finished sample was delivered to the customer this morning for a final confirmation.
sentences.cn: 樣品成品早上已經寄送到顧客手裡做最後的確認了。

sentences.en: She is the first female director of the Finance Department.
sentences.cn: 她是財政部的第一位女主任。

sentences.en: The education department financed all of the expenses.
sentences.cn: 教育部門資助所有的費用開支。

sentences.en: Sugarcane has much more fiber than other fruit.
sentences.cn: 甘蔗比其他水果所含纖維素要多得多。

sentences.en: Can you please fetch my boy in the afternoon for me?
sentences.cn: 您下午能幫我接一下孩子嗎？

sentences.en: The man enjoys fellowship with others, and he has friends from all walks of life.
sentences.cn: 這個人很喜歡與人交往，朋友遍佈各行各業。

sentences.en: What have you prepared for the feast?
sentences.cn: 你都為宴會準備了什麼？

sentences.en: They feasted on turkey, pork, potato casserole, and more.
sentences.cn: 他們盡情享用宴請的火雞肉、豬肉、烤馬鈴薯泥及其他美食。

sentences.en: The mansion was built in the seventeenth century. It's was the largest one at that time.
sentences.cn: 這座宅第建於十七世紀，規模是當時最大的。

cn: 有男子氣概的，強壯的，適於男人的

sentences.en: You look real manly in uniform!
sentences.cn: 你穿軍裝的時候看起來真有男子氣概！

sentences.en: I never have doubts about my manhood.
sentences.cn: 我從不懷疑我的男子氣概。

sentences.en: Both Maria and Penny are filled with longing for a ticket to the concert.
sentences.cn: 瑪利亞和佩妮都很渴望能有一張音樂會的門票。

sentences.en: We are all longing for the honor that concerns our futures.
sentences.cn: 我們都渴望獲得那份關乎未來的榮譽。

sentences.en: The price of livestock has increased generally this year.
sentences.cn: 今年家畜的價格普遍上漲。

sentences.en: My sister gave me a lively account of the movie she watched a few days ago.
sentences.cn: 姐姐生動地向我講述了她前幾天看的電影。

sentences.en: She is already completely under the influence of liquor.
sentences.cn: 她已經完全醉了。

sentences.en: Liquid is one state of matter.
sentences.cn: 液體是物質的一種存在形式。

sentences.en: The sign says “No Open Flames”. These cans are filled with liquid fuel.
sentences.cn: 指示牌上寫著「嚴禁明火」。這些罐子裡都是液態燃料。

sentences.en: The lease on my house will expire next week.
sentences.cn: 我的房子的租約下個星期就到期了。

sentences.en: He leased a house of his friend's.
sentences.cn: 他租用了朋友的一幢房子。

sentences.en: The naughty boy fell off the ladder and hurt his ankle.
sentences.cn: 這個淘氣的男孩從一個梯子上摔了下來，傷了腳踝。

sentences.en: The Swedish laborer comes to the dining hall along with his friends for lunch every afternoon.
sentences.cn: 這個瑞典工人每天中午都和他的朋友們一起來餐廳吃午飯。

sentences.en: Since I began attending this class, I have cultivated a keen interest in music.
sentences.cn: 自從我上了這節課，就對音樂產生了濃厚的興趣。

sentences.en: Dogs have a keener sense of smell than humans.
sentences.cn: 狗的嗅覺比人類更靈敏。

sentences.en: I'm several years junior to my husband.
sentences.cn: 我比我丈夫小幾歲。

sentences.en: This show aims at teaching people how to survive in dangerous jungles, and it now has an audience of more than 300 million.
sentences.cn: 這檔節目目的是教會人們如何在危險的叢林裡生存，現在已經有三千多萬名觀眾了。

sentences.en: I heard coins jingle in your pocket.
sentences.cn: 我聽到你口袋裡硬幣的叮噹聲了。

sentences.en: A stream of water jets out of this fountain.
sentences.cn: 一股泉水從這個噴泉裡面噴射出來。

sentences.en: In this photo, there is a jet fighter landing.
sentences.cn: 這張照片拍攝的是一架噴射戰鬥機正在降落。

sentences.en: She hurled a stone into the lake and scared the fish away.
sentences.cn: 她向湖裡投擲了一塊石頭，嚇跑了魚群。

sentences.en: A fleet of jet fighters were hovering over the city.
sentences.cn: 城市上方盤旋著一隊噴射戰鬥機。

sentences.en: The family grieved over the death of their neighbor.
sentences.cn: 這家人很為鄰居的去世傷心。

sentences.en: The emission of greenhouse gases has contributed to global warming.
sentences.cn: 溫室氣體的排放造成全球暖化。

sentences.en: Have you realized the gravity of the situation? None of us is capable of finishing the work before dark!
sentences.cn: 你意識到這情況的嚴重性了嗎？沒有人能在天黑之前完成任務！

sentences.en: There are a few grains of wheat on my bed.
sentences.cn: 我床上有幾粒麥子。

sentences.en: Some girls prefer to sit around gossiping about others.
sentences.cn: 有些女孩喜歡坐在一起，八卦地議論別人。

sentences.en: I don't like girls who are fond of gossip.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡愛聽八卦的女孩。

sentences.en: This type of glue doesn't work at all.
sentences.cn: 這種膠水一點都不管用。

sentences.en: The teacher asked the tallest boy to glue a piece of paper with the school regulations onto the wall.
sentences.cn: 老師請最高的男孩子把一張寫有校規的紙張貼到牆上去。

sentences.en: The poet wrote many poems glorifying God.
sentences.cn: 那位詩人寫了許多讚美上帝的詩歌。

sentences.en: Satellite broadcasting has played a key role in globalizing television.
sentences.cn: 衛星廣播在電視全球化中扮演了重要的角色。

sentences.en: Many fans waited at the airport for hours just for a glimpse of their idol.
sentences.cn: 許多粉絲在機場等好幾個小時，就為了看一眼他們的偶像。

sentences.en: That Ivy caught a glimpse of her sister at the cinema makes me suspect your words.
sentences.cn: 艾薇在電影院瞥見她妹妹了，那讓我對你的話產生懷疑。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the gleam of a flashlight flashed in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 突然間，手電筒的閃光閃亮了黑暗。

sentences.en: Neither Tom nor I like the taste of ginger.
sentences.cn: 湯姆和我都不喜歡薑的味道。

sentences.en: His remarks were the germ of this theory.
sentences.cn: 他的言論是這個理論的起源。

sentences.en: Not all germs are harmful to the human body.
sentences.cn: 並不是所有的細菌都對人體有害。

sentences.en: It's generous of you to offer us a meal for free.
sentences.cn: 您免費我我們提供食物，真慷慨。

sentences.en: The bank clerk narrated what happened during the robbery.
sentences.cn: 銀行職員講述了搶劫的經過。

sentences.en: Put a napkin by each plate.
sentences.cn: 在每個盤子旁邊都放一條餐巾。

sentences.en: Do you like stewed mutton?
sentences.cn: 你喜歡吃紅燒羊肉嗎？

sentences.en: You can develop your muscles through regular and effective exercise.
sentences.cn: 你可藉由規律而有效的運動來鍛煉肌肉。

sentences.en: The walls are covered with moss.
sentences.cn: 牆上長滿了青苔。

sentences.en: My arms and legs are itchy from many mosquito bites.
sentences.cn: 我手臂上和腿上被蚊子咬了很多包，癢死了。

sentences.en: Righteous behavior is not a responsibility forced on citizens. It's a matter of morality.
sentences.cn: 見義勇為並不是強加給公民的義務，而是一種美德。

sentences.en: Modernizing our factory equipment is currently the only option.
sentences.cn: 目前唯一的選擇就是使工廠設備現代化。

sentences.en: Environmentalists are promoting bicycles to become the most popular mode of transportation.
sentences.cn: 環境學家們正試圖將自行車推廣為最流行的交通方式。

sentences.en: These photos show the same hill hidden in the mist.
sentences.cn: 這些照片展示的是霧靄籠罩的同一座山。

sentences.en: The general sent three elite soldiers on a top-secret mission.
sentences.cn: 將軍派遣了三名精英戰士執行一項最高機密任務。

sentences.en: A little mistake made years ago resulted in her current misfortune.
sentences.cn: 她現在的不幸是多年前犯下的一個小錯誤所致。

sentences.en: It is no surprise that a lazy man will lead a life of misery.
sentences.cn: 懶惰的人最終會過著悲慘的生活，沒有什麼好驚訝的。

sentences.en: I have no idea how to break away from this miserable life.
sentences.cn: 我不知道該如何擺脫這樣悲慘的生活。

sentences.en: Only a minority of the teachers have just one child.
sentences.cn: 僅少數老師只有一個孩子。

sentences.en: The minister lives alone in a small house along the river.
sentences.cn: 牧師獨自居住在河邊的一座小房子裡。

sentences.en: The foreign minister condemned all of the misleading statements.
sentences.cn: 外交部長譴責了所有不實言論。

sentences.en: It's unbelievable that the old man used to be a miner.
sentences.cn: 真不敢相信，這位老人以前是個礦工。

sentences.en: The discovery of electricity marked an important milestone in mankind's history.
sentences.cn: 電的發現標誌著人類歷史上一個重要的里程碑。

sentences.en: One thousand kilograms is equal to one metric ton.
sentences.cn: 一千公斤等於一公噸。

sentences.en: Though I don't like her, she is a woman of merit.
sentences.cn: 雖然我不喜歡她，但她確實是個值得稱讚的女子。

sentences.en: These two companies merged (together) to enhance their competitiveness three years ago.
sentences.cn: 三年前，這兩家公司為提高競爭力而合併。

sentences.en: The girl brought the little dog home out of her mercy.
sentences.cn: 女孩出於憐憫，把小狗帶回了家。

sentences.en: The merciful queen released the two young men who had stolen food out of hunger.
sentences.cn: 仁慈的女王釋放了這兩個因饑餓而偷竊食物的年輕人。

sentences.en: The membership fee is $250 each year.
sentences.cn: 每年會員費是兩百五十美元。

sentences.en: I need to know the weight and measurements of the box in order to calculate the freight fee.
sentences.cn: 我需要知道箱子的重量和尺寸，以此來計算運費。

sentences.en: As the boss, he thinks that his employees should achieve their maximum work efficiency.
sentences.cn: 作為老闆，他認為員工應該達到最高的工作效率。

sentences.en: Two tons is the maximum load for this truck.
sentences.cn: 這輛卡車的最大載重量是兩噸。

sentences.en: I have to admit that I'm not an expert in higher mathematics.
sentences.cn: 我必須承認，我不擅長高等數學。

sentences.en: The museum displayed several masterpieces of Vincent van Gogh's.
sentences.cn: 博物館展出了幾幅梵谷的傑作。

sentences.en: It's a marvel that she was able to escape the cage with both of her hands tied together.
sentences.cn: 她雙手被綁在一起，竟然還能從籠子裡逃脫，真是奇蹟。

sentences.en: The long arduous march has damaged his health.
sentences.cn: 長期的艱難行軍損害了他的健康。

sentences.en: There is a large marble statue and a fountain standing in front of the government building.
sentences.cn: 政府大樓前有一個大型大理石雕像和一座噴泉。

sentences.en: Ordinarily, he puts some change in the outermost pocket of his bag.
sentences.cn: 通常，他會在袋子最外面的口袋裡放些零錢。

sentences.en: I have not an ounce of trust in him.
sentences.cn: 我一點也不相信他。

sentences.en: This holiday originated in Europe and was spread to America through mass migration.
sentences.cn: 這個節日起源於歐洲，隨著大規模移民傳至美洲。

sentences.en: This organization aims to help the needy and the poor.
sentences.cn: 這個組織旨在幫助貧困的人們。

sentences.en: It was on an ordinary day that the story happened.
sentences.cn: 故事發生在平常的一天裡。

sentences.en: Ordinarily, the family will travel to a warm country in Europe before Christmas.
sentences.cn: 通常，這家人會在耶誕節前，去溫暖的歐洲國家旅遊。

sentences.en: The spaceship the scientists launched is in orbit around Mars.
sentences.cn: 科學家發射的太空船繞著火星的軌道飛行。

sentences.en: The moon orbits all the way around the earth once a month.
sentences.cn: 月亮一個月繞地球一周。

sentences.en: A happy person always takes an optimistic view on life.
sentences.cn: 快樂的人總是對生活持樂觀的看法。

sentences.en: We are in opposition to each other regarding where to eat dinner.
sentences.cn: 我們在晚餐地點上意見相反。

sentences.en: If we defeat our opponents in Sunday's game, we’ll qualify for the semi-finals.
sentences.cn: 如果在週日的比賽中打敗了對手，我們就能晉級準決賽。

sentences.en: For decades, the two peoples have been in an opponent state due to the wars.
sentences.cn: 因為戰爭的原因，兩國人民幾十年來一直處於敵對狀態。

sentences.en: This new medicine can delay the onset of dementia.
sentences.cn: 這種新藥可以延緩老年癡呆症的出現。

sentences.en: Generally, officials in the government have an unsatisfactory attitude regarding service.
sentences.cn: 政府官員一般服務態度都不盡人意。

sentences.en: There is not an official statement yet about the upcoming basic educational reform policy.
sentences.cn: 關於即將來臨的基礎教育改革政策，目前還沒有官方聲明。

sentences.en: I apologize. I intended no offence in saying that.
sentences.cn: 我向您道歉，我那樣說並無惡意。

sentences.en: It's obvious that Allen is her stepbrother.
sentences.cn: 顯然，艾倫是她的繼兄弟。

sentences.en: You need some time to observe and learn how others finish their work quickly.
sentences.cn: 你需要些時間來觀察並學習其他人是如何快速完成工作的。

sentences.en: Everyone is responsible for observing traffic regulations.
sentences.cn: 每個人都有義務遵守交通規則。

cn: 費解的，不清楚的；無名的

sentences.en: This is too obscure for me. Can you give an example?
sentences.cn: 這對我來說太難懂了，你能舉個例子嗎？

sentences.en: That publisher has been obscure for more than a decade.
sentences.cn: 十多年來，那家出版社一直都沒有名氣。

sentences.en: My principle objective this season is to get a driver's license.
sentences.cn: 我這一季的主要目標是拿到駕照。

sentences.en: Can you make some comments on this matter in an objective manner?
sentences.cn: 你能客觀的評論一下這件事情嗎？

sentences.en: Brad has a strong objection to going to dancing class on the weekend with his little sister.
sentences.cn: 布萊德對於週末和他的小妹一起去舞蹈班十分反感。

sentences.en: Numerous pigeons are walking at a leisurely pace in the square.
sentences.cn: 許多鴿子在廣場上悠閒地走來走去。

cn: 無效的，無意義的，沒有的

sentences.en: A marriage without a registration is null and void.
sentences.cn: 沒有登記的婚姻是無效的。

cn: 值得注意的，顯而易見的

sentences.en: A noticeable difference between humans and other animals is language.
sentences.cn: 人類和動物一個顯著的區別就是語言表達。

sentences.en: He is noted for his calligraphy.
sentences.cn: 他以書法聞名。

sentences.en: The notable artist and writer has accepted our invitation to the award ceremony.
sentences.cn: 這個著名的畫家兼作家，已經接受了我們的邀請，答應參加頒獎典禮。

sentences.en: There are several kittens nestling together on the cushion.
sentences.cn: 幾隻小貓依偎在墊子上。

cn: 神經（質）的，緊張的，膽怯的

sentences.en: This shy girl is nervous of being stared at by lots of people.
sentences.cn: 這個害羞的女孩被許多人盯著會感到膽怯。

sentences.en: The parents are afraid that the child will become too addicted to video games and neglect his studies.
sentences.cn: 父母擔心孩子會太過沉溺於電動遊戲而忽視學習。

sentences.en: This merciful gentleman offered a shelter for the needy.
sentences.cn: 這位仁慈的紳士為窮人提供了安身之處。

sentences.en: Insurance could save us from needless damage.
sentences.cn: 買保險可以節省不必要的損失。

sentences.en: The woman is wearing a diamond necklace, which was a gift from her husband for their wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 那位女士帶著一條鑽石項鍊，那是她的丈夫送的結婚紀念日禮物。

sentences.en: It's natural for a leopard to hunt.
sentences.cn: 豹天生會捕獵。

sentences.en: Since her illness, she has placed special emphasis on physical exercise.
sentences.cn: 自從生病以後，她就特別注重鍛煉身體。

sentences.en: She has shown great interest in physical changes of matters from an early age.
sentences.cn: 她從小就表現出對物體的物理變化有極大興趣。

cn: v: 逐步前進，逐步實行

sentences.en: It's the first time this boy must have to go through such a difficult phase by himself.
sentences.cn: 這是男孩第一次自己度過這樣艱難的階段。

sentences.en: Since 2000, this type of mobile phone has been gradually phased out.
sentences.cn: 自從西元兩千年，這款型號的手機就逐漸被淘汰了。

sentences.en: There are no big problems, but there are many petty spelling mistakes.
sentences.cn: 沒有什麼大問題，只是有很多小的拼寫錯誤。

sentences.en: I don't want to be a pessimist, but what can we do with only 5 dollars?
sentences.cn: 我也不想悲觀，但是我們只有五美元了，又能做些什麼呢？

sentences.en: George attempted to persuade her to go hiking with us, but he failed.
sentences.cn: 喬治試圖勸她跟我們一起去遠足，但是失敗了。

sentences.en: The headmaster persisted in hiring this girl who just graduated one year ago.
sentences.cn: 校長堅持雇用這個才剛畢業一年的女孩。

sentences.en: His thesis, from which his name was removed, is to be sent to his peers for review.
sentences.cn: 他的論文被除去姓名，將送到同行那裡審評。

sentences.en: Alice was reluctant to believe the result, so she peered at the medical certificate for a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲不願意相信這種結果，盯著診斷書看了好幾分鐘。

sentences.en: He was caught peeping at the secret document.
sentences.cn: 他被當場抓到偷看機密文件。

sentences.en: She took a peep at the sleeping baby through the window along with her husband.
sentences.cn: 她和丈夫從窗戶偷偷地看了熟睡的孩子一眼。

sentences.en: It is uncivilized to drop peels whenever you want.
sentences.cn: 隨意亂丟果皮非常不文明。

sentences.en: Could you peel an apple for me?
sentences.cn: 你能為我削個蘋果嗎？

sentences.en: There is something wrong with my car's brake pedal. I’m going to have it checked tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我的車子刹車踏板有些問題，我準備明天請人檢查一下。

sentences.en: A local peasant narrated to us a legend about this big mountain.
sentences.cn: 一位當地的農民向我們講述了一個關於這座大山的傳說。

sentences.en: Are bicycles allowed on the pavement?
sentences.cn: 人行道上可以騎自行車嗎？

sentences.en: She chose a curtain with a pattern of water lilies.
sentences.cn: 她選了一款印有荷花的窗簾。

sentences.en: As a teacher, you should be patient with your students as well as their parents.
sentences.cn: 作為一名老師，對待學生和家長都要有耐心。

sentences.en: As we all know, patients are eager to get health.
sentences.cn: 正如我們知道的，病人很渴望獲得健康。

sentences.en: Her teacher gave her an encouraging pat on her head to carry on studying hard.
sentences.cn: 老師鼓勵性的拍了拍她的頭，讓她繼續努力學習。

sentences.en: She patted him on his shoulders, trying to comfort him.
sentences.cn: 她輕輕地拍了拍他的肩膀，想要安慰他。

sentences.en: She is always the passive one in this marriage.
sentences.cn: 在這段婚姻中，她總是被動的那個。

sentences.en: He told me that this bus can carry 55 passengers.
sentences.cn: 這輛大巴可以容納五十五名乘客。

sentences.en: They forced a passage through the crowd and finally reached the gate.
sentences.cn: 他們在人群中擠出一條路，終於到了大門前。

sentences.en: That was the first time I had found a job, which was a part-time math teacher at a private school.
sentences.cn: 那是我第一次找到工作，在一家私立學校做兼職數學老師。

sentences.en: He went into a partnership with his high school classmates to set up a training institution.
sentences.cn: 他和幾個高中同學合作，開了一家培訓機構。

sentences.en: All of the soldiers prepared long in advance for this parade.
sentences.cn: 所有的士兵為這次遊行提前準備了好長時間。

sentences.en: According to the schedule, the President will arrive at 13:00 and parade the troops at 14:30.
sentences.cn: 根據排程，總統將在一點抵達，兩點三十分開始閱兵。

sentences.en: Here are the instructions. They have details about the control panel.
sentences.cn: 這是說明書，上面有關於控制板的詳細說明。

sentences.en: Can you guess what's in my palm?
sentences.cn: 你猜我手裡是什麼東西？

sentences.en: The street was lined with palms and flowers.
sentences.cn: 街道兩旁種著棕櫚樹和花兒。

sentences.en: I don't like coats with shoulder pads.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡有墊肩的外套。

sentences.en: I received a large package from whom I don't know.
sentences.cn: 我收到了一個我不認識的人寄的大包裹。

sentences.en: Package all of these things together in one box, please.
sentences.cn: 請將這些東西全部裝成一箱。

sentences.en: Please be more careful and avoid errors caused by oversight as much as you can.
sentences.cn: 再細心一點，盡可能避免疏忽造成的錯誤。

sentences.en: John lived overseas for several years.
sentences.cn: 約翰在國外住了好幾年了。

sentences.en: The girl was assigned to an overseas branch of her company last month.
sentences.cn: 這個女孩上個月被派到一家海外分店去了。

sentences.en: The old man takes notes everyday on his outward journey.
sentences.cn: 這位老先生外出旅行的時候每天都記筆記。

sentences.en: If the wound extends outward, it will cause detrimental damage.
sentences.cn: 如果這個傷口再往外擴大的話，就會造成致命的傷害。

sentences.en: His outstanding performance drew the coach's attention.
sentences.cn: 他的出色表現引起了教練的注意。

sentences.en: The total amount of debt outstanding is more than one million dollars.
sentences.cn: 還有超過一百萬美元的債務沒有償還。

sentences.en: Actual output is much lower than predicted.
sentences.cn: 實際產量比預想的少得多。

sentences.en: It's an honor to be invited to have dinner with you, but I must say that I am sorry I will be unable to attend due to a previous engagement.
sentences.cn: 非常榮幸能與您共進晚餐，但是因為有約在先所以不能出席，真是抱歉。

sentences.en: The school places a lot of stress on the prevention of flu in wintertime.
sentences.cn: 冬天的時候，學校十分重視預防流行性感冒。

sentences.en: Mr. Smith can't prove that he was present when the debate began.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生不能證明，辯論開始的時候自己在場。

sentences.en: At present, we’re not sure if she has prepared him a birthday present or not.
sentences.cn: 目前，我們還不能確定她是否有為他準備生日禮物。

sentences.en: What you need to do is to present yourself as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 你需要做的就是盡可能地展現自己。

sentences.en: Every girl and boy is making preparations for the final examinations next week.
sentences.cn: 所有的男孩和女孩都在為下週的期末考試做準備。

sentences.en: Professor Longfellow is the person I respect the most and his instruction is quite precious to me.
sentences.cn: 朗費羅教授是我最尊敬的人，他的教誨對我來說相當珍貴。

sentences.en: Buffaloes are one of the dominant herbivores on the prairie.
sentences.cn: 野牛是這片大草原上主要的食草動物之一。

sentences.en: Put more soap powder into the water to clean the clothes.
sentences.cn: 在水裡多放些肥皂粉來把衣服洗乾淨。

sentences.en: Because of the rain, the annual sports meet has been postponed until next week.
sentences.cn: 因為下雨的緣故，年度運動會延到下週舉行。

sentences.en: Make sure the receiver's postal address is correct before dropping your letter into a mailbox.
sentences.cn: 把信件投進信箱之前，確保收信人的通訊位址是正確的。

sentences.en: The admission notice was sent to me via post.
sentences.cn: 錄取通知書是郵寄給我的。

sentences.en: I would like to request that you help me post this letter.
sentences.cn: 我想拜託你幫我寄一下這封信。

sentences.en: They have presented several possible explanations, and are eliminating them one by one.
sentences.cn: 他們列出了幾種可能的解釋，正在逐一排除。

sentences.en: Is there any possibility you will be able to picnic (together) with us this weekend?
sentences.cn: 你這週末有可能跟我們一起去野餐嗎？

cn: 佔有的，有佔有欲的，所有的

sentences.en: The boy is possessive of his belongings.
sentences.cn: 男孩對自己的東西很有佔有欲。

sentences.en: We need a man who possesses the patience and skills to communicate with the elderly.
sentences.cn: 我們需要一個跟老人溝通起來既有耐心又有技巧的人。

sentences.en: The young man was portrayed as wearing a military uniform with a gun in his hands.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕人在畫中穿著軍裝，拿著一把槍。

sentences.en: A clever politician knows when and what to say.
sentences.cn: 一個聰明的政治家知道什麼時候該說什麼話。

sentences.en: It's not polite to enter a person’s room without permission.
sentences.cn: 未經允許就進入別人的房間是很不禮貌的。

sentences.en: Playing poker is a good way to kill time during a long, boring train travel.
sentences.cn: 在漫長的火車旅行中，玩撲克牌是個消磨時間的好方法。

sentences.en: Some poisons used for killing weeds are also fatal to humans if ingested.
sentences.cn: 有些除草劑對人類來說也是致命。

sentences.en: They are always anxious that they will be poisoned one day.
sentences.cn: 他們老是擔心哪一天會被毒死。

sentences.en: When comparing Shelley's with Byron’s lyric poetry, she is fonder of Shelley’s.
sentences.cn: 相比於雪萊和拜倫的抒情詩，她比較喜歡雪萊的。

sentences.en: Jessica purchased a pocket calculator and carried it around everyday.
sentences.cn: 潔西卡買了一個袖珍的電算機，每天都隨身帶著它。

sentences.en: He put his hands back into his pockets immediately after shaking hands.
sentences.cn: 握完手他又立刻把手收回口袋裡去了。

sentences.en: When you are about to leave your house for an extended period of time, you should unplug every plug.
sentences.cn: 你要外出很長一段時間時，你應該把家裡的每一個插頭都拔掉。

sentences.en: The music was so noisy that he plugged his ears with cotton.
sentences.cn: 音樂聲太吵了，他不得不用棉花塞住耳朵。

sentences.en: Nowadays, ploughs have also stepped into the motorized era.
sentences.cn: 現如今，犁也進入電動化時代。

sentences.en: Seldom do peasants use oxen to plough their fields now.
sentences.cn: 現在很少有農民用牛耕地了。

sentences.en: Shakespeare is one of the most influential playwrights in history.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亞是史上最有影響力的劇作家之一。

sentences.en: The whole factory had to stop due to a broken oil pipeline.
sentences.cn: 有一條輸油管破裂了，整個工廠不得不停工。

sentences.en: This book is a pioneering work on absurdism.
sentences.cn: 這本書是荒謬主義流派的先驅作品。

sentences.en: Her great-grandfather was one of the pioneers of modern science.
sentences.cn: 她的曾祖父是現代科學的先驅者之一。

sentences.en: A flock of pigeons just flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一群鴿子剛從天空中飛過。

sentences.en: After dinner, the old woman usually goes for a walk along the pier accompanied by her son.
sentences.cn: 晚飯後，她的兒子通常會陪著這位老夫人沿著碼頭散步。

sentences.en: The forecast says it will be a nice day for a picnic tomorrow. Anyone want to join us?
sentences.cn: 天氣預報說明天會是個野餐的好天氣。還有誰要加入我們嗎？

sentences.en: The king expelled the wizard from his realm immediately when he discovered that he was cheated.
sentences.cn: 國王發現自己被騙後，馬上把巫師逐出了王國。

sentences.en: He has made some achievements in the realm of literature.
sentences.cn: 他確實在文學領域中做出了一番成就。

sentences.en: A ray of sunshine peeped into the room through the curtains.
sentences.cn: 一線陽光穿過窗簾射進房間。

sentences.en: The weekly coal ration was 1 kg per person during the war.
sentences.cn: 戰爭期間每人每週配給一公斤煤。

sentences.en: The soldiers rallied around their general.
sentences.cn: 士兵們都集結到將軍身邊。

sentences.en: A peace rally will be held at 9:00 in the morning on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 擁護和平的群眾大會將於週日早上九點舉行。

sentences.en: Only a radical reform can save the company.
sentences.cn: 只有一次徹底的改革才能拯救公司。

sentences.en: There is no doubt that it is harder to locate a plane via radar in stormy weather.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，暴雨天氣裡，雷達測定飛機的位置將會更加困難。

sentences.en: Racial harmony is the ultimate goal we are pursuing.
sentences.cn: 種族和睦是我們追求的終極目標。

sentences.en: It always takes hours of standing in a queue at ticket hall to buy a ticket.
sentences.cn: 在售票大廳買票，總是要排幾個小時的隊才能買到。

sentences.en: They queued for hours only to find that the tickets were sold out.
sentences.cn: 他們排了幾個小時的隊，卻發現票賣光了。

sentences.en: I was puzzled by his queer behavior in the cellar that day.
sentences.cn: 那天他在地窖裡的奇怪行為讓我不解。

sentences.en: That professor puzzled over the phenomenon that many students are absorbed in their cellphones during class.
sentences.cn: 那個教授對於許多學生在課堂中全神貫注地玩手機的現象感到困惑。

sentences.en: Why he was not present at the award ceremony is still a puzzle to me.
sentences.cn: 我仍然不清楚他為何在頒獎時缺席。

sentences.en: The policeman has a trained dog to help him pursue criminals.
sentences.cn: 員警有一條訓練有素的警犬來幫他追捕罪犯。

sentences.en: He is active and wants to pursue a literary career in the future.
sentences.cn: 他很積極，希望將來可以從事文藝事業。

sentences.en: They transferred a large sum of money to their son for the purchase of a house.
sentences.cn: 他們給兒子一大筆錢來買房。

sentences.en: You must think twice before you decide to purchase that item.
sentences.cn: 在你決定要買那件東西之前，必須要三思。

sentences.en: Water pumps are usually used for irrigation in fields.
sentences.cn: 經常用水泵灌溉農田。

sentences.en: Her heart is pumping quickly out of fear.
sentences.cn: 她的心臟因為害怕跳得很快。

sentences.en: The government has just passed a bill on provincial elections.
sentences.cn: 政府剛剛通過了一項關於省級選舉的法案。

sentences.en: Many conservatives hold provincial attitudes regarding this proposal.
sentences.cn: 許多保守派對這項提案持偏狹態度。

sentences.en: The protectionists are planning a demonstration to protest against the new foreign trade policy.
sentences.cn: 貿易保護主義者正在計畫遊行示威，抗議新的對外貿易政策。

sentences.en: She exhorted him again and again to wear protective headgear when riding his motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 她再三叮囑他騎摩托車時要戴安全帽。

sentences.en: If language learners want to be able to pronounce accurately, they must imitate native speakers repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 如果學語言想要發音準確，就要不斷地模仿當地人。

sentences.en: The mayor refused to pronounce his position on the closed case.
sentences.cn: 市長拒絕對這樁已經了結的案件表態。

sentences.en: She worked earnestly and productively and got promoted quickly.
sentences.cn: 她工作認真又有效率，很快就得到了升遷。

sentences.en: That project must be finished with multi-lateral collaboration.
sentences.cn: 完成那項專案需要多方的協作。

sentences.en: We project that we will call on the mayor before leaving for Sydney.
sentences.cn: 我們計畫在去雪梨之前，拜訪一次市長先生。

sentences.en: Jane borrowed a book about the Java programming language from the library, but she forgot to return it.
sentences.cn: 珍從圖書館借了一本關於 Java程式設計語言的書，但是忘了還回去。

sentences.en: He is a normal businessman, and only interested in the profits.
sentences.cn: 他是個標準的商人，只對利益感興趣。

sentences.en: Because the manager can profit a lot from it, he is more motivated.
sentences.cn: 經理因為能從中獲利很多，所以他就更有動力了。

cn: n: 專業人員，職業運動員

sentences.en: As a professional athlete, I have a lot of confidence in myself.
sentences.cn: 作為一個專業的運動員，我對自己很有信心。

sentences.en: Not only amateurs but also professionals are allowed to participate in this contest.
sentences.cn: 職業運動員和業餘愛好者都可以參加這項比賽。

sentences.en: The village assigned to the family a piece of productive farming land.
sentences.cn: 村民們分給這一家一塊非常肥沃的農田。

sentences.en: Millions of people worldwide are suffering from diseases that have proceeded from their unhealthy diets.
sentences.cn: 全球有幾百萬人正在遭受不健康飲食帶來的疾病。

sentences.en: He persisted in probing into the cause of the traffic accident.
sentences.cn: 他堅持要調查處這起交通事故的起因。

sentences.en: Students from out of town have the priority in applying for accommodations.
sentences.cn: 外地學生可以優先申請住宿。

sentences.en: Bows and arrows and spears are several of the principal primitive weapons on display today.
sentences.cn: 弓箭和長矛是今天展出的幾種主要的原始武器。

sentences.en: No matter what happens, her prime concern is always her child's safety.
sentences.cn: 不論發生什麼，她最關心的都是孩子的安全。

sentences.en: If you can't pay a visit, please inform the priest in advance.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能來拜訪，請提前通知神父。

sentences.en: She won the Nobel Prize and is the pride of her country.
sentences.cn: 她獲得了諾貝爾獎，是她國家的驕傲。

sentences.en: The rental for this house is $10,000 a year, and that is not including utilities.
sentences.cn: 這套房子的租金是每年一萬美元，不含水電費。

sentences.en: It seems to me that only a noble man is capable of rendering good for evil.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，只有高尚的人才能做到以德報怨。

sentences.en: It is your treachery that has rendered our alliance ruptured.
sentences.cn: 正是你們的背信棄義致使結盟破裂。

cn: 顯著的，引人注意的，不同尋常的

sentences.en: It has been proven that this new medicine has a remarkable effect on the treatment of cancer.
sentences.cn: 事實證明，這種新藥對於治療癌症有顯著效果。

sentences.en: The manager remarked that the new employee worked hard but not efficiently.
sentences.cn: 經理指出，這個新人工作確實很努力，但是沒有效率。

sentences.en: Did you remark the relevance between the two cases?
sentences.cn: 你注意到這兩起案件之間的關聯了嗎？

sentences.en: His remarks on the interviewee played an important role in the final decision on whether or not to hire the interviewee.
sentences.cn: 他對應徵者的評價，對於最終決定是否錄用起著重要作用。

sentences.en: After the fire, nothing remained of my car. But luckily no one was hurt.
sentences.cn: 著火以後，我的車子什麼都不剩了，但幸運的是，沒有人受傷。

sentences.en: I remained in New York for about four months for an operation, accompanied by my wife.
sentences.cn: 我曾經因為一場手術在紐約停留過四個月左右，我妻子一直陪著我。

sentences.en: She remained silent in court from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 在法庭上，她從頭到尾都保持沉默。

sentences.en: The widow is extremely faithful to her religious beliefs.
sentences.cn: 這位寡婦非常信守她的宗教信仰。

sentences.en: The doctor gave me some medicine to help relieve my headache.
sentences.cn: 醫生開了些藥給我來緩解頭疼。

sentences.en: The board of directors has made a decision to relieve Mr. Smith of his position as manager.
sentences.cn: 董事會已經決定解除史密斯先生經理的職位。

sentences.en: He is just one of the reliable business partners who was introduced to me by my father-in-law.
sentences.cn: 他只是我岳父介紹給我的，很可靠的商業夥伴之一。

sentences.en: The new secretary put all of the relevant documents on your desk.
sentences.cn: 新來的祕書已經把所有相關的文件放在你桌子上了。

sentences.en: The hunter released the baby deer from the trap.
sentences.cn: 獵人把小鹿從陷阱中放了出來。

sentences.en: The police released very few details about the crime to the media.
sentences.cn: 警方向媒體透漏極少關於這一宗罪案的細節。

sentences.en: I found that it was difficult to relate the missing necklace to the murder in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我發現，我很難把遺失的項鍊和這起謀殺案聯繫起來。

sentences.en: He has never asked her out on a date for fear of rejection.
sentences.cn: 他因為怕遭拒絕，從來沒有邀請她出去約會過。

sentences.en: The man in the picture standing by the river with a rein in hand is Columbus.
sentences.cn: 畫中手持韁繩，站在河邊的人是哥倫布。

sentences.en: Given that you are a novice, they will assign you a horse that reins well.
sentences.cn: 考慮到你是新人，他們會分配給你一匹易於駕馭的馬。

sentences.en: Under the reign of the Red Queen, a lot of good people were persecuted.
sentences.cn: 在紅心皇后統治期間，許多善良的臣民都遭到了迫害。

sentences.en: The Queen reigned over the country for 20 years.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下統治國家長達二十年。

sentences.en: Creativity shouldn't be limited by too many rules and regulations.
sentences.cn: 創新不應該受到太多規則條例的約束。

sentences.en: The register of the child's name was done in one month after birth.
sentences.cn: 孩子出生後一個月就辦好了姓名登記。

sentences.en: Do not forget to send the registered letter tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 別忘了明天早上要寄出那封掛號信。

sentences.en: The old regime has been replaced totally by the new one.
sentences.cn: 舊的制度已經被新制度完全取代了。

sentences.en: His refusal to have dinner with her made her feel embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 他拒絕與她共進晚餐，讓她覺得很尷尬。

sentences.en: He always refreshes himself with a cup of coffee when he stays up late.
sentences.cn: 他熬夜的時候總是給自己沖杯咖啡來提神。

sentences.en: There is no sign that he will reform his ways.
sentences.cn: 他一點改變作風的跡象都沒有。

sentences.en: The objective of this meeting is to find better ways to accelerate a reform in education.
sentences.cn: 這次會議的主題就是找出更好的方法來加速教育改革。

sentences.en: The architecture of a period reflects its aesthetic ideas.
sentences.cn: 某一時期的建築風格可以反映出這一時期的審美觀念。

sentences.en: The ship did not wreck on an iceberg but on a coral reef.
sentences.cn: 那艘船並沒有撞上冰山，而是觸礁失事。

sentences.en: The price of property will probably be reduced by 5.54% in the next quarter.
sentences.cn: 下一季，房地產的價格很有可能會下降百分之五點五四。

sentences.en: The police attributed the recovery of the missing money to the dog with a keen sense of smell.
sentences.cn: 員警把尋回錢的功勞歸功於這隻嗅覺靈敏的狗。

sentences.en: Proper exercise is helpful to a quick recovery.
sentences.cn: 適當的鍛煉有助於快速恢復。

sentences.en: When I asked Professor Brook who would be most qualified to conduct this research, he recommended you.
sentences.cn: 當我向布魯克教授問起，誰最適合進行這項研究時，他推薦了你。

sentences.en: I recommend you apologize to him right away.
sentences.cn: 我建議你立馬向他道歉。

sentences.en: I can recognize my dog based on the color of its paws.
sentences.cn: 我根據爪子的顏色認出了我家的小狗。

sentences.en: The Count recognized that man as his sole heir.
sentences.cn: 伯爵承認那人為唯一繼承人。

sentences.en: The teacher requested one student to recite the poem learned in the last lesson.
sentences.cn: 老師要求一名同學背誦上一節課中學到的詩歌。

sentences.en: Can you recite the names of all the European capitals?
sentences.cn: 你能一一說出歐洲各國首都的名稱嗎？

sentences.en: According to this recipe, I need to cut the meat, carrots, and peppers into small pieces first.
sentences.cn: 食譜上說，我要先把肉、胡蘿蔔和青椒都切成丁。

sentences.en: They finally rebelled against the high tax.
sentences.cn: 他們最終群起反抗嚴苛重稅。

sentences.en: These rebels have captured five cities now.
sentences.cn: 這些反叛者已經攻佔了五座城池。

sentences.en: We must reap the barley before it rains.
sentences.cn: 我們必須在下雨之前收割完麥子。

sentences.en: Her clothes were torn into ribbons.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服被撕成布條了。

sentences.en: In the Bible it says that Eve was made from one of Adam's ribs.
sentences.cn: 《聖經》裡說，夏娃是用亞當的一根肋骨做出來的。

sentences.en: I know there are many excellent poems written in rhyme, but I can't recall any now.
sentences.cn: 我知道有許多優秀的韻詩，但是我現在一首也想不起來。

sentences.en: Can you think of a word that rhymes with “leap”?
sentences.cn: 你能想出來一個和 leap押韻的詞嗎？

sentences.en: You helped me repair my roof, and this is the reward you deserve.
sentences.cn: 你幫我修好了屋頂，這是你應得的報酬。

sentences.en: The police will reward $1,000 to anyone who supplies information as to the criminal's whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 警方會向提供罪犯下落線索的人獎賞一千美元。

sentences.en: Mendel's Law was a great revolution in genetics.
sentences.cn: 孟德爾遺傳定律是遺傳學上的一大突破。

sentences.en: Thanks to your encouragement, her shattered hope has been revived.
sentences.cn: 多虧有你的鼓勵，她破滅的希望又重新燃起。

sentences.en: Since the operation, the patient's health has been undergoing a revival.
sentences.cn: 手術過後，病人正在恢復健康。

sentences.en: I think this will produce a revival of interest in some artists.
sentences.cn: 我想這可以再度引起對許多藝術家的興趣。

sentences.en: She made some minor revisions to her paper before handing it in to her tutor.
sentences.cn: 在交給導師之前，她又對論文做了些修改。

sentences.en: Elsa can't go out with us today, as she is revising for the test the day after tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 今天艾爾莎不能跟我們出去了，她正在為後天的測試複習功課。

sentences.en: Having seen his behavior today, I will revise my opinion of him.
sentences.cn: 看到了他今天的所作所為，我會對他改觀的。

sentences.en: This result is the reverse to what I predicted.
sentences.cn: 這個結果和與預期的完全想反。

sentences.en: The numbers engraved on the reverse of the coins represents the year in which it's casted.
sentences.cn: 印刻在硬幣反面的數字代表了其鑄造的年份。

sentences.en: Falling oil revenue is upsetting the shareholders.
sentences.cn: 逐漸減少的石油收入使股東們惴惴不安。

sentences.en: The patient's wife asked the doctor not to reveal the truth to him.
sentences.cn: 病人的妻子請求醫生不要向他揭露真相。

sentences.en: My grandpa will retire in ten years, and he is making plans to travel around the world now!
sentences.cn: 我外公十年後退休，現在已經在計畫環遊世界了。

sentences.en: The commander ordered the troops to retire from the front with haste.
sentences.cn: 指揮官命令部隊儘快撤離前線。

sentences.en: Can you please retell your adventure in the forest to me?
sentences.cn: 你能再給我講一遍你的森林冒險故事嗎？

sentences.en: When she moved, she retained all of her books.
sentences.cn: 她搬家時保留了所有的書。

sentences.en: The previous policy in China that one family was restricted to only one child has been changed.
sentences.cn: 先前在中國一個家庭只能有一個孩子的政策現在已經改變了。

sentences.en: The mild climate here is helpful in restoring his health.
sentences.cn: 這裡溫和的氣候對他恢復健康很有幫助。

cn: 焦躁不安的，得不到休息的

sentences.en: The children grew restless having continuously not seen their parents.
sentences.cn: 一直沒有看到父母，孩子們變得不安起來。

sentences.en: Excessive use of electronics is responsible for the decline of many teenagers' vision.
sentences.cn: 過度使用電子產品導致許多青少年視力下降。

sentences.en: The manager made no response to my advice.
sentences.cn: 經理沒有回覆我的建議。

cn: 有身分的，可敬的；相當數量的

sentences.en: This respectable man was my teacher when I was in college.
sentences.cn: 這位可敬的先生是我大學時代的老師。

sentences.en: Young as he is, he makes a respectable annual salary of 80,000 pounds.
sentences.cn: 雖然很年輕，他有著八萬英鎊的可觀年薪。

sentences.en: This land is rich in mineral resources, and that's exactly why the company is willing to purchase it at such a high price.
sentences.cn: 這塊土地礦產資源很豐富，這就是公司願意花這樣高的價格買下它的原因。

sentences.en: There is no doubt that he is a man of great resources.
sentences.cn: 他無疑是個很足智多謀的人。

sentences.en: These weeds have become resistant to herbicides.
sentences.cn: 這些野草已經對除草劑有抵抗力了。

sentences.en: He resisted the idea of replacing all of the furniture.
sentences.cn: 他抗拒換掉所有傢俱的想法。

sentences.en: How can I resist the temptation of such delicious food?
sentences.cn: 我怎麼可能經得住這樣美味食物的誘惑？

sentences.en: These seats are reserved for handicapped people in advance.
sentences.cn: 這些座位是專為殘疾人保留的。

sentences.en: I have reserved a room under the name of Jenny.
sentences.cn: 我已經以珍妮的名義預定了一間房間。

sentences.en: Although they resemble each other very much, there is no relation between them.
sentences.cn: 雖然他們兩個長得很像，但是他們並沒有血緣關係。

sentences.en: The police are trying to rescue the hostages from the kidnappers.
sentences.cn: 警方正試圖從綁匪手中救出人質。

sentences.en: Thank you so much for your coming to my rescue.
sentences.cn: 太感謝你們來解救我了。

sentences.en: We are short of a copier that can reproduce color pictures.
sentences.cn: 我們缺少一台彩色影印機。

sentences.en: Corn and wheat reproduce by means of seeds.
sentences.cn: 玉米和小麥都是種子繁殖。

cn: adj: 典型的，有代表性的

sentences.en: Is your opinion representative of all of the teachers?
sentences.cn: 你的觀點代表所有老師的觀點嗎？

sentences.en: As our company's representative, she is in full charge of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 作為我們公司的代表，她全權負責此次談判事件。

sentences.en: Replace the magazine where you found it after reading.
sentences.cn: 看完後把雜誌放回原處。

sentences.en: I replaced that old cellphone.
sentences.cn: 我換掉了那隻舊手機。

sentences.en: Can you give me a list of sailing timetable so that I can arrange the loading more conveniently?
sentences.cn: 你能給我一張船期表嗎？這樣我安排裝貨會更方便些。

sentences.en: The said speculation is only one of the hypotheses, and it still needs more experiments to verify.
sentences.cn: 上述推斷只是假設之一，還需要更多的實驗來驗證。

sentences.en: Wolves are sacred to the herdsmen living in this prairie.
sentences.cn: 對生活在這片大草原上的牧民們來說，狼是神聖的動物。

sentences.en: This sack split. Give me another one.
sentences.cn: 袋子破了，再給我一個。

sentences.en: Harry had a bad temper and quarreled with customers. That's why his boss sacked him.
sentences.cn: 哈利脾氣很壞，還跟顧客吵架，所以被老闆解雇了。

sentences.en: The boy rushed out of the room when he heard his father's voice.
sentences.cn: 男孩一聽到爸爸的聲音，就從房間衝了出去。

sentences.en: Before the start of each semester, there is a rush to buy stationery in his shop.
sentences.cn: 每學期開學前，他的商店裡都會迎來文具用品的購買熱潮。

sentences.en: Rural life is a major theme in Chinese paintings.
sentences.cn: 鄉村生活是中國畫的一大主題。

sentences.en: The day-to-day running of a shop is tedious and cumbersome.
sentences.cn: 商店的日常經營既枯燥又繁瑣。

sentences.en: He was thirsty because of a running debate.
sentences.cn: 一連串的辯論使得他口渴不已。

sentences.en: There is a rumor that he will be expelled for fighting.
sentences.cn: 傳聞他將會因為打架被開除。

sentences.en: The king has an unquestionable ruling position.
sentences.cn: 國王有不容質疑的統帥地位。

sentences.en: Who is the ruler of the forest, the tiger or the lion?
sentences.cn: 誰是這片森林的統治者，老虎還是獅子？

sentences.en: The girl drew a straight line with a ruler on the desk and told her deskmate not to cross the line.
sentences.cn: 女孩用直尺在桌子上劃了一條線，告訴同桌不要越線。

sentences.en: On the shopping list are a pair of rubber gloves and a large bottle of laundry detergent, as well as a dozen pencils with rubbers on the end.
sentences.cn: 購物單上寫著，要一副橡膠手套、一大瓶洗衣液，還有一打帶橡皮的鉛筆。

sentences.en: The waitress told us that those private rooms are reserved for royalty.
sentences.cn: 女服務員告訴我們，那些包廂是皇室成員專用。

sentences.en: Those eggs were bought half a month ago. They must be rotten now, even though they are in the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 那些雞蛋是半個月前買的。即使是在冰箱裡，也一定壞掉了。

sentences.en: That was too exciting for me! I will never ride on a roller coaster again!
sentences.cn: 太過刺激了！我再也不會玩雲霄飛車了！

sentences.en: A rubber rod rubbed on fur becomes electrified.
sentences.cn: 橡膠棒和皮毛摩擦會起電。

sentences.en: They are going to launch a new rocket in September.
sentences.cn: 他們將於九月發射一艘新式火箭。

sentences.en: He threw rocks at the dog, trying to drive it away.
sentences.cn: 他向那條狗扔石頭，想要趕走牠。

sentences.en: The dancers started to rock their bodies to the music.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈演員們隨著音樂開始搖擺身體。

sentences.en: Is there a story about the black robes that judges wear?
sentences.cn: 法官穿的黑色長袍，其中有什麼故事嗎？

sentences.en: The boy was charged with robbery—his face was clearly visible in the bank's camera.
sentences.cn: 那個男孩被控告搶劫—銀行的攝影機清晰地錄下了他的臉。

sentences.en: We are going to have a picnic on Sunday, and my task is to roast a chicken—that's my specialty.
sentences.cn: 我們週末去野餐，我的任務就是烤一隻雞，那是我最拿手的。

sentences.en: A portion of roast beef has been served to that guest.
sentences.cn: 已經給那位客人上了一份烤牛肉。

sentences.en: I have prepared a roast for dinner today.
sentences.cn: 我為今天的晚餐準備了烤肉。

sentences.en: The painter usually roams around the fields with his drawing board for hours.
sentences.cn: 這位畫家經常背著畫板在田野邊漫步，一晃就是幾個小時。

sentences.en: Shakespeare is the greatest playwright ever, and he has no rival, especially in the field of tragedy.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亞是最偉大的劇作家，特別是他寫的悲劇，沒有人能比得上。

sentences.en: Biographies cannot rival novels in their appeal.
sentences.cn: 傳記不如小說有吸引力。

sentences.en: Citizens are complaining a lot about the increasing rise in meat price.
sentences.cn: 市民們抱怨肉價在不斷上漲。

sentences.en: The patient rose slowly from the sofa.
sentences.cn: 病人慢慢從沙發上站起身來。

sentences.en: Sunlight is essential to ripen fruit.
sentences.cn: 陽光是果實成熟必不可少的。

sentences.en: She was still in a state of shock as narrating how the crazy dog ripped the clothes in the closet.
sentences.cn: 她心有餘悸地敘述發瘋的小狗是如何撕扯衣櫥裡的衣服的。

sentences.en: Several riots broke out at the same time in the same way. I suspect that they were deliberate and meant to achieve something.
sentences.cn: 幾起暴亂以同樣的方式同時爆發，我不得不懷疑這是蓄意謀劃的，為的是達到某種目的。

sentences.en: Someone called the police and said that there were people rioting in the streets.
sentences.cn: 有人報警說街上有人鬧事。

sentences.en: I heard your cellphone ring many times. Why didn't you answer it?
sentences.cn: 我聽到你的電話響了很多次了，為什麼不接？

sentences.en: You are in need of a key ring to string your keys together.
sentences.cn: 你需要個鑰匙圈把鑰匙都串起來形式出現。

sentences.en: It's easy to recognize James, as he always wears a pair of glasses with gold rims.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯是很好認的，因為他總是帶著一副金框眼鏡。

sentences.en: This man is respected as a righteous judge.
sentences.cn: 這位先生因為身為一位正直的法官而受到尊敬。

sentences.en: The newcomer is famous for his richness.
sentences.cn: 新來的人以富有聞名。

sentences.en: Suddenly, the house shook violently and collapsed within seconds.
sentences.cn: 突然，房子開始劇烈搖動，幾秒鐘以後就倒塌了。

sentences.en: They stood under the shade of a palm tree, waiting for their bus.
sentences.cn: 他們站在一顆棕櫚樹的樹蔭下等公車。

sentences.en: Nancy plans to replace all of the lamp shades in this house along with all of the curtains.
sentences.cn: 南西打算換掉房子裡所有的燈罩和窗簾。

sentences.en: Wheat propagates by sexual reproduction, as does corn.
sentences.cn: 小麥是通過有性生殖來繁衍的，玉米也是。

sentences.en: She had sewn up the hole in the sock by herself before I came in.
sentences.cn: 我進去之前，她就自己把襪子上的洞補好了。

sentences.en: After a long debate, they came to a settlement at last.
sentences.cn: 經過長久的辯論，他們最終解決了問題。

sentences.en: The owner gave a cheque as settlement for our account.
sentences.cn: 店主給我們一張支票，結清了款項。

sentences.en: It's your own business; you need to settle the matter among yourselves.
sentences.cn: 這是你們自己的事，要自己解決。

sentences.en: On Sunday afternoons he always settles himself down comfortably on the sofa to watch a movie.
sentences.cn: 星期天下午，他總是會舒服地窩在沙發上看一部電影。

sentences.en: The teacher tried to settle the students down, but he failed.
sentences.cn: 老師試圖要學生們安靜下來，但是失敗了。

sentences.en: Separation from his beloved daughter made him sad.
sentences.cn: 他離開了他心愛的女兒，十分難過。

sentences.en: It was sensible of you to open all of the doors and windows right away.
sentences.cn: 你立刻打開所有的門窗的做法是明智的。

sentences.en: There has been a sensible change in his attitude towards this matter.
sentences.cn: 可以感覺到他對這件事的態度有所改變。

cn: 高級的，年長的，老資格的

sentences.en: He entered the company before me. That is to say, he is senior to me.
sentences.cn: 他比我早進公司，也就是說他比我資深。

sentences.en: The contact information and address on the letter are not valid, so the letter will be returned to its sender.
sentences.cn: 信封上的聯繫方式和地址都是無效的，所以這封信會被退還給寄件人。

sentences.en: The selection of the cheerleading team starts this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 啦啦隊選拔下午開始。

sentences.en: They selected Paul to be the leader of the expedition.
sentences.cn: 他們挑選保羅做探險隊的隊長。

sentences.en: A select group of scientists have been sent to the desert to study the inscriptions on the pyramids.
sentences.cn: 一隊精挑細選的科學家已經被送去研究金字塔裡的銘文了。

sentences.en: That thief was seized by the passing traffic police.
sentences.cn: 那個小偷被一個路過的交警抓住了。

sentences.en: I have a secure job in the financial department of a company, and my wife is a full-time mother.
sentences.cn: 我在公司的財務部有一份穩定的工作，而我的妻子是一位全職太太。

sentences.en: The financial sector has been hurt a lot by the declining economy.
sentences.cn: 金融領域由於衰退的經濟而遭受重挫。

sentences.en: Parents should pay attention to seasonal flu prevention.
sentences.cn: 家長們應該注意預防季節性流感。

sentences.en: He turned his head to me and said, “A screw on the door has loosened. Can you help screw it?”
sentences.cn: 他把頭轉向我，說：「門上有個螺絲鬆了，你能幫忙擰緊一點嗎？」

sentences.en: Staring at a computer screen for a long time will damage one's eyesight.
sentences.cn: 長時間盯著電腦螢幕會損害視力。

sentences.en: As a scientist, I believe that all strange phenomena can be explained by science.
sentences.cn: 作為一名科學家，我相信所有的奇怪現象都能都能用科學解釋。

sentences.en: They stopped at the middle of the mountain to admire the scenery.
sentences.cn: 他們在山腰上停下，欣賞風景。

sentences.en: There is a long scar from his forehead to his cheek that he regards as a symbol of his manhood.
sentences.cn: 從額頭到臉頰有一條長長的疤痕，他把那視為男子氣概的象徵。

sentences.en: Mr. Thomas usually scans the newspaper over breakfast.
sentences.cn: 湯瑪斯先生通常會在吃早餐的時候瀏覽報紙。

sentences.en: Scan the document and send it to me before noon.
sentences.cn: 把這份檔掃描一下，中午之前傳給我。

sentences.en: The doctor did a brain scan on him and found there was a tumor in his brain's right hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 醫生給他做了大腦掃描，發現他的右半邊大腦裡長了個腫瘤。

sentences.en: I know where he is. I saw him walking into the forest with a saw two or three hours ago.
sentences.cn: 我知道他在哪裡。兩三個小時前，我看到他帶著一把鋸子進森林了。

sentences.en: He sawed the trunk in two for easy transport.
sentences.cn: 他把樹幹鋸成兩段，方便運輸。

sentences.en: Here are sausages, salad, milk, fruit, sandwiches, and omelets. Enjoy yourself.
sentences.cn: 這裡有香腸，沙拉，牛奶，水果，三明治和煎蛋，請盡情享用吧。

sentences.en: Add a few drops of soy sauce to make the dish more appealing.
sentences.cn: 加幾滴醬油，讓菜看起來更誘人。

sentences.en: This satellite is programmed to orbit the Earth once a week.
sentences.cn: 這顆衛星被設定為，每一週繞線地球一圈。

sentences.en: Their main products are canned sardines with different kinds of flavors.
sentences.cn: 他們的主打產品是罐裝沙丁魚，有各種各樣的口味。

sentences.en: The sampling period is as important as the sampling range in this experiment.
sentences.cn: 這項實驗中，取樣週期和取樣範圍同樣重要。

sentences.en: Your grandfather just fell asleep. Be quiet for his sake.
sentences.cn: 你爺爺剛睡著，安靜些，不要吵醒他。

sentences.en: He is a saint to be able to tolerate her bad temper.
sentences.cn: 他真是個聖人，能容忍她的壞脾氣。

sentences.en: The special chair developed by their company will be used in spacecraft.
sentences.cn: 他們公司研發的這種特殊座椅將會用於太空船中。

sentences.en: Move that desk out of the study and there will be enough space for the new shelf.
sentences.cn: 把那張桌子移出書房，這樣就有足夠的空間來放新書架了。

sentences.en: I'm sure that humans will be able to travel through space to other planets someday.
sentences.cn: 我確信，總有一天，人類可以穿越太空抵達其他行星。

sentences.en: Do you have a solution to the teenage rebellion?
sentences.cn: 你有什麼解決青少年叛逆的方法嗎？

sentences.en: With this aqueuous solution, we can dissolve unrecyclable waste.
sentences.cn: 藉著這種溶液，我們就能分解不可回收的廢料。

sentences.en: Although she has rehearsed many times, she is still very nervous to dance a solo.
sentences.cn: 儘管已經排練過很多次了，要表演獨舞，她還是很緊張。

sentences.en: His face is just as solemn as usual; I have no idea if he knows the truth.
sentences.cn: 他的面孔就像往常一樣嚴肅，我不知道他是否已經知道了真相。

sentences.en: His house is the sole one that collapsed during the earthquake; luckily, he was not in it at that time.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是地震中唯一倒塌的，幸運的是，他當時並不在裡面。

sentences.en: The aging of populations is an unstoppable social trend globally.
sentences.cn: 人口高齡化已經是一種不可阻擋的全球性社會趨勢。

sentences.en: This dress is quite smooth. Is it made of silk?
sentences.cn: 這條裙子摸起來很光滑，是絲綢做的嗎？

sentences.en: Thanks to your tips, we had a smooth trip in Boston.
sentences.cn: 多虧了你的提點，我們在波士頓的旅途很順利。

sentences.en: He drove his car with difficulty down the slope and stopped beside a field.
sentences.cn: 他把車艱難地開下斜坡，停在一塊田邊。

sentences.en: The garden sloped slightly towards the east, which made the former owner unsatisfied.
sentences.cn: 花園稍稍向東傾斜，上一位主人對此很不滿意。

sentences.en: The difference between an authentic one and this fake one is really slight. If I were you, I would have bought it, too.
sentences.cn: 這件贗品和真品的差異真的很小。如果我是你，我也會買下它的。

sentences.en: This dress is more suitable for a girl with a slight figure.
sentences.cn: 這件洋裝更適合身材苗條的女孩。

sentences.en: How can you treat your housemaid like a slave?
sentences.cn: 你怎麼能像對待奴隸一樣對待女僕？

sentences.en: The family has been slaving away at painting their new house throughout the weekend.
sentences.cn: 這一家整個週末都在為新房子刷油漆。

sentences.en: One of the war ships was hit by a shell and rapidly sank into the sea.
sentences.cn: 戰船之一被一顆炮彈擊中，很快沉沒在海裡了。

sentences.en: When the telephone rang, I was washing the dishes in our kitchen sink.
sentences.cn: 電話響起的時候，我正在洗廚房水槽裡的碗碟。

sentences.en: That traveler confessed to the priest that he was sinful.
sentences.cn: 那個旅人向神父懺悔自己有罪。

sentences.en: The only similarity between them is their accents.
sentences.cn: 他們唯一的相似處就是口音。

sentences.en: The price of silver is much lower than that of gold in the precious metals market.
sentences.cn: 在貴重金屬交易市場中，銀的價格比金低很多。

sentences.en: Her black hair has turned silver as time has passed.
sentences.cn: 隨著時間流逝，她原本黑色的頭髮已經變成了銀白色。

sentences.en: If your experiment succeeds, it will have a significant impact on the development of solar energy technology.
sentences.cn: 如果你的實驗成功了，這將會對太陽能科技的發展產生深遠的影響。

sentences.en: After a careful review of the contract, he added his signature to it.
sentences.cn: 仔細檢查了一遍合約後，他簽上了自己的名字。

sentences.en: His poor sight deprived him of enlisting in the army.
sentences.cn: 他視力太差，不能參軍。

sentences.en: I intended not to laugh, but I couldn't help it at the sight of his strange clothes.
sentences.cn: 我不想笑的，但是看到他奇怪的穿著，就忍不住了。

sentences.en: He was amazed by the beautiful sights in the park.
sentences.cn: 他被公園裡的美麗景象驚到了。

sentences.en: He shrugged at me and walked away without a word, just as you had predicted.
sentences.cn: 就像你預測的那樣，他朝我聳了聳肩，然後一句話沒說就走開了。

sentences.en: I inferred from her shrug that she didn't want to be involved.
sentences.cn: 她只是聳了聳肩，我推斷她是不想攪合進來。

sentences.en: I like this pair of trousers very much, but they shrank in the wash and don't fit me now.
sentences.cn: 我很喜歡這條褲子，但是洗了後縮水了，現在穿不上了。

sentences.en: As the intruder walked toward him with a knife, I saw him shrink back.
sentences.cn: 闖入者拿著刀走向他的時候，我看到他向後退縮了一下。

sentences.en: The soldiers headed for the spot where the shots came from.
sentences.cn: 士兵朝著槍聲傳來的地方前進。

sentences.en: For the reason of the economic crisis, many laborers in shipbuilding have been laid off recently.
sentences.cn: 由於經濟危機，最近許多造船業工人都被資遣了。

sentences.en: My cousin has been working on the same merchant ship since he graduated in 1999.
sentences.cn: 我堂哥從一九九九年畢業開始，一直在同一條商船上工作。

sentences.en: The moonlight shone on the calm sea, which reflected its bright light.
sentences.cn: 月光照在平靜的海面上，反射出粼粼的光芒。

sentences.en: The TV has been shifted from the living room to my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 電視機已經從客廳移到我的臥室裡了。

sentences.en: What does the shift of the wind forecast?
sentences.cn: 風向的轉變預示了什麼？

sentences.en: Lucy has found a new job where she works the day shift so that she can have a few hours to study at night.
sentences.cn: 露茜找到一份值日班的新工作，這樣她晚上就可以有幾個小時來學習。

sentences.en: The homeless people ran deep into the mountains and sought shelter from the war in an old temple.
sentences.cn: 那些無家可歸的人逃進了深山裡，在一座古廟裡躲避戰爭。

sentences.en: The car is advertised to have a shell as hard as a plane's.
sentences.cn: 廣告宣稱，這輛車有著和飛機一樣堅硬的車體外殼。

sentences.en: The building was destroyed by a shell in a war decades ago.
sentences.cn: 這座建築在幾十年前的一場戰爭裡，被一顆炮彈炸毀了。

sentences.en: My mom left a sheet of paper for me that listed the household chores I needed to do.
sentences.cn: 媽媽給我留了一張紙，上面列著要做的家務。

sentences.en: I hate Sundays when I wash my bed sheets.
