sentences.cn: 我討厭週日的洗床單時間。

sentences.en: Bring the sharp knife back to the kitchen in case somebody carelessly gets hurt.
sentences.cn: 這把刀很鋒利，把它拿回廚房，以免有人不小心被傷到。

sentences.en: Don't worry. I will pay my share of the fee.
sentences.cn: 不用擔心，我會付自己的那份費用的。

sentences.en: Thank you for sharing your food with us.
sentences.cn: 謝謝您將您的食物分享給我們。

sentences.en: He struck his head on the corner of the desk by accident when playing chess.
sentences.cn: 他玩象棋的時候不小心把頭撞到桌角上了。

sentences.en: The workers in shipbuilding went on strike for higher pay and better working conditions.
sentences.cn: 造船業工人為提高工資和更好的工作環境舉行了罷工。

sentences.en: She raised herself on tiptoe and stretched her arms out in order to reach the book on the upper shelf.
sentences.cn: 她踮起腳尖，伸長手臂來搆書架上層的書。

sentences.en: This pair of trousers is made of material that has a lot of stretch.
sentences.cn: 這條褲子是用很有彈性的材料做成的。

sentences.en: The gardener strengthened the fence with more metal wire for the upcoming storm.
sentences.cn: 園丁用鐵絲鞏固了籬笆，來抵禦即將到來的暴風雨。

sentences.en: Johnny straightened his tie, went into the room, and stared at his girlfriend nervously.
sentences.cn: 強尼把領帶撫平，走進房間，緊張地看著自己的女朋友。

sentences.en: Make certain that the new stove arrives before dinner.
sentences.cn: 確保新爐子能在晚餐前送到。

sentences.en: The forecast says there will be a storm tomorrow, so we have to cancel the picnic.
sentences.cn: 天氣預報說明天會有暴風雨，所以我們不得不取消野餐的計畫。

sentences.en: Stir your tea with a spoon to speed up the dissolution of sugar.
sentences.cn: 用湯匙攪動茶，加速糖的溶解。

sentences.en: It seems that his claim caused quite a stir in class.
sentences.cn: 他的言論似乎在班裡引起了一陣騷動。

sentences.en: His fingers were sticky with jam after dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃完晚飯後，他的手指變得黏糊糊的，都是果醬。

sentences.en: Arthur had collected enough sticks to make a fire before we got home.
sentences.cn: 我們回家之前，亞瑟已經撿了足夠的柴來生火。

sentences.en: A needle is stuck in my finger deeply. I need a band-aid right now.
sentences.cn: 一根針深深地紮進我的手指裡，我現在急需一個 OK繃。

sentences.en: The morning glorys'stems rise around the trunk of the tree.
sentences.cn: 牽牛花的花莖繞樹而上。

sentences.en: The staff’s discontent stemmed from the uneven distribution of shared resources.
sentences.cn: 員工的不滿情緒來自於共有資源的分配不均。

sentences.en: The roof is quite steep; be careful when climbing it.
sentences.cn: 屋頂太陡了，爬上去的時候要小心些。

sentences.en: His official status in the government is financial minister.
sentences.cn: 他在政府的正式職位是財政部長。

sentences.en: She was sad because she had broken her favorite statue carelessly while doing household chores.
sentences.cn: 她做家務的時候，不小心摔碎了最喜歡的雕像，十分難過。

sentences.en: Benjamin Franklin was not only an excellent statesman but also a productive scientist.
sentences.cn: 班傑明 ·富蘭克林不僅是一位出色的政治家，還是一名多產的科學家。

sentences.en: The farmer stared at the huge circle in the field in amazement.
sentences.cn: 農夫驚訝地看著田裡的巨圈。

sentences.en: His strange outfit attracted a number of curious stares.
sentences.cn: 他奇怪的打扮吸引了很多好奇的目光。

sentences.en: He stabbed at him with his stick to remind him to focus his attention.
sentences.cn: 他用拐杖戳了戳他，提醒他集中注意力。

sentences.en: He has several stabs on his arm and needs emergency bandaging.
sentences.cn: 他手臂上有幾處刺傷，需要緊急包紮。

sentences.en: Squeeze water out of the sponge.
sentences.cn: 把海綿裡的水擠出來。

sentences.en: He sprang from his seat once he heard the news.
sentences.cn: 他一聽到這個消息就從座位上跳了起來。

sentences.en: They found hot springs in the mountains when they went hiking in spring.
sentences.cn: 他們春季出去遠足的時候，在山裡發現了一處溫泉。

sentences.en: They spread a blanket on the floor in case they get cold when sitting there.
sentences.cn: 他們把一張毯子鋪在地板上，以防坐在地板上時感冒。

sentences.en: The news of the victory spread quickly across the country.
sentences.cn: 勝利的消息很快傳遍全國。

cn: n: 霧狀液體，噴霧液體

sentences.en: The garage is in need of some spray paint. Have you arranged the delivery?
sentences.cn: 修理廠需要些噴漆，你安排好送貨了嗎？

sentences.en: My dad was spraying herbicide in the fields when I got home.
sentences.cn: 我回家的時候，我爸爸正在田裡噴除草劑。

cn: n: 發起人，主辦者，贊助商

sentences.en: When I planned to express gratitude to the sponsor, he left the party.
sentences.cn: 我剛準備向贊助人表示感謝，他就離開了晚會。

sentences.en: The old man sponsored many disabled students anonymously.
sentences.cn: 這位老人匿名贊助了許多殘疾學生。

sentences.en: It's a good idea to put some sponge in the carton to make sure that the machine does not get damaged during transit.
sentences.cn: 在箱子裡放些海綿來確保機器不會在運輸途中遭受損害，這真是個好主意。

sentences.en: The class has split into two groups that are debating each other on this matter.
sentences.cn: 學生們分成了兩組，在這個問題上辯論不休。

sentences.en: From the windows, you will have a splendid view of the sunset in the evening.
sentences.cn: 傍晚的時候，從窗戶可以看到日落的壯觀景象。

sentences.en: He did not say that out of spite.
sentences.cn: 他那樣說並不是出於惡意。

sentences.en: In spite of the heavy rain, she went out shopping with her friends.
sentences.cn: 儘管下著大雨，她還是跟朋友們出去購物了。

sentences.en: I prefer mild flavors; in other words, I don't like food with too much spice.
sentences.cn: 我喜歡清淡的口味；也就是說，我不喜歡加太多香料的食物。

sentences.en: Could you please be more specific about your arrival time and the number of attendees?
sentences.cn: 請問你能告訴我一下更明確的到達時間和參加人數嗎？

sentences.en: How many specifics do you know about this new weapon?
sentences.cn: 你對這種新型武器的特性了解多少？

sentences.en: The bride sparkled with happiness at her wedding.
sentences.cn: 婚禮上，新娘幸福得容光煥發。

sentences.en: The sudden sparkle in the dark indicated that there were other people hidden in the cave.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中突然的火花表示還有其他人躲藏在山洞裡。

sentences.en: Compared with a century ago, the average span of human's life now has been extended by at least ten years.
sentences.cn: 與一個世紀前相比，人類的平均壽命至少延長了十年。

sentences.en: Prof. Cooper is a brilliant man of wide learning—his knowledge spans many different fields.
sentences.cn: 庫珀教授是個非常博學多才的人，他的知識遍及許多領域。

sentences.en: It was the first time that I had seen the launching of a spaceship in person and not on video or on TV.
sentences.cn: 那是我第一次親眼看到太空船的發射，而不是通過錄影或電視。

sentences.en: The homeless man who witnessed the murder ran away in terror.
sentences.cn: 那個目擊了謀殺的流浪漢驚慌地跑開了。

sentences.en: When the lady was told the terrible news from the front, she instantly fainted.
sentences.cn: 當這位女士被告知這個前線傳來的可怕消息時，立刻暈倒了。

sentences.en: She looked at the baby's tender face and couldn’t help crying loudly.
sentences.cn: 她看著那個嬰兒溫和的面容，忍不住大聲哭了起來。

sentences.en: Tender petals easily fall.
sentences.cn: 嬌嫩的花瓣很容易掉落。

sentences.en: He has a tendency to talk too much when he is lying.
sentences.cn: 他說謊的時候會有多話的傾向。

sentences.en: The closure of this road is only temporary.
sentences.cn: 封路只是暫時的。

sentences.en: After taking the medicine the doctor gave her, her temperature soon came down.
sentences.cn: 吃了醫生給的藥片後，她的體溫很快就降下來了。

sentences.en: The first thing you need to learn to do is to control your temper.
sentences.cn: 你要學會的第一件事就是控制住自己的脾氣。

sentences.en: The advantages of our technological innovations will help us maintain a leading position in the market.
sentences.cn: 技術革新帶來的優勢會幫助我們在市場中保持領先地位。

sentences.en: The water in the teapot is no longer hot. I will reheat it.
sentences.cn: 茶壺裡的水不熱了，我會重新加熱的。

sentences.en: The government has passed the new tariff act and is about to raise the import tariff starting next year.
sentences.cn: 政府已經通過了新的關稅法，從明年起將會提高進口關稅。

sentences.en: He always feels inferior because of his height and is afraid of being the target of scorn.
sentences.cn: 他總是因為身高感到自卑，害怕成為嘲笑的對象。

sentences.en: Take one of these tablets after dinner every day.
sentences.cn: 每天晚飯後吃一片藥。

sentences.en: Many students switched to vote for Linda in the class monitor election.
sentences.cn: 在班長選舉中，許多學生改投了琳達。

sentences.en: They decided to install a new light switch on the wall to replace the old one.
sentences.cn: 他們決定在牆上安裝了一個新的電燈開關，替換掉了舊的。

sentences.en: He was swift to confess his fault and make an apology.
sentences.cn: 他立刻承認了錯誤，並道了歉。

sentences.en: The twins have swept their own bedrooms since they were eight years old.
sentences.cn: 這對雙胞胎自八歲起就自己打掃臥室了。

sentences.en: I swear to you that what I told you is truth.
sentences.cn: 我向你發誓，我告訴你的是真的。

sentences.en: That drunkard fell into a puddle and swore loudly.
sentences.cn: 那個醉鬼摔進了泥坑裡並大聲咒罵。

sentences.en: The earthquake took place so suddenly and violently that only half of the village survived.
sentences.cn: 地震發生的太突然太劇烈，只有一半的村民倖存了下來。

sentences.en: They surveyed 10,000 adults aged between 25 and 35, half men and half women.
sentences.cn: 他們調查了一萬名年齡在二十五到三十歲之間的成年人，男女各占一半。

sentences.en: The survey was conducted by the sales department.
sentences.cn: 這項調查由銷售部進行。

sentences.en: You have my words, no matter what happens, I will never surrender to the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我向你保證，不管發生什麼，我都絕不會向敵人投降。

sentences.en: The surgeon was too tired to move after performing two successive operations.
sentences.cn: 連續進行了兩場手術，這位外科醫生累得動不了。

sentences.en: They painted the surface of the box green to make it eye-catching.
sentences.cn: 他們把箱子的表面塗成綠色，來使它跟顯眼一點。

sentences.en: That old man, with supreme wisdom, is believed to be able to communicate with gods.
sentences.cn: 人們相信，那位有著無上智慧的老人，能夠與神靈對話。

sentences.en: The boss summoned the staff to the conference room to announce the new rules.
sentences.cn: 老闆把所有員工召集到會議室，宣佈新的規定。

sentences.en: They climbed to the summit of the mountain in the early morning and took many photos there.
sentences.cn: 他們在清晨登上頂峰，在那裡拍了很多照片。

sentences.en: The inspector asked him to open the suitcase for further inspection.
sentences.cn: 安檢員要求他打開手提箱，做進一步檢查。

sentences.en: This game is quite suitable for children between the ages of 8 and 14.
sentences.cn: 這個遊戲相當適合八到十四歲的孩子們。

sentences.en: Jack finally submitted to the organization's decision and left for Miami.
sentences.cn: 傑克最後服從了組織的決定，去了邁阿密。

sentences.en: The researcher has submitted her proposal to the committee and is waiting for a response.
sentences.cn: 研究員已經向委員會提交了申請，正在等待回復。

sentences.en: He is wearing a black suit with a white shirt and a tie with red stripes today.
sentences.cn: 他今天穿著黑色西裝，白色襯衣，脖子上系著一條有紅色條紋的領帶。

sentences.en: We need to strip off the old paint first, and then we can repaint the car.
sentences.cn: 我們首先要把舊的漆除掉，然後才能為車重新上漆。

sentences.en: When the duke went out, the servant had already tied up the parcel with string and put it in the carriage.
sentences.cn: 公爵出門前，僕人已經把用繩子把包裹捆紮好，放進馬車裡了。

sentences.en: I can't believe you were fooled by that old trick!
sentences.cn: 真不敢相信，你竟然被那樣的老伎倆給騙到了！

sentences.en: During the day, women in this tribe go fishing, while men do housework at home.
sentences.cn: 這個部落的女人白天要去捕魚，而男人在家做家務。

sentences.en: This team is funded by a medical company to find better treatments for cancer.
sentences.cn: 這個小組有一家醫藥公司資助，研發癌症更好的治療方法。

sentences.en: They know that it's cruel to trap rabbits, but they don’t stop laying traps in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 他們知道誘捕兔子是很殘忍的，但是他們一直沒有停止在樹叢裡設陷阱。

sentences.en: The buyers requested the goods be transported by ship.
sentences.cn: 買家要求用船運輸貨物。

sentences.en: My car was sent to the garage for repairs, so I have to travel by public transport today.
sentences.cn: 我的車送去修理廠修理了，所以我今天只能搭大眾交通工具了。

sentences.en: Everyone is very sad because of the tragic news.
sentences.cn: 大家都因為這個悲慘的消息傷心不已。

sentences.en: It's traditional in this village for the bride and groom to not be able to see each other before their wedding.
sentences.cn: 這個村莊裡的傳統是，新娘新郎在婚禮之前不能見面。

sentences.en: The new act reduces tariffs, which encourages international trade.
sentences.cn: 新法案降低了關稅，積極鼓勵國際貿易。

sentences.en: The company trades in grain. For example, they purchases rice from the south and sell it in the north.
sentences.cn: 這家公司經營糧食買賣，比如說，他們會從南方收購米然後賣往北方。

sentences.en: We found a track in the forest, and following it we found a village.
sentences.cn: 我們在森林裡發現一條小路，沿著它找到了一個村莊。

sentences.en: That plane suddenly just disappeared without a trace.
sentences.cn: 那架飛機突然間消失得無形無蹤。

sentences.en: The hunter traced a rabbit through the bushes, and found it in its lair.
sentences.cn: 獵人追蹤著一隻兔子穿過灌木叢，在巢穴中找到了牠。

sentences.en: A group of foreign tourists are waiting for their bus in the shade.
sentences.cn: 一群國外遊客正在樹蔭下等他們的遊覽車。

sentences.en: It's indeed a tough problem. I have to admit that I can’t deal with it by myself.
sentences.cn: 這確實是個難題，我必須承認，我獨自一人解決不了。

sentences.en: I strongly recommend the police take some tough measures against thieves.
sentences.cn: 我強烈建議警方對小偷採取強硬措施。

sentences.en: That tobacco pipe on his waist is from his daughter.
sentences.cn: 他腰間的菸斗是女兒買給他的。

sentences.en: The girl usually has some toast and a glass of milk for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 那女孩通常會吃幾片烤麵包和一杯牛奶當早餐。

sentences.en: They toasted the bride and the bridegroom.
sentences.cn: 他們向新娘新郎祝酒。

sentences.en: The fat tissue under our skin helps protect against the cold.
sentences.cn: 皮下脂肪組織可以防寒。

sentences.en: The waiter put a box of tissues on the table and a pot of tea.
sentences.cn: 服務員放了一盒紙巾和一壺茶在桌子上。

sentences.en: He walked into the bedroom on the tips of his toes, like a thief in the night.
sentences.cn: 他踮著腳尖走進臥室，鬼鬼祟祟的。

sentences.en: The couple put their tip on the table and left the restaurant in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 那對夫婦把小費放在桌子上，就急匆匆地離開了飯店。

sentences.en: They covered the floor and the walls of the bathroom with marble tiles.
sentences.cn: 他們用大理石瓷磚鋪的浴室地板和牆面。

sentences.en: Tighten that loose screw, or the painting will fall.
sentences.cn: 把那顆鬆動的螺絲擰緊一些，不然那幅畫會掉下來的。

sentences.en: Don't tie too tight of a knot, or it will be difficult to untie.
sentences.cn: 不要把結繫得太緊，不然會很難解開。

sentences.en: There is a book about the industrial revolution in 18th century on his tidy desk.
sentences.cn: 他整潔的書桌上放著一本關於十八世紀工業革命的書。

sentences.en: The ebb and flow of the tides are affected by the moon.
sentences.cn: 潮漲潮落是受到月亮的影響。

sentences.en: Wait for me! I will finish the packing in two ticks!
sentences.cn: 等等我，我馬上就打包好了！

sentences.en: The tailor embroidered a lotus in full bloom on the dress using silk thread.
sentences.cn: 裁縫用絲線在洋裝上繡了一朵盛開的荷花。

sentences.en: The students gave their classroom a thorough cleaning before classes on the first day of school.
sentences.cn: 開學第一天，學生們在上課前先把教室徹底地打掃了一遍。

sentences.en: The police offered a $500 reward for information on the thief who had stolen the painting.
sentences.cn: 員警懸賞五百美元捉拿那個偷畫賊。

sentences.en: It's absurd to thicken the wall because of a bad dream. Do you know how hard that would be?
sentences.cn: 因為一個惡夢就要加厚牆，你知道這有多辛苦嗎？

sentences.en: Your hypothesis might explain the strange phenomenon in theory, but it needs practical experiments to confirm it.
sentences.cn: 你的假說也許理論上能解釋這種奇怪現象，但是需要實際試驗來驗證。

sentences.en: According to textual research, this brass statue was buried with a duke in the fifteenth century.
sentences.cn: 據考證，這座青銅雕像是十五世紀一位公爵的陪葬品。

sentences.en: Susan got a job in a factory that produced a range of textiles, but she quit after just a week.
sentences.cn: 蘇珊在一家生產各種紡織品的工廠裡找到了一份工作，但是一個星期後又辭職了。

sentences.en: The terrorist who threw the bomb into the embassy last month has been arrested in a slum.
sentences.cn: 上個月向大使館投擲炸彈的恐怖分子，在一個貧民窟裡被逮捕了。

sentences.en: She always works with great zeal, which has drawn her team leader's attention.
sentences.cn: 她工作總是充滿熱情，引起了團隊領導的注意。

sentences.en: You need to wipe the table first as it has not been used for a long time.
sentences.cn: 你得先把桌子擦一下，因為很久沒用了。

sentences.en: The length of the bed is 2.2 meters, and the width is 1.5 meters.
sentences.cn: 這張床長二點二米，寬一點五米。

sentences.en: The topic of their conversation was the perfect social welfare system.
sentences.cn: 他們談話的主題是完善的社會福利制度。

sentences.en: The house's owner welded a new handle onto the iron gate.
sentences.cn: 房主在鐵門上焊接了個新把手。

sentences.en: The girl wearing a garland woven out of roses is his fiancée, and she plays the piano well.
sentences.cn: 那個頭戴玫瑰花環的女孩就是他的未婚妻。

sentences.en: Whether the competition continues or not depends on the weather.
sentences.cn: 比賽是否繼續要看天氣了。

sentences.en: I don't want to waste my breath telling you how to do it.
sentences.cn: 我不想再白費唇舌告訴你們怎麼做了。

sentences.en: The issue is how to deal with the waste, not to find who is responsible for it.
sentences.cn: 問題是如何處理這些垃圾，而不是誰該為此負責。

sentences.en: The king sent twelve warriors to save the princess, who had been seized by the evil wizard.
sentences.cn: 國王派出了十二名勇士去拯救被邪惡巫師抓走的公主。

sentences.en: This issue is incredibly urgent, so please report to your superior immediately.
sentences.cn: 這個問題非常緊急，請速報告給上級。

sentences.en: Aunt Penny urged us to go to bed at 10:00 p.m.
sentences.cn: 潘妮阿姨一到十點就催促我們上床睡覺。

sentences.en: I have a sudden urge to go to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 我心血來潮想去動物園。

sentences.en: My little brother doesn't want the room upstairs, so he and I changed rooms.
sentences.cn: 我弟弟不喜歡樓上的房間，所以我和他換了一下。

sentences.en: He put the document on the upper shelf in case the children get it wet.
sentences.cn: 他把文件放在架子上層，以免孩子們弄濕。

sentences.en: He did his homework until one o'clock in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他寫作業一直寫到淩晨一點。

sentences.en: I had no idea what happened until he returned and told me.
sentences.cn: 直到他回來告訴我，我才知道發生了什麼。

sentences.en: You won't believe they are twins because they are so unlike.
sentences.cn: 你一定不會相信他們是雙胞胎，他們的長相如此不同。

sentences.en: Peter is always silent and shy, unlike other boys of his age who are quite naughty.
sentences.cn: 彼得不像同齡的男孩們那樣淘氣，他總是很安靜，還非常害羞。

sentences.en: We will go shrimping with my cousins unless it rains tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我們要跟堂兄們去捉蝦，除非明天下雨。

sentences.en: It is hard to believe that these two tribes can live together in unity.
sentences.cn: 很難相信這樣兩個部落能和睦地生活在一起。

sentences.en: The minister strongly called for the two parties to unite and fight against the foreign intruders.
sentences.cn: 這位大臣強烈呼籲兩派團結起來，共同抵抗外來侵略者。

sentences.en: He has a unique talent for recognizing emotions from facial expressions.
sentences.cn: 由面部表情識別情緒方面，他有著獨特的天賦。

sentences.en: It's rare that she undertakes the task of road surveying.
sentences.cn: 她竟然負責道路勘探，這真罕見。

sentences.en: Hail is uncommon in this country, and that's why the citizens are so excited about it.
sentences.cn: 冰雹在這個國家非常罕見，這就是民眾如此激動的原因。

sentences.en: I'm uncertain about his attitude towards this matter.
sentences.cn: 我不確定他對於這件事的態度如何。

sentences.en: Scarcely had I left home when one of my tyres burst.
sentences.cn: 我剛出家門，一個輪胎就爆了。

sentences.en: He fell down from the roof, and his face was twisted due to great pain.
sentences.cn: 他從屋頂上摔了下來，疼得齜牙咧嘴。

sentences.en: Anna gave birth to twins last week.
sentences.cn: 安娜上週生了一對雙胞胎。

sentences.en: They are not twin sisters, though they resemble each other strikingly.
sentences.cn: 儘管像得驚人，但是他們並不是雙胞胎姐妹。

sentences.en: It became dark as the car went into the tunnel.
sentences.cn: 隨著汽車進入隧道，光線暗了下來。

sentences.en: The notice says that everyone should wash the test tubes and replace them after use.
sentences.cn: 公告上寫著，使用後要把試管清洗並放回原處。

sentences.en: He betrayed my trust twice, so now he is the least person that I trust.
sentences.cn: 他曾經兩次辜負我對他的信任，所以現在他是我最不信任的人。

sentences.en: There is a pair of trousers in my closet; you can try them on.
sentences.cn: 我的衣櫃裡有一條褲子，你可以試試看。

sentences.en: The teacher is angry with Leo, because he always makes trouble for her.
sentences.cn: 老師很生里奧的氣，因為他老是給她惹麻煩。

sentences.en: What troubles me is that I have no idea how to explain what happened to my wife.
sentences.cn: 讓我苦惱的是，不知道該怎麼跟妻子解釋發生的事。

sentences.en: His company is the exclusive agency of this brand in China.
sentences.cn: 他的公司是這個品牌在中國的獨家代理商。

sentences.en: Jerry affirmed his innocence to the judge, but the judge still found him guilty.
sentences.cn: 傑瑞向法官堅稱自己是清白的，但是法官還是判了他有罪。

sentences.en: The financial minister is advocating a policy of gradual reform.
sentences.cn: 財政大臣提倡逐步改革的政策。

sentences.en: He is a famous and firm advocate for freedom.
sentences.cn: 他是著名且堅定的自由主義擁護者。

sentences.en: It's certainly advisable to follow his suggestions.
sentences.cn: 遵循他的建議當然是明智的。

sentences.en: His being laid off has had a terribly adverse effect on his family's life.
sentences.cn: 他被解雇對家庭生活有很大的不利影響。

sentences.en: Driving in strong adverse winds is dangerous.
sentences.cn: 在強大的逆風中行駛很危險。

sentences.en: She adheres to adorning her room with fresh flowers.
sentences.cn: 她堅持要用鮮花來裝飾房間。

sentences.en: The women who will attend the dinner are required to adorn themselves with jewelry.
sentences.cn: 參加晚宴的女生要佩戴首飾。

sentences.en: The middle-aged manager adores his wife and children—he is a model husband and employee.
sentences.cn: 這位中年經理深愛著他的妻兒，他是一個模範丈夫和員工。

sentences.en: The old wealthy couple adopted an orphan.
sentences.cn: 這對有錢的老夫婦收養了一個孤兒。

sentences.en: The new employee was quite excited when his manager adopted his idea.
sentences.cn: 這個新人對於經理採納了他的意見感到非常興奮。

sentences.en: The girl has great admiration for her mom's bravery.
sentences.cn: 女孩十分佩服她媽媽的勇氣。

cn: 正式發給或給予某事物；管理

sentences.en: They had to ask the elders of the family to administer justice.
sentences.cn: 他們不得不請家族的長老來主持正義。

sentences.en: You all need to learn to administer your internal affairs as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 你們要儘快學會管理自己的內部事務。

sentences.en: You can adhere this piece of paper to the map with glue.
sentences.cn: 你可以用膠水把這張紙黏在地圖上。

sentences.en: I will adhere to my opinions and will not change my mind at all.
sentences.cn: 我堅持自己的觀點，無論怎樣都不會改變心意。

sentences.en: I'm afraid you will have to pay an additional charge.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你必須支付額外的費用。

sentences.en: Frankly speaking, this is the best film adaptation.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，這是最佳的電影劇本改編。

sentences.en: In actuality, the financial affairs of this company are in complete disorder.
sentences.cn: 事實上，這家公司的財務狀況十分混亂。

sentences.en: The audience all held their breath watching the acrobat keep his balance on the high rope.
sentences.cn: 觀眾們全都屏住呼吸，看那個雜技演員在高繩上保持平衡。

sentences.en: The acquisition of experience can't be done in a day.
sentences.cn: 經驗的獲取並非一日之功。

sentences.en: His latest acquisition is an abstract painting.
sentences.cn: 他最近所得是一副抽象畫。

sentences.en: Noah just has some acquaintance with computer technology.
sentences.cn: 諾亞對電腦技術只是稍有涉獵。

sentences.en: This discovery is beyond a doubt the greatest scientific achievement of this decade.
sentences.cn: 這項發現無疑是這個十年中最偉大的科學成就。

sentences.en: She is able to accustom herself to new environments quickly.
sentences.cn: 她能夠很快地適應新環境。

sentences.en: This old woman is famous because she is able to predict the weather with great accuracy.
sentences.cn: 這位老婦人非常有名，因為她能極準確的預測天氣。

sentences.en: In a week the police have accumulated a great amount of evidence of his guilt.
sentences.cn: 一週內，員警已經累積了大量證據證明他有罪。

sentences.en: Your ability to think critically will accrue from reading a lot.
sentences.cn: 思考能力將因讀書而自然增強。

sentences.en: His actions do not accord with his words.
sentences.cn: 他言行不一。

sentences.en: The owner of the house accorded us permission to enter his beautiful garden.
sentences.cn: 房子的主人允許我們進入他漂亮的花園。

sentences.en: The accord between the two countries has been broken.
sentences.cn: 兩國之間的協議被打破了。

cn: 提供住宿或房間，提供；適應

sentences.en: To accommodate all of the students, the school is planning to invest another dorm building.
sentences.cn: 為了能給所有學生提供住宿，學校正準備投資建造另一座宿舍樓。

sentences.en: It's not necessary to accommodate your plans to mine.
sentences.cn: 沒有必要調整你的計畫來跟我的計畫相適應。

sentences.en: Lack of protein can accelerate the aging process.
sentences.cn: 蛋白質缺乏會加速衰老。

sentences.en: How dare you abuse your authority like this!
sentences.cn: 你怎麼敢像這樣濫用職權！

sentences.en: The man was accused of abusing his wife.
sentences.cn: 這個男人被指控虐待妻子。

sentences.en: Drug abuse is a serious societal problem.
sentences.cn: 藥物濫用是一個很嚴重的社會問題。

sentences.en: Is Vitamin D helpful to the absorption of calcium?
sentences.cn: 維生素 D能幫助鈣的吸收嗎？

sentences.en: The artist requires total absorption to create his art.
sentences.cn: 藝術家需要全神的投入創作當中。

sentences.en: The above-mentioned novels were all written by Chekhov, a great Russian realist writer.
sentences.cn: 上面提到的小說作品都是俄國現實主義偉大作家契訶夫寫的。

sentences.en: What's your opinion regarding the abolition of death penalty?
sentences.cn: 對於廢除死刑，你的看法是什麼？

sentences.en: What's the abbreviation for the Test of English as a Foreign Language?
sentences.cn: 英語外語考試的縮寫是什麼？

sentences.en: I was invited to attend a wedding (ceremony).
sentences.cn: 我被邀請參加一場婚禮。

sentences.en: Don't worry. I have gotten a nurse to attend to your mother.
sentences.cn: 不用擔心。我已經請了一位護理師照顧你的母親。

sentences.en: The climber attempted to get to the top of the mountain by himself, but he failed.
sentences.cn: 登山員試圖獨自一人登上山頂，但是失敗了。

sentences.en: His attempt to eat all of the food failed.
sentences.cn: 他試圖吃光所有的食物，但是失敗了。

sentences.en: You need to assure me that you'll bring them back home safely.
sentences.cn: 你要向我保證會把他們安全帶回家來。

sentences.en: He has been assured of a job as a math teacher after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他已經確定畢業後要當一名數學老師。

sentences.en: I always associate this beautiful girl with her brilliant performance.
sentences.cn: 我總是由這個漂亮的女孩聯想到她精彩的表演。

sentences.en: The powers of associate judges are not clear.
sentences.cn: 陪審法官的權利還不明確。

sentences.en: The teacher assigned two large classrooms to us, which made us all very happy.
sentences.cn: 老師分配給我們兩間大教室，這讓我們非常高興。

sentences.en: The teacher assigned the tallest boy in the class to be the class monitor.
sentences.cn: 老師指定班裡最高的男孩做班長。

sentences.en: Nobody likes falsehood or artificiality in love.
sentences.cn: 沒有人喜歡在愛情裡造假或做作。

sentences.en: She runs a shop that sells artificial flowers.
sentences.cn: 她經營著一家賣人造花的店。

sentences.en: It's arrogant of you to assume that you are the most intelligent.
sentences.cn: 你以為自己是最聰明的，未免太自大了。

sentences.en: Generally speaking, boys are better at arithmetic than girls.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，男孩比女孩更擅長算術。

sentences.en: The approximate number of students is 300.
sentences.cn: 大約有三百個學生。

sentences.en: Your price is approximate to the one we would be willing to accept.
sentences.cn: 你們的價格接近我們接受的價格。

sentences.en: I approve of setting off in the early morning. The earlier we reach our destination, the better.
sentences.cn: 我贊成一大早就出發，我們愈早到達目的地愈好。

sentences.en: Her application has not been approved yet.
sentences.cn: 她的申請還沒有得到批准。

sentences.en: Is my dress appropriate for the party?
sentences.cn: 我的洋裝適合參加派對嗎？

sentences.en: The Finance Bureau is unwilling to appropriate funds for the construction of the new stadium.
sentences.cn: 財政局不願意為新的體育館的建設撥款。

sentences.en: As you approach the company, the first thing you will see is the fountain in front.
sentences.cn: 你到公司的時候，首先看到的就是前面的噴泉。

sentences.en: I only noticed her as she approached.
sentences.cn: 她走近的時候我才注意到她。

sentences.en: I'll always appreciate your help when I needed it the most.
sentences.cn: 你在我最需要的時候給了我幫助，我將永遠感激。

sentences.en: You should appreciate her.
sentences.cn: 你應該體諒她。

sentences.en: The President appointed the mayor to be the new prime minister.
sentences.cn: 總統任命市長為新的首相。

sentences.en: The date and time of the interview for a new secretary has been appointed.
sentences.cn: 新祕書的面試日期及時間已經安排好了。

sentences.en: This law is not applicable to international criminals.
sentences.cn: 這條法律不適用於國際罪犯。

sentences.en: The audience applauded their wonderful performance.
sentences.cn: 觀眾們為他們的精彩表演鼓掌。

sentences.en: I don't applaud your plan.
sentences.cn: 我不贊成你的計畫。

sentences.en: The author cited more than one hundred studies in the appendix to his paper.
sentences.cn: 那位作者論文的附錄中，引用了一百多篇的研究。

sentences.en: Her mother just had her appendix removed last week.
sentences.cn: 她母親上週剛做了切除闌尾的手術。

sentences.en: The environmentalists are appealing for afforestation.
sentences.cn: 環境學家們呼籲植樹造林。

sentences.en: The lawyer advised him to appeal to the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 律師建議他向最高法院上訴。

sentences.en: His latest album appeals to me very much.
sentences.cn: 他最新的唱片非常吸引我。

sentences.en: I must apologize to you for not being able to pick you up this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午沒能去接你，我向你道歉。

sentences.en: Not hearing news from her after nine o'clock in the evening, a growing sense of anxiety spread among her family.
sentences.cn: 晚上九點還沒有收到她的消息，家人們愈來愈擔心了。

sentences.en: He has a strong anxiety to please his boss.
sentences.cn: 他急於討好他的老闆。

sentences.en: Anticipating that it would soon rain, they all went out with umbrellas.
sentences.cn: 預料到很快會下雨，他們出去的時候都帶了雨傘。

sentences.en: His constant complaints annoyed me very much.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休的抱怨真讓我心煩。

sentences.en: Tom, go play in the yard and stop annoying me.
sentences.cn: 湯姆，去院子裡玩，不要再煩我了。

sentences.en: The romantic anniversary dinner pleased his wife.
sentences.cn: 浪漫的周年紀念晚餐讓他的妻子很高興。

sentences.en: His ancestors came to Britain about 200 years ago, fleeing a war in their home country.
sentences.cn: 大約兩百年前，他的祖先來到英國，躲避家鄉的戰亂。

sentences.en: Scientists analyzed the new medicine and found it to be harmful to the human body.
sentences.cn: 科學家們分析了這種新藥，發現會對人體有害。

sentences.en: When the ambulance arrived at the hospital, the injured person had already bled to death.
sentences.cn: 當救護車趕到醫院時，傷者已經失血過多而死。

sentences.en: This young student is filled with ambition to become the richest person in the world before he is 40 years old.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕的學生立志要在四十歲之前成為全球最富有的人。

sentences.en: He altered his plan once he heard the news.
sentences.cn: 一聽到這個消息，他馬上改變了計畫。

sentences.en: My best friend invited me to her home yesterday and showed me her stamp albums.
sentences.cn: 我最好的朋友昨天邀請我去她家裡，向我展示了她的郵冊。

sentences.en: She finally released her first album last year.
sentences.cn: 她終於在去年發行了自己的第一張唱片。

sentences.en: George spent his entire life compiling this book.
sentences.cn: 喬治花了畢生的心血編纂了這本書。

sentences.en: The country's commitment to comply with the treaty is worth nothing.
sentences.cn: 該國遵守條約的承諾一文不值。

sentences.en: The police combed at the crime scene over and over again looking for clues.
sentences.cn: 員警一遍遍地在犯罪現場搜尋以尋找線索。

sentences.en: The British husband gave a horn comb to his wife on their wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 這個英國籍丈夫在結婚紀念日送給妻子一把牛角梳。

sentences.en: The rain-soaked trousers were clinging to his legs.
sentences.cn: 浸了雨水的褲子牢牢地貼著他的腿。

sentences.en: She clung to a belief that she would not give up.
sentences.cn: 她始終懷著一個信念，她不能放棄。

sentences.en: The poor couple couldn't afford any worse circumstances.
sentences.cn: 這對落魄的夫妻承受不起更壞的情況了。

sentences.en: They laughed at him when he made the childish remarks.
sentences.cn: 他言語幼稚，引來他們的嘲笑。

sentences.en: Only an expert can determine which category it belongs to.
sentences.cn: 只有專家才可以判定它屬於哪一類。

sentences.en: The keepsake from their meeting was a carnation.
sentences.cn: 他們見面的紀念品是一朵康乃馨。

sentences.en: Taking one Vitamin E capsule every day is enough.
sentences.cn: 每天服用一顆維生素 E膠囊就足夠了。

sentences.en: The space capsule is equipped with plenty of food and water.
sentences.cn: 太空艙內備有足夠的食物和水。

sentences.en: The elderly and children are in need of calcium the most.
sentences.cn: 老年人和孩子是最需要補鈣的。

sentences.en: The ash in the burner must be cleaned every two days.
sentences.cn: 爐心的灰要每兩天清理一次。

sentences.en: Because of an absence of parental rearing, the 15-year old boy committed a burglary.
sentences.cn: 由於沒有父母的教養，這個十五歲的男孩犯了搶劫罪。

sentences.en: The public suggested that the police bureau should make more effort to track down the murderer.
sentences.cn: 公眾建議警察局應該加大力度追查兇手。

sentences.en: Your stress comes from your burdensome workload.
sentences.cn: 你的壓力來自過於繁重的工作量。

sentences.en: Driving on a bumpy road, the car's tyres became extremely worn out.
sentences.cn: 行駛在顛簸不平的道路上，極度磨損汽車的輪胎。

sentences.en: She bumped her arm into the table and felt a great pain.
sentences.cn: 她的手臂撞到了桌子，十分疼痛。

sentences.en: The violent bump on the train worried the passengers.
sentences.cn: 火車上一陣劇烈的碰撞讓乘客擔心不已。

sentences.en: Now the stock market is bullish.
sentences.cn: 現在股市行情看漲。

sentences.en: During the chaos of war, bullion is the most worthy of hoarding.
sentences.cn: 戰亂時期，金條是最值得收藏的。

sentences.en: Michael was criticized by his mother for the bruise on his face.
sentences.cn: 麥可因為臉上的瘀青被媽媽批評了。

sentences.en: Was it the robber that bruised your arms?
sentences.cn: 是搶劫的人把你的胳膊打傷了嗎？

sentences.en: Children are not allowed to swim in this brook.
sentences.cn: 小孩子不許到小溪裡游泳。

sentences.en: Children are not likely to brook the provocation of others.
sentences.cn: 小孩子不太能容忍別人的挑釁。

sentences.en: A stock broker is a highly paid profession.
sentences.cn: 股票經紀人是一種高收入的職業。

sentences.en: The travel agency provided me with a brochure.
sentences.cn: 旅行社發給我一本宣傳手冊。

sentences.en: Broadband is the primary business every telecom company is engaged in to earn profit.
sentences.cn: 寬頻是各大電信公司盈利的主要業務。

sentences.en: Many rare animals are on the brink of extinction.
sentences.cn: 許多稀有動物正處於滅絕的邊緣。

sentences.en: The earth's axis is an abstract line between the North and South Poles.
sentences.cn: 地軸是南北極之間的一條抽象的線

sentences.en: I always feel awkward when I am alone with him.
sentences.cn: 跟他單獨在一起時，我總是感覺很尷尬。

sentences.en: Do you see an avenue of poplars? Walk along it and you will find the castle.
sentences.cn: 看到一條白楊樹的林蔭大道嗎？沿著它一直走，就能找到城堡了。

sentences.en: There are countless avenues to success.
sentences.cn: 成功的道路有無數條。

sentences.en: Has George endorsed office automation?
sentences.cn: 喬治是否贊同辦公室自動化事宜？

sentences.en: The President has authorized the prime minister to settle all of the disputes with the other nation.
sentences.cn: 總統已經授權首相處理與另一國之間所有的爭端。

sentences.en: If Congress does not pass this bill, the President can not authorize it.
sentences.cn: 如果國會不通過這項法案，總統就不能批准。

sentences.en: People are not allowed to smoke in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 禮堂裡禁止吸菸。

sentences.en: This task has been deemed to be impossible to finish.
sentences.cn: 這任務被認為不可能完成。

sentences.en: As long as you press this button, the bank will automatically deduct your payment.
sentences.cn: 只有您點擊按鍵，銀行就會自動扣除您的付款。

sentences.en: This decree is more to safeguard the interests of the public.
sentences.cn: 這一法令更多地是維護民眾的利益。

sentences.en: It is said the government will decree a new environmental protection act.
sentences.cn: 據說政府要頒佈新的環境保護法了。

sentences.en: I'm really fed up with Tom that he always wears indecent shirts.
sentences.cn: 我真是受夠了湯姆總是穿一件不得體的襯衫。

sentences.en: The government should provide decent care for those elderly without children.
sentences.cn: 政府要為無子女的老人提供適當的照顧。

sentences.en: Some criminals deceived the public into protesting against the government.
sentences.cn: 一些不法分子誤導公眾向政府抗議。

sentences.en: Ordinary people can't tell whether or not the announcement is deceitful.
sentences.cn: 普通人無法辨認那份公告是否具有欺騙性。

sentences.en: If I were you, I would not admit that I was involved in the deceit.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你的話，我不會承認我參與了欺詐。

sentences.en: This deceased general was very fond of drinking with his friends when he was alive.
sentences.cn: 這位已故的將軍生前很喜歡和友人喝酒。

sentences.en: I hate debasing myself to amuse you.
sentences.cn: 我討厭降低我的身份去娛樂你們。

sentences.en: A wild tiger dashed into the villa and frightened the nearby residents.
sentences.cn: 一隻野生老虎猛衝進了別墅區，嚇壞了附近的居民。

sentences.en: Time is tight; let's make a dash for the school.
sentences.cn: 時間來不及了，我們衝向學校吧。

sentences.en: The crystalline form of carbon is a diamond.
sentences.cn: 碳元素的晶體結構是鑽石。

sentences.en: College students have a lot of unrealistic criterion when they go job-hunting.
sentences.cn: 大學生有很多不切實際的擇業標準。

sentences.en: He joined the army in spite of his mother's counsel.
sentences.cn: 他不顧母親的勸告去參軍了。

sentences.en: My friend counseled me to buy another one.
sentences.cn: 我朋友建議我買另一個。

sentences.en: Your behavior is in great contradiction to what you promised.
sentences.cn: 你的行為跟你的承諾大相徑庭。

sentences.en: Unlike other contemporary writers, he always keeps to himself.
sentences.cn: 與同時代的其他作家不一樣，他總是獨來獨往。

sentences.en: Cream constitutes an important part of cakes.
sentences.cn: 奶油是蛋糕的重要組成部分。

sentences.en: That CEO's bold policies constitute as raising revolution of the whole industry.
sentences.cn: 那位執行長大膽的政策被視為掀起整個業界的革命。

sentences.en: It seems that he never realizes that his constant interruptions in meetings annoys everyone.
sentences.cn: 看起來他從來沒有意識到，他不斷打斷會議讓所有與會者都很生氣。

sentences.en: A constant has a fixed value.
sentences.cn: 常數是一個固定不變的數值。

sentences.en: What the new President should do at first is to consolidate power.
sentences.cn: 新上任的總統首先要做的就是鞏固政權。

sentences.en: Nothing could console them after the death of their only child.
sentences.cn: 他們唯一的孩子死後，沒有什麼可以寬慰他們。

sentences.en: Even just a few simple words of consolation will warm her.
sentences.cn: 哪怕只是幾句簡單的安慰的話也會讓她感到溫暖。

sentences.en: You ought to deal with this continuously changing situation in an appropriate way.
sentences.cn: 你應該採取恰當的方法來應對不斷變化的情形。

sentences.en: These two sentences are connected by a conjunction.
sentences.cn: 這兩個句子被一個連接詞連接起來。

sentences.en: The conjunction of two traffic accidents caused the traffic police to be in a terrible bind.
sentences.cn: 兩起交通事故的同時發生讓交警焦頭爛額。

sentences.en: If it had not rained today, elderly people could have congregated in the square and done morning exercises.
sentences.cn: 如果今天沒有下雨，老年人可以聚集在廣場上做晨操。

sentences.en: Many people hold that wealth conduces great happiness.
sentences.cn: 許多人認為財富帶來巨大幸福。

sentences.en: The article is too cumbersome and needs to be condensed.
sentences.cn: 這篇文章太繁瑣，需要精簡。

sentences.en: The soup condensed after boiling for four hours.
sentences.cn: 湯煮了四個小時後變得很濃。

sentences.en: She was condemned for saying inappropriate words in public.
sentences.cn: 她因為在公開場合不合適的言辭而受到譴責。

sentences.en: The judge condemned him to life imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 法官判他無期徒刑。

sentences.en: Comprehensive and systematic teaching methods are more respected.
sentences.cn: 全面系統的教學方法更受推崇。

sentences.en: The human brain is still unable to comprehend all the mysteries of the universe.
sentences.cn: 人類的大腦目前還無法理解宇宙的所有奧祕。

sentences.en: The school has set up this course in order to guide students with their compositions.
sentences.cn: 學校開設這門課程就是為了指導學生們的寫作。

sentences.en: One of the reasons for the decrease in crop yield is the lack of composition in the soil.
sentences.cn: 土壤中的成分不足是農作物減產的原因之一。

sentences.en: A few of them have been studying the topic of how to comport oneself.
sentences.cn: 近來他們中有一些人在研究如何表現自我這個主題。

sentences.en: The ending of this TV drama was dramatized beyond everyone's imagination.
sentences.cn: 這部電視劇的結局太戲劇化了，超出了人們的想像。

sentences.en: The residential drainage system undergoes regular maintenance.
sentences.cn: 社區的排水系統都有定期檢修。

sentences.en: The young people in the village want to be involved in the construction of the drain.
sentences.cn: 村裡的年輕人都要參與修建下水道。

sentences.en: The leftover water was drained.
sentences.cn: 剩菜的水分瀝乾了。

sentences.en: This extreme doctrine was prevalent in the whole European continent during a certain period.
sentences.cn: 某一時期內，極端實利主在整個歐洲大陸盛行。

sentences.en: Her speech this time had a big divergence compared with the one she gave last time.
sentences.cn: 她這次的演講與上次相比偏離了主題。

sentences.en: The only person who survived the earthquake couldn't help but suddenly cry from the distress.
sentences.cn: 地震中唯一存活下來的人面對突然的不幸不由得嚎啕大哭。

sentences.en: The little girl's behavior of refusing to apologize displeased her father.
sentences.cn: 小女孩拒絕道歉的行為惹怒了她的父親。

sentences.en: Our mom stopped dispensing pocket money to us after we turned ten years old.
sentences.cn: 在我們十歲後母親就不給我們零用錢了。

sentences.en: Let's dispense with those tedious steps and just get things started.
sentences.cn: 讓我們省略那些繁瑣的步驟，直接進入正題吧。

cn: 迅速派遣 n快件，急件

sentences.en: The logistics system shows that your parcel is being dispatched.
sentences.cn: 物流系統顯示您的包裹正在派件中。

sentences.en: Tina received a dispatch from New York.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜收到一封來自紐約的急件。

sentences.en: If it weren't for the dismal weather, we would have gone out to have fun a long time ago.
sentences.cn: 如果不是這沉悶的天氣，我們早就出去玩了。

sentences.en: He couldn't bear to disillusion her.
sentences.cn: 他不忍心使她的幻想破滅。

sentences.en: It's natural that he should be disdained.
sentences.cn: 他被鄙視是很正常的。

sentences.en: He hates those who always look at others’ opinions with disdain.
sentences.cn: 他討厭總是藐視別人意見的人。

sentences.en: The manufacturer disclaims all responsibility for man-made damage done to their automatic washing machines.
sentences.cn: 製造商對人為造成的自動洗衣機的損壞不承擔任何責任。

sentences.en: The impact of the drought on coffee trees has been disastrous for the people of Brazil.
sentences.cn: 乾旱對咖啡樹的影響對巴西人民來說是災難性的。

sentences.en: The village leader is more likely to agree to repair the dike at the end of the village.
sentences.cn: 村長比較可能同意在村尾修一條河堤。

sentences.en: Yogurt helps digestion.
sentences.cn: 優酪乳有助於消化。

sentences.en: The doctor asked if he couldn't digest food like nuts.
sentences.cn: 醫生問他是否無法消化像堅果這樣的食物。

sentences.en: This week’s news digest is not complete yet.
sentences.cn: 這週的新聞摘要還沒有完成。

sentences.en: Someone I am unfamiliar with told me that he is a dictator.
sentences.cn: 一個不熟悉的人告訴我他是一個獨裁者。

sentences.en: Sometimes dialects sound really interesting.
sentences.cn: 方言有時候聽起來真有趣。

sentences.en: The devaluation of the US dollar has a great impact on the economic development in Europe.
sentences.cn: 美元貶值對歐洲的經濟發展有很大的影響。

sentences.en: Please help me detach the watch's chain.
sentences.cn: 請幫我把錶帶拆下來。

sentences.en: He was detached to carry out a secret mission.
sentences.cn: 他被派去執行祕密任務。

sentences.en: The destructive power of nuclear weapons can't be withstood by any country in the world.
sentences.cn: 世界上的任何國家都不能承受核武器的破壞性力量。

sentences.en: After the earthquake, everywhere in this area was ruins and desolation.
sentences.cn: 地震過後，該地區到處都是荒涼的廢墟。

sentences.en: Do you know something about the designated editor?
sentences.cn: 你知道關於已受委任的編輯的事情嗎？

sentences.en: The manager's suggestion is that someone should be designated to inspect the foreign market.
sentences.cn: 經理的建議是派人去考察國外市場。

sentences.en: You need to pay part of the deposit.
sentences.cn: 您需要交付部分定金。

sentences.en: She deposited her salary at once.
sentences.cn: 她馬上把薪水存入銀行了。

sentences.en: He didn't know how to depict such a magnificent scene.
sentences.cn: 他不知道怎樣描述如此美輪美奐的場景。

sentences.en: The letter “H” in the organization “WHO” denotes health.
sentences.cn: WHO組織中的字母「H」是「健康」的意思。

sentences.en: The Congress delegate insisted that the project be canceled.
sentences.cn: 這位議會代表堅持取消該專案。

sentences.en: The manager was delegated to Africa to inspect the markets there.
sentences.cn: 經理被委派到非洲考察市場。

sentences.en: The financial statements show the company has a deficit of two million dollars.
sentences.cn: 財務報表顯示該公司虧損了兩百萬美元。

sentences.en: The citizens who default their corresponding obligations will be deprived of some of their rights.
sentences.cn: 不履行相應的義務的公民會被剝奪一些權利。

sentences.en: Austin said he would never forget when the President exalted him in the early years.
sentences.cn: 奧斯汀說他永遠也不會忘記總統在早年對他的提拔。

sentences.en: She was exalted by her manager.
sentences.cn: 她得到經理的高度讚揚。

sentences.en: In ancient times, people held intellectuals in high esteem.
sentences.cn: 古時候，人們拿知識份子很看重。

sentences.en: We greatly esteem the spirit of the old artists' dedication to art.
sentences.cn: 我們對老藝術家們為藝術奉獻的精神充滿了敬意。

sentences.en: More and more stars have begun to invest in real estate.
sentences.cn: 愈來愈多的明星開始投資房地產。

sentences.en: Lucy is not very clear whether there is a direct relationship between Karst landforms and wind erosion.
sentences.cn: 露西不太清楚喀斯特地形是否和風蝕有直接的關係。

sentences.en: List the equations based on the subject.
sentences.cn: 根據題目列出方程式。

sentences.en: This declaration has an epoch-making significance.
sentences.cn: 這一宣言具有劃時代的意義。

sentences.en: If only he could remember the story's important episode.
sentences.cn: 如果他記得那個故事重要的片段就好了。

sentences.en: Neither of them knew to whom they should entrust the poor orphan.
sentences.cn: 他們誰也不知道該把這個可憐的孤兒託付給誰。

sentences.en: The Buddhist monk says he cannot enlighten people; people must enlighten themselves.
sentences.cn: 那位佛教僧侶說，他無法啟迪人們，而是人們必須啟迪他們自己。

sentences.en: The enhancement of the defense system in the residential district improved its safety factor.
sentences.cn: 住宅區的防禦系統的增強提高了安全係數。

sentences.en: The three-meter high hill was soon engulfed by the sea.
sentences.cn: 三米高的小山丘很快被海水吞沒了。

sentences.en: We endeavor to make every step with zero flaws.
sentences.cn: 我們努力做到每一步都是零缺陷。

sentences.en: Our endeavor paid off with a lucrative return.
sentences.cn: 我們的努力換來了豐厚的回報。

sentences.en: Industrial pollutants endanger marine life.
sentences.cn: 工業污染危及海洋生物。

sentences.en: After the manager entered the meeting room, he emphasized the importance of the project.
sentences.cn: 經理進入會議室後，強調了該專案的重要性。

sentences.en: The city was awarded because its emission of carbon dioxide reached the standard this year.
sentences.cn: 該城市因為今年的二氧化碳排放量降低到標準而被表彰。

sentences.en: The young seedlings thrive under the emission of the sun's light.
sentences.cn: 小樹苗在陽光的照射下茁壯成長。

sentences.en: The Lakers were one of the world's most eminent basketball teams in the past.
sentences.cn: 湖人隊過去一直是世界上最傑出的籃球隊之一。

sentences.en: The statue standing in the square embodies the country's spirit of freedom.
sentences.cn: 廣場上矗立的雕像象徵著這個國家的自由主義精神。

sentences.en: The latest smart phone embodies a lot of features.
sentences.cn: 最新款的智能手機包含很多功能。

sentences.en: The beautiful lady was stopped outside of the embassy because she lacked a permit.
sentences.cn: 這位漂亮的女士因為沒有許可證而被攔在了使館外面。

sentences.en: The most embarrassing thing in his whole life, the old artist recalls, was the time he didn't take money with him to purchase something.
sentences.cn: 老藝術家回憶說他一生中最尷尬的事情就是購物沒帶錢。

sentences.en: As time has elapsed, the young and strong boy has turned into a grey-haired man.
sentences.cn: 隨著時間的推移，年輕健壯的小夥子已經變成白髮蒼蒼的老人了。

sentences.en: The crowd was ejected from the park by the police with the guard dogs.
sentences.cn: 員警用警犬將人群從公園驅散。

sentences.en: The temperature of the lava ejected from a volcano is very high.
sentences.cn: 從火山噴出的岩漿溫度很高。

sentences.en: The foreign medical experts are assessing the effectiveness of the newly-researched medicine.
sentences.cn: 國外的醫學專家正在對新研發的藥物療效進行評估。

sentences.en: His wife gave birth to a daughter, which made him immediately fall into a state of ecstasy.
sentences.cn: 他妻子生了一個女兒，他馬上陷入狂喜之中。

sentences.en: Humans are destroying the balance of the ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 人類正在破壞生態系統平衡。

sentences.en: We have to economize our water use.
sentences.cn: 我們必須節約用水。

sentences.en: The Education Bureau has set up a special prize to award those who make achievements in ecology.
sentences.cn: 教育局設立專項獎金獎勵那些在生態學上取得成就的人。

sentences.en: People who are engaged in art are often considered eccentric.
sentences.cn: 從事藝術的人通常被認為很古怪。

sentences.en: The dying earl told his lawyer to make a will.
sentences.cn: 瀕死的伯爵通知律師立遺囑。

sentences.en: People have been dumping less rubbish into the ocean in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近些年人們往海洋裡傾倒的垃圾少了。一般表示「更⋯⋯的」。

sentences.en: I'm wondering how you can make your bedroom into a dump.
sentences.cn: 我想知道你怎麼會把臥室搞得一團糟呢。

sentences.en: The dropout rate of middle school students in this city has declined in recent years.
sentences.cn: 該城市的中學輟學率近幾年有所下降。

sentences.en: The doctor asked if his face flushed a lot in day-to-day life.
sentences.cn: 醫生問他在日常生活中是否經常臉紅。

sentences.en: A bit of abnormal flush appeared on his cheek.
sentences.cn: 他的臉上出現了一絲不正常的紅暈。

sentences.en: Our country's goal is for our economy and education to flourish.
sentences.cn: 我們國家的目標是使經濟和教育興旺發達。

sentences.en: She refused to go out with him because of his fleshy figure.
sentences.cn: 她因為他肥胖的體型而拒絕和他出去。

sentences.en: The lime on the ceiling began to flake off.
sentences.cn: 天花板上的石灰開始剝落了。

sentences.en: A flake of a petal floated here from the other side of the stream.
sentences.cn: 一片花瓣從小溪的另一邊飄過來了。

sentences.en: Every parent expects their own children will be able to enter a first-rate university
sentences.cn: 每個父母都希望自己的孩子能夠上第一流的大學。

sentences.en: His firmness of purpose has greatly contributed to his success.
sentences.cn: 他對目標的堅定不移為他自己的成功做出巨大貢獻。

sentences.en: We all have a finite amount of time on Earth, so enjoy it!
sentences.cn: 我們在這世上的時間都是有限的，所以就盡情享受吧！

sentences.en: I'm afraid that it will take a lot of time and money to finalize the policy.
sentences.cn: 恐怕這項政策的落實需要花費很多時間和金錢。

sentences.en: The filter was delivered without any instructions.
sentences.cn: 這台過濾器被寄來的時候沒有任何說明書。

sentences.en: The water needs to be filtered before drinking.
sentences.cn: 生水在飲用之前需要先過濾。

sentences.en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith liked to put their valuables in the filing cabinet.
sentences.cn: 史密斯夫婦喜歡把貴重物品放在檔案櫃裡。

sentences.en: Which fictional hero is your favorite?
sentences.cn: 哪個虛構英雄是你最喜歡的？

sentences.en: Different crops need different fertilizers.
sentences.cn: 不同的作物施用不同的肥料。

sentences.en: We walked a long time before we saw the ferry.
sentences.cn: 我們走了好久才看見渡船。

sentences.en: Jimmy put forward a feasible plan.
sentences.cn: 吉米提出了一個切實可行的方案。

sentences.en: Don't believe Brooks. His words are all fabrications.
sentences.cn: 不要相信布魯克斯，他的話都是胡編亂造的。

sentences.en: You can't fabricate the facts.
sentences.cn: 你休想捏造事實。

sentences.en: He lived an extravagant life before his father died.
sentences.cn: 他父親去世前，他過著揮霍無度的生活。

sentences.en: Fibers are extracted from plants.
sentences.cn: 纖維是由植物中提取出來的。

sentences.en: The teacher extracted some wonderful poems for the students to read.
sentences.cn: 老師選了些優美的詩歌讓學生閱讀。

sentences.en: Firefighters rushed to the scene to extinguish the fire.
sentences.cn: 消防員快速趕到現場滅火。

sentences.en: The congressman's reputation suffered greatly from the scandal’s exposure.
sentences.cn: 醜聞的曝光使這位議員名聲大大受損。

sentences.en: The theme of the exposition was shown clearly in the brochure.
sentences.cn: 這次博覽會的主題在宣傳冊上很清楚。

sentences.en: The director will be responsible for the exposition of the superiority of the new engine.
sentences.cn: 主任將會負責對新型發動機的優越性的說明。

sentences.en: If that is so, the foreigner who was expelled from the country isn't worth any sympathy.
sentences.cn: 如果是這樣的話，這個外國人被驅逐出境就不值得同情。

sentences.en: The executive in the construction company has constantly urged that the project be expedited.
sentences.cn: 建築公司的總裁一直在催促加速工程的進展。

sentences.en: He wrote the book while he was in exile.
sentences.cn: 他在流放期間寫了這本書。

sentences.en: He was exiled for twenty years before he was able to return to his motherland.
sentences.cn: 他被流放二十年後才回到祖國。

sentences.en: That such a respected executive was also involved in the fraud shocked his many supporters.
sentences.cn: 這樣一個頗受尊敬的主管也參與了詐騙事件，震驚了他的很多支持者。

sentences.en: Competition at the executive level is fierce.
sentences.cn: 管理層的競爭很激烈。

sentences.en: The President ordered that plan B should be executed if plan A fails.
sentences.cn: 總統命令如果 A計畫失敗那就執行 B計畫。

sentences.en: He was executed for the murder.
sentences.cn: 他因謀殺案被處死。

sentences.en: The fee is exclusive of the cost of transportaion.
sentences.cn: 費用不包含交通費。

sentences.en: The exclusive privileges of the royal family shall not be denied.
sentences.cn: 皇室獨有的特權不會被剝奪。

sentences.en: The exclusion of those people from the event was done intentionally.
sentences.cn: 那些人在這個活動裡是刻意被排除的。

sentences.en: Frank stood up in the restaurant and exclaimed his love for Betty.
sentences.cn: 法蘭克在餐廳裡站起身並大聲說出他對貝蒂的愛。

sentences.en: This type of shark is exceedingly rare.
sentences.cn: 這種體型的鯊魚極為罕見。

sentences.en: The junction of the two parts is not closely connected.
sentences.cn: 兩個零件的接頭處沒有緊密地連在一起。

sentences.en: The car is stuck in the mud and needs a jerk.
sentences.cn: 車子陷在泥潭裡了，需要猛地推出來。

sentences.en: The waves beat against the boat's hull, and the boat rocked violently.
sentences.cn: 波浪打在船殼上，船劇烈地搖晃起來。

sentences.en: They eventually made reservations at a modern hotel with a homely atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 最終他們在一家有著家庭氣息的現代酒店中預訂了房間。

sentences.en: The hoe in the farmer's home was passed on to him by his grandfather.
sentences.cn: 農夫家的這把鋤頭是他祖父傳給他的。

sentences.en: The old gardener is going to hoe the flower beds.
sentences.cn: 老園丁正要去花壇鋤草鬆土。

sentences.en: Lisa shouted herself hoarse at the stadium.
sentences.cn: 麗莎在球場喊得聲音都嘶啞了。

sentences.en: The plan of action was hampered by higher authorities before it was finally carried out.
sentences.cn: 行動計畫實施之前受到上級部門的阻礙。

sentences.en: Liz is repairing the gutter.
sentences.cn: 麗茲正在修排水槽。

sentences.en: The audiences are not allowed to grumble during the president's speech to the general assembly.
sentences.cn: 大會主席發言期間觀眾不許嘟嘟囔囔。

sentences.en: Few people can stand her gross words and actions.
sentences.cn: 很少有人能忍受她那粗俗的言行。

sentences.en: Unexpectedly, no one found this gross error.
sentences.cn: 竟然沒有人發現這個明顯的錯誤。

sentences.en: Nearly one third of the women in our country like to grind pearls into powder.
sentences.cn: 在我們國家近三分之一的女性都喜歡把珍珠磨成珍珠粉。

sentences.en: She was grim-faced as she heard of the negotiation's failure.
sentences.cn: 聽到談判失敗，她的臉色極為凝重。

sentences.en: I have refused to grant them any news.
sentences.cn: 我已拒絕給他們提供任何消息。

sentences.en: Constructions experts believe that houses made of a lot of piles of granite are sometimes very vulgar.
sentences.cn: 建築專家認為大量花崗岩堆砌的房屋有時候很庸俗。

sentences.en: They are lucky that they have gone traveling in such gorgeous weather.
sentences.cn: 他們在這樣好的天氣裡去旅行，真是幸運。

sentences.en: The weather is gloomy and a storm is coming.
sentences.cn: 天色陰暗，一場暴雨就要來臨。

sentences.en: Eagles glide freely in the sky.
sentences.cn: 老鷹在天空自由自在地滑翔。

sentences.en: The swan's graceful glide across the lake amazed us.
sentences.cn: 那隻天鵝在湖面上優美的滑行使我們驚呆了。

sentences.en: The gigantic bay has brought incalculable benefits to the coastal city.
sentences.cn: 巨型港灣給這個濱海城市帶來了不可估計的利益。

sentences.en: We just held a college get-together in Shanghai the year before last.
sentences.cn: 我們前年在上海剛舉行大學同學聚會。

sentences.en: I think geometry is the most difficult part of mathematics.
sentences.cn: 我認為幾何學是數學中最難的一部分。

sentences.en: Julia showed a great interest in geology early on.
sentences.cn: 茱莉亞很早就表現出對地質學的濃厚興趣。

sentences.en: It's high time that you change your fussy character.
sentences.cn: 是時候改變你愛大驚小怪的性格了。

sentences.en: We were taught to be frugal from an early age.
sentences.cn: 我們從小就被教導要節約。

sentences.en: Let's honor those soldiers who have been constantly guarding the frontier.
sentences.cn: 讓我們致敬那些一直守衛邊疆的戰士。

sentences.en: His mother was too frail to walk by herself.
sentences.cn: 他母親虛弱到無法自己走路了。

sentences.en: Nobody believed that this was caused by a fortuity.
sentences.cn: 沒人相信這是由意外造成的。

sentences.en: During a war, a fortress is easy to defend and difficult to attack.
sentences.cn: 戰爭時期，堡壘是易守難攻的。

sentences.en: He was threatened not to leave the city for a fortnight's time.
sentences.cn: 他被威脅在兩週的時間內不得離開本城。

sentences.en: This paper has systematically formulated the role of force.
sentences.cn: 這篇論文系統闡述了力的作用。

sentences.en: Forestry is an important basic industry in our country.
sentences.cn: 林業是我國重要的基礎產業。

sentences.en: My mother would rather mince meat with a knife than with a mincer.
sentences.cn: 我媽媽寧願用刀把肉切碎也不願用絞肉機。

cn: 切碎，剁碎；裝腔作勢地走或說

sentences.en: You and she come help me mince the meat in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 你和她到廚房幫我把肉剁碎吧。

sentences.en: She minced that she didn't like the dress.
sentences.cn: 她裝腔作勢地說她不喜歡這件洋裝。

sentences.en: Bob's house was in a mess after the thief left.
sentences.cn: 竊賊離開以後，鮑勃的家裡一片狼藉。

sentences.en: The little boy accidentally messed up her dress.
sentences.cn: 小男孩不小心弄髒了她的洋裝。

sentences.en: You have to have a certain mentality to want to run marathons.
sentences.cn: 你必須要打從心底想跑馬拉松。

sentences.en: The flag is waving on the mast.
sentences.cn: 桅杆上的旗幟在隨風飄揚。

sentences.en: We have to make sure it is marketable before we decide to do electronic business.
sentences.cn: 我們決定做電子生意之前要先確定它是有銷路的。

sentences.en: The state strictly stipulates that any unit or individual shall not destroy marine life without permission.
sentences.cn: 國家嚴格規定任何單位和個人不得私自破壞海洋生態。

sentences.en: The import cost of this equipment is so high that we have to study and manufacture it by ourselves.
sentences.cn: 這種設備的進口成本太高，我們要研究並且自己製造。

cn: 塊，（因疾病或傷害而有的）腫塊

sentences.en: After the onset of the disease, the lump in Ted's brain grew bigger and bigger.
sentences.cn: 病發以後，泰德的腦子裡的腫塊漸漸變大了。

sentences.en: The rest of this lumber can be given to you free of charge.
sentences.cn: 這剩下的木材可以免費給你們。

sentences.en: I never believe that Ally would play the lottery.
sentences.cn: 我從來不信艾莉會玩樂透。

sentences.en: A lorry that was going slowly on the highway suddenly overturned.
sentences.cn: 高速公路上一輛慢悠悠行駛的卡車突然翻車了。

sentences.en: We drove around the city center in a huge loop.
sentences.cn: 我們開車環市中心繞了一大圈。

sentences.en: The general ordered the solider to loop the reins around the pillar.
sentences.cn: 將軍命小兵把韁繩環繞在柱子上。

sentences.en: With industrial development, environmental problems loom larger.
sentences.cn: 隨著工業的發展，環境問題愈發凸顯。

sentences.en: In our home, my grandmother is the only one who knows how to use a loom.
sentences.cn: 在我們家只有我奶奶會使用織布機。

sentences.en: It was getting dark, so they decided to find lodging for the night.
sentences.cn: 天色漸漸變暗，他們決定找一個寄宿的地方過夜。

sentences.en: Vivian lodged an appeal so as to gain more benefits.
sentences.cn: 薇薇安提出上訴是為了獲取更多的利益。

sentences.en: I lodged in a very kind couple's home when I toured the United States.
sentences.cn: 我在美國遊玩的時候寄宿在一對非常友好的夫婦家裡。

sentences.en: The group did everything they could in order to lobby for more people to take part in the protests.
sentences.cn: 該集團想方設法遊說更多的人參加抗議。

cn: 有讀寫能力的；有文化修養的

sentences.en: A seven-year-old child should be literate at least.
sentences.cn: 一個七歲的孩子至少是識字的。

cn: 照字面地；確實地，真正地

sentences.en: In the early stages of learning English it is usually the case that we literally translate.
sentences.cn: 英語學習初期我們經常會發生直譯的情況。

sentences.en: Since the founding of the new school, local literacy has been greatly improved.
sentences.cn: 新學校成立以來，當地文化水準有了大幅度提高。

sentences.en: Linen is one of the strongest textiles.
sentences.cn: 亞麻布是紡織品中最結實的一種。

sentences.en: There are no leftovers on the table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上並沒有剩飯。

sentences.en: Remember to put the leftover meal in the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 記得把剩飯放到冰箱裡。

sentences.en: The tall driver was largely responsible for the accident.
sentences.cn: 那個高個子司機要為此次事故負主要責任。

sentences.en: The landed gentries huddled together for a meeting to talk about how to set the price for food.
sentences.cn: 地主鄉紳們聚在一起開會討論如何定糧價。

sentences.en: That man who has a lame leg and the woman who has a blind eye are in love with each other.
sentences.cn: 那位有一隻瘸腿的男人和那位有一隻盲眼的女人彼此相愛。

sentences.en: Don't you think your statement is lame?
sentences.cn: 難道你不覺得你的理由沒有說服力嗎？

sentences.en: The designer designed a circle lace in the hem of the dress, making it very fashionable.
sentences.cn: 設計師在裙子的下擺設計了一圈蕾絲花邊，使裙子看起來很時尚。

sentences.en: Once it was winter, my mother knitted a sweater for me.
sentences.cn: 一到冬天，我媽媽就為我織毛衣。

sentences.en: He was sentenced to prison because he kidnapped a little child.
sentences.cn: 他因為綁架了一個小孩子而被判入獄。

sentences.en: For the disabled mother, her son is the kernel of her life.
sentences.cn: 對於這位殘疾的母親來說，她的兒子就是她生活的核心。

sentences.en: The jury was surrounded by a swarm of people who wanted them to make a decision.
sentences.cn: 陪審團被一大群人圍著要他們做出判決。

sentences.en: It's time to paddle the oars.
sentences.cn: 該划槳了。

sentences.en: How long will it take you to finish reading a novelette?
sentences.cn: 你多長時間可以看完一本中篇小說？

sentences.en: Haven't you received the payment notification?
sentences.cn: 你還沒有收到繳費通知單嗎？

sentences.en: I don’t quite understand what the content of this notification means.
sentences.cn: 我不太明白佈告的內容是什麼意思。

sentences.en: The doctor says that eating food with a lot of protein may normalize one's blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 醫生說吃含有大量蛋白質的食物可以使血壓恢復正常。

sentences.en: This year Leonardo Dicaprio has been nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor.
sentences.cn: 今年李奧納多．狄卡皮歐被提名奧斯卡最佳男演員。

sentences.en: The United Nations declared neutrality in the affairs of every country, a principle that it has consistently adhered to.
sentences.cn: 聯合國宣稱在各國事務中保持中立，這是它一貫堅持的原則。

sentences.en: The issue of nationality may cause an international problem.
sentences.cn: 國籍問題可能會引起國際問題。

sentences.en: Don't you know that you need to add a little bit of mustard to some dishes?
sentences.cn: 難道你不知道有些菜餚需要添加一點芥末嗎？

sentences.en: Skyscrapers have mushroomed all over the city since then.
sentences.cn: 從那時候開始，摩天大樓如雨後春筍般遍及整個城市。

sentences.en: We are to go mushrooming this weekend.
sentences.cn: 這個週末我們要去採蘑菇。

sentences.en: Just help yourself to some mushroom soup.
sentences.cn: 隨意嚐嚐蘑菇湯。

sentences.en: Many people in the press are musing on this policy.
sentences.cn: 很多新聞界人士都在揣測這一政策。

sentences.en: The muscular athlete also has a clever mind.
sentences.cn: 這個肌肉發達的運動員還有一顆聰明的頭腦。

sentences.en: A leader's improper management will cause a multitude of other problems.
sentences.cn: 領導者管理不當會引起許多其它問題。

sentences.en: When did you start to learn the multiplication tables?
sentences.cn: 你是什麼時候開始學習乘法表的？

sentences.en: North Korea doesn't want to be controlled by multiple nations.
sentences.cn: 北韓不希望被多國操控。

sentences.en: Elsa has printed a photo of her boyfriend and her on her mug.
sentences.cn: 艾莎把她和男朋友的照片印製在了馬克杯上。

sentences.en: It's time that she begin to remember the past without mourning.
sentences.cn: 該是她對往事不會感到悲痛的時候了。

sentences.en: The fish lies motionless in the hands of the cook.
sentences.cn: 魚在廚師的手裡動彈不得。

sentences.en: All of the doctors have decided that he couldn't live any longer because he had a mortal wound.
sentences.cn: 所有的醫生都判定他不能活了因為他受了致命的傷。

sentences.en: The passengers on the boat suggested that the boatman should moor the boat on the bank.
sentences.cn: 船上的乘客建議船夫把船停在岸上。

sentences.en: They found the hunter's trail on the moor two kilometers away.
sentences.cn: 他們在兩公里外的荒野發現了獵人的蹤跡。

sentences.en: No one believes that this great monumental literary work was written by a blind man.
sentences.cn: 沒人相信這部偉大的不朽巨著是由一位盲人創作的。

sentences.en: Throughout history there have been so many monarchs who have been ousted.
sentences.cn: 歷史上被廢黜的君主有很多。

sentences.en: The years of World War II were some of the most momentous periods in the history of the world.
sentences.cn: 二戰的那些年是世界歷史上最重要的時期之一。

sentences.en: The moisture in the soil will be absorbed by the weeds.
sentences.cn: 土壤裡的水分會被雜草吸收。

sentences.en: The modified machines have doubled the labor rate.
sentences.cn: 改良的機器使勞動率提高了兩倍。

sentences.en: We should often remind ourselves to behave with modesty.
sentences.cn: 我們要時常提醒自己謙虛行事。

sentences.en: The temperature will be moderate tomorrow and suitable for outdoor activities.
sentences.cn: 明天溫度適中，適合外出活動。

sentences.en: The arrival of the new supplies has moderated the current situation.
sentences.cn: 新物資的到來緩和了眼下的局勢。

sentences.en: The government dispatched thousands of police to quell the mob.
sentences.cn: 政府派出數千武警鎮壓暴民。

sentences.en: Carrie's misgivings were swept away after hearing Rebecca’s explanation, who is a best friend of hers.
sentences.cn: 凱莉聽了她最好的朋友之一瑞貝卡的解釋之後，疑慮一掃而光。

sentences.en: The miser image of our chairman is really well-known.
sentences.cn: 我們公司董事長的守財奴的形象真是眾所周知。

sentences.en: When you have a headache, you can try chewing a piece of mint.
sentences.cn: 頭疼的時候可以嚼一片薄荷糖。

sentences.en: No country in the world would allow an individual to own a mint.
sentences.cn: 任何國家都不允許個人擁有鑄幣廠。

sentences.en: In the past, patches on clothes meant poverty while now it means fashion.
sentences.cn: 以前，衣服上的補丁意味著貧窮，而現在則意味著時尚。

sentences.en: Before the farmers harvest the wheat, they need to patch the barn.
sentences.cn: 農民收割麥子前，要先把穀倉修好。

sentences.en: Golf has developed into an advanced pastime.
sentences.cn: 高爾夫已經發展成為一項高級消遣。

sentences.en: The passionate love displayed on the TV drama does exist in real life.
sentences.cn: 電視劇中轟轟烈烈的愛情在現實生活中的確存在。

sentences.en: Obama is known as a most passionate speaker.
sentences.cn: 奧巴馬被譽為非常有激情的演講者。

sentences.en: No one raised an objection to the territorial partition.
sentences.cn: 沒人對這次的領土分割提出異議。

sentences.en: The two rooms are partitioned by the wall.
sentences.cn: 兩間房被這道牆隔開了。

sentences.en: Don't believe Jack. There’s not a particle of truth in what he has said.
sentences.cn: 不要相信傑克，他說的話沒有一句是實話。

sentences.en: One of basic particles of matter is a proton.
sentences.cn: 物質的基本粒子之一是質子。

sentences.en: Dust particles in the air can not be seen by the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 空氣中的灰塵顆粒並不能被肉眼所見。

sentences.en: The laughter in the parlor distracted Alice.
sentences.cn: 客廳裡的笑聲使愛麗絲分心了。

sentences.en: The experts are trying their best to find out what has paralyzed the system, hoping to get it back to normal quickly.
sentences.cn: 專家們正在盡最大努力尋找是什麼使系統癱瘓，希望讓它早點恢復正常。

sentences.en: There is still one third of water in the pail.
sentences.cn: 桶裡還有三分之一的水。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if he is able to carry a pail of water.用來修飾水。
sentences.cn: 我很好奇他能否提得動一桶水。

sentences.en: The matter of his owing 1,000 dollars has been forgotten.
sentences.cn: 他把欠債一千美元的事情忘記了。

sentences.en: The wooden bridge was flooded owing to the heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 因為這場大雨，木橋被淹沒了。

cn: 勢不可擋的，壓倒一切的

sentences.en: Bella had an overwhelming desire to find her husband under the ruins.
sentences.cn: 貝拉不顧一切的想要找到被壓在廢墟下的丈夫。

sentences.en: The attempt to overthrow the government was leaked.
sentences.cn: 密謀推翻政府的企圖已經洩露了。

sentences.en: After the overthrown of the cruel king, the country entered a democratic period.
sentences.cn: 在殘忍的國王被推翻以後，這個國家進入了民主主義時期。

sentences.en: A truck tried to overtake a car in front of it but was not successful.
sentences.cn: 一輛卡車試圖超越一輛汽車，但是沒有成功。

sentences.en: This is the first time in a swimming competition that Chinese athletes have overtaken American athletes.
sentences.cn: 這是第一次在游泳比賽中中國運動員超越了美國運動員。

sentences.en: It's great that our room overlooks the sea.
sentences.cn: 我們的房間能直接俯視海景真是太棒了。

sentences.en: You should not have overlooked the spelling mistakes in the report.
sentences.cn: 你根本不該忽略這份報告中的拼寫錯誤。

sentences.en: The truck was overloaded with fruits.
sentences.cn: 這輛卡車裝載著過量的水果。

sentences.en: Don't overestimate him for he is just an unpopular governor.
sentences.cn: 不要高估他，他只是一個不得人心的州長。

sentences.en: He was deceiving her feelings from the outset.
sentences.cn: 他從一開始就在欺騙她的感情。

sentences.en: Some people hold outright objections to modifying the constitution.
sentences.cn: 有些人完全不同意修改憲法。

sentences.en: Parents should not outright suppress their children's enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 父母不應該徹底打壓孩子的熱情。

sentences.en: In the end, the outlaw was arrested at the customs office.
sentences.cn: 最後，逃犯在海關被抓獲。

sentences.en: Some areas in the United States don't outlaw the injection of morphine.
sentences.cn: 美國某些地區並沒有宣佈注射嗎啡是非法的。

sentences.en: Organic milk is very good for children's skeletal development.
sentences.cn: 有機牛奶對兒童的骨骼發育大有益處。

sentences.en: The most famous orchestra in Italy will come to America for a concert.
sentences.cn: 義大利最著名的交響樂團將要來美國進行演出。

sentences.en: I dream of owing an apple orchard.
sentences.cn: 我夢想擁有一個蘋果果園。

sentences.en: Lin Zexu ordered all opium to be burned after it was seized.
sentences.cn: 林則徐下令焚燒繳獲的所有鴉片。

cn: adj | （計畫、法律等）實施中的，起作用的

sentences.en: The new speed limit issued by the traffic department started to be operative last month.
sentences.cn: 交通部門頒發的新的限速令上個月開始實施了。

cn: 即可使用的；（用於）操作的

sentences.en: One machine is broken, and the other is operational.
sentences.cn: 一台機器壞掉了，另外一台還在運行。

sentences.en: There is usually an omission of the pronoun in object clauses.
sentences.cn: 代名詞在受詞子句中通常被省略。

sentences.en: For which detail do you have an omission?
sentences.cn: 你在哪些細節處有遺漏呢？

sentences.en: The social scientists are studying the problems between parents and their offspring.
sentences.cn: 社會學家正在研究父母與子女之間的問題。

sentences.en: Our product will be obtainable from all major shopping malls next month.
sentences.cn: 下個月我們的產品就可以在各個大型商場購買。

sentences.en: It was Mr. Smith who was temporarily detained for the crime of obstruction.
sentences.cn: 因為妨礙公務罪而被暫時拘留的是史密斯先生。

sentences.en: The car was blocked by the obstacle on the road.
sentences.cn: 汽車被路上的障礙物攔住了。

sentences.en: The pedestrians were obliged to find somewhere to avoid the sudden storm.
sentences.cn: 突如其來的暴風雨使得路上的行人紛紛找地方避雨。

sentences.en: I am so obliged for the help you gave my son.
sentences.cn: 您幫了我的兒子，我真是感激不盡。

sentences.en: The police often instal monitors on porches to observe people in the past.
sentences.cn: 警察在門廊處安裝一個監視器，觀察過往的人。

sentences.en: The convenience the software provides has popularized it greatly.
sentences.cn: 這款軟體提供的便利性使它大受歡迎。

sentences.en: The school invited that hospital's famous professor to come here and popularize the knowledge of health care.
sentences.cn: 學校邀請醫院的知名教授到這裡向我們宣導健康護理知識。

cn: 民意調查；投票，投票地點

sentences.en: A new poll shows that environmental problems are the issues that the public is most concerned about.
sentences.cn: 一項新的民意調查顯示公眾最關心的問題是環境問題。

sentences.en: Hundreds of people have gathered at the nearest poll.
sentences.cn: 最近的投票點已經聚集了數百人。

sentences.en: His wife always polishes his shoes before he goes to work.
sentences.cn: 他上班之前他的妻子總是為他把鞋擦亮。

sentences.en: The teacher let her polish the end of the paper.
sentences.cn: 老師讓她修改這篇論文的結尾處。

sentences.en: I poked the motionless dog with a stick.
sentences.cn: 我拿木棍戳了一下這只一動不動的狗。

sentences.en: They don't allow anyone to poke their noses into their private lives.
sentences.cn: 他們不允許任何人干涉他們的私生活

sentences.en: Pointed shoes are popular with a great number of female stars.
sentences.cn: 尖頭皮鞋今年頗受女明星的喜愛。

sentences.en: The calligraphy master made a pointed view of her work.
sentences.cn: 這位書法大師對她的作品提出尖銳的看法。

sentences.en: His attention was immediately attracted by a plump woman.
sentences.cn: 他的注意力馬上就被一個豐滿的女子吸引了。

sentences.en: In order to establish a credible government, the state should fulfill its pledges to the public.
sentences.cn: 為了建立有公信力的政府，國家應該履行對公眾的承諾。

sentences.en: She pledged her house to take out a loan of two million dollars from the bank.
sentences.cn: 她用房子作抵押向銀行貸款兩百萬美元。

sentences.en: Although he has pledged not to hurt anyone, I still don't believe him.
sentences.cn: 儘管他已經發誓不會傷害任何人，但是我還是不相信他。

sentences.en: Ancient people regarded the plague as an incurable disease.
sentences.cn: 古代的人們把瘟疫當做不治之症。

sentences.en: Alex dropped into a pit as he was returning home at night.
sentences.cn: 艾力克斯夜裡回家的時候掉進了坑裡。

sentences.en: People who work down in the pit put their lives at great risk.
sentences.cn: 在礦井下工作的人有極大的生命風險。

sentences.en: Sue is very pious when she goes to church every week.
sentences.cn: 蘇每週做禮拜的時候都很虔誠。

sentences.en: Please give me half a pint of milk.
sentences.cn: 請給我半品脫牛奶。

sentences.en: In order to make Nick stay awake, I pinched him as hard as I could.
sentences.cn: 為了讓尼克保持清醒，我狠狠地掐了他一下。

sentences.en: She forgot to add a pinch of salt to the dish.
sentences.cn: 她忘了在菜裡放一撮鹽。

sentences.en: Michael bumped into a pickpocket on the bus and had his wallet stolen.
sentences.cn: 麥可在公車上遇到了扒手，他的錢包被偷了。

sentences.en: You'd better be careful not to annoy the eccentric physicist.
sentences.cn: 你最好小心一點以免惹惱那性格古怪的物理學家。

sentences.en: They are still talking about whether to see a physician or a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 他們還在討論去看內科醫生還是外科醫生。

sentences.en: The El Nino phenomenon caused by climate change has become more serious.
sentences.cn: 氣候變化引起的聖嬰現象更嚴重了。

sentences.en: Some people once denied that Jay Chou is a phenomenon among the many musicians in Taiwan.
sentences.cn: 曾經有人否認周杰倫是台灣眾多音樂人中的奇才。

sentences.en: Our country is working hard to develop new energy sources to replace petroleum.
sentences.cn: 我國正在努力開發替代石油的新能源。

sentences.en: The film analyses the ugliness of human nature from a historical perspective.
sentences.cn: 該電影從歷史的角度剖析了人性的醜陋。

sentences.en: The positive actions of the government have encouraged the people in the disaster zone to have a perspective for a better life.
sentences.cn: 政府的積極行動鼓舞了災區人民對美好生活的展望。

sentences.en: The personnel are all lined up to welcome the manager's arrival.
sentences.cn: 全體工作人員都在列隊歡迎經理的到來。

sentences.en: The new employees of each company must go to the personnel to register at first.
sentences.cn: 每家公司的新員工都必須先去人事部門報到。

sentences.en: The traditional virtues of filial piety should be permanent.
sentences.cn: 孝順的傳統美德應該永存。

sentences.en: We have foreseen the permanence of this terrible condition, so we must stop it.
sentences.cn: 我們已經預見了這種恐怖情況的持久性，所以我們必須要阻止它。

sentences.en: While an old dynasty perishes, a new one will appear.
sentences.cn: 舊王朝滅亡就會出現新王朝。

sentences.en: If the precious flower has not been carefully looked after, it will perish soon.
sentences.cn: 這種名貴的花如果沒有得到細心照顧，很快就會枯萎。

sentences.en: The figure on the cover of the periodical is a business tycoon.
sentences.cn: 這次的期刊封面人物是一位商業大亨。

sentences.en: During her pregnancy, she made periodical visit to the hospital.
sentences.cn: 懷孕期間，她定期去醫院做檢查。

sentences.en: Your father's pension has been received.
sentences.cn: 你父親的養老金已經領過了。

sentences.en: While on the way home with his pension, he was robbed.
sentences.cn: 他帶著退休金回家的路上被搶了。

sentences.en: Whether the death penalty should be abolished depends on the specific circumstances of a country.
sentences.cn: 是否取消死刑根據國家的具體情況而定。

sentences.en: After discussing, the two referees decided not to award a penalty.
sentences.cn: 兩個裁判商議過後決定不判點球。

sentences.en: I need to use a hammer to nail pegs into the yard.
sentences.cn: 我需要用錘子把木樁釘在院子裡。

sentences.en: The international crude oil price is pegged at $70 per barrel.
sentences.cn: 國際原油的價格被固定在七十美元一桶。

sentences.en: There was hardly a pedestrian in the street when it rains heavily.
sentences.cn: 下大雨的時候街上幾乎沒有行人。

sentences.en: This book was so pedestrian that I fell asleep soon after starting to read it.
sentences.cn: 這本書乏味至極，才翻開我就睡著了。

sentences.en: The woodpecker is pecking at a worm in the tree.
sentences.cn: 啄木鳥正在樹上啄食一條蟲子。

sentences.en: The young man gave the girl lying on the bed a little peck.
sentences.cn: 年輕人輕輕吻了一下躺在床上的女孩。

sentences.en: The patriotism of our revolutionary predecessors is worthy of our admiration.
sentences.cn: 革命前輩的愛國主義精神值得我們敬仰。

sentences.en: I bought my dad a pair of blue-checkered pyjamas at the mall last month.
sentences.cn: 我上個月在商場買了一套藍格子的睡衣給爸爸。

sentences.en: The man well-known for being punctual brought it to me three days ago.
sentences.cn: 這個眾所周知的守時的人三天前把它帶來給我了。

sentences.en: The doctor is feeling her pulse.
sentences.cn: 醫生正在為她把脈。

sentences.en: Catherine felt as if something was pulsing in her head.
sentences.cn: 卡洛琳感覺腦子裡好像有東西在跳動。

sentences.en: The result of the research is at present provisional and needs further exploration.
sentences.cn: 目前這個研究成果只是暫時的，還需要進一步探索。

sentences.en: The director of the film decided to find a few provisional actors.
sentences.cn: 該電影的導演決定找一些臨時演員。

sentences.en: These controversial provisions must be implemented this year.
sentences.cn: 這些有爭議的條款今年必須要落實。

sentences.en: The government is responsible for the provision of public services to citizens.
sentences.cn: 政府有責任向市民提供公共服務。

sentences.en: Her weight is not proportional to her height.
sentences.cn: 她的體重與身高不成比例。

sentences.en: One paddle is enough to propel the boat.
sentences.cn: 一隻槳足以推動小船。

sentences.en: The prominent entrepreneur is very patient when it comes to educating children.
sentences.cn: 這位傑出的企業家在教育孩子方面很有耐心。

sentences.en: The director found a projector from the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 導演從倉庫裡找到一個放映機。

sentences.en: Most movie theaters prohibit from bringing food from outside.
sentences.cn: 大多數的電影院禁止攜帶外食。

sentences.en: China has seen a progressive development in the aerospace manufacturing technology.
sentences.cn: 中國的航太製造技術的發展正在不斷前進。

sentences.en: There has been a progressive reduction in the number of women dying from gynecological diseases.
sentences.cn: 因婦女病而死的女性人數正在逐漸減少。

sentences.en: The profound economic crisis has not affected the inhabitants of this island.
sentences.cn: 這場嚴重的經濟危機並沒有對這個島嶼的居民產生影響。

sentences.en: The professor recommended quite a profound book to us.
sentences.cn: 教授推薦我們一本寓意深遠的書。

sentences.en: Real estate is known as the most profitable industry in this country.
sentences.cn: 房地產被視為這個國家利潤最豐厚的產業。

sentences.en: The reporter has only taken a photo of this star's profile.
sentences.cn: 記者只拍到了這位大明星的側面。

sentences.en: She is not proficient in French.
sentences.cn: 她並不精通法語。

sentences.en: What is the procedure for applying for a bank card?
sentences.cn: 申請辦理銀行卡需要什麼手續？

sentences.en: In the case of litigation, some legal procedures can not be omitted.
sentences.cn: 訴訟案件中，有些法律程序是不能省略的。

sentences.en: At present, the principal energy source in industrial development is oil.
sentences.cn: 目前工業發展中主要的能源是石油。

sentences.en: Discrimination against women is more prevalent in areas with less developed economies.
sentences.cn: 對女性的歧視在經濟不發達的地區更為普遍。

sentences.en: Some of these dances didn't prevail in India and some African countries at the beginning.
sentences.cn: 這些舞蹈一開始在印度和一些非洲國家並不流行。

sentences.en: The Conservative Party seems to have prevailed in this election.
sentences.cn: 保守黨在選舉中似乎要獲勝了。

sentences.en: This entire forest is under the preservation of the government.
sentences.cn: 整片森林都在政府的保護範圍之內。

sentences.en: The preservation of the past cultures is one of the main functions of museums.
sentences.cn: 博物館的最主要功能之一就是對於過去文化的保存。

cn: 使對⋯⋯全神貫注，使專心於

sentences.en: This portrait of the human body has preoccupied her.
sentences.cn: 這幅人體肖像畫已經佔據了她全部的心思。

cn: （包括附屬建築、土地等在內的）房屋或其他建築物

sentences.en: It's necessary for the assaulted premises to be rebuilt.
sentences.cn: 受到襲擊的建築物有必要重建。例句是 it is開頭的主詞子句，

sentences.en: A premature baby is usually lighter than full-term babies.
sentences.cn: 早產的嬰兒通常比足月的嬰兒體重要輕。

sentences.en: The police have excluded a heart attack as a cause of his premature death.
sentences.cn: 員警已經排除了心臟病發作是他過早死亡的原因。

sentences.en: The wife complained that one of her husband's predominant disposition is weakness.
sentences.cn: 妻子抱怨先生最大的弱點之一是軟弱。

sentences.en: We were taught to ask for advice respectfully from our predecessors.
sentences.cn: 我們被教導要恭敬地向前輩請教。

sentences.en: He was given very little leadership in order to prevent him from being involved in corruption like his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 為了防止他像他的前輩那樣貪污，他被授予了很少的領導權。

sentences.en: That soldier's bravery and valor in combat were seen as a precedent that all future soldiers should aspire to.
sentences.cn: 那位士兵的勇氣以及在戰鬥時的英勇表現，被認為是往後的士兵尊崇的對象。

sentences.en: Scientists are unable to make accurate estimates of the potential resources in Antarctica.
sentences.cn: 科學家無法對南極大陸的潛在資源做出精確估計。

sentences.en: Some people's potential can’t be seen until they have been stimulated.
sentences.cn: 有些人的潛力只有通過刺激才能發揮出來。

sentences.en: Only a small portion of the furniture was wet from the rain.
sentences.cn: 只有一小部分傢俱被淋濕了。

sentences.en: Would you like a portion of dessert after the main course?
sentences.cn: 主菜之後您想要一份甜點嗎？

sentences.en: I hired a porter at the train station to help carry my large suitcases.
sentences.cn: 我在火車站雇了一個搬運工幫忙搬運我的大的行李箱。

sentences.en: We strongly recommend you to get a portable notebook computer.
sentences.cn: 我們極力推薦你買一款可隨身攜帶的筆記型電腦。

sentences.en: This book's cover has a resemblance to that one.
sentences.cn: 這本書與那本書的封面有相似之處。

sentences.en: It's not clear why the reputable shop suddenly closed.
sentences.cn: 這家聲譽不錯的店鋪不知道為什麼突然關門了。

sentences.en: The doctor found the patient's newly transplanted heart began to be repelled by the body.
sentences.cn: 醫生發現病人新移植的心臟與身體開始發生排斥。

sentences.en: They repelled the invaders from their village.
sentences.cn: 他們把入侵者從他們村子裡趕走了。

sentences.en: You should pay attention to whether or not the contract is renewable.
sentences.cn: 你要注意該合約是否可以續簽。

sentences.en: Basically, every country is actively developing renewable energy sources.
sentences.cn: 基本上，每個國家都在積極開發可再生能源。

sentences.en: His remoteness made her sad.
sentences.cn: 他的疏遠讓她傷心不已。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, these few buildings are the only remanants of the once glorious empire.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，這幾座建築是那曾經輝煌一時的帝國的唯一殘骸。

sentences.en: The main force has been evacuated from the battlefield, and the remnant is pinning the enemy down.
sentences.cn: 部隊的主力已經撤離了戰場，剩下的殘存部隊在牽制敵人。

sentences.en: The doctor gave him an anesthesia remedy to keep him quiet.
sentences.cn: 醫生給他打了麻醉藥使他安靜下來。

sentences.en: Whether this remedy is feasible is still testing.
sentences.cn: 這種治療方法是否可行還在測試中。

sentences.en: Before a huge loss occurs, you should quickly find some ways to remedy the situation.
sentences.cn: 在沒有發生巨大損失之前，你應該趕緊想辦法補救。

sentences.en: Bonnie clarified the news to the media with reluctance that she was about to get married.
sentences.cn: 邦妮不情願地向媒體澄清她即將結婚的消息。

sentences.en: All of the soldiers are looking forward to being reinforced.
sentences.cn: 所有的士兵都在期待增援。

sentences.en: They would rather reinforce the wall than build a new one.
sentences.cn: 他們寧願加固牆體也不願重新修建一個。

sentences.en: He accidentally came across a refuge built on the mountain.
sentences.cn: 他偶然間發現了建在了山上的避難所。

sentences.en: Home is the most important place for us to seek refuge.
sentences.cn: 家是我們尋求避難的最重要的地方。
