sentences.en: The edible oil we use is mostly refined from peanuts and soybeans.
sentences.cn: 我們使用的食用油大多是從花生和大豆中提煉出來的。

sentences.en: It is worth discussing how to refine the words of the article before it is published.
sentences.cn: 如何改善這篇即將發表的文章裡的用詞值得商榷。

sentences.en: But for the police's positive measures, the recurrence of the violence would have been inevitable.
sentences.cn: 要不是員警的積極措施，暴力事件的再次發生是不可避免的。

sentences.en: Our company is recruiting for a management position, so those who are interested can come to our office and interview.
sentences.cn: 我們公司正在招募經理職位，有意者可前來我們辦公室參加面試。

sentences.en: Up until now, the country has recruited more than 300,000 soldiers.
sentences.cn: 到目前為止，全國已徵兵超過三十萬人。

sentences.en: Disney is a famous place for recreation, leisure, and entertainment.
sentences.cn: 迪士尼樂園是著名的休閒娛樂場所。

sentences.en: I received a warm reception from my friends when I visited Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 我去上海的時候受到朋友的熱情招待。

sentences.en: The waitress at the restaurant told her to leave her umbrella at the reception.
sentences.cn: 餐廳的服務員告訴她把傘放在接待處。

sentences.en: While she was receding, he was moving forward.
sentences.cn: 她向後退，他向前進。

sentences.en: Under the careful care of her family, her condition recedes day by day.
sentences.cn: 在家人的精心照顧下，她的情況一天天好轉。

sentences.en: The wooden staircase in Mr. and Mrs. White's often rattles.
sentences.cn: 懷特夫婦家的樓梯經常嘎吱作響。

sentences.en: The friction between the child’s toy car and the ground made a harsh rattle.
sentences.cn: 小孩子的玩具車與地面摩擦，發出刺耳的嘎吱聲。

sentences.en: Grandpa always likes to have a ramble around the yard after dinner.
sentences.cn: 爺爺總是喜歡飯後在院子裡漫步。

sentences.en: We don't plan to ramble in the woods today.
sentences.cn: 我們今天不打算去林子裡散步了。

sentences.en: Even if the rail project is not carried out, we will still look forward to it.
sentences.cn: 即使這項鐵路專案計畫還沒有開始實施，我們仍對它充滿了期待。

sentences.en: In general, the elevators in large shopping malls are equipped with hand rails.
sentences.cn: 一般來說，大型商場裡的電梯都設有扶手。

sentences.en: The police found all of the buried explosives within a one mile radius.
sentences.cn: 員警在半徑一英里的範圍內發現了埋在地下所有的炸藥。

sentences.en: The sunrise I saw on the mountain top was radiant.
sentences.cn: 我在山頂看的日出光芒萬丈。

sentences.en: All living things on Earth are able to survive because of the radiant heat from the sun.
sentences.cn: 地球上所有生物都因為太陽輻射的熱量而能夠生存。

sentences.en: The teacher asked who knew where the quotation was from.
sentences.cn: 老師問誰知道這句話出自哪裡。

sentences.en: The German branch just sent us a quotation about this product.
sentences.cn: 德國分公司剛發來關於這個產品的報價單給我們。

sentences.en: The quota of film tickets one person can buy has been reduced to one.
sentences.cn: 一個人可買的電影票的限額已經降至一張了。

sentences.en: The university has two quotas every year for further study abroad.
sentences.cn: 該大學每年有兩個去國外留學的名額。

sentences.en: The English teacher often gives quizzes in class to help students reinforce what they have learned.
sentences.cn: 英語老師經常在課堂進行測驗以幫助學生鞏固所學的知識。

sentences.en: She was upset because she didn't do well on the quiz.
sentences.cn: 她很沮喪因為她在問答競賽中表現得不好。

sentences.en: The pattern on this quilt is very special.
sentences.cn: 這條被子上的花紋很特別。

sentences.en: With only the last one hundred meters left, we quickened our pace.
sentences.cn: 剩最後一百米的時候，我們加快了步伐。

sentences.en: Washing your face with cold water helps quicken your mind.
sentences.cn: 用冷水洗臉有助於刺激頭腦。

sentences.en: He stopped to drink some water to quench his thirst.
sentences.cn: 他停下來喝了點水解渴。

sentences.en: A fireman was badly injured when quenching the fire.
sentences.cn: 一名消防員在撲滅火災的時候受了重傷。

sentences.en: This chemical experiment has a quantitative advantage over the previous one.
sentences.cn: 該化學實驗與前一個相比具有定量優勢。

sentences.en: Almost no one can say clearly what the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research is.
sentences.cn: 幾乎沒有人能說清定量研究和定性研究之間的區別。

sentences.en: Since entering the Internet era, computer technology has made a qualitative leap.
sentences.cn: 進入互聯網時代以後，電腦技術有了品質上的躍進。

sentences.en: Qualitative analysis has both its advantages and disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 定性分析既有優點又有缺點。

sentences.en: I wish I were able to visit the pyramids in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 如果我能去看看埃及的金字塔多好。

sentences.en: Arrange the following works according to their chronological sequence.
sentences.cn: 將下列作品按照時間順序排列。

sentences.en: The senator who always wears a pair of black framed glasses often does chores at home.
sentences.cn: 這位總是戴著一副黑框眼鏡的參議員經常在家裡做家務。

sentences.en: A small segment of this play is an action play.
sentences.cn: 這部戲中只有一小部分是動作戲。

sentences.en: In the early evening, a lot of people gathered on the seashore for a walk.
sentences.cn: 傍晚的時候，很多人聚集在海岸散步。

sentences.en: The seams are open again.
sentences.cn: 接縫處又裂開了。

sentences.en: At the age of five he showed a remarkable talent for sculpture.
sentences.cn: 他五歲那年就展現出了驚人的雕塑天賦。

sentences.en: That night he screeched as if he had seen a ghost.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上他如看到鬼一樣的尖叫起來。

sentences.en: The screech of the car's brakes made the baby cry.
sentences.cn: 汽車的刹車聲把嬰兒嚇哭了。

sentences.en: The doctor holds down his body so that he does not scratch his scars.
sentences.cn: 醫生按住他的身體不讓他去撓疤痕。

sentences.en: She is very worried that the scratches on her skin will leave marks.
sentences.cn: 她很擔心皮膚上的擦痕會留下印記。

sentences.en: Her arm was scraped by an out-stretched branch.
sentences.cn: 她的手臂被一枝突出來的樹枝刮傷了。

sentences.en: He somehow managed to have a fashion show with a lot of clothes made of scrap paper.
sentences.cn: 他竟然靠著大量以廢舊報紙製作的衣服辦了一場時裝秀。

sentences.en: This piece of yellow scrap paper contains important information on the suspect.
sentences.cn: 這張黃色的小紙片上有犯罪嫌疑人的重要資訊。

sentences.en: The traffic police scattered the crowd after receiving a notice from the mayor.
sentences.cn: 交通警察接到市長的通知後把圍觀的群眾分散開了。

sentences.en: My mother taught me how to scatter seeds in the grass.
sentences.cn: 媽媽教我如何把種子撒在草地上。

sentences.en: The roads in remote mountainous areas are very scarce, and so few people set foot there.
sentences.cn: 偏遠山區的公路很少，所以很少有人會踏足那裡。

sentences.en: No one thought that he would be involved in such a scandal.
sentences.cn: 誰也沒有想到他會捲入這樣的醜聞裡。

sentences.en: The race gradually disappeared because of their savage character.
sentences.cn: 這個種族是因為殘暴的性格而漸漸消失的。

sentences.en: This writer used to write works people found satisfactory , but he has since stopped writing.
sentences.cn: 這個作家本來都創作出令人滿意的作品，但是他卻不再寫了。

sentences.en: Venice Businessman is a famous book that is a satire.
sentences.cn: 《威尼斯商人》是一部著名的諷刺小說。

sentences.en: He turned sarcastic when he was faced with injustice.
sentences.cn: 他一遇到不公平的事情就會挖苦諷刺。

sentences.en: At the beginning of the parade, the crowd gathered to salute the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 閱兵開始時，人們紛紛向士兵們致敬。

sentences.en: He was saluted by his leader for his outstanding performance.
sentences.cn: 他因為業績突出而被上司讚揚。

sentences.en: In order to succeed in portraying his role in the play, he made a great sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 為了成功塑造他在這部戲中的角色，他做出了重大犧牲。

sentences.en: The foreigner was so curious what people will sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 這個外國人很好奇人們會用什麼獻祭。

sentences.en: He was ruthless to ignore the old lady's calls for help.
sentences.cn: 他無視了老太太的求助，真是無情。

sentences.en: The bike cannot be ridden because of its rusty chain.
sentences.cn: 腳踏車的鏈條生銹了所以不能騎了。

sentences.en: Romanticism and realism are two main schools of thought in literature and art.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主義和現實主義同為文學藝術上的兩大主要思潮。

sentences.en: A robust person has more chances in life than a weak one.
sentences.cn: 一個身體強健的人比身體虛弱的人擁有更多的人生機遇。

sentences.en: No matter what happens, he is robust in his pursuit of a purpose.
sentences.cn: 不論發生什麼事，他對目標的追求都非常堅定。

sentences.en: The ripple in the lake didn't attract his attention.
sentences.cn: 湖水的陣陣漣漪並沒有引起他的注意。

sentences.en: This batch of steel was abandoned because its rigidity is not up to standard.
sentences.cn: 這批鋼材由於硬度不達標而被廢棄了。

sentences.en: The math teacher in the school is famous for his rigidity in class.
sentences.cn: 該學校的數學老師以死板出名。

sentences.en: In the late Qing Dynasty, there were many peasant revolts.
sentences.cn: 清朝末期出現了很多農民起義。

sentences.en: He hopes no one revolts against him.
sentences.cn: 他希望沒有人反抗他。

sentences.en: The plaintiff abruptly revoked his charges against the defendant.
sentences.cn: 原告突然撤銷了對被告的控告。

sentences.en: She retorted his previous statement that this plan was practical.
sentences.cn: 她反駁他認為這個計畫很實際的說法。

sentences.en: He became less resolute in opposing the project.
sentences.cn: 他對這個專案的反對變得不太堅決了。

sentences.en: This reservoir can hold 10 thousand tons of water.
sentences.cn: 這個水庫可以容納一萬噸的水。

cn: 非凡的，異常的；單一的，單數的

sentences.en: We were astonished at the young man's singular achievement.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕人的非凡成就使我們都震驚了。

sentences.en: The English teacher asks her students to write out the singular forms of 50 nouns during class.
sentences.cn: 這位英語老師要求學生在課堂上寫出一下五十個名詞的單數形式。

sentences.en: Simultaneous interpretation is a well-paid career at home and abroad, which also means it requires strong professionalism and focus.
sentences.cn: 同步口譯在國內外來說都是一份高薪職業，這也意味著這份工作需要很強的專業性和專注力。

sentences.en: I did my utmost to simulate disappointment after hearing the news.
sentences.cn: 聽到這個消息後，我竭力假裝失望的樣子。

sentences.en: Mom asked me to sift out the gravel from the wheat.
sentences.cn: 媽媽讓我把小麥裡的小石子篩出去。

sentences.en: He sifted through the pile of letters and found his.
sentences.cn: 他仔細檢查了那堆信件，發現了他自己的那封。

sentences.en: The impurities in the tea leaves should be run through a sieve.
sentences.cn: 茶葉裡的雜質應該通過濾網濾一下。

sentences.en: The first step in making bread is to sieve the flour into a particular bowl.
sentences.cn: 做麵包的第一步是把麵粉篩進特定的碗裡。

sentences.en: The city had been under siege for a week before the general came to rescue.
sentences.cn: 將軍趕來營救時，這座城市已經被圍困一周了。

cn: 梭子 v穿梭般來回移動

sentences.en: The modern shuttle is generally made of calamander, laminated wood, or nylon and other materials.
sentences.cn: 現代一般梭子是用柿木，層壓木或尼龍等材料製成的。

sentences.en: For the sake of love and career, he had to shuttle between two cities for three years.
sentences.cn: 為了愛情和事業，三年來他往返於兩個城市。

sentences.en: He stood in front of the shutters, with a cigarette in his hand, and looked into the distance.
sentences.cn: 他站在百葉窗前，手裡夾著一根菸，向遠方望去。

sentences.en: The model made a sexy pose, and the photographer pressed the shutter quickly.
sentences.cn: 模特擺了一個性感的姿勢，攝影師飛快地按下快門。

sentences.en: He didn't want to be disturbed when he was shuffling.
sentences.cn: 他不希望洗牌的時候受到打擾。

sentences.en: It’s not a good habit to shuffle.
sentences.cn: 拖腳走路不是好習慣。

sentences.en: There are more than 6,000 species of shrubs in our country.
sentences.cn: 我們國家有六千多種灌木樹種資源。

cn: 刺耳的；大聲、執著、強烈地提出申訴、要求等的

sentences.en: Every morning I am woken up by that hateful shrill whistle.
sentences.cn: 每天早上叫醒我的就是那可惡的刺耳的汽笛聲。

sentences.en: No one can stand the sound of the shrill woman.
sentences.cn: 沒有人受得了那位大嗓門女人的聲音。

sentences.en: The crowd shrieked at Beckham's every goal.
sentences.cn: 貝克漢的每一個進球得分都令觀眾為之尖叫。

sentences.en: He gave a loud shriek when someone sneakily covered his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他發出尖叫聲是因為有人悄悄地把他的眼睛蒙起來了。

sentences.en: Facts have proven that Warren Buffett is a shrewd investor.
sentences.cn: 事實已經證明華倫巴菲特是一個精明的投資家。

sentences.en: I shyed away after I looked into his shrewd eyes.
sentences.cn: 我對上他銳利的目光後，馬上就躲開了。

sentences.en: He wants the Human Resources Department to recruit a secretary with the most basic shorthand ability.
sentences.cn: 他想要人事部門招聘一個有最基本的速記能力的祕書。

sentences.en: The thinly-dressed beggar was shivering in the cold wind.
sentences.cn: 這個衣著單薄的乞丐在寒風裡瑟瑟發抖。

sentences.en: There is an urgent need to expand the scale of the shipyard, or it will be purchased.
sentences.cn: 這家造船廠迫切需要擴大規模，否則就會被收購。

sentences.en: He is the only one who survived the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一一個在海難中生還的人。

sentences.en: The lonely shepherd looked into the distance as if he were looking forward to his wife's return.
sentences.cn: 孤獨的牧羊人眺望遠方彷彿在期待他妻子的回來。

sentences.en: All of his family thought that he was a sheer waste of time.
sentences.cn: 他的家人都認為他純粹是在浪費時間。

sentences.en: What's the name of the movie that was filmed on the sheer cliff?
sentences.cn: 那部在陡峭的懸崖上拍的電影是什麼名字？

sentences.en: Grandpa said that he often slept in the cattle shed when he was young.
sentences.cn: 爺爺說他小時候經常睡在牛棚裡。

sentences.en: Soldiers pursue the shedding of blood not tears.
sentences.cn: 軍人奉行流血不流淚。

sentences.en: Shearing sheep is not as easy as I imaged.
sentences.cn: 剪羊毛沒有我想像中的簡單。

sentences.en: He was so angry that he sheared the chopsticks off.
sentences.cn: 他太生氣了，把筷子折斷了。

sentences.en: It is essential for every man to shave in the morning.
sentences.cn: 每個男士在早上刮鬍是必不可少的。

sentences.en: The car shaved by me and frightened me.
sentences.cn: 那輛車從我身邊擦過，嚇壞我了。

sentences.en: The company has promised that their glass will not shatter due to ordinary explosives.
sentences.cn: 這家公司承諾他們的玻璃不會被普通的爆炸物震碎。

sentences.en: The first failure in life can shatter a lot of people's dreams.
sentences.cn: 人生中的第一次失敗會使很多人的夢想破滅。

sentences.en: He said sharply that whoever had broken the glass would be punished.
sentences.cn: 他嚴厲地說無論是誰打破了玻璃都要接受懲罰。

sentences.en: They could not tell if the shapeless figure in the distance was friend or foe.
sentences.cn: 他們無法辨別遠方的模糊身影是友是敵。

sentences.en: Make sure you grip the ax's shaft firmly.
sentences.cn: 請確保自己緊握著斧頭的柄。

sentences.en: This afternoon in the street, a shabby man attracted the attention of the police.
sentences.cn: 午後的街上，一名衣著襤褸的男子引起了員警的注意。

sentences.en: She decided to resign because she suffered shabby treatment at her company.
sentences.cn: 她辭職是因為在公司裡受到了不公正的待遇。

cn: 會議；（進行某活動連續的）一段時間

sentences.en: After receiving a lawsuit, the court will have a session in a few working days.
sentences.cn: 接到訴訟案件後，法院會在幾個工作日內開庭審理。

sentences.en: A serviceable servant always knows the need of his master.
sentences.cn: 一個有用的僕人總是會了解主人的需要。

sentences.en: I was very fortunate to have bought a pair of serviceable shoes.
sentences.cn: 我很幸運地買到了一雙耐穿的鞋子。

sentences.en: The minister preached sermons regularly in the square.
sentences.cn: 牧師定期在廣場上進行講道。

sentences.en: In ancient China, women usually spun by themselves.
sentences.cn: 在古代中國，女性通常都是自己紡紗。

sentences.en: The cup was so full of milk that it spilled out all over the table.
sentences.cn: 杯子裡的牛奶太滿了，灑的一桌子都是。

sentences.en: Thirty years have passed and he is still at the forefront of the broadcasting sphere.
sentences.cn: 三十年過去了，他仍然是廣播界數一數二的人物。

sentences.en: Botanists collected a specimen of the amazing creature in order to further understand it.
sentences.cn: 植物學家為了研究這種神奇的物種，採集了有關的樣本。

sentences.en: Because she is specialized greatly in philosophy, she has been invited to give lectures at universities.
sentences.cn: 她在哲學方面的知識非常專業化，所以她被多次要求在各個大學做講座。

sentences.en: He murdered his biological parents with a spear.
sentences.cn: 他用矛殺害了自己的親生父母。

sentences.en: Having appropriate spatial relationships is a good method to keep close among friends.
sentences.cn: 朋友之間，適當的空間關係是保持親密的好辦法。

sentences.en: I have a sore throat, and that is the reason why I came to this clinic.
sentences.cn: 我喉嚨疼，這也是我為什麼要來到這診所的原因。

sentences.en: Every sophomore at that university is required to find an internship during the summer.
sentences.cn: 這所大學裡的大二學生都被要求在暑假的時候實習。

sentences.en: The philosopher desires nothing but solitude and darkness.
sentences.cn: 除了寂寞和黑夜，這位哲學家別無他求。

sentences.en: He enjoys his solitary lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 他喜歡這種獨自的生活方式。

sentences.en: Workers in this factory are solid about striking.
sentences.cn: 這個工廠的所有工人一致同意舉行罷工。

sentences.en: Solid objects are easier to be stored.
sentences.cn: 固體的東西更易保存。

sentences.en: In a sober manner that professor suggested that the young man do what he wants to do.
sentences.cn: 那個教授很清醒的建議這個年輕人做自己想做的事情。

sentences.en: After falling asleep for a while, the old man gradually sobered up.
sentences.cn: 這個老人睡了一覺後，慢慢地清醒過來。

sentences.en: Sweat soaked his leather jacket.
sentences.cn: 汗水浸濕了他的皮夾克。

sentences.en: Before the dog ate the food I put in front of it, it sniffed the food.
sentences.cn: 那隻狗在開始吃我放在牠面前的食物前，先聞了一聞。

sentences.en: If you insist on doing that, I will smack you.
sentences.cn: 你要是再堅持做那件事的話，我就要揍你了。

sentences.en: This slump in his career destroyed his confidence.
sentences.cn: 這次事業跌落谷底重創他的信心。

sentences.en: She soon fell into a sound slumber.
sentences.cn: 她很快就沉睡過去了。

sentences.en: The slogan serves as a warning to remind people to remember this historical event.
sentences.cn: 這條標語起到了一個警醒作用，讓人們能夠記得這個歷史事件。

sentences.en: She was so angry that she slit the newspaper to strips.
sentences.cn: 她十分氣憤，都把報紙撕成細條。

sentences.en: He is a slippery cooperator so nobody is willing to work together with him.
sentences.cn: 他是一個狡猾的合作者，沒有人願意與他一起工作。

sentences.en: The great President was slain by some extremist with a gun.
sentences.cn: 一些極端主義者用槍殺害了這位偉大的總統。

sentences.en: Millions of innocent civilians were slaughtered during this war.
sentences.cn: 成千上萬的無辜的老百姓在這次戰爭中遭到了屠殺。

sentences.en: He slapped his beloved son on the face on account of his colossal mistake.
sentences.cn: 他給了他心愛的兒子一記耳光，因為他犯了一個巨大的失誤。

sentences.en: He was at a loss in this strange place full of people speaking in slang.
sentences.cn: 他在這個陌生的地方有點不知所措，這個地方的人都在說著俚語。

sentences.en: No matter how my opponent slandered me, my colleagues chose to trust me.
sentences.cn: 無論對手如何誹謗我，我的同事們都選擇相信我。

sentences.en: This window slammed.
sentences.cn: 這扇窗戶砰地關上了。

sentences.en: The financial discipline in this nation is very slack.
sentences.cn: 這個國家的財政紀律非常鬆弛。

sentences.en: The student was warned not to slack off in his studies.
sentences.cn: 這名學生被告誡學習上不可懈怠。

sentences.en: A rough sketch has already been prepared by the world-renowned engineer.
sentences.cn: 這個世界知名的工程師已經畫好了草圖。

sentences.en: There are plenty of creepy skeletons in this laboratory.
sentences.cn: 這個實驗室裡擺滿了很多讓人感到詭異的骨架。

sentences.en: No one can deny the importance of strategic significance from the development of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 沒人能夠否認科技發展具有重要的戰略意義。

sentences.en: Lily didn't find that the strap on her pyjamas was loose.
sentences.cn: 莉莉沒有發現睡衣的帶子鬆了。

sentences.en: When she was in high school, she dyed a few strands of her hair yellow.
sentences.cn: 她上高中的時候，把幾股頭髮染成了黃色了。

sentences.en: The sudden storm stranded the tourists in the valley.
sentences.cn: 突如其來的暴風雪把遊客困在了山谷裡。

sentences.en: Strain the net to avoid the fish getting out.
sentences.cn: 拉緊這張網，以免魚跑出去。

sentences.en: Her father's illness has put her under a great strain.
sentences.cn: 父親的疾病使她壓力很大。

sentences.en: That three-storey office building is where he goes to work.
sentences.cn: 那座三層樓高的辦公大樓是他上班的地方。

sentences.en: Something perishable should be kept in cold storage.
sentences.cn: 易腐壞的東西應該冷藏起來。

sentences.en: When I was cooking, the smell the peppers produced stung my eyes.
sentences.cn: 我做飯時，辣椒產生的氣味刺痛了我的眼睛。

sentences.en: The austere situation nowadays has stimulated the government to take specific measures.
sentences.cn: 目前的嚴峻形勢促使政府要採取具體的措施。

sentences.en: The manager who was stiff in his manners received complaints.
sentences.cn: 這個經理因為態度僵硬，遭到了投訴。

sentences.en: The stern mother has commended her oldest son for his diligent spirit in his studies.
sentences.cn: 這位嚴厲的母親表揚了大兒子的勤奮好學精神。

sentences.en: The romantic poet is singing in the stern of a boat.
sentences.cn: 這位浪漫的詩人正在船尾唱歌。

sentences.en: As our steamer sailed, the sea began to become rough.
sentences.cn: 當我們的汽輪啟航時，大海便開始波濤洶湧。

sentences.en: Joint effort is needed by both governmental statutes and self-awareness.
sentences.cn: 政府法令以及個人自我意識都應該要努力。

sentences.en: She has realized that the statistical significance should be recognized.
sentences.cn: 她意識到統計的重要性應該得到認可。

sentences.en: There is a wide variety of stationery and office supplies in this store.
sentences.cn: 這家商店經營著各種各樣的文具和辦公用品。

sentences.en: Comparatively speaking, a stationary thing is easier to aim at.
sentences.cn: 相比較而言，靜止的東西更容易瞄準。

sentences.en: House prices that have been kept static for a few years are now increasing rapidly.
sentences.cn: 房價在靜止了幾年以後，又迅速飆升。

sentences.en: These stout-hearted soldiers died of starvation during the famine.
sentences.cn: 這些剛毅的士兵在這次饑荒中餓死了。

sentences.en: It is imperative that we standardize our uniforms.
sentences.cn: 很有必要統一標準化我們的制服。

sentences.en: I must burn the midnight oil in order to finish this stack of work I have today.
sentences.cn: 我必須要熬夜了，為了今天按時完成工作。

sentences.en: This developed country greatly contributes to the peace and stability of the world.
sentences.cn: 已開發國家對世界和平和穩定作出了巨大的貢獻。

sentences.en: The visitors squatted down to warm themselves by the fire.
sentences.cn: 遊客們為了烤火取暖全都蹲了下來。

sentences.en: This vast demonstration was squashed by the government.
sentences.cn: 政府鎮壓了這場聲勢浩蕩的示威活動。

sentences.en: This fair competition will spur the team to be more positive.
sentences.cn: 這種公平競爭將會使團隊更加積極向上。

sentences.en: The little girl started to sprout up when she was 15 years old.
sentences.cn: 這個小女孩十五歲的時候才開始發育。

sentences.en: No matter what you do, you are forbidden to sprinkle salt on railroad tracks.
sentences.cn: 不管你做什麼，你都不准在鐵路軌道上撒鹽。

sentences.en: My mother exhorted me to take an umbrella with me for fear that it will sprinkle.
sentences.cn: 媽媽叮囑我出門帶把傘，以防下雨。

sentences.en: His foot was heavily bandaged as if he had sprained his ankle.
sentences.cn: 他的腳被厚厚地包紮著，彷彿他扭傷了腳踝。

sentences.en: His sportsmanship encourages us to never give up.
sentences.cn: 他的體育精神鼓勵我們永不放棄。

sentences.en: He spoilt the farewell performance because he was too nervous.
sentences.cn: 因為過度緊張，他搞砸了這個告別演出。

sentences.en: The lake was so full of water that water splashed on my face as I waded across.
sentences.cn: 這個湖裡的水太深了，我淌過去的時候濺我一臉水。

sentences.en: Along with the development of science and technology, our spiritual civilization cannot be ignored.
sentences.cn: 隨著科技的發展，也不能忽視人們的精神文明建設。

sentences.en: Synthetic diamonds are several times cheaper than natural diamonds.
sentences.cn: 人造鑽石比天然鑽石便宜好幾倍。

sentences.en: Most synthetic fibers can not be degraded in nature like natural fibers can.
sentences.cn: 大部分合成纖維不能像天然纖維一樣在自然界降解。

sentences.en: People usually see fox as a synonym for cunning.
sentences.cn: 人們通常認為狐狸是狡猾的代名詞。

sentences.en: A sore throat is one symptom of a cold.
sentences.cn: 喉嚨痛是感冒的一大症狀。

sentences.en: Strangely, there were not any symptoms before he was diagnosed with a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他在被確診患了心臟病之前沒有任何徵兆。

sentences.en: I can't agree with the statement that a person with a strong mind does not need any sympathy.
sentences.cn: 我並不贊同內心強大的人不需要任何人的同情這樣的說法。

sentences.en: She has made it clear that she has no sympathy toward his views.
sentences.cn: 她已經明確表示不會支持他的觀點。

sentences.en: The dog ate too much, and that made its stomach swell.
sentences.cn: 這只狗吃的太多，肚子脹得鼓鼓的。

sentences.en: Whether a country's soft power can be swelled to a large extent depends on its economic strength.
sentences.cn: 一個國家的軟實力能否增強在很大程度上取決於它的經濟實力。

sentences.en: There is a belief that fat people are more likely to sweat than thin people.
sentences.cn: 有這樣一個說法，胖的人比瘦的人更容易出汗。

sentences.en: Jim came back after playing outside, dripping with sweat.
sentences.cn: 吉姆在外面玩回家後，滿頭大汗。

sentences.en: The river williows swayed gently with the breeze.
sentences.cn: 河邊的楊柳枝隨著微風輕輕搖擺。

sentences.en: The manager of the company put forward a stronger statement to try to sway her mind.
sentences.cn: 公司的經理提出更大的理由企圖左右她的想法。

sentences.en: The swarm of people turned a blind eye to the little girl's suffering.
sentences.cn: 這群人都對小女孩的遭遇視而不見。

sentences.en: The government is trying to make the city a place that will be swarmed with tourists.
sentences.cn: 政府試圖把該市打造成一個充滿觀光客的地方。

sentences.en: She said that it was love that sustained her to get through the most difficult four years of her life.
sentences.cn: 她說是愛支撐著她度過了人生中最艱難的四年。

sentences.en: In order to protect his wife from being hit by a rock, he sustained a back injury.
sentences.cn: 為了保護妻子不被石頭砸到，他的背部受了傷。

sentences.en: If you see any suspicious person, inform us as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 如果發現有任何可疑的人，請儘快通知我們。

sentences.en: Since when has he been depressed and been suspicious about his wife's behavior?
sentences.cn: 他從何時得了憂鬱症並總是猜疑妻子的行為？

sentences.en: As a surveyor, he admits that his work is boring.
sentences.cn: 作為一名測量員，他承認他的工作很枯燥。

sentences.en: It's not clear where he found the so-called senior surveyor.
sentences.cn: 不知道他從哪裡找來的所謂的高級鑒定員。

sentences.en: The riot was quickly suppressed by the armed police soldiers.
sentences.cn: 武裝警察迅速鎮壓了這場暴動。

sentences.en: He couldn't suppress his feelings any more and expressed his feelings to her.
sentences.cn: 他再也壓抑不住自己的情感了，所以向她表白了。

sentences.en: At present, radio therapy may be one of the most effective methods to suppress cancer cell growth.
sentences.cn: 放射治療可能是目前阻止癌細胞擴散的最有效的方法之一。

sentences.en: I heard that some schools have installed cameras in their classrooms to supervise students.
sentences.cn: 我聽說有些學校在教室裡安裝了攝影機監督學生。

sentences.en: One of her jobs is to help her master to supervise his house.
sentences.cn: 她的工作之一就是幫主人管理他房子。

sentences.en: The judge would have not sentenced him without sufficient evidence.
sentences.cn: 沒有充分的證據，法官是不會判刑他。

sentences.en: She hasn't saved sufficient money to buy the gift she likes.
sentences.cn: 她還沒有攢夠足夠的錢去買她喜歡的禮物。

sentences.en: Suffice it to say, your temper is too bad.
sentences.cn: 我只想說，你的脾氣太壞了。

sentences.en: If your company doesn't suffice, we will consider copperating with others.
sentences.cn: 如果貴公司不能使我們滿足，我們會考慮與其他公司合作。

sentences.en: The family's new successor has been revealed.
sentences.cn: 這個家族的新繼承人已經揭露了。

sentences.en: She met three acquaintances in succession when she was abroad.
sentences.cn: 她在異國他鄉接連碰到三個熟人。

sentences.en: His succession as the mayor has caused a lot of controversy in the city.
sentences.cn: 他繼任市長在全市引起了不少爭議。

sentences.en: Those really rich men are not likely to suffer substantial losses in economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 那些真正富有的人是不會在經濟危機中損失慘重的。

sentences.en: A substantial number of citizens demanded the government to stop the land development.
sentences.cn: 大量的市民要求政府停止土地開發。

sentences.en: When there is a fire, cover your mouth and nose to avoid breathing in toxic substances.
sentences.cn: 發生火災時，掩住口鼻，避免吸入有毒物質。

sentences.en: There is no substance in these data, and they can't be published.
sentences.cn: 這些資料沒有證據支撐，不能發表。

sentences.en: A series of subsequent experiments fully proved our hypothesis to be correct.
sentences.cn: 隨後的一系列實驗充分證明了我們的假設是正確的。

sentences.en: In order to cultivate his children's reading ability, the father subscribed to the children’s newspaper.
sentences.cn: 為了培養孩子的閱讀能力，爸爸訂閱了兒童報紙。

sentences.en: I subscribe to nature’s survival of the fittest rule.
sentences.cn: 我贊同大自然的優勝劣敗法則。

sentences.en: A man who is sturdy is more attractive than a weaker man.
sentences.cn: 一個擁有健壯體魄的男人比一個虛弱的男人有魅力的多。

sentences.en: It's natural for a child who has just learned to walk to stumble.
sentences.cn: 對於一個剛學會走路的孩子來說，跌倒是很自然的事情。

sentences.en: If I were to see him tomorrow, I would stumble.
sentences.cn: 如果我明天能見到他，我會結巴。

sentences.en: She wishes she were not so stuffy.
sentences.cn: 她希望自己不要這麼古板就好了。

sentences.en: The last century in general was relatively stuffy.
sentences.cn: 上個世紀總體來說還是比較古板乏味的。

sentences.en: The city is trying to rectify its structural unemployment.
sentences.cn: 該市正在大力整頓結構性失業。

sentences.en: The old couple always enjoy going to the beach for a stroll in the evening.
sentences.cn: 這對年老的夫婦總是喜歡在傍晚的時候去海灘散步。

sentences.en: On the weekend, she strolled through the supermarket with her mother.
sentences.cn: 週末，她和媽媽在超市閒逛。

sentences.en: Some African countries are striving to eliminate poverty.
sentences.cn: 一些非洲國家正在為擺脫貧困而努力。

sentences.en: The root cause of the ethnic strife is inequality.
sentences.cn: 民族間衝突的根源是不平等。

sentences.en: The two political parties have a fierce strife.
sentences.cn: 這兩個黨派鬥爭的很激烈。

sentences.en: From far away, Jimmy saw someone driving towards him with a cart of straw.
sentences.cn: 吉米遠遠地看見有人拉著一車稻草向他駛來。

sentences.en: He asked Tedy to take some of the drier straw to replace these wet wood.
sentences.cn: 他讓泰迪去拿一些比較乾的麥稈代替這些濕的柴火。

sentences.en: Do you have any other straws available?
sentences.cn: 你們還有其它的吸管可用嗎？

sentences.en: He is on trial at present because of a hit-and-run accident.
sentences.cn: 他因為肇事逃逸現在正在接受審訊。

sentences.en: Scientists studied the unknown theory and managed to validate it via trial and error.
sentences.cn: 科學家們經過反復試驗研究這一未知的理論，並最終成功了。

sentences.en: The commander gave orders to fortify the trenches to defend against the enemies.
sentences.cn: 指揮官下令加固戰壕抵禦外敵。

sentences.en: Senior citizens have obtained tremendous benefits as a result of this favorable policy.
sentences.cn: 銀髮族從這項有利的政策中受益頗豐。

sentences.en: If I were you, I would be trembling with fear.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你的話，肯定會嚇得膽顫心驚。

sentences.en: It seems that she can do nothing but have a transplant operation next week.
sentences.cn: 看起來她除了一星期以後接受移植手術，就沒有別的辦法了。

sentences.en: The young generation are obligated to transmit the revolutionary tradition.
sentences.cn: 年輕一代有義務發揚革命傳統。

sentences.en: Military life has completely transformed him.
sentences.cn: 軍隊生活完全改變了他。

sentences.en: He was reproached abusively by the citizens because they regarded him as a traitor.
sentences.cn: 他遭到了國民的痛罵，因為人們一直認為他是個叛徒。

sentences.en: Her enthusiasm about this career has trailed off.
sentences.cn: 她對這項事業的熱情漸漸消失。

sentences.en: The hunter followed the trail of the wolf and found its lair.
sentences.cn: 獵人順著足跡找到了狼窩。

sentences.en: In addition to tractors, farmers usually utilize combine harvesters in their fields.
sentences.cn: 除了拖拉機，農民有時候在田地裡用到聯合收割機。

sentences.en: Please give my a car a tow because my car has stalled.
sentences.cn: 我的車熄火了，請你用你的車幫我拖一下吧。

sentences.en: Toss me a can of soda, won't you?
sentences.cn: 把一罐汽水拋給我，好嗎？

sentences.en: One ton of sand out of every three will be transported to East Asia.
sentences.cn: 每三噸沙子中就有一噸要運往東亞地區。

sentences.en: The solider was asked to count the death toll of the war and give a report.
sentences.cn: 這位士兵被要求統計在這次戰爭中的死亡人數，並彙報上來。

sentences.en: All vehicles passing through are toll-free during holidays.
sentences.cn: 在假期期間，所有的車輛通行都是免費的。

sentences.en: As she was from an aristocratic family, of the people at the table she found the coarse manners least tolerable.
sentences.cn: 她出身於貴族家庭，在她看來，她最不能容忍的就是餐桌上粗魯無禮的舉止。

sentences.en: This token cannot buy anything except beverages.
sentences.cn: 這種代幣不能買除飲料以外的其它東西。

sentences.en: Red roses are usually considered tokens of love.
sentences.cn: 紅玫瑰通常被認為是愛情的象徵。

sentences.en: We toiled over a month but were paid so little.
sentences.cn: 我們辛辛苦苦地工作了一個月，報酬卻很少。

sentences.en: After five months of toiling, he finally finished the design part of the project.
sentences.cn: 辛苦工作五個月，他終於完成了該專案的設計部分。

sentences.en: Tin is a metallic element with a slightly blue color.
sentences.cn: 錫是一種略帶藍色的金屬元素。

sentences.en: When she got home, she remembered she had forgotten to buy a tin of fruit.
sentences.cn: 她到家才想起來忘記買水果罐頭了。

sentences.en: Everyone thought he couldn't be the killer because he was too timid.
sentences.cn: 所有人都認為他不可能是殺人兇手，因為他太膽小了。

sentences.en: She is a timid girl that, once someone calls her name, she blushes.
sentences.cn: 她是一個羞怯的女孩，別人一叫她的名字，她就臉紅。

sentences.en: I remember when I was young my father always tickled my feet.
sentences.cn: 我記得小時候爸爸總是騷癢我的腳。

sentences.en: The news that my son was admitted to a major university really tickled me pink.
sentences.cn: 兒子被重點大學錄取的消息真使我高興。

sentences.en: Her mother taught her that it was wrong to thrash small animals with a stick.
sentences.cn: 她媽媽教育她用棍子打小動物是不對的。

sentences.en: Tyson thrashed his opponent with the final blow.
sentences.cn: 泰森的最後一擊徹底擊敗了對手。

sentences.en: Be careful not to get stung by the thorns on the branches.
sentences.cn: 小心不要被樹枝上的刺紮到。

sentences.en: Which pattern would she like to tattoo on her thigh?
sentences.cn: 她想在大腿上紋哪一個圖案？

sentences.en: The territory of any country is not to be violated.
sentences.cn: 任何國家的領土都是不容侵犯的。

sentences.en: Literary issues are very much Harry's territory, and I am responsible for legal issues.
sentences.cn: 文學方面的問題是哈利負責的，我負責法律方面的問題。

sentences.en: The terminal station is coming soon, and the train attendant reminds the passengers to take their luggage with them.
sentences.cn: 列車的終點就要到了，乘務員提醒乘客帶好行李。

sentences.en: The old man's illness is terminal, so he has decided to give up treatment.
sentences.cn: 老人的病已到末期，所以他決定放棄治療。

sentences.en: She intends to work as a teller at a bank after graduation.
sentences.cn: 她打算畢業後在銀行裡當出納員。

sentences.en: The teller has submitted the voting results to the chairman of the general assembly.
sentences.cn: 計票員已經把投票結構提交給了大會主席。

sentences.en: The road was covered in a layer of tar.
sentences.cn: 馬路上被塗了一層瀝青。

sentences.en: Mr. Jobs deeply impressed people with his tact and humour.
sentences.cn: 賈伯斯先生的機敏幽默給人們留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: His teacher said that tact was never his strength in the ways of the world.
sentences.cn: 他的老師說他在人情世故方面還不夠老練。

sentences.en: The teacher hopes that each student can master the knowledge of systematic grammar by the end of the semester.
sentences.cn: 老師希望每個學生在學期結束的時候都可以掌握系統的語法知識。

sentences.en: Young people prefer to buy tickets via the utilization of the Internet.
sentences.cn: 年輕人更喜歡利用網路購票。

sentences.en: Kate loves the utility of a scooter when riding in the city.
sentences.cn: 凱特在城市裡喜歡騎摩托車。

sentences.en: Agricultural experts have concluded that the soil here is not suitable for planting unusual plants.
sentences.cn: 農業專家斷定這裡的土壤不適合種植獨特的植物。

sentences.en: The master is famous for his unusual design style.
sentences.cn: 這位大師就是因為其獨特的設計風格而聞名天下的。

sentences.en: The heavy rain has caused the machine to be unusable.
sentences.cn: 暴雨導致機械無法使用。

sentences.en: She wore a pair of jeans that were unsuitable for the party.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一條完全不適合參加宴會的牛仔褲。

sentences.en: In some unstable regions in the world, peace is most sought after.
sentences.cn: 對於世界上一些不穩定的地區來說，他們那裡最想擁有的就是和平。

sentences.en: He became involved in an unpleasant affair which intensified the conflict between them.
sentences.cn: 他捲入了一場不愉快的事件，這件事也激化了他們之間的矛盾。

sentences.en: Starting with an unpaid internship, he became rich and prosperous step by step.
sentences.cn: 他也是從沒有酬勞的實習生開始，一步步發達致富的。

sentences.en: It is unnecessary for him to apologize to his roommate for being late to class.
sentences.cn: 他沒有必要因為上課遲到向室友道歉。

sentences.en: Beautiful women after undergone plastic surgery are uniform in appearance.
sentences.cn: 那些做過整形手術的美女外表都是一樣的。

sentences.en: He looks so cute in his uniform.
sentences.cn: 他穿著制服看起來超級帥。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I was the only one not aware of that situation.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，我是唯一一個不知道的那件事情的人。

sentences.en: That our boss consented to our request was quite unexpected.
sentences.cn: 出人意料的是，老闆竟然答應了我們的請求。

sentences.en: She suffers from unemployment as if the world is going to come to an end.
sentences.cn: 她失業了，就感覺好像世界走向末日一樣。

sentences.en: The teacher asks students to underline the second paragraph of the text and fluently recite it.
sentences.cn: 老師要求學生把文章第二段劃下來，並熟練背誦。

sentences.en: Its significance cannot be too underlined.
sentences.cn: 它的重要性再怎麼強調也不為過。

sentences.en: The actress will undergo plastic surgery to get rid of the scars on her back.
sentences.cn: 這個女演員為了去除她背上的傷疤，將會接受外形整容手術。

sentences.en: The athlete lay unconscious in the quagmire.
sentences.cn: 這個運動員失去知覺，躺在泥潭裡。

sentences.en: Almost everyone is afraid of the uncertainty of the unknown.
sentences.cn: 幾乎每個人都害怕未知事物的不確定性。

sentences.en: That monarch was a tyrant who, in the end, was overthrown by his people.
sentences.cn: 那個君主是一個暴君，最終被國民推翻了。

sentences.en: There is a saying that tyranny is fiercer than a tiger.
sentences.cn: 有句諺語說，苛政猛於虎。

sentences.en: As we all know, many birds use twigs to build their nests.
sentences.cn: 正如我們所知的，很多鳥兒會用樹枝來築巢。

sentences.en: He sent his girlfriend a bunch of tulips as a birthday present.
sentences.cn: 他送給他女朋友一束鬱金香作為生日禮物。

sentences.en: The little boy dropped out of school at an early age because he was unable to pay the tuition.
sentences.cn: 因為交不起學費，這個小男孩很小的時候就輟學了。

sentences.en: He tucked his white shirt inside his trousers to work more easily.
sentences.cn: 他為了工作方便，把白襯衫塞進褲子裡面。

sentences.en: In order to save space, he crammed all of the toiletries into the little trunk.
sentences.cn: 為了節省空間，他把所有的洗漱用品都塞進這個小箱子了。

sentences.en: For some foreigners, Chinese is troublesome to learn.
sentences.cn: 對於一些外國人來說，中文很難讀。

sentences.en: As the boss left the meeting room he was surrounded by a troop of journalists.
sentences.cn: 這個老闆從會議室走出來，被一群記者圍住了。

sentences.en: I need a trolley to carry all of the stuff I bought at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 在超市裡，我需要一輛手推車來放我買的所有東西。

sentences.en: He is very bad-tempered and often becomes enraged over trifles.
sentences.cn: 他脾氣很不好，常為了一點小事兒發脾氣。

sentences.en: Sweat trickled down his cheek after a hard day at work.
sentences.cn: 經歷了一天的勞累，汗水從他臉頰流了下來。

sentences.en: As far as I know, he doesn't intend to yield to anyone.
sentences.cn: 就我所知，他不打算向任何人屈服。

sentences.en: The crop yield has increased a lot due to the abundant rainfall.
sentences.cn: 由於雨量充沛，今年的農作物產量增加了不少。

sentences.en: I don't yearn for chocolate at all. Please, take it away.
sentences.cn: 我一點也不想吃巧克力，請把它拿走吧。

sentences.en: I believe that the tigers in the zoo yearn greatly for free lives in the forest.
sentences.cn: 我相信動物園裡的老虎非常嚮往森林裡的自由自在的生活。

sentences.en: Even after she turned 60 years old, there were few wrinkles on her face.
sentences.cn: 即使過了六十歲，她的臉上也不見幾條皺紋。

sentences.en: The lower right corner of the paper has wrinkled.
sentences.cn: 這張紙的右下角起褶皺了。

sentences.en: She had to find someone to help her wring the sheets out.
sentences.cn: 她要找人幫她把洗好的床單擰乾。

sentences.en: He wrung a 2% profit out of the supplier.
sentences.cn: 他想方設法從供應商那裡得到了百分之二的利潤。

sentences.en: The baby put the candy into her mouth without taking off the wrapper.
sentences.cn: 小嬰兒沒有把糖紙撕掉就把糖果放進嘴裡了。

sentences.en: Julie is fond of putting beautiful wrappers over new books.
sentences.cn: 茱莉喜歡給新書包漂亮的書套。

sentences.en: Zootopia is a movie that is very worthwhile watching.
sentences.cn: 《動物方程式》是一部相當值得觀看的電影。

sentences.en: Someone once investigated the number of people who worship Jesus.
sentences.cn: 曾有人對崇拜耶穌的人的數量做過調查。

sentences.en: Her worship of the star has reached a point of madness.
sentences.cn: 她對這位明星的崇拜已經達到了瘋狂的地步。

sentences.en: Whether the plan will be workable or not still needs a comprehensive consideration of the public's opinion.
sentences.cn: 該計畫是否可行還需要綜合考慮市民的想法。

sentences.en: The geological experts have spent two years searching for a workable tin mine.
sentences.cn: 地質學家花費兩年尋找可開採的錫礦。

sentences.en: She always tells others about her woes so that no one wants to be close to her.
sentences.cn: 她總是向別人訴說她的悲痛，以致於沒人願意靠近她。

sentences.en: He is a witty and humorous person and is surrounded by a lot of beautiful women.
sentences.cn: 他是一個機智幽默的人，身邊總是圍繞著很多的美女。

sentences.en: He is suing his old company because they withheld his salary from him.
sentences.cn: 他對前東家提告因為他們扣押他的薪水。

sentences.en: She couldn't withhold her grief.
sentences.cn: 她抑制不住悲傷。

sentences.en: The wireless radio has a variety of applications, including wireless data networks, and all kinds of mobile communications.
sentences.cn: 無線電有著多種應用形式，包括無線資料網，各種行動通信。

sentences.en: In order to prevent widespread avian influenza, these patients need to be separated from the others.
sentences.cn: 為了防止廣泛傳播的禽流感，需要把患者與其他人隔離開。

sentences.en: When others speak, it is not polite to speak in whispers.
sentences.cn: 別人演講的時候，你在竊竊私語是不禮貌的。

sentences.en: He whispered that he found a thief.
sentences.cn: 他小聲說他發現了一個竊賊。

sentences.en: The mother told her daughter that the leaves were whispering as if they were singing.
sentences.cn: 媽媽告訴女兒，樹葉沙沙作響好像在唱歌。

sentences.en: The trainer said he never whipped the horse.
sentences.cn: 訓練員說他從不鞭打馬。

sentences.en: The enemy threatened him with a whip.
sentences.cn: 敵人用鞭子威脅他。

sentences.en: She hurried to the wharf to meet him.
sentences.cn: 她匆忙趕到碼頭和他會合。

sentences.en: With the decrease in the number of whales, the prospects of the whaling industry are slim.
sentences.cn: 隨著鯨魚數量的減少，捕鯨業的前景渺茫。

sentences.en: The closure of the factory resulted in a large number of unemployed weavers.
sentences.cn: 工廠倒閉導致大量織工失業。

sentences.en: The weary young men and women like to relax at the bar after work.
sentences.cn: 疲倦的年輕男女喜歡下班後到酒吧裡放鬆一下。

sentences.en: The newborn puppy has a pair of watery eyes.
sentences.cn: 剛出生的小狗有一雙水汪汪的眼睛。

sentences.en: Men usually don't like to drink watery beer.
sentences.cn: 男人通常都不喜歡喝味道很淡的啤酒。

sentences.en: Countries in the Middle East have often been at warfare with one another because of resources.
sentences.cn: 中東地區的國家經常因為資源而發生戰爭。

sentences.en: The relief supplies from the warehouse have been shipped out.
sentences.cn: 倉庫裡的救災物資已經運送出去了。

sentences.en: The earliest bronze ware appeared in Babylon in the Mesopotamian area 6,000 years ago.
sentences.cn: 最早的青銅器出現於六千年前的古巴比倫兩河流域。

sentences.en: They are absolutely unwilling to sell their wares at a half price.
sentences.cn: 他們絕不可能半價出售這些貨品。

sentences.en: The walnut originated in Europe and Asia.
sentences.cn: 胡桃原產自歐洲和亞洲。

sentences.en: Mark is worried that the gas in the wagon is insufficient to drive to the destination.
sentences.cn: 馬克擔心車裡的汽油不足以驅動汽車到目的地。

sentences.en: Her every utterance is worth considering.
sentences.cn: 她的每一句話都值得推敲。

sentences.en: Try to make your utterances clear.
sentences.cn: 儘量使你的表達清楚。

sentences.en: He didn't utter a word at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他在會議上沒有說一個字。

sentences.en: What do you mean with this utter nonsense?
sentences.cn: 你說這些純粹的廢話是什麼意思？

sentences.en: What is of utmost urgency is to find those missing people.
sentences.cn: 當務之急是要找到那些失蹤人員。

sentences.en: We can offer you a discount to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 我們可以在最大限度上給你們提供優惠。

sentences.en: She utilized the small amount of cloth to make a toy doll.
sentences.cn: 她利用有限的布料做了一個布偶玩具。

sentences.en: The poor worker lost his job and then led an aimless life.
sentences.cn: 那位可憐的工人失去了工作，過著毫無目標的生活。

sentences.en: Modern agricultural development should be attributed to scientific technology.
sentences.cn: 現代農業的發展應該歸功於科技。

sentences.en: Before he was taken to the hospital, he lay in agony there.
sentences.cn: 被送往醫院之前，他很痛苦地躺在那裡。

sentences.en: People were worried about air aggressions every day during World War II.
sentences.cn: 二戰時期，人們每天都在擔心空襲。

sentences.en: Sorry, I am afraid you can't aggregate the receipts in return for our prizes.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉，恐怕您不能累計發票來換取我們的獎品。

sentences.en: Sadly, the well-known baseball team lost 3-2 on aggregate in the last game last week.
sentences.cn: 令人痛心的是，這支很有名的棒球隊在上週最後一場比賽中以三比二的總比分輸掉了比賽。

sentences.en: A shortage of funds will aggravate the situation.
sentences.cn: 資金短缺會使情況惡化。

sentences.en: Keep the boat afloat, or it will sink.
sentences.cn: 讓船保持漂浮，否則它會下沉的。

sentences.en: If I'm not mistaken, that chemistry professor was held in great affection.
sentences.cn: 如果我沒有記錯，那位化學教授很受愛戴。

sentences.en: Her major adversary in getting the manager position is Jane.
sentences.cn: 跟她競爭經理職位的最大對手是珍。

sentences.en: Can a prepositional phrase be adverbial?
sentences.cn: 介系詞片語可以作副詞用嗎？

sentences.en: What is the craziest thing you did in your adolescence?
sentences.cn: 你在青春期做過的最瘋狂的事情是什麼？

sentences.en: She was lucky to gain admission to the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 她很幸運地獲准進入這個實驗室。

sentences.en: Your resignation will be regarded as an admission of failure.
sentences.cn: 你的辭呈也許會被視為承認失敗。

sentences.en: This might be the best solution to the administrative problem.
sentences.cn: 這也許是解決行政問題的最佳方法。

sentences.en: It's so surprising that our house adjoins the governor’s.
sentences.cn: 我們的房子竟然緊鄰著州長的房子，真是太驚訝了。

sentences.en: Someone seems to be crying in the adjacent room.
sentences.cn: 鄰近的房間裡好像有人在哭。

sentences.en: She is very adept at unearthing people's talents.
sentences.cn: 她十分擅於發掘人們的才能。

sentences.en: Only the adepts can discern the truth.
sentences.cn: 只有真正的內行可以辨別真偽。

sentences.en: There has been bitter controversy over the chemical additives in food.
sentences.cn: 食品中的化學添加劑引起了劇烈的爭議。

sentences.en: I didn't acquaint her with the truth of the case although she may have already known it.
sentences.cn: 我沒有把事情的真相告訴她，儘管她可能已經知道了。

sentences.en: The judge ruled the accusation had no basis.
sentences.cn: 法官判定這項控告沒有依據。

sentences.en: Success in any field can not be separated from the accumulation of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 任何領域的成功都離不開知識的積累。

sentences.en: She has made up her mind to apply for the vacancy in the accounting firm.
sentences.cn: 她已經決定申請那家會計公司的空缺職位。

sentences.en: As you know, all of us must act in accordance with the law.
sentences.cn: 你知道的，我們所有人都要依法行事。

sentences.en: I think it's time you celebrate the accomplishment of your objectives.
sentences.cn: 我想，是時候慶祝你大功告成了。

sentences.en: The company has promised to provide accommodations for all new employees.
sentences.cn: 該公司已經承諾會向所有新員工提供住宿。

sentences.en: Do you know where I can buy the accessories for cars?
sentences.cn: 你知道我在哪裡可以買到汽車配件嗎？

sentences.en: Although he was just an accessory to the crime, he was sentenced to 5 years in prison.
sentences.cn: 雖然他只是共犯，但是也被判了五年的有期徒刑。

sentences.en: The system is accessible only to researchers.
sentences.cn: 只有研究人員可以使用這套系統。

sentences.en: He is presently acceding to the position of headmaster.
sentences.cn: 他目前擔任校長的職位。

sentences.en: Why can't you accede to our plan to have fun on the weekend?
sentences.cn: 為什麼你不同意我們週末去玩的計畫？

sentences.en: The academic meeting next month will be held on schedule.
sentences.cn: 下個月的學術會議將會如期舉行。

sentences.en: Who on earth is responsible for this absurdity?
sentences.cn: 到底是誰散發了這個謬論？

sentences.en: Farmers get water abstraction from rivers.
sentences.cn: 農民從河流中抽水。

sentences.en: Few people can understand where the painting's abstraction is.
sentences.cn: 幾乎沒有人能夠理解這幅畫的抽象所在。

sentences.en: This arch has made a great contribution to the local tourism industry.
sentences.cn: 這道拱門為當地的旅遊業做出巨大貢獻。

sentences.en: His high aptitude for learning foreign languages is admirable.
sentences.cn: 他學習外語的高天資真是令人羡慕。

sentences.en: The best part of the article lies in this apt metaphor.
sentences.cn: 這篇文章最恰當的地方就在於這個恰當的隱喻。

sentences.en: She is always apt to protect those who are younger than her.
sentences.cn: 她總是傾向於保護那些比她年紀小的人。

sentences.en: How long have you been an apprentice?
sentences.cn: 你當學徒多久了？

sentences.en: Hector was apprenticed to a master of calligraphy when he was ten.
sentences.cn: 海克特十歲的時候拜了一個書法大師做學徒。

sentences.en: Electrical appliances only began to become popular in the twenty-first century.
sentences.cn: 電器用品在二十一世紀才開始流行起來。

sentences.en: As soon as I think of that scene, I don't have an appetite.
sentences.cn: 只要一想起那個場景，我就沒有胃口了。

sentences.en: This experiment lacks the most important apparatus.
sentences.cn: 這一實驗缺少最重要的儀器。

sentences.en: “Big” is the antonym of “small”.
sentences.cn: 「大」是「小」的反義詞。

sentences.en: The auction house specializes in antique furniture.
sentences.cn: 這家拍賣行專門從事古董傢俱的交易。

sentences.en: Elder people are not the only ones who are more likely to rely on their experience to identify those antiques.
sentences.cn: 並不是只有年長者才會憑藉經驗鑑定那些古玩。

sentences.en: This rotation needs to be anticlockwise.
sentences.cn: 這旋轉必須是逆時針的。

sentences.en: He intends to study anthropology in depth.
sentences.cn: 他打算深入研究人類學。

sentences.en: This company was not well managed and was in the end annexed by another company.
sentences.cn: 這家公司經營不善，最後被另一家公司兼併了。

sentences.en: The master's last brush stroke animated the painting.
sentences.cn: 大師的最後一筆使得這幅畫變得栩栩如生。

sentences.en: Many people don’t understand what animate material is.
sentences.cn: 很多人不明白什麼是有生命的物質。

sentences.en: The history teacher always tells some interesting anecdotes in class.
sentences.cn: 這位歷史老師總是在課堂上講一些有趣的軼事。

sentences.en: The hammock is firmly anchored in the trees.
sentences.cn: 吊床牢牢地固定在樹上。

sentences.en: Check the anchor carefully before setting out in your boat.
sentences.cn: 開船之前仔細檢查一下船錨。

sentences.en: He has an analytical mind and a sense of humor.
sentences.cn: 他善於分析，還有幽默感。

sentences.en: I was asked to point out the analogy between the two matters.
sentences.cn: 我被要求指出這兩件事的相似之處。

sentences.en: You can draw your conclusion through an analogy.
sentences.cn: 你可以通過類推得出結論。

sentences.en: To amend the constitution is a serious matter.
sentences.cn: 修訂憲法是一件重中之重的大事。

sentences.en: The expression here in the article is ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 文章這處的表達有歧義。

sentences.en: The new ambassador of the United Nations called for environmental protection throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 新上任的聯合國大使呼籲全世界保護環境。

sentences.en: Please make sure to check if you have altitude sickness before you fly on a plane.
sentences.cn: 乘飛機前請確認你是否有高山症。

sentences.en: What is most likely to make people sick is when hot days alternate with cold days.
sentences.cn: 冷熱交替最容易使人生病。

sentences.en: She bought a dress with alternate red and white patterns.
sentences.cn: 她買了一件有紅白兩色圖案的洋裝。

sentences.en: What she needs most is a close ally.
sentences.cn: 她最需要的是一位親密的同盟。

sentences.en: The prime minister doesn't agree to ally with any other countries.
sentences.cn: 首相不同意與任何國家結盟。

sentences.en: The task is so large that it needs to be allotted to another five people.
sentences.cn: 任務量如此之大，需要多分攤給五個人做。

sentences.en: How to effectively allocate these resources is none of our business.
sentences.cn: 如何有效地分配這些資源不關我們的事。

sentences.en: The alliance of the two nations did not attract very much attention across the world.
sentences.cn: 這兩個國家的聯盟並沒有在世界上引起過多關注。

sentences.en: People who are allergic to pollen should stay away from gardens.
sentences.cn: 對花粉過敏的人應該遠離花園。

sentences.en: He is quite alert to his surroundings.
sentences.cn: 他對四周的動靜非常警覺。

sentences.en: The President ordered the army to be alert.
sentences.cn: 總統命令軍隊警戒起來。

sentences.en: He was continuously vomiting because he drank a lot of ale.
sentences.cn: 因為喝了很多濃啤酒讓他嘔吐不止。

sentences.en: When the fire broke out, the aisle was full of a pungent smell.
sentences.cn: 火災發生時，通道裡充滿了刺鼻的味道。

sentences.en: This barbaric custom still prevails in some primitive areas.
sentences.cn: 這種野蠻的習俗仍然流行於一些原始地區。

sentences.en: The company might go bankrupt unless you take immediate measures.
sentences.cn: 除非你立即採取措施，不然，這家公司可能會破產。

sentences.en: I guess there's a problem with the axle.
sentences.cn: 我猜是車軸出現了問題。

sentences.en: Don't regard him with awe.
sentences.cn: 不要敬畏他。

sentences.en: They were awed by his serious expression.
sentences.cn: 他嚴肅的表情嚇到了他們。

sentences.en: Both the aviation and manufacturing industry have been developing very rapidly in recent years.
sentences.cn: 航空業和製造業近幾年發展得非常迅速。

sentences.en: He availed to escape down the narrow alley.
sentences.cn: 他成功地從這個狹窄的巷子裡逃離。

sentences.en: Mother said that the cooker I bought was of no avail.
sentences.cn: 媽媽說我買的廚具一點兒用處都沒有。

sentences.en: The hospital has a new batch of medical auxiliaries.
sentences.cn: 醫院新進了一批醫療輔助設備。

sentences.en: Teachers sometimes just have an auxiliary role for students.
sentences.cn: 老師對學生來說有時候只是輔助者的角色。

sentences.en: Autonomy is the most important right in a country.
sentences.cn: 自治權是一個國家最重要的權利。

sentences.en: Our country has started automation thanks to the development of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 科技的發展使得我國開始自動化。

sentences.en: He seems to have been working on his autobiography all night.
sentences.cn: 看來他花了一整晚的時間寫自傳。

sentences.en: Do you think the new manager is a person of authority?
sentences.cn: 你認為新任經理是個有權威的人嗎？

sentences.en: The auction that will be held next month in New York will be a great event.
sentences.cn: 下個月在紐約舉行的拍賣會將會是一大盛舉。

sentences.en: Michael Jackson's used gloves have been auctioned off.
sentences.cn: 麥可傑克森用過的手套已經被拍賣了。

sentences.en: His teacher asserted that he couldn't go to graduate school before he attained his bachelor’s degree.
sentences.cn: 在獲得學士學位之前，他的老師斷言他不可能考上研究所。

sentences.en: I would rather put the atlas where nobody can find it.
sentences.cn: 我寧願把地圖集放在沒人可以找到的地方。

sentences.en: The development of astronomy and the space industry are complementary to each other.
sentences.cn: 天文學的發展和航太事業的發展是相輔相成的。

sentences.en: His performance in the final game astounded everyone in the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他在決賽中的表現震驚了所有的觀眾。

sentences.en: The value of the property will be assessed by the bank before it is mortgaged.
sentences.cn: 房產被抵押之前，銀行要先做資產評估。

sentences.en: Modern women all demand to assert their economic independence.
sentences.cn: 現代女性都要求堅持經濟獨立。

sentences.en: The governor asserted that the measure was meant to protect people's rights.
sentences.cn: 州長聲稱這一措施是為了保護人們的權利。

sentences.en: On Mondays people usually assemble in the office for a meeting.
sentences.cn: 人們通常在星期一聚集在辦公室開會。

sentences.en: The media reported yesterday that a mentally ill person was charged with assault.
sentences.cn: 媒體昨天報導一個患有精神病的人被指控毆打他人。

sentences.en: Have you heard that he assaulted the police last night?
sentences.cn: 你聽說了嗎？他昨晚襲擊警察。

sentences.en: This failure should be ascribed to those who played a smaller part in the team.
sentences.cn: 這次的失敗應該歸因於在團隊裡功能比較小的人。

sentences.en: Ascertaining the truth of the matter is imminent.
sentences.cn: 弄清事情的真相迫在眉睫。

sentences.en: As they ascended toward the mountaintop, they encountered an avalanche.
sentences.cn: 在他們向山頂攀登的時候，遭遇到了雪崩。

sentences.en: Array the books in order.
sentences.cn: 把書排列整齊。

sentences.en: She was hit by an array of facts.
sentences.cn: 她被一連串的事實打擊到了。

sentences.en: We have to arouse them to take up arms to fight against the cunning enemies.
sentences.cn: 我們要喚醒他們拿起武器和狡猾的敵人戰鬥。

sentences.en: The knight was protected from the swords and arrows of the enemy by his armour.
sentences.cn: 騎士的盔甲保護他抵禦敵人的刀劍及飛箭。

sentences.en: No objection has arisen.
sentences.cn: 沒有出現反對。

sentences.en: We must know that perfection arises from practice.
sentences.cn: 我們必須要知道完美源自練習。

sentences.en: That arduous mountain climbing journey is the most valuable memory in my life.
sentences.cn: 那段艱苦的爬山之旅是我生命中最珍貴的回憶。

sentences.en: The arctic aurora is the most magnificent.
sentences.cn: 北極極光是最壯觀的。

sentences.en: Designing a landmark building is the lifelong dream of every architect.
sentences.cn: 設計出一個具有指標性的建築是每一個建築師畢生的夢想。

sentences.en: Working for consecutive nights makes her unable to bear it any more.
sentences.cn: 連續幾個晚上的工作讓她再也受不了了。

sentences.en: The way in which he treats rumours may connote other meanings and you should think carefully.
sentences.cn: 他對待謠言的方式可能隱含其他意思，你要仔細想想。

sentences.en: He was informed that he had been confined to his house.
sentences.cn: 他被通知限制離家。

sentences.en: Living in concord with our neighbors eases our life.
sentences.cn: 與鄰居和睦相處會讓我們的生活輕鬆起來。

sentences.en: It's a shame to concede to an opponent in an international competition.
sentences.cn: 在國際比賽中給對手讓步是一種羞辱。

sentences.en: He refused to concede that he failed.
sentences.cn: 他拒絕承認他的失敗。

sentences.en: Compulsory education has been practiced for some years in our country.
sentences.cn: 義務教育的實行在我國已經有好幾年了。

sentences.en: Few medical lawsuits can be settled by compromise.
sentences.cn: 醫療官司很少能和解。

sentences.en: Her parents don't want to compromise with the school.
sentences.cn: 她的父母不願意向學校妥協。

sentences.en: Boys comprise less than 10% of foreign language learners.
sentences.cn: 外語學習者中男生占了不到百分之十。

sentences.en: Because it contains so many irrelevant details, this book needs to be compressed.
sentences.cn: 這本書裡有太多不相干的細節，需要精簡一下。

sentences.en: He received a large amount of compensation from his job for his workplace injury.
sentences.cn: 他因為工傷獲得了一大筆賠償金。

sentences.en: The doctor concluded that the clot in his brain was the main reason for his amnesia.
sentences.cn: 醫生斷定他腦子中的血塊是他失憶的主要原因。

sentences.en: For athletes, winning an Olympic gold medal would be the climax of their career.
sentences.cn: 對於運動員來說，贏得奧運會金牌是他們事業的巔峰。

sentences.en: Her acting career climaxed two years ago.
sentences.cn: 她的演藝事業兩年前達到了頂峰。

sentences.en: This great writer suffered from chronic bronchitis from his early years.
sentences.cn: 這位偉大的作家早年便患上了慢性支氣管炎。

sentences.en: This exhibition is mainly to show exquisite ceramic works.
sentences.cn: 這次展覽會主要是為了展示精美的陶瓷品。

sentences.en: That investor always takes a very cautious approach.
sentences.cn: 那位投資者總是採取謹慎的措施。

sentences.en: His comments are so caustic that he has offended many people.
sentences.cn: 他的評論過於尖刻，得罪了很多人。

sentences.en: Water is caustic to some substances.
sentences.cn: 水對有些物質是有腐蝕性的。

sentences.en: Except for him, his family all perished in the catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 除了他，他的家人都在這場大災難中喪生了。

sentences.en: There were many casualties in this car crash.
sentences.cn: 此次撞車事故傷亡慘重。

sentences.en: The old carpenter used to work until late at night.
sentences.cn: 那位老木匠過去常常工作到深夜。

sentences.en: She has no idea what the way to the school cafeteria is.
sentences.cn: 她不知道該怎麼去學校的自助餐廳。

sentences.en: It's said that the butcher’s son will be fired because he is too naughty.
sentences.cn: 據說這個肉販的兒子要被開除了，因為他太調皮了。

sentences.en: The rebels butchered the three people in that family.
sentences.cn: 叛軍屠殺了這一家三口。

sentences.en: Only a few people attended his burial.
sentences.cn: 只有幾個人參加了他的葬禮。

sentences.en: Recently, a bureaucratic style has prevailed in the company.
sentences.cn: 近來，公司的官僚主義風氣盛行。

sentences.en: Bureaucracy is not conducive to the government being able to serve the people.
sentences.cn: 官僚主義不利於政府為人民服務。

sentences.en: The papers have been packed in bundles.
sentences.cn: 這些檔案早就打包成捆了。

sentences.en: Bundle all of the stuff on my desk into my bag.
sentences.cn: 把我桌子上的東西都塞進我的包裡。

sentences.en: If you fail in the competition, you will have to accept a brutal punishment.
sentences.cn: 如果你在比賽中失敗，你就要接受殘酷的懲罰。

sentences.en: This brood of chicknes is ten full.
sentences.cn: 這一窩小雞足足有十隻。

sentences.en: We need to check to see if this is a brittle item.
sentences.cn: 我們需要檢查一下這是否是易碎物品。

sentences.en: The pony broke into a brisk trot as soon as it saw its mother.
sentences.cn: 小馬看到牠的媽媽後，快步小跑起來。

sentences.en: Remember to lead your pet by a bridle when you go out.
sentences.cn: 外出的時候記得牽著寵物的繩子。

sentences.en: She bridled herself not to read the news report.
sentences.cn: 她抑制著自己不去看新聞報導。

sentences.en: We need to devastate the enemy's will in one stroke.
sentences.cn: 我們要一舉摧毀敵人的意志。

sentences.en: Edison's great achievements won’t be detracted by such a small issue as him saying some bad words.
sentences.cn: 愛迪生的偉大成就是不能被他曾說髒話這麼一件小事貶低的

sentences.en: He couldn't think of any reason to detain her.
sentences.cn: 他想不出任何可以挽留她的理由。

sentences.en: The mayor has been detained by some trivial matters.
sentences.cn: 市長被一些瑣碎的小事耽擱了。

sentences.en: Do you know what the derivation of this word is?
sentences.cn: 你知道這個單字起源於哪裡嗎？

sentences.en: This is a word of German derivation.
sentences.cn: 這是一個德語的衍生字。

sentences.en: No one has derided the old man who has a handicapped son.
sentences.cn: 沒有人曾經嘲笑這位有一個殘障兒子的老人。

sentences.en: There is no one or no law can deprive us of our freedom.
sentences.cn: 任何人或法律都不能剝奪我們的自由權。

sentences.en: This country's depreciated currency has caused unprecedented economic turmoil.
sentences.cn: 該國的貨幣貶值引起了前所未有的經濟動盪。

sentences.en: He won’t allow anyone to depreciate his ideas.
sentences.cn: 他不允許任何人輕視他的想法。

sentences.en: A lot of details in that book will deprave people who read it.
sentences.cn: 那本書裡有很多細節會使人墮落。

sentences.en: The meeting that was held by national leaders was to denounce terrorism.
sentences.cn: 各國領導人舉行的會議是為了譴責恐怖主義。

sentences.en: She finally decided to use that word to denominate her plan.
sentences.cn: 她最後還是決定以這一個字為她的計畫命名。

sentences.en: Present western democracies have exposed some deep flaws.
sentences.cn: 現行的西方民主暴露出一些深層次的缺陷。

sentences.en: They have a delicate relation and need to be handled with care.
sentences.cn: 他們的關係很微妙，需要小心處理。

sentences.en: He put her birthday present in a delicate package.
sentences.cn: 他把要送她的生日禮物放在一個精美的包裝裡。

sentences.en: She has deliberated over pros and cons and made the decision.
sentences.cn: 她權衡利弊做出了這個決定。

sentences.en: She was deliberate in hitting the ball the wrong way.
sentences.cn: 她是故意用錯誤的方式打球的。

sentences.en: The mean bully made fun of the young boy and degraded him in front of his friends.
sentences.cn: 那個惡霸取笑那位年輕男孩並讓他在朋友前丟臉。

sentences.en: She would rather throw away that pair of tight shoes that feel like they have deformed her feet.
sentences.cn: 她寧願把那雙緊的會讓腳變形的鞋扔掉。

sentences.en: The wind deflected the hat.
sentences.cn: 風吹斜了帽子。

sentences.en: He cannot purchase that new car as his funds are deficient.
sentences.cn: 他的資金不足因此無法購買那輛新車。

sentences.en: Many tourists like to deface buildings as well as to take photos in higher places.
sentences.cn: 許多遊客喜歡在建築物上亂塗亂畫就和喜歡在較高的地方拍照一樣。

sentences.en: Beethoven dedicated his life to creating great symphonies.
sentences.cn: 貝多芬一生都致力於創作偉大的交響曲。

sentences.en: He came back from abroad and found the roads in his hometown decrepit.
sentences.cn: 他從國外回來發現家鄉的道路破舊不堪。

sentences.en: Scientists have explained why plastics do not automatically decompose.
sentences.cn: 科學家已經解釋了為什麼塑膠不會自動分解。

sentences.en: Food is put into a refrigerator to prevent it from decomposing.
sentences.cn: 食物放在冰箱裡是為了防止腐爛。

sentences.en: It's unknown whether the government will issue a declaration.
sentences.cn: 並不知道政府是否會發佈宣言。

sentences.en: Students are debarred from bringing in anything other than their exam materials.
sentences.cn: 這次考試禁止學生帶除了考試用品以外的任何東西。

sentences.en: It's customary to eat roasted turkey at Thanksgiving in America.
sentences.cn: 在美國感恩節吃烤火雞是慣例。

sentences.en: This is the farmer about whom we talked who has cultivated the rarest roses in the world.
sentences.cn: 這位就是我們談論的培育出世界上罕見玫瑰花的農民。

sentences.en: In the end, this controversial treaty was not implemented.
sentences.cn: 這一有爭議的條約最終沒有落實。

sentences.en: Oil spills will contaminate the ocean.
sentences.cn: 石油洩漏會污染海洋。

sentences.en: If you are uncomfortable, consult your doctor at once.
sentences.cn: 如果你不舒服，立刻向醫生諮詢。

sentences.en: She needs to consult with her parents.
sentences.cn: 她需要和父母商量一下。

sentences.en: Women are more likely to be constrained by children and family than men.
sentences.cn: 女性比男性更容易被孩子和家庭束縛。

sentences.en: The two leaders reached a consensus on the issue of environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 兩國領導人就環境保護達成了共識。

sentences.en: Although her acting career was in eclipse, Catherine attended some business activities to maintain her popularity.
sentences.cn: 雖然凱薩琳的演藝生涯已黯然失色，不再名聲大噪，但是她也會去參加一些商演活動來維持自己的人氣。

sentences.en: If only I could be a master of dynamics.
sentences.cn: 我要是能夠精通動力學這門學科就好了。

sentences.en: The two parties finally signed a contract with a duration of three years.
sentences.cn: 雙方最終簽訂了為期三年的合約。

sentences.en: He sat there silently with his eyelids drooping.
sentences.cn: 他靜靜地坐在那，眼皮已經要闔上了。

cn: 沉悶的，令人情緒低落的

sentences.en: In my opinion, this is the less dreary job I have ever done.
sentences.cn: 在我看來，這還是我做過的工作中比較不沉悶的工作。

sentences.en: As the saying goes “Gold cannot be pure and man cannot be perfect”, so it is unwise to dwell on one's drawbacks.
sentences.cn: 正如諺語所說的，「金無足赤，人無完人」，所以盯著別人的缺點不放是非常不明智的。

sentences.en: The demonstration should be suppressed as soon as possible so as to avoid the drastic actions.
sentences.cn: 示威活動要儘快地壓制，避免發生過激的行為。

cn: 戲劇的；戲劇性的，激動人心的

sentences.en: She made up her mind to join the dramatic society.
sentences.cn: 她下定決心加入戲劇協會。

sentences.en: Henry was asked by them to give an explanation for the dramatic victory.
sentences.cn: 他們要求亨利解釋取得戲劇性勝利的原因。

sentences.en: The Foreign Ministry spokesman cleverly dodged the controversial issue.
sentences.cn: 外交部發言人巧妙地避開了這個具有爭議性的議題。

sentences.en: The mirthful moment at his birthday party distracted his attention away from the fact that he failed his examination.
sentences.cn: 生日聚會上的歡樂時刻使他暫時忘記了沒有通過考試這件事。

sentences.en: There is heated dispute over whether abortion should be legalized or not.
sentences.cn: 關於墮胎是否該合法化的問題有著激烈的爭論。

sentences.en: Your top priority currently is to dispose of the trash.
sentences.cn: 你當務之急是把這些垃圾處理掉。

sentences.en: The police used tear gas to disperse the crowd of onlookers.
sentences.cn: 員警用催淚彈驅散了圍觀的群眾。

sentences.en: Leaders in government positions attempted to dispel the notion that the nation's economy is worsening.
sentences.cn: 現任執政者試圖消除國民經濟正在走下坡路的這一觀點。

sentences.en: His carelessness caused his disorientation on his journey.
sentences.cn: 他的粗心使他在旅途中迷失了方向。

sentences.en: This situation aggravated the disintegration of the social structure.
sentences.cn: 這一事件加劇了社會結構的瓦解。

sentences.en: Even though the government was disinclined to implement health-care reform, it did so because it did not want to go against the public's opinion.
sentences.cn: 儘管政府不願意推行醫療改革，它也不能違背公眾的意見。

sentences.en: The schedule of this conference will be determined at the discretion of the representatives from Asia.
sentences.cn: 此次會議的排程將由亞洲與會代表自行決定。

sentences.en: The headmaster made a discreet comment on every individual's performance at the university.
sentences.cn: 校長對學校裡面的每個人的表現都作出了慎重的評論。

sentences.en: In contrast with empty rhetoric, realistic discourse maybe is conducive to choosing a way of life.
sentences.cn: 比起那些空話來說，那些切實的言語或許更有利於選擇人生的方向。

sentences.en: Emma is noted for being able to discern the essentials of complicated things.
sentences.cn: 愛瑪以能夠辨別複雜事物的本質而著稱。

sentences.en: You should create a new directory to store those files.
sentences.cn: 你應該新建一個目錄來保存這些檔。

sentences.en: It is imperative that diplomats possess strong professional qualities.
sentences.cn: 外交人員必須具有非常強的專業素養。

sentences.en: I want to get out of this dingy room for a breath of fresh air.
sentences.cn: 我想離開這間骯髒的房間，出去呼吸一下新鮮空氣。

sentences.en: We should diminish the cost of production as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 我們應該盡可能地減少生產成本。

sentences.en: A barrel of oil was diluted with fresh water.
sentences.cn: 水把這一桶油給稀釋了。

sentences.en: Teachers with clear diction are very popular among students.
sentences.cn: 學生們都非常喜歡老師咬字清晰。

sentences.en: As depicted in this diagram, it is commonly believed that environmental protection is of great urgency.
sentences.cn: 正如這幅圖表中描繪的那樣，人們普遍意識到，保護環境刻不容緩。

sentences.en: His wonderful imagination about his future life was devoured by brutal reality.
sentences.cn: 他對於未來生活充滿幻想，卻被吞噬在冷酷的現實中。

sentences.en: The changes the government has made have deviated from their original intention.
sentences.cn: 政府的這些改變背離了初衷。

sentences.en: It is universally known that he is in a feud with his ex-wife.
sentences.cn: 他與他前妻有仇，這是眾所周知的事情。

sentences.en: The President delivered a fervent inauguration speech.
sentences.cn: 總統發表了熱情的就職演說。

sentences.en: A leopard is ferocious by its very nature.
sentences.cn: 就天性來說，豹是一種兇猛的動物。

sentences.en: Thousands of refugees died in this famine.
sentences.cn: 成千上萬的難民死於這次饑荒。

sentences.en: His biological mother is of French extraction, which accounts for his romantic quality.
sentences.cn: 他的親生母親是出身於法國，這恰恰能解釋他所具有的浪漫特質。

sentences.en: The little boy's teeth are very bad he needs to have three extractions done.
sentences.cn: 這個小男孩的牙壞的很厲害，需要拔掉三顆。

sentences.en: This exquisite beadwork is quite sellable in India because of its modest price.
sentences.cn: 這些精緻的珠飾在印度賣非常好，因為價格很便宜。

sentences.en: You should make sure of the expiry date of this contract.
sentences.cn: 你應該確認這份合約的到期日。

sentences.en: The government is expected to increase expenditures on health and education.
sentences.cn: 希望政府可以增加對保健和教育的開支。

sentences.en: Being able to pay your bills at convenience stores has made the process extremely expedient.
sentences.cn: 能在超商繳帳單讓手序變得非常方便。

sentences.en: For expedience's sake, the manager made sacrifices for our company and then resigned.
sentences.cn: 作為權宜之計，經理為公司作出了一些犧牲後辭職了。

sentences.en: The manager made an exhaustive investigation into the whole matter to clear himself of all charges.
sentences.cn: 經理對整件事情進行了徹底的調查，為自己洗清罪名。

sentences.en: My mother exhausted all of her strength to support me finishing college.
sentences.cn: 母親為了供養我完成大學學業，耗盡了她所能。

sentences.en: Those citizens who insured themselves against accidents will be exempted from legal liability in this accident.
sentences.cn: 那些投保意外險的市民在這次事故中，將被免除法律責任。

sentences.en: Emma's father took her on an excursion to the Gulf of Mexico as a reward for being admitted to Harvard University.
sentences.cn: 愛瑪的父親為了獎勵她被哈佛大學錄取，帶她去了一趟到墨西哥海灣的短途旅行。

sentences.en: It is unwise to be exasperated at others' mistakes.
sentences.cn: 為別人犯的錯誤而發怒，這實在是太不明智了。

sentences.en: It seems that your dreams always evaporate gradually once you are stuck with something tempting in real life.
sentences.cn: 一旦被現實中的誘惑困住，你的夢想就似乎漸漸消逝了。

sentences.en: The President was provided an armed escort when visiting the mayor.
sentences.cn: 總統在訪問市長期間，有武裝衛隊護送。

sentences.en: These doctors have been struggling to eradicate diseases such as avian influenza and malaria, and they finally have made great progress.
sentences.cn: 這些醫生過去一直在為根除禽流感、瘧疾等疾病而奮鬥，他們最終取得了很大的進展。

sentences.en: You should consider for a moment this equivalenceproblem.
sentences.cn: 你需要考慮一下這個等價問題。

sentences.en: We all know that the equator is a line that people have imagined.
sentences.cn: 我們都知道赤道其實是人們想像出來的一條線。

sentences.en: In view of my carelessness, I usually enumerate a list of things that need to be done on my notebook.
sentences.cn: 考慮到我粗心大意，我通常會把待辦事項列在我的筆記本上。

sentences.en: This policy received an enthusiastic response.
sentences.cn: 這項政策獲得了熱烈的響應。

sentences.en: All of the real estate was entailed to the youngest son.
sentences.cn: 最小的兒子將繼承所有房地產。

sentences.en: This company's products were endorsed by an international superstar.
sentences.cn: 一位國際巨星曾經為這家公司的產品代言過。

sentences.en: What we should do then is to compile a brand new encyclopedia on agriculture.
sentences.cn: 接下來我們需要做的就是，編寫一本全新的農業百科全書。

sentences.en: The sailors are all aboard the ship and ready to embark.
sentences.cn: 船員們全部都在船上並準備裝載貨物。

sentences.en: He has an international reputation because he is an eloquent speaker not because he is an outstanding politician.
sentences.cn: 他享譽世界的原因是因為他是一名雄辯的演說家，並非因為他是一名出色的政治家。

sentences.en: In this article, the author mainly narrates the usage of ellipsis in English and how to render them cleverly into Chinese.
sentences.cn: 在這篇文章中，作者主要講述了在英語中的省略用法，以及如何把它巧妙地翻譯為中文。

sentences.en: This mountain is at an elevation of about 700 meters.
sentences.cn: 這座山峰的海拔高度約為七百公尺。

sentences.en: His elevation to the position of chairman of the board was announced last week.
sentences.cn: 上週就宣佈他升為董事長了。

sentences.en: Due to their special personal identity, the ambassadors have the option to decline to elaborate any further.
sentences.cn: 基於他們個人的特殊身份，大使有權拒絕進一步透露更多細節。

sentences.en: An ox cart was stuck in the groove.
sentences.cn: 一輛牛車卡在了這個溝裡。

sentences.en: Sometimes we also need to follow the social groove. After all, our ancestors possessed enormous wisdom in life that are worth learning from.
sentences.cn: 有時候，我們也需要遵循社會常規。畢竟，我們的祖先擁有的豐富人生智慧是值得我們學習的。

sentences.en: The audiences were gripped by the motivational speaker with rich gesture.
sentences.cn: 觀眾們被這個手勢豐富、慷慨激昂的演說家吸引住了。

sentences.en: Gravel is not arbitrarily available—you must spend money on it.
sentences.cn: 礫石不是唾手可得的，而是需要花錢買的。

sentences.en: The divorce that had gnawed at him for a few years finally reached a legal solution.
sentences.cn: 困擾他多年之久的離婚事件最後終於得到了合法的解決。

sentences.en: The glut of fruit compeled the fruit farmer to sell at drastically reduced prices.
sentences.cn: 水果供過於求，迫使果農以非常低的價格出售水果。

sentences.en: Each chapter is supplemented by a relevant glossary for readers to review what has been learnt.
sentences.cn: 每一章節後面都附有相關的詞彙表，供讀者複習學過的東西。

sentences.en: That factory is equipped with small generators for fear that the power should ever go out.
sentences.cn: 那座工廠配有小型的發電機，以防發生停電。

sentences.en: The doctor wrapped the patient's wounds in gauze.
sentences.cn: 醫生用紗布包紮病人的傷口。

sentences.en: You are very vulnerable to the cold, so you had better spend the holiday carrying a temperature gauge.
sentences.cn: 你很容易感冒，這次渡假，你最好帶著溫度計。

sentences.en: The country road after a rainfall was covered with furrows that were left by carriages.
sentences.cn: 雨後的鄉間小路佈滿了馬車留下的車轍。

sentences.en: Would you mind firing the furnace again? The room is so cold that it feels just like an ice box.
sentences.cn: 你介意再給爐子點火嗎？這間房子冷得像個冰窖一樣。

sentences.en: When I was fumbling for the right words to get the job interview, the boss already decided to hire another job seeker.
sentences.cn: 當我笨嘴拙舌地為這次工作面試準備合適的說辭時，老闆已經決定雇用另一位求職者了。

sentences.en: The large-scale demonstration against the ruling party was not just a fringe phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 反對執政黨的大規模的示威遊行絕對不是一個邊緣現象。

sentences.en: Different habits and ways of life among roommates in university make it hard to avoid much friction in daily life.
sentences.cn: 大學室友之間不同的生活習慣和生活方式在日常生活中難免會引發不少磨擦。

sentences.en: When one devotes their heart and soul to their dream, other trivial matters they fretted over just dissipate.
sentences.cn: 當你專心致志的實現夢想時，其他你曾經為此煩惱的事情就會煙消雲散了。

sentences.en: If you persist in doing this, it will fracture our friendship to a large degree.
sentences.cn: 如果你堅持這樣做的話，這會很嚴重地破壞我們的友誼。

sentences.en: Because he has a large family to support, he only spends a fraction of his earnings for himself.
sentences.cn: 因為他有一大家子要養活，所以他自己只花收入的很少一部分。

sentences.en: There are many hidden dangers in this project, and the government intends to take measures to renovate completely for the forthcoming year.
sentences.cn: 這項工程存在許多的隱憂，為了即將到來的明年，政府打算採取措施徹底整治。

sentences.en: The real meaning of life is to overcome formidable obstacles.
sentences.cn: 人生的真正意義在於克服那些可怕的障礙。

sentences.en: He was sentenced to five years in prison for forgery.
sentences.cn: 他因為偽造罪被判處五年有期徒刑。

sentences.en: Some businessmen who lacked professional ethics forged antiques so that they could make big profits.
sentences.cn: 一些缺乏職業道德的商人會偽造古董，讓他們能夠獲得高額的利潤。

sentences.en: The whole society always is in a continuous flux instead of staying still.
sentences.cn: 整個社會一直以來都是不斷在變遷，而非靜止不動的。

sentences.en: I could see the red flag fluttering in the breeze.
sentences.cn: 我能看得到紅旗在微風中飄動。

sentences.en: When the price of vegetables fluctuates dramatically, vegetable growers panic.
sentences.cn: 當菜價大幅度波動時，菜農就開始陷入恐慌狀態。

sentences.en: The old couple was forced by robbers to fling the window open and shout downstairs.
sentences.cn: 搶匪迫使這對老夫婦把窗戶打開，並向樓下大叫。

sentences.en: I used to eat a sandwich and drink a flask of milk in the morning.
sentences.cn: 以往每天早上，我都會吃一個三明治，喝一瓶牛奶。

sentences.en: The whole army was completely annihilated after the enemy attacked their left flank.
sentences.cn: 整個部隊全軍覆沒，因為敵人攻擊了他們左翼部隊。

sentences.en: Have you heard of the idea that all cells may be able to go through duplication and fission?
sentences.cn: 你知道所有的細胞都會複製和分裂的嗎？

sentences.en: What was really weird was that Eliza fell in love with that boy in filthy clothes.
sentences.cn: 很奇怪的是，艾莉莎竟然愛上了那個邋遢的男生。

sentences.en: Feudal barons who oppressed farmers for hundreds of years were finally overthrown.
sentences.cn: 壓迫農民數百年之久的封建貴族終於被推翻了。

sentences.en: Psychologists believe that this tension is just a manifestation of passion.
sentences.cn: 心理學家認為這種緊張是富有激情的表現。

sentences.en: The middle-aged and the elderly appreciate the magnitude of a good mood.
sentences.cn: 中老年人了解到保持好心情的重要性。

sentences.en: They had their wedding in a magnificent cathedral.
sentences.cn: 他們在一座宏偉的教堂裡舉行了婚禮。

sentences.en: We spent our honeymoon at a luxurious hotel.
sentences.cn: 我們在一家豪華酒店度過了蜜月。

sentences.en: I am very reluctant to cancel this significant luncheon appointment.
sentences.cn: 我十分不情願地取消了這次重要的午餐約會。

sentences.en: There are luminous organisms that can be detected under the deep sea.
sentences.cn: 在深海中，可以發掘出許多的發光生物。

sentences.en: Literally, tears not only lubricate our eyeballs, but also can relieve feelings.
sentences.cn: 事實上，眼淚不僅能潤滑我們的眼球，而且也能發洩感情。

sentences.en: The astronomers marked this place with its specific longitude.
sentences.cn: 天文學家用特定的經度來標記這一地方。

sentences.en: We all wished our grandfather health and longevity at his birthday party.
sentences.cn: 我們所有人都在爺爺的生日宴會上，祝福他健康長壽。

sentences.en: He finished the difficult task all by his lonesome.
sentences.cn: 他獨自完成了這個艱巨的任務。

sentences.en: I didn't like her lofty attitude towards the consumers.
sentences.cn: 我不喜歡她對待顧客的的傲慢的態度。

sentences.en: He is an engineer, and he detached the locomotive from the rest of the train.
sentences.cn: 他是工程師並把火車頭和車身分離了。

sentences.en: Scholars from Jamaica sailed to the United States in a luxury liner.
sentences.cn: 來自牙買加的學者們乘坐豪華遊輪來到了美國。

sentences.en: His personality is limp.
sentences.cn: 他性格很軟弱。

sentences.en: This limousine will appear on the market this year.
sentences.cn: 這款豪華轎車今年上市。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that this new treatment for cancer will achieve success.
sentences.cn: 這種癌症新療法可能會取得成功。

sentences.en: The driver had no choice but to admit liability in the crash.
sentences.cn: 那位司機別無選擇，只能承認他對此次撞車事故負有責任。

sentences.en: Such beautiful scenery kindled his enthusiasm for writing.
sentences.cn: 如此美麗的景色激發了他寫作的熱情。

sentences.en: If those uremia patients want to continue to live, they will need to have kidney transplanted.
sentences.cn: 如果這些尿毒症患者想繼續存活，他們必須接受腎臟移植。

sentences.en: The foreign minister has made a reasonable interpretation of this dispute.
sentences.cn: 外交部長針對這一爭端作出了合理的解釋。

sentences.en: The reason why he received a good education starting at an early age was that his parents were highly qualified intellectuals.
sentences.cn: 他很小就接受很好的教育，原因就是因為他父母是高級知識份子。

sentences.en: An insufficient supply of fuel is one of the major challenges we face.
sentences.cn: 燃料供應不足，是我們所面臨的挑戰之一。

sentences.en: Sometimes hardship can be helpful and instructive.
sentences.cn: 有些時候，苦難也是有幫助和有益的。

sentences.en: All products must receive strict inspection when passing through Customs.
sentences.cn: 所有的東西經過海關時，都必須接受嚴格的檢查。

sentences.en: This unfortunate family has incurred huge debts.
sentences.cn: 這個不幸的家庭早已負債累累。

sentences.en: His family is his primary incentive to work hard.
sentences.cn: 家庭是激勵他努力工作的首要動機。

sentences.en: The new employees are surely ignorant of the regulations.
sentences.cn: 那些新進員工一定不知道這些規章制度。

sentences.en: Scientists put forward another hypothesis that robots will become dominant in the next fifty years.
sentences.cn: 科學家們提出了另外一種假設，那就是未來五十年，機器人將佔據主導地位。

sentences.en: That little child gulps the food eagerly as if he has not eaten for a whole day.
sentences.cn: 那個小孩狼吞虎嚥地吃著東西，彷彿一整天都沒有吃飯一樣。

sentences.en: He did not turn on the lights in order to train his ability to grope the door knob with his hands in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他沒有開燈，就是為了要訓練能夠在黑暗中用手摸到門把的能力。

sentences.en: The politician was notorious for his poor reputation.
sentences.cn: 這名政客因為不講信譽而聲名狼藉。

sentences.en: As for us liberal arts students, we know nothing about nitrogen.
sentences.cn: 對於文科生的我們而言，我們對氮氣一無所知。

sentences.en: My mother gave me a nightgown as a birthday present when I was 12 years old.
sentences.cn: 我十二歲的時候，媽媽送給我一件睡衣作為生日禮物

sentences.en: All of the staff have decided to negotiate with the boss for their wages. If they are unsuccessful, some of them intend to resign.
sentences.cn: 所有的員工打算和他們的老闆就工資問題進行協商，若談判失利的話，一些人就打算辭職了。

sentences.en: Do not rely on him as he plays a very negligible role in this department.
sentences.cn: 不要想著依賴他，他在這個部門是微不足道的小人物。

sentences.en: I was necessitated to make this decision.
sentences.cn: 我被迫作出這個決定。

sentences.en: These channels are also navigable during icy periods.
sentences.cn: 這些航道在結冰期間也可以航行。

sentences.en: Confronted with a myriad of difficulties, these vendors resorted to improper means to overcome them.
sentences.cn: 面對這麼多的困難，這些商販們不惜訴諸不正當的手段來克服它們。

sentences.en: I bowed to my teacher with mute appreciation.
sentences.cn: 我向老師鞠了一躬，表示無言的謝意。

sentences.en: By contrast, the mute has an acute sense of touch.
sentences.cn: 相比之下，聾啞人士的觸覺比一般人更加敏銳。

sentences.en: It has been reported that the municipal authority has increased this illegal behavior's penalties.
sentences.cn: 據報導，市政當局對這種違法行為加重罰責。

sentences.en: This retired old man is accustomed to trimming his moustache once a month.
sentences.cn: 這位退休的老人已經習慣了每月都要修剪一下自己的鬍鬚。

cn: 使產生錯誤想法；帶錯路

sentences.en: I guess you must have misled her regarding your thoughts.
sentences.cn: 我猜，你一定是讓她對你的想法產生了誤解。

sentences.en: We were unlucky to be misled by the policeman.
sentences.cn: 我們真的很倒楣，讓那位員警帶著我們走錯路。

sentences.en: It is extremely painful for her to recall the mishap she once suffered.
sentences.cn: 回憶曾經飽受折磨的那場事故讓她極度痛苦。

sentences.en: As the acknowledged mischief in the family, he often breaks things.
sentences.cn: 作為家裡公認的搗蛋鬼，他經常會打碎一些東西。

sentences.en: Julie was inconsolable due to her daughter's miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 茱莉對她女兒小產這件事傷心欲絕。
