sentences.en: The miscarriage of this plan was a great fault of this policy.
sentences.cn: 這項計畫的失敗是政策的巨大失誤。

sentences.en: We have tried our best to keep expenditures to an absolute minimum.
sentences.cn: 我們已經盡力將開支控制在最低限度。

sentences.en: Please tell me the minimum taxi fare.
sentences.cn: 請告訴我最低的計程車費是多少。

sentences.en: When you purposely mingle two similar things, it is difficult to tell them apart.
sentences.cn: 當你故意把兩個相似的東西混合在一起，就很難把它們區分開。

sentences.en: The government decided to build a mighty army despite all of the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 政府決定排除一切困難，打造一支強大的軍隊。

sentences.en: The young man was mighty pleased with himself after he was promoted.
sentences.cn: 晉升之後，那位年輕人洋洋自得。

sentences.en: Residents living in the metropolitan area are accustomed to a fast-paced lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 住在大城市的人習慣於快節奏的生活方式。

sentences.en: I am utterly ignorant of this book which contains a lot of knowledge about meteorology.
sentences.cn: 我對這本書一無所知，這裡面包含了很多的氣象學知識。

sentences.en: Please handle that merchandise with care.
sentences.cn: 搬運這批貨物時，請小心一點。

sentences.en: As long as you are down-to-earth, your dreams will materialize one day.
sentences.cn: 只要你腳踏實地的，夢想終有一天會實現。

sentences.en: She has rather masculine characters such as courage and aggressiveness.
sentences.cn: 她擁有偏男性化的性格，如富有勇氣與進取的精神。

sentences.en: We all were impressed by the marvelous spectacle that was the most snow we had had in 50 years.
sentences.cn: 我們都為五十年來最大雪的景致震撼了。

sentences.en: The solider was honored as a glorious martyr for the cause of peace.
sentences.cn: 這位戰士被授予革命烈士，因為他帶來了和平。

sentences.en: He runs a small and marginal restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他經營著一家收益不大的小飯館。

sentences.en: Although the old couple made great contributions to our society, they still were living on the margins of respectability.
sentences.cn: 雖然這對老夫妻曾經為社會做出過巨大的貢獻，但是他們的生活仍然過的不怎麼體面。

sentences.en: Nowadays, the original manuscript of the book written by that well-known author is invaluable.
sentences.cn: 那個知名作家的最初手稿現在已經是價值連城了。

sentences.en: Astute businessmen know how to manipulate the minds of consumers.
sentences.cn: 精明的商人知道如何左右消費者的心理。

sentences.en: The party in power issued a manifesto regarding this matter last week.
sentences.cn: 執政黨上週針對這一事件發表了一份宣言。

sentences.en: It was pathetic to see that patient struggle against liver cancer.
sentences.cn: 看到這個病人與肝癌奮鬥令我十分感傷。

sentences.en: That dancer was so pathetic in her singing.
sentences.cn: 那名舞者唱歌非常差勁。

sentences.en: Through unremitting efforts, he finished the experiment at last and presented an application to the Patent Office.
sentences.cn: 經過不懈努力，他終於完成了這項實驗，並向專利局遞交了申請書。

sentences.en: The sheep are gazing in the pasture.
sentences.cn: 羊正在牧場上吃草。

sentences.en: He will fulfill the assignment that he was asked to do:paste up posters along the street.
sentences.cn: 他會完成被交付的任務，也就是在整條街上貼滿海報。

sentences.en: Angela does not want to be a parasite—she wants to support herself.
sentences.cn: 安琪拉不想做米蟲，她想自立更生。

sentences.en: In a parallel world, all things would be of equivalent exchange.
sentences.cn: 在平行世界裡，所有的物品都是等價交換的。

sentences.en: My parachute failed in the air and at that time I thought I was going to die.
sentences.cn: 當降落傘在空中打不開時，我以為我要死了。

sentences.en: The wife panted out a few scornful words that really irritated her husband.
sentences.cn: 妻子氣喘吁吁地說出一些嘲諷的話，而惹怒了她的丈夫。

sentences.en: The dog was under the tree panting after running in the park.
sentences.cn: 那隻狗在公園裡跑步後在樹下喘氣。

sentences.en: It is my responsibility to distribute these pamphlets to visitors at this scenic spot.
sentences.cn: 我的職責就是把這些小冊子分發給風景區裡的遊客。

sentences.en: As the oldest son in the family, he was overextended at a very early age.
sentences.cn: 作為家中的長子，他很小的時候就承擔起過多的責任了。

sentences.en: It is rather unreasonable to overcharge here.
sentences.cn: 在這裡多收錢是相當不合理的。

sentences.en: You may as well rent a house on the outskirts of the city in view of your income at present.
sentences.cn: 考慮到你目前的收入情況，你不妨在城市的郊區租個房子。

sentences.en: The enemy made a sincere apology for the outrage they committed ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 敵方真誠地為他們十年前所犯下的暴行表示歉意。

sentences.en: He was extremely outraged by brutal crimes.
sentences.cn: 殘忍的罪行徹底激怒了他。

sentences.en: All of the products manufactured at this factory have a good outlet.
sentences.cn: 這個工廠所生產的產品銷路都很好。

sentences.en: All outlays will be taken into consideration, including loading and unloading charges.
sentences.cn: 所有的相關費用都考慮在內了，還包括裝卸費用。

sentences.en: This beautiful house was decorated with modern ornamental pottery.
sentences.cn: 這間漂亮的房子裝飾著各種現代裝飾性的陶器。

sentences.en: Nowadays, many Western scholars are very interested in Oriental cultures.
sentences.cn: 現如今，許多西方學者對東方文化十分感興趣。

sentences.en: In ancient times, many brilliant achievements were made in the Orient.
sentences.cn: 在古代，許多輝煌的成就都出現在東方國家。

sentences.en: I need some time to orient myself to this brand new environment.
sentences.cn: 在這樣一個全新的環境下，我需要一些時間來適應一下。

sentences.en: The government offered optimum conditions for the market.
sentences.cn: 政府為市場提供了最佳條件。

sentences.en: When a light is turned on, all optical effects are enhanced.
sentences.cn: 燈打開的時候，所有的視覺效果都得到了增強。

sentences.en: This monarch cruelly oppressed the conquered people for years.
sentences.cn: 這個君主以十分殘酷的方式壓迫被征服的人們長達好幾年。

sentences.en: Take this away—it is producing an awful odor that makes me sick.
sentences.cn: 快把它拿開，它散發一股難聞的氣味，讓我想吐。

sentences.en: He was so obstinate over this matter that he finally severed his relationship with his father.
sentences.cn: 他在這件事上很固執，以致於最後與父親斷絕了關係。

sentences.en: I shall be rewarded for my observance of the rules.
sentences.cn: 因為遵守規則，我得到了應有的獎勵。

sentences.en: Along with the observance of this ancient festival, people have gradually attached a lot of importance to traditional customs.
sentences.cn: 隨著人們對這個古老節日的慶祝，大家逐漸對傳統習俗重視起來。

sentences.en: She is obedient to her husband and will do anything her husband asks without resistance.
sentences.cn: 她是一個很聽話的妻子，丈夫要求的任何事情她都會去做，絕不反抗。

sentences.en: My password is entirely numerical.
sentences.cn: 我的密碼全部由數字組成。

sentences.en: This couple definitely do not want to have children, and they believe that children are a nuisance.
sentences.cn: 這對夫妻堅決不要孩子，在他們看來，孩子是很惹人厭的。

sentences.en: The young man is regarded as the nucleus of his whole family, so he has to work under great pressure every day.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕人被認為是整個家庭的核心，所以他每天的工作壓力都很大。

sentences.en: Emma is an amazing author, and there is a lot of novelty in her story.
sentences.cn: 愛瑪是一名非常了不起的作家，她的故事裡充滿著各種新奇的事物。

sentences.en: A great amount of fertilizer was used by the farmers to nourish the farmland.
sentences.cn: 農民使用大量的肥料來滋養農田。

sentences.en: The priest preached that everyone was an independent individual.
sentences.cn: 牧師在佈道時說道，眾生都是一個個獨立的個體。

sentences.en: While the businessman was preaching good faith, he was cheating his customers by hook or by crook.
sentences.cn: 這個商人一邊鼓吹誠信，一邊千方百計地欺騙消費者。

sentences.en: I did not realize that my feelings would have a potent influence on his actions.
sentences.cn: 我沒有意識到，我的感情會對他的行為產生很大的影響。

sentences.en: A feeling of fear seeped from every pore of his body, and his face went red.
sentences.cn: 他的每一個毛孔都滲出害怕的感覺，緊接著臉都漲紅了。

sentences.en: The wife pored about her marriage status and then made up her mind to get a divorce.
sentences.cn: 妻子仔細考慮自己目前的婚姻狀況，下定決心離婚。

sentences.en: These porcelain plates were carefully selected for my new home.
sentences.cn: 這些瓷盤子是我為新家精挑細選過的。

sentences.en: Readers plied him with a string of questions about his latest novel.
sentences.cn: 讀者針對他最新的這部小說提出了一連串的問題。

sentences.en: Do not worry about transportation issues for trains ply between these two cities.
sentences.cn: 不用擔心交通問題，火車定期往返兩個城市之間。

sentences.en: He plunged into the discussion on whether an innovative approach should be taken to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 他突然加入議題，討論是否應該針對出現的問題採取創新的方法。

sentences.en: I plucked up the courage to inquire about my marks last semester.
sentences.cn: 我鼓足勇氣才查詢了自己上個學期的考試分數。

sentences.en: The young man showed plenty of pluck when he bared his heart to his beloved girl.
sentences.cn: 這個年輕人鼓起了很大的勇氣才向心愛的女孩表白。

sentences.en: In order to address the plateau phenomenon, the trainer suggested a specific theory.
sentences.cn: 為了解決這種高原現象，教練提出了一種具體的理論

sentences.en: This kind of plaster already fell off.
sentences.cn: 這種灰泥早已經脫落了。

sentences.en: There are a lot of illegal uses of child labor on coffee plantations.
sentences.cn: 在咖啡種植園裡，有很多非法雇用的童工。

sentences.en: We pitched our tent in the middle of the mountain to prevent from being eaten by a bear.
sentences.cn: 為了不會被熊吃掉，我們把帳篷搭在半山上。

sentences.en: Brandon, after he was reproached, pitched the baseball angrily into a drainage ditch.
sentences.cn: 布萊登受到責備後，生氣地把棒球扔到臭水溝裡。

sentences.en: The best solution is to push the piston out.
sentences.cn: 把活塞頂出去是最好的解決問題的辦法。

sentences.en: As the oldest son, he was the pillar of support for his family.
sentences.cn: 作為長子，他是家裡的樑柱，要養活家人。

sentences.en: This scenic spot attracts millions of vistors every year because of its picturesque scenery.
sentences.cn: 因為景色優美，這個風景區每年會吸引成千上萬的遊客。

sentences.en: The famous magazine put the fair lady on the cover of their pictorial this month.
sentences.cn: 這家有名的雜誌把這位窈窕淑女刊登在本月畫報的封面。

sentences.en: I am wondering why children are prone to pictorial things rather than words.
sentences.cn: 我很好奇，為什麼小孩喜歡圖畫的東西更甚文字。

sentences.en: Although he has studied some philosophical issues, he is still not clear about the meaning of life.
sentences.cn: 雖然他研究過哲學問題，但是他至今也沒有弄清過人生的意義。

sentences.en: All of the citizens sent letters to petition the President for the tax cut.
sentences.cn: 所有人都投書向總統請願，希望可以減免稅收。

sentences.en: Supporters actively responded to the call to sign this petition and advocated the advantages of bringing pets to work.
sentences.cn: 支持者們積極回應號召，在請願書上簽字，並且鼓吹帶寵物上班的好處。

sentences.en: Alice scattered the petals she had collected to create a romantic atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲把她收集花瓣灑落在地板上，製造一種浪漫的氛圍。

sentences.en: Right-wing extremists perturb the social order by spreading rumors.
sentences.cn: 右翼極端分子散佈謠言來擾亂社會秩序。

sentences.en: I am obsessed with anything pertaining to my idol.
sentences.cn: 關於我偶像的一切東西，我都非常感興趣。

sentences.en: The party needs to make a reform to the economic  structure that no longer pertains.
sentences.cn: 政黨應該對不再適用的經濟結構作出改革。

sentences.en: Nothing is impossible as long as you persevere.
sentences.cn: 只要你堅持下去，萬事皆有可能。

sentences.en: Confronted with such difficities, she was totally perplexed.
sentences.cn: 面對如此大的困難，她完全不知所措了。

sentences.en: I couldn't bear his perpetual complaints so I dashed out of the door.
sentences.cn: 我實在忍受不了他無止境的抱怨，奪門而出。

sentences.en: The little bird perched itself on the branch all day.
sentences.cn: 這個小鳥在這個樹枝上棲息了一整天了。

sentences.en: I perceive that white will be very popular this year.
sentences.cn: 我注意到今年的流行色是白色。

sentences.en: He was made marketing director in India because of his acute penetration.
sentences.cn: 他擁有敏銳的洞察力，因此被任命為印度的行銷主管。

sentences.en: The police officer was apt at penetrating into other people's motives.
sentences.cn: 這位員警擅長探查別人做事的動機。

sentences.en: It is a peculiar fact that the excellent athlete is not going to take part in the Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 很奇怪的是，那位很傑出的運動員居然沒有參加這屆奧運會。

sentences.en: The guards patrolling the door of this villa were exceptionally tense tonight.
sentences.cn: 在別墅門前巡邏的保全們今晚顯得格外緊張。

sentences.en: Policemen in patrol cars are responsible for doing routine work.
sentences.cn: 坐在巡邏車裡的員警負責執行日常勤務。

sentences.en: One of the representatives of realism in the nineteenth century was Balzac, a French writer.
sentences.cn: 十九世紀現實主義流派的代表作家之一是法國的巴爾扎克。

sentences.en: The police caught the young rascal who had robbed the old man.
sentences.cn: 員警抓住了搶劫老人的小流氓。

sentences.en: The farmer is talking with his neighbors with a rake in his hands.
sentences.cn: 那個農夫手裡拿著個耙子，正在同鄰居講話。

sentences.en: The homeowner was busy raking ashes from the fire when the traveler rang the door.
sentences.cn: 那個旅者按響門鈴的時候，房主正忙著從爐子裡往外耙灰。

sentences.en: In the early hours of the morning, the police carried out a raid on all of the bars on this street.
sentences.cn: 淩晨時分，員警突擊檢查了這條街上的所有酒吧。

sentences.en: In 1898, Madame Curie discovered a radioactive element, radium, which won her the Nobel Prize.
sentences.cn: 西元一八九八年，居里夫人發現了放射性元素鐳，並因此獲得諾貝爾獎。

sentences.en: The heat that radiated from the fireplace warmed her body.
sentences.cn: 壁爐發出的熱量溫暖了她的身體。

sentences.en: Can you please stop making that terrible racket? I can't concentrate!
sentences.cn: 你們能不要這麼吵鬧嗎？我都不能集中精力了！

sentences.en: I bought a new badminton racket as the old one had got lost.
sentences.cn: 我買了一副新羽毛球拍，因為舊的丟了。

sentences.en: Those tourists put their luggage on the racks as soon as they entered the train cabin.
sentences.cn: 那些遊客一進火車車廂就把行李放當架子上去了。

sentences.en: The leaves on the tree are quivering in the wind.
sentences.cn: 樹葉隨著風輕輕顫動。

sentences.en: They drank two quarts of vodka in total that night.
sentences.cn: 他們那天晚上一共喝了兩夸脫伏特加。

cn: 出版物；出版，發行；公佈，發表

sentences.en: They provide a wide range of publications for you to choose from.
sentences.cn: 他們提供各種各樣的出版物以備挑選。

sentences.en: Rumor has it that the publication date of the book has been delayed.
sentences.cn: 有傳言說，這本書的出版日期已經延遲了。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that there will be a delay in the publication of the trade figures.
sentences.cn: 貿易資料的出版可能會延遲。

sentences.en: It is no wonder that his controversial statement has provoked great criticism even among his supporters.
sentences.cn: 難怪他這個具有爭議性的聲明在他支持者中引起非議。

sentences.en: Our foreigner teacher always shares amusing proverbs with us in class, and they make us convulse with laughter.
sentences.cn: 我們的外籍老師經常在課堂上分享一些有趣的諺語，常常引得我們捧腹大語。

sentences.en: As we all know, milk is rich in protein.
sentences.cn: 我們都知道，牛奶含有豐富的蛋白質。

sentences.en: I had not been to the small village for a few years, and then, unexpectedly, it became very prosperous.
sentences.cn: 我已經好幾年沒來這裡了，出人意料的是，這個小村莊現在十分的繁華。

sentences.en: The chief prosecutor had received complaints several times because of his indecent behavior.
sentences.cn: 因為不檢點的行為，這位首席檢察官已經被投訴了好幾次了。

sentences.en: We often see a sign that trespassers will be prosecueted on a specific door.
sentences.cn: 我們經常會在特定的門上看見這樣的標語，閒人免進，違者必究。

sentences.en: It is meaningless to prosecute that investigation that has no support.
sentences.cn: 再繼續那項得不到支持的調查就沒有什麼意義了。

sentences.en: Due to his family environment, the old man was prone to the self-mutilation.
sentences.cn: 因為家庭環境的原因，這個老人有自殘的傾向。

sentences.en: Our whole team made intensive efforts to produce the film in a projection booth.
sentences.cn: 我們整個團隊在放映室裡深入細緻的完成了這部電影。

sentences.en: The government proclaimed that the price of commodities will be adjusted moderately next month.
sentences.cn: 政府宣佈下個月將會適當的調整物價。

sentences.en: The new employee seemed to be occupied with nothing, so the manager asked him to review day's proceedings.
sentences.cn: 新來的員工看起來似乎無所事事，所以經理要求他去複習今天的會議記錄。

sentences.en: The miserable wife filed a legal proceeding against her huaband on account of domestic violence.
sentences.cn: 這個可憐的妻子因為家暴的原因向她的丈夫提出訴訟。

sentences.en: Descending from an aristocratic family, Alice is able to enjoy many privileges in her life.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲出身於貴族家庭，在日常生活中得以享受很多特權。

sentences.en: The high prestige the publisher had built up toppled down in a flash.
sentences.cn: 出版商建立起來的威信一瞬間就倒塌了。

sentences.en: When that musician was presiding over that evening event, she was warned not to make any mistakes.
sentences.cn: 當那個音樂家主持晚會時，被警告不要出任何差錯。

sentences.en: A millionaire who suffered from a terminal disease was restored to health after taking the prescription his doctor gave him.
sentences.cn: 一位身患絕症的百萬富翁在吃藥後恢復健康了。

sentences.en: Explicit terms prescribe that such crimes are to be given severe punishment.
sentences.cn: 明文規定這樣的罪行應該從重處罰。

sentences.en: Only when a patient gets a medical certificate can working personnel prescribe for them.
sentences.cn: 病人只有拿到了醫生證明，工作人員才能給他開處方。

sentences.en: The young couple was immersed in joy when their lead doctor delivered their pregnant news this morning.
sentences.cn: 這對年輕夫婦沉浸在懷孕的喜悅中，懷孕的消息是他們的主治醫生今天早上告訴他們的。

sentences.en: He is an inventor pregnant with much inspiration.
sentences.cn: 他是一個極富於靈感的發明家。

sentences.en: The preface of this book was written by a rather controversial person, so it caused a stir.
sentences.cn: 這本書的前言是由一個十分具有爭議性的人物寫的，因此引起軒然大波。

sentences.en: Compulsory education should take precedence over other social welfare issues.
sentences.cn: 義務教育問題應該優先於其他民生問題。

sentences.en: He resigned his position as vice president and started to work hard on his own business.
sentences.cn: 他辭去了副總的職位，開始為自己的事業打拼。

sentences.en: He didn't realize that it was his remarks about her that the lady resented bitterly.
sentences.cn: 他沒有意識到，那位女士對他批評的話非常反感。

sentences.en: Do you have the requisite ticket for the art exhibition with you?
sentences.cn: 你帶參觀畫展必須的門票了嗎？

sentences.en: See to it that you have packed all the requisites for travel in your suitcase.
sentences.cn: 確保已經把所有旅行必需品打包進手提箱了。

sentences.en: Uncle Martin reproached them for leaving home without a word.
sentences.cn: 馬丁叔叔指責他們竟然一聲不吭地離家外出。

sentences.en: Her performance on stage was above reproach.
sentences.cn: 她在舞臺上的表演真是無可指摘。

sentences.en: He repented for lying to his girlfriend and is thinking about how to apologize.
sentences.cn: 他很懊悔對女朋友撒謊，現在正在想要怎麼道歉。

sentences.en: The government repealed the ban on marine trade.
sentences.cn: 政府已經撤銷了海上貿易的禁令。

sentences.en: A majority of the citizens voted for the repeal of that inheritance law.
sentences.cn: 大多數的市民都投票贊成廢除那項繼承法。

sentences.en: The Renaissance rose firstly in Italy and spread to other countries in Western Europe later.
sentences.cn: 文藝復興最先興起於義大利，後來擴展到西歐其他國家。

sentences.en: There is a price list on the wall that tells detailed fee regulations for foreign remittance.
sentences.cn: 牆上張貼著收費表，上面有外幣匯款的詳細收費規定。

sentences.en: The merciful king has remitted his prison sentence.
sentences.cn: 仁慈的國王已經赦免了他的監禁刑罰。

sentences.en: Just as I predicted, your parents remitted your tuition one hour ago.
sentences.cn: 正如我所料，你父母一個小時前剛匯了學費過來。

sentences.en: The reliability of the trade figures is open to question.
sentences.cn: 這些貿易資料的可靠性有待懷疑。

sentences.en: The Olympic Games were relayed live all around the world via satellites.
sentences.cn: 奧運會經由衛星向全世界實況轉播。

sentences.en: We won the championship; therefore, let us rejoice.
sentences.cn: 我們贏得了冠軍，因此歡欣鼓舞。

sentences.en: They rehearsed the dance over and over before the day of their performance.
sentences.cn: 他們一遍又一遍地排練這場舞蹈，直到表演那天。

sentences.en: It's said that they go to church with great regularity.
sentences.cn: 據說，他們定期去教堂。

sentences.en: He refuted his rival's argument with sufficient evidence.
sentences.cn: 他用充分的證據反駁了對方的觀點。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with our service, we will refund you half of the fee in accordance with the contract.
sentences.cn: 如果您對我們的服務不滿意，我們可以按照合約退還您一半的費用。

sentences.en: The refund will be transferred to your account within three days.
sentences.cn: 退款將於三日內退到您的帳戶。

sentences.en: They would like to buy some refreshments from the snack room.
sentences.cn: 他們想要到小吃部去買些食物和飲料。

sentences.en: Please refrain from smoking; this is a No Smoking Area.
sentences.cn: 請克制一下不要抽菸，這裡是禁菸區。

sentences.en: The referent that “it” points out in this sentence is the dog.
sentences.cn: 這句話中，「it」指的物件是那隻小狗。

sentences.en: I recollect that Mark borrowed a reel of thread last Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我記得上週六馬克來借了一卷棉線。

sentences.en: That man reeled the line out slowly so that the kite wouldn't fly away.
sentences.cn: 那人慢慢地放出線，以免風箏掉下來。

sentences.en: He doesn't have enough money to redeem his car.
sentences.cn: 他沒有足夠的錢去贖回汽車。

sentences.en: I don't believe that you can manage without recourse.
sentences.cn: 我不相信沒有外援你也能獨自應付過去。

sentences.en: They did have a quarrel a few days ago, but now they've reconciled with each other.
sentences.cn: 他們前幾天確實吵架了，但是現在已經和好了。

sentences.en: When you made a budget for next month, did you reckon the cost of the gift for Kevin?
sentences.cn: 你做下個月預算的時候，有把為凱文準備禮物的費用算進去嗎？

sentences.en: Reckless driving is likely to put your life in danger.
sentences.cn: 魯莽駕駛可能會使你的生命處於危險之中。

sentences.en: Recently, there are signs of recovery from the recession.
sentences.cn: 最近有經濟復甦的跡象。

sentences.en: The manager rebuked Donald for failing to submit his year-end report on time.
sentences.cn: 經理指責唐納德沒有按時提交年終報告。

sentences.en: They have set aside a piece of land at the rear of the house for a garden.
sentences.cn: 他們在房子的後部空出了一塊地，準備建一座花園。

sentences.en: It might be not realistic to get a promotion in a month.
sentences.cn: 在一個月之內得以晉職，也許是不現實的。

sentences.en: The workers skirmished with their employers in the factory last night.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上工人與雇主在廠裡發生了衝突。

sentences.en: Recently, the differences in the discussions have led to several verbal skirmishes.
sentences.cn: 最近，這種討論上的差異已經導致了幾場口頭上的爭執。

sentences.en: The girl was awakened by a siren sounding outside of her door.
sentences.cn: 這個女孩被門外的汽笛聲吵醒了。

sentences.en: Ada slowly moved her injured body when she saw an ambulance along with its sirens wailing.
sentences.cn: 當艾達看到響著警報器行駛的救護車，她便慢慢的移動她受傷的身體。

sentences.en: The boy signified his love by giving a bunch of flowers to the beautiful girl.
sentences.cn: 男孩送一束花給他喜歡的漂亮女孩。

sentences.en: The whole world is cloaked in a shroud of mystery.
sentences.cn: 整個世界籠罩在神祕的氣氛中。

sentences.en: The kind villager bought a shroud for the dead person.
sentences.cn: 這個善良的村民給這個死者買了一件壽衣。

sentences.en: The old man will not shove the heavy burden onto his only child.
sentences.cn: 這位老人不願意把重擔推給他唯一的孩子。

sentences.en: The man shoved me aside when I was waiting for the bus this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 在我中午等公車的時候，這個男的把我擠到了一邊。

sentences.en: The mother shielded the girl with her body during the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 當地震發生的時候，媽媽用自己的身體保護這個女孩。

sentences.en: There is no doubt that the forest is an effective shield against wind and dust.
sentences.cn: 毫無疑問，森林可以有效的防護風沙。

sentences.en: He has been recommended to be the sheriff of New York City.
sentences.cn: 他被推薦為紐約市的行政司法長官。

sentences.en: It was their serenity which made her feel the most happiness.
sentences.cn: 最讓她感覺幸福的是他們的平靜。

sentences.en: Fans'sentiments rapidly turned to support the star.
sentences.cn: 粉絲情緒迅速轉變，支持這名明星。

sentences.en: The police ordered the seizure of all of his assets for his unlawful act.
sentences.cn: 這個員警下令沒收他違法行為的所有財產。

sentences.en: The private lives of film stars have become open to press scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 電影明星的私生活受到大眾的監視。

sentences.en: They will withdraw their money if you deviate from the script.
sentences.cn: 如果你違背劇本，他們會撤資。

sentences.en: The young scout was ordered to scout around and look for enemy troops.
sentences.cn: 那位年輕的偵察員接到命令，四處偵察尋找敵軍。

sentences.en: They have been scouting around the city for a well-paid job.
sentences.cn: 為了找一份薪資優厚的工作，他們找遍了全城。

sentences.en: Grass tends to scorch in the hot sun.
sentences.cn: 小草容易被炙熱的陽光燒焦。

sentences.en: Don't scold him, he’s still young.
sentences.cn: 不要責怪他，他還小呢。

sentences.en: You'd better not scoff at the color of their skin, because we all are equal.
sentences.cn: 你最好不要嘲笑別人的膚色，因為我們都是平等的。

sentences.en: Delia turned scarlet from anger when she realized what he had said.
sentences.cn: 迪麗雅了解他說的話後，臉因為憤怒而變得通紅。

sentences.en: Young as he is, his cheeks are beginning to sag.
sentences.cn: 雖然他很年輕，但是他的臉頰開始鬆弛了。

sentences.en: The horse's saddle is too high for the girl.
sentences.cn: 這匹馬的馬鞍對這個女孩來說太高了。

sentences.en: After a ruinous earthquake, the remaining villagers have left this place.
sentences.cn: 一場毀滅性的地震之後，剩餘的村民也離開了這個地方。

sentences.en: Rotate your neck right and left, and you will feel relaxed.
sentences.cn: 把脖頸左右旋轉，你會覺得很放鬆。

sentences.en: The teacher is rigorous toward students in his class.
sentences.cn: 這個老師在課堂上對學生非常嚴厲。

sentences.en: This article failed to meet the advisor's rigorous standards.
sentences.cn: 這篇文章沒有達到指導老師的嚴格標準。

sentences.en: The regimental commander told to us to walk along the ridge.
sentences.cn: 團長告訴我們要沿著山脊走。

sentences.en: There is no one who knows the answer to the riddle.
sentences.cn: 沒有人知道謎底。

sentences.en: The housewife's life revolves around her husband and children.
sentences.cn: 那位家庭主婦的生活就是圍繞著老公和孩子。

sentences.en: The man can’t get to sleep because the matter was revolving around in his mind.
sentences.cn: 這個男的無法入睡，因為事情一直盤據在腦中。

sentences.en: The man reverted to drinking after his wife died.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子死後，這個男子又恢復喝酒了。

sentences.en: Don't get carried away too far; can you revert to our earlier question?
sentences.cn: 不要扯太遠了，你能回到我們先前提出的問題嗎？

sentences.en: In order for the patient to regain his health, the doctor suggested that he live in a quiet retreat.
sentences.cn: 為了讓病人恢復健康，醫生建議他住在一個安靜的地方。

sentences.en: Our army has suffered heavy casualties, so we must retreat now.
sentences.cn: 我軍傷亡人數太多，必須現在撤退。

sentences.en: One year later, she resumed traveling alone.
sentences.cn: 一年之後，她重新開始了一個人的旅行。

sentences.en: “I have an idea,” he sprang up and exclaimed before resuming his seat.
sentences.cn: 他跳起來大聲的說：「我想到了一個辦法」，然後返回了座位。

sentences.en: As an adult, you must learn to restrain yourself rather than blame everyone around you.
sentences.cn: 作為一個成年人，你必須控制好自己，而不是責備身邊的人。

sentences.en: The security officers had a rough time restraining the crowd of spectators that came from this neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 治安人員難以制止來自這個社區的圍觀人潮。

sentences.en: It's a novel necklace made of sterling silver.
sentences.cn: 這款新穎的項鍊是純銀製作的。

sentences.en: Only when a man has a sterling character can he be praised.
sentences.cn: 只有一個品格優秀的人才值得被稱讚。

sentences.en: Tom, turn down the stereo so that we do not disturb others.
sentences.cn: 湯姆，把這個立體音響關了以免打擾到別人。

sentences.en: Albert engraved his paintings on stencil to be printed in large numbers.
sentences.cn: 亞伯特把自己的畫刻在蠟紙上以便大量印刷。

sentences.en: His wonderful performance startled everyone present.
sentences.cn: 他的精彩表現使在座的每個人為之震驚。

sentences.en: His sudden appearance really startled me.
sentences.cn: 他突然出現真的驚嚇到了我。

sentences.en: He is very self-effacing because there are a lot of people who laugh at his stammer.
sentences.cn: 他很自卑，因為很多人嘲笑他的結巴。

sentences.en: Don't keep using your stale thoughts to educate children now.
sentences.cn: 不要再用你那迂腐的思想來教育孩子。

sentences.en: I’d rather buy expensive fruit than eat stale fruit.
sentences.cn: 我寧願買貴的水果也不要吃不新鮮的水果。

sentences.en: Is he crazy? Why does he play that game for such high stakes.
sentences.cn: 他瘋了嗎？為什麼為了一個遊戲下那麼大的賭注。

sentences.en: We staked the tree upright that was blown down in the gale.
sentences.cn: 我們用木樁固定被大風吹倒的樹。

sentences.en: Investigations have ground to stagnation because they can't find the suspect.
sentences.cn: 調查進入了停滯階段，因為他沒有找到疑犯。

sentences.en: Many people are out of work due to current economic stagnation.
sentences.cn: 很多人因為經濟的不景氣失業了。

sentences.en: This unexpected news did not stagger his resolution.
sentences.cn: 這個意外的消息並沒有動搖他的決心。

sentences.en: The old man strenuously staggers along with the help of his son.
sentences.cn: 老人在兒子的幫助下費力地蹣跚而行。

sentences.en: A few poems among his collection of poetry are spontaneous improvisations.
sentences.cn: 他的詩作中有幾首是他即興創作的。

sentences.en: There are naturally spontaneous emotions between a child and their mother.
sentences.cn: 孩子和母親之間有一種自然的親近感。

sentences.en: The cancer patient took only a mouthful of food and then spat it out.
sentences.cn: 這名癌症患者只吃了一口飯就吐出來了。

sentences.en: The driver was very rude for spitting out of the bus window.
sentences.cn: 這個司機很粗魯地向公共汽車窗外吐口水。

sentences.en: It's not over yet, so we’d better not speculate about things.
sentences.cn: 事情還沒有結束，所以我們最好不要做那樣的推測。

sentences.en: I have heard that he speculated in oil shares.
sentences.cn: 據說他是做投機生意的。

sentences.en: The man was only a passive spectator of this movement.
sentences.cn: 在這場運動中，這個男子只是一個旁觀者。

sentences.en: I couldn't wait to call my friend to tell her how spectacular the film that I saw yesterday was.
sentences.cn: 我迫不及待想打電話告訴我的朋友，昨天看的電影非常壯觀。

sentences.en: The opening of the Olympic Games was a splendid spectacle.
sentences.cn: 奧運會的開幕是個壯觀的場面。

sentences.en: Such a spectacle is the perfect gift for the photographer.
sentences.cn: 這種景觀對攝影者來說是一份極好的禮物。

sentences.en: The new stadium is spacious enough to seat 50,000 people.
sentences.cn: 這座新的體育館非常寬敞，足夠容納五萬人。

sentences.en: Only a sovereign nation can secure the basic living standards of its people.
sentences.cn: 只有主權獨立的國家才能保障人們的基本生活。

sentences.en: When my friend moved to America, she left me her photo album as a souvenir.
sentences.cn: 當我的朋友搬到美國的時候，她把她的相冊留給我作紀念。

sentences.en: The kind stranger attempted to soothe the crying child.
sentences.cn: 好心的路人試圖安慰啼哭的小孩兒。

sentences.en: To some degree, analgesic may soothe the pain.
sentences.cn: 在某種程度上來說，鎮痛藥能夠緩和疼痛。

cn: 有償付能力的；可溶解的

sentences.en: The old man who had just lost his child is not solvent.
sentences.cn: 那位剛失去孩子的老人沒有償還能力。

sentences.en: Carbohydrates are more solvent in hot water.
sentences.cn: 碳水化合物在熱水中更容易溶解。

sentences.en: As investors, we must make sure that we have solvency in every investment with our collaborators.
sentences.cn: 作為投資者，我們必須確保與合作者的每一項投資都具有償付能力。

sentences.en: The poor rural girl has no words to describe the soaring skyscrapers.
sentences.cn: 這個農村女孩無法形容拔地而起的摩天大樓。

sentences.en: The injured bird tried its best to soar over the trees.
sentences.cn: 這隻受傷的小鳥拼盡全力飛過樹梢。

sentences.en: I couldn't accept his sneering at our efforts.
sentences.cn: 我無法忍受他嘲笑我們的努力。

sentences.en: The policeman managed to snatch the knife from the hands of the criminal.
sentences.cn: 員警試圖從罪犯手中奪取這把刀。

sentences.en: The old lady wanted to snatch a chicken and cook it for the sick child.
sentences.cn: 老太太想抓一隻雞並煮給這個生病的孩子吃。

sentences.en: This foreigner was arrested for smuggling goods across the border.
sentences.cn: 這名外國人因為走私貨物過境被捕。

sentences.en: This taxi was in a head-on smash with a private car.
sentences.cn: 這輛計程車和一輛私家車迎面相撞了。

sentences.en: Family members of patients smashed their way into the doctor's office.
sentences.cn: 病人家屬衝進了這個醫生的辦公室。

sentences.en: Most boys want to have a beautiful and slender girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 大多數男生都希望有一個長得漂亮，身材苗條的女朋友。

sentences.en: The poor old man must live on his slender pittance because he has no children to support him.
sentences.cn: 這個可憐的老人只能依靠自己微薄的收入生活，因為他身邊沒有孩子。

sentences.en: At present, my dream is to work in a comfortable skyscraper office.
sentences.cn: 目前，我的夢想是進入舒適的摩天大樓去上班。

sentences.en: Nowadays, people's well-being has plummeted while their living standards have skyrocketed.
sentences.cn: 如今，在生活水準上漲的同時，人們的幸福感卻下降了。

sentences.en: The accent falls on the second syllable.
sentences.cn: 重音落在第二個音節上。

sentences.en: The swinging of the ship made many people lose balance.
sentences.cn: 船的搖擺使很多人失去重心。

sentences.en: She looked thoughtful as she sat in the swing on the porch.
sentences.cn: 她若有所思的坐在門前的鞦韆上。

sentences.en: There are all kinds of balloons suspended in the air.
sentences.cn: 天空中懸浮著各種各樣的氣球。

sentences.en: Even if he comes, he cannot demand the meeting to be suspended.
sentences.cn: 即使他來了，他也不能要求會議暫停。

sentences.en: The producer tried to sell its surplus goods at a discount price.
sentences.cn: 生產商努力把過剩產品折後處理掉。

sentences.en: Facts proved that our surmise was correct.
sentences.cn: 事實證明我們的推測是正確的。

sentences.en: The most recent fashion show is bound to bring a new surge of classic styles.
sentences.cn: 最新時裝秀肯定會再一次激發人們對復古風的濃厚興趣。

sentences.en: The beat of the heart is like the surge of the sea.
sentences.cn: 內心的波動就像洶湧的大海一樣。

sentences.en: A service surcharge of 4 dollars was added to your bill.
sentences.cn: 你的帳單上加了四美元的服務附加費。

sentences.en: There is a supplementary electricity apparatus in case the power goes out.
sentences.cn: 萬一停電了 , 我們另外有供電的儀器。

sentences.en: All of my family is living on supplementary benefits.
sentences.cn: 我們全家人都依靠補助金生活。

sentences.en: We overwhelmed our opponents with our superior team.
sentences.cn: 我們以優秀的團隊打垮了對手。

sentences.en: All of his actions must be in compliance with the orders from his superior.
sentences.cn: 他的所有行動都絕對服從上司的命令。

sentences.en: A wound in the soul is more difficult to heal than a superficial one on your body.
sentences.cn: 心靈上的創傷比身體上的創傷更難癒合。

sentences.en: The judge has a superficial viewpoint of this case.
sentences.cn: 這個評判者對這個案例表達了一些膚淺的觀點。

sentences.en: The first time I saw him was two years ago on a sultry afternoon.
sentences.cn: 第一次見他是在兩年前的一個悶熱的午後。

sentences.en: No matter what you say, I can't stand your sultry attitude anymore.
sentences.cn: 無論你說什麼我都無法再忍受你的壞脾氣。

sentences.en: The low cost of accommodations is subtracted from employees' salaries.
sentences.cn: 廉價的住宿費是從員工的薪水裡扣除。

sentences.en: If you subtract 4 from 8, you will have 4.
sentences.cn: 八減去四就得四。

sentences.en: The tide was at its height and submerged coastal land.
sentences.cn: 海水漲到了最高點淹沒了海岸。

sentences.en: Only an experienced diver can submerge very quickly.
sentences.cn: 只有專業的潛水夫能快速下潛。

sentences.en: There's a submarine moving to the east beside this ship.
sentences.cn: 這艘船的旁邊有一個正在向東行駛的潛水艇。

sentences.en: Don't always judge a person based on your own subjective thinking.
sentences.cn: 不要總是憑自己的主觀思維去評價一個人。

sentences.en: Tom forced himself to subdue his fears when he tried to intimidate his opponents.
sentences.cn: 當試圖恐嚇對手時，湯姆強迫自己戰勝恐懼。

sentences.en: The leaders of this country have made a promise that they can subdue the rebels.
sentences.cn: 這個國家的領導人承諾他們一定能制服反叛者。

sentences.en: There is an expression of stubborn on his face.
sentences.cn: 有一種固執的表情流露在他的臉上。

sentences.en: The most stubborn problem is that of how to ride out the recent economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 最棘手的問題是如何度過最近的經濟危機。

sentences.en: The girl lengthened her stride to keep up with her father.
sentences.cn: 這個女孩邁著大步追上她的爸爸。

sentences.en: This child has made enormous strides in his academic performance.
sentences.cn: 這個孩子在他的學習成績上取得了很大進步。

sentences.en: The workers waited until the stray dog was picked up by its owner.
sentences.cn: 工作人員一直等到這隻走失的狗的主人把牠領走。

sentences.en: Alva has strayed from home after her parents divorced.
sentences.cn: 自從父母離婚後，艾娃就一直在外流浪。

sentences.en: It's so incredible that someone can transverse this strait by swimming.
sentences.cn: 真不敢相信，有人可以游泳橫渡海峽。

sentences.en: Don't be scared—I just need a straightforward answer.
sentences.cn: 不用害怕我只需要一個直截了當的回答。

sentences.en: All of us like to be friends with straightforward people.
sentences.cn: 所有的人都喜歡和坦率的人做朋友。

sentences.en: Adolph is short, but he has a stout constitution.
sentences.cn: 阿道夫個子不高，但他竟然有一個強大的體格。

sentences.en: Alfred was influenced by the girl with a stout heart.
sentences.cn: 亞爾弗列得被這個勇敢的女孩影響了。

sentences.en: Don't dream that I would ever stoop to my enemies’ level.
sentences.cn: 不要做夢了，我絕對不會墮落到我的敵人那步田地。

sentences.en: All of the people couldn't make out why he looked at his parents with such a stony stare.
sentences.cn: 所有的人都無法理解，他為什麼用冷酷的眼神看自己的父母。

sentences.en: The wound on his eyelid needed five stitches.
sentences.cn: 他的眼皮需要縫五針。

sentences.en: It is very shabby clothing that Alice is stitching.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲正在縫補就是那件破舊的衣服。

sentences.en: According to the stipulations, we must finish the job today.
sentences.cn: 根據規定我們今天必須完成任務。

sentences.en: What do you think of the stipulations between fathers and sons?
sentences.cn: 你怎麼看待父子之間的契約。

sentences.en: It has been stipulated that new staff can become regular employees after a three-month probationary period.
sentences.cn: 根據規定，新員工三個月試用期後可以轉正職員工。

sentences.en: To educate students in such a way is a total stink.
sentences.cn: 用這種方法教育學生簡直糟糕透了。

sentences.en: Mr. Adams's speech provides a great stimulation for the children who are confused.
sentences.cn: 亞當斯先生的演講給予處於迷茫的孩子們很大的啟發。

sentences.en: Watching science fiction movies can give plenty of stimulations to viewers’ minds.
sentences.cn: 觀看科幻片能大大激發人們的新思路。

sentences.en: The success of the transaction has helped him turn a healthy profit for his company.
sentences.cn: 交易的成功給他公司帶來了一筆豐厚的利潤。

sentences.en: He used to be a very important man, but now he is an ordinary man and lives a tranquil life.
sentences.cn: 以前他也算是個大人物，但是現在過著平常人的寧靜生活。

sentences.en: His appearance broke the tranquil life of the family.
sentences.cn: 他的出現打破了這家人的平靜生活。

sentences.en: You have no right to trample on the dignity of any person.
sentences.cn: 你無權踐踏人的尊嚴。

sentences.en: Do not dress like a tramp.
sentences.cn: 不要穿得像流浪漢一樣。

sentences.en: How can a little girl stand such torture?
sentences.cn: 一個小女孩怎麼能夠經得住如此拷問？

sentences.en: My mother has been suffering from mental torture.
sentences.cn: 我的母親一直遭受著精神上的折磨。

sentences.en: The army needs to cross that raging torrent.
sentences.cn: 這支軍隊需要穿過一條水勢兇猛的急流。

sentences.en: Nothing excruciates people more than lovers tormenting each other.
sentences.cn: 沒有什麼比相愛的人互相折磨更痛苦的事了。

sentences.en: How can a mother bear her child to suffer such torment?
sentences.cn: 怎麼會有母親能忍受自己的孩子受到如此痛苦？

sentences.en: This kind of timber can be used to make fine furniture.
sentences.cn: 這種木材可以用來做精美的傢俱。

sentences.en: It's only a tiny minority of children who can thrive in such a tough life.
sentences.cn: 只有很少一部分小孩能在這種艱苦的生活下茁壯成長。

sentences.en: Everyone knows that a business cannot thrive without an excellent manager.
sentences.cn: 所有人都知道商業興旺離不開一個好的管理者。

sentences.en: It is a thrill to see a real star in the flesh.
sentences.cn: 看見明星本人是一件令粉絲十分興奮的事。

sentences.en: I felt a thrill in my heart in the middle of my speech.
sentences.cn: 在我演講中能夠感覺到內心的顫動。

sentences.en: This rich man has always lived a thrifty life.
sentences.cn: 這個富人一直過著節儉的生活。

sentences.en: At the threshold, I see a man pacing back and forth.
sentences.cn: 在門檻外我看到一個男的來回徘徊。

sentences.en: Without his glasses, he could not see the gradations on the thermometer clearly.
sentences.cn: 由於沒有戴眼鏡，所以他看不清楚溫度計上的刻度。

sentences.en: We shouldn't be too excited as it’s just a theoretical possibility.
sentences.cn: 我們不要高興得太早，這只是理論上的假設。

sentences.en: The TV program shows the most outstanding theatrical performances to its viewers.
sentences.cn: 這個電視節目向觀眾介紹最傑出的戲劇表演作品。

sentences.en: Kindergarten teachers always make theatrical gestures to grab children's attention.
sentences.cn: 幼稚園的老師經常做一些誇張的手勢來吸引小孩的注意力。

sentences.en: The testimony of the three suspects is in line with the report.
sentences.cn: 三名嫌疑犯的證詞與報告一致。

sentences.en: His indifference was testimony of his dissent.
sentences.cn: 他的不理睬表明了他的不贊同。

sentences.en: I prefer a room with a terrace where I can grow flowers.
sentences.cn: 我喜歡帶陽臺的房間，我可以在盆裡種一些花放在那。

sentences.en: This is the first time he tried tentative speaking after a quarrel.
sentences.cn: 自爭吵以後，這是他第一次試探性的開口說話。

sentences.en: We made a tentative experiment according to the supervising method.
sentences.cn: 根據這個指導方法，我們做一次嘗試性的試驗。

sentences.en: Indeed, most people couldn't resist the temptation of living in a big city.
sentences.cn: 的確，大多數人都抵制不住大城市的誘惑。

sentences.en: This kind of plant only grows in temperate regions.
sentences.cn: 這類植物適合生長在溫和的地區。

sentences.en: The doctor advised him to do some temperate exercise during his recovery period.
sentences.cn: 醫生建議他可以在康復期做一些適當的運動。

cn: 乏味的，膩煩的；令人生厭的

sentences.en: If the tedious narration could be eradicated, the paper would be better.
sentences.cn: 如果可以除去那些單調乏味的敘述，這篇論文會更好。

sentences.en: For students, examinations are exceedingly tedious things.
sentences.cn: 對於學生來說，考試是最令人厭煩的事情。

sentences.en: Better not tangle with our parents. They're very tired.
sentences.cn: 最好不要和父母爭執了，他們非常幸苦。

sentences.en: Even my best friend will never understand the tangle in my heart.
sentences.cn: 即使是我最好的朋友也無法理解我內心的糾結。

sentences.en: The naughty boy was playing with a tame horse.
sentences.cn: 這個淘氣的男孩和馴服的馬一起玩。

sentences.en: Disappointingly, this novel has a tame ending.
sentences.cn: 令人失望的是這本小說結局枯燥無味。

sentences.en: We firmly oppose such violent tactics being used on children.
sentences.cn: 我們堅決反對這種針對兒童的暴力行為。

sentences.en: The Board of Directors has strongly disagreed with the tactics.
sentences.cn: 董事會成員強烈反對這個戰略。

sentences.en: My rather tactful wit avoided that awkward question.
sentences.cn: 我很機智的迴避了這個尷尬的問題。

sentences.en: I am disgusted by him because he is too tactful.
sentences.cn: 我很討厭他，因為他太圓滑。

sentences.en: We will make every effort to tackle the difficulties in their life.
sentences.cn: 我們會竭盡全力解決他們生活上的困難。

sentences.en: The teacher asked us to make a chart to tabulate the data.
sentences.cn: 老師要求我們把這些資料製作成表格。

sentences.en: Classical Chinese architecture seems to have a preference for symmetry.
sentences.cn: 中國古代建築偏愛對稱。

sentences.en: The school syllabus should be aimed at average students.
sentences.cn: 學校的教學大綱應該以接受能力中等的學生制定。

sentences.en: Don't forget to hand your syllabus to your teacher.
sentences.cn: 不要忘了把課程表交給任課老師。

sentences.en: If our product is unsatisfactory, you can return it to us.
sentences.cn: 如果不滿意我們的產品，你可以退還給我們。

sentences.en: We need to understand that our parents may try to put unreasonable demands on us.
sentences.cn: 我們需要理解父母可能給我們提出不合理的要求。

sentences.en: Salesmen always have unreasonable views of their products.
sentences.cn: 推銷者總是過度的美化自己的產品。

sentences.en: It is said that the rate of survival was unprecedented.
sentences.cn: 據說這個存活率是前所未有的。

sentences.en: The unprecedented proposal was approved by everyone who was in the meeting room.
sentences.cn: 這個新奇的提議得到了會議室的所有人的支持。

sentences.en: That sounds rather simple, but in fact it's unobtainable in a foreign country.
sentences.cn: 聽起來非常簡單，但是在國外卻無法做到。

sentences.en: This stuff has always been unmerchantable in the market.
sentences.cn: 這些東西在市場上一直沒有銷路。

sentences.en: In school, you'll have unlimited access to the library.
sentences.cn: 在學校，進圖書館的次數是沒有限制的。

sentences.en: A teacher shouldn’t talk about unlimited trivialities to students.
sentences.cn: 一個老師不應該和學生說過多的瑣事。

cn: 不合法的，違法的；私生的

sentences.en: You must bear in mind that unlawful fund-raising is a serious crime.
sentences.cn: 你必須謹記非法集資是非常嚴重的違法行為。

sentences.en: He's the most laughed at man in this city for he is unlawful.
sentences.cn: 因為他是私生子，所以他成為這個城市中最遭人嘲笑的人。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me that he would do such undue actions.
sentences.cn: 我從來沒想過他竟然會做出如此過份的行為。

sentences.en: The whole family are worried that the child can't undo the knot in his mind about adoption.
sentences.cn: 全家人都在擔心這個孩子無法解開被領養的心結。

sentences.en: Don’t you think it’s time to undo those bureaucracies?
sentences.cn: 你不覺得是時候廢除這些繁文縟節嗎？

sentences.en: You should claim against the car insurance from your underwriter.
sentences.cn: 你應該從保險商那裡要求得到汽車保險金。

sentences.en: The banker said that you could get an underwriter to sign the loan for you.
sentences.cn: 銀行工作人員說您需要一個擔保人為您的貸款做擔保。

sentences.en: For three years, she had to bear unbearable physical abuse from her husband.
sentences.cn: 三年來，他再也無法忍受丈夫對她的身體虐待。

sentences.en: All the students were unanimous in approving the plan.
sentences.cn: 所有學生都一致的支持這個計畫。

sentences.en: Adam has lived a quiet life, but his heart has been in a turbulent riot.
sentences.cn: 亞當過著平靜的生活，但是他的內心卻處於激蕩不安之中。

sentences.en: The seas grew turbulent, battering at the shore.
sentences.cn: 海浪變得洶湧澎湃，不停地拍打著海岸。

sentences.en: The tumult of Tom's mind has been moderated by this conversation.
sentences.cn: 這次談話使湯姆躁動的心平靜了下來。

sentences.en: The tumult in the streets affects everybody’s mood in the house.
sentences.cn: 街上的喧嘩牽動著屋子裡的每一個人的心。

sentences.en: The child tumbled off the chair and started to cry.
sentences.cn: 這個小孩從椅子上跌倒哭了起來。

sentences.en: He is very disappointed because stock prices took a tumble in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他非常的失望，因為股票價格上午暴跌。

sentences.en: Marry tugged so hard that the curtains broke.
sentences.cn: 瑪莉使勁一拉，窗簾拉斷了。

sentences.en: As soon as he got home, his dog trotted to greet him.
sentences.cn: 他一回到家，狗就小跑來迎接。

sentences.en: I admire those people who always want to live adventurous lives in tropical areas.
sentences.cn: 我非常崇拜那些一直想到熱帶地區過冒險的生活的人。

sentences.en: As a child, he lived south of the Tropic of Cancer.
sentences.cn: 小時候，他住在北迴歸線的南面。

sentences.en: Don't forget to sort your things for travelling to the tropics.
sentences.cn: 不要忘記整理熱帶旅行的東西。

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but it is hard work to finish.
sentences.cn: 這些聽起來瑣碎，但是很難完成。

sentences.en: Everyone has trivial ideals which push them to go forward.
sentences.cn: 每個人都有個平凡的理想推動者他們前進。

sentences.en: The Great Wall of China is a triumph of architecture.
sentences.cn: 長城是一個建築上的巨大成就。

sentences.en: The triple cash bonus he received came from his excellent work.
sentences.cn: 由於出色的工作他獲得了三倍的現金獎勵。

sentences.en: The gardener is trimming the hedges with shears.
sentences.cn: 這名園藝工人正在拿著大剪刀修剪樹籬。

sentences.en: If you pull the trigger of that gun, you will be sent to the prison.
sentences.cn: 如果你扣動扳機，你會被送進監獄。

sentences.en: He told me to stay away from the trigger.
sentences.cn: 他告訴我要遠離那個觸發器。

sentences.en: As citizens, we resolutely oppose all acts of treason.
sentences.cn: 身為公民，我們堅決反對一切叛國行為。

sentences.en: She is a very kind girl who won't even let the people around her tread on an ant.
sentences.cn: 她是一個非常善良的女孩，她甚至不讓身邊的人踩死一隻螞蟻。

sentences.en: His heavy treading exposed his uneasiness when he walked out of the manager’s office.
sentences.cn: 當他走出經理辦公室的時候，沉重的腳步暴露出了他的不安。

sentences.en: He traverses the bustling streets but still could not find the boy.
sentences.cn: 他穿過繁華的街道，但還是沒能找到那個男孩。

sentences.en: The transverse bridge was built for people to cross the river.
sentences.cn: 這座橫向的橋為了讓人們渡過這條河。

sentences.en: Looking through this transparent glass, we can enjoy the beautiful scenery outside.
sentences.cn: 通過這塊透明的玻璃，我們可以欣賞到外面美麗的風景。

sentences.en: The answer to this question is transparent, but he still has not replied.
sentences.cn: 這個問題的答案顯而易見，但是他始終沒有回答。

sentences.en: No matter what you say, she is full of zealous emotion in her studies.
sentences.cn: 無論你怎麼說，她對研究充滿著熱心。

sentences.en: Only the extremely rich can enjoy the luxury of a private yacht.
sentences.cn: 只有非常有錢的人才能享受私人遊艇的奢華。

sentences.en: The wretched boy has lost his parents.
sentences.cn: 這個可憐的男孩失去了他的媽媽。

sentences.en: The man won the first prize in the wrestling competition.
sentences.cn: 這個人在摔角比賽中獲得了第一名。

sentences.en: They wrestled fiercly with the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他們與困境進行了一次激烈的鬥爭。

sentences.en: Parting with her best friend was a great wrench in her life.
sentences.cn: 同摯友分別對她是極大的痛苦。

sentences.en: The airplane was a total wreck.
sentences.cn: 這架飛機完全報廢了。

sentences.en: He incurred the wrath of his father by dropping out of high school without his consent.
sentences.cn: 他未經父親同意就輟學，使父親震怒。

sentences.en: The article is too wordy; you'd better make some corrections.
sentences.cn: 這篇文章太過冗長，你最好修改一下。

sentences.en: Leaves wither in cold weather.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天氣裡，樹葉枯萎了。

sentences.en: This movie star made a withdrawal of her statement and issued a public apology.
sentences.cn: 這個電影明星要收回那些話並公開道歉。

sentences.en: His parents have withdrawn him from school for treatment.
sentences.cn: 為了治療，他父母讓他退了學。

sentences.en: This large winery produces some of the best wines.
sentences.cn: 這家大的酒廠出產一些最好的葡萄酒。

sentences.en: The beautiful woman was attacked by a man wielding a knife.
sentences.cn: 這位漂亮的女士遭到一名持刀男子的襲擊。

sentences.en: Not all rich men are wicked.
sentences.cn: 並不是有錢人都很壞。

sentences.en: Morning exercise is a wholesome exercise for us.
sentences.cn: 晨練對我們是一種有益於身心健康的運動。

sentences.en: Such a fur coat usually wholesales for much less.
sentences.cn: 這種皮衣批發出售通常要便宜得多。

sentences.en: The referee blew his whistle to signal the beginning of the race.
sentences.cn: 裁判的口哨聲表示跑步比賽的開始。

sentences.en: At that moment her thoughts were in a whirl.
sentences.cn: 在那個時刻，她的思緒一片混亂。

sentences.en: The loss of the game made them waver in their faith.
sentences.cn: 競爭的失敗動搖著他們的信念。

sentences.en: You should install a watertight door.
sentences.cn: 你應該安裝水密門。

sentences.en: Emily bought me a waterproof watch for my birthday.
sentences.cn: 艾蜜莉為慶祝我的生日給我買了一隻防水錶。

sentences.en: It's so relaxing to be able to meander along the waterfront.
sentences.cn: 我們沿著海濱漫步是多麼愜意。

sentences.en: This computer is still under warranty.
sentences.cn: 這台電腦仍在保固期中。

sentences.en: Jack reached into his wardrobe and extracted a coat.
sentences.cn: 傑克從衣櫃裡拿出一件大衣。

sentences.en: There is a butler in the hospital ward.
sentences.cn: 病房裡有一位男僕。

sentences.en: Tom didn't waive his right to compete.
sentences.cn: 湯姆沒有放棄競爭的權利。

sentences.en: It has taken a long time to wade through the water.
sentences.cn: 涉水而過花費了很長時間。

cn: 易受傷害的；易受攻擊的

sentences.en: Lacking a father's and a mother’s love, many leftover children feel very vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 許多留守兒童既缺乏父愛又缺乏母愛，所以感情上易受傷害。

sentences.en: Without the protection of its mother, a cub is vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 沒有母親的保護，這隻幼獸容易受到攻擊。

sentences.en: It is the right of every consumer to uphold their rights and interests.
sentences.cn: 每位消費者都有權利維護他們的消費權益。

sentences.en: As for this question, we could not possibly uphold such a decision.
sentences.cn: 在這個問題上，我們不能接受這種決定。

sentences.en: Children need to wash their hands with antibiotic liquid soap.
sentences.cn: 孩子們洗手要用抗菌的洗手液。

sentences.en: My visit to America was antecedent to this event.
sentences.cn: 我去美國是在這件事之前。

sentences.en: It's Michael who lost to his antagonist.
sentences.cn: 是麥可輸給了對手。

sentences.en: The antagonism between the rich and the poor is a contradiction that can't be resolved.
sentences.cn: 貧富之間的對立一直都是不可解決的矛盾。

sentences.en: Let's not say anything about that amplifier.
sentences.cn: 我們不要再談論那個擴音機了。第一人稱祈使句的否定形式

sentences.en: Ammunition was scarce during the war.
sentences.cn: 戰爭時期彈藥極其匱乏。

sentences.en: Let's try to reach an amicable settlement.
sentences.cn: 讓我們試著達成和解。如果祈使物件包括說話人和

sentences.en: This amiable old man is considered as one of the greatest calligraphers.
sentences.cn: 這位和藹的老人被譽為最偉大的書法家之一。

sentences.en: The word needs to be modified because of its ambiguity.
sentences.cn: 這個單字需要修改一下，因為它有歧義。

sentences.en: The ambient temperature of the room will rise as the number of people in it increases.
sentences.cn: 房間的環境溫度隨著人數的增加而上升。

sentences.en: They have the alternatives of either receiving higher education or finding jobs.
sentences.cn: 他們可以選擇接受高等教育，或是選擇找工作。

sentences.en: I'm afraid you will be unable to find alternative means of transport.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你無法找到其他的運送方法。

sentences.en: Why not talk about the alternation of crops?

sentences.en: He said, “My painting creates a sense of alienation from society”.
sentences.cn: 他說：「我的畫會產生一種脫離社會的感覺。」

sentences.en: The driver was in an alcoholic stupor.

sentences.en: Pay more attention to those slight ailments that can sometimes be fatal.
sentences.cn: 不要不關注那些小毛病，它們有時候會要命的。

sentences.en: The uncertain return time of her husband agitates her.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫的不明確的歸期使她焦慮不安。

sentences.en: The group who tried to agitate the others at the protest has been arrested.
sentences.cn: 在抗議活動中試圖煽動他人的那群人已經被逮捕了。

sentences.en: There has been a growing concern about urban aggregation.
sentences.cn: 愈來愈多的人們開始憂心城市集聚現象。

sentences.en: All of the aforesaid materials do not conform with the case.
sentences.cn: 上述材料均與案件不符。

sentences.en: She thinks there is a close affinity between the English and French languages.
sentences.cn: 她認為，英語和法語十分相似。

sentences.en: Thirteen small firms were affiliated with the listing corporation in the last year.
sentences.cn: 這家上市公司去年將十三家小公司納入麾下。

sentences.en: The old man seems to be affectionate towards kids.
sentences.cn: 那位老人似乎很疼愛孩子們。

sentences.en: People can't stand aerial pollution any longer.
sentences.cn: 人們再也不能忍受空氣污染了。

sentences.en: Adversity is usually considered as a stepping stone to success.
sentences.cn: 人們往往把逆境當成是成功的墊腳石。

sentences.en: Admittedly, she likes that dress very much, but she didn't buy it.
sentences.cn: 她確實很喜歡那件連衣裙，但是，她並沒有買下來。

sentences.en: Sure enough, the little girl is quite interested in acrobatics on high wires.

sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是，長期飲食過量可能會危及健康。

sentences.en: The government has agreed to abrogate the contract.
sentences.cn: 政府已經同意廢除這個合約。

sentences.en: The scientist was upset about his abortive attempts.
sentences.cn: 這位科學家對這次失敗的嘗試很懊惱。

sentences.en: Abortion can sometimes cause a lot of damage to a woman's body.
sentences.cn: 流產有時候會對女性造成很大傷害。

sentences.en: The case was in abeyance before the judge made the final decision.
sentences.cn: 法官做最後決定之前，案子暫時擱置。

sentences.en: It's anticipated that the two countries will reach a bilateral agreement.
sentences.cn: 希望這兩個國家可以達成雙邊協定。

sentences.en: They appear to have a bias against people in the service sector.
sentences.cn: 他們對服務業似乎心存偏見。

sentences.en: The university is obviously biased in favour of the sciences.
sentences.cn: 這所大學顯然是偏重理科。

sentences.en: Seldom is she bewildered by riddles.
sentences.cn: 她難得一次猜不出謎底。

sentences.en: It is unnecessary to prohibit the sale of alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 沒有必要禁止酒精飲料的銷售。

sentences.en: Under no circumstances should you betray your principles.
sentences.cn: 不論如何，你都不能背叛自己的原則。

sentences.en: Is it William that betrayed the secret?
sentences.cn: 是威廉洩露了這個祕密嗎？

sentences.en: They finally decided to bestow an honor on the professor.
sentences.cn: 他們最終決定，授予榮譽給那位教授。

sentences.en: It was Nicholas who became the beneficiary of his will.
sentences.cn: 尼可拉斯成為了他的遺囑的受益人。

sentences.en: A stranger was seen battering on the door.
sentences.cn: 有人看見，那個陌生人接連砸門。

sentences.en: I have no idea why they decided to buy the barren land.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他們為什麼會決定買下這塊貧瘠的土地。

sentences.en: We would like to buy the painting at a bargain price.
sentences.cn: 我們想要低價購買這幅畫。

sentences.en: How did you bargain with the salesman over the car price?
sentences.cn: 你是怎麼與賣家協商車價的？

sentences.en: She was completely baffled as to who put forward the proposal.
sentences.cn: 她完全不知道，是誰提出了這個提議。

sentences.en: I wonder if he has the backbone to admit his mistake.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，他是否有勇氣承認自己的過錯。

sentences.en: Harry encountered a severe car accident and hurt his backbone last month.
sentences.cn: 哈利上個月遭遇一場嚴重的車禍並傷到了脊椎。

sentences.cn: 正是在經濟的支持下，教育才會發展的更快速。

sentences.en: It's Ronald who agreed to the audacious plan.
sentences.cn: 羅納德同意這個大膽的計畫。

sentences.cn: 這樁兇殺案開庭前，被告的辯護律師突然失蹤了。

sentences.en: It was his uncle that gave a lecture on unusual atmospheric conditions.
sentences.cn: 他的叔叔就大氣的異常情形進行講演。

sentences.en: It's Kim that acted with assurance in the difficult situation.
sentences.cn: 在困境中，金滿懷信心地行事。

sentences.en: I'm afraid her assumption is based on wrong suppositions.
sentences.cn: 恐怕她的理論是基於錯誤的假想之上。

sentences.en: He was assassinated when he was visiting a foreign country.
sentences.cn: 他在去國外訪問的時候被暗殺了。

sentences.en: The aristocrats who supported the reform gained a complete victory.
sentences.cn: 支持改革的貴族大獲全勝。

sentences.en: She is an ardent supporter of the singer wearing the black coat.
sentences.cn: 她是這位穿著黑色大衣的歌星的忠實支持者。

sentences.en: You briefly introduce his architectural features.
sentences.cn: 你來簡介他的建築風格。

sentences.en: Don't complain to that archaeologist about your troubles.
sentences.cn: 不要對那位考古學家抱怨你的困難。

sentences.en: You would be better off taking the matter to arbitration.
sentences.cn: 你最好將此事交付仲裁。

sentences.en: She called me to apprize me that the meeting was going to start.
sentences.cn: 她電話通知我會議要開始了。

sentences.cn: 你分不清這對雙胞胎，因為他們沒有明顯的差別。

sentences.en: Say something about the head-on collision between the two trucks, will you?

sentences.en: This company worked in close collaboration with this university on the research.
sentences.cn: 這家公司與這所大學密切合作，來進行這項研究。

sentences.en: Let us collaborate with his older brother on the project, okay?

sentences.cn: 巧合的是，他們兩個恰好在同一輛公車上。

sentences.en: The start of the international conference coincided with the fire.
sentences.cn: 此次國際會議與火災同時發生。

sentences.en: Let's talk about the lack of cohesion within the political party, shall we?
sentences.cn: 我們來談談黨派內的凝聚力缺乏的問題，好嗎？

sentences.cn: 生日晚會上的空啤酒瓶正亂糟糟地堆在地上。

sentences.en: Alice got her friend to clean up all of the clutter in the house.
sentences.cn: 愛麗絲找了朋友一起來收拾房間裡的淩亂的雜物。

sentences.cn: 聽到這個壞消息之後，那個年輕人忍不住咬緊了牙關。

sentences.en: The claimant has good reason to make an insurance claim.
sentences.cn: 那位索賠人有充分理由索取保險金。

sentences.en: Please write down the exact circumference of the earth.

sentences.en: The patient had better be cautious of his high cholesterol level, hadn't he?
sentences.cn: 那位病人最好當心膽固醇含量過高，不是嗎？

sentences.cn: 蘇菲亞吃魚很小心，以免被魚刺卡住。

sentences.en: He is going to choke; loosen his collar.
sentences.cn: 他要窒息了，把他的領子解開。

sentences.en: The secretary was censured for betraying the secret.
sentences.cn: 那位祕書因為洩密而受到指責。

sentences.en: Your foolish decision will surely lay yourself open to public censure.
sentences.cn: 你的愚蠢決定必定會讓你受到眾人的責備。

sentences.en: What a cautious censor!
sentences.cn: 多麼謹慎的檢查員！

sentences.en: These papers will be heavily censored soon.

sentences.en: Please help yourself to some caviar.
sentences.cn: 請隨意吃些魚子醬。

sentences.en: He dislikes the cathedral, doesn't he?
sentences.cn: 他並不喜歡這個有大教堂，不是嗎？

sentences.en: These are the catastrophic consequences of the earthquake, aren't they?
sentences.cn: 這些就是此次地震的災難性後果，不是嗎？

sentences.en: Chlorine is the catalyst of this chemical reaction.
sentences.cn: 氯是這個化學反應中的催化劑。

sentences.en: This is a full cartridge, rather than a blank one.
sentences.cn: 這是實心彈，而不是空心彈。

cn: 主要的，基本的；深紅色的

sentences.en: Everybody has memorized the cardinal principles of grammar, haven't they?
sentences.cn: 每個人都記住了語法的基本準則，不是嗎？

sentences.en: She prefers the cardinal necklace to the pink one.
sentences.cn: 相較於那條粉紅色的項鍊，她更喜歡那條深紅色的。

sentences.en: Noah is scarcely the right person to go out canvassing for votes.
sentences.cn: 諾亞並不適合出去拉選票。

sentences.en: I condole with you on your unfortunate circumstances.
sentences.cn: 我對你的不幸的遭遇表示同情。

sentences.en: This small-calibre pistol is suitable for female soldiers.
sentences.cn: 這款小口徑手槍適合女兵。

sentences.en: You need one more filing cabinet, don't you?
sentences.cn: 你還需要一個檔案櫃，不是嗎？

sentences.en: This has been regarded as a significant breakthrough in scientific research.
sentences.cn: 這被視為科學研究史上的重大突破。

sentences.en: There is absolutely no need to boycott foreign imports.
sentences.cn: 完全沒有必要抵制外國貨物。

sentences.en: They plan to put GMO crops under a boycott.
sentences.cn: 他們打算抵制基因改造作物。

sentences.en: We should view bourgeois ideology in its true perspective.
sentences.cn: 我們應該恰當地看到中產階級意識形態。

sentences.en: Never have they been prejudiced toward the bourgeois.
sentences.cn: 他們從未對中產階級有過什麼偏見。

sentences.en: The boundaries of the nations always arouse a lot of controversy.
sentences.cn: 國界問題總是會引起諸多爭議。

sentences.en: The courier blundered by giving me the wrong phone number.
sentences.cn: 那位快遞員留給我的是錯誤的電話號碼。

sentences.en: Be careful not to make such a blunder again.
sentences.cn: 當心，不要再犯這樣的錯誤。

sentences.en: Never have I read such a wonderful biography as this.
sentences.cn: 我從未讀過這樣精彩的傳記。

sentences.en: All employees are expected to act in conformity with the rules.
sentences.cn: 所有雇員都要遵循規章制度。

sentences.en: The illegally imported goods had to be confiscated, didn't they?
sentences.cn: 這些走私貨物必須充公，不是嗎？

sentences.cn: 她發現，要確切地描述太陽系的分佈狀況，是困難的。

sentences.en: Sorry, you have no access to the confidential information.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，你無權查看機密情報。

sentences.en: It's wise to speak in a confidential tone with your employees.
sentences.cn: 用信任的語氣與員工交談，這是明智的。

sentences.en: His confederate must have been missing for two days, didn't he?
sentences.cn: 他的同夥一定是已經失蹤了兩天，不是嗎？

sentences.en: We could confederate with their company, if needed.
sentences.cn: 如果有需要的話，我們可以與他們的公司結盟。

sentences.en: Environmental protection will be conducive to the public good.
sentences.cn: 環境保護將會有益於公共權益。

sentences.en: I hope you will condone her fault, if possible.
sentences.cn: 如果可以，我希望你可以寬恕她的過錯。

sentences.en: If I may say so, he will never condescend to say hello to strangers.
sentences.cn: 如果我可以這麼說的話，他絕不會屈尊對陌生人問好的。

sentences.en: This paper is regarded as a brilliant condensation of the latest scientific research.
sentences.cn: 這篇論文被視為最新科學研究的精華。

sentences.en: The driver must have suffered from severe concussion, haven't he?
sentences.cn: 那位病人一定是患有嚴重腦震盪，不是嗎？

sentences.en: The book fair is concurrent with the party conference.
sentences.cn: 此次書展是與黨派會議同時進行的。

sentences.en: You must have concocted a drink from different kinds of juice.
sentences.cn: 你一定是用不同的果汁來調製了一杯飲料。
