sentences.cn: 那個年輕的職員捏造了一些瞎話來解釋他缺席此次會議的原因。

sentences.en: The workers had no choice but to make some concessions with management.
sentences.cn: 這些工人別無選擇，只能對資方妥協。

sentences.en: You might find it hard to gain the mining concession.
sentences.cn: 你也許會發現，難以獲取採礦權。

sentences.en: His scheme ended in failure, though admittedly it was brilliant in its conception.
sentences.cn: 他的計畫構想得很好，最終卻以失敗告終。

sentences.en: They have no conception of how to deal with the issue, do they?
sentences.cn: 他們不知道該如何解決這件事，不是嗎？

sentences.en: She is a strange person who cannot conceive there are people who disagree with her.
sentences.cn: 她是個奇怪的人因為她不能理解為何會有與她意見不同的人。

sentences.en: Your conceit will be a great obstacle on the path to success.
sentences.cn: 你的自負將會是成功路上的巨大障礙。

sentences.en: There are some concave lenses in the box, aren't there?
sentences.cn: 這個盒子裡有一些凹透鏡，不是嗎？

sentences.en: People are always fond of hearing compliments, aren't they?
sentences.cn: 人們都總是喜歡聽到讚美，不是嗎？

sentences.en: We all complimented the chef on the excellent meal.
sentences.cn: 我們都稱讚那位廚師做菜極佳。

sentences.en: In compliance with his request, we have made some modifications to the design.
sentences.cn: 依照他的要求，我們對這份設計圖進行了修改。

sentences.en: She is busy preparing for the competitive examinations for government posts.
sentences.cn: 她正忙著準備公職遴選考試。

sentences.en: You must be competent at your work, mustn't you?
sentences.cn: 你必須勝任你的工作，是嗎？

sentences.en: Drivers are reminded that they should drive their cars at a speed compatible with safety.
sentences.cn: 要提醒司機們的是，他們要以符合安全要求的速度開車。

sentences.en: Against all expectations, this printer is not compatible with this computer.
sentences.cn: 出乎意料的是，這台印表機與這台電腦不相容。

sentences.en: We decided to make a comparative study of the two universities.
sentences.cn: 我們決定對這兩所大學進行比較研究。

sentences.en: The country has been in a great commotion in the past year.
sentences.cn: 在過去的一年時間中，這個國家處於極度的動亂之中。

sentences.en: She said that the agreement would be beneficial to the Commonwealth, didn't she?
sentences.cn: 她說，這項協議於聯邦有利，不是嗎？

sentences.en: The manager commended him on his excellent performance.
sentences.cn: 經理稱讚了他的傑出業績。

sentences.en: They will commence the award ceremony in half an hour.
sentences.cn: 此次頒獎典禮將於半小時之後開始。

sentences.en: I think this monument commemorates the martyrs who died in the battle, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 我認為，這座紀念碑紀念的是在此次戰鬥中犧牲的烈士，不是嗎？

sentences.en: The likelihood is that it will release combustible gases.
sentences.cn: 它可能會釋放出可燃氣體。

sentences.en: The political columnist is discontented with his salary.
sentences.cn: 那位政治專欄作家對自己的薪資並不滿意。

sentences.en: He was placed in the custody of his uncle at the age of five.
sentences.cn: 五歲開始，他由叔叔監護。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that the man will be held in custody.
sentences.cn: 那個人可能會被拘留。

sentences.en: You can see the crystallization of the salt when the water evaporates.
sentences.cn: 水蒸發的時候你就會看到鹽粒結晶了。

sentences.en: I would like to make a study of the process of the crystallization of a vague idea into a definite plan.
sentences.cn: 我想要研究模糊的想法具體化成明確的計畫的過程。

sentences.en: The cloth which you chose seems to crumple easily.
sentences.cn: 你選擇的那種布料似乎很容易起皺。

sentences.en: It's said that the wheat in this cropland grows well.
sentences.cn: 據說，農田裡的麥子長勢很好。

sentences.en: They cannot help but envy him for his handsome craggy features.
sentences.cn: 他們忍不住嫉妒他那五官輪廓分明的英俊相貌。

sentences.en: Remember to countersign the cheque on the back.
sentences.cn: 記得背書支票。

sentences.en: I'm afraid you have forgotten to give the countersign.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你忘記要給會簽了。

sentences.en: The corrupt mayor was removed finally.
sentences.cn: 貪污腐敗的市長終於被撤職了。

sentences.en: Be careful. Don't let the metal corrode by the acid.
sentences.cn: 當心，不要讓金屬被酸腐蝕掉。

sentences.en: It took the professor three days to analyse the corpus of spoken dialects.
sentences.cn: 那位教授用了三天時間來分析方言的匯總資料。

sentences.en: Her cordial smile left a deep impression on us.
sentences.cn: 她的熱誠微笑讓我們印象深刻。

sentences.en: It's of great importance to coordinate our efforts to get out of trouble.
sentences.cn: 我們要協同努力，走出困境，這是很重要的。

sentences.en: There seems to be something wrong with the x and y coordinates on the graph, doesn’t there?
sentences.cn: 這個圖表上的x 和y 座標似乎有些不對，不是嗎？

sentences.en: The cooperative venture is likely to achieve great success.
sentences.cn: 這個合作企業可能會取得極大的成功。

sentences.en: You had better think twice about investing in the agricultural cooperative.
sentences.cn: 你最好慎重思考，要不要投資這個農業合作社。

sentences.en: Conventional wisdom is that unemployment is one of the major challenges facing the government.
sentences.cn: 人們普遍認為，失業是政府所面臨的一大挑戰。

sentences.en: I'm afraid she doesn’t have the courage to contradict him.
sentences.cn: 恐怕她並沒有勇氣去反駁他。

sentences.en: His accounts seem to contradict the news report.
sentences.cn: 他的話與那篇新聞報導似乎是相互矛盾的。

sentences.en: He told me, “You should be careful with all the possible contingencies”.
sentences.cn: 他告訴我，「你應該當心一切可能的偶然事件」。

sentences.en: The well-known holiday resort has a typical continental climate.
sentences.cn: 這個著名的度假勝地是典型的大陸性氣候。

sentences.en: We all feel a great need to contend for the prize.
sentences.cn: 我們都認為，很有必要爭取這個獎項。

sentences.en: I would contend that the gap between rich and poor is one of our most serious challenges.
sentences.cn: 我認為，貧富差距是我們所面臨的最為嚴重的挑戰之一。

sentences.en: You used to often look down upon his mean and contemptible behaviors, didn't you?
sentences.cn: 你過去常常看不起他那樣吝嗇而又卑鄙的行為，不是嗎？

sentences.en: His elder brother is contemplating studying abroad.
sentences.cn: 他的哥哥正在考慮出國留學。

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, this is a highly contagious disease.
sentences.cn: 事實上，這是一種傳染性很強的疾病。

sentences.en: His great wealth consummates his ambitions.
sentences.cn: 極大的財富是他的雄心壯志的完美結果。

sentences.en: I hope you can cope with the problem with consummate skills.
sentences.cn: 希望你可以完美地解決這個問題。

sentences.en: Not until you told me was I aware of rampant consumerism.
sentences.cn: 直到你告訴我，我才意識到顧客至上主義的普及程度。

sentences.en: I'm afraid your silence will be construed as approval.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你的沉默會被視為認同。

sentences.en: He was criticized for consorting with drug-dealers.
sentences.cn: 有人指責他與毒販結交。

sentences.en: Seldom did his behaviors consort with his public statements on morality.
sentences.cn: 他的行為鮮少與他所標榜的仁義道德相符。

sentences.en: The new employee seems to be more conservative than his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 那位新進員工似乎比同事們更保守一些。

sentences.en: I'm afraid the conservative might raise an objection to the plan.
sentences.cn: 恐怕那位因循守舊者會對這個計畫提出異議。

sentences.en: Why did he choose to consecrate his life to the relief of suffering?
sentences.cn: 他為什麼會選擇獻身於解除苦難的事業？

sentences.en: The wine connoisseur feels great affection for his little son.
sentences.cn: 那位葡萄酒鑒賞家很疼愛他的小兒子。

sentences.en: The little boy feels like learning how to conjure.
sentences.cn: 那個小男孩想要學變戲法。

sentences.en: I conjure you most earnestly to think twice about your decision.
sentences.cn: 我最誠摯地懇求你慎重思考你的決定。

sentences.en: Let me recommend a mining conglomerate to you, okay?
sentences.cn: 我給你推薦個礦業集團，好嗎？

sentences.en: Neither the soup nor the wine started to congeal.
sentences.cn: 湯和酒都沒有凍結。

sentences.en: The central government devolved more power to the local governments in order to better develop local economies.
sentences.cn: 中央政府向地方政府下放更多的權力是為了更好地發展地方經濟。

sentences.en: Linda needs to devolve her duties before she leaves.
sentences.cn: 琳達離開之前需要移交職務。

sentences.en: A deviation from the rules is likely to cause great losses.
sentences.cn: 背離規則可能會導致極大的損失。

cn: 徹底毀壞，摧毀；使震驚，使難以承受

sentences.en: It's been reported that the unexpected earthquake devastated the small village.
sentences.cn: 據報導，突如其來的這場地震徹底損毀了這個小村莊。

sentences.en: I’m afraid your father will be devastated by the bad news.
sentences.cn: 恐怕你父親無法承受這個壞消息。

sentences.en: As is known to all, smoking is detrimental to our health.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，吸菸有害健康。

sentences.en: The bomb is supposed to detonate in twenty minutes.
sentences.cn: 這顆炸彈應於二十分鐘之後引爆。

sentences.en: His condition deteriorated without prompt treatment.
sentences.cn: 沒有及時治療，他的病情惡化了。

sentences.en: The little girl found a synthetic detergent in the box.
sentences.cn: 那個小女孩在盒子裡找到了一瓶合成洗滌劑。

sentences.en: It's desirable that the despicable man be punished at once.
sentences.cn: 真希望這個卑鄙的小人馬上得到報應。

sentences.en: The land had been desolate for many years because of the poor soil.
sentences.cn: 這塊地因為土壤貧瘠已經荒廢很多年了。

sentences.en: The earthquake desolated the city.
sentences.cn: 地震使這座城市淪為一片廢墟。

sentences.en: That poor old man lives in a derelict house alone.
sentences.cn: 那位可憐的老人獨自居住在廢棄的房子中。

sentences.en: We should first consider the depletion of the ozone layer.
sentences.cn: 我們要首先考慮臭氧層的消耗。

sentences.en: Foolish people think that natural resources are not depleted.
sentences.cn: 愚蠢的人認為大自然的資源是不會被耗盡的。

sentences.en: The demure young lady has found a well-paid job.
sentences.cn: 那位端莊的年輕女士找到了一份薪資優厚的工作。

sentences.en: He was demoted because of improper management.
sentences.cn: 他因為管理不當而被降職。

sentences.en: The demolition of the old factory will begin in three days.
sentences.cn: 三天後將開始拆除舊有工廠。

sentences.en: They were hesitant about demolishing the slums.
sentences.cn: 要不要拆除貧民區讓他們猶豫不決。

sentences.en: I'm confident that you will surely demolish her argument.
sentences.cn: 我相信，你一定會駁倒她的論點。

sentences.en: The police have been investigating the cause of his demise.
sentences.cn: 員警一直在調查他的死因。

sentences.en: An adult will demean himself by stealing.
sentences.cn: 一個成年人偷竊會降低人格。

sentences.en: You're under a delusion on this matter.
sentences.cn: 你對這件事情有個誤解。

sentences.en: The secretary was severely punished for his delinquent behaviors.
sentences.cn: 那位祕書因其失職行為而受到了嚴厲的處罰。

sentences.en: I wonder how you deal with juvenile delinquents.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，你們是如何處理少年犯的。

sentences.en: There is a growing concern over the increase in juvenile delinquency.
sentences.cn: 青少年犯罪現象的增多，愈來愈讓人擔憂。

sentences.en: It's strange that they did not defray the costs at our request.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他們並沒有如我們所要求的那樣支付費用。

sentences.en: Someone has deflated his car tyres.
sentences.cn: 有人把他的汽車輪胎放了氣。

sentences.en: Congress is debating whether to deflate their currency.
sentences.cn: 國會正在討論是否要緊縮通貨。

sentences.en: You should give a definitive answer as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 你應該儘快給出明確的答覆。

sentences.en: It's your fault for sending a defiant message to her.
sentences.cn: 你給了她挑釁的資訊，這是你的過錯。

sentences.en: That policeman is said to be skilled at deduction.
sentences.cn: 據說，那位員警擅長推理。

sentences.en: They have no objection to the tax deduction from their wages.
sentences.cn: 對於薪資中扣除的稅費，他們並無異議。

sentences.en: The law says that no person is allowed to decry the reputation of others at random.
sentences.cn: 法律規定任何人不得隨意詆毀他人的名譽。

sentences.en: This decimal coinage is widely accepted in these countries.
sentences.cn: 這些國家都廣泛採用十進幣制。

sentences.en: You had better not try to obtain wealth by deception.
sentences.cn: 你最好不要試圖騙取財富。

cn: 小巧的，精緻的；挑剔的，講究的

sentences.en: She bought a dainty porcelain cup for her daughter.
sentences.cn: 她給女兒買了個精緻的瓷杯。

sentences.en: The dainty eater was disappointed by the meal in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 那個挑剔的食客對這家餐廳的食物感到失望。

sentences.en: Thousands of people were evacuated to the countryside during the war.
sentences.cn: 在戰時，成千上萬的人們都被疏散到鄉下去了。

sentences.en: The troops received an order to evacuate the region.
sentences.cn: 部隊接到命令，撤離這個地區。

sentences.en: You should try to maintain an equilibrium when riding a bike.
sentences.cn: 騎自行車的時候，你應該盡力保持平衡。

sentences.en: How will history remember this epoch?
sentences.cn: 在歷史上，這個時代將會如何被記得呢？

sentences.en: Political extremism in this region seems to be reaching epidemic proportions.
sentences.cn: 政治極端主義在這個地區似乎已經愈演愈烈。

sentences.en: The local government has taken some measures to deal with the outbreak of the influenza epidemic.
sentences.cn: 當地政府已經採取了措施來應對流行性感冒的爆發。

sentences.en: Enzymes are necessary to our body's functioning.
sentences.cn: 我們認為，酶對我們的身體機能運作是很有必要的。

sentences.en: He sincerely entreated his manager to provide him with another chance.
sentences.cn: 他誠懇地請求經理再給他一次機會。

sentences.en: The arrangement of the furniture as recommended by him will form a striking ensemble.
sentences.cn: 他推薦的傢俱擺放模式，會有很好的整體效果。

sentences.en: She says a pink scarf does indeed complete your ensemble.
sentences.cn: 她說，一條粉紅色的圍巾確實讓你的衣著搭配得很完美。

cn: 經驗主義的，以經驗為根據的

sentences.en: She appears to have a prejudice against empirical research.
sentences.cn: 她對經驗主義研究似乎心存偏見。

sentences.en: The plan is supposed to be at the embryo stage.
sentences.cn: 這個計畫應該還在醞釀中。

sentences.en: The local government has imposed a gold embargo.
sentences.cn: 當地政府頒佈了黃金買賣禁令。

sentences.en: Nobody wants the government to embargo food shipments.
sentences.cn: 沒有人希望政府禁運糧食。

sentences.en: The advent of new productivity will free us from backbreaking labor and further emancipate our minds.
sentences.cn: 新生產力的出現將我們從艱苦繁重的勞動中解放出來，並且進一步解放了我們的思想。

cn: 難以捉摸的，難以理解的

sentences.en: I haven't grasped the elusive charm of the original text.
sentences.cn: 我還沒有領會原文中令人難以捉摸的韻味。

sentences.en: Please bring some elastic bandages for me.
sentences.cn: 請給我帶一些彈性繃帶來。

sentences.en: His interpretation of the rules seems to be fairly elastic.
sentences.cn: 他對這些規則的解釋似乎是很靈活的。

sentences.en: The arrogant man talked a lot of nonsense in an editorial he wrote.
sentences.cn: 這個傲慢的男子在一篇社論中大放厥詞。

sentences.en: She is unwilling to borrow a dustpan from her neighbor.
sentences.cn: 她不願向鄰居借簸箕。

cn: 半信半疑的，猶豫不決的

sentences.en: Lisa is dubious about the matter and so decided to check if it is credible.
sentences.cn: 麗莎對這件事半信半疑，決定去核實一下是否可信。

sentences.en: Only a small piece of the cloth was drenched by the heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 只有少量的布被這場大雨淋濕了。

sentences.en: Standing on the roof, you can see the dome of St Paul's Cathedral.
sentences.cn: 站在屋頂上可以看見聖保羅教堂的圓屋頂。

sentences.en: The sudden fire was said to be a divine punishment.
sentences.cn: 據說突發的火災是上天的懲罰。

sentences.en: She didn't divine his intention to approach her.
sentences.cn: 她沒有察覺他靠近她的意圖。

sentences.en: The sound of animation easily diverts the child's attention from his homework.
sentences.cn: 動畫片的聲音很容易把小孩子的注意力從作業上轉移。

sentences.en: Her face was distorted in acute pain.
sentences.cn: 她的臉因為劇烈的疼痛都扭曲。

sentences.en: Her cheerful smile dissipated all of his anxiety.
sentences.cn: 她那歡喜的笑容驅散了他的所有不安情緒。

sentences.en: Don't dissipate your fortune randomly.
sentences.cn: 不要隨意揮霍錢財。

sentences.en: His dissertation on cognitive linguistics received high praise.
sentences.cn: 他的有關認知語言學的博士論文，得到了高度讚揚。

sentences.en: The city's small size is disproportionate to its large population.
sentences.cn: 這個城市規模很小，人口卻很多，這並不相稱。

sentences.en: What do you think of the wide disparity between the rich and the poor?
sentences.cn: 你如何看待貧富之間的極大差距？

sentences.en: The mechanic dismantled the motor with no delay.
sentences.cn: 那位汽車修理工立即拆除了這個發動機。

sentences.en: She believed that the ugly hut would disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 她認為，這棟醜陋的小木屋會破壞風景。

sentences.en: You are expected to disburse the traveling expenses within two days.
sentences.cn: 希望你於兩日內支付旅行費。

cn: 尺寸（寬度、長度、厚度、高度）

sentences.en: I guess she doesn't know the exact dimensions of the room.
sentences.cn: 我猜，她並不知道這個房間的確切面積是多少。

sentences.en: Nobody could give an adequate explanation for the differential treatment of students.
sentences.cn: 對於學生們的差別待遇，沒有人可以給出恰當的解釋。

sentences.en: That was a heartfelt expression of thanks, isn't it?
sentences.cn: 多麼衷心的謝意，不是嗎？

sentences.en: It would be hazardous to put all of your eggs in one basket.
sentences.cn: 孤注一擲是很冒險的。

sentences.en: The new manager treated the employees with haughty disdain.
sentences.cn: 那位新任經理對待員工們時總是高傲自大、不可一世。

sentences.en: That hardy person had lunch at this small restaurant, didn't he?
sentences.cn: 那個耐寒的人是在這個小餐館中吃的午飯，不是嗎？

sentences.en: His teaching method appears to be quite haphazard.
sentences.cn: 他的教學方法似乎是極為隨意的。

sentences.en: Nothing was said by the man with a haggard face, right?
sentences.cn: 那個神色憔悴的人什麼都沒有說，不是嗎？

sentences.en: Billy accidentally touched his wound, and he gave a grunt.
sentences.cn: 比利不小心碰到了傷口，悶哼了一聲。

sentences.en: The minister grunted heavily and threw the newspaper onto the ground.
sentences.cn: 部長重重地哼了一聲，把報紙扔在了地上。

sentences.en: The millionaire grudges to give even a penny to a beggar.
sentences.cn: 那位百萬富翁十分吝嗇，連一分錢都捨不得給乞丐。

sentences.en: I have good reason to believe that she has a grudge against us.
sentences.cn: 我有充分的理由相信，她對我們心存怨恨。

sentences.en: I have no idea what the dancers wearing grotesque masks are talking about.
sentences.cn: 我不知道那些戴著面具的舞蹈者們在討論些什麼。

sentences.en: It is grotesque to question his honesty.
sentences.cn: 質疑他的誠實，這是荒唐的。

sentences.en: It gratified her to hear of the outcome of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 聽聞此次協商的結果，她很高興。

cn: 親切的，和藹的；奢華的，優美的

sentences.en: It was gracious of the premier to smile to the public.
sentences.cn: 那位總理對公眾微笑，十分親切。

sentences.en: They were astonished at her gracious living.
sentences.cn: 她生活奢華，讓他們都感到吃驚。

sentences.en: She is grateful to him for his gesture of goodwill.
sentences.cn: 她很感激他善意的手勢。

sentences.en: They look forward to paying a visit to the company in goodwill.
sentences.cn: 他們渴望去參觀那個信譽良好的公司。

sentences.en: The owner of this strange shapeless garment remains a mystery.
sentences.cn: 這件怪異的衣服的主人依然是未知的。

sentences.en: It was not until last century that women gained the franchise.
sentences.cn: 直到上個世紀，女性才獲得了選舉權。

sentences.en: The businessman grew rich quickly after obtaining the fast-food franchise.
sentences.cn: 獲取了速食特許之後，那位商人很快就富裕起來。

sentences.en: We can find many problems within the basic framework of society.
sentences.cn: 我們可以發現，基本的社會結構中存在著很多問題。

sentences.en: It is unimaginable that the professional referee ignored that obvious foul in the first half.
sentences.cn: 在上半場比賽中，這個專業裁判竟然忽視這個明顯的犯規，這真是不可思議。

sentences.en: The forum for political debate turned out to be a great success.
sentences.cn: 事實證明，這個政治論壇是極為成功的。

sentences.en: The reason why she always fails is that she lacks courage and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 她一直失敗的原因在於她缺乏該有的勇氣和剛毅。

sentences.en: You can find a wide range of foliage in the botanical garden.
sentences.cn: 在這個植物園中，你可以看到各種各樣的觀葉植物。

sentences.en: There seems to be open dry fissures on the parched grassland.
sentences.cn: 幹灼的草地上似乎出現了深長裂縫。

sentences.en: The verb is used in a figurative sense in this sentence.
sentences.cn: 在這個句子中，這個動詞是用作比喻意義。

sentences.en: Her feminine features seem to be the most attractive.
sentences.cn: 她的容貌似乎是最為嫵媚的。

sentences.en: The employers'federation is going to call a meeting tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 明天早上，雇主協會將要召開會議。

sentences.en: You should consider the feasibility of seeking another job.
sentences.cn: 你要考慮到另找一份工作的可行性。

cn: n: 英噚（測水深的單位）

sentences.en: My guess is that he cannot fathom your remarks.
sentences.cn: 我猜，他無法理解你所說的話。

sentences.en: The ship sank 15 fathoms after being loaded with the goods.
sentences.cn: 載貨之後，這艘船下沉了十五英噚。

sentences.en: According to them, computers play the role of the facilitator.
sentences.cn: 他們認為，電腦起到了促進者的作用。

sentences.en: It seems that serious troubles lay behind their facade of happiness.
sentences.cn: 他們的幸福表像之下似乎隱藏著嚴重的問題。

sentences.en: I thanked him a lot for his explanation exonerated me from blame.
sentences.cn: 我對他十分感謝，因為他的解釋讓我免受責難。

sentences.en: You should be well aware of existentialism.
sentences.cn: 你應該十分了解存在主義。

sentences.en: The exalted sport of golf has been included in the Summer Olympic Games for this year.
sentences.cn: 高爾夫這項高貴的運動今年被列入奧運會比賽項目。

sentences.en: The young lady cannot follow her own inclination in this matter.
sentences.cn: 在這件事情上，那位年輕的女士不能遵循自己的意願。

sentences.en: Who on earth has the inclination to put great emphasis on language study?
sentences.cn: 究竟是誰有注重語言學習的趨勢？

sentences.en: It appears inappropriate for them to cooperate with this company.
sentences.cn: 他們與這家公司合作，似乎是不恰當的。

sentences.en: It was not until he suffered huge loses that he gave up his impractical plan.
sentences.cn: 直到他損失慘重之後，他才放棄了這個不切實際的計畫。

sentences.en: The policy seems to have far-reaching implications for the future of the industry.
sentences.cn: 這項政策對於這個行業的未來發展似乎是有著意味深長的暗示。

sentences.en: There is some doubt as to his implication in the case.
sentences.cn: 對於他是否涉入了這樁案件，尚有疑問。

sentences.en: The policeman made an imperious gesture to stop the car.
sentences.cn: 那位員警做了個傲慢的手勢來攔截這輛車。

sentences.en: It's imperative that they find the best solution to the problem as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 他們要儘快找出最佳方法來解決這個問題，這是十分重要的。

sentences.en: They all have no objection to the imperative of quality education for all.
sentences.cn: 對於讓所有人接受優質教育的必要性，他們都沒有什麼異議。

sentences.en: I find him an impartial judge, don't you?
sentences.cn: 我發現他是一位公正的法官，你怎麼看？

sentences.en: The player tried to find out how to impart spin onto a cricket ball.
sentences.cn: 那位運動員試圖尋找使板球增加旋轉力的方法。

sentences.en: The secretary refused to impart the news to anybody.
sentences.cn: 這位祕書拒絕將這個消息透露給任何人知道。

sentences.en: Children will get immunity to smallpox after being vaccinated.
sentences.cn: 接種疫苗之後，孩子們對天花就會有免疫力。

sentences.en: It's unknown whether or not he will always have immunity to criticism.
sentences.cn: 不知道他能否不受批評的影響。

sentences.en: They were all delighted at their immunity from additional taxes.
sentences.cn: 不必繳納附加稅，他們都很高興。

sentences.en: The gardener forgot to immerse the seeds in water beforehand.
sentences.cn: 那個園丁忘記了要事先將種子浸泡在水中。

sentences.en: He often used to immerse himself in his work all day long.
sentences.cn: 過去他常常整日埋首於工作中。

sentences.en: It is immaterial to her whether you agree to the plan or not.
sentences.cn: 你是否同意這個計畫，於她而言，並不重要。

sentences.en: There is no sense in relying on there being an immaterial soul.
sentences.cn: 寄望於那些虛無的靈魂，是沒有意義的。

sentences.en: Customers are reminded to beware of imitations.
sentences.cn: 他們提醒消費者謹防假冒。

sentences.en: The best way to learn languages is by imitation.
sentences.cn: 最好是借由模仿來學習語言。

sentences.en: Floodlights are usually used to illuminate a stage.
sentences.cn: 泛光燈常用作舞臺照明燈。

sentences.en: She stares at him, for he has no idea how to illuminate the difficult theory.
sentences.cn: 她盯著他看，但他不知道該如何解釋這個難以理解的理論。

sentences.en: With this problem solved, we could go on with the identification of the victims of the accident.
sentences.cn: 這個問題已經解決了，我們可以繼續鑒定事故遇難者的身份。

sentences.en: There seems to be no particular reason for his hysterical behavior.
sentences.cn: 似乎並沒有什麼特別的原因，可以解釋他那歇斯底里的行為。

sentences.en: In a recent public activity, Betty exposed his hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 在最近的一次公開活動中，貝蒂戳穿了他的虛偽。

sentences.en: Regular showering is a good way to maintain personal hygiene, which also can prevent bacterial growth.
sentences.cn: 人們經常洗澡可以很好的保持個人衛生，同時也能夠防止細菌滋生。

sentences.en: Time permitting, I will explain the features of hydrogen peroxide in detail.
sentences.cn: 如果時間允許的話，我會詳細介紹過氧化氫的特性。

sentences.en: It's said that a new hydroelectric power station will begin construction next week.
sentences.cn: 據說，下個月將修建一座新的水力發電站。

sentences.en: The star's scandal has humiliated the company so much that they terminated their contract with him.
sentences.cn: 該明星的緋聞使公司蒙羞，所以公司解除了與他的合約。

sentences.en: How high the humidity is!
sentences.cn: 空氣濕度真高！

sentences.en: We should treat animals with humanity.
sentences.cn: 我們應該以仁慈之心對待動物。

sentences.en: I have no notion of why she was openly hostile towards you.
sentences.cn: 我並不知道她為什麼會公然顯示對你的敵意。

sentences.en: We were much obliged to receive your kind hospitality.
sentences.cn: 我們都十分感謝你的殷勤款待。

sentences.en: The sun sank below the horizon before he came home, didn't it?
sentences.cn: 在他回到家之前，太陽就已經落到地平線之下了，不是嗎？

sentences.en: Porters have been to hoist the piano up to the top floor of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 雇主花錢雇用搬運工人把這架鋼琴吊到這家酒店的頂層。

sentences.en: Don't you hinder him in his work.
sentences.cn: 你不要去阻礙他的工作。

sentences.en: They used to be high up in the social hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 他們曾經有過很高的社會地位。

sentences.en: What a hideous scheme it is!
sentences.cn: 多麼可怕的計畫！。

sentences.en: Cuckoos are usually regarded as heralds of spring.
sentences.cn: 報春鳥通常被視為春天的使者。

sentences.en: This agreement heralds in a new era of peace, according to the official.
sentences.cn: 那位元官員認為，這項協定宣告著和平新紀元的到來。

sentences.en: The teacher is skilled at discovering students' latent talents.
sentences.cn: 這位老師擅長發現學生的潛能。

sentences.en: The new director has the habit of speaking with a languid drawl.
sentences.cn: 那位新任主管說話時習慣於拖長調子。

sentences.en: Turning the knob clockwise three times will open the chest.
sentences.cn: 順時針轉動旋鈕三圈就可以打開寶箱了。

sentences.en: They are about to discuss juvenile literature in the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他們將在此次會議上討論少年文學。

sentences.en: The defendants of the case were two juveniles aged 13 and 15 respectively.
sentences.cn: 這樁案子的被告人，是兩個未成年人，年齡分別是十三歲和十五歲。

sentences.en: The first item in eyesight training is to pick out the different species among a huge jumble of seeds.
sentences.cn: 視力訓練的第一項就是在一大堆混亂的種子裡挑選出不同的種類。

sentences.en: When two lovers start a romantic relationship, they will jettison their two closest friends.
sentences.cn: 當情侶們開始一段感情時，他們就會拋棄兩位親密的朋友。

cn: 使陷入困境，使受到損失

sentences.en: Even a single mistake is likely to jeopardize the security of the whole project.
sentences.cn: 即便是一個錯誤，也可能會危及這個工程的安全。

cn: 不能改變的，不可撤銷的

sentences.en: We will select an irrevocable letter of credit, if you insist.
sentences.cn: 如果貴方堅持，我方可以選擇不可撤銷信用狀。

sentences.en: We must win the contract irrespective of any possible difficulties.
sentences.cn: 即便有任何可能的困難，我們也必須爭取到這份合約。

cn: 不可抗拒的，不能自已的

sentences.en: If he yields to the irresistible temptation, she will break up with him.
sentences.cn: 如果他屈從於這種不可抗拒的誘惑，她就與他絕交。

sentences.en: These findings might invalidate the new law.
sentences.cn: 這些發現可能會使這部新法規無效。

cn: 難以捉摸的，難以理解的；無形的

sentences.en: The traveler had an intangible awareness of danger at that moment.
sentences.cn: 那時候，這個旅行者有一種模糊的危險感覺。

sentences.en: They have taken into consideration of all the intangible property.
sentences.cn: 他們已經考慮到了所有的無形財產。

sentences.en: Her grandma who suffers from insomnia was seeing a doctor at this time yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天的這個時候，她那患有失眠症的祖母正在看醫生。

sentences.en: It was last month that the corporation was declared insolvent.
sentences.cn: 這家公司是在上個月宣告破產的。

sentences.en: The official doesn't show any insight into human character.
sentences.cn: 這位官員並沒有表現出對人性的深刻了解。

sentences.en: They have purchased a great many of inorganic fertilizers.
sentences.cn: 他們已經購買了大量的無機肥。

sentences.en: There used to be innumerable books in the public library.
sentences.cn: 這個公立圖書館中曾經有數不清的藏書。

sentences.en: The local government should take the initiative in encouraging industrial development.
sentences.cn: 當地政府應該主動鼓勵工業發展。

sentences.en: They would like to test the ingenuity of the students.
sentences.cn: 他們想要測試學生們的靈巧程度。

sentences.en: This company has been severely punished for copyright infringement.
sentences.cn: 這家公司因為版權侵權而受到嚴厲的處罰。

sentences.en: His little son has suffered from influenza for three days.
sentences.cn: 他的小兒子患流行性感冒已經有三天了。

sentences.en: Never has he felt a sense of inferiority.
sentences.cn: 他從未覺得自卑。

sentences.en: The doctor warned us of the danger of the highly infectious disease.
sentences.cn: 醫生提醒我們注意這種具有極強傳染性的疾病風險。

sentences.en: Only in this way would we be well prepared for the induction of the new employees into their jobs.
sentences.cn: 只有這樣做，我們才能為新雇員的就職工作做好準備。

sentences.en: Computers seem to have become indispensable to our lives.
sentences.cn: 電腦似乎已經成為我們的生活中必不可少的一部分。

sentences.en: Much to their indignation, there has been a sudden steep rise in the price of petrol.
sentences.cn: 讓他們感到憤慨的是，汽油價格驟然上漲。

sentences.en: If George is not familiar with the indigenous language, I don't know who is.
sentences.cn: 如果喬治不熟悉當地語言，我不知道還有誰熟悉。

cn: 表示懷疑的，不能相信的

sentences.en: If anyone might question his honesty with an incredulous look, it is Hannah.
sentences.cn: 如果有人會以懷疑的神情質疑他的誠實，那就是漢娜。

sentences.en: The newcomer seems to be totally incompatible with his colleagues.
sentences.cn: 那位新員工似乎與同事們完全合不來。

sentences.en: It turns out that their accounts were mutually incompatible.
sentences.cn: 事實證明，他們的敘述是彼此衝突的。

sentences.en: That miniatures artist did not say a word regarding his request.
sentences.cn: 對於他的請求，那位微型畫畫家什麼都沒有說。

sentences.en: You could copy the model in miniature, if you like.
sentences.cn: 如果你願意，可以縮小複製這個模型。

sentences.en: A huge migration of people into the city would cause a lot of social problems.
sentences.cn: 大批移民遷入這個城市，可能會引起諸多社會問題。

sentences.en: There was a lively discussion about the future of microeconomics.
sentences.cn: 關於個體經濟學的未來前景，有一場激烈的討論。

cn: 極精細的，極為注重細節的

sentences.en: The technician is meticulous in the explanation of the theory.
sentences.cn: 那位技工講解這個原理時十分注重細節。

sentences.en: No more of your nonsense! She is not interested in the metamorphosis of caterpillars into butterflies.
sentences.cn: 你不要胡說！她對毛毛蟲蛻變為蝴蝶的過程一點興趣都沒有。

sentences.en: The mesh of the fishing nets can be neither too big nor too small.
sentences.cn: 漁網的網眼不能太大也不能太小。

sentences.en: The emergence of a new mercantile class is likely to bring about great changes.
sentences.cn: 新的商業階層的出現，可能會引起極大的變革。

sentences.en: That gangster put deadly menace to the business owner to compel him to pay up.
sentences.cn: 那個歹徒極力威脅恐嚇店主，強迫他把錢都交出來。

sentences.en: Just my luck! My memoir of the trip is somehow missing.
sentences.cn: 我真倒楣！我的旅行記錄莫名其妙地不見了。

sentences.en: After hearing the sorrowful news, the little boy immediately fell into a melancholy state.
sentences.cn: 這個小男孩聽到這個傷心的消息，馬上陷入了憂愁之中。

sentences.en: We were all disappointed in his mediocre film.
sentences.cn: 他的電影十分平庸，讓我們都感到失望。

sentences.en: What a magnificent medieval castle it is!
sentences.cn: 多麼壯觀的中世紀城堡！

cn: 錄取入學，准予註冊入學

sentences.en: Nothing could be more delightful to him than his matriculation.
sentences.cn: 再沒有什麼比他的錄取更為讓人高興的了。

sentences.en: The matinee idol used to take a walk at sunset.
sentences.cn: 演日間劇的那位演員過去常常在日落時分去散步。

sentences.en: All of the inhabitants in this city were massacred by the rebels.
sentences.cn: 這座城市的所有居民遭到了反叛者的大屠殺。

sentences.en: They were all sorry to hear of the martyrdom of the four-star general.
sentences.cn: 聽聞這位四星上將殉難，他們都很難過。

sentences.en: Here is the lemon marmalade.
sentences.cn: 給你檸檬果醬。

sentences.en: Any applicant for the position must possess plentiful managerial experience.
sentences.cn: 這個職位的所有申請人都必須具備豐富的管理經驗。

sentences.en: The millionaire sent magnanimous gifts to the poor people.
sentences.cn: 那位百萬富翁給窮人們贈送了慷慨的禮物。

sentences.en: The witness promised to go before the magistrate.
sentences.cn: 這位人證承諾說，他將在地方法院出庭。

sentences.en: May you achieve success in your study of macroeconomics!
sentences.cn: 祝願你的總體經濟學研究取得成功！

sentences.en: You had better take a mackintosh in case it rains.
sentences.cn: 你最好帶件雨衣，以防下雨。

sentences.en: The grassland used to be covered with luxuriant vegetation.
sentences.cn: 這片草原上曾經生長著茂盛的植被。

cn: 徘徊，逗留；拖延，動作遲緩

sentences.en: I saw her lingering about the entrance to the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 我看見她在超市入口處徘徊。

sentences.en: His mother criticized him for lingering too long over his meals.
sentences.cn: 他吃飯時慢吞吞地，媽媽批評了他。

sentences.en: They have given up on the project, and you are expected to do likewise.
sentences.cn: 他們已經放棄了這個項目，希望你也放棄。

sentences.en: The industrious professor immersed himself in lexicography.
sentences.cn: 那位勤奮的教授沉迷於詞典編纂工作中。

sentences.en: The new law aims at protecting legitimate businesses.
sentences.cn: 這部新法規旨在保護合法生意。

sentences.en: They have been absent from the meeting without legitimate reasons.
sentences.cn: 他們缺席會議，卻沒有什麼合理的理由。

cn: 應受稱讚的，值得誇獎的

sentences.en: His dedication to the cause of justice is highly laudable.
sentences.cn: 他致力於正義事業，應該受到高度讚揚。

sentences.en: The low latitudes are supposed to be extremely hot.
sentences.cn: 低緯度地區應該為格外炎熱。

sentences.en: You should not have allowed him too much latitude.
sentences.cn: 你本不該給予他太多的自由。

sentences.en: It is said that Chinese consider heavy snow in the winter as a good omen.
sentences.cn: 據說中國人把冬天裡下大雪認為是一個好兆頭。

sentences.en: The pay raise will be offset by excessive higher prices.
sentences.cn: 過高的物價會抵消掉工資上漲。

sentences.en: The young man who grew up in the mountainous areas had little knowledge of the history of the Occident.
sentences.cn: 那個在山區長大的年輕人對西方歷史所知有限。

sentences.en: I would like to move the oblong table upstairs.
sentences.cn: 我想把這張橢圓形的桌子移到樓上去。

sentences.en: Do not worry about me as my ex-boyfriend has already been obliterated from my memory.
sentences.cn: 不用擔心我，我早就已經把我的前男友忘記了。

sentences.en: High-calorie food will nullify long periods of physical exercise.
sentences.cn: 高熱量的食物會抵消長期鍛鍊的效果。

sentences.en: Any number multiplied by nought is nought.
sentences.cn: 任何數乘以零都等於零。

sentences.en: Notwithstanding language difficulties, they decided to live overseas.
sentences.cn: 雖然語言不通，他們依然決定到海外居住。

sentences.en: They missed their deadline, but the project was a great success notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 雖然他們施工逾期，這個專案依然是極為成功的。

sentences.en: She felt a pang of nostalgia at the sight of the old photograph.
sentences.cn: 看到這張舊照片，她忍不住起了懷舊之心。

cn: 名義上的，不真實的；象徵性的

sentences.en: The emperor was actually only the nominal ruler of the country.
sentences.cn: 那位帝王只是這個國家名義上的統治者。

sentences.en: The kind-hearted landlord only charged them nominal rent.
sentences.cn: 那位好心的房東只是對他們收取象徵性的租金。

sentences.en: Nick had a funny nickname in his childhood.
sentences.cn: 尼克在童年時期有個有趣的綽號。

sentences.en: Harold is nicknamed “Smiler” because he is always delightful.
sentences.cn: 哈洛德常常很快樂，因此，他得了個綽號，叫做微笑的人。

sentences.en: It is impossible for there to be a second narcotics agent.
sentences.cn: 不可能會有第二個毒品探員。

sentences.en: It has been proven that this kind of juice has a mild narcotic effect.
sentences.cn: 事實證明，這種果汁有輕微的麻醉作用。

sentences.en: Just like his namesake, Mr. Franklin achieved great success in the world of politics.
sentences.cn: 正如他的同名之人一樣，富蘭克林先生在政界取得了極大的成功。

sentences.en: This professor wrote a famous paper on Greek mythology last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，這位教授寫了一篇關於希臘神話的著名論文。

sentences.en: It is impossible for there to be a vowel mutation in the pronunciation of the word.
sentences.cn: 這個單字發音時不可能會有母音變化。

sentences.en: Emma exerted herself to muffle her feelings.
sentences.cn: 愛瑪竭力控制自己的感情。

sentences.en: Is there a mosque nearby?
sentences.cn: 附近有沒有清真寺？

sentences.en: The victory of the battle greatly boosted their morale.
sentences.cn: 這一戰役的勝利極大地鼓舞了士氣。

sentences.en: It will be a monstrous unfairness for those athletes to train for several months.
sentences.cn: 這樣對那些訓練了好幾個月的運動員來說簡直太不公平了。

sentences.en: Some people show a special preference for things of monstrous beauty.
sentences.cn: 一些人就是對具有畸形美的事物情有獨鍾。

sentences.en: There is not much monotonous work in this company.
sentences.cn: 在這家公司，並沒有多少單調乏味的工作。

sentences.en: They coordinated their efforts in order to gain a monopoly.
sentences.cn: 他們協同努力，以便獲取專賣權。

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, quality education is the monopoly of the rich in this country.
sentences.cn: 事實上，在這個國家中，優質教育是富人所獨有的。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if you have any questions about the international monetary system.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，對於國際貨幣制度，你是否有什麼疑問。

sentences.en: There are five monasteries in total in this district.
sentences.cn: 這個地區一共有五所修道院。

sentences.en: They went on with the discussion after a momentary pause.
sentences.cn: 短暫的停頓之後，他們繼續進行討論。

sentences.en: The molecular biologist lives up to his reputation.
sentences.cn: 那位分子生物學家不負盛名。

sentences.en: There was nothing wrong with this analog input module.
sentences.cn: 這個類比輸入元件沒有什麼問題。

sentences.en: 方或時間存在（發生）什麼事」，常用「there be + 名稱 + 地點 / 時間狀語」結構。如例
sentences.cn: 句所示。

sentences.en: When your roommates fall asleep, you should modulate your voice so as not to wake them.
sentences.cn: 當你的室友睡覺時，為了不吵醒他們，你需要調整自己的聲音。

sentences.en: This merchant mobilizes all of his relatives to give strong backing to the public welfare undertaking.
sentences.cn: 這個商人動員所有的親戚強烈支援公益事業。

sentences.en: They didn't dispel the misconception until after the accident.
sentences.cn: 直到此次事故之後，他們才消除誤解。

sentences.en: In order to have no plagiarism in the paper, she asked him to rewrite it.
sentences.cn: 為了確保這篇論文中沒有抄襲現象，她讓他重寫論文。

sentences.en: With the problem solved, they are going on a pilgrimage to Mecca.
sentences.cn: 這個問題已經解決了，他們將要去往麥加朝聖。

sentences.en: A large number of Muslim pilgrims are on their way to Mecca at this time of the year.
sentences.cn: 每年的這個時候，都有大批的朝聖者去往麥加。

sentences.en: Severe punishments are expected to stop the pilferage of goods.
sentences.cn: 希望嚴厲的處罰可以遏制貨物偷竊現象。

sentences.en: Time permitting, you could mix the pigment with oil.
sentences.cn: 如果時間允許的話，你可以把顏料與油混合在一起。

sentences.en: A great deal of pickles was served for dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐的時候上了很多泡菜。

sentences.en: Of course, she will manage as best she can to control her phobia.
sentences.cn: 當然，她將會盡最大努力來克服恐懼。

sentences.en: You can imagine there being a hot discussion about the design of petticoats.
sentences.cn: 你可以想像，有關襯裙設計的討論，是有多激烈。

sentences.en: The less persistent pesticide has grown in popularity recently.
sentences.cn: 近來，這種低殘留的殺蟲劑大受歡迎。

sentences.en: There being little time, we could not have a perusal of the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 沒有時間了，我們不能細讀這份報紙。

cn: （尤指宗教或政治信仰的）迫害

sentences.en: The party often persecutes those who don't agree with them.
sentences.cn: 該黨派經常迫害不同意他們的人。

sentences.en: The visitor was disappointed at there being so few perpendicular columns in the temple.
sentences.cn: 這座寺廟中的垂直柱子很少，那位遊客感到很失望。

sentences.en: The flagpole seems to be a little out of its perpendicular.
sentences.cn: 這個旗杆似乎是傾斜的。

sentences.en: A permissive upbringing is very likely to have negative effects on children.
sentences.cn: 放任的教養模式很有可能會對孩子們產生負面的影響。

sentences.en: They expect there to be a periodic review of expenditures.
sentences.cn: 他們希望對支出進行定期核查。

sentences.en: The gardener insists on building a perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 那位園丁堅持修建周邊的籬笆。

sentences.en: The divorced man in peril of being sued took his daughter home.
sentences.cn: 這個離婚的男子冒著被起訴的危險，把他的女兒接回家。

sentences.en: The best thing to do would be to improve your powers of perception.
sentences.cn: 你最好提高感知能力。

sentences.en: My perception of the matter is that we should place great emphasis on the quality of education.
sentences.cn: 我對此事的看法是，我們應該格外注重優質教育。

sentences.en: You could send the penicillin by airmail, if need be.
sentences.cn: 如果需要的話，可以空運盤尼西林。

sentences.en: The manager was angry to see so many pending inquiries.
sentences.cn: 經理看到還有這麼多詢價沒有解決，非常生氣。

sentences.en: It's apparent that you have placed the singer on a pedestal.
sentences.cn: 很顯然，你很崇拜那位歌星。

sentences.en: All in all, the patronage of this company is of great help to them.
sentences.cn: 總的來說，這家公司的贊助給了他們極大的幫助。

sentences.en: As is known to all, paranoia isn't cured easily.
sentences.cn: 眾所周知，妄想狂並不容易醫治。

sentences.en: His brother suffered from paralysis of his right leg at the age of 25.
sentences.cn: 二十五歲時，他的哥哥即承受右腿麻痹之苦。

sentences.en: The strike is likely to cause the complete paralysis of the public transport system.
sentences.cn: 此次罷工事件可能會引起公共運輸系統的全面癱瘓。

sentences.en: The little boy hid in the pantry when playing hide-and-seek.
sentences.cn: 玩捉迷藏的時候，那個小男孩躲到了食品儲藏室中。

sentences.en: We were all deeply impressed with the superb panorama of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 壯麗的山景全景讓我們都印象深刻。

cn: 美味的，可口的；滿意的，認同的

sentences.en: There is some doubt as to the palatable local wine.
sentences.cn: 對於美味的當地葡萄酒，尚有疑問。

sentences.en: Fast-food restaurants are supposed to be made more palatable to local customers.
sentences.cn: 速食店應該讓當地顧客更為滿意。

sentences.en: His parents have placed great hopes on him and spent an outrageous amount of money on his studies.
sentences.cn: 他的父母對他寄予很大的希望，在他的學習方面投資了一大筆錢。

sentences.en: The long report that the old professor worded was full of opaque words.
sentences.cn: 那個老教授作的這篇報告盡是晦澀的詞語。

sentences.en: It seems that there are ominous signs around her recently.
sentences.cn: 看起來她近來身邊好像圍繞著不祥的徵兆。

sentences.en: The discussion about the trade agreement has been protracted for three days.
sentences.cn: 有關這份貿易協定的討論，已經持續了三天時間。

sentences.en: This prototype for future school buildings is worthy of great praise.
sentences.cn: 未來的學校建築的模型值得大加讚賞。

sentences.en: As the legal representative of this company, he has the right to sign some significant protocols.
sentences.cn: 作為公司的法人代表，他有權簽署一些重要的協議。

sentences.en: The two Protestant ministers said good-bye to each other, one to go to the church, and the other to go home.
sentences.cn: 這兩位新教牧師互相道別後，一個去教堂，另一個回家。

sentences.en: Protectionism is actually a double-edged sword.
sentences.cn: 保護貿易主義其實是一把雙刃劍。

sentences.en: They will show the apartment to a prospective buyer in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午，他們要帶可能的買主去看這棟公寓。

sentences.en: Ten proprietors endorsed the plan, many of them businessmen.
sentences.cn: 有十位業主贊成這個計畫，其中商人占多數。

sentences.en: That gardener is skilled at propagating plants from seeds.
sentences.cn: 那位園丁很擅長由種子繁殖植物。

sentences.en: The proletariat have managed as best they could to propagate their faith.
sentences.cn: 無產階級盡最大努力來宣傳他們的信仰。

sentences.en: There will be more propaganda against alcohol in the next stage.
sentences.cn: 在下一個階段將會有更多的主張禁酒的宣傳。

sentences.en: The proletarian revolution is sure to succeed.
sentences.cn: 無產階級革命必定會取得勝利。

sentences.en: It's been said that prodigal housekeeping is a typical feature of her.
sentences.cn: 據說，這種鋪張浪費的持家方式是她的一個典型特點。

sentences.en: It proves that the philanthropist is prodigal with money.
sentences.cn: 事實證明，那位慈善家並不吝惜錢財。

sentences.en: They are to procure the revised edition of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 他們打算搜尋這部詞典的修訂版。

sentences.en: There is no knowing what will happen to the primate.
sentences.cn: 無法猜測靈長類動物將會有何種遭遇。

sentences.en: The pretentious writer always speaks to others in a tone of disdain.
sentences.cn: 那位自命不凡的作家總是用輕蔑的語氣說話。

sentences.en: She has no idea when her first premium will be due.
sentences.cn: 她不知道她的第一筆保險費將於何時到期。

sentences.en: We will have to pay a premium for parking in the city center.
sentences.cn: 在市中心停車的話，我們要額外付費。

sentences.en: This is just a prelude to social turmoil.
sentences.cn: 這僅僅是社會動亂的一個前奏。

sentences.en: Economic reform is the prelude of a scene of prosperity in that less-developed country.
sentences.cn: 經濟改革為那個不發達的國家拉開了繁榮景象的序幕。

sentences.en: There is a lot of work to be done before carrying out the preliminary experiments.
sentences.cn: 在進行初步試驗之前，還有很多事情要做。

sentences.en: I'm wondering who will be responsible for the necessary preliminaries for the conference.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，將由誰來負責此次會議的必要籌備工作。

sentences.en: There was not enough time to explain their precautions against fire in detail.
sentences.cn: 沒有時間詳細解釋他們的防火措施了。

sentences.en: Poultry farms in the village have been formed.
sentences.cn: 這個村子的家禽養殖已經形成規模了。

sentences.en: She postulates that the building is due for completion in two months.
sentences.cn: 她推斷，建築工事將於兩個月之後竣工。

sentences.en: There are a lot of postulates in the mathematical book.
sentences.cn: 這本數學書中有很多假設。

sentences.en: We ought to protect the environment for the benefit of posterity.
sentences.cn: 我們應該保護環境，造福後代。

sentences.en: Prosperous cities are usually concentrated in populous areas near the coast.
sentences.cn: 繁榮的城市通常是集中分佈在沿海人口稠密的地區。

sentences.en: There is a great need of literature for the populace.
sentences.cn: 對大眾文學的需求量很大。

sentences.en: They can list a wide range of artificial polymers, if need be.
sentences.cn: 如果有需要的話，他們可以列出各種各樣的人造聚合物。

sentences.en: You must have mistaken the polarity of the magnet.
sentences.cn: 你一定是弄錯了磁鐵的極性。

sentences.en: In short, we must take measures to deal with the growing polarity between the employees and the management.
sentences.cn: 簡言之，我們必須採取措施來應對勞方和資方之間日益增大的分歧。

sentences.en: Robbers plundered the vast treasures in the museum.
sentences.cn: 強盜掠奪了博物館裡的大量藝術珍品。

sentences.en: A great deal of plunder was burnt by the invaders.
sentences.cn: 侵略者放火燒了搶來的很多物品。

sentences.en: The plume on the crown is the most important part.
sentences.cn: 這頂王冠上的羽飾是最重要的部分。

sentences.en: The new wall seems to be out of plumb.
sentences.cn: 這道新牆似乎是傾斜的。

sentences.en: There is no need for you to plumb the mysteries of the woods.
sentences.cn: 你沒有必要去探索叢林的奧祕了。

sentences.en: The millionaire was indifferent to the plight of the homeless.
sentences.cn: 那位百萬富翁對無家可歸之人的困境漠不關心。

sentences.en: There is nothing for it but to prevent him from relapsing into bad habits.
sentences.cn: 別無他法，只能阻止他重染惡習。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that he will suffer a relapse.
sentences.cn: 他可能會舊病復發。

sentences.en: The girl reiterated that she hadn't been at home that day.
sentences.cn: 女孩重申，她那天沒有在家。

sentences.en: You may rest assured that any loss or damage will be reimbursed to you.
sentences.cn: 你的一切損失和傷害都會得到補償，盡可放心。

sentences.en: There is nothing more interesting than the rehearsal of a play.
sentences.cn: 再沒有什麼事情比排練一齣戲劇更有趣的了。

sentences.en: There is nothing more difficult than a rehearsal of a lengthy text.
sentences.cn: 再沒有什麼事情比背誦這篇冗長的課文更為艱難的了。

cn: v: 嚴格管制，嚴密編組

sentences.en: There is no use preventing him from enlisting in the crack infantry regiment.
sentences.cn: 阻止他加入這支赫赫有名的團隊是沒有用的。

sentences.en: These tourists will have to be regimented into large parties for sightseeing.
sentences.cn: 這些遊客們將被編成大組進行觀光旅行。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if you have any doubt about the refinement of the oil.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，對於油的精煉，你是否還有什麼疑問。

sentences.en: His brother seems to be a person of great refinement.
sentences.cn: 他的哥哥似乎是個溫文爾雅的人。

sentences.en: There has been an argument between the two referees.
sentences.cn: 這兩位裁判員之間曾經有過爭執。

sentences.en: He is surely qualified to referee the match.
sentences.cn: 他必定可以勝任此次比賽的裁判員。

sentences.en: There is nothing to be done—we'll have to redound our credit.
sentences.cn: 別無他法，我們只好提高信譽度。

sentences.en: You should be reminded that your misdeeds will finally redound to you one day.
sentences.cn: 要提醒你的是，你的惡行終有一日會報應到你自己。

sentences.en: She was reluctant to rectify the omission in the book.
sentences.cn: 她不願意修訂這本書中的疏漏之處。

sentences.en: Spirits should be rectified before you use of them.
sentences.cn: 使用烈酒之前應該進行精餾。

sentences.en: If everything goes according to schedule, they will make an aerial reconnaissance of the island tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 如果一切順利，他們將於明天對這個島嶼進行空中偵察。

sentences.en: The boss promised to recompense the employees for overtime work.
sentences.cn: 那位老闆承諾說，會給員工發放加班費。

sentences.en: Everyone has the right to receive adequate recompense for their service.
sentences.cn: 每個人都有權獲得自己的工作所應有的報酬。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I have no recollection of the baker's shop.
sentences.cn: 我並不記得那家麵包房。

sentences.en: The well-known writer seems to be lost in quiet recollection of the past.
sentences.cn: 那位著名作家似乎是沉浸在對往事的幽思之中。

sentences.en: There is only a slim chance that you will be able to reclaim your lost property.
sentences.cn: 你要找回所失去的財物，幾率很小。

sentences.en: The residents on the island have reclaimed an area from the sea.
sentences.cn: 這個島嶼的居民曾經填海造地。

sentences.en: It's best to reclaim glass from old bottles.
sentences.cn: 最好的做法是回收舊瓶子取得玻璃再使用。

sentences.en: The reciprocal trade agreement has been in effect for five years.
sentences.cn: 這份互惠貿易協定已經施行了五年時間。

sentences.en: The victims had no option but to rise up in open rebellion.
sentences.cn: 那些受害者別無選擇，只能公然造反。

sentences.en: Only after they gave a promise did we feel reassured about his safety.
sentences.cn: 他們給出承諾之後，我們才不再擔心他的安全。

sentences.en: The reactionary politics are not allowed to be published.
sentences.cn: 出版物中不得出現反動政治。

sentences.en: Reactionaries will be as such in the near future.
sentences.cn: 在不久後的將來，那些反動主義者的下場就是這樣的。

sentences.en: They just had some ravioli for supper.
sentences.cn: 晚飯他們吃的是方形餃。

sentences.en: The textile industry had been ravaged by the recession.
sentences.cn: 經濟衰退嚴重摧毀了紡織工業。

sentences.en: The enemy forces ravaged the small town.
sentences.cn: 敵軍洗劫了這個小鎮。

sentences.en: So ridiculous was the treaty that all of the member states refused to ratify it.
sentences.cn: 這份協議是如此的荒誕，所有成員國都拒絕批准。

sentences.en: Here is a random sample selected by her.
sentences.cn: 這是她隨機選擇的一份樣品。

sentences.en: They declared that they drew the winning numbers at random.
sentences.cn: 他們聲稱是隨機抽取的中獎數字。

sentences.en: There is growing concern about radioactive contamination.
sentences.cn: 放射性污染愈發讓人憂心。

sentences.en: The majority of the villagers were diagnosed with radiation sickness.
sentences.cn: 多半村民都被診斷出放射病。

sentences.en: Here comes the man who has contracted rabies.
sentences.cn: 那個患有狂犬病的人過來了。

cn: 問卷，問題單，調查表，徵求意見表

sentences.en: You are expected to complete the questionnaire by this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 請於下午之前完成這份問卷。

sentences.en: The meeting over, they started to deal with the difficulties in a purposeful way.
sentences.cn: 會議結束之後，他們開始堅定地解決困境。

sentences.en: Although pulleys are very small, we can use them to lift heavy things easily.
sentences.cn: 滑輪雖小，我們卻可以用它們輕易地舉起重物。

sentences.en: The advertising campaign to publicise the new high-speed rail service is scheduled to begin tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 定於明日舉行廣告宣傳活動，推廣新高鐵運營服務。

sentences.en: The leader of that country is well-known for his prudent personality.
sentences.cn: 那個國家的領導人因為謹慎的性格而聞名。

sentences.en: It was prudent that we made an enormous investment in real estate ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 我們十年前對房地產的大規模投資是十分有遠見的做法。

sentences.en: She asked us to simmer the soup for another ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 她請我們把湯再煨十分鐘。

sentences.en: You would be better off keeping the stew on the simmer for an hour or so.
sentences.cn: 你最好讓燉菜煨上一個小時左右。

sentences.en: There are lots of shrines for music lovers.
sentences.cn: 音樂愛好者的聖地有很多。

sentences.en: The old professor has entered the serene age of life.
sentences.cn: 這名老教授已進入了安詳的老年時期。

sentences.en: Their sensational victory has been in the headlines for two days.
sentences.cn: 他們的轟動性勝利已經連續兩天高居標題新聞。

sentences.en: To be frank, your new dress is sensational.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，你的新洋裝漂亮極了。

sentences.en: He will give a brief introduction to the latest semiconductor devices.
sentences.cn: 他將會對最新的半導體裝置進行簡單的介紹。

sentences.en: There is to be a lecture on seismographs.
sentences.cn: 將會有一場關於地震儀的講座。

sentences.en: There appears to be gritty sediment in the drinking water.
sentences.cn: 飲用水中似乎有沙粒狀沉澱物。

sentences.en: Having no price wars and market saturation is unusual.
sentences.cn: 沒有價格戰和市場飽和現象，是不尋常的。

sentences.en: The sanitary inspector was content with the sanitary facilities.
sentences.cn: 那位衛生檢查員對這些衛生設施感到很滿意。

sentences.en: To tell the truth, I am not sanguine about the chances of her coming.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，我並不覺得她會來。

sentences.en: She dreamed there could be a sanatorium nearby.
sentences.cn: 她夢想著附近可以有一所療養院。

sentences.en: There is a general public perception that saliva can kill bacteria.
sentences.cn: 人們普遍認為，唾液可以殺菌。

sentences.en: There is some doubt as to whether sagacity increases with age.
sentences.cn: 對於睿智是否會隨著年齡而增長，尚有疑問。

sentences.en: There are too many intersections there, so I took a very roundabout way.
sentences.cn: 那裡的路口太多，所以多走了些迂迴的路。

sentences.en: Someone is needed to stop the riotous action.
sentences.cn: 需要有人及時阻止這狂暴的行動。

sentences.en: The singer's concert was so riotous that someone called the police.
sentences.cn: 這位歌星的演唱會過於喧鬧，有人報警了。

sentences.en: I rinsed the flour off my hands and began to eat.
sentences.cn: 我把手上的麵粉沖洗掉後開始吃飯。

sentences.en: Anyone's religious beliefs should not be ridiculed.
sentences.cn: 任何人的宗教信仰都不應該被嘲笑。

sentences.en: Although she is an object of ridicule for some people, she never feels inferior.
sentences.cn: 雖然她是別人嘲笑的對象，但是她從不自卑。

sentences.en: I swear to you, I will get revenge for my brother.
sentences.cn: 我向你發誓，我會為我哥哥報仇。

sentences.en: The man crashed his neighbor's new car in a spirit of revenge.
sentences.cn: 那人在報復心的驅使下，撞壞了鄰居的新車。

sentences.en: These beautiful cups retail at 1 dollar. That's really cheap, isn’t it?
sentences.cn: 這些杯子零售價只有一美元，真的很便宜，不是嗎？

sentences.en: I only sell by retail. If you want to buy by wholesale, I can introduce you to someone else.
sentences.cn: 我這裡只零賣。如果你要整批買的話，我可以介紹一個人給你。

sentences.en: Nothing could be more delightful to them than a resurgent economy.
sentences.cn: 再沒有什麼比經濟復甦更能讓他們感到高興的了。

cn: 贊同的，支持的；反應靈敏的；回答的

sentences.en: I don't think he will be responsive to the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我並不認為他會贊同這個建議。

sentences.en: This company is supposed to be responsive to customers’ demands.
sentences.cn: 這家公司應該迅即回應顧客的需求。

sentences.en: She saw Ronald giving a responsive wink just now.
sentences.cn: 方才，她看到羅納德眨了眨眼睛作為回應。

sentences.en: There is said to be a few residual faults in the computer program.
sentences.cn: 據說，這個電腦程式中存在著少許殘留錯誤。

sentences.en: We have adequate reason to rescind the trade agreement.
sentences.cn: 我們有充分的理由廢止這項貿易協定。

cn: 與某人斷絕來往；拒絕；拒絕服從 / 遵守

sentences.en: Such being the case, you had better repudiate your former friends.
sentences.cn: 如果是這樣的話，你最好與舊友斷絕來往。

sentences.en: The conditions being favourable, we could repudiate their claim.
sentences.cn: 如果條件有利的話，我們可以拒絕他們的要求。

sentences.en: Please give me the reason you are repudiating the contract.
sentences.cn: 請告訴我，你為什麼要拒絕履行這份合約。

sentences.en: Crocodiles are a kind of reptile.
sentences.cn: 鱷魚是一種爬蟲類動物。

sentences.en: It being a legal holiday today, you might be unable to replenish your stock of notepaper.
sentences.cn: 現在是國定假日，你也許無法添置信紙。

sentences.en: She would like to replenish her glass with lemonade.
sentences.cn: 她想要在杯子裡再斟滿檸檬汁。

sentences.en: These overseas postings usually provide generous remuneration.
sentences.cn: 外派工作通常都有分優沃的報酬。

sentences.en: There is a possibility that the event has escaped his remembrance.
sentences.cn: 他可能已經不記得這件事了。

sentences.en: Every visitor will get a small remembrance of the visit later.
sentences.cn: 稍後每個遊客都會得到一件小小的紀念品。

sentences.en: There is no point in trying to persuade him into relinquishing his post to his successor.
sentences.cn: 勸說他將職位讓給繼任者是沒有意義的。

sentences.en: Under no circumstances should you relinquish your hold on him.
sentences.cn: 不論如何，你都不能鬆手放開他。

sentences.en: Transistor radios seem to have gone out of fashion.
sentences.cn: 電晶體收音機似乎已經過時了。

sentences.en: The psychopath has been on tranquilizers for the last three months.
sentences.cn: 在過去的三個月時間中，那位精神病患者都在用鎮靜劑。

sentences.en: Time permitting, we will introduce the progress of the research on torpedoes.
sentences.cn: 如果時間允許的話，我們將介紹魚雷研究的進展狀況。

sentences.en: The ship was said to have been torpedoed off the coast.
sentences.cn: 據說，這艘船是在沿海一帶被魚雷擊中的。

sentences.en: There is good reason to believe that they torpedoed the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 有充分理由認為，他們破壞了協商工作。

sentences.en: The adventurer walked miles and miles across the difficult mountainous terrain.
sentences.cn: 那位冒險家在崎嶇不平的山嶺地區走了很長很長的路。

sentences.en: That complicated scientific terminology is just beyond her.
sentences.cn: 她完全無法理解那些複雜的科學術語。

sentences.en: The international symposium on global warming is scheduled for tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 此次針對全球變暖的國際研討會，定於明天舉行。

sentences.en: The police felt a great necessity to keep them under round-the-clock surveillance.
sentences.cn: 警方認為，極有必要對他們實行晝夜監視。

sentences.en: There is a general superstitious belief that a broken mirror will bring bad luck.
sentences.cn: 有這樣一種迷信思想，認為打破的鏡子會帶來霉運。

sentences.en: With the expert having arrived, we began to discuss the problem of the supersonic aircraft.
sentences.cn: 那位專家到來之後，我們開始討論這架超音速飛機的問題。

sentences.en: The likelihood is that factory workers will be superseded by machines in the future.
sentences.cn: 工廠工人將來可能會被機器取代。

sentences.en: Due to a lack of subtitles, the editor was criticized for this mistake.
sentences.cn: 那位編輯錯在沒有加副標題，為此受到了批評。

sentences.en: You had better have the news report subtitled.
sentences.cn: 你最好給這篇新聞報導加個副標題。

sentences.en: The results of the research are certain to substantiate his theory.
sentences.cn: 調查結果必然會證實他的理論。

cn: adj: 附屬的，從屬的，次要的

sentences.en: The manager from the overseas subsidiary of the company overlooked the subsidiary question.
sentences.cn: 來自這家公司的海外附屬公司的這位經理，忽視了這個附屬問題。

sentences.en: His subordinate officers all think very highly of him.
sentences.cn: 他的下級官員對他都有很高的評價。

sentences.en: The officer and his subordinates believe that the other tasks should be subordinate to this one.
sentences.cn: 那位官員及其部下都認為，其他的任務都應該以這項任務為准。

sentences.en: They were asked to subordinate their individual needs to those of the group.
sentences.cn: 他們要將個人需求置於集體需求之後。

sentences.en: The students having taken their seats, the teacher began to explain the sublimation.
sentences.cn: 學生們都就座後，老師開始講解昇華現象。

sentences.en: This verb should be in the subjunctive in this sentence.
sentences.cn: 在這個句子中，這個動詞應該是用虛擬語氣形式。

sentences.en: Thanks to their cooperation, we have made a stupendous achievement.
sentences.cn: 多虧了他們的合作，我們取得了極大的成就。

sentences.en: With one of the villagers leading the way, they had no difficulty finding the mountain stronghold of the guerrillas.
sentences.cn: 靠一位村民帶路，他們很容易地找到了遊擊隊的山區據點。

sentences.en: To put it bluntly, the government might refuse to reduce its stockpiles of weapons.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，政府可能會拒絕減少武器儲備。

sentences.en: The speculator stockpiled a great amount of goods in the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 那位投機商在倉庫中儲備了大量的貨物。

sentences.en: The doctor came out of his office with a stethoscope in his hands.
sentences.cn: 那位醫生走出了辦公室，手裡拿著個聽診器。

cn: 模式化的人 / 物，老一套

sentences.en: We feel little interest in a play with full of stereotypes.
sentences.cn: 對於這種充斥著公式化人物的劇碼，我們並沒有什麼興趣。

sentences.en: The little boy fell off the spiral staircase and broke his leg.
sentences.cn: 那個小男孩從螺旋樓梯上摔下來，摔斷了腿。

sentences.en: They had a discussion about the spiral of rising wages and prices.
sentences.cn: 他們討論的是工資和物價的交替上升。

sentences.en: Watching the falling leaf spiraling to the ground, she heaved a sigh.
sentences.cn: 看到落葉盤旋著飄到了地上，她嘆息一聲。

sentences.en: The taxi driver sustained an injury to his spine in the head-on car crash.
sentences.cn: 在此次迎頭相撞擊事故中，這位計程車司機傷到了脊樑骨。

sentences.en: We had the luck to see the seven colors of the color spectrum in the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 我們有幸在彩虹中看到光譜的七種顏色。

sentences.en: The new technology is being widely used in the whole spectrum of industry.
sentences.cn: 這項新技術已經廣泛應用於整個工業領域。

cn: 世故的，老練的；精良的，尖端的

sentences.en: The sophisticated salesperson is skilled at dealing with customers.
sentences.cn: 那個世故的售貨員擅長應對顧客。

sentences.en: The government decided to limit its expenditures on sophisticated modern weapons.
sentences.cn: 政府決定減少用於精良現代武器的費用開支。

sentences.en: The best thing to do would be to consult your solicitor.
sentences.cn: 最好去諮詢你的事務律師。

sentences.en: Sodium carbonate—in the form of crystals—is usually used to make glass, paper, etc.
sentences.cn: 晶體狀的碳酸鈉通常用來制玻璃、紙張等。

sentences.en: This manager had a snobbish dislike for people of lower social status.
sentences.cn: 這個經理非常勢利，不喜歡身份低微的人。

sentences.en: All of us shouldn't have snobbish mockery of the people who work at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 所有人都不應該自命不凡地嘲笑底層工作的人。

sentences.en: He was born and brought up in a slum and looked forward to leaving there.
sentences.cn: 他出生在貧民窟，並在那裡長大，渴望著離開那裡。

sentences.en: With his parents disappointed, he had to give up his study of zodiac signs.
sentences.cn: 由於他的父母很失望，他不得不放棄對黃道十二宮的研究。

sentences.en: The politician reached the zenith of his influence at the age of 55.
sentences.cn: 在五十五歲時，那位政客的影響力達到了頂峰。

sentences.en: The Africans dreamed of throwing off the yoke of slavery.
sentences.cn: 那些非洲人夢想著擺脫奴隸制的枷鎖。

sentences.en: The farmers yoked oxen together before ploughing the field.
sentences.cn: 在犁地之前，農民們用軛把牛套在一起。

sentences.en: Rumor has it that Tom and Jane have been yoked together in marriage.
sentences.cn: 有傳言說，湯姆和珍結婚了。

sentences.en: To tell you the truth, she has no idea how to use yeast.
sentences.cn: 坦白說，她不知道該怎麼用發酵粉。

sentences.en: My advice to you would be to make a couple of xeroxes of the contract beforehand.
sentences.cn: 我建議你，提前複製好合約的影印件。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if you could help me xerox the document.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，你能否幫我複印這份檔。

cn: 被風吹落的果實；意外的收穫

sentences.en: There being no windfalls in the orchard, they were filled with joy.
sentences.cn: 果園裡沒有果實被風吹落，他們都很高興。

sentences.en: We were lucky to get a windfall of 3,000 US dollars.
sentences.cn: 我們幸運地得到了三千美元的意外收穫。

sentences.en: The dog's leg was wedged in the narrow crack.
sentences.cn: 這個小狗的腿卡在那狹縫裡了。

sentences.en: The guy was scared when he saw the police's warrant for him.
sentences.cn: 這個傢伙看到員警對他的逮捕令就嚇壞了。

sentences.en: There is no warrant for what he said.
sentences.cn: 他說的話毫無道理可言。

sentences.en: I was unable to warrant that it would not reoccur.
sentences.cn: 我不能保證這種事情不會再發生。

sentences.en: Hannah doesn't have the courage to battle against the vicissitudes of life.
sentences.cn: 漢娜沒有勇氣對抗每況愈下的生活。

sentences.en: With so many things to settle, she could not help crying in vexation.
sentences.cn: 有這麼多事情要做，讓她很煩惱得忍不住哭起來。

cn: 遺跡，痕跡；毫無，一點也不

sentences.en: There remains not a vestige of the ancient museum.
sentences.cn: 那個古老的博物館遺跡已經蕩然無存。

sentences.en: The pity of it is that we could not find a vestige of common sense in his theory.
sentences.cn: 遺憾的是，我們發現，他的理論毫無常識。

sentences.en: My work done, we could carry out research into vernacular literature.
sentences.cn: 我的工作已經完成了，我們可以對本國語創作的文學作品進行研究。

sentences.en: The ventilation shaft of the coal-mine appears to be out of order.
sentences.cn: 煤礦的通風豎井似乎出了問題。

sentences.en: They lodged a vehement objection to investing in the firm.
sentences.cn: 他們強烈反對投資這家公司。

sentences.en: That vegetarian likes pop music and classical music.
sentences.cn: 那位素食者喜歡流行音樂和古典音樂。

sentences.en: They finally succeeded in developing a smallpox vaccine.
sentences.cn: 他們最終成功地培育出了天花疫苗。

sentences.en: The best utensil for keeping things fresh is a refrigerator because its temperature is adjustable.
sentences.cn: 冰箱是最好的保鮮工具，因為他的溫度可以調節。

sentences.en: They made such an enormous uproar that they woke the whole house.
sentences.cn: 他們喧鬧之聲驚醒了全屋子的人。

cn: 無道德原則的，不講道德的

sentences.en: Under no circumstances should you use unscrupulous methods to deal with rival firms.
sentences.cn: 不論如何，你都不應該用不道德的手段與對手公司競爭。

sentences.en: It would be unethical to be indifferent to the sufferings of refugees.
sentences.cn: 對難民的苦難視而不見，是不道德的。

sentences.en: Down jumped that sailor from the boat when they were caught in an undertow.
sentences.cn: 碰上回流的時候，那個水手從船上跳了下去。

sentences.en: Nothing can undermine the friendship between them for they have been best friends since childhood.
sentences.cn: 沒有什麼能夠破壞他們的友誼，他們從小就是最好的朋友。

sentences.en: I'm wondering if the ultraviolet rays will do harm to our skin.
sentences.cn: 我想知道，紫外線光會不會損傷皮膚。

sentences.en: There once lived a worker who was interested in ultrasonic waves.
sentences.cn: 這裡曾經住著一位工人，他對超聲波很有興趣。

sentences.en: The publication date of his latest novel was the 21st ultimo.
sentences.cn: 他的最新小說是於上個月二十一日出版的。

sentences.en: She only ate some light food because of her mouth ulcer.
sentences.cn: 她只能吃些清談的食物因為她患了口腔潰瘍。

sentences.en: There remains one question about this turbine.
sentences.cn: 關於這台渦輪機，還有一個問題。

sentences.en: The mourners stood in tribute to the martyr at the funeral.
sentences.cn: 在葬禮上，送葬者向這位烈士默立致哀。

sentences.en: The worker went out of the store, translucent glass in hand.
sentences.cn: 那位工人從店中走出來，手裡拿著一塊半透明玻璃。
